We look forward to seeing you again and please feel free to contact me personally, as I would be delighted to assist with any requests or needs you may have. Kind regards!

Summary: Just came back from a week here...you can wake up refreshed, eat breakfast, and walk to take the shuttle to Disneyland. Room was clean and staff helpful when we needed a way to get to Anaheim Stadium...walkable to many restaurants including The Pizza Press, Tony Roma's, and Cheesecake Factory. Coffee and lemon-water always available. Outdoor pool and hot tub.Take the 50 bus to the Intermodal station for Amtrak or the Metrolink, a really nice commuter train. Definitely appreciated the free shuttle after 15 hours at Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for staying with us and for sharing your wonderful comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. I am delighted you enjoyed your visit with us and I thank you for your kind comments about our team and property! Thank you again for your stay and we hope to see you again real soon. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Manager's Special for Violation of Privacy
Summary: In short, my husband and I went away for the night without our kids. We only live about 30 minutes from the area, so we aren't using the hotel for only it's proximity to Disneyland.  An hour before checkout, a maid began knocking on the door, and opened it even before she had finished the first set of "knock knock knock". I hadn't even a chance to reach the door yet before she had opened it, as I stood there HALF dressed, with my bosoms hanging out and obviously a surprised look on my face! She blamed me for not having the "do not disturb" sign on the door- even though I should be entitle to privacy until I check out of my room, and feel free to do so.  Management tried to brush it off. finally the General Manager offered me the "manager's special" for the incident. I was
Manager Response: First and foremost and with all due respect I want to make it perfectly clear that we appreciate ALL guests (past, present and future) and the feedback they provide and I have always chosen not to use this platform to challenge. Our housekeeper saw that you had the Do Not Disturb sign up and passed by the room. She later witnessed your husband moving out your luggage and that the Do Not Disturb sign was removed and your car was also gone. She knocked and announced herself, (as you acknowledged), and came in. I am truly apologetic that our housekeeper walked in on you as she sincerely thought the room was vacant. I spoke with you personally and offered you a Managers Special for this visit, and when you said that was not enough, I offered a Managers Special for your next visit as well. When you came back and spoke to me in person, a month later, I was under the impression you were satisfied with the discount which I applied and arranged to your upcoming reservation. However, afterwards you canceled that reservation with us. Please contact me personally, as my original offer for the Managers Special still applies for a future visit. Kind regards!

Summary: You really can't go wrong staying at this hotel. Clean, quaint, and convenient to Disneyland.  The staff is friendly and helpful and the price is right.  I have stayed here numerous times and have never been disappointed. a real gem.
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for being a repeat member of the Candy Cane family and for sharing your wonderful comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. Summary Heading: The best place to stay when going to Disneyland
Summary: I have been staying at the Candy Cane Inn for many years now. What I love the most is that it is updated regularly. The rooms are extremely clean and the staff friendly and  accommodating. It is quiet charming and has the best breakfast I have found in a hotel near Disneyland. When I say near they are on the same block  as Disneyland.  It works for family's and Couples alike. The grounds are beautiful with flowers and a waterfall welcoming you into  the parking lot. If you want a memorable stay when going to Disneyland this will be it. I highly recommend.
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for being a loyal and dedicated member of the Candy Cane family. Summary: With the exception of a couple very minor things, you seriously cannot go wrong staying here. It is an adorable little motel with incredibly friendly and nice employees. We've stayed here on three different occasions (with an upcoming fourth) and were happy every single time.  Pros: --Cost: Totally reasonable. They also give you a coupon for $10/night off your next stay, as long as it's within a year. --Location: It's a short walk to the gates (less than ten minutes) and is on the same side of Harbor as the gates, so you only have to cross one smaller street to get there. Additionally, the hotel runs a free shuttle every half hour, so if you are tired after a long day, no need to walk back. --Breakfast: This is one of the few nicer motels in the area (that we've found) that
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us once again, and I am delighted that you and your family continue to enjoy the Candy Cane Inn. We appreciate your many kind comments and it is our pleasure to provide our guests with friendly and excellent customer service. Kind regards!

Summary: From July 18-July 25 my husband and I visited Disneyland, Beverly Hills and Huntington Beach. We're from Long Island, NY and we go to California about every two years. We stayed at the Candy Cane Inn for the second time and once again it was perfect. From check in to check out, it was great. The location is perfect. They have a free shuttle every half hour to and from Disneyland. Very convenient. We didn't use the pool but it's really cute where the pool is located. In the mornings they have a continental breakfast buffet that is partly on the patio near the pool. It's just enough to get you through lunch. Make sure you say hello to Ed. He's a man who walks around the pool for a couple of hours sharing his stories of Disneyland. He's a character. The grounds at the Candy Cane
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for staying with us once again and for sharing your wonderful comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. Summary: We are a family of 5, with the youngest child at 8-years-old.  We found the walk from the property to the front gate of Disney was 7 minutes so super convenient.  We also found the hotel breakfast to be more than adequate... it was nice to eat near the pool, and there was a nice coffee station with real cream.  I also saw them refilling the pastry area with pastries from a local bakery... I always like to see that!  We stayed at both the Disneyland Hotel and Grand Californian before but never during peak season... this time we couldn't justify the cost for the Disney properties.  Candy Cane Inn was a very economical option when the Disney ones are at peak.  I would stay again... but during value season I would still opt for Disneyland Hotel.

One day there was a freak storm and I'm guessing when housekeeping entered for the Turn Down Service they noticed all the wet clothes and towels everywhere. They restocked everything that evening. The grounds rival Disney as well. Beautiful gardens everywhere! The pool was small and relaxing. We spent about an hour at the small wading pool in paradise. Felt like we were sitting around a backyard pool, which we loved. The rooms were a bit rougher. Our carpet was badly stained and just alarming to look at. I kept
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for staying with us and for sharing your wonderful comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. Summary Heading: Candy Cane hits the sweet spot yet again
Summary: We now stay here every time we go to Disneyland California as the hotel offers excellent value for money. Its one of the few hotels on the same block as Disneyland so there is no crossing of the busy Harbor Boulevard. it backs on to the Disney property behind the mountain range of "Radiator Springs". Despite this there is a regular free shuttle bus to the park entrance, a massive 5 minutes away. Nevertheless after a day in Disneyland your feet might be glad of the bus back.  The hotel rooms are clean and comfortable and have good laundry facilities on site. We prefer ground floor rooms due to the amount of luggage we have as international visitors and there were no noise issues.   Check-in was friendly and efficient and we got a $10 voucher off our next stay per night. The pool
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for being a loyal and dedicated member of the Candy Cane family. Enjoyed the pool and continental breakfast. Only stayed 2nights but if we return to Anaheim will definitely stay here. Very pretty landscaping also. Just another comment, forgot a sweater and called the hotel. Spoke with the head of housekeeping and he went and found my lost item and mailed it to me. Very courteous service.

Summary Heading: You can't get much closer to Disney
Summary: We were recommended the Candy Cane by a relative living in California.  Having visited Eurodisney (and despite looking at everything online) I expected this hotel to be a 10-15 minute drive (at least) from the parks - especially as a complimentary bus if available.  I could not have been more wrong, it is walking distance from the park and if (like us) you walk at a reasonable pace you can almost beat the bus to the park - it is a 6 minute walk.  So this means it is really easy to just hop back to the hotel for a couple of hours and rest.  Check in was helpful and we had apparently booked a superior room - which meant we had a quieter room, breakfast could be delivered to the room, we could rent movies and got a late check out - probably more things but I can't remember.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us and for agreeing with your family members’ recommendation. I am delighted we were able to accommodate you and your family and that you enjoyed the many complimentary amenities we offer here at our hotel, including our exclusive complimentary shuttle, and expanded continental breakfast. Summary: I can't recommend the Candy Cane Inn enough. Clean and cozy rooms, good value, great service, beautiful grounds, close walk to Parks and very timely hotel shuttle. The breakfast buffet is great. The Premium room with the huge breakfast basket, free movie rental and welcome snacks is worth it!  We stay here several times a year and we've been consistently very pleased each time!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us once again, and I am delighted that you and your family continue to enjoy the Candy Cane Inn. We appreciate your many kind comments and it is our pleasure to provide our guests with friendly and excellent customer service. Kind regards!

Summary: The family and I visited the beautiful Candy Cane Inn for six nights in their premium room. Getting breakfast delivered to the room was always nice and on time. The beds were comfortable along with the roll around bed we needed. Room service was good. Everyone working their was always nice and friendly to us. The Candy Cane Inn is in perfect distance to Disneyland, restaurants and the Anaheim Garden Walk. Disneyland is about I would say a five to ten minute walk then it also depends on how fast you walk.  I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us on your recent trip to the theme parks. I am delighted you and your family enjoyed your stay and the many complimentary amenities we offer with our Premium rooms. We hope to see you again real soon! Kind regards.

Summary: This is the only place to stay in Anaheim, we have been going to California for 20 years and have never found a better place. Staff are the best nothing to much trouble. Easy access to all attractions. Rooms exceptional value and very clean. I could write a list of exceptional qualities for the Candy Cane Inn but trying will give you the best experience and an holiday of a lifetime.

Summary: Candy Cane Inn is a gem, folks.  This lived up to the hype of all the reviews I had read about it before.   The convenience of the free hotel shuttle is unbeatable and the free continental breakfast was very good, plentiful, and restocked in a timely manner.  The pool area was very nice and we really enjoyed our stay.  AAA discount was good and we received a $10 off the room voucher for our next stay.  Hotel staff was friendly and so were the shuttle drivers.  It's an easy place to make your stay enjoyable.

Summary Heading: We loved this gem of a hotel!
Summary: We stayed at the Candy Cane June 18-23, and we couldn't have been happier. We selected this hotel because the price was much more reasonable than other area hotels, and the Trip Adviser reviews were great.   The hotel and grounds are lovely--almost like an oasis in the middle of such a busy area. Lots of beautiful flowers everywhere. We did not use the pool area, but we passed it on our way in and out every day, and it looked very nice and well-kept.  We had a premium room on the first floor, which included an option to have continental breakfast delivered to the room each day. We took advantage of the free continental breakfast basket every single day. This was a great feature because it was nice to eat in the room while still getting ready. Also, the order sheet allowed us to
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us and for agreeing with our many TripAdvisor reviews. Summary: Nice breakfast provided each day.  EXCELLENT location for Disney.  Bus to parks, but also about a half mile walk.  Nice and clean and beautiful landscaping.  Rooms extremely small.  All good rooms, except I might not want to be right on the street.  The hotel backs to Carsland, but we didn't hear any noise.

Summary: Our 2nd time back at Candy Cane Inn with Grandma and 2 kids. 1st trip was when the kids were 5 & 8 and return trip they are 8 & 11. We love the small hotel feel and the complimentary breakfasts by the pool. The pools and hot tub were great. There is even a separate smaller kids pool that is all shallow. The pools & hot tub never seemed too busy during our 2 stays here. Our 2nd trip included my 29 year old Niece who walked to Disney at night it's so close and on the same side of the street.

Summary: We've stayed at several different Disneyland area hotels, and we've now found our favorite, the Candy Cane Inn! The location makes for an easy walk, but the shuttle bus is also a great option for tired feet.  With all the gardens and flowers, it's a clear winner for the best landscaped property, and it was clean everywhere you looked, including the rooms. The pool area is beautiful, while many other pools in the area are quite plain.  My daughter really loved the 1 1/2 foot deep play pool as well as the overall hotel.  If you're going to serve donuts and bagels, have good ones! - another win here. Free coffee in the lobby all day, free parking, free wi-fi, it's all a great value. Summary: This is a reasonably-priced, clean hotel located VERY near Disneyland.  The hotel is on a busy street, but the rooms surround the hotel's cobblestone plaza, which makes for a pleasant setting.   I was a little disappointed--given the name--that there aren't any Candy Canes or Disney-like decorations to appeal to kids.  Also, the swimming pool is pretty small.  No HBO.  But, all that being said, it is a fine place to rest between park adventures.

Summary: The hotel is just a 10 minute walk to the main entrance of Disneyland/DCA. But if you're too tired, they also offer a free shuttle that runs 2x per hour in each direction. The room was clean but very small. There was not enough room to unpack our luggage, clearly a couple of more drawers would be necessary. Don't take the smallest room if you are 4 people. Breakfast was in a nice location, by the pool. There were bananas and apples, and the rest was typical industrial junk food. Even the eggs are pre fabricated (already peeled and heated in a microwave), not even sure what they are exactly, don't think this stuff came from a chicken. The price is good for the location. Kind staff too.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Outstanding hotel in all facets. Great price, incredible location, ten minutes from the gate. Decent breakfast. Extremely clean, inside and out. We would definitely stay here again. In fact, I think my daughter would have stayed a month. ROLL TIDE!

Summary Heading: Easy access to the parks, secure environment and great service
Summary: This was my 6th visit to the Candy Cane Inn, and I typically feel very at home there.  There had been a change in GM's since our last trip, although it was not really a big deal. Some minor rooming issues...nothing more. The property is "U" shaped around the parking / pool areas, and this offers a very secure feeling when you return to the hotel late at night. They offer up a decent "continental" style breakfast, that includes much needed proteins - boiled eggs that have already been peeled, small squares and swiss and cheddar cheeses, and of course there's yogurt. There are plenty of bread options, as well as coffee, juices and milk. The breakfast setting is very pleasant around the pool, with Edd, the morning greeter out and about. And yes, he spells it with two d's. After
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for being a repeat member of the Candy Cane family and for sharing your wonderful comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. Summary: Have heard only great things about the Candy Cane Inn. We finally had a chance to stay there at the end of June. The location is excellent! A quick 10 mins and you are in either park! Beds were comfortable, room was quiet for the most part, breakfast was nice...although I did bring my own cereal...just cause I like what I like. I rated it very good vs excellent just cause I was expecting outstanding service and friendly staff. For the most part they were but the lady at the front desk during our check in seemed to have other things on her mind and was not very welcoming to say the least. I had to ask questions about breakfast times, pool time...simple things that should have been easily stated in welcoming first timers. I even stated that we were first time guests. I would stay

Summary Heading: Close to Disney and Decent Price
Summary: This hotel is decent and a short walk from Disney. They offer free parking and continental breakfast. They will also give you a $10 off voucher for a future visit.   The hotel rooms are always clean, and the staff is pleasant. We stay here often!

Summary: Have looked at this property in the past when we have been to Disney but haven't stayed there we were here in June and must say the best place hands down, we were a party of 4 three adults and a 15 year old so needed two rooms they gave us adjoining rooms on second floor very clean and the most comfortable beds ever all in party agreed, beautiful property from entrance and throughout, a short walk to park or catch the complimentary shuttle after a nice breakfast. this place a must stay for a family highly recommend.

Summary: We stayed at the Candy Cane Inn for the first time this June.  We were staying for three nights and it was reasonably priced so we took a chance with this one after reading the reviews on Trip Advisor.  We checked in fairly easy and the room was quaint.  We had a normal room with two queen beds.  It had a bathroom that was a good size, a table with two chairs, and a fridge.  The beds were fairly comfortable and the I was surprised at the fact that we really didn't hear any noise. We were on the first floor and didn't hear anyone above us either.  Of course, the fireworks from Disney were heard but not a long amount of noise or too distracting.    The breakfast is just bagels, muffins, hard boiled eggs, etc.  Not a huge spread but enough to sustain you.  The pool was small, but

Thank you again for your many kind comments and please don’t hesitate to call or email me directly should your family be returning to the Candy Cane, as I would be delighted to assist with reservations. Summary: Had heard of this hotel for many years but this was my first stay.  I thought it was very good and so close to Disneyland.  It was nice to walk to my room through the lovely flowers and landscaping.  Pool area was very nice and I had breakfast by the pool each morning.  Good selection of breads, yogurt, cheese, fruit, hard boiled egg and good coffee.  Room was fine, bed comfortable, linens were soft, overall was very clean.  Small fridge and in room coffee maker.  It is a 'motor hotel' style so a bit noisy in the morning as people mobilize for their day.  But has been updated very nicely.   You feel like you're in California when you are there because of the landscaping which is a treat.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and I am delighted that you enjoyed the Candy Cane Inn. Summary Heading: Just As Sweet As a Candy Cane!
Summary: I had an absolutely wonderful stay in the Candy Cane Inn! It's a cute and quiet hotel with free continental breakfast, wifi, and a free Disneyland shuttle service. You don't even need the shuttle service though, my boyfriend and I walked to and from the park every morning and evening and it only took about 10 minutes. The continental breakfast was great and we were able to grab it and go on the way.  The staff was knowledgeable and helpful during the day; however, the night staff seemed very inattentive and was unable to help us find or recommend a good restaurant in the area which was slightly disappointing.  Overall we will definitely be coming back!  And for Disney Passholders, make sure to use that Passholder discount on the hotel! Unfortunately they were unable to give us a
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us for the first time and I am delighted that you enjoyed the Candy Cane Inn. We appreciate your kind comments about all of our complimentary amenities, including our expanded continental breakfast. I thank you for our conversation we had and I am again truly apologetic that our staff was inattentive. I again thank you for staying with us and we hope to see you again soon. Kind regards!

Summary: We booked the Candy Cane Inn based on trip adviser reviews and its close proximity to Disneyland. We are a family of 5 (2 adults, 3 kids aged 14, 11, 8) and stayed for 6 nights. We booked a Premium Room which accommodated all 5 of us but was extremely cosy (2 queen beds and a rollaway all lined up together)!! For the amount of time spent in our rooms, it wasn't a big deal.  Breakfast delivered to our room each morning was a great way to start our long days at Disneyland. The free shuttle was part of the reason we booked Candy Cane Inn. We would often walk to Disneyland in the mornings (5-8 mins) but catch the shuttle back in the afternoons and night. The kids loved the pool and spa and was a great way to spend the afternoon after a big morning at Disneyland. Mini Mart and 7/11
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us on your recent trip to the theme parks. We look forward to seeing you again and please feel free to contact me personally, as I would be delighted to assist with any requests or needs you may have. Kind regards!

Summary: Candy Cane Inn is in a great location and is walking distance to Disneyland, although they do offer a shuttle service every 30 min. Enjoy the outdoor pool. Continental breakfast included, with a lot of options. Have breakfast by the pool or in the small breakfast area. Rooms are basic, but clean. Staff is friendly and helpful. Really happy with our stay and would definitely return.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and I am delighted that you enjoyed the Candy Cane Inn. We appreciate your many kind comments and it is our pleasure to provide our guests with friendly and excellent customer service. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as I would be delighted to assist with future reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: The Candy Cane Inn was a great place to stay for our trip to Disneyland.  The price was a fraction of the Disneyland hotels and we only had a 10 minute walk to the park.  Breakfast was provided, as well as, bus service to and from the park. The rooms were very clean and all of the employees were incredibly friendly and helpful.  I would definitely stay her again for my next trip to Disneyland.

Summary: I have always like Candy cane inn! It offers free breakfast and a free shuttle to Disneyland ! This time I felt it could use a little updating! It is in an awesome location for Disney goers! Rooms  with king beds are a little bit little and dark because they are under the stairs! Love the location but wish they would update it a little!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us and providing your valuable feedback. I am truly apologetic that your last visit with us was not to your liking. Summary: We come every year and would never dream of staying anywhere else but the Candy Cane Inn. The place is truly magical for us.  The grounds are beautiful, breakfast delicious and pools great.  Staff is wonderful, as well.

Summary Heading: As always, perfect in every way!
Summary: Perfect in every way!    Would never stay anywhere else in Anaheim BUT the Candy Cane Inn.    Perfect location, perfect setting, perfect rooms, meticulous landscaping, extremely comfy beds, most wonderful staff!     You feel like you've entered a little European village when driving onto the property!

Summary: 4th yearin a row to stay at this great private hotel.  Comfortable, great staff, free continental breakfast, quiet, and a free Disneyland shuttle every 30 minutes...on time.  Not a cookie cutter place but a gem to be enjoyed.  Back again next year.....

We look forward to seeing you again soon and please feel free to contact me personally when returning, as I would be delighted to assist with reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: We stayed based on reviews and it was great. We are a family of four and had a roll away in the room and it was perfect.  Beds very comfortable. I brought an over the door shoe organizer that we hung on closet door. This allowed for a lot of organized storage.  Friendly front office and check in. They printed directions for us and answered our questions.  This hotel saved us a lot of money vs. On property hotels.

Summary: This was a great hotel, primarily because of the location! It was about a 10 min walk to Disneylands entrance. Breakfast was included, make sure you get there early as the good stuff runs out. The rooms were well equipped with towels, and your standars hygienic needs. The hotel is a little old but well maintained. Staff was very friendly, good for our party of 9. Pool and hotub were very clean. Would recommend for a good deal, and great location for everyone visiting Disneyland!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and I am delighted that you enjoyed your visit. We do strive to provide an exceptional product and delivering friendly service while being mindful of families traveling on a budget. Thank you again for your wonderful comments and we look forward to seeing you again real soon. Kind regards!

Summary: This hotel is a hidden gem. After a long day at the parks, we had a short walk back to the hotel, not even 5 min. And the days we were too tired to walk 5 min, they have a free shuttle back to the hotel. Free shuttle, free wifi, free breakfast and free parking! The rooms were exceptionally clean and cool (much needed when it's 85 degrees outside). The service was wonderful. We were able to check in early around 10am, and during our stay the staff was very informative with the surrounding area. There was a moment when we needed hot water at 11pm and the front desk staff went out of their way to open the closed breakfast area to give me a cup of water. Overall our stay was amazing! The staff of housekeeping, shuttle driver, bell staff, front desk, gardener, and security guard all

Summary Heading: Outstanding, well-priced choice for the Disneyland area. A very well-managed property.
Summary: We spent two nights at the Candy Cane Inn with our two daughters. We wanted to be close to the Disneyland Resort, but wanted to avoid the inflated rates at the Disney-owned properties (nice though they are).  Candy Cane Inn is an older property that is meticulously maintained - both in the rooms and around the grounds. It's not 'luxury' in the sense of amenities, but rather a welcoming, friendly and relaxed little inn near the park.  We opted for [and would recommend, especially if traveling with little ones] the premium room, which features delivery of their expanded - and generous - continental breakfast to the room. These rooms are generous in size, and ours had a full-sized bathtub which I always appreciate. The only complaint I had was a slightly beaten-down mattress and a

Summary: I booked our family's stay at The Candy Cane Inn based on a recommendation of a friend.  It was, shall we say, a sweet decision!  Pros:  Clean.  Comfortable.  Quiet.  Close to Disney. Reliable dedicated shuttles (didn't realize how awesome this was until we left the park the first night).  Well-stocked continental breakfast.  Delightful staff all around.  Hot tub and pool for relaxation after a long morning or day at the park.  Cons:  The pool was considered small by my kids.    Overall it was a great stay and we will definitely stay here again!

Summary Heading: Great Hotel With Next Door To Disneyland
Summary: Beautiful Location Close to all Amenities plus you can walk to Disneyland   The people at the hotel are very friendly and looking for ways to make your stay enjoyable.  The serve a great continental breakfast in the morning to get you going for the whole day. The rooms are small but there is everything you need for a good nights sleep to get you refreshed for your holiday.  Will stay here agin in the future.

Summary Heading: no place more convenient if you're spending the day with the mouse!
Summary: we spent two nights/three days at disneyland/california adventures and decided to stay at the candy cane inn because a) we'd always heard great things and b) they had the availability (not often available).  It's the first time we've stayed on the Harbor Blvd side, and, although there's always shuttles waiting to drive you over to the parks, it's only about an 8 minute walk straight to the gates.  **(It's also nice to not have to struggle trying to get past the Downtown Disney crowds).  The rooms were clean, well maintained, and roomy enough for 4 of us (altho we were only 2) with closet space and a mini-fridge.  Good and comfy beds (2 queens) with updated furnishings and clean carpeting; we didn't take advantage of the pool but there were lots of people out there (not noisy)

Summary Heading: A very nice Good Neighbor hotel
Summary: We stayed here for 5 nights while we were on vacation. This place was perfect for myself and my two kids. The pool area was clean and relaxing - has a nice hot tub and a kiddie pool, too. The staff was friendly. The rooms are clean and the beds comfy. If you can, spring for the Premium room - having breakfast delivered to your room is a great start to a busy day at Disney. They also offer a free shuttle to and from the park. Would recommend this place to anyone visiting Disneyland.

Summary: I am always leery of staying at a new to me hotel. Good reviews. Bad reviews. What to believe? But my friend stays here all the time. So we took a chance and it was wonderful! The rooms were cool and quiet. We were on the ground floor near the pool. We were able to park right outside and load right in. The room was very clean. In fact they clean the carpets in between each guest. That's clean. The complimentary breakfast is not grand but there are a lot of choices and we enjoyed it. It was a perfect place to stay for our two day Disneyland trip with our 2 year old. When I checked in I accidentally left my annual pass in the lobby. They called me the next morning (at a reasonable time I might add). The staff was informed and courteous. However, I hesitate to write all this good

Summary Heading: Dirty carpet vs. Close to Disneyland
Summary: I just checked out of Candy Cane Inn today. The hotel is an easy 12ish minute walk to Disneyland which is a definite plus. Our room was orderly but a bit rough around the edges which I was fine with overlooking. Our problem was that the carpet in our room and the adjoining room next to it was extremely dirty. Our first evening there, we discovered that my one year old's feet were filthy after she walked around the room playing. We cleaned them then decided she'd have to wear shoes any time we were in the room and tried to keep her off the floor as much as possible. This morning she had to walk around without shoes for about an hour and again her feet were really dirty. It made me question the cleanliness of everything around my room. I don't expect perfection but my family

I have attempted to reach you through the TripAdvisor email system, however I have not heard back and wanted to respond. We do listen to all guest comments and I just wanted you to know that our owners are currently in the process of installing hardwood floors in our rooms as they are non-allergenic, sanitary and easier to maintain. We do currently have a few rooms already installed with the new flooring and if you were to return, I would love to block you into one of these rooms for your family to enjoy. Summary Heading: No reason to stay at a Disney property!
Summary: We just returned from a wonderful stay at the Candy Cane Inn. Everything about it was great, right down to cucumber infused water they supply at the front desk!  We stayed in a deluxe room and I highly recommend it for the breakfast service alone.  It was so nice to pick out what we wanted for breakfast the night before and have it delivered to our room at the time we wanted the next morning. The selection and quality of the food was wonderful.  Our room was very clean and the beds were comfortable.  We stayed on the 2nd floor in the back of the property and it was very quiet.  The free shuttle was very convenient, but the walk to Disneyland was an easy one.  We would highly suggest staying at this property, especially when you compare the cost versus staying at a Disney

Thank you again for your stay and please feel free to contact me personally when your family is returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: We had a great stay at this hotel.  We were in a Standard Room and loved it.  Lots of space for 2 adults and 2 kids.  We had a room right across from the pool on the 2nd floor and it was really quiet.  Never heard neighbors.  Beds were very comfortable.  The free shuttle was a savior for tired kids and feet. Free breakfast was wonderful.  All staff we came in contact with were helpful and friendly.  The pool was great as well, with a toddler pool tucked away in the back behind the hot tub in a gated area.  The grounds were beautiful compared to comparable priced motels in the area.  We will for sure be back!

Summary: I found this hotel on Tripadvisor, now I can write my own review. It is awesome! The Candy Cane Inn was one of my favourite hotels during our month- long USA trip. We stayed three nights in a premium room, which was actually much more reasonably priced than any of our other hotels. This lovely boutique hotel has so much character and adds to the Disneyland experience. It makes you feel excited to go to Disneyland! I personally always try to stay in places that have some character and are unique, as I cannot stand big, boring hotel chains that have zero charm. The gardens are gorgeous, beautifully done, so many colourful flowers everywhere. The pool and spa area is fantastic and you get to enjoy complimentary breakfast outdoors by the pool if you wish, or you can be seated

Summary: We know a few people who regularly stay at the Candy Cane Inn and love it so we decided to try it.  We had a good experience - this hotel just felt comfortable.  We had 4 people who stayed in a deluxe room for 3 nights and there was enough space for us, however we were not in the room much as we were in the parks from opening until closing.   The beds were comfortable, the room was clean - my only (petty) negative comment is that the air in the room felt stuffy after being gone all day as true with some other hotels in the area.  The free breakfast was fine with pastries, fruit, hard boiled eggs and cheese, cereals, donuts, bagels, breads and juices/coffee, etc.  Although we never seemed to time the shuttle service correctly at night (when we wanted it with our tired feet), it

Summary Heading: I wish we found this gem of a hotel sooner
Summary: My boyfriend were guests here for three nights.  The first thing we noticed are the beautiful landscaped grounds. Greenery and bright tropical flowers everywhere!  Totally added to the "Disney" feel.  All the employees we encountered, from the front desk to housekeeping staff, were friendly, helpful, and genuine.  We stayed in a standard guest room which was perfect for us. The room was wonderful - clean and fresh smelling, comfy beds, loved the shutters on the windows, free wifi and mini fridge, toiletries, hair dryer and we were able to park right outside the entire stay without having to hunt for a parking space. Location is perfect! They offer a free shuttle service but we opted to walk which took us about 8 minutes one way. It's so close you can see the Carsland backdrop
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us to be of service during your first visit with us. Please feel free to contact me personally when you and your boyfriend are returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: Just returned from a weeklong stay at this motel.  It was adequate for our needs, a place to rest up after a day at the parks or sightseeing.  Grounds were clean and well kept.  We paid a little more for a larger room which I'm not sure we got!  Breakfast was simple but enough of a variety for everyone, not a full breakfast, no meats, pancakes or waffles.  There were pastries, hard boiled eggs, donuts, cereal and yogurt. It's an 8 minute walk to Disneyland or a 5 minute shuttle ride.

Summary: Well no need to worry about this review, as one usually does about reading reviews..  You can not beat this place!! We stayed here in September-October 2014  NZ family of 4 for 10 nights (on my dream trip of taking my girls to Disneyland like  when I was young) and it was better than I expected.  Just to name a few of the highlights of this place: you  are close to Disneyland in fact right behind it with a courtesy Shuttle or you can easily walk, friendly staff,  have a mini fridge, use of washing machine, (which by the way you don't get  in the big hotels) breakfast included in price, (typical american type breaky, but enough to keep you going til lunch and without the hassle of having to find something) other modes of transport near by either across the road or from Disneyland

We thank you again for staying with us and we look forward to seeing you again soon. Kind regards!

Summary: The Candy Cane was a great way to escape the busy crowds and heat of Disneyland. The staff were accommodating and the grounds were so beautiful. We really stepped onto the property and were able to relax.  Staff found us a room when we arrived early, at about noon. This was so great, because we could unpack, repack and head to Disneyland. The staff were also able to bring us a playpen promptly and clean our room at requested times if we were back for naps during the regular cleaning schedule. Breakfast was wonderful and the grounds were great! Loved the ice water and coffee served in the lobby 24-7. We will return:)

I am delighted you and your family enjoyed your stay and I thank you for your kind comments about our team and property! We arrived from Australia on Mother's Day so the hotel was unable to check us in early as was booked out due to the Mother's Day classic being held at Disney, this was fine with us as it was expected and the Inn have always accommodated us in the past when possible. The location of the Inn is great, walking distance to Disney with a free shuttle when your feet get tired and right next door to the Garden Walk mall which houses a visitors centre which was extremely helpful or as painful as pulling teeth depending on who is assisting you. We had requested adjoining rooms and the request was accomodated. the rooms were located on the ground floor and as always, were very clean and comfortable, my only complaint has nothing to do

Summary: We had a wonderful time. The shuttle leaves every half hour, and seems to stick to that schedule within a minute or two. The only problem we had was we are from central California and we are in a severe drought, so the watering of all the plants was a bit hard to watch.

The Candy Cane has been drought conscience for a long time and while we do water our plants, we use sprinklers minimally and water by hand to ensure we are moisturizing as needed and not having any excess run off. Thank you again for staying with us and please feel free to contact me personally when you and your family are returning to the Anaheim area as it would be my pleasure to assist with reservations. Summary Heading: The happiest place next to the Happiest Place on Earth!
Summary: This was my 3rd stay in 3 months at this hotel. I've tried for years to get in and always full. Now I know why!!! First two times in deluxe room with 2 queens and was plenty roomy and perfect. Just stayed in a premium room for the first time. It is their priciest room (not compared to other hotels in area tho) and we had breakfast delivered to our room (did I mention the free breakfast is delicious, don't miss the donuts/ so soft and fresh), we had snacks delivered in mid afternoon, and a turn down service (optional) in the evening. Front desk staff is so accommodating and friendly, they treat you like you matter.Shuttle every half hour although it's an easy walk to park.  I won't stay anywhere else when visit Disneyland Resort from here on out. I have stayed at over half the
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for being a loyal and dedicated member of the Candy Cane family. I am delighted you enjoyed your 3rd visit with us and I thank you for sharing your many wonderful comments about our property. We have a wonderful team here who work hard and I am thankful to be a part of that. We look forward to seeing you again soon and please feel free to contact me personally when returning, as I would be delighted to assist with reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: I booked this place because of the great reviews and proximity to Disneyland. The place provides a shuttle, but you don't really need it. Book the premium room if you can. Overall we were happy with our stay...  Pros:  Disneyland is 5 mins walking distance place is clean staff is super nice specially (Luis) free shuttle available   reasonably priced  same amenities as resort hotels inside disneyland premium rooms come with free wifi, breakfast, and larger rooms  place has a small pool  Cons:  Because of the proximity to resorts it can be loud ( fireworks )  clean but outdated...the staff told me owner is renovating place, adding elevators etc... I have no idea why I was charged an extra $20 more then contract I signed once we got home
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us on your recent trip to the theme parks. I am delighted you and your family enjoyed your stay and the many complimentary amenities we offer with our Premium rooms. I have tried to reach you through the Tripadvisor email, as I wanted to do some research regarding the comment that you were charged an extra $20, but have not heard from you and wanted to answer back.  Thank you again for staying with us and please feel free to contact me personally if there is anything further I may be able to assist you with. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: nice place, very good value for the money
Summary: We stayed here recently for a family trip to Disneyland. We would stay here again.  Pros: The room was clean. The complimentary breakfast was reasonable with cereals, pastries, bagels, cheese, juice, milk, and coffee. The pool was nice. The shuttle to and from Disneyland was extremely helpful.  Cons: The complimentary Wi-Fi was pathetically slow. The boiled eggs for the breakfast tasted a little off/bland. There were very few low-carb breakfast options except the so-so eggs. Housekeeping kept coming every morning before 9 a.m.
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for staying with us and for sharing your wonderful comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. I am delighted you and your family enjoyed your stay and I thank you for your kind comments about our property and amenities! I do apologize for the items you noted as guest comments are very important to us, and while we never want to disappoint our guests I am glad we can use this opportunity to continue to grow and train our team. We look forward to seeing you again and please feel free to contact me personally, as I would be delighted to assist with any requests or needs you may have. Kind regards!

Summary: Positives: location, cleanliness and pleasant to eat breakfast by the pool.  Negatives: we found the reception staff unhelpful and abrupt (apart from James), especially as we were first time visitors and not from the USA. Room tired and dated. Charged $10 per night more than quoted when booking (originally booked by AAA member who unfortunately could not make trip) and when we complained, the response was not pleasant and no offer to get managers involved.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and providing your valuable feedback. I am sincerely sorry that you were unhappy with our service, as we do strive to provide all of our guests with the excellent service they have come to expect from the Candy Cane. I am happy you enjoyed the breakfast and cleanliness of our property. Kind regards!

Summary: This was our second time staying at the Candy Cane. The staff was very nice, the rooms were clean and exactly like like the images on the website but the beds weren't as good as I remembered. We had problems with the phone and the message feature that would starting flashing in the middle of the night. After a long day in the park we were too exhausted to try and figure out where the bright red was coming from when it woke us up night after night. I spoke with the office staff and we never had a message, just a malfunctioning light. Yes, we probably just should have unplugged the phone, but we had more than one room rented and we wanted the other rooms to be able to contact us. Still a great place to stay but could use some updates to prevent others from being awakened during
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for being a repeat member of the Candy Cane family and for sharing your wonderful comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. I am truly apologetic that you had issues with your phone, and it kept you folks from getting the rest you deserve after a long day at the parks. I am happy we were able to solve a few of the issues regarding noise. Thank you once again for your return visit and we do hope to see you again soon. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: A hop and skip to Disneyland
Summary: Candy Cane is a great place to stay if you are on a budget. They provide a shuttle to Disneyland or it's a short 10 min walk. The staff is friendly, the rooms are a little dated, but always clean. They have a continental breakfast.  If you forgot anything, there is s store next door.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and I am delighted that you enjoyed your visit. We do strive to provide an exceptional product and delivering friendly service while being mindful of families traveling on a budget. Thank you again for your wonderful comments and we look forward to seeing you again real soon. Kind regards!

Summary: This hotel was great! The rooms were spacious and had a very large and comfortable bathroom. The best part of this hotel was how close it was to the park! It was a 4 minute walk away and was even closer to  Disneyland than the actual Disneyland hotel! I would definitely stay again!
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us to be of service during your recent visit to Anaheim. We do appreciate your business and I am so glad you were able to enjoy our many complimentary amenities we have to offer at the Candy Cane. Thank you again for your stay and please feel free to contact me personally when your family is returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with reservations, as well as discussing what our team can do to bring your next review up to a five. Kind regards!

Summary: My daughter and I stayed here over Mother's Day weekend and we had a great experience. The grounds were very well kept and the staff were friendly and helpful. Our room was exceptionally clean and nicely decorated. Even though our room was located in the front corner of the property facing the street, it was surprisingly quiet. The Candy Cane Inn has a great location (only about a 10-15 minute walk to Disneyland). It is, also, close to theaters, shopping, and restaurants. Parking and breakfast (cereal, yogurt, fruit, eggs, bagels, pastries, cheese) were included, so it was a great value. I had stayed here over 15 years ago and had an equally wonderful experience then. In the past 5 years, I've stayed at properties which were closer to Disneyland, but the quality doesn't compare
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting with us for the first time and for sharing your kind comments regarding our property, complimentary amenities and exceptional guest service. We have a wonderful team, who take pride in their jobs and taking care of our guests and they too appreciate when folks take the time to write positive comments such as yours. We thank you again for staying with us and we look forward to seeing you again soon. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Super hotel for trip to Disneyland
Summary: Loved the room....clean room, soft luscious bed & beddings, great breakfast buffet, garden-like setting of hotel, great shuttle and super close to main gate of Disneyland! What more could you ask for?!!!! Wanna go back soon as we have annual passports😍
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and I am delighted that you enjoyed the Candy Cane Inn. Thank you again for your stay and please feel free to contact me personally when you and your family are returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with reservations, as well as discussing what our team can do to bring your next review up to a five. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Best Place to stay near Disneyland park!
Summary: We stay here every time we visit Disneyland.  The staff is always very friendly and helpful.  The rooms are neat and clean.  They offer a shuttle that leaves every 30 minutes but if you miss it, it is only a 10 minute walk to the park entrance.   The breakfast is simple but plenty good.  There is coffee, hot chocolate, juice and milk, Cereal, rolls, toast and fruit.  Everything is fresh and tastes good.     The pool is always clean and well maintained, the flowers are always beautiful.  We have tried other hotels, in the same area, in the past and none are as nice.
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for being a repeat member of the Candy Cane family and for sharing your wonderful comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. I am delighted you enjoyed your stay and I thank you for your kind comments about our many complimentary amenities we have to offer. We look forward to seeing you again soon. Kind regards!

Summary: Our stay at CandyCane Inn was Fantastic. Beautiful surroundings, spotless rooms, great staff (especially Ericka) and a great Continental breakfast. Shuttle bus back and forth to Disneyland  was great too. Thank you for the great stay and we will be back.
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for staying with us and for sharing your wonderful comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. I am delighted you and your family enjoyed your stay and I thank you for your kind comments about our team and property! We look forward to seeing you again and please feel free to contact me personally, as I would be delighted to assist with any requests or needs you may have. Kind regards!

Summary: I've always wanted to stay at the Candy Cane Inn as it gets glowing reviews from locals and Disney forum members but it has never been available for our dates and now I understand why. I was pleasantly surprised to pick up a 2 night stay the days before Memorial Day in a Deluxe 2 queen bed room.  We spent the first part of the day at Disneyland then walked over for a midday break to check into Candy Cane Inn. We were greeted warmly and welcomed quickly and check in was a breeze with great information about breakfast and amenities available. We found our room easily on the top floor and found the grounds impeccable. Our room was towards the back which we actually loved because it was near the back of CarsLand and Tower of Terror could be seen in the background. We felt in that
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us and for agreeing with our many wonderful TripAdvisor reviews. I am delighted we were able to accommodate you and your husband and that you enjoyed the many complimentary amenities we offer here at our hotel. We look forward to having you back with us for another wonderful visit in December. Kind regards!

Summary: This hotel is a gem.  It is a beautiful oasis in the middle of the crowded Harbor Blvd cluster of hotels around Disneyland.  The staff is super friendly, the landscaping is beautiful and fragrant, the rooms are clean and well maintained, even though they are a bit small.  Despite its location, the hotel is incredibly quiet (we were on the park side).  There is a free shuttle to the Disney Parks' entrance, but you can walk it in about 10 minutes if you want.  There is also free parking which is great.  The breakfast is good with seating indoors or outdoors by the pool.  I love the lemon-cucumber water too!  I will be back.
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for staying with us and for sharing your many wonderful comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. I am delighted you enjoyed your stay and the many complimentary amenities we offer here at our hotel, including our Expanded Complimentary Continental breakfast and our clean and comfortable rooms. Thank you again for your many kind comments and please don’t hesitate to call or email me directly should your family be returning to the Candy Cane, as I would be delighted to assist with reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: We have stayed at The Candy Cane Inn several times. Whenever we have company from home we take them to stay at The Candy Cane Inn.  It is within walking distance to Disneyland and the inn has a shuttle as well.  The breakfast is very nice and the inn itself is very well maintained. No dislikes.
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for being a loyal and dedicated member of the Candy Cane family. I am delighted you enjoyed your visit and the many wonderful complimentary amenities we have to offer here. We look forward to seeing you again soon and please feel free to contact me personally when returning, as I would be delighted to assist with reservations. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: 4th visit just as good as ever!
Summary: I have written several reviews for the Candy Cane Inn. I write about my experience each time I stay here as I enjoy the place so much, I like to express my satisfaction after each visit.   On our first stay here in 2011, I proposed to my now-wife. We honeymooned here in 2012 and in 2013 celebrated our anniversary at this property. We associate our great Disney experiences and memories with the Candy Cane Inn and it only seemed fitting that our first Disney experience as parents included staying here. Even though we had an option to stay at another property that would have given us cheaper rates through our insurance, we still chose the CCI since we know what to expect from them.    It had been a couple years since my wife and I last stayed here and we were just as happy this
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for being a loyal and dedicated member of the Candy Cane Inn, and for giving us the opportunity to be able to share in your wonderful milestones. We thank you again for sharing your wonderful comments and please don’t hesitate to contact me personally when returning, as I would be delighted to assist with next year’s reservations. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Review for mom's who may want to take kid(s) solo...
Summary: This review is for all those mom's out there that may or may not have a partner that wants to go solo with their kids - safety first.  We (me and 2 kids) stayed here in October of 2014, so about 6 months ago. I am writing a review now, as we are thinking of staying again, this fall 2015 and my greatest concerns in booking was finding a safe place to be taking kids by myself.  Everything was just so easy, checking in, hanging at the pool, enjoying the free breakfast and the nicest walk to Disney you could have.  This was a sole Disney trip, we did not rent a car and we did not need one. The van dropped us at the hotel and we walked to Disney and surrounding eateries and the next door convenience stores. I had two children with me an 11 year old and a 13 year old, no complaints on
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us to be of service during your recent visit to Anaheim. We do appreciate your business and I am so glad you were able to enjoy our many complimentary amenities we have to offer at the Candy Cane. Thank you again for your many wonderful comments and please feel free to contact me personally when you and your family are returning to the Anaheim area as it would be my pleasure to assist with reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: Best place period for Disneyland and convention center. I've stayed multiple times. Staff is very friendly and patient. Breakfast is great. Egg, donuts, ect. Rooms clean. Video rental from the office is good too.  Only downside is lack of parking.
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for being a repeat member of the Candy Cane family and for sharing your wonderful comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. I am delighted you enjoyed your stay and I thank you for your kind comments about our team and property! We look forward to seeing you again soon. Kind regards!

Summary: The Candy Cane Inn is in need of some work. They're living on their reputation at this point. It's pretty clear rooms haven't been updated in awhile--the mattresses need to be replaced, the bathrooms need to be updated, and the they need to add flat screen TVs and drawer space. They somehow don't even have ESPN, which just lets you know they're trying to save a few dollars. They need to spend on an Inn that has been a goldmine for them, but sadly has lost its charm.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and providing your feedback. I am sincerely sorry that you were unhappy with our property, products and services provided. I try and never utilize this platform to confront guest’s as we appreciate and strive to make them feel welcome and at home. However, I did want to say that all of our rooms do have flat screen TV’s. In regards to ESPN, we have an existing cable package that does not include this channel and to add it on would be a price increase, which would detract from allowing us to continue to offer our complimentary amenities such as free parking, shuttle, and breakfast.  Kind regards!

Summary: We stayed here  for three nights this past week and felt at home.  The room served it's purpose with fresh linens, fluffy towels in the bathroom, and the great service we got the whole time we were there. We took advantage of the free breakfast but not the shuttle as we could walk to the parks quicker. It is a seven minute walk to Disneyland.  Great checkout and we were given another coupon for $10 off for our next stay.  We will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and allowing us to be your home away from home. We appreciate your many kind comments and it is our pleasure to provide our guests with friendly and excellent customer service. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as I would be delighted to assist with future reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: This is our second time at the Candy Cane Inn and again we had another excellent stay.  We stayed for 10 nights and only have great things to say about this hotel.  It is small, quiet, clean, comfortable and very convenient.  We have stayed at about 7 different hotels around Disneyland over the years and this is the only place we will stay at now.  Breakfast has a good selection.  The shuttle is great being a direct ride to Disneyland and back.  It is only a 7 minute walk if you want to skip the shuttle.  Service is excellent.  We will definitely be back.
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for being a repeat member of the Candy Cane family and for sharing your many wonderful comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. I am delighted you and your family enjoyed your stay and I thank you for your kind comments about our team and property! We look forward to seeing you again soon. Kind regards!

Summary: Stayed here with my daughter for the Tinkerbell Half Marathon....PERFECT location for easy walking access to Disney.  Hotel also provides a shuttle for the 1/2 mile distance if you prefer.  Hotel staff were extremely friendly and helpful.  We stayed in a 2nd floor room, which was perfect.  The rooms are a bit dated BUT very clean, beds are very comfortable, bathroom was super clean, the room had a mini fridge....really couldn't have asked for anything else.  Breakfast was included and very nice, breads, bagels, donuts, fruit, yogurt, hard boiled eggs, cheese, juice, coffee and tea.  Pool and Jacuzzi were also very nice and never over crowded.  Would DEFINITELY stay here again for my next visit.
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for staying with us and for sharing your many wonderful comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. Summary Heading: five night stay with 5 yr old granddaughter
Summary: We stayed for the first time, May 3-8th, at the Candy Cane in a Premium room at the back with our five year old granddaughter.  We took the shuttle and/or walked to Disneyland every day.  ALL staff were helpful and gracious.  We used the hot tub and pool and the call each night for breakfast delivery in the morning.  The room was spacious, clean and quiet.  Beautiful grounds. An absolute pleasure.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us for the first time and I am delighted that you enjoyed the Candy Cane Inn. We appreciate your kind comments and it is our pleasure to provide all of our guests with excellent customer service, and our many complimentary amenities. I again thank you for staying with us and please feel free to contact me personally when returning as I would be delighted to assist with future reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: My family stayed here on our vacation to Disneyland, and it worked perfectly for us. With the "premium" room (which was half the price of the big name hotel in the area), breakfast was delivered to our room every morning, which was very helpful with two small children who are difficult to get out the door quickly. There was a nice little gift basket in the room at check in with popcorn, cookies, and other snacks. Also, the premium room came with a 2pm checkout time, which was very nice on our last day.   The walk to Disneyland was far enough to be dreaded at night on our way back, but very doable, even for an out of shape person carrying a sleepy baby (myself). There is a 2 minute shuttle ride that leaves every half hour, which we took a couple times, but often realized that we
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us on your recent trip to the theme parks. I am delighted you enjoyed your stay and the many complimentary amenities we offer with our Premium rooms, including the complimentary breakfast delivery, and complimentary late checkout. Thank you again for staying with us and please feel free to contact me personally when you and your family are returning to the Anaheim area, as I would be delighted to assist with future reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: My daughter and I stayed for 3 nights to visit Disneyland before a cruise. I choose this motel based on trip advisor reviews and all previous reviews pretty well say it all. I thought the price of $133 per night very good compared to Disney properties. The location was great and we walked to the parks easily but the shuttle is available if you need it. The beds and pillows were very comfortable and the room was clean. They were doing maintenance on some rooms below us during the day which was a little noisy if you do want to nap during the day but this was a slow time for the property, so they have to do it sometime. I did hear some street noise at night but I am a very light sleeper. Breakfast had lots to choose from and it was all very fresh and tasty. Seating was a little
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us and for agreeing with our many wonderful TripAdvisor reviews. I am delighted you enjoyed your stay and the many complimentary amenities we offer here at our hotel. I apologize for the maintenance noise as we are working on some upgrades, but I do thank you for your understanding. Thank you again for staying with us and please feel free to contact me personally when you and your family are returning to the Anaheim area, as I would be delighted to assist with future reservations. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: The ONLY place to stay in Anaheim
Summary: We have stayed at many places around Disneyland to try and find the best one and this is it. Simply, it's clean, the property is beautiful, the staff is great, you get free breakfast, and they have their own shuttle to the park. It's close enough too to walk. This is the only place we'll stay from now on. We've stayed at all 3 Disney properties which are great but you aren't in your room much so it's not worth the price.  Candy Cane Inn in the only way to go.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and I am delighted that you enjoyed your visit. Thank you again for your wonderful comments and we look forward to seeing you again real soon. Kind regards!

Summary: My husband and I stayed at the CCI for the first time a couple of years ago and it definitely lived up to its excellent reviews on TA.  Because of the fabulous experience the first time I chose this property again when my sister and I travelled to Anaheim to celebrate my 50th birthday last week (my husband was envious on both the destination and the hotel - but it was a "sisters trip" only).  She was used to staying at the Disneyland Hotel and was quite skeptical when considering the CCI, however it fit into the budget much better than a Disneyland Resort property so she trusted my judgement and went along with the plan.  We did not reserve a premium or deluxe room, just the standard as we were there for the parks, not for the hotel amenities.  That said, my sister was very
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for being a repeat member of the Candy Cane family and for sharing your many wonderful comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. I am delighted you and your family enjoyed your stay and I thank you for your kind comments about our team and property! We look forward to seeing you again in June for your husband’s birthday and please feel free to contact me personally, as I would be delighted to assist with any requests or needs you may have. Kind regards!

Summary: We tried to get in to our usual hotel, Howard Johnson a year before our trip, but there were no rooms left, which we were a little upset about.  However, It gave us a chance to try out the Candy Cane Inn, which always has pretty good reviews!  The property is beautifully landscaped, as all the rooms are along outdoor corridors you don't have your own balcony, but we were lucky enough to get a room by a large section of balcony with a table and 4 chairs, which we really appreciated.  We had a fireworks view which we had asked for.  The rooms are very small compared to HoJo, with very little storage space, but comfortable enough.  It was great to have a separate sink area, and there was plenty of bathroom storage space.  There were always plenty of nice thick towels, flannels and
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for staying with us and for sharing your many comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. I am delighted you and your family enjoyed your stay and I thank you for your kind comments about our property and complimentary amenities! I am happy we were able to provide you with one for the duration of your stay. We look forward to seeing you again and please feel free to contact me personally, as I would be delighted to assist with any requests or needs you may have. Kind regards!

Summary: We stayed at the Candy Cane Inn for the first time this past week.  This place came with high recommendations from several friends.  We really enjoyed staying here.  Nice quaint rooms, great location, good amenities.    The only issue we had, and this is not really the hotels fault, is that our son was bitten by some type of spider several nights in a row.  No other family members had the same experience, so we are certain it was an isolated incident in his bed.  He did get several very swollen bites that were slightly painful to him throughout the trip.    The pool area is nice.  The breakfast is what I would call "advanced continental."    It is very nice that they have a scheduled shuttle run to Disneyland.  The hotel is close enough to walk back and forth, but at the end of
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us for the first time and I am delighted that you enjoyed the Candy Cane Inn. I am sincerely apologetic for the incident you noted and I want you to know that I personally went with my Housekeeping Managers to search your room for the spider, as this is an unusual occurrence. We do take all guest comments very seriously and I hope your son is feeling much better. Thank you again for your visit with us. Kind regards!

Summary: We just got back from our 4th stay here. It's so convenient to Disneyland, and the grounds are beautiful. The rooms are basic, but very clean and comfortable. We always stay in the premium rooms because we love the convenience of having breakfast delivered and the late check-outs. We'll be back!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for allowing us to be of service once again during your most recent visit to Anaheim. Summary Heading: Super clean, great service, and walkable to the Convention Center & parks
Summary: We recently spent two nights at the Candy Cane Inn while attending a convention at the Anaheim Convention Center around the corner. I'm glad I scoured reviews, because this turned out to be the perfect choice.   The hotel is a short walk to the convention center and provided a very comfortable stay.  Our positive experience started the moment we drove up. Despite arriving before 11 am, we decided to stop by on the off chance that a room may be available. While our room was not available that early, the gentleman at the front desk immediately offered us a parking pass so that we could leave our car there before returning later to officially check-in.  This was an enormous help to us since the convention center parking lots were already full and we would have had to pay to park at
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us and for agreeing with our many wonderful TripAdvisor reviews. I am delighted you enjoyed your stay and the many complimentary amenities we offer with our Premium rooms, including the complimentary breakfast delivery, and complimentary late checkout. Thank you again for staying with us and please feel free to contact me personally when you and your family are returning to the Anaheim area, as I would be delighted to assist with future reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: Great staff all of them !!!! Great location, Great breakfast spread, clean, well groomed, & priced right !!!!!!!! Special thanks to Banillo (sp?) the manager of housekeeping/lost & found who along with his staff helped me retrieve articles left behind by me in the safe....I will definitely come back!!
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for staying with us and for sharing your many wonderful comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. We look forward to seeing you again and please feel free to contact me personally, as I would be delighted to assist with any requests or needs you may have. Kind regards!

Summary: I booked this hotel for our combo DisneyLand/Star Wars Convention trip. The price was right, and it was a comfortable walk to both of our locations. This hotel worked really well. I appreciate the classic style of the place. It is an older hotel but has been remodeled. I also love the free breakfast. That comes in handy with 2 boys who love to eat. I would appreciate more options for non Carb eaters. By day 3 I was a little sick of hard boiled eggs. But my kids were still thrilled with the pastries and donuts.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and I am delighted that you enjoyed your visit. We do strive to provide an exceptional product and delivering friendly service while being mindful of families traveling on a budget. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: I most definitely would come again!
Summary: We just returned from a short Disney trip and stayed two nights at the Candy Cane Inn.  I chose to stay here because of the great reviews, free parking and breakfast and because it is very close to the park entrance.  We found that not only is it all those things, but the grounds are beautiful and well-kept, the beds are comfortable, the room was clean and the breakfast was very nice.  We were there two nights after Easter and we didn't even have to fight a crowd for breakfast.  The free shuttle to the park was easy to use when we were too tired to even walk 10 more minutes!  Next time we come to Disneyland, we will stay here again!
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for staying with us and for sharing your many wonderful comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. Summary Heading: Great couple of nights at Candy Cane Inn
Summary: We took a quick trip to Disneyland and were so glad we picked the Candy Cane Inn. We drove from LAX in the a.m. and got there around 11am on a weekday. They checked to see if rooms were available but nothing was ready so they gave us a parking pass and shuttle pass and we left our rental car and went to DL for the day. We came back around 8pm and officially checked in. Our beds were so comfortable. Everything was clean and pleasant. We never made it to the pool but we did have the breakfast which was fine, typical ready to eat carbs type stuff. We grabbed some fruit for the walk to DL. I appreciated the fact that it was on the same side of the street as DL and just about the closest hotel. My two kids also loved it and the flowers are beautiful.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us for the first time and I am delighted that you enjoyed the Candy Cane Inn. We appreciate your kind comments and it is our pleasure to provide our guests with excellent customer service. I again thank you for staying with us and please feel free to contact me personally when returning as I would be delighted to assist with future reservations. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Candy Cane is the best Boutique Hotel near Disneyland
Summary: We just stayed one night in April 2015.  We have been going back to this hotel for the past ten years.  This is just the best little secret around Disneyland.  It is a short 9 minute walk to the front gates or you can take the shuttle.  It is a wonderful little hotel.  Well maintained and well taken care of.  The rooms are very nice, clean, and charming.  The owners seem to take great care in their little gem of a hotel.  I highly recommend it for your next stay.
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for being a loyal and dedicated member of the Candy Cane Inn for the past 10 years. I am delighted that you have continued to enjoy our many complimentary amenities and our clean and “charming” rooms. We thank you again for sharing your wonderful comments and please don’t hesitate to contact me personally when returning, as I would be delighted to assist with future reservations. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Another wonderful stay at the Candy Cane Inn
Summary: We just returned from our second stay at the Candy Cane Inn and I can't say enough positive things about this place.  I love the location, a close 10 minute walk to the Disneyland Resort, but if you'd rather not walk there is a shuttle available.  The Candy Cane Inn is well taken care of, rooms are neat and clean.  The standard room has a safe, coffee maker and refrigerator. The Candy Cane Inn offers a complimentary continental breakfast each morning which included juice, coffee, cold cereal, fruit, donuts, pastries, yogurt, hard boiled eggs and cheeses.  The breakfast area is constantly being restocked by a lovely woman whose name escapes me.  The grounds are beautifully kept with a variety of flowers,and various other plant life.  The staff always seems to be busy polishing
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for being a repeat member of the Candy Cane family and for sharing your many wonderful comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. I am delighted you and your family enjoyed your stay and I thank you for your kind comments about our team and property! We have a wonderful staff here, including James and Mr. Lee, and we definitely appreciate their hard work and professionalism. We look forward to seeing you again in September and please feel free to contact me personally, as I would be delighted to assist with any requests or needs you may have. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Comfy and walking distance to parks
Summary: This was my 3rd stay at the Candy Cane.  The hotel is always clean, rooms are quiet and comfortable.  We stayed in the premium room and it is worth it for the extras they provide.  We enjoyed having our breakfast delivered to the room as well as extended check out time.  We were so happy we were allowed to park our car a few hours before check in as well as leave it there a few hours after check out.   Staff at the front desk is always kind and helpful.  The grounds are perfectly maintained with beautiful flowers everywhere.  We will definitely stay again next time.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for allowing us to be of service once again during your most recent visit to Anaheim.
