Summary Heading: Tons of positives but 2 things you should know
Summary: So many good things to say. Starting with the cute grounds, tons of flowers and greenery.   Small, cute little Inn with lots of FREE parking,  I always hate to pay for parking, you are spending enough already.  So close to the park, we timed our walk at 6 minutes.  But if you need a shuttle, that is FREE too. The staff is so wonderful.  I can't say enough about how nicely they treat the guests, you feel respected and welcome. Our room was very clean and very quiet.  We were 1/2 way back but could see the pool, no noise problems. Generous continental breakfast.  My complaints are kinda big though.  I asked for a wake up to back up my alarm and I never got one. Luckily I didn't need it.  But man the beds are just not good, soft and foamy.  I think if you are looking for an economy

It's across from them cnvmtion cente, plus, it's right next to,Disneyland. The rooms are always spotless, free parking, very nice breakfast, nd he staff. Oh my ! Evryone is always very friendly. It's very clear that everyone here loves their job. This is just a few reasons we always books urged weeks Vern ear at theCandy Cane.  Never a disappointment! Once again James and the r rest the staff haven exeed and made us once again fee like family . I'm alreadyookingfoward to our next trip in 2016.  We still have 3 days left on this trip but I felt the upper management needed to know how much we enjoy our stay and their continued friendship!

Summary: This is the fourth time we have stayed here and love this charming hotel. Everything was outstanding. Staff is very friendly. Any thing that was needed from plane boarding passes to even a small screwdriver to tighten glasses was handled with no problem. Great breakfast,(including kid friendly and healthy choices ), quiet rooms, and wonderful beds. Rooms were spotless and any requests for extra towels, glasses etc. were taken care of. They have their own shuttle to get you back and forth from the park. Though it is only a 10 minute walk from the park. Pool and hot tub are well maintained. The spa was a godsend after a long day at the parks. Enjoyed the music by the pool also.

We stayed in a King Deluxe room and experienced/had:  • a very comfy bed * a free shuttle to and from the parks every half hour • access to a laundry room • a safe in our room • pool on site • free (cold) breakfast - cereals, danishes, fruits, coffee, juice, etc. You could lounge by the pool with your breakfast, or walk through and grab a quick bite on your way out the door (very convenient!) • courteous and quick service for everything including a problem with our bathroom • upon request, a grace period of checking out one hour later (a

Summary: I've edited this review to include this first paragraph after having spoken with the management at Candy Cane Inn today (4/5/2015). They did a good job rectifying the situation and for that I am bumping up my review from 2/5 to 3/5. However, I feel it important in the spirit of transparency to include the original review (slightly amended) so that future travelers will know what to expect should they have a problem during their stay. Bottom line is this - if you feel your concerns/complaints are valid, don't stop at the reception staff. Request to speak directly with the general manager, and do not settle for them speaking to the GM on your behalf if they seem to be stonewalling you. Here is the original review. Anything that's been changed has been noted between square brackets
Manager Response: none

Summary: We booked this hotel strictly from Trip Advisor reviews. A great find!! We were tired of the homogenized corporate hotel environment and tried this little gem. Best way to describe this beautifully, simply charming hotel is to say that if I owned a property this would be my choice.  (I have worked executive staff for Hyatt & Hilton Hotels)The staff is friendly, efficient and competent. The morning continental breakfast is just what's needed before heading to Disney. The pool is sunny in the afternoon and nicely maintained. Iced cucumber water available in the lobby upon returning from a hot day. Easy walking to Disneyland. The hotel shuttle perfectly comfortable and runs like clock work. Drivers very courteous, too. Beautiful bougainvillea make it all so pretty.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us for the first time and I am delighted that you enjoyed the Candy Cane Inn. Summary: We are annual passholders and go to Disneyland about every other month. We have stayed at a lot of hotels around the park and the Candy Cane Inn is our go to hotel. They have an awesome breakfast and the beds in the room are supper comfy! Our son has special needs and the staff has always been so helpful and accommodating. The shuttle to the park is great and the drivers are so friendly and great. If you miss the shuttle, the hotel is just a 15 minute walk to the park. You may see better prices at other hotels around, but trust me when I say that the extra you pay is well worth it!

Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and I am delighted that you enjoyed your visit. We do strive to provide an exceptional product and delivering friendly service while being mindful of families traveling on a budget. Kind regards!

Summary: Just to be clear, this is NOT a fancy hotel property. I think people look at the reviews and think it must be super-nice and expect more than what it is. It IS a nice basic off-Disney property hotel within 7 minutes walking distance to Disneyland and has clean, well-appointed and relatively quiet rooms, with a nice pool and hot tub area all for a very reasonable price.  The one area I would disagree with other reviewers on is the breakfast. Cold continental breakfast was just "eh". If you have nut allergies beware as everything is mixed together, such as the various muffins with and without nuts are in same basket, as are the pastries and bagels. So that made it difficult for us. What was there for baked goods were dry. Rest was standard fare yogurt, fruit and cereal. Nothing to
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us to be of service during your recent visit to Anaheim. We do appreciate your business and I am so glad you were able to enjoy your stay with us. Summary: Loved this hotel, first time traveling where I could sleep in the bed without waking up in pain, staff was amazingly friendly and centrally located to Disneyland. Will stay there again without hesitation

Summary: I wanted a nice, clean (cheaper than Disney) hotel within walking distance to Disneyland.  And this was it!  We had two adjoining, deluxe rooms for 4 adults and 3 kids.  It was roomy and comfortable.   I was a little skeptical due to the name.  I was scared it was going to be dated and tacky.  It's neither.  Now, it's not fancy by any means, but it was perfect for our family vacation.  The staff was friendly and helpful. I highly recommend this hotel!  Already booked it again for next year.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and I am delighted that you enjoyed your first visit with us. We do strive to provide an exceptional product and delivering friendly service while being mindful of families traveling on a budget. We can’t wait to see you again soon! Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Not sure why so highly rated???
Summary: I read all the reviews, and we were excited to stay at the third ranked Anaheim motel. A lot of the reviews stated to reserve the "premium" room. We booked through Disney travel and were offered the choice of "standard" or "deluxe". I didn't realize that there was a "premium" room because it was not offered when I booked far in advance. So, we were very disappointed when we could not watch any of the numerous Disney movies offered to only "premium" guests. My son was also disappointed by not getting the towel animals shown on tripadvisor.  We were offered an upgrade to "premium" but they did not have availability for the entire time we were there. We didn't want to have to check out at 11 and recheck in at 3 during our stay.  The breakfast was great! The shuttle, and the shuttle
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and providing us with your valuable feedback. I do want to apologize for the incidents you noted. Summary Heading: Friendly, Clean and Affordable place to stay close to Disneyland
Summary: We love going to Disneyland and this was our first hotel stay off property. This is a great option if you are going to Disneyland.  The hotel/ motel itself is extremely clean. We stayed in a deluxe room and it is great for a family of three or four. The CCI staff is friendly and helpful.  They work hard to make your stay enjoyable.  We arrived at 10:00 am and the staff let us park there before check in time. The location is great and walked to the park in a few minutes, the Inn has its own shuttle bus that runs every 30 minutes to and from the park. The continental breakfast is as everyone describes pastries, fruit and cereal. The Wi-fi is free and worked good, but don't do any high frequency trading on it. Our only complaint was the noise of the other patrons walking to and
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us to be of service during your recent visit to Anaheim. Service was excellent at the front desk for travel arrangements and we even rented a scooter for grandma and they helped out with that, including a "parking spot" and battery charge.

The room was the perfect size for us, and the beds were super comfortable. The room was very clean, and the grounds are beautiful. It's true that the parking spaces are a bit small, but I didn't have any problems parking my mid sized suv. I will be coming back next Feb/Mar with my husband and children, and I will definitely be staying at Candy Cane Inn!

Summary: Stayed here March 9 to the 12th.  The Good:    Clean , good breakfast, free parking, shuttle is very convenient.    The bad:        Housekeeping..we didnt get our room clean after our first night. We went to  D isneyland early . arrived back around 1:30 ..room still dirty. I called the office and they said they dont start cleaning rooms until after 11:30. I explained that with a little one we take naps and his attitude was basically I was out of luck.I ask him if I could get the room cleaned the next day by one, but he really didnt answer me. He said they are finished cleaning by 3 or so  So the next morning I went and talked to a nice lady at the front desk and our room was clean. If this is the policy the  schedule should be changed.
Manager Response: I would like to sincerely apologize that your stay was not to your expectations and I thank you for your input. I have attempted to reach you through the TripAdvisor email system, however I have not heard back and wanted to respond. We do listen to all guest comments and while we never want to disappoint our guests, we do value these opportunities to continue to train and grow our guest service. I have personally spoken with my Front Desk staff in length, to ensure that we are assisting our guests properly and offering the guest service folks have come to expect from the Candy Cane. Thank you again for your business and kind regards!

Summary Heading: Perfect for NAMM convention @Anaheim Convention Center
Summary: I have stayed twice at the Candy Cane and enjoyed it immensely...it is right behind Disneyland almost at the corner of Katella and S Harbor...you park your car (included in the stay) and walk to the convention center...since the NAMM convention is a LOT of walking...it is wonderful to have a hotel so close and so affordable...they are booked out quickly so make your reservations early...beautiful grounds and nice spa and pool and QUIET...the morning breakfast service to your door could use some improvement but if you walk to the lobby...it is exquisite to sit by the pool watching the birds play and enjoying the wonderful landscape while you eat...coffee just ok...continental breakfast (included) good...I will be back
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for being a repeat member of the Candy Cane family and for sharing your wonderful comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. Our Room was one of the few that faced the busy street, however this did not affect us or our 3 year old.  The traffic noise was minimal. Breakfast was included and sufficient, nothing grand, but nice and simple. The only negatives where no elevator to the second floor, which made if tough when our child feel asleep in the stroller on the way home from Disney. Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us on your friend’s recommendation and I am delighted that you enjoyed the Candy Cane Inn. Summary: Clean and roomy.  An easy walk to Disneyland.  Breakfast was a cold buffet but plenty of variety grandkids loved it.  Also didn't figure this out until our last day, but hotel rents strollers.  We had been renting ours at Disney but then you end up carrying tired kids back.  Oh and try to get a room closer to the front and ground floor.

Summary: We stayed here for 3 nights while visiting Disneyland. It is a lovingly tended motor lodge. The grounds are beautiful with lots of climbing flowers, hanging baskets and a cobblestone drive. The staff was incredibly friendly. We reserved the premium room which was slightly more expensive, but still reasonable. Each morning they brought us a basket with breakfast selections, at night there was a turn down service and the kids borrowed several movies to watch at night. The rooms are a nice size, and thee are laundry facilities on site. Disneyland is a short walk away. There is a nice shuttle, but we felt the walk was just as easy. This is a lovely place!

Summary: Each time I take my kids to Disneyland, I always think, "Maybe this time we will stay on property."  Well...the Candy Cane Inn makes that practically impossible.  First off...when we visit Disneyland, we are really not in the room or even at the hotel very much.  On my recent visit, we basically just used the room to sleep at night...aside from two 90 minute breaks on our second and third day.  Then there is location.  Yes...the location of the Grand Californian or the Disneyland Hotel are fantastic...but is that location worth the premium?  Not to me.  Finally...facilities.  Yes...the other hotels have ridiculously awesome amenities.  But, again, are the ones I can't visit (pool, spa, etc.) worth the premium?  Maybe...but I go to Disneyland to, well, go to Disneyland!  The

Summary: My husband and I had a short break at The Candy Cane this week having stayed several times previously over the years.  It is consistent in it's customer service.  Our room was spotless as were all other areas.  The buffet breakfast is a bonus and a good start to a full day in Disney. There is free parking and wifi something not all other hotels in the area offer.  Another plus is the shuttle bus but in truth it is a very short walk to the Parks.  We would have no hesitation in staying again.

Summary: This is our second stay at the Candy Cane Inn. We have stayed at the Disney hotels as well as a few others, but this place is a favorite. The rates are reasonable - about the same size as some of the Disney rooms but 1/2 the cost. Our kids love the breakfast buffet - we don't need huge meals like some of the restaurants offer - cereal, toast, bagels, donuts, fruit, and yogurt are perfect for us! The deluxe queen room was fine for two adults and two kids, with lots of space in the bathroom area (though it would be nice to have a little more space to put clothes in a dresser). This hotel is quieter than some of the others in the area and it is very clean.  We love having the option to walk or take the very convenient and reliable shuttle (that we don't have to pay extra for,

Summary: We stayed over Presidents Day weekend and had a 2 queen standard room.  When we arrived the room was not ready but they gave us a bus pass and parking permit so that we could go to Downtown Disney and eat lunch.  There is not a charge for parking which I find was great, but those with oversize vehicles will have problems squeezing their SUV's in the spaces designed for standard vehicles.  The room was ready at 3pm as promised and was very clean and had one of the best bathrooms of hotels we have stayed at in the Disneyland area.  Also impressive was the AC, it blasted us to the freezing point which we love and most hotel ac's aren't able to do.  The refrigerator also stayed cold which is another sticking point with some other hotels.  We heard no noise except for kids running up

Summary Heading: Great first-time stay at the Candy Cane!
Summary: Found this hotel/motel on TA while searching for close-by choices for DL/DCA trip in early February.  So glad we chose it;  reviews we read here gave us confidence to book it (4 nights), and we felt the price and value were very good.  Breakfast was 'just okay', but considering many other hotels in the area offer no breakfast, this was a further deal.  High points: *Rooms are CLEAN *Pool area looked clean, and while we didn't use it, we may have if time allowed *Staff were all friendly and accommodating *Very close to Disneyland entrance, this is perhaps it's best selling point:  I timed the walk to the front resort entrance on Harbor Blvd, and it was 6 min.  A further 4 min puts you right at the DL and DCA gates *Reasonable rates.  We paid $122/night, which given the location,

Summary: I stayed here for 3 nights with my daughter on our very first trip to Disneyland. While it doesn't have the glitz and glamour of hotels that are "Disney" which by the way empty the wallet real fast Candy Cane Inn is by far probably the best bang for your buck. The rooms are beyond clean and a generous size and honestly what else do you need when you are spending 8-10 hours a day running around Disneyland and the neighboring park Adventureland. The beds are very comfortable, the bathroom/shower may be a lite cramped but as I said this is mainly a place to rest your weary body after a long day of park hopping. The location couldn't be any better it was honestly about an 8 minute walk to either park and there is a free shuttle service if you feel so inclined. They offer a
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting with us on your first visit to Disney and for sharing your kind comments regarding our property, complimentary amenities and exceptional guest service. We thank you again for staying with us and we look forward to seeing you again in April. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Nice property, helpful staff, close to restaurants, great breakfast!

Candy Cane Inn was our second choice and we were lucky to get into this hotel.    We had a 5 day pass to Disneyland/California Adventure.  There are only 3 hotels on Disney property and had a steep price tag.  I did a lot of research and we decided to stay at a Good Neighbor Hotel. I have to admit that I was apprehensive, I have high expectations of places to stay and I wasn't entirely sure of the quality. However every single person I mentioned the Candy Cane Inn to sung it's praises. And I have to admit, I could not find 1 fault. Not 1. We stayed in a Premium Room (246), which included the ability to order from the buffet breakfast to have it delivered to your room. A turndown service was also included, which was very welcome after a long day in the park, as well as bathrobes and Disney movie rental. The
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us and for sharing your wonderful comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. Summary: We stayed here for the first time January 4th through 8th. Rooms were clean, daily maid service. Walking distance to Disneyland about 10 minutes. They do have their own shuttle but I seemed to miss it each time coming back so I just walked. I really liked the free breakfast, boiled eggs, cheese cubes, fresh donuts, cereals, juices, coffee, etc. I would stay here again if the rates were right. We paid $99 a night AAA discount. All staff were great! Oh and having 2 stores next door, one a 7-11 and a CVS pharmacy right across the street was convenient and affordable,
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us for the first time and I am delighted that you enjoyed the Candy Cane Inn. We appreciate your kind comments and it is our pleasure to provide our guests with excellent customer service. I am sincerely apologetic that you missed our shuttle from the theme parks, as it does depart on the 15 and 45 of every hour. I again thank you for staying with us and please feel free to contact me personally when returning as I would be delighted to assist with future reservations. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Candy Cane Inn - Still Excellent after 20+ years
Summary: Our family has been going to Disneyland for approximately 25 years. We did not discover the Candy Cane Inn the for several years, after our first several visits. We were very surprised to discover  such a fine establishment. We have gone back virtually ever year. The rooms themselves are very comfortable and neat and clean. But you do not go to Anaheim for the rooms. You go to visit Disneyland. The Candy Cane Inn has a shuttle bus, which is punctual and clean. Prior to the addition of California-land and Downtown Disney, it took approximately 20 minutes to walk to Disneyland. It now talks approximately 10 minutes. The shuttle is still a welcomed form of transportation, especially during tho summer months.  The buffet breakfast is well managed and well stocked, i.e., food is
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for being a loyal and dedicated member of the Candy Cane family. Our team does an outstanding job in maintaining our property and I sincerely appreciate the friendliness they possess and extend to our guests! We thank you again for sharing your many wonderful comments and please don’t hesitate to contact me personally when returning, as I would be delighted to assist with future reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: We love this place for so many reasons and have made this our regular disney hotel.  The whole facility is spotless.  We've stayed at their premium rooms and enjoyed the microwave and the breakfast delivery, but also stayed at a regular room - which puts us closer to the buffet breakfast.  the pool isn't huge, but the times we've been there, there are only a few other kids.  there's free parking and a shuttle to the park too in  case you don't want the 10 min walk. all of the staff we've ever encountered have been so pleasant.  thank you candy cane inn!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us once again and I am pleased that you enjoyed your Premium Room and the amenities they provide. The expanded continental breakfast delivery is a time saver and something that most simply enjoy. Thank you again for your kind comments and we look forward to seeing you again soon. Kind regards!

Summary: I have had the pleasure of staying at this hotel 6 or 7 times over the years. The last trip was with my two young boys and husband. The hotel never disappoints. The rooms are clean and inviting. The beds are comfortable and new. Most rooms have a refrigerator and microwave. The grounds are kept up and the flowers are so lovely. The private shuttle is wonderful and the hotel is a short walk to the parks. It's just a great hotel for the price.
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for being a repeat member of the Candy Cane family and for sharing your many wonderful comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. I am delighted you and your family enjoyed all of the complimentary amenities that we offer here at our hotel. Thank you for your kind comments about our team and property! We look forward to seeing you again soon and please feel free to contact me personally when returning, as I would be delighted to assist with reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: Wonderful service, clean and spacious hotel, nice pool, good breakfast.  It's the place to go for the price.  I like the location, close to CVS for any needs and very close to the parks.  I will return for sure in the future.  The stay was due to a runDisney event and I was happy that it still has a shuttle even though it is so close.  It was a need after running the 1/2.  Other hotels may look similar in the area, but this hotel has a very nice staff and as corny as it sounds, it felt like home for a few days.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us during your recent visit to the theme parks. We appreciate your kind comments and I am delighted we were able to make this your “home” for a few days. We look forward to seeing you again soon and please feel free to contact me personally should you and your family be returning to the Anaheim area as it would be my pleasure to assist with reservations. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Great stop-off for a 1-2 day Disneyland trip
Summary: Perhaps it depends on the time of week or year, but for week days, it's relatively quiet. The shuttle service to Disneyland runs consistiently throughout the day although it is literally a 5 min walk, so you could just a well take a nice walk down the street to Disneyland.  We got there earlier than our supposed check in but we were still able to get room keys. Parking there was also no problem and we could pretty much park there for as long as we needed. The staff is friendly and helpful for whatever questions we had.  I would come back again for the next Disneyland trip.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and I am delighted that you enjoyed the Candy Cane Inn. We appreciate your kind comments and it is our pleasure to provide our guests with excellent customer service. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as I would be delighted to assist with future reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: We stayed here over the 2014 Christmas season and our stay was exceptional!  Property is literally a 10-minute walk from the Disneyland parks and the shuttle takes about five minutes (less in non-rush hour traffic) to drop you off at the parks.  You can see the back of "Radiator Springs" at Disney California Adventure from the parking lot. Shuttle is VERY prompt and leaves exactly when they see (hour and half hour to the parks and 15 and 45 minutes after the hour from the parks).  Breakfast is very satisfying and saved us money from eating in the parks and staff is extremely helpful and friendly.  Nicely landscaped and a nice break from the hustle and bustle of the parks.  We didn't use the pool as our girls are 26 and 22 but it looks nice and the hot tub was busy every night we
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for staying with us and for sharing your many wonderful comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. I am delighted you enjoyed your stay and the many complimentary amenities we offer here at our hotel, including our Exclusive Complimentary Shuttle and our Expanded Complimentary Breakfast. Thank you again for your many kind comments and please don’t hesitate to call or email me directly should your family be returning to the Candy Cane, as I would be delighted to assist with future reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: FANTASTIC experience for stay #5 at Candy Cane Inn.   We couldn't print our Disneyland tickets out, and we needed to get to the park that morning, Jeff at the front desk actually turned the computer around, put the keyboard and mouse in front of us, and let me manage our ticket/printer issue right there on the spot - no questions asked. This is the best way to treat your guests! We felt important and valued and will continue to stay at this exceptional hotel.  Breakfast, pool/hot tub, and rooms were clean, maintained, and ready for guest usage. The shuttle drivers were polite, fast, and patient.
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for being a loyal member of the Candy Cane Inn family of repeat guests. We DO appreciate your business and look forward to you having another memorable visit soon. It was my pleasure to assist you with printing out your theme park tickets. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with reservations and any requests you may have as well. Kind Regards!

Summary: Loved this hotel. Really close to Disneyland, within walking distance, a shuttle to and from the Disney area even tho its not necessary! The breakfast was really good. They stated the pool was heated, compared to the weather in the 60s it was heated, but my daughter got in the pool and it was freezing. We bought our Disney tickets thru the hotel. We are overall very happy with our trip and would stay there again and again!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and I am delighted that you enjoyed the Candy Cane Inn. We appreciate your kind comments and it is our pleasure to provide our guests with excellent customer service. I am sincerely apologetic that your daughter found our pool to be cold, as our pool is heated to 79 degrees all year round. I again thank you for staying with us and please feel free to contact me personally when returning as I would be delighted to assist with future reservations. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: One of our favorite good neighbor hotels.
Summary: We have stayed here many times in the last 8 years.  The first time our room was dirty housekeeping missed it and there was no other room to move us to as we came in just before Midnight so went for a walk while they cleaned the room.  We checked out the next day. Glad we gave it a second chance as we have been back many times since.  It's the cleanest good Neighbour hotel in the area!  Front desk staff and maintenance workers helpful and very polite! The beds are on the softer side and the rooms are nicely decorated and clean! You will have a nice sleep here. The Pool is smaller but has a nice sitting area to watch the kiddos. Parking is good and convenient. Breakfast is included and has cereals, yogurt, fruit, milk and juice. Location is awesome and is on the corner of
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us again and for sharing your comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. We DO appreciate your business and you taking the time to provide us with this valuable feedback. I am delighted you enjoyed the many complimentary amenities we have to offer here at the Candy Cane Inn. Again, thank you and please feel free to contact me personally when returning as I would be delighted to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: We stay here at least 4 times a year for a week plus when we go to Disneyland.  The staff is friendly, especially Alejandra and the breakfast staff.  The rooms are a bit small, mainly because we are a family of 4  staying for a week with luggage and a double jogger stroller. However even with ALL of our stuff, we are still able to stay in there comfortably.  The beds are comfy and clean.  The outside noise can be a little loud as people return but I just pack a small fan to help drive out the noise and circulate the air, but that's just my personal choice. Would love to have a small fan provided in the rooms for that so we don't have to run the AC all night. One less thing I would have to pack but really if that's he only thing I can think of to make the stay better, then this
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for being a repeat member of the Candy Cane family and for sharing your many wonderful comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. Our team does an outstanding job in maintaining our property and I sincerely appreciate the friendliness they possess and extend to our guests! I thank you for your suggestion regarding a small fan in the room, as all guest comments are of the upmost importance to us. We thank you again for staying with us and please don’t hesitate to contact me personally when returning as I would be delighted to assist with future reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: We stayed back in May 2014 on our Honeymoon from Australia!  We TOTALLY loved our stay. From the staff,  management, housekeeping, just every1 were amazing.  Disneyland was a 10 minute walk which we did over 9 days & at night caught the free shuttle bus back if our feet could take no more. The cheesecake factory is just up the road.  We thoroughly Recommend this beautiful place & have Already booked our return trip for May 2015!! Am Soo excited!! Can't wait to stay at this comfy clean quiet friendly hotel again!
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting with us on your honeymoon and sharing your kind comments regarding our property, complimentary amenities and exceptional guest service. We have a wonderful team, who take pride in their jobs and taking care of our guests and they too appreciate when folks take the time to write positive comments such as yours. We thank you again for staying with us and we look forward to seeing you again in May. Kind regards!

Summary: This is a lovely hotel with clean rooms and is walking distance to the Disney entrance that behind Cars Land.  The hotel feels like HOME, it's cozy and has beautiful flowers and landscape.  The pool is very nice, too.  We went with another couple and everyone was so happy with this adorable Candy Cane Inn.  You won't be disappointed.
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for being a repeat member of the Candy Cane family and for sharing your many wonderful comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. Our team does an outstanding job in maintaining our property and I sincerely appreciate the friendliness they possess and extend to our guests! We thank you again for staying with us and please don’t hesitate to contact me personally when returning as I would be delighted to assist with future reservations. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Candy Cane not just for Christmas
Summary: This is a great little hotel that is a fantastic option to not staying on property.  We stayed here in November and loved the little extras in our room.  Not sure about the type of package my wife bought, but we had a little welcome basket of snacks that the kids enjoyed waiting for us.  In the morning, we had breakfast brought to the room and it was great.  Staff was all friendly and the shuttle drivers were helpful.  Very fair prices.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us and for sharing your wonderful comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. I am delighted you enjoyed your stay and the many complimentary amenities we offer with our Premium rooms, including the complimentary breakfast delivery. Thank you again for staying with us and we hope to see you again real soon. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Clean, great location, not enough parking
Summary: Less than 3 blocks walk to Disney entrance, located behind Cars Land... If you listen you can hear the cars on the ride. Nice pool and landscaping.  Friendly staff. Clean rooms with comfy beds. The only big negative is scarcity of parking
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and I am delighted that you enjoyed the Candy Cane Inn. We appreciate your kind comments and it is our pleasure to provide our guests with excellent customer service. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as I would be delighted to assist with future reservations. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Great place to stay close to Disneyland
Summary: We arrived at the Candy Cane Inn on Saturday, December 20, 2014. We are a family of 4 travelling (two adult children). We checked in with a very nice young man. I met Robert who I had communicated with through email. We were told of amenities and what was in the area. We were given rooms 128 and 129 (connecting rooms).   The rooms were quite spacious. The kids had two queen beds and we had a room with a king size bed. I found the bed too soft but my husband loved it. My daughter as well found the bed not very comfortable. The rooms came equipped with a small fridge which was nice. They had nice big TV's not that we watched too much. The only complaint that I have with the rooms was that you heard everything. Being so close to Disney, there were people coming and going at all
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting with us and sharing your many kind comments regarding our property, complimentary amenities and exceptional guest service. We have a wonderful team, including Jair my Front Desk Agent who checked you in and Robert, that take great pride in their jobs and taking care of our guests. We thank you again for staying with us and please don’t hesitate to contact me personally when returning as I would be delighted to assist with future reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: We booked at the Candy Cane Inn based on several recommendations and by the positive reviews on this site.   For the most part it was a very good experience.  The grounds are beautifully maintained, the staff is friendly and accommodating and the location is really quite ideal for daily trips to Disneyland.  The free shuttle was nice to use as well when we timed it right. The morning breakfast was always tasty and plentiful!  It was a carb-lovers dream and those donuts were amazing!  It was a nice indulgence.  My only complaint was that the seating area was VERY small.  We hit Anaheim during a cold spell and with only four indoor tables, we spent a few breakfasts shivering at the outdoor tables.  Brrr!   The room was a bit on the small side but completely functional and very
Manager Response: none

Summary: Nothing fancy, but close to the entrance of Disneyland.  We were able to walk the short distance each day to the park.  The hotel also offers a shuttle, which would be good for families with small children.  Rooms are clean.  Free breakfast buffet which offered a variety of selections.  We would definately stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us to be of service during your recent visit to Anaheim. We do appreciate your business and I am so glad you were able to enjoy our many complimentary amenities we have to offer at the Candy Cane. Thank you again for your stay and please feel free to contact me personally when your family is returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with reservations, as well as discussing what our team can do to bring your next review up to a five. Kind regards!

Summary: We stayed 4 nights as part of our 2 week trip.  A good breakfast is included for no extra charge which is great and you have a free shuttle to Disney till 12.45am which is great.  Even if you don't use the shuttle disneyland and other amenities are a walk away.  Our room had 2 double beds, heating and a bathroom that was a usual size but with a small bath.  We found there was a lot of noise at night and in the morning but you cant really complain as its people returning from disneyland and kids up excited in the morning ready to go!!!  But if you are wanting a very quiet environment this may not be for you, I just invested in ear plugs.  Would definitely bring the kids to stay here but as a couple might go somewhere a little more peaceful.  Overall enjoyable stay.
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for staying with us and for sharing your many wonderful comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. I am delighted you enjoyed your stay and the many complimentary amenities we offer here at our hotel. I do thank you for your understanding that we are a family hotel, and while we do ask that all our guests respect each other, we are filled with excited children who are ready to go to the theme parks. Please don’t hesitate to call or email me directly should you be returning to the Candy Cane, as I would be delighted to assist with reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: We first stayed at Candy Cane Inn 10 years ago and while planning our anniversary trip to DL, we knew we'd have to stay here again.  Stayed for one night in a Premium room - very spacious, clean and quiet (room was located at the back of the property).  Welcome amenity was a nice touch as was the turn down service and the breakfast delivery to your room in the morning (one of the perks of the Premium room!).  All staff we encountered (front desk, housekeeping, shuttle van driver) were very polite and friendly.  Both check-in and check-out were smooth and quick.  Location is great - about a 10 minute walk to the front gates and the free shuttle van is a plus, especially when you're tired.  It may not be the most modern looking property, but while staying here, you can tell the
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for staying with us on your Anniversary trip and for sharing your wonderful comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. We are delighted you and your family enjoyed the many amenities our Premium rooms have to offer, including the breakfast delivery and our nightly turn down service. Please feel free to contact me personally when you and your family are returning to the Anaheim area, as I would be delighted to assist with future reservations. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Candy Cane Inn; A Great Choice
Summary: We have stayed at the Candy Cane Inn the last five times we have visited Disneyland.  The grounds and rooms are impeccably clean.  Any issue you may have with your room is promptly dealt with in a courteous manner.  As a matter of fact what drew our attention to the property initially was that we observed a groundskeeper scrubbing tire marks off the curb at the entrance while we walked by from our hotel on our way to the park.  As others have said, it is hard to beat the location.  It is easy walking distance without crossing any busy intersections; and if you overdo at Disneyland, the Candy Cane runs a dedicated shuttle that will save you about two blocks of walking. Additionally, it is a simple drive to the Honda Center and Angel Stadium. On check out, they provide a gift
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for being a repeat member of the Candy Cane family and for sharing your many wonderful comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. Our team does an outstanding job in maintaining our property and I sincerely appreciate the friendliness they possess and extend to our guests! We thank you again for staying with us and please don’t hesitate to contact me personally when returning as I would be delighted to assist with future reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: Stayed for 2 nights, picked this hotel due to close proximity to Disneyland and other amenities in the area (movie theater, shopping & restaurants).   Hotel offers a free shuttle bus to Disneyland, which is handy on the hot days, but the park itself is in easy walking distance.  Room was very clean and tidy. Would stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and I am delighted that you enjoyed the Candy Cane Inn. We appreciate your kind comments and it is our pleasure to provide our guests with excellent customer service. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as I would be delighted to assist with future reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: We visited this hotel in 2011 and had such a good experience we decided to book there again for our trip in October 2014.    This hotel is in a fantastic location, in fact it would probably be hard to find anywhere that is more conveniently situated.  It is on the same side of the road about a block down from Disneyland.  It is a couple of minutes walk from a small shopping centre which has a good selection of restaurants.  We particularly like the Cheesecake Company - the food and the staff were excellent.  There are two small mini-markets adjacent to the hotel so you can pick up any essentials you need.  There is a continental breakfast in with the price of this hotel and you can help yourself to bagels, toast, danish pastries, cereal , fresh fruit and yogurt etc.  They also
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for staying with us and for sharing your many wonderful comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. I am delighted you and your family enjoyed all of the complimentary amenities that we offer here at our hotel, including our Expanded Complimentary Breakfast Buffet, complimentary parking, and our Exclusive Complimentary Shuttle. I am so glad to hear that Danilo was able to find your bag and I thank you for your kind comments about him and his staff. Please feel free to contact me personally should you and your family be returning to the Anaheim area as it would be my pleasure to assist with reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: We just spent five days at the Candy Cane Inn, and have already booked another visit for February.   From the reservation,  handled by the very courteous and efficient Rigo, to the morning buffet, to the lovely Christmas surprise from management,  the entire stay was a delight.  It's so nice to be able to walk home from the parks to a room that is clean, spacious, and comfortable.  Yes, it's a few dollars more than some of the others across the street, but you get what you pay for!
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting with us and sharing your kind comments regarding our property, complimentary amenities and exceptional guest service. We have a wonderful team, including Rigo, who take pride in their jobs and taking care of our guests and they too appreciate when folks take the time to write positive comments such as yours. We thank you again for staying with us and please don’t hesitate to contact me personally when returning as I would be delighted to assist with future reservations. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Another great year's worth of stays
Summary: What I can say about the Candy Cane that I have not stated in reviews from year prior?  We love the place and the staff.  This year we stayed at the CCI in Feb., April, Aug., Sept, Oct and Nov..Each time the stay was ideal.    As I reflect back on why we stay here so much it comes down to two primary reasons.  After all, every hotel near Disneyland has beds, TVs, pools, close to the park, and easy access to SNA or LAX.  What makes CCI so special is: 1) the staff and 2) the overall experience.   As one who travels for work and fun, we stay approximately 75+ nights a year in hotels. We meet lots of hotel staff and none are better than those at the CCI. From those at the front desk to the bus drivers to housekeeping to management, everyone is happy, friendly and willing to assist.
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for being a repeat member of the Candy Cane family and for sharing your many wonderful comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. I am delighted you and your family enjoyed all of the complimentary amenities that we offer here at our hotel. Thank you for your kind comments about our team and property! We look forward to seeing you again soon and please feel free to contact me personally when returning, as I would be delighted to assist with reservations. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Old Style Service Which Keeps You Coming Back
Summary: This was our first stay at the Candy Cane Inn, but from now on will be the only place we stay in Anaheim.  As we had a late evening flight out of LAX I booked the premium room as it has a late check-out.  Even if we didn't need the late check-out in future I would still book this room as the little extra it costs is well worth it.  The room is a good size with plenty of room around the beds.  It has a good bathroom and a little kitchenette which came in handy.  As we arrived early our room wasn't ready but the hotel stored our luggage and messaged us when the room was available.  There was a lovely welcome basket in our room for us which had popcorn, cookies, muesli bars and snacks in it.  There was also a lovely flower on the dresser.  In the evening there was a breakfast menu
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us on your first visit and we appreciate your many kind comments regarding our property, staff and services. We are delighted you and your family enjoyed the many amenities our Premium rooms have to offer, including our 2 PM late checkout. Please feel free to contact me personally when you are returning to the Anaheim area, as I would be delighted to assist with future reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: We had a great stay at the hotel.  We booked a Premium room, which was a needed for our family of 5.  The extra space of the room was great and the extra amenities (like the continental breakfast being delivered) were very appreciated.  The walk to Disneyland wasn't bad, but by the third day we were there it felt like the hotel was a lot farther.  They do have a shuttle, but we never used it- I didn't know how breaking down our double stroller would work on the shuttle and it just never worked out for us to catch it.  We didn't use the pool either, but everything seemed well maintained and very clean.    The only snag we did have was that our fire alarm went off at 2:20 the night we got there.  It wasn't a big deal, but it did require 3 hours of getting our kids to go back to
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for staying with us and for sharing your many wonderful comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. I am delighted you enjoyed your stay and the many complimentary amenities we offer with our Premium rooms, including our complimentary breakfast delivery. I am sincerely apologetic that your fire alarm went off and kept your children awake. I did want to point out that although we do not have suites, we do offer our Deluxe and Premium rooms with the ability to have connecting doors between the rooms for larger families. Thank you again for staying with us. Kind regards!

Summary: My wife chose this resort based on the previous reviews. The Candy Cane Inn did not disappoint. The location is very close to Disneyland, the grounds and rooms were immaculate, the staff friendly. They even had a coin operated laundry to do a load of clothes as kids can go through them fast on vacation. The room price was very reasonable and the shuttle ran right on time, the Continental breakfast was good and I highly recommend the Candy Cane Inn.  Quite simply I got 5 star service for a 3 star price.
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for staying with us and for sharing your many wonderful comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. I am delighted you enjoyed your stay and the many complimentary amenities we offer here at our hotel, including our Exclusive Complimentary Shuttle and our onsite laundry service. Thank you again for your many kind comments and please don’t hesitate to call or email me directly should your family be returning to the Candy Cane, as I would be delighted to assist with reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: Great hotel located just a 10 min stroll from Disneyland & very reasonably priced.  Rooms were spacious & clean, breakfast was adequate & the Disney shuttle a bonus.  Lots of food choices for dinner within walking distance.  Would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us to be of service during your recent visit to Anaheim. We do appreciate your business and I am so glad you were able to enjoy our many complimentary amenities we have to offer at the Candy Cane. Please feel free to contact me personally when you and your family are returning to the Anaheim area as it would be my pleasure to assist with reservations. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Candy Cane Inn had me at Hello!
Summary: This place is awesome!  You can park here and take a shuttle OR walk a couple of minutes to the front gates of DL or DCA.  The front desk and staff are so nice!  This was our second time visiting and my son commented to the front desk clerk about how much he loves CCI and we come annually.  The clerk said Hello and was nice enough to look up our past reservation and knocked off $10/night for that and then prompted us for our AAA card and knocked off another $10/night!  We rolled up before the parks opened and got in our room right then!  That including the ease of ordering bfast and having it brought to your door piping hot before your day at the parks is just so nice!  No standing in lines and the ease of eating and getting ready in your own room.  They even had turn down
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for being a repeat member of the Candy Cane family and for sharing your many wonderful comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. Our team does an outstanding job in maintaining our property and I sincerely appreciate the friendliness they possess and extend to our guests! We thank you again for staying with us and please don’t hesitate to contact me personally when returning as I would be delighted to assist with future reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: Hands down the best Disneyland area hotel. Great staff, great rooms, great location! I love that this is a smaller hotel. The property is beautifully landscaped and always smells so good (like star jasmine). The rooms are not huge, but more than adequate. Depending on the type of room you select, there is the option of having breakfast delivered to your room every morning. Simply fill out the order form and hang on your door before heading to bed. The complimentary breakfast is great also and you can eat poolside. Add in free parking, free shuttle and AP discounts, you just can't go wrong. It may seem silly to have a shuttle for a property so close to the park, but at the end of a long Disneyland day, it is so nice to not have to hike back to the hotel. Especially with arms full
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and I am delighted that you enjoyed the Candy Cane Inn. We appreciate your many kind comments and it is our pleasure to provide our guests with excellent customer service. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as I would be delighted to assist with future reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: This was our fourth stay at the Candy Cane.  For the price you can’t beat it.  It is walking distance to Disneyland or take their free shuttle.  If you are worn out, you can return to the motel, eat a reasonably priced dinner at several restaurants nearby, from Tony Roma’s to Denny’s, and then return to the mayhem.  The breakfast is a standard continental, but offers nice touches like hard boiled eggs, and hot chocolate for the kids.  And most of all it is spotless.  Real care is taken from the grounds to the linen. Your only problem with the Candy Cane is getting a reservation! Note to the manager.  I understand why you use the vinegar and water process on the hard boiled eggs, but it does impart a slight vinegar taste.  There are several other methods now available.
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us the opportunity once again and being a loyal member of the Candy Cane Inn family of repeat and loyal guests. We DO appreciate your business and kind comments and will definitely look into your valuable tip about our hard boiled eggs, to ensure we are giving folks the best breakfast available. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as I would be delighted to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: I'm big into clean rooms and this place is great. Free parking, shuttle, and breakfast! We will stay here again in the future. Staff was friendly and very accomidating. Better value than staying on site. I have stayed in many different places in Anaheim and this is the best.
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting with us and sharing your many kind comments regarding our property, complimentary amenities and exceptional guest service. We have a wonderful team, who take pride in their jobs and taking care of our guests and they too appreciate when folks take the time to write positive comments such as yours. We thank you again for staying with us and please don’t hesitate to contact me personally when returning as I would be delighted to assist with future reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: I stay at the Disneyland Resort several times a year and have been doing so for over 10 years.  This is the first time I've stayed at this hotel and I wish I had found it earlier.   This is a great property that shows pride of ownership.   Extremely well kept, quiet, safe and CLEAN.  My room was cleaner than some four or five star hotels I've stayed at.   Check-in was a breeze and the staff was very welcoming.  I checked in at 3:30 pm and there were only a few parking spots available.   But the best part is, unlike most of the other hotels in the area, there is NO extra parking fee.   They also have their own private shuttle to Disneyland.   It is free and sure beats the Anaheim Resort Transportation buses.  It is such a short drive that you really could walk.  The only
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for staying with us and for sharing your many wonderful comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. I am delighted you enjoyed your stay and the many complimentary amenities we offer here at our hotel, including our Exclusive Complimentary Shuttle and our Expanded Continental Breakfast Buffet. I do want to note that we do include hot instant oatmeal, cubed cheese, yogurt and hard boiled eggs in our Breakfast Buffet for all guests to enjoy. Thank you again for your many kind comments and please don’t hesitate to call or email me directly should your family be returning to the Candy Cane, as I would be delighted to assist with reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: We stayed for four nights after a bad experience at another hotel. Candy Cane has friendly staff- they are very accommodating. First of all, the hotel is CLEAN. Spotless. Very well taken care of. There is free breakfast, and although not a hot breakfast, it is totally excellent. The hotel is super conveniently located, a ten minute walk from Disneyland, and yet, they offer shuttle service to Disney every half an hour, which is very impressive. They do not charge their customers for parking- we appreciated that! All these positives helped us save money and feel very well taken care of with our three children. Also, the staff works very well together- the cleaning staff was very helpful and had a smile on their face. If you need something at the hotel, just ask, because they care.
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for staying with us and for sharing your many wonderful comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. I am delighted you and your family enjoyed all of the complimentary amenities that we offer here at our hotel, including our Expanded Complimentary Breakfast Buffet, complimentary parking, and our Exclusive Complimentary Shuttle. Please feel free to contact me personally should you and your family be returning to the Anaheim area as it would be my pleasure to assist with reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: We stayed at the Candy Cane Inn for 3 nights in January 2014. We arrived at around 7am as we had a breakfast reservation at the Disneyland hotels and wanted to leave our bags and come back to check in later. However they had a room ready at that early hour which was great. The receptionist checking us in was friendly and could see we were in a hurry so she was quick at giving us all the info we needed.  We managed to park right outside of our room which was handy with all of our bags. The room was a bit on the small side as it had 2 double beds - I understand they are all meant for families but 1 double bed would have been much better. There was no real room for our 2 big suitcases but I understand they are meant for families and people with less luggage then us - we had so much
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and I am delighted that you enjoyed the Candy Cane Inn. We appreciate your kind comments and it is our pleasure to provide our guests with excellent customer service. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as I would be delighted to assist with future reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: This is a beautiful property!  The grounds are gorgeous, the pool area very clean and pretty.  The continental breakfast was perfect.  The staff are very friendly!  The shuttle is so handy and fast and the drivers were very nice!  So many positives!. We stayed here for a week and enjoyed our stay.  There did seem to have been a problem with the chemical balance in the hot tub because it was very foamy when turned on, however the big pool was very very clean and perfect. The rooms are a comfortable size and being a motel, it was so handy to go directly to our room.  But sorry Candy Cane, the rooms are very outdated and need some modernization and renovation.  There was a musty smell mixed with the strong smell of cleaning chemicals.  The rooms were cleaned well, but the smell we
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and providing us with your valuable feedback. This allows us to institute operational modifications as well as discuss with our team to rectify. Thank you again for your visit with us and your kind comments regarding our beautiful grounds. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Perfect place to stay for Disneyland!
Summary: We loved the Candy Cane Inn! Each and every staff person we saw was friendly and accommodating. The location can't be beat! We chose to walk to the park but they provide transportation if needed. Our favorite things about the hotel were its cleanliness, pool and hot tub, breakfast delivered to our room each morning (premium rooms only), microwave, refrigerator, and location, location, location! We used Hugo's car service for transportation to and from the airport and it was wonderful as well! They even have complementary car seats so we didn't have to lug ours around. We also rented a stroller from City Stroller Rentals and that was super easy and convienent too! Thanks CCI!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. We DO appreciate your business and you taking the time to provide us with this valuable feedback. I am delighted you enjoyed the many complimentary amenities we have to offer here at the Candy Cane Inn. Again, thank you and please feel free to contact me personally when returning as I would be delighted to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: THE ONLY PLACE TO STAY IN ANAHEIM!
Summary: My family and I have been staying at the Candy Cane since 2000. We have never been disappointed in fact they have only continued to outdo  themselves. Our most recent stay was from Nov. 20 to 23. From the moment we checked in the Candy cane staff was more than accommodating. James at the front desk made sure all of our requests were met and made us feel very welcome. Over the next 3 nights we took advantage of the complimentary shuttle, wide variety of breakfast options, and relaxing and comfortable rooms. The Candy Cane has made every effort to modernize their rooms. The rooms have been updated to include flat screens, new bed linens, and thermostat for air conditioning to name a few. There is also complimentary parking and wifi. Which is hard to find at any of the area hotels
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for being a repeat member of the Candy Cane family and for sharing your wonderful comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. Our team does an outstanding job in maintaining our property and I sincerely appreciate the friendliness they possess and extend to our guests! It was a pleasure speaking to you and please feel free to contact me personally prior to your next visit with us, as I would be delighted to assist with any needs or requests you may have. Kind regards!

Summary: Staying here is the Best if your destination is Disneyland, you are right next door. The hotel is VERY clean the employees are super nice and they have a great breakfast which is free of charge. They do not charge for parking which most hotels in the area do. They also provide a shuttle to take you to Disneyland and pick up.
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting with us and sharing your many kind comments regarding our property, complimentary amenities and exceptional guest service. We have a wonderful team, who take pride in their jobs and taking care of our guests and they too appreciate when folks take the time to write positive comments such as yours. We thank you again for staying with us and please don’t hesitate to contact me personally when returning as I would be delighted to assist with future reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: We have 5 in our family so we got the premium room which was just a room but they brought breakfast in the morning. I didn't think it would be a big deal but it was awesome to not have to leave the room! Of course it's a motel so it's not quiet if people are talking outside but it's okay, usually people just go back to their room and sleep. It was about a 7 minute walk, clean, comfortable, one morning our fire alarm was beeping but they came quickly to fix it. And as we left they were having a no water routine thing going on - that was disturbing since there was no water in even the lobby bathroom. Microwave and refrigerator in the room was nice, water pressure in shower was nice. If you plan to just sleep there, it's great. And I requested away from the pool and upstairs as
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your comments with other Tripadvisor travelers. I am delighted that you enjoyed our Premium rooms and our complimentary breakfast delivery. I do sincerely apologize for the water shut off, as the City of Anaheim came to do their yearly inspection of our backflow, and there was a valve that needed to be replaced. Normally we could turn off the water in separate sections of the hotel, but again with the backflow needing a cartridge replaced, the City of Anaheim had to shut off water to the entire hotel. I again apologize for the inconvenience and please don’t hesitate to contact me directly should your family be returning to the Anaheim area, as it would be my pleasure to assist with future reservations. Kind regards.

Summary: This review is only regarding the hotel/building itself. The first room had a terrible smell of chlorine. The second smelt of fragrance attempting to coverup a very old, outdated motel. The rooms has stains on the furniture and the water from the sinks were murkey.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and I do sincerely appreciate your feedback. I sent you an email via the TripAdvisor system and with no response I wanted to reply to your comments. We certainly do care and listen to all guests, and while I have always chosen not to use this platform to challenge any guest I did want to address a few comments you made. I personally walked both rooms myself and can honestly say they were clean and smelled very clean. Thank you again for your comments and please know that we do take great pride in providing a clean and friendly room to each and every guest. Kind regards

Summary: The Candy Cane Inn If you are planning a trip to Disneyland the Candy Cane Inn is the place to stay.  This property is absolutely gorgeous,  with all the amenities a family vacation should have to make your stay memorable and fun. Beautiful rooms, property, pool, and a fantastic continental breakfast included. Just a short walk to the park, but I suggest you take the shuttle so you can meet Lee the driver....what a pleasant person, he makes every morning and evening trip to and from the park fun what a great way to start your day...hope to see you soon Lee.. Also let's not forget Brian at the front desk...we wanted to order dinner to be delivered to our room from a local restaurant and asked Brian for his suggesting. .he was on the money and the place that suggested was
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting with us and sharing your many kind comments regarding our property, complimentary amenities and exceptional guest service. We have a wonderful team, including Mr. Lee and Brian, who take pride in their jobs and taking care of our guests and they too appreciate when folks take the time to write positive comments such as yours. We thank you again for staying with us and please don’t hesitate to contact me personally when returning as I would be delighted to assist with future reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: My family of 4 stayed here for 5 nights during Halloween. It was a nice little motel with a free shuttle to the Disney parks. The rooms were clean and the morning breakfast was a nice start to the day. The pool and hot tub were small but the kids wanted to use them every night after we returned from Disney. The staff was friendly and attentive if you needed more towels or toiletries. Theres also stores and food located conveniently near buy. We had no complaints about our visit and would consider staying again in the future.
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us to be of service during your recent visit to Anaheim. We do appreciate your business and I am so glad you were able to enjoy our many complimentary amenities we have to offer at the Candy Cane. Thank you again for your stay and please feel free to contact me personally when your family is returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with reservations, as well as discussing what our team can do to bring your next review up to a five. Kind regards!

Summary: My family of 4 including a 9 year old boy and 15 year old girl stayed here in mid November of 14 for 5 days. The rooms are simple but efficient. We stayed in a deluxe double queen. The room included a safe and a refrigerator. The hotel offers a free shuttle to the parks that leaves every 30 minutes, and there was always room on the bus when we wanted a lift. The park entrance is only a short walk from the hotel, so we walked most of the time. There was a heated pool and hot tub, but we did not use it. We purchased our DL tickets from the hotel which was convenient. We used the free continental breakfast every day, and although there were no hot items it was more than sufficient. The front desk staff were always friendly and warm. The breakfast staff was awesome, and the
Manager Response: Thank you so much for choosing the Candy Cane Inn on your recent visit to the Anaheim area. I am delighted you enjoyed your stay and the many complimentary amenities we offer here at our hotel, including our Exclusive Complimentary Shuttle and our Expanded Continental Breakfast Buffet. I do want to note that we do include hot instant oatmeal in our Breakfast Buffet for guests to enjoy. Thank you again for your many kind comments and please don’t hesitate to call or email me directly should your family be returning to the Candy Cane, as I would be delighted to assist with reservations. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Cute hotel in a perfect location
Summary: Stayed here two nights when visiting Disneyland.  I had researched Disney's hotels and since they were terribly expensive, I chose this "good neighbor" hotel. It's absolutely adorable and literally minutes from the Disney parks. The room is well roomy and comfortable. The staff is very helpful and accommodating. There is a shuttle that's very convenient, but you can also walk to and from the parks in less than 10 minutes. There's a nice continental breakfast in the morning as well. I would definitely stay here again and recommend it!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and I am delighted that you enjoyed the Candy Cane Inn. We appreciate your kind comments and it is our pleasure to provide our guests with excellent customer service. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as I would be delighted to assist with future reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: I would rate it a very good – 4+ stars!  It’s not fancy or high class, but the staff is very professional and the complex very clean and a comfortable/convenient place to stay.  We stayed at the Candy Cane Inn Nov 7 – 11, 2014.  Location:  Very convenient and one of the closest to Disneyland entrance.  Either you can walk approximately 10 minutes or use their private bus/shuttle service.   There is a 7-Eleven and a convenience store right next door; a pharmacy across the street from 7-Eleven and Target 1 mile down the road.  Also, a Tony Roma’s and Denny across from Disney entrance.  Rooms/Complex/Pool:  We had conjoining “Premium” Rooms (2 queen beds in each) at the back of the complex.  The rooms were a good size and although older, they were very clean, very well maintained
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for staying with us and for sharing your many wonderful comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. I am delighted you and your family enjoyed all of the complimentary amenities that we offer here at our hotel, including our Expanded Complimentary Breakfast Buffet, our pool and spa, and our Exclusive Complimentary Shuttle. Please feel free to contact me personally should you and your family be returning to the Anaheim area as it would be my pleasure to assist with reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: I have to say, do not count this place out until you have tried it.  Pros: close to the resort, free parking, free shuttle to the resort (walking was faster). Very comfortable beds. ( I'm a picky tempurpedic cloud owner) Cons: no elevator which is an issue with you have a 3 yr. old and a baby and two strollers to lug up and down stairs! Small pool, hotel books up fast.  Our stay was amazing, we wanted to stay longer but the rooms we're completely booked. We ended up having to stay another night somewhere else. We got a premium room and it was well worth the extra price! I loved every night filling out a breakfast order on paper and waking up to someone delivering our complimentary breakfast to our freaking door! The breakfast isn't glorious but food delivered to your door is so
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for visiting with us and for sharing your wonderful comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. I am delighted you enjoyed our Premium rooms and our soft mattresses. I hope that on your next visit in December we can bring your review up to a 5 as we do strive to provide a 5 out of 5 service and quality hotel. Once again thank you for staying with us and we do look forward to seeing you again soon. Kind regards!

Summary: This was about the third time over the last four years our family of four has stayed at the Candy Cane Inn while visiting Disneyland and DCA. Before this past trip I looked in to other hotels in the area just to see if there might be something better, but again decided on the Candy Cane Inn. It really is one of the best deals in the area. All of the extra charges can really add up at the other hotels. We don't spend a lot of time in our hotel since we are usually at the parks the whole day. So, the Candy Cane Inn is just fine for sleeping. Here are all of the things I like about the Candy Cane Inn: free parking, free breakfast, free internet, no resort fee (like at other area hotels), comfortable beds, fairly quiet (some hall noise since it's a motel style, but not bad), within
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for being a loyal member of the Candy Cane Inn family of repeat guests. We DO appreciate your business and look forward to you having another memorable visit soon. Thank you again for your stay and please feel free to contact me personally when your family is returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with reservations, as well as discussing what our team can do to bring your next review up to a five. Kind regards!

Summary: Another happy customer!  Rooms are not new, but very clean and attractive.  Bathrooms are small, but will do just fine.  Showerhead was actually at a good height for my 6' Hubby.  A good number of towels, and bath amenities.  Bed was fine for me, but Hubby found it a little lumpy.  There were plenty of pillows, with an extra pillow and blanket in the closet.  Buffet breakfast until 9:30 every morning - don't skip the fun cereal bar by the pool.  Very friendly. professional staff.  Walking distance to Disneyland and the Convention Center, but they also have a shuttle bus to Disney that runs every half-hour.  No restaurant or bar onsite, but right across the street is a little plaza with a bunch of places to eat.  7-11 and CVS and just a short half-block away to stock the
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. We DO appreciate your business and your taking the time to provide us with this valuable feedback. I have sent you a note to inquire the room number in which you were staying as we have high quality Serta mattresses and I would like to inspect this to ensure there are no manufacturer’s defects present. Again, thank you and please feel free to contact me personally when returning as I would be delighted to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: A great place to stay for Disneyland
Summary: We visited in early October, 2014 - our second visit to Candy Cane Inn.  The room was clean and comfortable although one bed was somewhat soft on the edges.  We were in a handicapped room but there was a tub/shower combo instead of a walk in shower so it was somewhat difficult.  The breakfast is fine - nothing exciting - but it is nice to sit around the pool.  Shuttle makes is very convenient although you could walk if you so chose. It was very clean and we had plenty of room for three of us.  We only went in the pool one day and it was quite cool.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and providing us with your valuable feedback. This allows us to institute operational modifications as well as discuss with our team to rectify. In regards to our pool temperature, we maintain 79 degrees year round however I will certainly have our engineering team check this. Kind regards.

Summary: My husband and I love staying at the Candy Cane Inn!    The grounds are beautiful, rooms are nice, and breakfast is wonderful!     And always love visiting with Edd at breakfast time.   He takes his job as Candy Cane Ambassador and Historian very seriously and always has interesting facts about the hotel and Disneyland to share with us.    Please let Edd know how very much he is appreciated!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for being a loyal and repeat guest of Candy Cane Inn. Yes, we as do many of our guests simply adore Edd and I personally and sincerely appreciate his over 29 years of service.  His knowledge and desire to share these many facts of our hotel the area makes breakfast even more enjoyable.  Kind regards!

Summary: The only place we stay when we go to Disneyland. Clean rooms. Walking distance to front entrance or take their shuttle that runs all day to the park. Nice pool. Complimentary breakfast. Wifi needs upgrading.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us and providing us with your valuable feedback. We do listen to our guests and I had our Chief Engineer contact our Wi-Fi provider as the system had an extensive overhaul and working most wonderfully. Again, thank for bringing this to our attention. Kind regards.

Summary: We enjoyed our second stay at the Candy Cane Inn as much as the first!  The rooms are nicely decorated and clean. I love the shutters on the windows because they add an airy, tropical feel to the room. The location can't be beat. It's about a 10 minute walk to Disneyland or the shuttle runs every half hour.  This property is beautiful. For what could be just a standard old motel, they have done an amazing job with the landscaping, the "cobblestone" driveway and the lighting. We enjoy the breakfast of donuts, muffins, toast, fruit, hard boiled eggs, yogurt, and cold cereal. It is so enjoyable to sit and eat by the poolside before heading out for a busy day. The breakfast lady is extremely pleasant and outgoing. She makes breakfast most enjoyable. Front desk staff were also
