Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your wonderful comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. I do agree that bricks and mortar are the foundation of any hotel but the ambiance, personal touches, friendliness and guest service is what makes the difference. I am delighted that your daughter was thrilled with her surprise and hearing that is what makes my job rewarding and enjoyable. Please feel free to contact me when returning as I would be delighted to assist with rates and reservations. Kind Regards!

Summary: We stayed here for the Mickey's Halloween Party. The hotel backs up to Radiator Springs in Cars Land. The walk to the park is only 10 min to the gate. There is even a free shuttle, but either way super easy and quick to get to the park. The expanded continental breakfast more than satisfied my family! Bagels, pastries, cereals, hard boiled eggs, fruit and yogurt to name a few. The staff is super friendly! If you drive, they offer FREE parking. Most other hotels in the area charge up to $18/night. There are different sizes of rooms from the standard to the deluxe. Every time we have stayed here, they are always clean, and even have a refrigerator too! Will definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and I am delighted that you enjoyed your visit once again. We do strive to provide an exceptional product and delivering friendly service while being mindful of families traveling on a budget. Kind regards!

Summary: My wife and I stayed at the Candy Cane Inn for 2 nights while on a road trip around California.  We really enjoyed the hotel and the service was very good.  Everyone was very friendly and the room was clean and quite.  The only issue I had was that the morning breakfast was just OK.  I look forward to my AM cup of coffee and theirs was not very good, so I had to go elsewhere to get my java fix. One thing I'd like to thank the hotel for was that we left our camera cable/re-charger there and they did find it and mail it to us...THANK YOU! I would both stay at this hotel again and recommend it to anyone going to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and I appreciate your comments regarding our coffee. I will certainly contact our provider to ensure that their product and brewers are working together. Thank you for your kind comments regarding the return of your personal items. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Wouldn't stay anywhere else! We love it that much!
Summary: Every trip we take to Disneyland, we stay at the Candy Cane Inn. We have been staying there for years! My daughter is even a Cast Member (WDW), and even with her incredible discount on the resorts at this time of year, we, once again, chose to stay at the Candy Cane Inn. We will be there in about 2 weeks, and we can't wait! We went back and forth with staying on Disney property, or staying at our favorite place! Candy Cane Inn won!!! We will continue to stay there as long as we travel to Disneyland! It's a wonderful place to stay!
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us the opportunity once again and being a loyal member of the Candy Cane Inn family of repeat and loyal guests. We DO appreciate your business and kind comments and your daughter’s testimonial is simply wonderful and I personally thank her for this. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as I would be delighted to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: We arrived from Las Vegas with a reservation made much earlier in the year for 3 nights. We had selected a suite at the rear which was quiet and comfortable and we enjoyed our time so much that we extended our stay with another 4 nights. The breakfasts were delivered at a time we specified in the mornings, otherwise we could attend the breakfast area served near the pool. Our last two days we ate near the pool and it was quite spacious and we found there was lots of food and it was regularly replenished. We particularly liked that we could walk to Disneyland parks from the hotel, although twice we caught the free shuttle back after long days of walking.  We will not hesitate in returning as soon as we can.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and I am pleased that you enjoyed your Premium Room and the amenities they provide. The expanded continental breakfast deliver is a time saver and something that most simply enjoy. Thank you again for your kind comments and we look forward in seeing you again. Kind regards!

Summary: I stay at this hotel quite frequently and absolutely loved our last stay here. We were there during a very busy time and I must say I hardly noticed it at all. Due to the increased crowds that weekend (October 17th through 20th) the rooms were sold out months in advance. I called the manager directly and pleaded with him, I was so appreciative that he was able to find us a room. The room was great, the breakfast was welcome and  James was at the front desk which was awesome to see him again. Clean, comfortable, courteous, convenient. What else can I say about this property. There is now a HUGE CVS pharmacy across the street which was sooooo convenient. They had anything you would need including groceries. This was a nice perk as we for the first time in years did not rent a car.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us again and it was my pleasure in finding a room to accommodate your visit. We do appreciate your being a loyal member of the family of repeat Candy Cane Inn guests and look forward in seeing you on your next visit. Please contact me when returning as I would be delighted to assist with reservations once again. Kind regards!

Summary: This motel was very convenient for visiting Disneyland. It is far from a 'luxury' hotel, but it had all the basics.  Pros:   Breakfast every morning. It was basic, with no hot items, but there was decent coffee and you could eat outside by the pool.    The beds were comfortable.    There was free parking.     It was withing walking distance of some nice restaurants if you want to eat out of the park       All of the staff we encountered, from the front desk to the gardeners were friendly and went out of their way to be helpful if we needed anything at all.    The rooms had a small fridge and the motel is close to a 7/11 so you can stock up on waters/sodas for your stay and not spend a fortune.    The room we were in had a great Air Conditioner and decent water pressure. Two
Manager Response: First and foremost I would like to sincerely apologize that your stay was not to your expectations and I thank you for your input. We do listen to the comments of our guests and appreciate your valuable feedback. In regards to a few of the items you mentioned, we do offer instant hot oatmeal for breakfast, and I do apologize that our shuttles were not running for the special event. Thank you again for your comments, as I have shared them with the proper Managers and Staff for training and review. Kind regards!

Summary: Stay here for a week 10/21-10/28/14 and will be back. The resort is a few blocks away from disneyland. On one corner is 711 and the next was a CVS and a little shopping center across the street. We had a standard room. It was clean a comfy. It had two queen beds and a table two plush chairs and a area by sink to hang clothes and a huge counter with one sink and the bathroom had a toilet and tub. They provided a one cup coffee maker. Also had a tv and mini fridge in wall unit. There was no water provided I have seen other reviews that said that I think that was for a deluxe room. We were located on the second floor and had no noise what's so ever from any other rooms. I will stay here again. It was a great place for a great price. It had so much charm. The front desk staff on the
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for staying with us and for sharing your many wonderful comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. I am delighted you and your family enjoyed all of the complimentary amenities that we offer here at our hotel. Thank you for your kind comments about our team, including Edd, as they do an outstanding job in maintaining our property and I sincerely appreciate the friendliness they possess and extend to our guests! We look forward to seeing you again soon and please feel free to contact me personally when returning, as I would be delighted to assist with reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: Rooms very clean, friendly & attentive staff, convenient shuttle to Disneyland. We chose Candy Cane Inn because of the great reviews on TripAdvisor and we were not disappointed!  Great deal! We will stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and I am delighted that you enjoyed the Candy Cane Inn. We appreciate your kind comments and it is our pleasure to provide our guests with excellent customer service. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as I would be delighted to assist with future reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: This was the best hotel ever.  The breakfast is plenty to keep you going and has lots of choices.  The rooms are on the small side but your not there much.  The staff is very friendly and can't do enough for you.  Always smiling and friendly.  We had a fridge and coffee maker that was a bonus.  We used the laundry room and it was $1.25 to wash and dry.   The pool area is nice and gated so small kids do not wander.  You are less than a 10 min walk to Disneyland or can use the shuttle that runs every 30 minutes.  We found it faster to walk than use the shuttle.  There are variety stores and drug store very close for anything you forgot.  Overall this place was fantastic, and I will stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting with us and sharing your many kind comments regarding our property, complimentary amenities and exceptional guest service. We have a wonderful team, who take pride in their jobs and taking care of our guests and they too appreciate when folks take the time to write positive comments such as yours. We thank you again for staying with us and please don’t hesitate to contact me personally when returning as I would be delighted to assist with future reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: We loved that we could walk to and from Disneyland but I feel it's a typical motel just like the others around the maingate.  Breakfast is not very good.  Typical donuts, cereal and hard boiled eggs unlike the Ayers Anaheim.  We also made the mistake of leaving the bathroom light and fan on during the night for my daughter to find the potty.  There is a sewer drain next to the toilet and the fan sucked all the sewer smell into the room.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and I am sincerely unhappy to learn that our “motel” style property and expanded continental breakfast were not up to your expectations. We do listen to our guests and desire to make enhancements in product and service that will benefit current and future guests. Your comment regarding the floor drain in the restroom was something that I appreciate very much and have actually implemented immediate change in our housekeeping procedures to alleviate this. Again, we appreciate your feedback and DO care about our guest’s satisfaction. Warm regards!

Summary: This is an excellent hotel that is within walking distance to Disneyland. They include a free shuttle to the park every 30 minutes, free wifi, free breakfast, excellent staff, hot tub, and swimming pool. I can't say enough about the staff. They are extremely helpful and are always in a cheery mood. During our trip we stayed at another hotel in the area too that was much more expensive and bigger. You would have thought that our experience would have been better at the other hotel, but far from it. If you are looking to go to Disneyland, I would highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your feedback with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. Rigo, our reservations supervisor told me about his pleasant conversation and enjoyed speaking with you at check-out. We appreciate your comments and please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: We really enjoyed our stay at The Candy Cane Inn. Our son chose this hotel as it was an easy 20 minute walk to Disneyland. While the facilities were fairly basic, but the morning buffet was very good, quality wise. I would stay here again, no doubt.
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us to be of service during your recent visit to Anaheim. We do appreciate your business and I am so glad you were able to enjoy our many complimentary amenities we have to offer at the Candy Cane, including our Expanded Continental Breakfast. Please feel free to contact me personally should you and your family be returning to the Anaheim area as it would be my pleasure to assist with reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: We had some uncertainty when we booked this place.   The price is affordable considering its location.   It's walking distance to Disney, restaurants and convinience stores.   It's a motel type environment where you have a two floor building and a parking space in front of your door.   The area was kept clean and parking was not a problem.    The room when we opened had a musty, cleaning chemical smell which went away after a few mins with the door open.   The carpets are a little bit worn with a few stains but this understandable when you have kids around.   You can't expect a steam cleaning every week.  We just didn't walk around in our bare feet.  The furnitures were a bit worn too but not broken, nice flat screen tv, in room safe, small fridge, nice big bathroom counter and
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us to be of service during your recent visit to Anaheim. We do appreciate your business and I am so glad you were able to enjoy our clean and comfortable rooms here at the Candy Cane Inn. I am delighted you enjoyed breakfast as well, as we have continued to add items to our complimentary Expanded Continental Breakfast, including hard boiled eggs, cubed cheese and a healthy Greek Yogurt. Thank you again for your stay and please feel free to contact me personally when your family is returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with reservations, as well as discussing what our team can do to bring your next review up to a five. Kind regards!

Summary: Five night stay at a great little hotel a short walk from Disneyland.  Very helpful and courteous staff.  Reasonable sized rooms that are well kept.  Great breakfast, so you can fuel up before heading out to the Magic Kingdom.  Generally, donuts, bagels, danish, cereal, and fruit.  Restaurants in strip mall directly across the street don't look like much, but were actually pretty good.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and I am delighted that you enjoyed the Candy Cane Inn. We appreciate your kind comments and it is our pleasure to provide our guests with excellent customer service. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as I would be delighted to assist with future reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: My partner and I recently enjoyed a second visit to the wonderful Candy Cane Inn. We once again loved our stay. The room was spotless, spacious and very comfortable. The beds are blissfully comfortable. The grounds are pretty and immaculately maintained. There is a lovely pool and spa area. The expanded continental breakfast includes hot and cold cereal, bagels,toast, boiled eggs, cheese, danish pastry,donuts, juices, coffee, tea, milk, hot chocolate, peanut butter, butter, jams, cream cheese, honey and yogurt. It can be enjoyed poolside or taken back to your room. The hotel is in perfect proximity to Disneyland. It is about a 10 minute walk to the Disney gates, or you can take one of the shuttles that run regularly to and from the park. All of the staff is genuinely kind and
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for being a loyal member of the Candy Cane Inn family of repeat guests. We DO appreciate your business and look forward to you having another memorable visit soon. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with reservations and any requests you may have as well. Kind Regards!

Summary Heading: Take the good with the bad.
Summary: I'll start off by saying: "If they offer you room 140, run far, far away!"  It is in the back, and considered some type of upgrade (it's $10 more than a regular room), but extremely noisy, in a cubby with a bright light on right outside the room all night.  I think it must be next to a giant boiler or something, it kind of sounds like an airliner running next to the room.  Anyway we had a terrible nights sleep, but it was the only room available the first night we stayed. The next two nights we were moved to a regular room in the middle on the complex and that was okay. Unfortunately, we had stayed at the Kearny Mesa Hampton Inn in San Diego for several nights prior to our visit to the Candy Cane Inn, and the difference was startling.  The Hampton was extremely clean (the Candy
Manager Response: First and foremost I would like to sincerely apologize for the items you noted. I do thank you for our phone conversation and as I stated before we do listen to all comments and while we never want to disappoint our guests, we do value these opportunities to continue to train and grow our guest service. I have personally spoken to the parties involved as well as their corresponding managers to ensure we are continuing to maintain a clean and professional environment for all of our guests. Thank you again for your business and kind regards!

Summary: We first found the Candy Cane in back in 1998.  Young family with small children on a budget.  All these years later it still is perfect.  The rooms are nice and very clean.  Beds are just so comfortable you will sleep even if you don't spend 10 hrs at Disneyland.  Shuttles run on time with fabulous drivers but you can walk its so close.  We got the premium room this time.  Just a hair bigger and they will bring breakfast to your room.  I found this service unmatched.  We have stayed at the Grand Californian several times and they would charge you a small fortune for a breakfast in your room. If your on a budget or not this is a perfect place.  The value for your money, friendly staff, great coffee, great beds.  Its not large and flashy, if thats important to you, spend 4 times
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for being a repeat member of the Candy Cane family and for sharing your wonderful comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. Our team does an outstanding job in maintaining our property and I sincerely appreciate the friendliness they possess and extend to our guests! I am delighted you folks enjoyed your Premium room and the complimentary in room breakfast delivery. Please feel free to contact me personally prior to your next visit with us, as I would be delighted to assist with any needs or requests you may have. Kind regards!

Summary: We loved the Candy Cane Inn. The staff welcomed us warmly and were very helpful throughout our four day stay. Our room was clean, neat and tidy and it had plenty of space for our family of four with two young girls aged 6 & 8. The breakfast was generous and gave us a good start to our busy days at Disneyland. I would recommend to any family.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us on your first visit and we appreciate your many kind comments regarding our property, staff and services. We are delighted you and your family enjoyed the many amenities we have to offer here at the Candy Cane, including our expanded complementary continental breakfast. Please feel free to contact me personally when you are returning to the Anaheim area, as I would be delighted to assist with future reservations. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Alejandra and their Customer Service Makes the Difference
Summary: This was my third time staying at the Candy Cane Inn this year while visiting Disneyland, but the first time going with my family.  My husband is incredibly critical about hotels, but Alejandra and the amazing staff at the Candy Cane had him declaring that he never wanted to stay anywhere else.  To start the grounds and breakfast area and impeccable and the rooms very clean and comfortable.  Every morning we took full advantage of their complementary breakfast (see my previous review of CCI for a full account of the menu) even nipping a few pieces of fruit for a snack in the park.  Every morning we were greeted by a cheerful and extremely helpful Alejandra.  I don't think I ever saw her stop moving or smiling.  We appreciate happy and attentive employees, so we delighted in
Manager Response: Thank you for being a loyal, repeat guest of the Candy Cane Inn and thank you for your kind comments about our property, services and our team. Alejandra and the rest of our staff truly do take pride in their work and providing exceptional service to all of our guests. I am also delighted to hear we were able to find your daughter’s toy and that you thoroughly enjoyed your stay. Please feel free to contact me personally when you and your family are returning to the Candy Cane, as it would be my pleasure to assist with reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: The Candy Cane was sensational. There was the four of us as a family and the room was an adequate size wise as we aren't there to spend time in the room. It was particularly comfortable and super clean. We arrived early and my son had a vomiting virus so they got our room ready as quickly as possible. It's always little courtesies such as this that make a difference. The staff was all friendly to a person but a special mention to our Vietnamese American bus driver. Although it's close to Disbeyland the bus is very welcome after 10 hours walking around Disneyland and it's great to return during the day for swim. Breakfast was simple but again very good. Good to Ok restaurants nearby and an ABC mini mart and 7/11 as well as a pharmacy. Location is great. I would not consider
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting with us and sharing your many kind comments regarding our property, complimentary amenities and exceptional guest service. I am sorry to hear that your son was sick but I am glad we were able to get you folks into your room as quickly as possible. We have a wonderful team, including Mr. Lee, who take pride in their jobs and taking care of our guests and they too appreciate when folks take the time to write positive comments such as yours. We thank you again for staying with us and please don’t hesitate to contact me personally when returning as I would be delighted to assist with future reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: We have always stayed at the Candy Cane Inn every time we have gone to Disneyland. From the time our kids where little and now we brought our grandchild. Overall rooms are nice and we did get a bottom floor next to the EOV parking. We had two rooms right next to each other. After two nights if the people upstairs do a stampede in their room day and night we complained to the front desk. The desks response was we would be happy to move you. We were not the problem and our room or rooms were exactly where we needed to be. The desk did nothing not even ask the people upstairs to try to be more considerate. Little to no sleep in afternoon for child's nap or evening for our sleep. Your shuttle could not accommodate a Electric scooter but your pool does? Anxious to here your response
Manager Response: I would like to sincerely apologize that your stay was not to your expectations and I thank you for your input. I have attempted to reach out to you by phone, however I have not heard back and wanted to respond. We do listen to all guest comments and while we never want to disappoint our guests, we do value these opportunities to continue to train and grow our guest service. I have personally spoken with my Front Office staff and Front Office Manager, and we have discussed in length your comments and overall guest satisfaction. As for your comment regarding our shuttle accommodating an electric scooter, I do apologize for this but I am a little confused as our shuttles have never been able to accommodate an electric scooter. I also wanted to inform you that we will be more than happy to clean your room anytime you would like, simply by calling down to the Front Desk and letting us know what time you desired your room to be cleaned. Thank you again for your business and kind regards!

Summary: We have stayed here twice now and will probably do so again on any future visits.  This place just feels like home.  It is not too big and all the staff are friendly, helpful and happy.  The beds are super comfortable.  The noise from the pool in the later hours at night can be annoying.  The walk is not far to Disneyland/DCA but the bus is great to catch back after a long day at the parks.
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for being a loyal member of the Candy Cane Inn family of repeat guests. We DO appreciate your business and look forward to you having another memorable visit soon. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with reservations and any requests you may have as well. Kind Regards!

Summary: Recently enjoyed our 2nd visit to the Candy Cane Inn. This hotel does not disappoint. From check in to the morning continental breakfast to random interactions with the staff - everyone is very friendly, polite and accommodating. Our room was spacious, clean and quiet. We spent 5-nights and slept very well in the cozy beds with 4-pillows on each. We have already started planning our next visit and would think of no where else to stay since it is conveniently located right next to the park entrance (7-min walk).
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for being a repeat member of the Candy Cane family and for sharing your wonderful comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. Summary: Stayed here with a Family of 4, 2 daughters 10 & 13, My wife & I for 6 nights. The Rooms are just that rooms to sleep, shower & have a rest in. Nothing bad about them at all, They are Extremely clean & well stocked. The beds are comfy, My only personnel dislike were the pillows (small). The staff, can't say enough about them, Ever willing to help in any way they can. It is a 5-10 Min. walk to the entrance of either Disneyland or California Adventure Park, A shuttle is also available if needed. Great to let food digest before the rides begin. 7-11 next door & a new CVS Pharmacy across the street. The included continental breakfast was well received, Various restaurants within walking distance. Free WiFi is available also.

Summary: Candy Cane Inn, really is a delightful establishment. The rooms are spacious, well laid out and super clean. The beds are extremely comfortable.  We had the breakfast in room option and the choices were very generous and always arrived within the time specified. Staff were always really helpful. And of course the Inn is within walking distance of Disneland Resort, or there is a free shuttle bus.  Would highly recommend and definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us and providing fellow TripAdvisor travelers with your review of our property, guest service and amenities. I am delighted you enjoyed our Premium rooms and the complimentary breakfast delivery, and that it was always delivered on time!  Thank you again for staying with us and please contact me when you are returning as it would be my pleasure to assist you with reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: Stayed here for 4 nights whilst doing the disney and universal parks. Only a 10 minute walk to disney, no need to move the car. Staff at the hotel very friendly and knowledgable. Buy your disney tickets from the hotel and save time by going straight into the parks. Room was very clean and quiet. Hotel is very well kept with flowers and shrubs around the parking areas to soften the outlook. Breakfast is adequate with a good range and always plenty on offer.
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us to be of service during your recent visit to Anaheim. Summary: We had the smallest room, I anticipated it being smaller, but all four of us fit.  The room and the grounds are extremely neat and clean, the beds were comfortable, there were tons of staff, always friendly and willing to help...   Their breakfast was wonderful, continental with lots of different choices.    I'm so very glad we didn't pay the extra money to stay at one of the Disney hotels.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us and providing fellow TripAdvisor travelers with your review of our property, guest service and amenities. I am delighted you will stay with us again and please contact me when you are returning as it would be my pleasure to assist you with reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: I can't say enough good things about this property. I'll start by saying that it is not fancy... but it is super clean, convenient, and everyone we interacted with gave great guest service. I traveled with my husband and 2 year old and stayed in a premium room for $169 a night with our AAA discount. The premium room is a bit bigger and has some perks- our favorite being the delicious breakfast basket that is delivered to your door each morning. For convenience, I loved that we were a short walk from Disney (a free shuttle is also available), very close to shopping (7-11 and CVS were also a short walk away), there is a laundry facility on the premises, and in addition to a pool and hot tub there was also a kid's pool that was 1 1/2 feet deep.  Free parking with free wi-fi make

Summary: We choosed this place after reading so many positve rewiews on Tripadvisor + good value (we choose the premium room, just because of the late check-out) + free parking + free shuttle to Disney + free wifi + free breakfast / we got the option to have it in our room but went to the breakfast area anyway, the area was quite crowded but we got a table all mornings without having to wait for it, would have prefered some coldcuts as well but we where all filled up with what they offered :) + excellent staff, at check-in, breakfast, shuttlebus-driver, cleaning lady (would give her 5stars) +pleasant surroundings + several stores nearby  +/- kids loved the soft beds, we adults thought they where a bit too soft  the only - would be that we had to go home
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us on your first visit and we appreciate your many kind comments regarding our property, staff and services. Please feel free to contact me personally when you are returning to the Anaheim area, as I would be delighted to assist with future reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: We stayed again at the beginning of sept for 9 nights.  Every time we stay here it gets better.   The surroundings are beautiful and very south california-esque.  The ground are very clean ,in fact they clean the pool area and furniture every morning after the breakfast.buffet.  This the first time in the premium room, which are larger and come with a welcome basket and robes to use.   We recommend this motel to everyone traveling to Anaheim.  The staff is helpful and friendly, there is a shuttle that takes you to Disneyland and there are various little stores nearby ,such as 7-11  and an ABC convenient store.  We really can't say enough good things about this motel.Give it a try and you won't be disappointed, but be sure to book a while ahead of time because it is a popular

Summary: After reading previous reviews and calling the hotel, we booked and stayed at the Candy Cane Inn on September 23-26.  What a lovely hotel!  It is not super fancy, just clean and practical.  We had called the hotel the week before to make sure they were aware that we would be a very late arrival - no problem.  When we rolled in, they were very cheerful at the front desk, and efficient.  There was still parking available, even at that late hour.  Our room was on the second floor, just about the middle of the complex.  Like I said, clean.  Good Wifi.  Soft beds, but comfortable.  There was a choice of pillows (thick and fluffy and thinner and soft).  Huge safe!  The buffet breakfast was small, but functional.  There was all sorts of pastries, fruit, breads (with toasters, jams,
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us on your first visit and we appreciate your many kind comments regarding our property, staff and services. Summary: I go to Disneyland often, but had not ever stayed here.  Because I had a conference at the convention center, CCI was a good compromise (10 minute walk to either the parks or the convention center).  Arrived at about 6pm--easy check in, super friendly employee.  I was in a ground floor room under the stairs, which I was worried would be noisy--but it was not.  I didn't hear anything (apparently the room next to mine is a linen closet).  The room was clean and had comfy beds and quiet AC.  The continental breakfast is a good value with cold cereal, bagels, fruit, yogurt and cheese.  As a bonus, there is a new CVS going in across the street.  The free wifi, free shuttle and free parking really make this place awesome.  I'd definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for staying with us for the first time and for sharing your wonderful comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. I hope that on your next visit we can bring your review up to a 5 as we do strive to provide a 5 out of 5 service and quality hotel. We do look forward to seeing you soon and please feel free to contact me personally when your family is returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: I was booked here for a three day conference taking place at the nearby convention center.  In my opinion, the Candy Cane Inn was a great hotel.  From the ease of check- in to the bountiful complimentary breakfast; everything was wonderful.  The grounds were well maintained and tranquil.  It has a small workout room... 2 treadmills, a bike, and weightlifting machine.  Yet, with everything being within walking distance, there was no need to utilize the room.  I didn't go in, but the Inn had a nice pool.  I appreciated and enjoyed the very comfy bed, especially after a long day attending my conference.  Considering everything, I would recommend this Inn mostly to conference attendees (due to the proximity of the convention center) and families (considering it's close to Disney).
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us to be of service during your recent visit to Anaheim. Summary: A great motel that is close enough to walk to the front gate of Disneyland/DCA (10 minutes) or take their own courtesy shuttle on the 1/2 hour or so. Truly an oasis when you come off the busy Anaheim streets, and the layout helps keep the property quiet (very little outside or adjoining room noise made it into our upstairs room).  The staff is courteous and helpful, and they allowed us to check in early and put a bag in their safe room/area. Most memorable, when my daughter lost a ring near our room, the staff offered to look for it in the bushes, etc. while we were at the park.  Checking the front desk the next day, we were grateful to see they found it. It's clear the Candy Cane team gets satisfaction in their service and it's not just a job to them. We will definitely be back!
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting with us and sharing your many kind comments regarding our property, complimentary amenities and exceptional guest service. Summary: Although this is an older hotel they have done an amazing job of updating and maintaining it. Perfect location for Disney and they have all the amenities one needs. Clean, quiet and comfortable. Would highly recommend this place for families. If you want to get pampered then maybe some spa hotel would be better but you will pay for it in Anaheim. This is great value for your buck and super friendly staff.
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us to be of service during your recent visit to Anaheim. Summary: Last stop on our tour walked though .. jaw dropping view - free upgrade to a beautiful room - gardens perfect - location perfect - staff perfect - we had a meal overlooking the sea true 5star food expensive by local standards but very cheap by European costs £24 each all in inc. drinks could not fault it
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us for and I am delighted that you enjoyed the Candy Cane Inn. We appreciate your kind comments and it is our pleasure to provide our guests with excellent customer service. Our location to Disneyland and local attractions, such as the beaches are enjoyed by all, and I am grateful you enjoyed them too. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as I would be delighted to assist with future reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: After staying at other places near Disneyland, this time I wanted something walking distance.  I chose Candy Cane Inn because of the Trip Advisor reviews.  I was not at all disappointed!  The Candy Cane Inn is like an extension of Disneyland - very friendly helpful staff, lush landscaping and very clean.  The breakfast selection is great - hard boiled eggs, cheese, greek yogurt, fruit, pasteries, bread, bagels, and cereals.  It's a great start for a full day at the parks.  There's a free shuttle that runs every 30 minutes, but I walked the distance in 10 minutes.  Honestly, it's right next to California Adventures.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us on your first visit and we appreciate your many kind comments regarding our property, staff and services. Summary Heading: My favorite place to stay in Disneyland
Summary: I have stayed at this Motel twice now. And who doesn't want to stay at a place called the Candy Cane Inn. It is conveniently located and beautifully landscaped. A quick walk to the gates but the shuttle is faster, reliable and very welcome after being on your feet all day Disneying. It has a very small feel but is much larger than it appears. The pool and hot tub area are a welcome treat mid or at the end of a busy day. We very much enjoy the included breakfast and being able to enjoy it poolside. I must say I was extremely impressed at noticing the cleaning procedure of the rooms. The entire bed was taken apart and washed. Not something done by every hotel. I will continue to stay here whenever visiting Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for being a loyal, repeat guest of the Candy Cane Inn and thank you for your kind comments about our property, services and our team. They truly do take pride in their work and providing exceptional service to all of our guests. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: We just returned from our first stay at the Candy Cane Inn with our daughter & 3 grandsons. It's a reasonably priced hotel with helpful & friendly employees.  We're booking another "adults only" Disney trip in February and plan on staying at the Candy Cane Inn.   We booked deluxe  2nd floor adjoining rooms toward the back of the complex...very quiet and very clean.  Check in and out was quick & efficient. The breakfast is basic...with enough choices for children & adults to start the day. If you desire a hearty, hot breakfast there are a number of restaurants within walking distance (for any meal). We had breakfast poolside which was great for 3 little boys with an abundance of energy. The shuttle runs like clockwork leaving for Disneyland every 30 minutes.  Even though you are
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us to be of service during your recent visit to Anaheim. We do appreciate your business and I am so glad you were able to enjoy our many complimentary amenities we have to offer at the Candy Cane. I am delighted you are staying with us again and please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with any requests you may have on your “adults only” return trip! Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Excellent hotel - wouldn't stay anywhere else in Anaheim
Summary: Stayed here for the second time for 5 nights in August. It is an excellent 'motel style' hotel. The lovely grounds are immaculate, staff are friendly and the location is brilliant for Disney. A 10 minute walk to the park entrances or a shuttle bus runs from the hotel every 30minutes. We stayed in a room on the second floor - adequate size, very clean, very quiet - we had no issues with noise whatsoever. Good breakfast served daily which we ate poolside. We wouldn't consider staying anywhere else when visiting Anaheim.
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for being a loyal member of the Candy Cane Inn family of repeat guests. We DO appreciate your business and look forward to you having another memorable visit soon. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with reservations. Kind Regards!

Summary: We decided to stay at candy cane inn this time around in Disney land.. We go every year and this hotel made it by far the best trip!! Right when we pulled into the hotel there were humming birds flying all around the gorgeous trees they have all around the building. My children absolutely loved this! And we were so excited every morning to have our breakfast served to is in a basket with everything we picked out on the list! We also got the candy came package where they have a stuffed bear and snacks in the room for my daughter on her birthday and it was amazing how they had everything set up so nicely when we arrived back to our room. It has a shuttle to Disney land but it is so close we walked every day! Absolutely loved it and will be back next year!!!
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for staying with us and for sharing your wonderful comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. I am delighted that your daughter enjoyed her goodies and our entire team appreciates the wonderful feedback you have provided. We can’t wait for you to be back with us again and please don’t hesitate to contact me personally should you need any special requests or anything else I may be able to assist you with. Kind regards!

Summary: Having stayed at a different hotel several times across the street from Disneyland, we decided to try someplace different so we stayed at the Candy Cane Inn and we were not disappointed.  Arriving late at night, we were greeted promptly and with smiles on their faces. The rooms were very comfortable and the air conditioners were great! Cold and quiet! The continental breakfast was great for a quick let's go get them meal and off to the park. Even thought it is walking distance to the park, the shuttle made it better.  The driver always looked for strays so as not to leave anyone behind.  The stay was great and we will go again.

Summary: We stayed here on our Disneyland trip and we found it to be the cleanest, most comfortable place we have ever stayed in. The staff was very friendly and always there to help if we needed anything. The bed was the most comfortable bed I have slept in . The motel is beautiful with trees and flowers all around and a great swimming pool. We would highly recommend this place and will be staying here any time we're in the area. There is also a free shuttle to Disneyland that leaves every 30 minutes which is great and a good continental breakfast.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us for the first time and I am delighted that you enjoyed the Candy Cane Inn. We appreciate your kind comments and it is our pleasure to provide our guests with excellent customer service. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as I would be delighted to assist with future reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: After reading reviews we decided to trust them and try Candy Cane Inn. So glad we chose to stay at CCI for our Disneyland vacation! We have stayed at many other hotels over the years and CCI is going to be where we stay now whenever we Disney.   Very attactive grounds. Excellent customer service, very clean room that smelled great-they even had the air on so it was nice and cool when we came in on the 100 degree weekend. Beds are nice and soft and pillows not too flat-brought our own just in case. Good breakfast, enough choices with healthy options. Nice and quiet room. Could not hear people in rooms next to us, no toilets or showers either.  The only negative: very loud guests outside our room around 12:45 pm one night and loud guests early in the am. (Probably same group)
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us on your first visit and we appreciate your many kind comments regarding our property, staff and services. I am pleased you agree with our Trip Advisor reviews and that you were not disappointed with your stay. We are delighted you and your family enjoyed the many amenities we have to offer here at the Candy Cane, including our expanded complementary continental breakfast. Please feel free to contact me personally when you are returning to the Anaheim area, as I would be delighted to assist with future reservations. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: The best kept secret in the DL
Summary: Our first trip to Disney was 30 years ago , in a tent at the old koa next to the old DLH. Later we happened upon the Candy Cane Inn, and over the years I have found no reason to stay anywhere else. When you park your car you are steps form your room, not a city block and a 22 floor elevator ride away, as with the large HOTELS.  I love the theme and the the atmosphere, and of course the comfort. I left my pillow there once, and it was sent to me free of charge, right away. If you drive to Disney, this is the place to stay.
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for being a repeat member of the Candy Cane family and for sharing your wonderful comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. Our team does an outstanding job in maintaining our property and I sincerely appreciate the friendliness they possess and extend to our guests! Please feel free to contact me personally prior to your next visit with us, as I would be delighted to assist with any needs or requests you may have. Kind regards!

Summary: This is by far the best hotel around Disneyland.  Not only are they within walking distance of Disneyland they offer a real complimentary shuttle and breakfast - AND you don't have to pay those extra fees just to park at the hotel. We have been staying there for years and after my last experience with the staff at the Candy Cane they topped all my expectations. I left my eyeglasses behind when we checked out.  We live about 5 hours away, so we were home by the time I realized they were left behind.  When I called and spoke to the hotel, they put me in touch with the head of housekeeping. After verfiying that they were my glasses, he offered to send them to me. Within the week, I had my glasses back.  Needless to say, I've already booked my next two trips to Disneyland and will
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for being a repeat member of the Candy Cane family and for sharing your many wonderful comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. I am delighted you and your family enjoyed all of the complimentary amenities that we offer here at our hotel. Thank you for your kind comments about our team and I am so happy we were able to locate and send you your glasses! We look forward to seeing you again soon and please feel free to contact me personally when returning, as I would be delighted to assist with reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: We just got back from spending 7 nights at the CCI, and we were not disappointed!                      The positives were:  -Free shuttle bus service every half hour to Disneyland with friendly drivers! -Complimentary continental breakfast by the pool consisting of bagels, toast, cereal, yogurt, pastries, fresh fruit, coffee and orange juice etc.  This really saved us a lot of money. -Clean rooms and very good maid service -Pool and hot tub were very clean and well maintained. -Friendly staff, especially Edd the Hotel Historian who was always at the pool during breakfast time with his Tinkerbell collection, making the children smile.  This property has an almost magical feel to it with its tropical gardens, lovely pool area and friendly staff. You can actually walk to Disneyland
Manager Response: none

Summary: We visited this inn for the convenience to Disney land California . It was in July 2009 with my parents, sister and brother-in-law, and my husband and 3 children. It was a typical American motel type of Inn. Higher end though . The rooms were great, spacious and clean, fresh towels daily. The breakfast was great, plenty of choice for adults and kids.  The location was ideal for Disney and a regular free shuttle bus meant we could be flexible. The pool area was small but fun, with a fab Jacuzzi! Close to shops bars and restaurants, this was also the place I discovered the Cheesecake Factory! The food and desserts were amazing! We all had a great time:) would definatly recommend and return in the future!
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us to be of service during your recent visit to Anaheim. We do appreciate your business and I am so glad you were able to enjoy our many complimentary amenities we have to offer at the Candy Cane. Please feel free to contact me personally when your family is returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with reservations, as well as discussing what our team can do to bring your next review up to a five. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Great value, excellent customer service, will return!
Summary: Candy Cane Inn deserves every single positive review it has received.    I stayed there Labor Day weekend and I was very impressed by the customer service, cleanliness and value of this property.  Yes, it is a motel, not a massive hotel, but I would rather stay here. The rooms are clean, well appointed and had everything I needed.  The staff were friendly, helpful, and went out of their way to make sure I had everything I needed.  Although the walk to Disneyland isn't too far, they have a free shuttle for guests.  Very helpful if you or your little ones are exhausted.  The breakfast was better than your typical continental breakfast.     I will absolutely return with my family.  Thank you Candy Cane Inn!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and I am happy that you enjoyed the Candy Cane Inn and all the complimentary amenities we have to offer. We appreciate your kind comments and it is our pleasure to provide our guests with excellent customer service. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as I would be delighted to assist with future reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: There isn’t much more to add to the great reviews (and recommendations we had from friends) and I echo the very positive comments about the service and staff. We arranged through the front desk shuttle trips to Universal Studios, Newport Beach as well as an excursion to LA and we appreciated the thoughtfulness of the staff with respect to options, routes and booking the shuttles. One thing we experienced as a family of many wifi users is that we found that the system can be slow. While the distance to Disneyland is close, the availability of the Inn’s shuttle made it easy on the family on a few late nights. We will definitely be back!
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us to be of service during your recent visit to Anaheim. I am delighted you will stay with us again and please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Candy Cane continues to be Disneyland's best choice
Summary: We have stayed at the Candy Cane practically every year for the past 25 years.  This is my 4th review.  Firstly...this is not a hotel or an inn.   It is a motel.  And a fabulous motel at that.  It is privately owned and the owner's pride is evident.    What sets CCI apart from every other motel and hotel near Disneyland (and that includes all three Disney properties where we have stayed, too) is the attentiveness to service here.  I have traveled a lot and I can honestly say that very few hotels rival the service found at CCI.  CCI's rooms are always clean and comfortable.  The rooms vary in size depending on what you want to pay.  However, even the smallest of rooms is perfect for us because we only sleep there.  Be careful...there are no elevators to 2nd floor rooms, but I
Manager Response: Thank you for being repeat guests and I am happy that you enjoyed the Candy Cane Inn and another visit with us. We have a wonderful team, who take pride in their jobs and taking care of our guests and they too appreciate when folks take the time to write positive comments such as yours. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would by my pleasure to assist with future reservations. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Fantastic location - conveniently located within a short distance to Disneyland and California Adventure World.
Summary: Awesome location within walking distance to The Disney parks, they even provide a free shuttle that runs regularly to and from the theme parks. The rooms were clean and a continental breakfast was included. Would definitely stay here again. Very friendly staff and everything we needed after very long days.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us and providing fellow TripAdvisor travelers with your review of our property, guest service and amenities. I am delighted you will stay with us again and please contact me when you are returning as it would be my pleasure to assist you with reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: This was our fourth stay at the Candy Cane Inn and it was wonderful to be back after staying someplace else back in May. Returning to the Candy Cane Inn is like coming home!   To be honest, I shouldn't like the Candy Cane Inn, but I do. I am a hotel snob and typically stay in luxury hotels. When I stay in a hotel I want a high rise hotel with phenomenal views, high thread count sheets, name brand  toiletries , room service and an executive lounge. While the CCI offers none of these amenities it still tops my list of hotels. The Candy Cane Inn is something special.  This is a family owned, charming property with top notch staff. Although the property is old, it is immaculate and kept in top condition. The grounds are beautifully manicured and you can tell that the staff takes
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for being a repeat member of the Candy Cane family and for sharing your many wonderful comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. Summary: This was our family's first trip to Disneyland, so a friend recommended Candy Cane Inn. They have friendly staff, clean and comfy rooms, plus a GREAT breakfast. It was perfect for our family of four, we will be back!

Summary Heading: A Great place to stay close to Disneyland
Summary: Stayed over the Labor Day weekend at Candy Cane Inn.  For being one of the busiest weekends of the year at Disneyland they did an outstanding job of handling their guest.  They have transportation to/from Disneyland but it is only a short walk (10 minutes) to the park.  Rooms were clean, employees were friendly, and the free breakfast buffet was above average.  We have stayed here in the past, and we would not hesitate to stay here again.  Pool is on the small size for a hotel/motel, but is more than sufficient to cool off after a busy day at the park.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and I am happy that you enjoyed the Candy Cane Inn and all the complimentary amenities we have to offer. Summary: This was my second visit to the Anaheim area within the last couple of years.   I stayed at a different property (chain hotel) on the previous trip.   However, after reading so many positive reviews of the Candy Cane Inn on Trip Advisor decided to give this property a try.  And I'm so glad I did!  I’m now a big fan of the Candy Cane Inn (plus just love the name!).  There were 2 of us and we stayed here at the end of July for 5 nights in a standard room and had a wonderful time.    As so many people have mentioned, the grounds are lushly landscaped with many flowering plants and thus had a nice relaxing vacation feel.    We’re from the Orlando area, and as many other reviewers have stated the rooms are comparable in size to the Walt Disney World moderate hotels.  Our room had 2
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us on your first visit and we appreciate your many kind comments regarding our property, staff and services. Summary: We have absolutely no complaints. The staff is amazing, the grounds are beautifully manicured  and the rooms very comfortable. The location is perfect, it is a easy walk or there is a hotel shuttle available for guest.  There is also parking available for hotel guest. We stay here 3-4 times a year and have always had a wonderful stay!

Summary: We are due to stay at The Candy Cane Inn next week at the start of a 17 day tour of California, Nevada and New York. The trip has been 18 months in it's planning and we have spent many. many hours researching the places where we want to stay and the Candy Cane Inn looks absolutely perfect for our needs. Great rooms and perfect location  This report is unusual because we haven't arrived yet but we wanted to use this opportunity to say that we have received such excellent service from the Inn even before we arrive and in particular from Rigo in reservations.  He has been brilliant in responding to my requests, very prompt and very professional.It has proved to be an excellent choice and we haven't even arrived yet!  From other reports on trip adviser and from our experience so far
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your positive comments with fellow Tripadvisor travelers. Rigo is a newer part of our team and I sincerely appreciate his friendliness and professionalism he possess and I thank you for recognizing this. We are glad you were able to make reservations with us and we look forward to seeing you next week. Kind regards!

Summary: This property was clean and well maintained.  It is at the end of Disney, just outside of California Disney, so it you want to walk, you will be walking from the main gate back the whole length of the park to get to the hotel.   The shuttle was fine and runs every 30 minutes to/from the park and the hotel.  The room was fine. We had the premium room, which was just the right size for us.  The rooms are not luxury, but you have what you need.  The premium rooms come with breakfast delivery.  This is nice, but all the food is cold and they only come at certain times (roughly once per hour).   The first day the delivery was on the late side and we barely had enough time to eat and then make it to the shuttle.   We bought our disney tickets from the hotel when we arrived and this
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us to be of service during your recent visit to Anaheim. We do appreciate your business and I am so glad you were able to enjoy our many complimentary amenities we have to offer at the Candy Cane. I do apologize for the incidents you noted, as guest service is of the upmost importance to us. I have personally spoken with my Breakfast Staff to see how we can improve breakfast delivery and efficiency. I do thank you again for you comments and business. Kind regards!

Summary: I last stayed here in 2008, and I still found the rooms clean and the staff super helpful. I like that they have a shuttle to Disney (saved my poor aching feet), a very nice breakfast and it's a very short walk to a convenience store and a 7-11 on the corner. Across the street is a little shopping center with a pizza place, a mexican fast food type place, a Subway, a burger type place, a liquor store and a souvenir place. I would definitely stay here again - in fact each time I come to Anaheim I will stay here. The only drawback is no business center - I had to do about 10 minutes of work on an excel spreadsheet to email to my office and so I ended up walking to the Hilton in the convention center to use the fedex office.
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for being a loyal member of the Candy Cane Inn family of repeat guests. We DO appreciate your business and look forward to you having another memorable visit. Summary Heading: First stay and we will be returning next year.
Summary: The friendliness and expertise of all staff made our stay.  We travelled with 2 teenage grandchildren.  We were provided early check-in and an extra day of parking on our departure. Enjoyed the well kept grounds, cleanliness of premises, complimentary breakfast, in-room wifi, walking distance or free shuttle to Disneyland.  Will be returning with more grandchildren  next year and would not consider staying anywhere else!!

Summary: Very nice little hotel. Rooms are very clean. The facility and grounds are all very well maintained,  and pretty close to Disneyland. They do have a shuttle too if you'd rather not walk. Stayed twice and going back next month.
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for being a repeat member of the Candy Cane family and for sharing your wonderful comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. We do look forward to seeing you soon and please feel free to contact me personally when your family is returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with reservations. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: First time but not the last!
Summary: This was our first time staying at the Candy Cane Inn.  James at the front desk was great, we were early and he had our room ready.  The room was good.  Two comfy queen beds, the fluffiness towels I have ever had in a hotel and the room was clean.  The fridge in our room wasn't working so we called and it was replaced quickly. We got the second floor so we could see the fireworks.  Breakfast was an assortment or pastries, breads, cereals and yogurts, etc.  We never took the shuttle as we walked to Disneyland quicker than the shuttle could.  Checkout was easy and quick.  Will stay again!

Summary Heading: Great place to stay... We'll be back!
Summary: Loved this place since I was a kid. Now I bring my kids here for them to enjoy. Location is superb and such a cute name... What kid doesn't want to stay at the Candy Cane Inn? Will be returning in September with the family for another amazing trip to the happiest place on earth.
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for being a repeat member of the Candy Cane family and for sharing your wonderful comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: good value for money and convenience to Disney
Summary: Stayed at the Candy Cane recently with my family.  We chose the hotel entirely based on views of TripAdvisor.  We were not diappointed.  It was more or less was expected.  Room was clean but could do with a bit of modernisation.  Air conditioning we very loud.  Staff were nice, breakfast, which is included in the price, was perfectly fine to start the day.  We took the bus to and from gates of the park but to be honest walking wouldn't have been a problem as it is so close we were just saving our legs for the long day ahead.  Bus driver was very friendly.  Just beside the hotel is a 7 Eleven which is handy and another market.  Across there is a Subway, Pizza store, burger sore and Chinese.  The swimming pool in the Candy Cane is very small but this wasn't a problem for us as we
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us on your first visit and we appreciate your kind comments regarding our property, staff and services. Summary Heading: Location is perfect, service is good
Summary: Came back after 10 years and the place is still great for Disneyland. Buses pick up at the quarter to \ past and take you there on the hour\half. You shouldn't need it but after a day at disney it's helpful! 5 of us stayed in a double room with roll out bed. Good value and they delivered our breakfast in the mornings and gave us a late checkout. Wouldn't stay anywhere else if we ever come back to Disneyland (the best disney park by miles)
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for being a loyal member of the Candy Cane Inn family of repeat guests. We DO appreciate your business and look forward to you having another memorable visit. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with reservations. Kind Regards!

Summary: We stayed for 4 nights recently at the Candy Cane Inn with our two children. The service from the time we stepped in the door until we left was fantastic. Any requests were met with a smile.  The property is kept clean and tidy inside and out. Beds are clean and comfortable for a great nights sleep which was vital with jet lag and 14 hour days at Disneyland.  A shuttle bus is provided complimentary which again you are very greatfull for at midnight leaving Disneyland. However the hotel is close to Disneyland for walking as well. Even though it backs onto Disneyland you only have minimal noise.  Continental breakfast is complimentary as well with fresh bakery items and fruit as well as cereals.  If we come back to Anaheim we will certainly stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us to be of service during your recent visit to Anaheim. We do appreciate your business and I am so glad you were able to enjoy our many complimentary amenities we have to offer at the Candy Cane. I am delighted you will stay with us again and please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: We recently visited the Candy Cane again.  It is our second time this year.  They give you a $10 per night discount if you return within the year.  As always the rooms are incredibly clean, the beds comfortable, and the grounds immaculate.  The staff is always friendly and accommodating.  It is wonderful to have a breakfast before leaving for the park.  We usually take the short walk to the park in the morning and take the free shuttle back at the end of a long day.  Unlike many other local properties they do not charge a parking fee or any resort fees. I really, really hate resort fees!  When possible I will always stay and recommend the Candy Cane when staying in the area.  There is no reason to stay elsewhere!

Summary: This was our 3rd stay since 2009 and the rooms are still kept clean and we noticed a few upgrades. The staff is amazing, James at the front desk was so accommodating, we arrived 4hrs prior to check in time which was due to our flight. James apologized a few times that our rooms weren't ready, yet it was not their fault, it was ours. We had asked for rooms on the second floor close to each other. Our rooms were side by side, 208/209, second floor across from the pool, perfect! The house keeping staff are very nice, Patricia did a great job keeping our room tidy. I wish I had noticed the name of a young man who kept the continental breakfast fully stocked, he was friendly and cheerful. I have recommended the Candy Cane Inn to two other families and both were very happy and would
Manager Response: Thank you for being repeat guests and I am happy that you enjoyed the Candy Cane Inn and your second visit with us. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would by my pleasure to assist with future reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: August 2014, 8 night stay at this conveniently located hotel to Disneyland.  This was our 3rd stay since 2010, and our loyalty is due to the convenience of the location, the complementary breakfast, and the adjoining rooms for the family vacation.  The only thing that we noticed this time was that the rugs in the room (239) were dirty and we like to take our shoes off while in the room - our white socks were soiled in no time!!!  I suppose this is a problem with many hotel rooms through-out the area but we were a bit disappointed...

Thank you again for you business and please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with room reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: This is my second time staying at the Candy Cane Inn.  Continental breakfast is exceptional.  Perfect location for walking to Disneyland but they also offer a shuttle if you care to do so.    The same staff were still working here since 2009 - that tells you something.  Rooms were clean, great housekeeping.

Summary Heading: Can't beat the location for Disney
Summary: We stayed 2 nights at the Candy Cane Inn.  The staff was wonderful.  They were helpful and polite and even had a room ready for us to check in when we arrived from San Diego just before 10 am.  The walk to Disney is easy and quick.  We did take the shuttle to the parks twice because it was leaving when we were ready to go and we wanted to save our feet.  Shuttle driver was friendly and polite. The room was clean and the beds were comfortable.  The breakfast was great - the usual bagels, muffins and cereal, etc.  But, they also had donuts (from a shop, not prepackaged), yogurt, some fruit, hard boiled eggs and cubed cheese.  We did utilize the pool area and it was very relaxing to take a break from Disney midday.  The only complaint that I have is the noise from above.  It

Summary Heading: So glad to stay with 'family' instead of just being another 'confirmation number.
Summary: We love DISNEYLAND and enjoy getting away from it all to the 'Happiest Place on Earth'. The Candy Cane Inn is the only place we ever stay. We have been staying as 'guests' since 2001 and truly feel now like we are part of the Candy Cane Inn family. Special thanks go to James at the front desk for his warm welcome and Danilo for finding just the right pillow. We especially appreciate the new bakery fresh pastries and proteins added to the breakfast. Joshua and Alejandra are new to the morning staff and were very friendly and helpful. The beautiful and clean property feels inviting and rivals the Disney standard. Thanks again for a delightful stay. See you again soon. There is no other hotel near Disneyland for us.

Summary Heading: Convenience is what it's all about
Summary: Cheap, convenient and close to the action of Disneyland.  Walk out of Disneyland and turn right.  its the first hotel on your right.  You can't beat the convenience or the price.  Nothing fancy, but if you are like us your Disneyland trips rarely involve the hotel room.  Nice little continental breakfast and the rooms are clean and decent.  Parking sucks a bit when its very busy.  Shuttle is easy and quick when you tire of the park.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and we certainly appreciate your kind comments regarding our property and amenities. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with reservations. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: This is the place to stay!
Summary: Amazing service and convenient to Disneyland. Free shuttle bus and the continental breakfast is amazing! We are going back! AAA discount too! I can not say enough from the time we arrived to the time we left friendly service and great transportation to and from hotel via super shuttle!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and I am happy that you enjoyed the Candy Cane Inn.
