Summary Heading: Clean and family friendly.  A great spot and easy walk to Disneyland.
Summary: A friend recommended Candy Cane Inn and I'm so happy we stayed here.  Such an easy walk to Disney.  Even though the motel offers a shuttle, we didn't use it.  Nice little pool and the hot tub was perfect after a day at the parks.  Very limited breakfast selection...mostly muffins, doughnuts and bread/bagels, but it was enough to get you started for the day.  It was also lovely to enjoy breakfast out on the pool deck.  Be aware if you have a room in the rear of the motel, it is quite a deep property so a little more walking.  This is a true motel with only 2 floors and no elevator.  The room itself was a little cramped (2 adults and 2 teens), but we weren't in there enough for it to be an issue.  Nice laundry facility if you need it, which we did. You can see most of the
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your many kind comments regarding our property and guest service. We are glad you enjoyed the many complimentary amenities we have to offer including our breakfast, pool and onsite guest laundry. Please feel free to contact me personally should you be returning, as it would be my pleasure to assist with reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: We booked the Premium 2 Queen Beds room, and found it to be quite small and dated. I've stayed at cheaper 2 star motels, like Motel 6, with better accommodations. For $189 per night, you're paying for the location, not the amenities. Since we only needed a place to sleep, it met our needs. The kids, ages 13 and 11, could barely fit on one bed together.  Breakfast consisted of little more than doughnuts, bagels, a banana or apple, cereal, and juice. And the parking lot was vastly overcrowded with parking very difficult to find and many cars illegally parked in fire lanes. Service was good at the front desk and we had no issues.  As we walked to and from the Disneyland Resort, we noticed a few hotels which were directly across the street from the theme parks and closer than our
Manager Response: First and foremost I would like to sincerely apologize that your stay was not to your expectations and I thank you for your input. We do listen to the comments of our guests and appreciate your valuable feedback. In regards to our price value and the many resounding comments posted by past guests of the Candy Cane Inn I would like to share my findings. Other hotels in the Anaheim Area have daily charges for parking, daily charges for Wi-Fi, no Complimentary Expanded Continental Breakfast and the Anaheim Resort Transit shuttle, which charges per guest. Again, we appreciate your business and while I do not like to use this platform to challenge guests I do feel the need to clarify that our many complimentary items do add up. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Will be staying here from now on!
Summary: My family visits Disneyland every year. We usually stay at the Ramada off of Katella, but after a really terrible experience with the staff last summer, we will never stay there again.  I had heard from a few friends that the Candy Cane Inn was a great place to stay, so we decided to give it a try this year.  First of all, customer service is excellent here. Everybody is so nice. I was blown away. From the receptionist, the maintenance personnel, to the shuttle driver. Just Outstanding.  The rooms are very clean. I was very impressed. We have two small children with us and we did not worry about the cleanliness of the room. The beds were comfortable and the rooms were quiet. My husband and I kept remarking that we had not heard anything going on outside of our room hardly at all
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting with us for the first time and sharing your many kind comments regarding our property, complimentary amenities and exceptional guest service. We have a wonderful team, who take pride in their jobs and taking care of our guests and they too appreciate when folks take the time to write positive comments such as yours. We thank you again for staying with us and please don’t hesitate to contact me personally when returning as I would be delighted to assist with future reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: This was my first experience staying in the Candy Cane Inn, or in a hotel near Disneyland in general and I throughly enjoyed it. The rooms were nice, although the floor was a light squeaky at night. The night staff weren't quite as helpful as the ones during the day but overall they were very knowledgable of the area. The location was great. Far enough to avoid the noise of Disneyland but close enough to walk to the park (there is a shuttle available as well but we chose to walk. Only took about 7 or 8 minutes). The complimentary breakfast had a wide variety and never seemed to run out. They were especially nice upon check out, holding our bags at the hotel while we spent one last day at the parks. I would definitely go back to the Candy Cane Inn. It was a great experience.
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for staying with us and sharing your wonderful comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. Our team does an outstanding job in maintaining our property and I sincerely appreciate the friendliness they possess and extend to our guests! Please feel free to contact me personally should you be returning as I would be delighted to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Traveled across the country and well worth it!
Summary: We chose this inn based on previous posts and we were not let down by the experience!  Customer service was exceptional from booking the reservation through checking out.  James was extremely helpful by providing us driving directions, several times, to the Inn.  The Inn is kept spotless from the lush foliage to the well stocked (towels, cups, soaps, etc.) room.    Of all the places that we have stayed, Candy Cane has the best pool towels!  They are thick and big enough to wrap around a man.  The round 1 1/2 ft kiddie pool is fenced in separate from the hot tub and pool (31/2 ft -5ft). Laundry facility was clean and well lit.  It is $1.25 in quarters each for the washing machine and dryer.  You can purchase detergent too.   We did not use the exercise room.  We did enough
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us on your first visit and we appreciate your kind comments regarding our property, staff and services. I am pleased you agree with our Trip Advisor reviews and that you were not disappointed with your stay. We are delighted you and your family enjoyed the many amenities we have to offer here at the Candy Cane, including our expanded complementary continental breakfast. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning, as I would be delighted to assist with future reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: Our family stayed here in July and it was wonderful.  The inn was very clean and everyone was so friendly.  We enjoyed eating breakfast poolside and then walking to the parks.  I would recommend this place to everyone going to Disneyland.  We traveled with our four children ages 21 through 13.  We had two rooms next door to each other on the first floor.  I was worried about outside noise, but never heard anything.  Thank you for a memorable visit!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and I am happy that you enjoyed the Candy Cane Inn. We appreciate your kind comments and it is our pleasure to provide our guests with excellent customer service. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as I would be delighted to assist with future reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: We had a great stay at the Candy Cane Inn. Even though we had a room right along the street, we couldn't hear any of the street noise. The room was very clean. It was great to have breakfast available before we left to hit the parks. And being able to grab a handful of candy canes for snacking was great!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and we certainly appreciate your kind comments regarding our property and amenities. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with reservations. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: This was our first stay but it won't be our last!
Summary: This was our first experience staying at the Candy Cane Inn and I truly couldn't be happier. We were fortunate enough to get an early check-in after a long and exhausting travel day.  The staff were very courteous and bent over backwards to assist us with everything from booking dinner reservations, directions to the closest emergency room (long story), and overall just so kind and helpful!  The shuttle driver could be a little gruff about anyone bringing food and drink on the shuttle (which can be difficult with souvenirs and treats coming back from Disneyland), but he clearly cares a great deal about his job and took pride in keeping the shuttle neat and clean. WARNING: This is not a 5-star resort, so if you are looking for duvet covers and high thread count sheets, you will
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting with us for the first time and sharing your many kind comments regarding our property, complimentary amenities and exceptional guest service. We have a wonderful team, who take pride in their jobs and taking care of our guests and they too appreciate when folks take the time to write positive comments such as yours. We thank you again for staying with us and please don’t hesitate to contact me personally when returning as I would be delighted to assist with reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: I stayed here with relatives who visit Disneyland several times a year and always try to stay here. When you check out, they give you a $10 off coupon for a return visit. The inn is very well maintained. It is a typical motel style where you park in front of your room. They have their own shuttle to Disneyland, which is much better than some of the other motels that have a common shuttle that stops at ALL of the hotels they serve. This shuttle departs every 30 minutes and it is about an 8 minute trip. I needed to go back to the motel during the day to change my shoes and it took about 22 minutes to leave and return to Disneyland. We ended one of our days at the Disneyland Hotel's Trader Sam's Tiki Lounge, and rather than walk back through the park to get to the shuttle area we
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and I am delighted that you enjoyed the Candy Cane Inn and all the complimentary amenities we have to offer. We appreciate your kind comments and it is our pleasure to provide our guests with excellent customer service. We again apologize for the incident you mentioned, but I am glad you were satisfied with the prompt response and resolution of the issue by my management team. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as I would be delighted to assist with future reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: Have stayed here once before for a night and it was a-ok. Started out second 3night stay in a "premium" room midweek. Hardly any parking, were a few conventions here plus Disney summer madness.  Checked in after about a 15 minute wait. Family ahead of me had a lot of questions and were having a lively conversation with the little girl behind the desk. She was very sweet to them, asking where they were from and chatting in Spanish.... While I waited. Which is fine but I didn't see the same courtesy extended to me. After getting my keys and leaving I realized she hadn't even told me where the heck our room was. Finally made it to the room and noticed right way that they hadn't done their best in cleaning. Past roomies bottled waters and sticky coffee stains were still here.
Manager Response: First and foremost I would like to sincerely apologize for the items you noted. I do thank you for our phone conversation and as I stated before we do listen to all comments and while we never want to disappoint our guests, we do value these opportunities to continue to train and grow our guest service. I have personally spoken to the parties involved as well as their corresponding managers to ensure we are continuing to maintain a clean and safe environment for all of our guests. Thank you again for your business and kind regards!

Summary Heading: Our go to hotel in Aneheim
Summary: We found this hotel a few years ago and have started here every visit since then. The property is well kept with a lot of plants to fine it an oasis feel in the area around Disneyland where it is wall to wall hotels.   The staff is very friendly and always helpful. They always try to accommodate our requests for extra parking or early or late check in/out. The breakfast staff is always cheerful and willing to help clear empty plates when it is not necessary.   Breakfast is nice with fruit, pastries/breads/bagels/cereals, hard boiled eggs and cheese, and beverages. The cereal dispenser and toasters could be better but that is minor.   The rooms are comfortable and clean. A small fridge were in each if our rooms.  The breakfast room microwave us available for use but there isn't
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for being a repeat member of the Candy Cane family and for sharing your wonderful comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. Our team does an outstanding job in maintaining our property and I sincerely appreciate the friendliness they possess and extend to our guests! We are also glad you enjoyed the many complimentary amenities our Inn has to offer, including parking and our expanded continental breakfast. Please feel free to contact me personally prior to your next visit with us, as I would be delighted to assist with any needs or requests you may have. Kind regards!

Summary: This hotel was perfect for our brief trip to Disneyland/California Adventure. Excellent value! Our family of 2 adults and 2 kids (ages 13, 9) stayed 3 nights in a standard room.  Check-in was fast and friendly.  The rooms were very clean and beds comfortable. The room was smaller than expected but no big deal.  Free Wi-Fi- worked great, no issues. Free breakfast was very good; lots to choose from.  The pool and hot tub were well maintained; it did get a bit crowded once but still great for the kids.  We also took advantage of the free shuttle to/from Disney which was very convenient leaving every 30 minutes. You can also walk easily in less than 10 minutes. FREE parking is unheard of in this area so definitely an excellent perk at Candy Cane. Try the refreshing cucumber/lemon
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your many kind comments regarding our property and guest service. We are glad you enjoyed the many complimentary amenities we have to offer including our breakfast, pool, complimentary cucumber/lemon ice water and our free parking. Please feel free to contact me personally should you be returning to the Anaheim area as it would be my pleasure to assist with reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: We stayed here in August of last year. We have stayed at a few different good neighbor hotels and this is by far my favorite !  Very clean Very friendly staff Just an amazing experience !!  We will be returning for our stay at the end of September  and this is the first time we have stayed at the same hotel twice !! that says a lot :p !!   Cant wait to celebrate my little guys 2nd Birthday at this hotel and of course at Disney Land !!!   See you soon Candy Cane Inn!!
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for being a repeat member of the Candy Cane family and for sharing your wonderful comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. I am delighted that you are choosing us again to celebrate your sons 2nd birthday. We look forward to seeing you again soon and please feel free to contact me personally, as I would be delighted to assist with any requests you may have, in order to make your trip as enjoyable as possible. Kind regards!

Summary: Last year we took three rooms at the Grand Californian (not in any way a grand hotel). By the time we had paid for room and board, park passes, magic hour upgrades, photo pass, a ton of character dining I was told we had spent circa $10k in 3 days. My 4 yr old's joy at all things Mickey was worth every penny, but the cost was crazy.  We didn't return to the Californian this year because of the cost. I am not sure that this was a good decision, however if you want to save nearly $500 per night per room, then The Candy Cane Inn is a fairly painless way to do it.  The Candy Cane is a classic American motel located immediately behind the Cars ride and a 15 minute family-speed walk from the park entrance. The motel has an excellent shuttle bus every 30 minutes.  They are very
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us and providing fellow TripAdvisor travelers with your review of our property, guest service and amenities. We do aspire to provide exceptional guest service and product while being mindful of family travelers on a budget. Kind regards!

Summary: I've stayed in good neighbor hotels 3 times and, like they say, the third time's the charm!   This is by far my favorite in Anaheim.  My daughters, sister, and I shared a room and it was comfortable and clean.  The breakfast was fantastic!   We were able to sit by the pool every morning and enjoy some delicious food that would have cost a fortune had we eaten every morning in Disneyland!!  We never thought we'd need the bus since it's a short walk to the parks, but we ended up taking it several times!   The grounds were lovely and the staff was so accommodating and friendly.   We even received a nice surprise for my daughter who recently got married - a rose and some yummy cookies.   Keep up the good work, Candy Cane Inn!  I'm going to tell all my Chicago friends about you!
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for staying with us and for sharing your wonderful comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. I am delighted that your daughter enjoyed her goodies and our entire team appreciates the wonderful feedback you have provided. We can’t wait for you to be back with us again and please don’t hesitate to contact me personally should you need any special requests or anything else I may be able to assist you with. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Great vacation from start to finish!!!
Summary: This is our second trip to the Anaheim area, and last time we spent it at Paradise Pier.  We needed something that was a bit more economical so we decided to give the CCI a try.  When we visit Disney World, we always stay at a Disney hotel because it's part of the experience for us.  And it was with some trepidation that we chose a non-Disney hotel for this trip.  I cannot say enough positive things about this place!  The hotel was spotless, the grounds charming, and the service friendly and helpful.  We were fortunate enough to have a housekeeper, Mary, who always had our room cleaned early and it was spotless.  Always had a smile on her face every time we said good morning.  In fact, everyone was so pleasant and helpful.  Didn't matter who it was, they said good morning and
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting with us for the first time and sharing your many kind comments regarding our property, complimentary amenities and exceptional guest service. We have a wonderful team, including our housekeeping staff, who take pride in their jobs and taking care of our guests and they too appreciate when folks take the time to write positive comments such as yours. We thank you again for staying with us and please don’t hesitate to contact me personally when returning as I would be delighted to assist with reservations. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: This is where a grown-up can still be a "Kid"
Summary: I took my family for a few to celebrate my Birthday.  The room was great and there were four adults.  It offered a nice size pool and jacuzie.  With each morning a continental breakfast with OJ, apple juice and coffee, fresh fruit, oatmeal, bagels, muffins, rolls, and other pastrys, also yogurt, cheese,hardboiled eggs, and dry cereal and milk.  We had a great breakfast.  The big green shuttle bus ran every half hour.  There is even a laundry on site for your convenience just outside the room.  Everyone had a wonderful time even this young senior, never too old to be a "Kid"
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and I am happy that you enjoyed the Candy Cane Inn and all the complimentary amenities we have to offer. We appreciate your kind comments and it is our pleasure to provide our guests with excellent customer service. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as I would be delighted to assist with future reservations. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: The most you can get for the price you pay for
Summary: Also follow all the reviews and stay a week at the end of July in this hotel during our Southern California visit.   We used to stay at Fairfield Inn by Marriott across the street from Disney.   After comparing our experience, I think the reason for this property to get such a high score is because you get the most for the price you pay for - frequent shuttle bus (which is rare for properties within 15 miniutes walking distance), continental breakfast with enough choices, clean room (you are allowed to add one rollaway bed in the double room which most chain hotels don't allow), enough in room amenties (coffee makers with coffees, shampoo, soaps, etc), one free parking space, two convenient store just right next to the property, some value diners across the street (Anaheim Plaza
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us to be of service during your recent visit to Anaheim. We do appreciate your business and I am so glad you were able to enjoy our many complimentary amenities we have to offer at the Candy Cane. I am delighted you will stay with us again and please feel free to contact me personally when you are returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: How do you improve on perfect?
Summary: Candy Cane Inn...literally the 7th or more time we have stayed at this property.  WE LOVE IT!  This time, we stayed in one of the premium rooms at the back of the property that has a little more room. In addition, when you stay in those rooms, you can have breakfast delivered to your room!  Pretty cool. Every night, my mom would put out the breakfast order, and every morning, at the requested time, the food was delivered in a large basket.  Very nice, especially since my mom uses a walker and getting up to breakfast is a chore.  The rooms as always comfortable and the beds sleep well.  The bathroom is not large, but there is plenty of room.  There was a large counter space outside the bathroom with a small fridge and microwave.  There was a small table with two chairs in the
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for being a repeat member of the Candy Cane family and for sharing your many wonderful comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. I am delighted you and your family enjoyed all of the complimentary amenities that we offer with our Premium rooms, including the breakfast delivery. Thank you for your kind comments about our team as they do an outstanding job in maintaining our property and I sincerely appreciate the friendliness they possess and extend to our guests!  We look forward to seeing you again soon and please feel free to contact me personally when returning, as I would be delighted to assist with reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: We've stayed with my wife and three kids, great place, very comfortable...sooooo close to Disney!!! Great location!!! The shuttle back & forward to Disney is a great solution to avoid traffic and parking! Highly recommended!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and we certainly appreciate your kind comments regarding our property and amenities. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: This was my second stay at the Candy Cane Inn and I'm an even bigger fan than before.  We stayed in a standard room the first time, fine for 2 adults and 1 child, but with 3 adults and 1 child on this trip, opted for the deluxe room.  We spent 4 nights and the extra space was just right.  We were celebrating my granddaughter's 5th birthday and first trip to Disneyland.  She was surprised with a nice card and fresh baked cookies waiting in our room!  The property is well maintained, the room clean, the beds comfy and the continental breakfast got us off to a fine start (enjoyed the addition of hard boiled eggs and cheese).  The shuttle is great but, with the close proximity to Disneyland, we usually walked.  The staff was always friendly and helpful.  They checked my son and
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for being a repeat member of the Candy Cane family and for sharing your wonderful comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. I am delighted that your granddaughter enjoyed her birthday goodies and our entire team appreciates the wonderful feedback you have provided. We can’t wait for you to be back with us again and please don’t hesitate to contact me personally should you need any special requests or anything else I may be able to assist you with. Kind regards!

Summary: I just booked a stay at the Candy Cane Inn. After booking I was reading reviews and saw that they give a discount for Disney pass holders. I thought why not try to call and see if they will adjust my rate. The person answering the phone was very polite and said no problem I will make that change right now...he did so quickly and I had a new confirmation email right away. I have stayed at many Anaheim resorts and am very excited to try this one.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and I am truly happy that my team was able to assist you in an efficient and friendly manner. Please feel free to let me know if you need anything prior to your visit with us as it would be my pleasure to assist. Kind regards!

Summary: We've stayed at the Candy Cane now several times and each time they have provided a quiet, comfortable room at a reasonable price with just enough fun to remind you that you are visiting Disney.  The provided continental breakfast is fine, the grounds are well maintained and very attractive, check-in and check-out is quick and friendly, the rooms are well maintained, kept clean and have everything we have needed (small frig, plenty of storage space, coffee maker). For those that are familiar with WDW the Candy Cane is the functional equivalent of a Disney Moderate hotel - at a better price.
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for being a repeat member of the Candy Cane family and for sharing your wonderful comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. We are delighted you and your family continue to choose us as your hotel when visiting the Disney theme parks. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with reservations. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: A wonderful place to stay  close to Disney
Summary: I found this hotel thru reading reviews on trip advisor.   We stayed in a premium room for 4 nights and  loved our stay here.  The staff was friendly and very helpful.   We loved getting the breakfast basket delivered to our room every morning ( only with premium rooms ). We also peaked into the breakfast room and it was nicely setup for the complimentary breakfast for guests that don't have premium rooms..  The location is perfect, only a 10 min walk to Disneyland or you can take the shuttle that comes every 1/2 hour.  There is the ABC market and 7/11 store  close by to get anything you need like snacks / drinks.    The room was clean and as I said I stayed in the premium room so my room was larger than the standard rooms and worth it us for the few extra bucks per night.  I
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us on your first visit and we appreciate your kind comments regarding our property, staff and services. I am pleased you agree with our Trip Advisor reviews and that you were not disappointed with your stay. We are glad you and your family enjoyed the many amenities our Premium rooms have to offer, including the complimentary breakfast delivery. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning, as I would be delighted to assist with reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: My grandson and I will be returning to the Candy Cane Inn in two weeks, & are very excited to again be staying in this great hotel. As I wrote in my review last summer after our first stay here, we have found the best place to stay at Disneyland and have no plans to ever stay anywhere else. It was just perfect for us - the complimentary breakfast, the shuttle,  the great rooms, the cleanliness & beauty of the grounds & especially the friendliness of the staff.  See you in 2 weeks!
Manager Response: Thank you for being a loyal and repeat guest of our Inn, as we DO appreciate your business and feedback. We can’t wait for you to be back with us again and please don’t hesitate to contact me personally should you need any special requests or anything else I may be able to assist you with. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: They took excellent care of us!
Summary: Well, this was not the Disney trip that I had planned. We spent our first night in Anaheim at the Paradise Pier Hotel. At check out time, I was ill. My husband called the Candy Cane Inn to see if our room was ready. It wasn't ready that early, but 30 minutes later they had our room ready. It was just as clean and nice as always.   My family spent the afternoon shopping, swimming in the pool, took a quick dip in the hot tub, and picked up a bite to eat. In the evening, my youngest became ill as well. My husband spoke with the front desk and our 5 night reservation was changed to a 1 night reservation. There were no hassles, just well wishes.   The beds were comfortable. Extra towels were left. Breakfast was great. They added hard boiled eggs and cheese cubes since our last visit.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and I sincerely hope that you and the little one are feeling better! We appreciate our guests and understand that things come up and you have to check out early. Yes, we have added these items and continue to enhance our Expanded Continental Breakfast. Please feel free to let me know if you need anything on your return visit as it would be my pleasure to assist. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Couldn't get out of here fast enough.
Summary: I can't understand all the rave reviews. Maybe because it's Anaheim we're talking about here, and there's just nothing better in the area. In any case, there wasn't much I can say I liked about this place. The room walls are paper thin. We could hear every cough, sneeze, and word of our next door neighbors as if they were right in the room with us. The a/c unit was extraordinarily loud to the point we had to shut it off because it was too loud to sleep to. Staff was outside our room smoking -- enough said there. Processed doughnuts and muffins and other fattening pastries are what you are offered for breakfast. Nothing fresh, and very minimal fruit or other healthy options. It's a motel right on a very busy street. View from every room is a parking lot full of cars. We needed a
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and providing your feedback. I am sincerely sorry that you were unhappy with our “motel” style property, products and services provided. I also read your un-flattering review on Disney’s California Adventure and both seem to stress your displeasure with Anaheim in general. I try and never utilize this platform to confront guest’s as we appreciate and strive to make them feel welcome and at home. However, when you stated that you were “not at all impressed with any staff” you came across. I take exception to this comment as we have a wonderful and caring group of fine individuals and I draw the line in this character assassination.

Summary: We chose Candy Cane Inn for second time (stayed last summer). Everything was perfect for our 4 day stay. Check in friendly and fast, room clean and perfect size for the limited time we spent there, always a spot to sit/lounge by the pool. Cleaning, front desk, shuttle, and breakfast staff always super friendly and helpful. The only request we made (regular room cleaning by 1pm for our siesta) was happily delivered without exception. Can't say enough good things about this hotel. The best part is returning and feeling a bit like you've come home. They also give a discount for returning guests... really can't think of anything to make it better!
Manager Response: Thank you for being a loyal and repeat guest of our Inn, we DO appreciate your business and feedback. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Comfortable Hotel, Smartly Priced & Perfectly Located
Summary: We (my wife and two kids) stayed at the Candy Cane Inn in mid-July.  It is located right next to Disney's California Adventure Park, so our kids were excited from the get go.  We arrived two hours earlier than our check-in time... and without batting an eye, the staff worked to identify a room to get us into right away.  The room with two queen beds that we were in was complete with a large flatscreen, refrigerator, iron and board, safe, and plenty of dresser and closet storage.  It featured a vanity and sink with large mirror and separate toilet and bathtub area.  The room was very clean and well-appointed.  Colorful flowers and greenery all over the hotel really added to it's charm.  There were two pools, an adult and children's pool and a hot tub.  A very nice free
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us and providing fellow TripAdvisor travelers with your review of our property, guest service and amenities. We do aspire to provide exceptional guest service and product while being mindful of family travelers on a budget. Kind regards!

Summary: We stayed here for a trip to Disneyland and the staff was delightful! The front desk staff was knowledgeable and so helpful.! Housekeeping was efficient and polite.  Breakfast featured a lot of great choices by the pool and the shuttle to the Disney Parks was fantastic.  We even watched the fireworks from our room. I can't say enough about how Candy Cane made our trip so delightful!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your many kind comments regarding our property and guest service. We are glad you enjoyed the many complimentary amenities we have to offer including our breakfast, pool and our free exclusive shuttle to the parks. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: Found this place through Trip Advisor and really glad I did.  Very comfortable and clean, with great amenities.  Can't go wrong here.  Shuttle made it very convenient to go to Disneyland et al.  Also walking distance to a bunch or places to eat.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and we appreciate your kind comments regarding our property, staff and services. I am pleased you agree with our Trip Advisor reviews and that you were not disappointed with your stay. Please feel free to contact me when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Great hotel with shuttle to Disney
Summary: Hotel is spotless. Staff is helpful. The shuttle to Disney every half hour, however you are close enough to walk.   They have a pool and spa both were clean. The continental breakfast was ample and served pool side..   A real find...
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and we certainly appreciate your kind comments regarding our property and amenities. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: Reviews are true. Really nice, and a good value. Had premium rooms, really nice with connecting doors. Had turn down service, never happened even after I noticed guest services. Had a clogged toilet, maitenance were there i 5 minutes even at 7 am. Would have been nice if they left the sleeping women in the beds vacate to the other room before they entered - but at least they came really fast, fixed and cleaned. However, the plusses cancels these incidents out. Fun breakfast delivered to out rooms.. Appreciated the dvd and vcr (!) free rentals. Kind of a retro-hotel, but very well kept and not out dated.
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for allowing us the opportunity on your recent visit to our Inn. We appreciate the feedback you have provided and I have personally reviewed with our management team as guest satisfaction is paramount to us. We DO listen to our guests and I sincerely apologize for your not receiving turn down service even after it was brought to our attention. Kind regards!

Summary: Great place to stay, very close to disneyland and amenities ie, superette, food outlets, advise you to bring own kettle/jug as they only have percolators in the rooms. Clean tidy rooms that were serviced everyday.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us. We appreciate your comments, business and our housekeeping team certainly does a wonderful job in keeping our hotel very clean. Kind regards.

Summary: Just returned from a month in the USA. The Candy Cane Inn was by far our favourite hotel. Such a beautiful place! The rooms are huge and the wonderful staff are so friendly and helpful. Breakfast by the pool was a great way to start each day. Having a laundry on site was a huge bonus too. We are used to that in Oz but it turns out that is not the norm in the USA, so it was very welcome. The shuttle to the two theme parks was terrific too. Yes, it's only a 5 minute walk but when you have been on your feet for 12+ hours, it was a relief not to have to hobble back to the hotel! And I should mention how comfortable the beds are:) Supersoft pillowtop beds that you will sink into. Also, directly across the road is the ART (Anaheim Resort Transportation) bus stop. Catch the #18 to
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us and I am delighted that you found our Inn your favorite hotel in the USA. This is certainly a testament to our team of ladies and gentlemen and I sincerely thank you for this! Yes, our location is convenient to dining, shopping and many bus stops for ease in traveling to many places. And yes, our exclusive complimentary shuttle to and from the theme parks is a sight many enjoy after spending many hours enjoying the parks. Kind regards!

Summary: My husband and I plus another couple stayed here a night last weekend to visit Disneyland. The location is great, walking distance to Disney and there are plenty of places to eat nearby. The only downside of the location is if you stay in a room that faces the busy Disney Drive like we did. It was a Friday night and we could hear people on the sidewalk about 10 feet from our window all night long. Be sure to request a room away from the street!   We had a room with two "Queen" beds, but FYI, they are not actually queens, more like Full beds. Not a big issue for us, but it is a bit misleading. We actually measured the width, only about 55 inches instead of the standard 60. The beds were pretty uncomfortable, extremely firm, but the AC worked really well and the room was clean
Manager Response: Thank you so much for allowing us the opportunity on your recent visit to the theme parks. We appreciate your business and feedback regarding our Inn and your stay. I have spoken with our Serta Manufacturer who confirmed that our mattresses are truly Queen sized and we also did random measurements and confirmed they are 60” width by 80” in length. Now, they are a Double Pillow Top mattress and there may be a slight variance as the “pillow top” may move and I apologize if they were too firm for your personal liking. In regards to the noise you encountered, I am extremely sorry and while we certainly hope that other guests and folks are mindful while walking past a hotel, we would certainly attempt to move any guest that is unhappy with their room placement.  Again, thank you so much for your kind comments and know that we do listen to guest feedback as strive to provide exceptional guest service and satisfaction. Kind Regards!

Summary: Just returned from a 3-day stay at this wonderful hotel.  We arrived too early Friday morning to check in, but reception suggested we store our bags and take advantage of all the amenities at the hotel.  We bought our Park-Hopper tickets right there at the desk, changed our clothes and off we went - all within an hour of arrival. I'd noted in my reservation that my granddaughter was travelling with me (recent college graduate and 22nd birthday) When we got to our room later that day there was a personal welcome basket filled with goodies for her. The room was tastefully decorated with wooden headboards, Hawaiian inspired bedspreads and pretty berber carpet, with wooden plantation shutters on the windows (that you could actually open!) Oh, and hanging in the closet were 2 cotton
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with and sharing your kind comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. I am delighted that your granddaughter enjoyed the goodies and our entire team appreciates the wonderful feedback you have provided.  We certainly attempt to provide many complimentary amenities for our guests and take into consideration most are family travelers and we are mindful of this. Please feel free to contact me personally should you be returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: Just back from our Disneyland adventure and cannot recommend this hotel highly enough. Great location (and a free shuttle to Disneyland), great rooms for families, great pool, and great breakfast every morning.  The staff were always friendly and helpful and the kids loved the candy canes in the lobby.. we appreciated the iced water after a long and hot day at Disney too.  The shuttle to/from the Disneyland was very welcome, especially after walking around the park all day.  Would definitely stay here again and will be telling our friends about your great hotel. Thanks again!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your many kind comments regarding our property and guest service. We are glad you enjoyed the many complimentary amenities we have to offer including our breakfast, iced cucumber water and our free exclusive shuttle to the parks. I am delighted you will stay with us again and please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: Stayed at the Candy cane Inn again in may14. This is a great independent hotel at Disney's front door. Huge rooms, great friendly staff ( including the lady at the breakfast who made the start to every day great, she was always smiling & happy) The free bus to the Disney parks was also a bonus. Nothing was ever any trouble. Included breakfast is awesome.I have to say a huge thankyou to the staff who packed & posted my wife's camera we left in Hugos Transportation vehicle on our trip to the airport to return to Australia. We had the camera back in our home 1 week after talking to the Candy Cane. Thankyou, you guys are the best. This is the only hotel I will stay at in Aneheim. Do yourself a favour, don't get sucked into staying in a chain hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for staying with us and sharing your wonderful comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. Our team does an outstanding job in maintaining our property and I sincerely appreciate the friendliness they possess and extend to our guests! I am so glad you were able to enjoy all of our complimentary amenities we have to offer, and I am delighted we were able to find your camera and expediently return it to you. Please feel free to contact me personally should you be returning to the Anaheim resort area as I would be delighted to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: This lovely small motel is in a great location for visits to Disneyland. From check-in with Robert through the end of our stay we found EVERY employee friendly and efficient. Good continental breakfast which we enjoyed eating poolside. We particularly liked the beautiful flowers throughout the property. We would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your kind comments regarding our property, complimentary amenities and exceptional guest service. We have a wonderful team, including Robert, who take pride in their jobs and taking care of our guests and they too appreciate when folks take the time to write positive comments such as yours. We thank you again for staying with us, as we do appreciate your business. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Great place to stay for disney. Terrific value.
Summary: We stayed 2 nights as a family of four. Disney is a 5 min walk from the hotel but there is a free shuttle. Hotel was very clean and kept up to date. Free breakfast which was plentiful and service was wonderful. I would not hesitate to return. Perfect location and a terrific value.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and we certainly appreciate your kind comments regarding our property and amenities. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: We stayed at the Candy Cane Inn on our trip to Disneyland in April.  We chose this hotel mostly based on Trip Advisor reviews and were not disappointed.  The room was comparable to rooms at a Moderate Resort at Walt Disney World.  We had a room on the second floor about half way back from the street and it was very quiet.  A few previous reviewers had mentioned the noise from the shuttle bus but we did not hear it.  We were able to purchase our Park Hopper passes in the lobby and that was very convenient.  The breakfast buffet was plentiful and though it was crowded at times, we always found a seat out by the pool.  The breakfast staff was very friendly.  The hotel was close to the entrances to the parks so we were able to walk over most of the times and take the shuttle bus
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us on your first visit and we appreciate your kind comments regarding our property, staff and services. I am pleased you agree with our Trip Advisor reviews and that you were not disappointed with your stay. We continue to enhance our Expanded Continental Breakfast and I do thank you for the kind comments about our breakfast staff, as the ladies do a wonderful job and they deserve kudos! Please feel free to contact me when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: This is an excellent place to stay when visiting Disneyland or Disney California Adventure. It costs just a fraction of the price of the Disney hotels, and operates a shuttle bus to and from the parks every 30 minutes. However, the park entrances are just an easy 10 minute walk away so we didn't even bother with the bus. The hotel itself is a motel (open-air plan where you can park your car outside your room door) and its very clean and well-kept. The beds were comfortable, the pools spotless and pretty, and you can even watch the Disney fireworks from the 2nd floor walkways in the evening. A very adequate breakfast was included in the room cost and we were able to quickly fill ourselves up with a good choice of bagels, pastries and fruit before hitting Disneyland. I'd highly
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and I am happy that you enjoyed the Candy Cane Inn and all the complimentary amenities we have to offer. We appreciate your kind comments and it is our pleasure to provide our guests with excellent customer service. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as I would be delighted to assist with future reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: Travelled from Perth, Australia. Walking distance to Disneyland, plus a regular shuttle. Breakfast was good. Pool facilities were small and simple but kids had fun. Disappointed with the room. We had booked for 2 x adults and 3 x kids. The trundle for our 3rd child was not set up. We were then told we would need to pay extra for this (even though our paid booking was for 5 people). The trundle was eventually delivered to the balcony outside of our room. We had to shift furniture in the room to even fit this trundle in. After a long flight from Australia this was so disappointing. Staff at reception were not apologetic and were not very helpful. Frustrating that they would accept a booking for a family of 5 when there was not enough space in the room to accommodate us all,
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and I am sincerely apologetic for the incident that you noted, as Guest Service is of the upmost importance to us. Your reservations were made through the Walt Disney Travel Company and apparently there had been misinformation provided. When this situation was brought to my attention I immediately and personally sent a complimentary rollaway bed, free of charge for your entire stay, in the spirit of hospitality. Thank you again for staying with us and kind regards.

Summary Heading: The best place to stay on our 3 weeks trip
Summary: This is by far one of the most enjoyable and best value place we ever stayed in.  We found this place on tripadvisor and saw all of the great reviews but they are all really true.  The place is very close to Disney parks and honestly we felt like it was part of Disney, not only because it close but also because of the standard of the service. We had a problem with our toilet so we called the reception and in 2 minutes a maintenance worker came and fix it. he then call to housekeeping and in 2 minutes someone came and clean the toilet. I never got so fast and efficient service.  The room is very nice and big enough for the 4 of us. the breakfast is very good as well and have variety of choices: Muffins, Bagels, croissant, Bread, fruit, cereal, cheese, boiled eggs, coffee and
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us the opportunity on your recent visit and I am pleased that you concurred that our TripAdvisor reviews were right on the money. I appreciate all your wonderful comments regarding our property, service and complimentary amenities, and I am delighted you enjoyed your visit. Please feel free to contact me personally should you be returning to the resort area, as it would be my pleasure to assist with future reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: After reading all the positive reviews we decided to stay here on our recent trip to Disneyland. We had yet to find the perfect hotel for when we go to Disney and I'm happy to say we've now found it! My husband and I absolutely loved everything about this hotel. Staff is friendly and courteous. The rooms are incredibly clean and comfortable. I slept better than I've ever slept in a hotel. I never heard kids running and screaming or doors slamming. The breakfast wasn't a full, hot breakfast, but the food was quality (I think they use Einstein Brother's bagels?) and everything was delicious. The ladies tending to the breakfast did an outstanding job at keeping everything clean and filled. We ate outside by the pool each morning and enjoyed the beautiful landscaping. We arrived
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your many kind comments regarding our property, complimentary amenities and exceptional guest service. We are glad you agreed that our TripAdvisor reviews were right on the money, and that you enjoyed your visit. We at the Candy Cane Inn strive in providing a clean comfortable and nicely decorated guestroom with a strong emphasis on friendly and caring team members. Our ambiance and peaceful setting is relaxing and enjoyed by our guests and we are glad that you enjoyed too. We hope to see you again and please contact me should you be returning, as it would be my pleasure to assist with reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: We just returned from a great 4-night stay. The rooms were clean with a fridge and safe. The beds were really comfortable too. The shuttle to Disney ran on the hour and half hour to Disney and the quarter hours coming back. Very convenient with super friendly drivers. If you want to walk, it was about 10 minutes walking slow at the end of the day. The breakfast was convenient: Bagels, muffins, Danish, fruit, cereal, cheese cubes, hard boiled eggs, coffee and juice. Easy way to start the day and easy to bring back to the room. I always appreciate coffee in the lobby and the cucumber water was nice too. The little shop of things you might need was not overpriced and their water is half the price of Disney so buy before you leave. Everyone was so nice. My daughter loved the pool
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your many kind comments regarding our property and guest service. We are glad you enjoyed the many complimentary amenities we have to offer including our breakfast, cucumber water and our free exclusive shuttle to the parks. I am delighted you will stay with us again and please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with reservations. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: My new go-to place to stay for Disneyland!
Summary: Just returned from a fantastic 4 night stay at the Candy Cane Inn! We couldn't have had a better stay. Our deluxe room was large, well appointed and super super clean. It had everything you can ask for - flat screen TV, mini fridge, small safe, blow dryer, iron/board etc.  The AC was strong and cooled the room down instantly (a must in the summer time)! The hotel features free parking and free breakfast (fresh pastries/breads/cheeses/boiled eggs... plus juice, coffee, tea, milk, cereal). There was plenty of tables/chairs outside to sit for breakfast. We were allowed to park there at 7am on our arrival day and leave our car until 4pm on our departure day (might be allowed later based on availability).  The free shuttle to Disneyland was a great perk. It was always on time and ran
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your many kind comments regarding our property and guest service. We are glad you enjoyed the many complimentary amenities we have to offer including our breakfast, pool and our free exclusive shuttle to the parks. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: We spent 3 days at the candy cane inn, and this place is Americas best kept secret !!! Being an older couple we weren't up for Disney day and night but the Canes own shuttle bus it was no problem we would head home for a spell shower and back for the fireworks !! Very nice staff, from the desk to the cleaners to the Bus drivers wonderful people. the breakfast was great not over the top like you normally find in resort hotels it was just enough of what you wanted a coffee or Juice out by the pool then on the bus for the day. I would recommend the candy cane inn to any one heading Disney way. It was sensational
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for staying with us and sharing your wonderful comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. Please feel free to contact me personally should you be returning as I would be delighted to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: I stayed at the Candy Cane Inn with 7 volleyball players and another chaperone. We were delighted with the rooms, the small pool with lovely plantings, the terrific breakfast, the warm and friendly employees, the clean grounds. Everything is well maintained. It's within walking distance of the Anaheim Convention Center where the girls played volleyball for 4 days, as well as Disneyland and California Adventure. The Inn also has a regular bus that took us to Disneyland if you don't want to walk. ABC store and a 7-11 is adjacent to the Inn. The iced coffees were half the price of Starbucks and just as good. If you need a laundry, they have one. If you have mobility problems, the rooms open to the parking lot and are on 2 levels. I'm bringing my family back to stay at Candy Cane
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us to be of service during your recent visit to Anaheim. We do appreciate your business and I am so glad you were able to enjoy our many complimentary amenities we have to offer at the Candy Cane. We are so glad you will stay with us again and please feel free to contact me personally when you are returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Candy Cane Inn is the only place to stay when going to Disneyland
Summary: After reading several reviews and  hearing great things about the Candy Cane Inn from a co-worker I booked my trip with a five night stay and I can't tell you enough about this place.  The Candy Cane Inn is now going to be my go to place whenever I go to Disneyland.  The hotel was clean and the staff were very helpful.  The hotel is literally at the backdoor of California Adventure and you can see the backside of Carsland, but the best part is at night is that you can watch the fireworks if you have room on the second story between 212-218.  I also loved the shuttle that ran from the hotel to the resort and back again even though you are only a five minute walk from the main entrance.  The shuttle did come in handy after long days in the park and the drivers were very friendly.
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting with us for the first time and sharing your many kind comments regarding our property, complimentary amenities and exceptional guest service. We are glad you agreed with our TripAdvisor reviews, and that you enjoyed your visit. We thank you again for staying with us and please don’t hesitate to contact me personally when returning as I would be delighted to assist with reservations and any requests you may have for the fireworks view. Kind regards!

Summary: My husband and I have been to Disneyland numerous times over the past number of years. We don't have children but Love Disney too!   While we have stayed at numerous hotels near Disney we keep coming back to Candy Cane Inn. Free breakfast, free parking, free shuttle and impeccably clean and quiet. Seriously, what more could you ask for? Oh, and did I mention charming?  We have introduced our family and friends to Candy Cane Inn and they have all been impressed too.  Thank you Candy Cane Inn for all the great memories. Can't wait to come back!,,,
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for being a repeat member of the Candy Cane family and for sharing your wonderful comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. Summary Heading: Stay at the Candy Cane Inn- You will not be disappointed, you will return
Summary: Stayed here two nights. An extremely clean and well kept property.   When we arrived, the front desk greeted us and patiently answered all our questions.  They have a nice sized pool. Chairs and tables are also located on the second floor area to hang out and enjoy some fresh air. The plants all around the property was a very nice touch.   The shuttle came on time to pick up and drop off. The driver was safe and courteous. The shuttle was clean.  BTW, you can walk to DL if needed. The location-price-value is phenomenal.  Had breakfast and the ladies were courteous and helpful in the breakfast area.  Candy Cane Inn is well run operation that other hotels should follow. This place is a gem.   Thank you Jeff!
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for staying with us and sharing your wonderful comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. Our team does an outstanding job in maintaining our property and I sincerely appreciate the friendliness they possess and extend to our guests! I am glad you enjoyed our grounds and the ambiance of our Inn. Please feel free to contact me personally should you be returning as I would be delighted to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: We stayed here for the fourth time this past April.I have already re booked for February. We have always stayed in the Premium room and it is well worth it.The breakfast delivery is a nice touch,my daughter loves filling out the breakfast menu the night before! The extra space is really nice so you don't feel cramped.Everything is really clean which I love because I am picky about that.All of the staff are very kind and professional.this is the place to stay when visiting Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for being a repeat member of the Candy Cane family and for sharing your wonderful comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. Summary Heading: This is a great choice for a hotel near Disney!
Summary: We have stayed at this hotel twice in the last 5-10 yrs when going to DisneyLand.  The location is great!  You can easily walk to the park.  Our most recent stay was Christmas Eve and Christmas night.  The hotel left us a gift bag which had a fleece blanket with the Candy Cane Inn logo on it.  I was impressed with that.  The rooms are always clean, comfortable, and nice, and the breakfast is also nice.  Would always choose this hotel when going to DisneyLand!
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for being a loyal member of the Candy Cane Inn family of repeat guests. We DO appreciate your business and look forward to you having another memorable visit. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with reservations.  Kind Regards!

Summary Heading: Why we stay at the Candy Cane Inn
Summary: We have stayed at the Candy Cane Inn four times in the past year and today I booked our fifth visit to the Candy Cane Inn.  We have stayed at other good neighbor hotels and believe the Candy Cane Inn fits our family the best.  On our first visit we stayed in a standard room and were quite happy, free parking, free internet, and free breakfast.  This is a huge value.  Parking is $14 a day before tax at many hotels/motels.  Internet is $9.95.  The breakfast is what you make of it.  There are plenty of "get you started" for a day at Disney options.  They do a phenomenal job with their offerings considering their is no on site restaurant.  They have a small gift/sundry shop on site and there is a mini mart next store.  The shuttle and drivers are timely and more than considerate.

Summary: Located a bare 10 minute walk from Disneyland, this is an excellent family hotel. Large, clean rooms, complimentary breakfast - good quality, swimming pool and a complimentary shuttle to Disneyland that leaves every half hour and picks one up from the parks till 12.45 am. Wow. Lots of greenery and flowers on the property and efficient front desk, just adds to the icing on the cake.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and we certainly appreciate your kind comments regarding our property and amenities. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: After reading all the great reviews on Trip Advisor I booked four rooms for my family (2 deluxe, 1 standard &1premium) all of which were entirely suitable for our mixed family party. All the rooms were extremely well presented, clean and we were all impressed with the quiet, garden ambience of the Candy Cane as well as the exceptional effort all the staff went to make sure our stay was fabulous. Special thank you to Erika and the other front desk staff for their  patience meeting our needs - early arrivals, car parks, extra nights and late check outs to name a few! We made full use of the shuttle, pool, spa, breakfast and laundry and appreciated all the little extras that this 'motel' offers complimentary where others charge extra. Although so close to a Disneyland it was great
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your many kind comments regarding our property, complimentary amenities and exceptional guest service. Summary Heading: Best Disneyland neighbor hotel, won't disappoint.
Summary: I love this hotel. After trying others in the area, I love it even more. Nothing is super amazing, but nothing is disappointing either. The rooms are basic, but clean and comfortable.Free breakfast buffet with plenty of options. Great customer service beyond what any of the other hotels provide, this is what they are good at. While waiting for a hotel shuttle for a different hotel we were staying at during our last visit, I saw the candy cane shuttle pick up 3 times at Disneyland and wished we had stayed there again. But,now I won't stay anywhere else. It is next door to Disneyland so you can just walk back and forth if the shuttle is full or not ready when you are. The front desk held our bags all day for us before we could check in, so we could goto Disney. They even gave my
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for staying with us and sharing your wonderful comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. Summary Heading: Good place I see why everyone likes this place
Summary: This place is great to stay. I always wanted to stay here because of the review and I a glad I did. The room was nice and had all of the amenities I needed. As a girl I need a lot of counter space and this I did have :-)  The breakfast was fine, but it is heavy on the carbs. The lady at the front desk taught us the trick of warming up the hard boil eggs. Hot water in a cup  .. duh!  Good luck on finding a place to eat because it will get packed inside and out. Love the fact that there is a shuttle that runs every 30 minutes to the park (Please tip your driver). You do need to get there a little early before they leave because the bus will get full. We stayed there during Mickey's Halloween party and all we had to do was call the hotel and ask them to send a shuttle driver to
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us the opportunity on your recent visit and I am pleased that you concurred that our TripAdvisor reviews were right on the money. We do aspire to deliver a quality product and exceptional friendly service to each and every guest that stays with us. We look forward to having you stay with us again. Kind regards!

Summary: We had a wonderful stay at the Candy Cane Inn. We booked a premium room and enjoyed the amenities provided especially being able to have breakfast in our room at no additional charge. We made full use of the shuttle to and from Disneyland each day, you think that a 10 minute walk is not much but add that onto a full day of walking and you leave when you are too exhausted to walk another step and a shuttle is waiting for you...thank goodness we thought each of the 4 days we were there. Laundry facilities were greatly appreciated as well. Subway, pizza, 7/11, Dennys and even McDonald's within walking distance.

We are glad you enjoyed the many amenities our Premium rooms have to offer including the complimentary breakfast delivery. Summary: We have stayed here twice in recent years.  The rooms are clean and well maintained as are the pretty grounds around the pool.  There is a good breakfast in the pool area and a complimentary shuttle to Disneyland that runs every half hour.  You can also walk the short distance.

They truly do take pride in their work and providing exceptional service to all of our guests. Summary: After a long flight from Australia, we were so happy to arrive at the Candy Cane Inn for a 3 night stay. The staff are just lovely and couldn't be more helpful. The rooms were clean, the breakfasts were fantastic and we loved the use of the pool. We couldn't believe how close the hotel was from Disneyland it was wonderful that Candy Cane had a shuttle service but to be honest it was an easy walk. However, it was great having the option As a side note Candy Cane recommended Hugo's Transportation for our journey to and from the airport. Our driver Ahmad was amazing!!! I highly suggest those who are traveling to use his transportation service - he couldn't be more helpful!!!

We do appreciate your business and yes our location is most convenient to the Disneyland Parks as well as many other wonderful things to do in southern California.
