Please feel free to contact me when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: If you want to view paradise...
Summary: This was a wonderful hotel. The staff are friendly, helpful and inviting. Check in was very quick, plus we were able to book a shuttle to take us to LAX. They have an excellent shuttle service to Disneyland that goes every 30mins. Free breakfast. The hotel was covered in greenery and flowers which was beautiful. There is a pool and spa (hot tub) with towels provided. Close location to Disneyland and other shops. Value for money. Free wi-fi. The hotel rooms were clean and homely. Room for parking. Could watch Disneys fireworks from pool area. The room has a fridge and coffee maker. Plus when we checked out, they handed us a $10 off voucher for our next visit (valid for a year). We would definitely stay here again, if we went back to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and I am happy that you enjoyed the Candy Cane Inn and all the complimentary amenities we have to offer. We appreciate your kind comments and it is our pleasure to provide our guests with excellent customer service. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as I would be delighted to assist with future reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: My family and I have stayed at the Candy Cane Inn over 15 times in the last 10 years!  Our last visit was in November and we are visiting again on June 8th for 4 days to celebrate my nephew's 13th birthday.  love this place!  They have never failed with their rooms, customer service, or amenities. In all the years I've never wrote a review but I have to give a big shout out to Ryan when calling to confirm my reservation for our planned Disney trip. My family and I made reservations for 2 rooms. This will be the first time for some of my family and fulfilling their expectations is alot of pressure for me.  He was patient and understanding with all my requests. After talking with Ryan I have complete confidence that this will be another memorable visit. I look forward to writing
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for being a loyal member of the Candy Cane Inn family of repeat guests. We DO appreciate your business and look forward to you having another memorable visit. Yes, Ryan is a newer member of our team and I am delighted with his exceptional guest service, positive friendly attitude and spirit of hospitality. Kind Regards!

Summary: Hopefully my frequent reviews are not growing tired but after my last stay (see my review in April) we stayed here again in May. Also as an update to my last review, the hotel manager called me and specifically discussed the negative aspects of our stay. He assured me the issues would be dealt with.  Very impressed that time was taken to apologize and assure me it would be dealt with.    Our stay in May was Awesome. Got a great rate, room was clean comfortable and accommodating. Breakfast was yummy and James was back at the front desk (yeah).   Great property. Keep up the good work
Manager Response: Thank you so much for being a repeat member of the Candy Cane Inn family. We appreciate your business and kind comments regarding our property and team of service professionals. I am thankful for our conversation about your last stay with us and so glad we provided you with the high level of service that the Candy Cane Inn is known for on this stay.  Thank you again for your business and please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with room reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: I found out about this hotel from friends. Just about everyone we knew has stayed here.  The staff was very friendly and helpful. The rooms were basic and clean. Our 4 yr old loved the pool and midday everyday we stopped what we were doing at disneyland and came back to swim and take a break.  Relaxing and quiet away from the hubbub.  Breakfast was plentiful.  We used the disneyland shuttle as well as just walking as it was so close to the park.  The only downer was no airport shuttle:( otherwise my rating would be five stars!
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for staying with us and sharing your wonderful comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. We are glad you enjoyed the many complimentary amenities we have to offer including our pool and our free exclusive shuttle to the parks. I do apologize for the lack of a complimentary airport shuttle, but we do offer transportation services through Super Shuttle or a town car service, which can be arranged any time through our Front Desk. Again thank you for staying with us and please feel free to contact me personally should you be returning as I would be delighted to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: For those like me who can't afford to stay at a Disney resort hotel
Summary: The Candy Cane Inn is right next too Disneyland. The grounds are beautiful with flowers everywhere. The staff is friendly and they serve a complementary breakfast every day. They have a shuttle that leaves every half hour and takes you near the park entrance but if you miss the shuttle it's not that far to walk. The rooms are very clean and comfortable and the rates are good. I would recommend this hotel to anyone going to Disneyland. I have stayed there many times.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for being a repeat member of the Candy Cane Inn family. We appreciate your business and kind comments regarding our property and team of service professionals. We look forward to seeing you again and please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: Stayed here for four nights to attend a conference at the Anaheim convention center.   It was a nice break from the hustle and bustle and a surprising little oasis from the neighboring concrete and chaos.  Hotel is immaculate and there seems to be an army of employees quietly working on it during the day.  The grounds are lovely, with hanging plants and established shrubs and trees.  Cobbled driveway and decorative iron railings and plenty of parking make this a very pleasant hotel.  Inside, the rooms are clean and the cleaning staff is efficient and friendly.  I had a premium room which included a delivered continental breakfast (to order), a welcome basket of goodies, a microwave, biscotti in the morning and some upgraded amenities (robes, turndown, a fresh rose on the night
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us again and sharing your many kind comments regarding our property, and exceptional guest service. We are glad you enjoyed the many amenities our Premium rooms have to offer including the complimentary breakfast delivery, and welcome basket of goodies. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with reservations. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Great place to stay when visiting Disneyland
Summary: I stayed here for a 3-night stay.  It is a very convenient hotel within walking distance to Disney.  They also provide a shuttle bus.  The hotel is clean, comfortable with a nice breakfast area and pool.  The rooms are cute, clean and spacious.  I would definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and we certainly appreciate your kind comments. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with reservations. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Lovely Little Inn Close to The Magic Kingdom!
Summary: The Candy Cane Inn was a delightful little hotel just down the street from the Magic Kingdom.  The room was very clean with a sweet little welcome basket full of little goodies.  The hotel had a nice pool and jacuzzi as well. The location is an easy walk to the Disneyland front gate. You have a good view of the fireworks as well.  Would totally go back for our next visit.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and I am happy that you enjoyed the Candy Cane Inn and all the complimentary amenities we have to offer. We appreciate your kind comments and it is our pleasure to provide our guests with excellent customer service. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as I would be delighted to assist with future reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: Pros: - 10 min walking distance from Disneyland, so we saved time and money on parking. - free drop off and pick up shuttle to Disneyland if don't want to walk - free hotel parking - clean and quiet room - jacuzzi and pool - free breakfast - ABC store is just around the corner  Cons: - small number of parking spaces and each space is tight (we have an Odyssey) - no microwave in the room   I'd come back here.
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us to be of service during your recent visit to Anaheim. We do appreciate your business and I am so glad you were able to enjoy our many complimentary amenities we have to offer at the Candy Cane. We are so glad you will stay with us again and please feel free to contact me personally when you are returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: We stayed at Candy Cane during our family Disney vacation.  I recommend this motel because: - clean rooms - comfortable and nicely decorated rooms - breakfast is included.  Cereal, donuts, yogurt, coffee.  Nothing fancy but it saves time and money. - a short walk to Disneyland. It took us less than 10 minutes to walk to the park. - shuttle service to Disneyland.  We used it only once since it was so easy to walk. - friendly staff - pool.  We didn't use it but it looked nice. - quiet.  Some noise early in the morning when families are getting ready to go to Disneyland, but we were up early too.  Quiet at night. - a short walk to some restaurants  The only problem we had was a pair of brand new shoes still in the box went missing from the room.  They were still in the Nike bag.  I
Manager Response: First and foremost I would like to sincerely apologize for the items you noted. I do thank you for the phone conversation you had with my Front Office Manager Jose, and as you folks discussed we do listen to all guest comments and take them very seriously. Thank you for your kind comments about the rest of the property and our friendly staff as they work hard, and they do appreciate kind comments such as yours. Thank you again for your business and we do look forward to seeing you again soon. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: We will for sure be back!!!
Summary: We enjoyed our stay very much. Upon check in they even had a birthday card and treat ready for my daughter. We couldn't have been more pleased with our stay, and look forward to going back soon. The location was wonderful.
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us to be of service during your recent visit to Anaheim. We do appreciate your business and I am so glad we were able to help make your daughters birthday a memorable one! Please feel free to contact me when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: This is an excellent choice for a family
Summary: We looked at several motel options for our visit to Disneyland.  We are very pleased that we chose the Candy Cane Inn.  The location is great - you can walk, or take the Shuttle (every half hour).  The grounds are immaculate.  Our room was very clean - had all the amenities we wanted and the air conditioning unit worked very well - you could actually adjust it and it would respond accordingly (unlike some places).  The free breakfast has many options for selection - cereals, breads, yogurts, fruit, cheese, boiled eggs, juices, coffee, tea, etc etc.  Very well done and you can eat right by the pool - just the way to start a morning.  The staff we encountered were all happy, polite and helpful.  The cost was very reasonable.  If we go back to this area we would book the Candy Cane
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for staying with us and sharing your wonderful comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. Our team does an outstanding job in maintaining our property and I sincerely appreciate the friendliness they possess and extend to our guests! Please feel free to contact me personally should you be returning as I would be delighted to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: The location is ideal and the staff is phenomenal. The grounds are beautifully landscaped with mature blooming plants and jasmine scents the air. The continental breakfast buffet is lavish. The front desk staff was gracious and very accommodating. I am especially appreciative for Brian's assistance in making travel arrangements and for James, Erika and Nick. No matter the time of day or night, the staff made every effort to make sure my stay was pleasant. I highly recommend the Candy Cane Inn!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your many kind comments regarding our property, and exceptional guest service. We have a wonderful team, who take pride in their jobs and taking care of our guests and they too appreciate when folks take the time to write positive comments such as yours. We thank you again for staying with us, as we do appreciate your business. Kind regards!

Summary: The Candy Cane Inn is an inexpensive hotel that has been well maintained and updated through the years. Apparently, this place has been around from the beginning (since Disney opened), and it doesn't look dumpy or frumpy at all. The grounds are beautiful, lovely pool area, very clean. The rooms are also clean and bright. It's only a 2 block walk to the Disney entrance, but they have a shuttle that picks up and takes you back every half hour. The shuttle itself is very clean and the drivers were all professional and accommodating. Our last day there was on Friday, and check out time was at 11. However, our flight out of John Wayne airport didn't leave until 8:15 that night. The hotel clerks allowed us to keep our suitcases in their office, continue to use their pool, and use the
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your kind comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers, as we certainly appreciate your time and business. Yes, the Candy Cane has been here for over 57 years and image, integrity and pride have always been the foundation of our Inn! I am so glad we were able to assist with holding your luggage while you folks enjoyed our pool area and complimentary shuttle. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: We stayed at the Candy Cane Inn on our trip to Disneyland. The people at the front desk are very nice and helpful. The rooms are clean and the beds are very comfortable. The A/C worked wonderful in our room. While there it was 96-98*. The ice machine is close by where you have a soda vending machine along with a snack machine. There is a little store off the main desk in the lobby.  The serve a continental breakfast in the morning that you can enjoy out by the pool. They have the swimming pool, a Jacuzzi and a children wading pool. This is all surrounded by wonderful plants and flowers. They have a shuttle bus that will take you to Disneyland and will also pick you up and bring you back to the motel. It is about a 10 minute walk to Disney, but after walking all over and spending
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for staying with us and sharing your wonderful comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. Our team does an outstanding job in maintaining our property and I sincerely appreciate the friendliness they possess and extend to our guests! I am so glad you were able to enjoy all of our complimentary amenities we have to offer, as well as our location which is most convenient to the many wonderful things to do in southern California. Please feel free to contact me personally should you be returning as I would be delighted to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: We stayed at Candy Cane Inn during our Disney vacation. It is very close to the Disney parks. We walked to Disney three times and took the shuttle once.  Front desk staff was friendly, rooms were clean and well stocked, everything worked well. We didn't have time to use the pool area. The breakfast was very good - no hot food, but many choices and delicious.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and we certainly appreciate your kind comments. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: We've stayed at the Candy Cane Inn twice now, and I plan to stay there next time we visit the Anaheim area.  It's so charming.  It has a cobble stone drive way/parking lot that is something you don't see and it adds a great touch to their décor.  Palm trees, fountain, pool, hot tub, and breakfast area... all perfect.  Breakfast is basic, pastries, bagels, cereals, and juices.  Plenty of options for me.  Let's talk about the 5-10 minute walk right to Disneyland/California Adventure/Downtown Disney!  It's so different then driving to Magic Kingdom in FL.  You make a left out of the front of the hotel and walk on the sidewalk till you get there.  It's quick and nice.  Of course the hotel has a shuttle for those who can't do the walk.  The staff was very friendly, and were always
Manager Response: Thank you for being a loyal, repeat guest of the Candy Cane Inn and thank you for your many kind comments about our property, services and our team. They truly do take pride in their work and providing exceptional service to all of our guests. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with reservations. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Great place to stay next to disney!
Summary: This hotel is only a 4 to 5 min. Walk to the disney gates. Very convieniently located. The staff was very friendly and helpful. They offer a shuttle to the gates also, I didn't think we would use it, but it was handy. The room was very nice, comfortable bed. Having a laundry onsite was also a bonus. They provide a good breakfast nice to start the day and saves a little for disney.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and I am happy that you enjoyed the Candy Cane Inn and your first visit. We appreciate your kind comments and please feel free to contact me personally when returning as I would be delighted to assist with rates and future reservations. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Beautiful Surroundings and Close to Disneyland
Summary: On previous visits to Disneyland we had stayed at a hotel which despite it being on the shuttle route(daily charge)the shuttle stopped at numerous hotels and this made the journey back after a tiring day at Disneyland seem even longer--so we decided on the Candy Cane Inn---what drew me in was the fact that there is free parking and the Inn has its own dedicated shuttle.(no charge)    At the time of booking all that was available was the standard room with 2 Queen beds--lovely room with small fridge coffee maker, hair dryer etc. Great continental breakfast yogurts, cheeses,hard boiled eggs, bagels etc. Lovely swimming pool and small spa----hotel towels provided :)     The hotel has lovely cobbled effect streets, excellent parking---beautiful plants--making for very peaceful
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us to be of service during your recent visit to the theme parks. We do appreciate your business and I am so glad you were able to enjoy our many complimentary amenities we have to offer at the Candy Cane. We do have microwaves in our Premium rooms, and there is a microwave available anytime in our Breakfast Garden Room. In regards to your comment on elevators, we currently have an architect reviewing this, however we do have staff available at all times to assist with luggage assistance. Should anyone have health issues please contact our Front Desk for immediate assistance with room placement. Please feel free to contact me personally when you are returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with reservations and any special request you may need. Kind regards!

Summary: Our group loved our stay!  3 adults and 2 five year olds all shared a double queen room and we honestly never felt overly crowded.  Of course with 5 people, we were packed in but for sleeping & getting ready, it worked just perfect.  We all enjoyed the pool a couple times - it was on the smaller side and could get crowded quickly but still fun.  Breakfast was plentiful, we never went elsewhere during our 4 days.  The variety was good and always fully stocked.  There's a 7-11 and abc market right next door for quick supplies or last minute souvenirs.  As every one else has said, the parks are just a quick 10 min walk, which we did back & forth, twice a day, every day.  It's nice they offer the shuttle but we didn't partake.  One thing our friend would have liked is an elevator -
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your many kind comments regarding our property and guest service. We are glad you enjoyed the many complimentary amenities we have to offer including our breakfast, pool and our free exclusive shuttle to the parks. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with reservations. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Perfect end to a great trip
Summary: This was the last hotel we stayed at on our Silver Wedding Anniversary trip to USA. It could not have been a better way to end our trip, especially given its proximity to Disneyland which is in easy walking distance (although we usually used the free shuttle bus). The Candy Cane is actually on Disney property, backing straight on to the Cars ride, and the nightly fireworks could easily be seen. The room was large and ver comfortable and the inclusive breakfast very nice. Staff were friendly and helpful and although we were disappointed with LA generally and Hollywood in particular this was hardly the fault of the Candy Cane. Finally for baseball fans the hotel is a very short drive from Angels stadium!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your wonderful comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. We at the Candy Cane Inn strive in providing a clean comfortable and nicely decorated guestroom with a strong emphasis on friendly and caring team members. Thank you again for staying with us and I am glad we were the “best way to end your Silver Wedding Anniversary trip”! Kind regards!

Summary Heading: My 84 year old mom and I had a great time!
Summary: I was hesitant about staying here but it was recommended by a friend. We were pleasantly surprised by how much we enjoyed the Candy Cane!  The free breakfast was plentiful and varied for us.  The ladies who staff the morning breakfast are so friendly, helpful and sweet. They always had a kind word accompanied with a smile.  What gems they are! The front staff were terrific.  They were always so patient, helpful and ready to supply information to me whenever i came in to ask questions.  One morning i woke up with a migraine and went into the lobby to have a cup of free coffee since it was only 5:30.  One of the front desk staff asked if i was ok because i looked a little shaky.  Again, where do you find this level of attention and kindness?  As people have said it took only 10
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your many kind comments regarding our property, and exceptional guest service. We are glad you were recommended to us by your friend, and that you enjoyed your visit. We have a wonderful team, including our Breakfast and Front Desk Staff, who take pride in their jobs and taking care of our guests and they too appreciate when folks take the time to write positive comments such as yours. We thank you again for staying with us, as we do appreciate your business. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Convenient, clean, mostly friendly and shuttle oddities
Summary: This is not our first rodeo at the Candy Cane Inn.  We stay here because it is one of the best budget hotels in the Disneyland area and we don't feel like we need to pay a fortune for a place when we are only there when the park is closed (and typically less than that) to sleep and get ready.  This trip was like most others, clean rooms, convenience to the parks, etc., all those things that the Candy Cane Inn is known for.  Unfortunately this trip we had a couple of issues with the shuttle service.  I know, I know, it's free and the walk to the parks is not that bad.  But we were at the parks because our daughter was dancing in the Dance The Magic parade and showcase.  This means bringing what is usually unnecessary bags to the park containing several pairs of dance shoes, and
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and providing your valuable feedback. I am apologetic for the incidents that you noted, as Guest Service is of the upmost importance to us here at the Candy Cane Inn. We do listen to all comments and while we never want to disappoint our Guest’s, we do value these opportunities to continue to train and grow our guest service. I would like to point out that our shuttle does make multiple runs when we are busy to and from the park, to accommodate all of our Guests. In addition our 8 passenger van runs twice a day during the Shuttle Drivers lunch and dinner breaks, so as to not inconvenience any of our guests by not providing transportation at all times. Again thank you so much as we certainly appreciate your business and appreciate your feedback. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Just back from an almost perfect trip at the Candy Cane Inn...
Summary: Let me start off by saying that my husband rarely has a strong opinion about anything...very easy going guy. However, when we go to Disneyland, the ONLY place he will stay is at the Candy Cane Inn. We have stayed there many times and it is always great. They have improved on an already better than anywhere else breakfast...lots of variety and ambience. We love sitting by the pool surrounded by the lush, gorgeous foliage and feeding the birds as we eat our breakfast. The hotel is immaculately clean and has beautiful landscaping with a cobble stone parking lot. It is just so quaint! We love the convenience of the shuttle especially at the end of the day when our feet are killing us (but it is close enough to walk as well). Our son LOVED Fred the shuttle driver! He was very
Manager Response: First and foremost I would like to sincerely apologize for the items you noted and I thank you for your valuable input. I have attempted to reach you through the TripAdvisor email system however have not heard back and wanted to respond. We do listen to all comments and while we never want to disappoint our guests, we do value these opportunities to continue to train and grow our guest service. With that said, I would like to point out that our Pool and Hot Tub are heated year round to 79-80 and 100-101 degrees per the Safety Code for the City of Anaheim. We always keep these temperatures to these standards and do not deviate from these. I do thank you again for your valuable feedback and please feel free to contact me personally should you be returning to the area as I would certainly like to assist you with future reservations and would like the opportunity to restore your confidence in our Inn. Kind regards!

Summary: The Candy Cane Inn has been a family favorite for many years.  We will head back there again this summer with out grandkids... again. Great pool and breakfast, private shuttle. Very comfortable, albeit slightly cozy rooms.  The staff is great and the ground are well kept.  A more affordable alternative to Disney magic that allows us more days to play.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for being a repeat member of the Candy Cane Inn family. We appreciate your business and kind comments regarding our property and team of service professionals. We look forward to seeing you again this summer and please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with reservations and any requests you may have. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Comfortable walk to Disneyland, friendly, clean, good price.  Breakfast.
Summary: Our 2nd time at Candy Cane (went in 2006) also.  We like it as the price is reasonable, clean, continental breakfast is great way to start day.  Shuttle very 1/2 hour or 10 minute walk to Disneyland.  Staff friendly, small convenience store for a few staples open anytime is good, food places across street, grocery store right next door.  We recommend for families (pool, etc.).  Good all around
Manager Response: Thank you so much for being a repeat member of the Candy Cane Inn family. We appreciate your business and kind comments regarding our property and team of service professionals. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with room reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: Stayed here 2 nights for a quick one day visit before flying home.  I chose Candy Cane due to the good reviews it gets on Trip Adviser.  The stay was pleasant however bear in mind that this is a busy family orientated hotel.  So be prepared for screaming kids and noise.  The car parks are quite small and with the number of people that can't park their cars between the lines in the USA makes car parking difficult at times.  The shuttle to Disney was awesome and we had no problem with the staff at all.  The breakfast was good and check in and out was easy.  It is a little on the pricier side for the room compared to some others only a hundred meters or so away but it's probably worth it for the location and services.  Overall I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for allowing us to be of service on your recent visit to the theme parks. We DO appreciate your business and the feedback provided allows us to adjust our operations accordingly. Kind regards!

Summary: We traveled to Disneyland with seven people... three of them grandchildren - ages 7, 3 and 8 months.  The Candy Cane Inn is THE PLACE TO STAY!!! It is perfect.  The rooms are modern, clean, well maintained and well serviced every day.  Small but very adequate breakfast buffet is included.  The pool and hot tub are just right for a dip.  The grounds are immaculate.  The desk and service staff were a joy to deal with.  They have answers to all your questions and helped us find the nearest pharmacy for an emergency. The hotel property butts right up against Disneyland.  It is literally a 7 minute walk or the hotel shuttle runs twice an hour.  We will stay here again and will recommend it to everyone we know.  Thanx for making our stay special. Sven 44.
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for staying with us and sharing your wonderful comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. Our team does an outstanding job in maintain our property and I sincerely appreciate the friendliness they possess and extend to our guests! Please feel free to contact me personally should you be returning as I would be delighted to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: We usually stay at The Grand California hotel but decided to save some of that money for our vacation. Everything I asked for in my request I got upon arrival.  We were half way from Disney and the convention center which was perfect. The free shuttle was great especially after walking the whole day. Beds are really soft in the room but I didn't mind. Parking was easy to find and especially with it being packed and a holiday weekend. Breakfast is ok but who cares it's free. Loved the gym they have water and towels if you need inside. Pool area is great with towels provided. Friendly helpful staff everyone that I bugged with questions was extremely helpful and nice. My fiance loved here as well and we will be back for another visit.
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us to be of service during your recent visit to Anaheim. We do appreciate your business and I am so glad you were able to enjoy our many complimentary amenities we have to offer at the Candy Cane. We are so glad you will stay with us again and please feel free to contact me personally when you are returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: Candy Cane Inn is a hotel we have visited for more than 30 years. This weekend we spent two glorious nights here. We felt completely pampered and refreshed from days in Disneyland. The hotel is an easy walk to the main gate, our room was great and roomy (a premium upgrade.) We loved the popcorn bucket full of treats.  A special touch was the delivered breakfast. We were able to order the night before and the delivery was on time and portions were very generous. Coming back on Saturday night, we asked the front desk for suggestions for nearby restaurants. They gave us menus and maps. We choose to have Marri's Pizza and Pasta deliver our dinner. What a great surprise! Two entrees and salads came hot and so delicious. It could have served four people! Great value! Loved it so much
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us again and sharing your many kind comments regarding our property, and exceptional guest service. We are glad you enjoyed the many amenities our Premium rooms have to offer including the complimentary breakfast delivery. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: Had reservation for two connecting rooms for three nights.  We had a late arrival due to airline and even though reservation was made months in advance and it was followed up by emails and phone calls no connecting rooms available.  Spoke to the guests who had the connecting room and it was given away after I made phone call saying we were going to be late.   But... This is a great place to stay.  Clean comfortable rooms, quiet, great breakfast and real easy walking distance to Disneyland and California Adventure.  You can even see the fireworks from Disney!  Shuttles run to Disney if you don't want to do the quick walk. Great room rates too.  Would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and we appreciate your kind comments regarding our property, staff and services. I am truly sorry we were unable to meet your requests for connecting rooms, but I am glad you enjoyed the rest of your stay with us. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and any other requests you may have. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: So close to Disneyland...shuttle or walk...take your pick
Summary: The property at Candy Cane Inn continues to bring us back year after year. We have choices of regular room or upgrade to premium room depending on whether we want to splurge on amenities of ordering breakfast in room, turn down service, upgraded amenities like microwaves in room. Wish the premium rooms has a larger refrigerators since the ones in the premiums are the same size as the regular rooms.  We stay nearly a week at a time and space runs out in the smaller sized refrigerators. Something to think about for management.  Otherwise, we enjoy the available shuttle service which is free and we always look forward to seeing Mr. Lee's smiling face every morning. Fred is also a friendly face to see at evening times when the park closes and we are looking for a ride back to the
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your many kind comments regarding our property, and exceptional guest service. We are glad you enjoyed the many amenities our Premium rooms have to offer including the complimentary breakfast delivery. We have a wonderful team, including Fred, Mr. Lee and James, who take pride in their jobs and taking care of our guests and they too appreciate when folks take the time to write positive comments such as yours. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with reservations. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Proximity to Disneyland can't be beat
Summary: My family stayed here with another family - overall experience was good, with the best thing about it being the 10-minute walk to the park. They have a shuttle as well, but it took no longer to walk! The free breakfast was basic but a nice bonus, and the rooms we're clean and plenty comfortable if you're not looking for fancy. Staff was also very nice.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and I am happy that you enjoyed the Candy Cane Inn and all the complimentary amenities we have to offer. We appreciate your kind comments and it is our pleasure to provide our guests with excellent customer service. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as I would be delighted to assist with future reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: This was our first time staying at The Candy Cane Inn and the first thing we noticed was the beautiful landscaping. You can tell the staff really takes pride in the landscaping and floral design of the property. Absolutely beautiful! The rooms aren't that big but they do the job. They are very clean and the beds are comfortable. I think we will request an upstairs room next time as there were little kids running around really early in the morning that sounded like a herd of elephants. The pool was very nice and a lot of people ate out by it in the morning. There is a regular sized pool, a hot tub, and then a wading pool for the little ones. After we would get back from the parks every day in the afternoon we enjoyed a nice dip in the pool. The Continental breakfast was very
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and I am happy that you enjoyed the Candy Cane Inn and your first visit. We appreciate your kind comments and please feel free to contact me personally when returning as I would be delighted to assist with rates and future reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: We stayed at Candy Cane Inn on a family trip to Disney.  It is a wonderful hotel.  The flowers and landscaping are so nice, you will still think you are at Disney!  The rooms aren't huge, but they are clean and nice.  All we did was sleep there anyway!  We were able to walk to and from Disney and it was nice to be able to come back to the room to allow the children to nap and then head back for dinner, more rides and the fireworks.  I highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your wonderful comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. We at the Candy Cane Inn strive in providing a clean comfortable and nicely decorated guestroom with a strong emphasis on friendly and caring team members. Our ambiance and peaceful setting is relaxing and enjoyed by our guests and we are glad that you enjoyed too. Kind regards!

Summary: We just returned from a stay at Candy Cane Inn and we were very pleased with our stay. We came to the area for a one day visit to Disneyland with our grandson. We just needed a clean room that was close to the park. We came in early and wanted to head to the park the same day. The associate at the desk was extremely helpful with all the information we needed for our stay. We were able to park our car there for the day even though it was too early to check in. We arrived at 9:30 AM, checkin is 3:00. The free shuttle was a big plus even though we opted to walk one way. It is a very short walk. Our room was clean and spacious for the three of us. The only thing I will do next time is request a room on the second floor. We were on the first floor and there was a lot of people
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us to be of service during your recent visit to Anaheim. We do appreciate your business and I am so glad you were able to enjoy our many complimentary amenities we have to offer at the Candy Cane. We are so glad you will stay with us again and please feel free to contact me personally when your family is returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: This hotel met and exceeded our expectations!  We were happy with the cost and did not expect much.  Yet, we were so happy with the staff here and the room was clean and spacious.  We had plenty of room for myself, my husband and my four-year- old son.  We spent the week going back and forth to Disney.  This hotel is about a ten minute walk to the parks, so that was what we usually did.  On the days when we were totally exhausted, we waited for the free shuttle bus provided by the hotel.  It was always on time and the drivers were courteous.  This hotel was perfect.  The grounds are well manicured and the hotel is well maintained.  It's so close to Disney but yet we felt it was secluded enough to give us the quiet we needed at the end of a long day.  The continental breakfast
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and I am happy that you enjoyed the Candy Cane Inn and all the complimentary amenities we have to offer. We appreciate your kind comments and it is our pleasure to provide our guests with excellent customer service. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as I would be delighted to assist with future reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: We chose the Candy Cane Inn based on the reviews on Trip advisor, and we're not disappointed. We stayed from April 6th until April 20th, (Australian school holidays) with our 14 & 15 year old teens on our first trip to the USA. Surprisingly, despite the busy Easter & Spring Break crowds in Anaheim, the Candy Cane was a welcome retreat. It is very quiet and private and so well cared for and maintained. The staff are very accommodating & friendly, and seem to take personal pride in the appearance and presentation of the premises. The free continental breakfast was a great way to start the day, with everything from fresh fruit, bagels, cereals, eggs, yoghurts, donuts as well as coffee, juices and hot chocolate.  The deluxe room was great, slightly larger than the standard size, and
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for staying with us and sharing your wonderful comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. Our team does an outstanding job in maintain our property and I sincerely appreciate the friendliness they possess and extend to our guests! Please feel free to contact me personally should you be returning as I would be delighted to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: We had a wonderful time and would absolutely recommend the Candy Cane Inn. It's extremely close to DisneyLand and we walked most days as it only took 6-8 mins to get to the bag check area. At the end of the day we took the free shuttle back if anyone was a bit tired.  The room was great and facilities like the pool etc we're excellent. Also the staff were charming and very helpful. A special mention for the free continental breakfast which was wonderful - we ate it every morning sitting by the pool.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and we appreciate your kind comments regarding our property, staff and services. We continue to enhance our Expanded Continental Breakfast and thank you for the “special mention” as the ladies do a wonderful job and they deserve kudos! Kind regards.

Summary: Based on good reviews we booked Candy Cane Inn for our trip to Disneyland. It's an easy walk to the park tho they offer FREE shuttle. Note the free in that statement. They also have free wireless and parking. These are things the big hotels charge for. Everyone is incredibly friendly and the rooms are clean and spacious (we had premium room). Breakfast is standard continental fare but nicely laid out and you can stock snacks for Disneyland, which is spendy for food. Pool is small but very clean. Hot tub is merely warm but pretty typical for a hotel. It's pretty quiet in the room. Bathrooms are small and a bit dated but overall it's so much nicer to stay in a mellow friendly place then a soul-sucking corporate hotel. Disneyland is hugely expensive so it was nice to not get nickel
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and we too feel that being a family and budget minded property we refrain from the charging for the following items; Our Expanded Continental Breakfast, Parking, WiFi, Our Exclusive Shuttle to the theme park and we have no Resort or Convenience Fees either. Kind regards!

Summary: Had a great stay. Hotel was perfect location to Disney and Angels stadium. We were able to see fireworks right from our room and the continental breakfast each day was a perfect way to start the morning. Our only complaint was the pool was small and crowded at night but it was still nice.  Beds were very comfy and room clean. We will stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us to be of service during your recent visit to Anaheim. We do appreciate your business and yes our location is most convenient to the many wonderful things to do in southern California. Please feel free to contact me when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: Candy Cane Inn is only a five to ten minute walk from Disneyland's main gates and Downtown Disney. It is also within easy walking distance of Anaheim Garden Walk mall where there are further dining options. Visually it is one of the nicest hotels in the area.   The hotel's breakfast has a lot of good options like muffins and boiled eggs.  The staff were good and helpful in booking onward transport. Probably the only down point was our room not being cleaned one day but we raised this during our stay so no further dramas.  The gentleman who comes by the breakfast area with the Tinkerbell toy ('Just a touch of pixie dust and we'll be on our way!') makes it all a good laugh.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us and I am delighted that you enjoyed Edd, our Hotel Historian as he is a kind gentleman and has been with us just shy of 30 years. Thank you for answering my email and providing me with your travel information to research the lack of service and again, I sincerely apologize for this occurrence. Kind regards!

Summary: You could throw a rock and it would land in Disneyland and it's called the Candy Cane Inn. I was coming to the area on business and was worried the hotel might be too family friendly for this specific visit...I'm glad I booked it.  The property is clean and lovingly maintained. The location is central to everything. I came for a convention and traffic was a nightmare; I left my car at the hotel and walked. I had an upgraded room at the back of the property--clean and quiet and they brought me a basket of breakfast, including fresh fruit they added since I didn't order any!  The staff are warm and courteous and quick to lend a hand or provide info about the area, including shortcuts.  The Candy Cane is my new go-to hotel in Anaheim!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your many kind comments regarding our property, and exceptional guest service. We are glad you enjoyed the many amenities our Premium rooms have to offer including the complimentary breakfast delivery. We have a wonderful team who take pride in their jobs and taking care of our guests and they too appreciate when folks take the time to write positive comments such as yours. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: We stayed at the candy cane for the fourth time and it has never disappointed. Every thing about this hotel is spectacular. The grounds are maintained perfectly and remind me of a tropical location.  It will be a shame if this place ever sells out to the overpriced Disney land.  For those who have not stayed here, you will not find a more reasonably priced, close location to Disneyland that never fails to impress.  I cannot say enough positive about this property and its staff.  We are from Utah an have stayed at numerous surrounding good neighbor hotels (except for Disney properties) and this is the only place we will stay and recommend to everyone.
Manager Response: Thank you for being a loyal, repeat guest of the Candy Cane Inn and thank you for your many kind comments about our property, services and our team. They truly do take pride in their work and providing exceptional service to all of our guests. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with reservations. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Nice place - super close to Disneyland
Summary: This a great hotel.  Very-well cared for and could not be any closer to the local attractions.  The rooms are average to small for two queen beds (probably a little soft for my taste), but they are clean and comfortable.  The staff is very helpful and the breakfast is your standard, but you get to sit outside in the nice weather!  The pool is not-so heated but functioned very well for my family.  I did not take advantage of the shuttle service except once, and it was prompt and helpful.  Restaurants are very close with lots of options for selection and price.  This is a great hotel selection for the area and the price for our group couldn't be beat.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your many kind comments regarding our property and guest service. We are glad you enjoyed the many complimentary amenities we have to offer including our breakfast, great donuts and our free exclusive shuttle to the parks. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: I have stayed at the Candy Cane Inn about 3-4 times a year for the last three or four years.  The rooms are clean and pretty quiet (although I travel with a white noise app for times when I'm near the front of the property because of the shuttle (which is great when you're tired) and people walking past the room.  The people who work there are pretty friendly, although a few of the regular front desk people seem a little detached and almost feel like they're doing you a favor by giving you a room.  The continental breakfast is apples, oranges, bagels, donuts and danishes, bread, yogurt, cereals, and various drinks.  Parking is free, although the spaces can feel a little tight if your vehicle is a little wider than average.  I like this place because it is clean, close to
Manager Response: Thank you so much for being a repeat member of the Candy Cane Inn family. We appreciate your business and kind comments regarding our property and team of service professionals. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: We stayed at the Candy Cane Inn in March 2014 again (I think we've stayed there 4+ times now). 2 adults, 2 teens. It did not disappoint! It's always clean, always friendly, always priced right! We love this place. Short 15-20 minute drive to Huntington Beach, 5-10 minute drive to Knotts Berry Farm, walking distance to Disneyland, Downtown Disney & many restaurants. We wouldn't stay anywhere else! Thank you Candy Cane Inn!!!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for being repeat guests and I am so happy that you enjoyed your most recent visit with us. We appreciate your kind comments and it is our pleasure to provide our guests with excellent customer service. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would by my pleasure to assist with future reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: We have stayed here so many times in the last 15 years I have lost count! Wonderful breakfast and wonderful staff. We are staying again at the end of this month and I can not wait! I had the misfortune of breaking my foot and I will be in a cast while I am there, but the shuttle will be such a HUGE connivence. We always have to get our Disney fix and this place is the best to come back to. Clean rooms, comfy beds, and the quiet space make it such an amazing inn. The flowers all around the property make you feel as if this is a secret gem only you and a handful of others know about.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for being a repeat member of the Candy Cane Inn family. We appreciate your business and kind comments regarding our property. Sorry to hear about your foot but glad the shuttle will be of extra assistance. Please feel free to contact me to see if there is anything I can do to make your stay more enjoyable. Kind regards!

Summary: 10 min walk to park. Great breakfast and free parking!  Major pros. Cons the sheets a little thin and beds not comfy.  But we wanted a close place for one night and it fit the bill.  Staff very nice.  Front desk easy check in and check out.  Place was full (spring break)
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and we certainly appreciate your kind comments. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with reservations. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Great location, staff and beautiful grounds
Summary: This was our first time staying at the Candy Cane Inn.  The grounds were beautiful and the proximity to Disneyland was perfect.  Just a ten minute walk to the entrance or take the shuttle ride and you are there in 5.  The breakfast was wonderful and the staff was very friendly and helpful.  I really liked that they had a safe in the room and also that they were willing to store our luggage on the day we checked out so that we could spend the rest of the day at Disneyland and didn't have to leave until many hours after check out time.  The beds were comfortable and the rooms were very clean.  The hot tub and pool were warm and clean.  The pool is small but nice. The only thing that I would recommend is to request a room further back away from the street and hotel lobby.  I was
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and I am happy that you enjoyed the Candy Cane Inn and your first visit. We appreciate your kind comments and it is our pleasure to provide our guests with excellent customer service. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as I would be delighted to assist with future reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: This was my first stay at the Candy Cane Inn. This hotel came recommended by 2 different coworkers, so I decided to give it a try. My family had 2 connecting rooms, which was great for the kids to be able to go back and forth.  Our rooms were clean and perfectly adequate. There was a mini fridge by the bathroom sink. There was also a very spacious safe in the cabinet under the TV. The mattresses were very soft. That was great for me because I slept like a baby. My friend has some back issues, so she thought they were too soft for her.  The continental breakfast in the morning has the usual pastries, cereal, fruit, hard boiled eggs, etc. I don't know where they get their donuts, but I totally blew my diet on those!  This hotel is within walking distance of the entrance to
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your many kind comments regarding our property and guest service. We are glad you enjoyed the many complimentary amenities we have to offer including our breakfast, great donuts and our free exclusive shuttle to the parks. Summary: Having state here many times (see previous reviews from me) I must say I was a little disappointed this trip. We had 2 issues with maid service and 1 HUGE issue with maintenance/security. The second day there we had to call down to ask for soap:shampoo. Later that evening we realized they had taken 3 towels and not replaced any of them.  One evening we were in the hot tub and all of the sudden cold water started shooting out all over us. Apparently it closes at 11 and rather than TELL us they were closed, they turned on the cold water and then argued with me about how he handled it. I spoke to the front desk about it but never heard back. 1 HUGE positive aspect was Alejandra. She was the most friendly and cheerful person EVER. She brightened our mornings and made me glad to be
Manager Response: First and foremost I would like to sincerely apologize for the items you noted. I do thank you for your response to my email and phone conversation we had, and as we discussed we do listen to all guest comments and take them very seriously. Thank you for your kind comments about the rest of the property and Alejandra, as she and out entire team work hard, and they do appreciate kind comments such as yours. Thank you again for your business and we do look forward to seeing you again soon. Kind regards!

Summary: We were here 6 years ago and loved it then and were very happy to come back again. The Candy Cane Inn remains spotlessly clean and inviting, friendly and well priced. The breakfast is much improved from the last visit and we didn't mind it then. We really enjoyed Alejandra's smiling face each morning as she assisted everyone at breakfast. Had some trouble with the room's safe, but staff had a good alternative for us, so no issues. Beds were really comfy. Would definitely return.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for being a repeat member of the Candy Cane Inn family. We appreciate your business and kind comments regarding our property and team of service professionals. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with reservations. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Great place to stay for a Disney trip!
Summary: We were impressed with our modest but  clean & nice room, the breakfasts, free shuttle service to and from Disney parks (but a nice little walk, too!), the pool & hot tub & seeing the Disney fireworks from the hotel. Everything is clean and tidy. Highly recommend.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and I am happy that you enjoyed the Candy Cane Inn and all the complimentary amenities we have to offer. We appreciate your kind comments and it is our pleasure to provide our guests with excellent customer service.
