Summary: We will be returning to the Candy Cane Inn this August!  This will be our 3rd stay at this terrific Inn. We even passed up a 50% off at another local hotel which was won through a contest and would of been much cheaper. Our past visits have been great! The staff, location and room size have always been top notch. Looking forward to our stay...
Manager Response: Thank you so much for being a repeat member of the Candy Cane Inn family. We appreciate your business and kind comments and we do look forward to seeing you back with us again soon! Kind regards!

Summary: I just spent the last hour reading the positive reviews. Bringing my family to Disneyland next week for the first time. I look forward to the staff, the stay and the smiles this trip will bring. Candy Cane Inn should be one of the highlights.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your positive comments with fellow Tripadvisor travelers. We are glad you were able to make reservations with us and we look forward to seeing you next week. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: 1st trip to Disneyland + Candy Cane Inn = SUCCESS!!
Summary: We returned last week from our first family trip to Disneyland.  My wife, son (9), and daughter (4) had never been.  I had been a few times growing up and my family always stayed at the Candy Cane Inn.  Let me preface my review by mentioning my "special request".  Being the fam's first time, I wanted to make it extra special.  In the "Special requests" section of my reservation form, I asked if we could have a room on the second floor that faced the fireworks {Sunday night only :(}.  Not only did they accommodate my request with no questions asked, but upon entering our room on our arrival day, we noticed a little care package of cookies, a welcoming card, a stuffed teddy bear and a stuffed Mickey Mouse. What a great way to start our adventure!!  The kids couldn't have been
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your many kind comments regarding our property, service and amenities. We have a wonderful team, including Edd, who take pride in their jobs and taking care of our guests and they too appreciate when folks take the time to write positive comments such as yours. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would by my pleasure to assist with future reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: We have been coming to Candy Cane Inn almost every year for 10 years and it remains the best hotel in Anaheim. The landscape of the hotel can't be beat, as soon as you walk onto the property it feels like a garden oasis away from the hustle and bustle of Disney. The staff are fantastic at helping in any way they can. Breakfast is great, we are early risers and really appreciate the earlier breakfast time at 6:30. It's a short, very pleasant walk to Disney which makes it easy to return for a quick lunch and pool visit before returning to the parks. Can't wait till our next visit, hope to be back sooner rather then later!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for being a repeat member of the Candy Cane Inn family. We appreciate your business and kind comments regarding our property and team of service professionals. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: After reading the reviews, I gave this hotel a try and found it to be less than expected. It took too long to check in, but the staff was nice. I got the premium room, but found little about it to be premium. The furnishings looked to be out of the 60's, the fridge was too small, and the microwave was placed at foot level so I had to practically lie down to use it. When my daughter flushed the toilet, it wouldn't stop running so I had to get dirty to fix it. The breakfast in the room was really nice, as was the late check out. But although the shuttle service was fine and timely most of the time, it was late when I left Disneyland at 11:45 P.M. in the rain on my final night of my stay. When I called to complain, I was told it had already been there, but other guests waiting
Manager Response: First and foremost I would like to sincerely apologize for the items you noted. I do thank you for your response to my email I sent you and as I stated before we do listen to all comments and while we never want to disappoint our guests, we do value these opportunities to continue to train and grow our guest service. Thank you again for your business and kind regards!

Summary: Stayed here for our last adult Disney vacation.   Great spot to get to Disney. Close enough so we never had to take the bus, we just walked in and out.  This is an older property, but it in kept in absolutely great condition. And yes, the air conditioning worked very well.   Breakfast very crowded, but hey.. it's by Disney. Coffee & fruit excellent. It is a welcoming little oasis at the end of a busy Disney day or evening.   We will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and we certainly appreciate your kind comments and are delighted that you would stay with us again in the future. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: We chose this motel based on this web site's recommendations and we are glad we did.  The free shuttle to Disneyland every half hour was a key for us.  They departed on time and picked us up on time and the drivers were very nice.  The ride takes about 5 minutes.    The rooms were nice and the beds comfortable.  The breakfast was plentiful and continually stocked; we never had to wait for an empty table.  You can eat inside or out by the pool.  The service is top notch as indicated by the fact that we left a couple of items in our rooms after we checked out and they put them in the mail the next day.  There is a mall nearby, within walking distance, that has several good restaurants.  Folks, this is a great value and the perfect place for a trip to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and I am happy that you enjoyed the Candy Cane Inn and all the complimentary amenities we have to offer. We appreciate your kind comments and it is our pleasure to provide our guests with excellent customer service. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as I would be delighted to assist with future reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: We have stayed here twice now and both times the service was excellent! The location is great, close but not too close. The breakfast is good and has something for everyone. The pool area is nice and never was overcrowded. The grounds are spotless and beautiful. The shuttle is nice and runs on time always. We would not think of staying anywhere else now that we have been spoiled by the Candy Cane Inn. Looking forward to our next trip!!!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for being a repeat member of the Candy Cane Inn family. We appreciate your business and kind comments regarding our property and team of service professionals. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: We've stayed here about every 2-3 years when we visit Disneyland. We are never disappointed! Continental breakfast has a variety of items and enough to more than fill us up before heading to the park.  Housekeeping is great, room is clean and comfortable and any issues are quickly resolved. Our tub drained slowly, told the front desk and by the time we returned from the park it was fixed. As you have read previous reviews this is definitely the place to stay while in Anaheim. A big shout out to Michael for his excellent and gracious service at the front desk.
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us the opportunity on your recent visit to the Theme Parks, we appreciate your business and kind comments. We take great pride in our hotel and our wonderful staff, including Michael and we thank you for recognizing this. I do apologize for the issue with your tub but I am glad we were able to resolve it in a timely and efficient manner. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: The reviews appear accurate for this independent hotel.  This is a conveniently located hotel, close to Disneyland, with breakfast included and a bus to transit back and forth. A small pool and hot tubs are also available for refreshing times between Disney visits.  They are the essentials, given that you likely won't be at the hotel much.  The hotel room is starting to appear dated - with loud (and old) air conditioners.  Not a modern hotel by any standard, and beds a little 'soft', but after all the walking at Disneyland, sleep is easy to come by.  Service is excellent and surrounds of hotel kept perfectly updated.  So, value for money is excellent.
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us the opportunity on your recent visit and I am pleased that you concurred that our TripAdvisor reviews were right on the money. We do aspire to deliver a quality product and exceptional friendly service to each and every guest that stays with us. We look forward to having you stay with us again. Kind regards!

Summary: Stayed here first week of March. Haven't stayed at the hotel since 2001. Hotel is so clean with great staff we weren't disappointed. It seems like all the staff members have worked there long term, so that says a lot for the hotel as well to us.The complimentary shuttle makes long days at Disney no big deal. We stayed at the Disneyland Hotel last year and I think as far as cleanliness, convenience, and most of all cost we would totally stay at Candy Cane again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for being a repeat member of the Candy Cane Inn family. We appreciate your business and kind comments regarding our property and team of service professionals. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with reservations. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: We loved it and will be back.
Summary: After a very long flight it was great to arrive at a hotel with friendly, helpful staff and which is what it says it is. We were in Anaheim for a visit to Disneyland and the location was amazing. Five minutes walk to the entrance! Breakfast was better than imagined (although coffee is very weak but I've found that this is the case generally in the States). A lot of food places nearby, and a 7/11 and ABC mart next door.Good healthy choices. If Disneyland is on our travel agenda in the future I wouldn't  look anywhere else. Staying here was a great start to our US trip.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and I am happy that you enjoyed the Candy Cane Inn and all the complimentary amenities we have to offer. We appreciate your kind comments and it is our pleasure to provide our guests with excellent customer service. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as I would be delighted to assist with future reservations. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Perfect place for a family vacation to Disneyland
Summary: I chose the Candy Cane Inn based on the other reviews listed here on Trip Advisor.  Despite my fear that this place was too good to be true it was everything and more than the many fans and positive reviews state.  We took our family and booked 3 rooms.  All of us had the same positive experience and opinion of this wonderful place.  Amazingly we found it to be a serene oasis somehow placed directly behind CA. Adventure.  The landscaping is lovely and gives a beautiful escape from the frenzy of the amusement parks.  The rooms were quiet, clean and comfortable.  The staff were friendly and Nick was especially helpful. The breakfast and the pool were perfect additions and made our stay wonderful.  We will be keeping this little gem in our resources for future trips to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us the opportunity on your recent visit and I am pleased that you concurred that our Trip Advisor reviews were right on the money. Nick and the rest of our team members do aspire to deliver a quality product and exceptional friendly service to each and every guest that stays with us. We look forward to having you stay with us again and please feel free to contact me personally when returning as I would be delighted to assist with reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: Just finished a spring break trip to Disneyland, we did the same trip in 2013 and walked past the Candy Cane Inn every day just viewing the grounds from the sidewalk made us decide to try it this year, so glad we did!! Everything about this stay was fantastic, my wife had questions before we came and Michael was pleasant and helpful in making sure we were accommodated. The rooms we had were comfortable and clean, the beds were very comfortable, breakfast was great, front desk staff were always ready to make sure we were taken care of. The shuttle to Disneyland was convenient and the drivers always friendly and pleasant, when the driver was on lunch Erika stepped in and drove us all back to Disneyland so as not to miss a shuttle shift. Everyone on this staff did an outstanding
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us and we are so happy that your stay was fantastic! We have a wonderful team, including Erika and Michael, who take pride in their jobs and taking care of our guests and they too appreciate when folks take the time to write positive comments such as yours. We do look forward to seeing you again soon and please feel free to contact me personally when returning as I would be delighted to assist with reservations. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Very nice hotel, walking distance from Disney, breakfast
Summary: Candy Cane Inn, despite the odd name as other than candy cane pens and complimentary candy canes at the front desk there is no other reference, is a great family hotel.  Large, clean rooms.  Big bathrooms with sinks outside the shower/toliet area.  Mini fridge and safe in the room.  Free parking.  Nice but small outdoor pool and hot tub.  Fitness center with 2 treadmills, a bike and a weight machine.  Shuttle to Disney but the walk is super quick.  Breakfast is nice with tables around the pool.  Cold cereal, instant oatmeal, fresh fruit, lots of baked goods, hard boiled eggs, yogurt.    Check in/out was quick, friendly and efficient.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and I am happy that you enjoyed the Candy Cane Inn and all the complimentary amenities we have to offer. We appreciate your kind comments and it is our pleasure to provide our guests with excellent customer service. Please feel free to contact me personally when your family is returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with reservations, as well as discussing what our team can do to bring your next review up to a five. Kind regards!

Summary: Wonderful service from all staff! Loved the hardy and filling breakfast to start our day. Bus drivers were super friendly and helpful! Will definitely be staying here again and I tell people all the time how good it was! The only downside was our room smelt a bit musty but overall we enjoyed ourselves. Thank you for the hospitality.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your positive comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. We look forward to seeing you again and please feel free to contact me personally when your family is returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: I took my daughter to Disneyland for her birthday and after reading reviews I decided to stay Candy Cane Inn.  It was a wonderful, charming Inn within walking distance of Disneyland.  The hotel grounds were impeccable.  The room we had was super clean and very quiet.  The staff was wonderful to work with.  I made reservations online and had several email correspondances with them before we arrived and the staff was quick with answers and made every effort to meet our needs.  They even had cookies waiting for us in the room when we got there for my daughters birthday.  The breakfast had a great selection including lots of protein options, not just sugar ladened pastries you find in lots hotels.  The walk to the park was not that bad, you walk much farther at Disney World in
Manager Response: Thank you so much for allowing us to be of service on your recent visit to the theme parks. I am so glad our staff was accommodating and that your daughter enjoyed her birthday cookies and card. We DO appreciate your business and kind comments regarding our amenities and service. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with future reservations. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: What a great place to stay!
Summary: I'd made three previous trips to Disneyland over 37 years, and each time I'd think, why am I not staying at the Candy Cane Inn? Well, I finally did it, and I couldn't have had a nicer experience. The hotel itself is so beautifully landscaped and maintained. The staff is top notch, always ready to help. The room was beautifully decorated, immaculate, the bed was not too hard (this is very important). We enjoyed the pool and hot tub each day of our stay. The free breakfast is really nice, and for those of you who are not into fresh bagels and pastries, they have fruit, oatmeal, cereals, yogurt, hardboiled eggs and cheese. My room was right up by the boulevard, and the only noise I heard was traffic helicopters early in the AM, so I ran the fan the next night. Problem solved. And
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us and sharing your comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. We do believe in providing a quality product and exceptional guest service, while being mindful of our family and budget minded guests. I do sincerely apologize for the noise, as Disney was doing some operational work which necessitated some helicopter drops to maneuver equipment and such. Unfortunately Disney did not inform us of the scheduled work till late the evening prior which gave us no time to inform our guests of the inconvenience. I again thank you for staying with us and please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with future reservations. Kind regards.

Summary Heading: Very Happy with Our Stay at Candy Cane!
Summary: We spent the 2nd week of March 2014 at Candy Cane, and had an exceptional stay here.  The staff were so friendly, welcoming, and accommodating.  The morning breakfast was a perfect healthy start to busy days, and the cozy beds were a comfortable way to end them.  We stayed in a premium room, and the extra space was nice, but not necessary, as we were only in the room to sleep.  The pool and hottub were clean.  The location to Disneyland is perfect, a ten minute walk OR hop on the free shuttle which leaves every half hour.  We will definitely stay here again:)
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and I am happy that you enjoyed the Candy Cane Inn and all the complimentary amenities we have to offer. We appreciate your kind comments and it is our pleasure to provide our guests with excellent customer service. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as I would be delighted to assist with future reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: Well, here is to hoping a room becomes available for the 24th to the 29th of March. We stay at the Candy Cane every year! We are disappointed that the hotel has been SOLD OUT for the past month. Had we known that, I would have booked this several months ago. Rooms are very nice, as well as the beds. Never a bad night at the Candy Cane!. I'm told we are still on the "waiting list" and hopefully we will get a call with enough advance time to cancel our reservation at another local hotel that I have never been to. We have ALWAYS been treated well at the CC and with a little luck, we will continue our yearly tradition and be able to stay again this trip.  "hint" (Johnson's from Oregon)
Manager Response: Thank you so much for speaking with me and I am glad I was able to assist in accommodating your room reservations based on some cancelations we had during the dates you requested. We appreciate you folks being a loyal part of the Candy Cane Inn family and I look forward to seeing you on Monday the 24th! Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Only review to read! Glad I listened to reviews BEST Disneyland hotel
Summary: Ok we just stayed mon night the 10-11th for our twins 5th bday for a quick trip to Disneyland. Boy do i wish we could have stayed longer. I do my research on everything I'm also a clean freak so very picky. We have stayed in Disney grand, sheraton, embassy, Homewood, and may other hotels for a disney trip this by far is the only hotel we will stay at ever again when we come to Anaheim. Erica at front desk was extremely nice and helpful which is nice after a long car drive and 3hrs of traffic, our room was perfect 2nd floor faced the pool 265 i think -beds/ pillows are comfy we feel right asleep  -our room was quite we never heard any people coming back from the park at night -we used the pool and hot tub both were great and they play music out side its nice after a long day
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us and for being so understanding with our pesky printers! We have a wonderful team, including Erika, who take pride in their jobs and taking care of our guests and they too appreciate when folks take the time to write positive comments such as yours. We do look forward to seeing you again soon and please feel free to contact me personally when returning as I would be delighted to assist with reservations. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Just a nice place to stay!
Summary: There's nothing fancy about the Candy Cane Inn. But they always come through on the really important things when traveling for business or pleasure. The staff is friendly and responsive. They seek out ways to make your stay more pleasant. The area is surprisingly quiet even though it's so close to Disneyland and major avenues. The housekeeping staff keeps the rooms, pool area, laundry facilities and breakfast facilities clean and tidy. The room rates are reasonable and affordable for families and business travelers with convenient parking. My co-workers and I reserve our rooms well in advance because it's just a downright nice place to stay and popular! I highly recommend the Candy Cane Inn.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for being a repeat member of the Candy Cane Inn family. We appreciate your business and kind comments regarding our property and team of service professionals. We look forward to seeing you again soon and please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: The hotel is clean and comfortable, but noisy due to the building materials (or lack thereof).  We could hear people talking in normal voices right outside our room.  The motel features a breakfast which is just pastries, etc.  The rooms are comfortable but not outstanding- correctly priced given the location.  And it's all about location as the motel backs up to California Adventure.  You can easily walk to the park entrance in under 10 minutes which is great because you can skip the shuttle bus.  If you are on a budget and just want a great location, this is the place for you.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your comments with other Tripadvisor travelers. I am happy that you enjoyed our close location and comfortable rooms. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as I would be delighted to assist with reservations. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Yes, It Is As Good As Everyone Says
Summary: We always stay at a Disney resort at Disney World. Here, just about five minute more walk to parks than the Disney hotels, much more inexpensive- and just as nice, just no mouse. A much longer walk to see an Angels Game, but doable. The Candy Cane Inn isn't terribly fancy, but clean and comfortable. A wonderful value hotel for your Disneyland visit.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us and sharing your comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. We do believe in providing a quality product and exceptional guest service, while being mindful of our family and budget minded guests. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as I would be delighted to assist with reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: Our family last stayed here in 2007.  In 2007, we could find little fault in the Candy Cane Inn.    In 2014 we stayed here for six nights over the President's Day weekend.  This hotel attracts budget conscious families who genuinely appreciate the breakfast included with the room rental.  We had a superior room that was a bit crowded with a cot - but the cleaning staff were good to make up the cot and turn it upright to create more floor space.  Staff at the front desk are helpful and obliging.    Breakfast was simple, but filling enough.  Cold cereal included fruit loops, raisin bran and granola (on all but the last morning).  Bread and bagels for toasting and the usual donuts and danishes were available.  Protein included cubes of cheddar cheese, cold boiled eggs, peach and
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your Tripadvisor review and for speaking with me directly over the phone. As we discussed, we do appreciate guest feedback and all guest comments are very important to us here at the Candy Cane Inn. I am glad we were able to talk about our package delivery system and our hotels proper procedures and I do thank you for your understanding and kind comments about our other services and amenities. We do look forward to seeing you again and please don’t hesitate to call for assistance with new reservations! Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Clean and Friendly Staff - Close to Disneyland!
Summary: We checked in around 5pm. The staff were very helpful and informative. We stayed in a double room (2 queens), which was clean and comfortable. The hotel is only a couple blocks from Disneyland - so we walked there and back every day. Kids enjoyed the pool. Breakfast was plentiful.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your positive comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. We look forward to seeing you again and please feel free to contact me personally when your family is returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with reservations, as well as discussing what our team can do to bring your next review up to a five. Kind regards!

Summary: Just got back from staying four nights at the Candy Cane Inn. Just as my review before it was a wonderful stay. Rooms and grounds are clean, staff are friendly, beds are comfortable, it is reasonably priced, and its location is very convenient. I'd also like to mention that I had a few questions before my arrival and wrote an email looking for answers. My email was responded to within hrs instead of days like most other places. I also called to change my days and it was taken care of in minutes, very little waiting. I appreciate quick service. Only complaint I had with anything was the "do not disturb sign" wouldn't stay on the door. It was a little windy and i saw several lying on the ground around rooms and we would hear ours fall off and would have to go put it back on. A
Manager Response: Thank you so much for being a repeat member of the Candy Cane Inn family. We appreciate your business and kind comments regarding our property and team of service professionals. I do apologize for the inconvenience of our do not disturb signs, and I will personally look into making the proper changes, as we DO listen to all guest comments, in order to better enhance our guest service. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with reservations. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Could Not Possibly Have Been Better
Summary: We returned to Anaheim and based on our excellent experience with Candy Cane Inn on our previous visit, we again stayed there.  And again it was excellent!  The rooms was, per our request, the same room we had last time and as last time the room was clean and comfortable.  Housekeeping does a very good job keeping things very clean -- from rooms to the property exterior and even the laundry room.  I didn't mention it last time, but there is at least one laundry room and we used it a lot.  However, if you use the laundry room we did halfway down on the right, avoid the top right dryer.  It does not generate enough heat.  The breakfast is good, but due to size constraints it can be a bit crowded to maneuver.  WiFi works exceptionally well and the Disney shuttle is easy to use and
Manager Response: Thank you for being repeat guests and I am happy that you enjoyed the Candy Cane Inn and your second visit with us. We have a wonderful team, including James, who take pride in their jobs and taking care of our guests and they too appreciate when folks take the time to write positive comments such as yours. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would by my pleasure to assist with future reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: Going to stay at Candy Cane Inn next month.Erica was so nice and helpfull on reservation! Cant wait maybe ill upgrade my room! I hear good things about premium rooms! Disney resorts almost sold me but the reviews where awesome on this hotel,see u soon!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your positive comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. We are glad you were able to make reservations with us and we look forward to seeing you soon. Please feel free to contact me personally as it would by my pleasure to assist with changing your reservation to our Premium room if you decide to upgrade. Kind regards!

Summary: Our son treated my husband and me to  3 nights at the Candy Cane Inn for our birthdays.  We were greeted by the staff with smiles and big welcomes.  When we got to our room there were cookies and cards waiting for us.  We purchased our tickets to Disneyland at the hotel and enjoyed fresh fruit throughout the day while staying there.  It is a very comfortable place to stay and the convenience to Disneyland and surrounding places to eat is very nice.  We would definitely stay there again on our next visit and would highly recommend it to any friends visiting the area.  The rooms were very clean, large and the breakfasts were great!!  Thank you for a wonderful time.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and I am happy that you enjoyed the Candy Cane Inn and all the complimentary amenities we have to offer. We appreciate your kind comments and it is our pleasure to provide our guests with excellent customer service. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as I would be delighted to assist with future reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: Great little spot within 10 min from the parks. Quiet in the back and premium gets you breakfast delivered to your room. Order a bit early since they are usually running behind. We did lose power one night but the staff was very quick to resolve. Stayed twice and will go back.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and providing your valuable feedback. Based on your comments, as well as other guest’s regarding our breakfast delivery, we have made some modifications and changes in personnel with improved and positive results. We do listen to all comments, as we are continuously striving to provide service with the 5 star quality our guests have come to expect from us. Thank you again for staying with us and please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would by my pleasure to assist with reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: For the record, whenever we're heading to Disneyland (a few times a year), the first place we check is the Candy Cane.  I remember staying there with my parents in the late 70's, so I'm sure I have some attachment to the place.  Having said that, in the years following, we've stayed at a lot of other hotels in the Anaheim area.    We still come back to the Candy Cane.  Here's a few reasons:  * It's locally owned.  We're glad that we can help a local business survive.  The staff have never been anything but great.  * Continental breakfast.  It's great being able to grab a quick cup of coffee & muffin or pastry in the morning. (Tip: Use the tray underneath the coffee maker to carry stuff back to your room.)  * Free shuttle.  A lot of the hotels in the area have shuttle service,
Manager Response: Thank you for being a loyal and repeat guest and for taking the time to share your experience with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. We have a wonderful team, who take pride in their jobs and taking care of our guests and they too appreciate when folks take the time to write positive comments such as yours. We look forward to seeing you again soon and please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would by my pleasure to assist with reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: I have stayed at 15 different locations in the Disneyland area since 1972. I must say the Candy Cane Inn is WONDERFUL. This was the first time I had stayed here because I usually like to be across the street...but we were only about an 8 minute walk to the entrance. Here's what I liked about the Candy Cane...Friendly Staff, nice rooms, nice pool. I think the Continental breakfast is better than any I've stayed at. There is a lot of variety...fruit, muffins, donuts, yogurt, hard boiled eggs, cheese, cereals and a variety of breads and bagels to toast. There's coffee, juice and cocoa. Absolutely all a family needs. I also LOVE the fact there's some music playing at the pool. Not too loud...just right. The rooms aren't huge, but enough room...and the housekeeping staff keeps them
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your positive comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. We are glad you were able to enjoy your stay and the many complimentary amenities we have to offer at our property. I have sent you an email through TripAdvisor, and I do look forward to speaking to you personally. Kind regards!

Summary: We stay here every time we go to Disneyland which has been a lot lately!! Every time has been a wonderful experience! The rooms are great and ALWAYS really clean. The beds are the most comfortable beds we have ever slept in when in a hotel. We love the fact that they have breakfast in the mornings too it makes it very convenient. Sometime we want to try out the premium room and have breakfast brought to us which would be even easier!! We love taking advantage of the shuttle even though it is so close you can walk! We have even missed the last shuttle due to watching the world of color before and they sent the bus to come get us!! The customer service is outstanding. We tell everyone we know if you are going to disney you can't beat the candy cane inn!! We will be going again in
Manager Response: Thank you so much for being a repeat member of the Candy Cane Inn family. We appreciate your business and kind comments regarding our property and team of service professionals. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with reservations for a Premium room. Kind regards!

Summary: This hotel is really lovely. It is simple & understated, super clean, well staffed and affordable! It is set back far enough from the road and feels intimate from the bustle of the Disney crowds. Being walking distance from Disney is a huge plus, although they do have a free shuttle as well! They have a really fantastic breakfast buffet around the pool area set away from the road - it is relaxed and well stocked.   We look forward to going back again!!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and I am happy that you enjoyed the Candy Cane Inn and all the complimentary amenities we have to offer. We appreciate your kind comments and it is our pleasure to provide our guests with excellent customer service. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as I would be delighted to assist with future reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: We have stayed at the Candy Cane on countless occasions.  Sometimes just us and sometimes others joining us and have always enjoyed it.  We started when our kids were in diapers and now they are grown men..   On the few occasions we have stayed elsewhere I almost had a revolt in my family.  The rooms are comfy, not luxurious, and have fridge and other amenities.  It is close enough to walk, but the shuttle is great and readily available.  It is always clean and comfortable and the staff courteous...although that has been the one weak spot of late.  The pool is great and the breakfast good and plenty for us.  I love this spot and it will always be in the top picks when we go to Disney, which is often.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for being a repeat member of the Candy Cane Inn family. We appreciate your business and kind comments regarding our property and team of service professionals. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: We have been staying at this location for years and wouldn't stay anywhere else! We have always had great service from the staff who are ever helpful and friendly. The location is perfect and the shuttle greatly appreciated after a long day at Disneyland.the free breakfast is also nice  with a good variety of food to choose from. The laundry room is also appreciated and we have needed to use on occasion.
Manager Response: Thank you for being a loyal guest and sharing your positive comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. I am so glad that you enjoyed your visit as we DO appreciate your business. We look forward to seeing you again and please feel free to contact me personally when your family is returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: We had a wonderful 4 night stay. The rooms are small and slightly dated but that is easily outweighed by the cleanliness of the rooms, the friendly staff, the great free breakfast, the close proximity to shopping and dining, and of course the close walk or free shuttle to Disneyland and California Adventure!!! We will stay here again!!!!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and I am delighted that you found our Inn a “great little gem”.  I too am proud of our team of service professionals and it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations on your next visit. Kind regards!

Summary: We stayed here for 2 nights, it was an easy 10 minute walk to Disney or their free shuttle ran every 30 minutes. The room was nice and clean, the free breakfast was great, ate out by the pool.  The staff was very friendly and they held our luggage all day while we went to Disneyland. The atmosphere was nice and great decor.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for allowing us to be of service on your recent visit to the theme parks. We DO appreciate your business and the feedback provided allows us to adjust our operations accordingly. Kind regards!

Summary: We chose the Candy Cane Inn based on reviews from this site.  Great choice!  The motel is dated, but our room was clean.  Employees were very friendly and helpful.  Location was great, only a 7 minute walk to the Disneyland entrance.  Breakfast was good for a continental breakfast, plenty to choose from.  Parking lot had very narrow spots making it difficult to get in and out of car.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us and we appreciate your feedback as this assists us in continuing to enhance our product and service. I am delighted to inform you that our owners are in the early planning stages of a complete guestroom remodel and we certainly listen to our guests. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as I would be delighted to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: There's a good reason this hotel is rated #1 on TripAdvisor. Here's just a few I noted during my stay 4 day stay: 1) The backside of the hotel is LITERALLY the backside of Radiator Springs.   2) Breakfast includes REAL hard boiled eggs and cubes of cheese. My gluten free friend could eat there every morning (most places use egg substitutes to make scrambled eggs). The fruit was also not only in great abundance, but were perfectly ripe. There were even unhealthy options like donuts. And to top it off you can eat in the lovely pool area with family friendly music playing.   3) there is a free shuttle to and from Disneyland every 30 minutes, but if you don't want to wait it's an easy 5-10 minute walk (depending on your speed).   4) The towels are thick and they're happy to give you
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us and sharing your comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. We do believe in providing quality products and exceptional guest service being mindful of our family and budget minded guests. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as I would be delighted to assist with reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: We stayed at the Candy Cane Inn a few years ago and it was a great experience.  We arrived a bit too early to check in but the staff gave us our parking pass so we could rest in the van while we waited for our room.  We loved the location - it's perfect for even a little one to walk over to the park - however the shuttle was great for when we were tired.  The free breakfast was simple (bagels, muffins, cereal) and the kids loved the hot chocolate.  It was enough to tide them over until we got to the park so that was a nice perk.  We experienced a problem with our toilet one day however the staff took care of it quickly. All in all, we look forward to another trip to the area and we'll continue to book at Candy Cane Inn!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and I am happy that you enjoyed the Candy Cane Inn and all the complimentary amenities we have to offer. We appreciate your kind comments and it is our pleasure to provide our guests with excellent customer service. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as I would be delighted to assist with rates and future reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: Stayed here for the last 2 nights (Sat/Sun President's Day weekend) with my family (2 adults, 2 kids ages 10 and 7) and here is the summary of our experience:  Pros: - Good Location.  Walked each day to Disney and back in 15mins.   - Free Parking.  Note however if you arrive before the check-out time of 11am then there may not be an open spot for you until others check-out.  If this happens, then you're on your own! - Free Breakfast.  Definitely not the best, but good enough to get you started without having to go out looking for something. If you get there during "rush hour" (7:30am-8:30am) expect not to get a table.  Menu includes cereals (3 kinds), coffee/tea, bagels/cream cheese, muffins, donuts, boiled eggs, bread, yogurts, bananas/apples, peanut butter, jelly, honey,
Manager Response: First and foremost I am sincerely sorry that you experienced a shortage of hot water as we have multiple boilers throughout the property and rarely an issue. In Anaheim we do have a high level of calcium and this can cause havoc as a piece will lodge itself in the cartridge of the valve and we must replace. I have discussed your concerns with our management team to ensure we provide caring and concern.  Kind regards.

Summary: After reading all these reviews, decided to give them a try. Only $5 more per night then Camelot, our other choice. Well worth it. Everything was great.... rooms, soundproofing, breakfast, pools, bus, personnel, grounds, location. I will be back every single time I go to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us the opportunity on your recent visit and I am pleased that you concurred that our Trip Advisor reviews were right on the money. We do aspire to deliver a quality product and exceptional friendly service to each and every guest that stays with us. We look forward to having you stay with us again and please feel free to contact me personally when returning as I would be delighted to assist with reservations. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: No booking site can find a better room
Summary: Immaculate comfortable rooms with free frig, parking, and wifi with a substantial continental breakfast. Location is superb for people who want to come and go to the parks with little effort. Ten minute walk (really) to inside the park is sometimes quicker than the every 30 minute shuttle that does save steps.  This is no resort. Clean cute pool and spa. Friendly staff. Best property for "park people."
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your kind comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. We appreciate your business and delighted that your experience was wonderful and you were able to enjoy our many amenities and clean hotel rooms. Kind regards!

Summary: I had yet another relaxing, and enjoyable, stay at the Candy Cane Inn for three nights last week.  The staff is so welcoming, they make me feel like family.  It is a joy for me to walk into the lobby each time and be greeted by James.  He is very kind, professional and a delight.  Jeff and Robert are always welcoming, Kim is such a sweetheart, always helpful, the drivers Fred and Robert are very kind also.  They help me when I have a hard time getting onto the bus.  The ladies in the breakfast room hug me when I see them, always ask about my daughter, then there is Edd, who is so sweet to the children and adults alike welcoming them with his pins and Tinkerbell doll collection.  The food is delicious, room is comfortable and clean, the pool is relaxing, and I enjoy reading out
Manager Response: Thank you for being a loyal, repeat guest of the Candy Cane Inn and thank you for your many kind comments about our property, services and our team. They truly do take pride in their work and providing exceptional service to all of our guests. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: This place is great!  We were celebrating my daughter's 23rd birthday at Disneyland and I was excited to be able to stay at the Candy Cane.  Most of our trips to Disneyland are impromptu and the Candy Cane is always sold out.  It is literally an oasis in the chaos of Anaheim. The grounds and pool area are beautiful. The staff is very friendly and helpful.  Jonathan from reservations was amazing!  He recommended a bakery to get a cake to surprise my daughter.  He had it delivered to our room with a container of milk waiting in the fridge!  The cake from Rossmoore Bakery was stunning and tasty!  The same bakery supplies the pastries for the breakfast every morning.  Even though the hotel is an easy walk to Disneyland, it was wonderful to be able to take the shuttle.  We never had
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and I am happy that you enjoyed the Candy Cane Inn and your visit. We have a wonderful team, including Jonathan, who take pride in their jobs and taking care of our guests and they too appreciate when folks take the time to write positive comments such as yours. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would by my pleasure to assist with future reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: 10 minute walk to Disney or 5 minutes by free shuttle.   Very friendly staff. Nice continental breakfast.    Rooms were good and clean.  2 stories with no elevator.   Pool and hot tub.    No restaurant but convenient to other eating places.  Did not need rental car because of shuttle bus and proximity to festaurants
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your kind comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. We appreciate your business and delighted that your experience was wonderful and you were able to enjoy our many amenities and clean hotel rooms. Kind regards!

Summary: This was our first time staying here. Loved it!!! Very clean, comfortable beds, great continental breakfast, beautiful landscaping, close to the parks. Excellent staff!!  Thank you so much and we will definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and I am happy that you enjoyed the Candy Cane Inn and your first visit. We appreciate your kind comments and it is our pleasure to provide our guests with excellent customer service. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as I would be delighted to assist with future reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: We had a really wonderful experience at the hotel. The room was very clean, the continental breakfast was plentiful, and the staff was very helpful.   The beds were very soft and comfortable and everything was just so clean! Sometimes, when you stay at a hotel, the bedspreads look like they've never been laundered, but this was not the case here. The bedspreads were very clean and smelled freshly laundered.  It's a short, 7 minute walk to the parks or they have a shuttle that leaves the hotel every half-hour if you don't want to walk. The hotel is actually right behind California Adventure.   During checkout, they were in the middle of upgrading their point-of-sale system and we were unfortunately double charged. They did a great job of communicating with me to get this issue
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your many kind comments regarding our property, service and amenities. I am thankful for our conversations we had and truly grateful for your understanding during our upgrades to our system!
