Summary Heading: This is the "only" place to stay
Summary: We have stayed at the Candy Cane several times.  It is always clean and the complimentary breakfast is awesome.  The location is wonderful and the shuttle is a great amenity.  I love that they always have coffee in the lobby.  The general manager Jeff & Front desk manager Robert were so gracious & made everything wonderful.  The entire staff is very friendly and accommodating.  The Candy Cane is the best!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your many kind comments regarding our property, service and amenities. We have a wonderful team, who take pride in their jobs and taking care of our guests and they too appreciate when folks take the time to write positive comments such as yours. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would by my pleasure to assist with future reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: We stayed in January, family of 4 with 2 other families. The location is perfect, literally 10 mins from Disney gates and the rooms are excellent. Clean, big and very comfortable for a family. Couldn't have asked for anything more. The complimentary breakfast is a lovely bonus. Free parking too! The shuttle is great as it's only for guests, we didn't use it as we preferred to walk but it's nice to have especially late at night. We will only stay at Candy Cane for future visits.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and we certainly appreciate your kind comments and are delighted that you would stay with us again in the future. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: We stayed here early December 2013 and could not have asked for a better place to stay! So close to Disneyland and their complementary shuttle was one of the main reasons we chose Candy Cane. The rooms are lovely and comfortable, with a functional bathroom and a handy bench area with mini fridge and microwave. We could watch the Disney fireworks from the walkway outside our room each night - we recommend staying on the upper floor if possible, with a view of the back of Cars land for fireworks viewing. Breakfast was pretty basic and they could really do some work around seating more people comfortably - when we were there the inside sitting area was full and we had to sit out by the pool in really cool temperatures. Toast does not staying very toasty warm when outside in that
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your positive comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. We are glad you enjoyed our complimentary amenities, especially our exclusive shuttle! Our owners feel very strongly about our complimentary amenities so you can rest assured our exclusive shuttles will continue to run! We hope to see you again soon and please feel free to contact me personally when your family is returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with reservations. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Convenient to disneyland and good value
Summary: This is a clean comfortable room with basic amenities.  The breakfast was a good quality, mostly continental except for hard boiled eggs.  More than adequate for us.  We walked to the park without difficulty but for less active guests there was a very nice looking bus in the parking lot.  This is a very good option for those wanting to stay around the park without breaking the bank.  We would definitely consider staying again on our trip.
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for staying with us and sharing your comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. We do aspire to provide the utmost of complimentary amenities while keeping in mind budget minded guests and families. Warm regards!

Summary: Decent and clean hotel at Disneyland doorsteps. As you will be needing a place, on a Disney trip just to crash in the night (or maybe a quick nap during the day) there cant be a better hotel than this. Clean rooms, friendly staff, free coffee all day and a breakfast with ample variety - is what this place boasts off. Don't expect porters around to take your stuff, travel light as you have to carry your own bags up the stairs if you are on the 1st floor as there are no elevators. We booked our Disney tickets with them thus avoiding the queues at the counter there. There is even a swimming pool if you want to soak in after a long day at Disneyland. Lots of eating options just outside and lots of souvenir shops too as it is in the same vicinity of Disneyland. All in all a great
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and I am happy that you enjoyed the Candy Cane Inn and your visit. We appreciate your kind comments and it is our pleasure to provide our guests with excellent customer service. In regards to a couple of your comments I wanted to inform you that we do have a houseman who is always willing to assist with any luggage you may have and with our upcoming renovations we are looking at adding an elevator on both sides of the property for guest convenience. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as I would be delighted to assist with future reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: What a pleasant change of pace.  We arrived late at night and our room was ready.  The gentlemen that checked us in offered to help with our bags.  Although the resort was almost at capacity there were plenty of parking spots.  The grounds are gorgeously maintained.  It brought a feeling of peace and relaxation.  Upon entering our room we were greeted with a bucket filled with fun snacks.  The room was clean and well maintained.  There was normal wear but very comfortable.  If you can swing it pay for the upgraded room.  The little extra touches like, robes, late check out, complimentary dvd rental and breakfast delivered to our room made all the difference.  With two young children it was so nice to not have to go get our breakfast .  Our 1 year old could roam around our room
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for allowing us the opportunity on your recent visit to our Inn. Jose who checked you in is our evening Manager on Duty and a wonderful gentleman with many years of guest service and we are happy he is a long time member of our team. Yes, our Premium Rooms with the additional amenities and services tend to be something once a guest tries will continue to utilize. I appreciate your comments regarding our drivers and our Exclusive Complimentary Shuttle to and from the theme parks. In closing, I would like to sincerely thank you for your comment about “every” member of our team being “so incredibly nice”. As a General Manager we all tend to think our team is without a doubt the best, however when it is delivered in a caring manner such as yours it warms your heart. Kind regards!

Summary: We stayed at the Candy Cane Inn last week and had a great time.  The service was very friendly and the front desk staff was great.  They put us in an amazing room where we could see the fireworks!  The kids loved the pool and the breakfast.  The breakfast had some nice healthier options as well as treats for the kids.  It was wonderful to sit around the pool and enjoy the sun and food!  Would recommend this hotel to anyone going to Disneyland.  Very easy 5 minute walk to the gates and the shuttle was really convenient when little feet were tired at the end of the day!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us and sharing your kind comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. We DO appreciate your business and I am delighted that you and the little ones enjoyed your visit. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: What a Gem, so very well maintained.
Summary: We checked into the Candy Cane late Friday evening after a short $9 taxi ride from the Amtrack station.  The staff were warm and welcoming.  We were doing one day at Disney on Saturday and they advised us on park hours, when to get there and when the shuttle would go all without being asked.  The room was very clean as were every bit of the grounds.  "Wow" clean, not just clean. The cleaning staff must use toothbrushes in the bathrooms, no build up of any sort in any crevice. The breakfast buffet had fresh fruit (bananas, apples, oranges), yogurt, breads, donuts, cheese and hard boiled eggs.  There was coffee, juice and milk.  Oddly no water that I saw. I am used to farm fresh eggs and didn't realize how flavorless store eggs are.  I like fancy cheese too so the cubes of cheese
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us and providing us with your kind comments regarding our team and property. I appreciate your answering my email thus allowing me to extend your kudos to Melissa and Alejandra at our front desk. They are both relatively new additions and are doing a wonderful job and thank you so very much for noticing. In regards to a couple of your comments we are adding a water station in our lobby and with our upcoming renovations are looking at adding an elevator on both sides of the property for guest convenience. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would certainly be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: We stayed at the Candy Cane Inn last year for Christmas trip to Disneyland.  We loved and it and returned again this past December. Clean rooms, friendly staff, and a good breakfast in the morning, that is what I was expecting.We again were very happy with our stay. What was an unbelieveable experience for us this time was that I left a bag full of Disney souveniers behind.  It wasn't until 3 days after we left Candy Cane Inn we arrived home to find out what I had done.  I immediately called and was connected to Mr.Danilo Gonzalez, housekeeping supervisor.  He said he would check the lost and found and return my call as soon as possible.  To tell you the truth, I didn't think they would be found since so much time had passed since we had checked out.  To my surprise, he called
Manager Response: Thank you for being a loyal guest and sharing your positive comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. I am so glad that we were able to locate your lost items and return them to you. We look forward to seeing you again and please feel free to contact me personally when your family is returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: My son and I just returned from another stay at the Candy Cane while celebrating his 21st b-day at Disneyland.  We  have stayed there numerous times and once again were very pleased.  I don't know who the unhappy men were that one reviewer mentioned, but it was not James or Jose who were very nice and accommodating.  Check the reviews for the Disney resort hotels and then book at the Candy Cane.  It is cozy, clean, friendly and if you need something fixed they are there very quickly.  The pool area is cleaned and hosed down daily and the grounds are pretty and relaxing.  Pretty much everything else has been said already but I wanted to give them the praise they deserve.  Best service of any motel or hotel we've stayed at. Thank you for another great stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for being a loyal and repeat guest as we do appreciate your business. We have a wonderful team, including James and Jose, who take pride in their jobs and taking care of our guests and they too appreciate when folks take the time to write positive comments such as yours. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would by my pleasure to assist with future reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: My family and I have been staying at the Candy Cane Inn annually, for over a dozen years. We have never and would never think to stay anywhere else. The hotel is a convenient, 10-15 min walk from Disney as well as many restaurants at the Anaheim Gardenwalk. We have always enjoyed coming back to to the quiet, peaceful atmosphere, especially mid-afternoon to take a dip in the pool and get a much needed reprieve from the hustle and bustle of Disney. The grounds are always up kept with beautiful flowers and plants and the staff have always been helpful and friendly. The rooms are spacious and tastefully decorated and the complimentary continental breakfast is always welcoming. I would highly recommend this hotel to anyone and I look forward to my next stay!
Manager Response: Thank you for being a repeat guest of the Candy Cane Inn and thank you for your kind comments about our property, services and the team. They truly do take pride in their work and providing exceptional service to our guests. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: We stayed at Candy Cane Inn in January 2014. The location is perfect for families going to Disneyland. The staff are friendly and helpful with a 24 hour front desk. There are laundry facilities that you can use with quarters, which is very handy. The included breakfast has plenty of variety and everything that you need to start the day. There is also a shuttle bus however we just walked as it is not far to disneyland. The only constructive criticism have about the room was that the mattresses in our room sunk in the middle so were a little uncomfortable. Overall this is fantastic and good value accommodation for your trip to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and we certainly appreciate your kind comments regarding our hotel. I am glad you were able to enjoy our breakfast and our onsite laundry room! I do sincerely apologize that your bed was not to your satisfaction, and please note that my Housekeeping Manager and myself have personally walked our rooms to ensure all mattress are in perfect working order. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: We chose this hotel largely based on the overwhelmingly positive reviews on Tripadvisor. While there were some nice touches, overall we felt let down for reasons I will detail below.  The kids were delighted by the jar of candy canes and we enjoyed the friendly helpful receptionist (Alejandra if I recall correctly). However another guy on reception at a different time (do not remember his name) was verging on rude and dismissive.  We paid extra for a premium room, partly because it was described as quieter and partly because we thought the room service breakfast would help us on our way quicker in the mornings. Well firstly we thought the room was very small for a 4-sleeper. Secondly the "quieter" was clearly relative - I can imagine it's quieter than the rooms at the front but
Manager Response: I would like to sincerely apologize that your stay was not to your expectations and I thank you for your input. I have attempted to reach you through the TripAdvisor email system, however I have not heard back and wanted to respond. We do listen to all guest comments and while we never want to disappoint our guests, we do value these opportunities to continue to train and grow our guest service. I have personally spoken with my Housekeeping Manager and Breakfast Team, and we have discussed in length your comments and suggestions to ensure better delivery times and overall guest satisfaction. As for your suggestion regarding the early shuttle service, we thank you for your input and would like to let you know that we do provide an early shuttle service. The shuttle leaves a half hour earlier prior to Magic Morning days at Disneyland Park, which are every Tuesday, Thursday and Saturdays of each month. Thank you again for your business and kind regards!

Summary: Candy Cane Inn is the only Anaheim area hotel to stay in. So close to the park, no need to wait for shuttle, but it's a great option to have. Always welcoming ,have stayed here many times over the years. Love the pool area for breakfast, relaxing. Breakfast offering is great,everything you need to start the day right. Rooms and property always clean and we'll kept.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for being a repeat member of the Candy Cane Inn family. We appreciate your business and kind comments regarding our property and team of service professionals. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: My daughter and I visited the Disneyland parks and stayed at the Candy Cane Inn for two nights. The rooms were clean and comfortable, the pool area was satisfactory and I appreciated the healthier options on the breakfast buffet, especially when I knew that we'd be eating processed crap at the park. The hotel is close enough to walk to the parks, but we used the shuttle on the way home. It was easy and convenient. The only reason I gave it four stars out of five was because I was travelling as a single parent and a large, male staff member walked behind me for quite a period of time, as I labored with our luggage and he did not offer assistance. I even stopped and looked directly at him, but he walked on past. I would, however, stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and providing your valuable feedback. I am truly sorry for the incident that you noted, as Guest Service is of the upmost importance to us here at the Candy Cane Inn. We do listen to all comments and while we never want to disappoint our Guest’s, we do value these opportunities to continue to train and grow our guest service. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as I would be delighted to assist with future reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: This was our 2nd visit to Candy Cane Inn, as my 10-year old son insisted that we stay here again.  We enjoyed another pleasant stay and we love that the hotel is quiet and extremely clean.  The continental breakfast is delicious and plentiful.  The hotel is within walking distance to Disneyland but we opted to take the wonderful shuttle that leaves every 30-minutes.  We rented a car and there was ample parking during our stay.  There is a 7-11 next door and a Target about a mile down the street where we stocked up on snacks and drinks to keep in the medium sized mini fridge, located in each room.  Each afternoon, we'd take a break from the parks and relax by the pool.  The staff is extremely friendly and helpful.  If you're looking for an inexpensive, clean, close hotel to
Manager Response: Thank you for your gracious comments and being a loyal and repeat guest of the Candy Cane Inn, as we DO appreciate your business! Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as I would be delighted to assist with reservations. Warm Regards!

Summary: I love the location of The Candy Cane. The hotel is nicely kept and staff couldn't make you feel more at home. The breakfast is a perfect mix for our family. I love the smallness of the hotel and the location of the pool. I love sitting in the pool area and chat with other travelers. You really don't need a vehicle if staying there since shopping and food are right there. As a mom traveling with kids I always feel totally safe there. This trip out room was very close to the front/shuttle area and I was worried about the sound but I was never woke up or noticed it and I am a light sleeper. I will stay here again and again!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and I am happy that you enjoyed the Candy Cane Inn and your visit. We appreciate your kind comments and it is our pleasure to provide our guests with excellent customer service. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as I would be delighted to assist with rates and future reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: Arrived from a 13-hour flight on the morning of the 25th. Our room wasn't ready yet but the concierge was so kind to keep our bags and offered us breakfast even though we have not checked in yet. The complimentary bus ride to and from Disney was perfect and helpful after a tiring day at Disney. Also beside the hotel is the ABC Mart and 7-11 so picking up water, midnight snack and even a baby stroller in our case came in handy. Wife works perfectly well also. We got room 139 at the back of the property and surprisingly the wifi was fast. My daughter was down with cold and fever on our 3rd day and the hotel staff was so kind to assist us in getting a cab and letting us know which hospital to go to. Breakfast was plain but enough to give you a little bit of energy to start your day.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your many kind comments regarding our property, service and amenities. We have a wonderful team, who take pride in their jobs and taking care of our guests and they too appreciate when folks take the time to write positive comments such as yours. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would by my pleasure to assist with future reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: Exceptional customer service, convenient shuttle, clean rooms, good breakfast.  Need I say more?  This was a great find - thanks to Tripadvisor.  We loved all of the extras you typically only find in more expensive hotels such as free water bottles, in-room breakfast, free wi-fi and movie rentals.  Will definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us the opportunity on your recent visit and I am pleased that you concurred that our TripAdvisor reviews were right on the money. We do aspire to deliver a quality product and exceptional friendly service to each and every guest that stays with us. We look forward to having you stay with us again and thank you in advance for being a repeat guest. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Beautiful property, very close to Disneyland entrance
Summary: Our family of 5 were very pleased with our three night stay at the Candy Cane Inn.  The gardens are beautiful, the rooms clean and comfortable (very reasonably priced) and the staff friendly. Being halfway through our five week holiday the laundry room was a great bonus.  The deluxe room was smaller than we had anticipated (we had a rollaway bed and 2 queens) but that really didn't matter as we only used it to sleep!  The complimentary breakfast (which we ate by the pool) each morning was great.  The best part was how close we were to the Disneyland entrance - it is a very short walk.  We would happily stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your many kind comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. We are glad you enjoyed coming down for breakfast and the outside view by the pool area, which is beautiful and lush with greenery. Please feel free to contact me personally if there is anything that I can do to make your next visit even more enjoyable. Kind regards!

Summary: Stayed here again but this time I brought my family so there was 4 rooms of us. And we all had a great experience. I was pleased that the Candy Cane Inn lived up to the standard they had set on my husband & I's earlier visit in 2012.   Just to reinforce this was my previous review: First and most important point is the amazing service throughout our entire stay. There is nothing like being greeted and assisted with a genuine smile. The Breakfast served daily was good and having it by the pool was really nice. And a very easy walk to the entire Disney resort, as well as a shuttle. Rooms were a little small but maybe that's just because we were three adults! They had very comfy beds and my favorite shutters! Great cleaning daily, you could tell they put a lot of effort into
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for being a loyal member of the Candy Cane Inn family, and sharing your many kind comments about our service and amenities. We DO appreciate your business and please feel free to contact me personally when planning you next trip as it would by my sincere pleasure to assist with reservations. Warm regards!

Summary: I did extensive research on where we should stay when we visited Disneyland and Trip Advisor didn't lie - this place is awesome!  We had three rooms booked - each of which were clean, quiet with two double beds and very close to the main entrance of Disneyland - there is no need to wait for the shuttle bus when the park is so close!  I have stayed at more expensive hotels in the area but they were no match for the wonderful Candy Cane Inn.  We will be back!
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us the opportunity on your recent visit and I am pleased that you concurred that our TripAdvisor reviews were right on the money. We do aspire to deliver a quality product and exceptional friendly service to each and every guest that stays with us. We look forward to having you stay with us again and thank you in advance for being a repeat guest. Kind regards!

Summary: I very happy with our stay. The location was prefect and breakfast was good and free. We are going to Disney world this year if not I would be coming back here. I'm planning a trip for my mom and dad here this year though. They can't wait. Save money and stay here you won't be disappointed.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your positive comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. We hope to see you again soon and please feel free to contact me personally when your family is returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: We stayed on the recommendation of a friend and were not disappointed. A really beautiful property, well maintained, clean, spacious rooms and a great breakfast to see us on our way to a busy day full of Disney. Loved the fact that there were washers and dryers (coin operated and front desk were happy to help out with change) and we never even needed to use the shuttle bus they provide to Disney because it was such a close, easy walk! The pool and spa looked fantastic but with our days packed with Disney goodness, we didn't get a chance to try them. An added bonus was the ABC Mart and 7/11 next door, not to mention the many nearby eating spots. For the price, a total win
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your many kind comments regarding our property, service and amenities. We are glad you were recommended to us and that you enjoyed your stay. We have a wonderful team, who take pride in their jobs and taking care of our guests and they too appreciate when folks take the time to write positive comments such as yours. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would by my pleasure to assist with future reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: Love staying at the Candy Cane. Right next to Disneyland but far less expensive than staying in one of the Disney resorts. Rooms are always clean, staff is nice and the shuttle service is a life saver. This is our go-to spot when visiting Disneyland and we've never had a bad stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for being a loyal guest and sharing your positive comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. We look forward to seeing you again and please feel free to contact me personally when your family is returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with reservations, as well as discussing what our team can do to bring your next review up to a five. Kind regards!

Summary: This is my new favorite place to stay.  My husband and I stayed over Christmas while we were going to Disneyland.  We were so impressed on how clean the rooms were and how friendly the staff was.  Loved the shuttle service to Disneyland and the breakfast.  To our surprise we received a Christmas gift from them just for staying during that time.  It was a super soft plush blanket that we will use in our travels.  The Candy Caine is 5 stars in my book.  We will be frequent clients.  Thank you!
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us the opportunity on your recent visit to the Theme Parks, we appreciate your business and kind comments. We take great pride in our hotel and our wonderful staff and we thank you for recognizing this. We are glad you enjoyed your Christmas gift, and we look forward to your return visits. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: The staff was great.   Held our bags when we arrived before the room was ready.  We had one of the larger rooms which was good for four people.  Bath fan was a bit noisy and woke up sleepers when a middle of the night trip was needed.  But we will try for The Candy Cane Inn the next time we visit Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and we certainly appreciate your kind comments and are delighted that you would stay with us again in the future. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: We stayed here in mid-December and it was great! The reviews we had read on here were accurate. The Candy Cane Inn is very clean and the staff was very hospitable! We loved that it's so close to Disneyland and there was plenty of different items to choose from at breakfast time. We also really appreciated their free parking & that they welcomed us to park there before we actually got our room keys (we arrived early). They also let us keep our car parked there after we checked out until we left that evening. When you go to Disneyland, you just want to stay somewhere that's clean and convenient and takes pride in their business, so this place is perfect. We will definitely stay there again!
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us the opportunity on your recent visit and I am pleased that you concurred that our Trip Advisor reviews were right on the money. We do aspire to deliver a quality product and exceptional friendly service to each and every guest that stays with us. We look forward to having you stay with us again and please feel free to contact me personally when returning as I would be delighted to assist with reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: This was our first time at the Candy Cane Inn, but it won't be our last. We arrived early on Dec. 26 and were able to park our car there and use the shuttle even though our room wasn't ready. The front desk was helpful and friendly. The grounds were very pretty. The room was nothing fancy but clean.  The bathroom was huge.  Just what we needed for a few days in Disneyland. The shuttle was always right on time and would stop if they saw us running for it. Booked the upgraded room and it was totally worth it. They left us a welcome buck of treats and the breakfast being delivered was a bonus. I had it delivered while I was getting ready and that gave our daughter extra time to sleep. This is a great place to stay. We've already booked our return trip there.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your many kind comments regarding our property, and exceptional guest service. We are glad you enjoyed the many amenities our Premium rooms have to offer including the complimentary breakfast delivery. We have a wonderful team who take pride in their jobs and taking care of our guests and they too appreciate when folks take the time to write positive comments such as yours. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: This was our second time staying at this hotel, the first experience was great which is why we returned.  I wish I could say the same now.  This is my first time writing a review on anything, we tend to try to make the best out of any situation.  A few small things like the room location with a front facing window to traffic (no big), a 2am random knock on our door with a "wrong room" reply (unlucky), and a phone call to our private room claiming to be the hotel management and asking for all of our private info because "the computers went down" (totally lame).  No, we did not fall for this and walked down to the front desk immediately to report what happened.  The evening manager was apologetic and seemed to have acted on the situation by reporting to police, he said we were not
Manager Response: When we first met I expressed my extreme regret for this situation, and while we do not want to become cold, callus and untrusting in regards to mankind in general it is sad that locks and safes have become part of the culture in everyone’s daily life. I totally understand that this situation may be a sensitive one but please trust that we at the Candy Cane Inn sincerely take to heart and completely investigate any and all incidents. Kind regards!

Summary: I spent hours combing through Anaheim accommodation for the perfect base for our Disney trip and I couldn't be happier with our choice.  The Candy Cane Inn is right next door to Disneyland (in fact, the Cars ride backs on to the hotel), so it takes approximately 7 mins (yep, we timed it) door to door.  The hotel itself is clean and comfortable - though nothing too luxurious. Wifi and parking are free. Breakfast is a little full of sugar (bagels, donuts etc) but hey, when in Disneyland...  The staff were always obliging, and were happy for us to stay quietly in the spa/pool after hours.  I would definitely recommend this hotel to anyone going to Disneyland. We stayed in a deluxe room and it was very well priced and perfectly located.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your many kind comments regarding our property, service and amenities. We have a wonderful team who take pride in their jobs and taking care of our guests and they too appreciate when folks take the time to write positive comments such as yours. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would by my pleasure to assist with future reservations. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Not Just A Great Location, A Great Motel
Summary: My family and I just completed a 6 night stay at the Candy Cane Inn.  The price was extremely reasonable for a property just 2 blocks from Disneyland during Christmas, so I had very low expectations.  My mistake!  The staff is friendly and warm and extremely helpful!  The rooms are nicely appointed (noting fancy) and serviceable and impeccably clean. Although the property is just 2 (long) blocks from the front entrance of Disneyland, they have a free shuttle that runs on the half hour.  It may not seem like a big deal, but after 5 days of walking for 16 hours a day, a free shuttle that does not sop at 9 other hotels before yours is GOLDEN.  The breakfast ends a little too early for my liking, at 9:30am.  But it is a decent spread with lots of pastries, cereal bar, juice, coffee,
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us and sharing your many positive comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. We do believe in providing an exceptional product and wonderful guest service while keeping in mind families travelling on a budget, and we are delighted to see you would stay with us again. Kind regards!

Summary: This place is just perfect for anyone wanting to do Disneyland.  They include breakfast and a free Disney shuttle with the cost of your accommodation but the Inn is so close to the entrance that it is quicker to walk.  The breakfast buffet had a wide variety and the coffee was good.  The room we had was a little squeezy for three but just fine as we only needed to sleep there.  There are convenience stores nearby and shopping centre if you need non Disney supplies.  Staff are efficient and helpful although housekeeping tended to want to come in early.  The Inn also has a laundry which was much appreciated in the last week of our trip.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and we certainly appreciate your kind comments regarding our hotel. I am glad you were able to enjoy our breakfast and our onsite laundry room! Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: My family stayed here for 3 nights from 12-13 to 12-16. My husband loves our room. We reserved the premium deluxe room and hubby was constantly saying how clean the hotel room was. The service was superb. Bed was really comfy. We would prolly check in here again on our next disney visit.  Cons: breakfast menu is very limited. It only consists of mainly pastries and cooked to order boiled eggs.            Our room's carpeting is dirty that it made our feet changed color to dirty brownish to blackish. We need to use our shoes, socks all the time. I even threw my home slippers that i bought with me after using them at the hotel.           We can't open the blinds to have direct sunlight in our room since the room sits directly across the parking lot. There's no privacy.   OVERALL:
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your kind comments regarding our property, and amenities. I sincerely apologize for the items you listed above, including the dirty carpets, and I appreciate your communication through Trip Advisor. We do listen to all comments and while we never want to disappoint our guests, we do value these opportunities to continue to train and grow our guest service, as we feel that guest service and cleanliness is of the upmost importance to us! Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: With booking our trip of a lifetime family 5week holiday to the USA from Australia, it was a little daunting with so many places to research. We started our trip with Disneyland.  Candy Cane Inn came with many glowing reviews I got to work trying to find out more - I didn't find and fault so I booked it.   Our family of 4 stayed 6 nights with the sole purpose is visiting Disneyland. We arrived jet lagged and disheveled with 2 kids in tow before 8am, not expecting our room to be ready but it was! I could of jumped the counter and kissed James who helped us out no end. No question was too silly, everything was explained clearly and with a smile and genuine want of being helpful.   Value for money when we chose the executive package having breakfast delivered was a dream with the
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your many kind comments regarding our property, service and amenities. We have a wonderful team, including James, who take pride in their jobs and taking care of our guests and they too appreciate when folks take the time to write positive comments such as yours. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would by my pleasure to assist with future reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: While looking for hotels to stay at while we visited Disneyland we wanted 3 distinct features: 1. Free parking 2. Free shuttle to Disneyland 3. Reasonably priced. Candy Cane Inn was literally the last hotel that we looked at and booked 1 week prior to our trip! Breakfast in the morning was also a plus (the 2 year old appreciated the yogurt and toast in the mornings - they also have donuts/pastries/fruit and boiled eggs). A few times we even walked back to the hotel room from Dinsneyland and did not feel that the walk was too long. A few other perks included an ABC Mart/7 eleven literally right next door and a whole bunch of eating establishments a block away which you could either walk to or drive to (Cheescake factory, Bubba Gump, PF Changs, Roys, etc...). We'll definitely stay
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your many kind comments regarding our property and guest service. We are glad you enjoyed the many complimentary amenities we have to offer including the free parking and our free exclusive shuttle to the parks. I do apologize for the noise and that we were able to take care of the situation. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: If you are visting Disneyland this is your hotel. Location within walking distance, like right next door, they even will shuttle you, if your to lazy to walk, for free. They also DO NOT CHARGE EXTRA for parking, which all hotels around disney do. The breakfast buffet was free and more than the average buffet, lots of choices. The rooms were clean and the staff friendly.  We will go back.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your positive comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. We look forward to seeing you again and please feel free to contact me personally when your family is returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with reservations, as well as discussing what our team can do to bring your next review up to a five. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Friendly, cozy and clean - perfect for Disneyland
Summary: After a long couple days at the Disneyland Parks, the Candy Cane Inn was exactly what we paid for.   Friendly - the staff were all very helpful and happy. I could tell they were busy with many guests to care for, but we never felt like a nuisance. They made us feel welcome.  Cozy - the rooms were inviting and the property was well cared for.   Clean - the grounds were immaculate. The rooms were clean.   Highlights: - quick and tasty breakfast. Seating by the pool, very busy prior to parks opening, but easy to grab a quick meal. Cereal, pastries, doughnuts, fruit and yogurt.   - spa and pool open late. It was nice to relax in the spa after walking all day at Disneyland.   - free parking. We were able to leave our vehicle here while we went to the park even after checking out.
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us the opportunity on your recent visit and I am pleased that you concurred that our Trip Advisor reviews were right on the money. We do aspire to deliver a quality product and exceptional friendly service to each and every guest that stays with us. We look forward to having you stay with us again and please feel free to contact me personally when returning as I would be delighted to assist with reservations. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Great staff and service location perfect for Disneyland
Summary: Thanks so much for your great service during our recent visit.  We arrived very early morning and could not check in however were offered complimentary breakfast which was a nice welcome then luggage storage.  Room fine 2 x queen beds and fine for Disneyland visit.  Breakfast great and could not fault staff in fact compliments to Adrian for his help for our checkin, queries and help to book return transit to LA.  Would chose this hotels again and recommend to friends.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your many kind comments regarding our property, service and amenities. We have a wonderful team, including Adrian, who take pride in their jobs and taking care of our guests and they too appreciate when folks take the time to write positive comments such as yours. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would by my pleasure to assist with future reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: We arrived at Candy Cane after 8 p.m. and were instantly drawn towards the warm yellow lighting of the Reception House beaming from a garden of dimmed foliage. Reception was equally warm and remained so for every evening of our 5 days stay. But I cannot say so for the morning Reception – hardly a paragon of friendliness.  Candy Cane is pretty, with an upper floor balcony dripping leafy tendril and bougainvillea in a U-shaped wood and stone fixture hugging the Reception House. My family of three booked a Premium Room and enjoyed the floral bedspreads and country feels of the room. We loved the long vanity area outside the bathroom and our kid was delighted with the complimentary tub of goodies.  The room was large and perfectly adequate for storage, with sufficient wardrobe space
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your many kind comments regarding our property, and amenities. We are glad you enjoyed our Premium rooms and all they have to offer including the complimentary breakfast delivery, and goodie basket. I sincerely apologize that your reception in the morning was not up the warm reception you received at night. We do listen to all comments and while we never want to disappoint our guests, we do value these opportunities to continue to train and grow our guest service, as we feel that guest service is of the upmost importance to us!  Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: My husband and I stayed here last weekend while we visited the Disney Resort. When making reservations my husband mentioned the trip was for my birthday. When we walked into the room, sitting on the table, was a cute little bag filled with yummy cookies and a birthday card. It was such a nice thoughtful touch. Everyone on staff was very friendly. The room was very clean and well kept. There were a few stains on the carpet, but it is a darker carpet and you would have to be looking. It is understandable because I imagine they have to wait for a less busy time to clean the carpet. It didn't really bother me because the carpet was well vacuumed. We had a top level room in the back and it was really quiet. I have a hard time sleeping, so the quiet was something I really appreciated.
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us the opportunity on your recent visit and I am pleased that you enjoyed your cookies and birthday card! We do aspire to deliver a quality product and exceptional friendly service to each and every guest that stays with us. We look forward to having you stay with us again and please feel free to contact me personally when returning as I would be delighted to assist with reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: We stayed at the Candy Cane based on the reviews and the fact that it could accommodate  a family of five. I was really looking forward to this but was a bit disappointed.      The grounds are beautiful, not doubt about that. Breakfast is a bonus and definitely got you going in the morning (Coffee was terrible, no flavor but I like Starbucks!) There was a shuttle which was always on time and used by many. We did not use it much, just the odd time. The walk is only ten minutes but I realize that for various reasons some people want or need a shuttle.      My biggest complaint is the price. The rooms are average, just average, nothing more. Take away the grounds, the breakfast and the shuttle and you have a mediocre hotel. The carpets were not clean, the bathroom floor was dirty,
Manager Response: First and foremost I would like to sincerely apologize that your stay was not to your expectations and I apologize for the items you noted. I do thank you for your response to my email I sent you and as I stated before we do listen to all comments and while we never want to disappoint our guests, we do value these opportunities to continue to train and grow our guest service. Thank you again for your business and kind regards!

Summary Heading: Candy Cane Inn Is The Best!!!
Summary: My wife and granddaughter and I stayed at the Candy Cane Inn the week before Thanksgiving and as usual, everything was fantastic.  James greeted us at check in and every morning for breakfast.  Our room was ready when we arrived at mid-day and was clean and comfortable.  My wife and granddaughter enjoyed the pool and hot tub and the breakfast was a great way to start a long day of walking.  I've talked to my wife about looking at other hotels in the area when we come to Disneyland but she refuses, saying she loves the Candy Cane Inn and I'd have to say that I agree.  We both feel it's like coming home when we stay at Candy Cane.
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for being a loyal member of the Candy Cane Inn family. We DO appreciate your business and please feel free to contact me personally when planning you next trip “home” as it would by my sincere pleasure to assist with rates and reservations. Warm regards!

Summary Heading: Best EVER Disney Good Neighbor Hotel
Summary: My family enjoyed the most wonderful stay at the Candy Cane Inn over Thanksgiving week. It was our first trip to Disneyland Resort and we couldn't have chosen a better place to stay. We upgraded to the premium 2-queen bed room and let me tell you, it was worth every penny! We were greeted by the friendly and helpful front desk staff who explained all of the amenities of the property and answered our questions. We were checked into room 245 which was beautiful, clean and chock full of fun surprises. The staff prepared a welcome basket packed with goodies including fresh baked cookies, popcorn and some cute little Mickey shaped candies. My son and I were celebrating our birthdays and they even prepared a special birthday surprise for us! Our beds were SO comfortable we almost
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your many kind comments regarding our property, and exceptional guest service. We are glad you enjoyed the many amenities our Premium rooms have to offer including the complimentary breakfast delivery. Summary: The gentleman on the other end of the phone was so quiet, I could barely hear him. Unfortunately they are sold out for one of the four nights I wanted to stay...next time I will try to book a little earlier because I hear amazing things about this hotel!
Manager Response: First and foremost I sincerely apologize we were not able to accommodate your reservations. I do thank you for your comments and please don’t hesitate to contact me personally when you decide to book as I would be delighted to assist with reservations. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: first time but not our last!
Summary: My daughter and I are Disney junkies and usually drive down from Los Angeles once a month.  We decided to try staying overnight to avoid the midnight drive back home.  Candy Cane Inn was recommended by another Disney junkie and we are sooo glad we stayed.  everyone was very helpful and took great pride in their jobs.  our room was very clean, the breakfast was a great start to our day, and the shuttle was a welcome site after walking around the parks all day.  We are planning another stay in early 2014.  Can't wait to return.  I just wish Disney would grant a entry into Radiator Springs from the back of the property 😊
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your many kind comments regarding our property, service and amenities. We are glad you were recommended to us and that you enjoyed your stary. Summary: I have spent sometime online looking for a perfect hotel for our first family trip and was very impressed with the many praise reports i have read about Candy Cane, i over looked the comments about how unhelpful, abrupt, and short the staff could be and decided to call and make a reservation. I just got off the phone from reserving rooms for April and the gentlemen on the other end of the line was very short, spoke so quick I couldnt understand him, he was very unhelpful and rude to me...not a good start to a first family trip. Its kind of sad for a business owner with such a "great hotel" because you can't keep your eye on your straff all the time, and you expect they will provide WOW service too but thats not always the case. To the staff member who was rude to me I hope one
Manager Response: First and foremost I sincerely apologize for your initial dealings with our reservations team. I do thank you for the conversation we had today on the phone and as I stated, please feel free to contact me personally as I DO listen and care about our guest satisfaction and strive to provide an exceptional and memorable trip to our Inn. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Nothing But Nice Things to Say...
Summary: We recently took a group of 21 adults with disabilities, along with 7 staff, to Pirate Dinner Adventure and Disneyland and stayed at the Candy Cane Inn. Honestly, I do not have anything but rave reviews for the staff, facilities, and amenities at this extremely convenient hotel.   We arrived to find the hotel grounds clean and beautifully landscaped, the rooms lovely, and all our room key envelopes labeled with the names and room numbers of our group members - a HUGE help for us - so different than the usual hoops that we have to jump through at check-in at other hotels. Per our request, all of our rooms were in a row and on the bottom floor - perfect!   The extended continental breakfast was absolutely sufficient for a good start to a busy day at Disneyland and seating was more
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us the opportunity to serve your group and I was so very delighted to see them and how excited they were and enjoying their memorable trip. We appreciate your kind comments and Amy in reservations certainly did a wonderful job in having your rooms together and keys prepared. We do strive to provide these special and thoughtful details to ease what can be stressful when traveling with a group. Again, we appreciate your business and thank you! Kind regards.

Summary: This motel was amazing!  The rooms were large and clean.  The grounds were absolutely spotless….there are employees constantly walking around cleaning up!  The landscaping (trees, bushes) makes the hotel feel very tucked away which is nice considering that it is RIGHT next door to the theme parks!  They have a wonderful, friendly staff….friendly shuttle driver…I can’t say enough good things…their breakfast was perfect and had quite a variety, we were impressed!  We came with a large group of disabled adults and when we pulled up they had our room keys ready and labeled…we were in our rooms within 5 minutes, all of us!  If I had anything negative, it would be the breakfast room was small, but they had tables set up at the pool area so that made it ok…but if it were raining not
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us and sharing your comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. It was so nice to see the members of your group enjoying themselves and I am delighted that you were happy with your accommodations. We DO try and place groups together and have necessary preparation completed for a smooth arrival. Kind regards!

Summary: Superbly situated  smaller Motel close to DISNEYLAND lovely clean rooms nice decor with two double beds per room.. Great pool and gardens plenty of parking and shuttle for the Magic Kingdom..great cared for motel and friendly attentive staff,,
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your kind comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. We appreciate your business and delighted that your experience was wonderful and you were able to enjoy our many amenities and clean hotel rooms. Kind regards!

Summary: The reviews were all on target.  The Candy Cane Inn was a wonderful place to stay. The rooms weren't big, but they are clean and inviting, and the beds were extremely comfortable. As the kids said, "Who spends time in their room when they are at Disneyland?' We enjoyed breakfast by the pool every morning, and looked forward to our visit with Edd and Tinkerbell. The grounds are neat, tidy and very peaceful. Every employee we encountered friendly and welcoming. The shuttle to and from Disneyland was great for the days our feet had just had enough and wanted a break. Otherwise the 2 block walk was a pleasant stroll.  There are plenty of great restaurants within walking distance, everything from $ to $$$$. We will definitely stay here the next time we visit.
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us the opportunity on your recent visit and I am pleased that you concurred that our Trip Advisor reviews were right on the money. We do aspire to deliver a quality product and exceptional friendly service to each and every guest that stays with us. We look forward to having you stay with us again and please feel free to contact me personally when returning as I would be delighted to assist with reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: Having travelled from Australia we couldn't have asked for a better place to stay for our first stop in the USA.  Comfortable, clean rooms, lovely staff, ample breakfast, lovely pool and spa and complementary shuttle bus for our tired legs and feet.  Ticked all the boxes.  To see the Tower of Terror and the back of Cars Land just added to our excitement.  Thank you to all of you who played a part in our wonderful stay.  The grounds are exceptional and as for Edd, what a gem to see him every morning was a real highlight for our kids, highly recommended.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your many kind comments regarding our property, service and amenities. Summary: This was our third stay at the Candy Cane Inn, and it was just great.  It's a small motel that's wonderfully cared for by great staff members.  We really enjoy the breakfast in the pool area in the morning.  It's nice to be able to stroll over for coffee and a bagel while waiting for everyone to wake up and get ready for the day.  Rooms are very clean and basic, which is just fine when you spend most of your time in the parks.  If you are staying with other adults or older kids, you have to be a little creative as there really isn't much privacy in the room, but it worked out fine for us.  There is also a safe in the room which was important to me as I didn't want to carry my valuables around all day at Disneyland. You won't always find this at motel properties.  We usually
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your many kind comments regarding our property, service and amenities. We have a wonderful team who take pride in their jobs and taking care of our guests and they too appreciate when folks take the time to write positive comments such as yours. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: We just got back from a four day Disney excursion;  this was a great place to stay;  within walking distance or a quick shuttle ride;  right next store to a convenience market for snacks and drinks;  store also has good Disney souvenirs at much cheaper rate than in the park.  Clean, quiet at night; helpful staff, and a good well-run breakfast.  My kids enjoyed the pool too.  Also, across the street from a 24 hour Subway and other dining options.  And, it's a mom and pop operation and not a big chain.  Bonus:  you can see the creepy Tower of Terror building from many of the rooms!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your kind comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. We appreciate your business and delighted that your experience was wonderful and you were able to enjoy our many amenities and clean hotel rooms. Kind regards!

Summary: This is the 3rd time we have stayed at the Candy Cane Inn in Anaheim.  It has remained true as one of the best values close to the Disney parks.  Very friendly and helpful staff.  The rooms are comfortable and clean and not noisy.  This is a quite hotel and perfect for young families.  Their shuttle service to the parks is timely and comfortable.  If you are hardy, you can also walk to and from the parks to the CC Inn. Might be a challenge with tired youngsters. We stayed in rooms 220 and 222.  The price of the room includes a reasonable (high carb) continental breakfast however the serving space is small as is the eating area, you can eat around the pool if the weather is warm and dry.  The breakfast fare is the same every day, so if you want some variety, you will need to seek
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your positive comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. We look forward to seeing you again and please feel free to contact me personally when your family is returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with reservations, as well as discussing what our team can do to bring your next review up to a five. Summary: We had heard wonderful things about the Candy Cane Inn from family and friends for years.  When I decided to take our youngest son on a trip to Disneyland I thought it was the perfect opportunity to see what all the fuss was about.   Candy Cane Inn is truly a gem.  For the most part excellent customer service.  Check in was a breeze as was check out.  I had upgraded our room to a "concierge room" when I booked thru the Disney Travel Company.  I had read it was worth the upgrade.  Since I was contemplating paying for a Disney property the upgrade was cheap in comparison.  The Candy Cane Inn tries very hard to make your stay carefree.  The amenities with the upgraded room were outstanding.  The free breakfast delivered to your room was fabulous.  They delivered everyday on time.
Manager Response: First and foremost I would like to sincerely apologize that your stay was not to your expectations and I thank you for your input. We do listen to all comments and while we never want to disappoint our guests, we do value these opportunities to continue to train and grow our guest service. In regards to your late checkout, I apologize that we were not able to accommodate a later checkout for you, as we were at a high occupancy at the time and all late checkouts are based upon availability. As you pointed out, our Premium rooms do come with a 2 pm late checkout versus the regular 11 am checkout time. We do have to keep in mind the short window the late checkout gives to our Housekeeping staff to turnover a room and get it back to us by the 3 PM check in time. I again thank you for your input. Kind regards!

Summary: Agree with positive reviews, clean well kept property.  Friendly staff.  Breakfast perfect, lots to choose from!  Shuttle no problem to use!  Very quiet in the mid to back area of property.  Room 230 had a table and chairs on a deck area we used for late night dinners.  Plan to book again!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and we certainly appreciate your kind comments and are delighted that you would stay with us again in the future. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: A good hotel for families to walk to Disneyland
Summary: Candy Cane Inn is a good hotel for young families on a budget to stay at as the accommodations are clean and neat, includes a OK continental breakfast, and is a short walk or furnished bus ride to Disneyland.  Also has a small pool for youngsters to cool down in.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your positive comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. We do believe in providing an exceptional product and wonderful guest service while keeping in mind families travelling on a budget, and we hope to see you again soon. Kind regards!

Summary: I don't make a hotel reservation without checking reviews on TripAdvisor, and once again I was not steered wrong. The Candy Cane Inn was everything other reviewers promised - clean, attractive, quiet, worth the expense. The room was laid out nicely and didn't feel cramped despite being very standard. The free continental breakfast had plenty of options although it is utilitarian. Customer service was excellent - check in was smooth and friendly, and I was offered the option to use the Disney resort shuttle and leave my car on hotel grounds even after I checked out. Would stay here gain no question if my travel plans call for it. Absolutely no need to spend a fortune on the Disney properties with an option like this available.
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us the opportunity on your recent visit and I am pleased that you concurred that our Trip Advisor reviews were right on the money.
