We look forward to having you stay with us again and please feel free to contact me personally when returning as I would be delighted to assist with reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: With the caveat that this hotel is within easy walking distance of Disneyland, it is a very nice hotel, but… the rooms are on par with a Comfort Inn, but the price is much higher. We stayed at the Candy Cane Inn three nights four years ago, and we were very happy with the experience. This trip we only stayed one night, and if I remember correctly the price this time was about $40 more. The free parking and continental breakfast are definitely plus, as is the proximity to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. We appreciate your valuable feedback and we do take all guest comments very seriously. We strive to deliver a product that is exceptional and is affordable at the same time, which is why we offer our complimentary amenities including free parking, free Wi-Fi to all guest rooms, complimentary expanded continental breakfast, and complimentary exclusive shuttle to and from the Disneyland main gate entrance. Warm Regards!

Summary: Stayed here because I was told by a co-worker that this was THE place to stay if you're going to Disneyland.  She was right!  The place was very CLEAN - which is a top priority for me.  They had a welcome kit with popcorn and freshly baked cookies in our room when we arrived.  They have a shuttle that runs every half hour to Disneyland, so it was super convenient for me and my family - and it was always prompt!  It's a short distance to restaurants/convenient stores, so you really didn't need a car to go anywhere.  What really impressed me was that no matter how often I came and went from my room, whenever I got back, my beds were always made.  How's that for service!  Would definitely stay here again the next time I visit Disneyland!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your kind comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. We appreciate your business and delighted that your experience was wonderful and you were able to enjoy our many amenities and clean hotel rooms. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: 20th+ visit, still the best in town
Summary: I've stayed at the Candy Cane Inn more than 20 times over the course of my life, and my parents stayed prior to that. I've grown up visiting the hotel, come with friends, stayed here when I moved into nearby Chapman University, and this past weekend stayed with my sister here for a weekend getaway. I can assure you this hotel is unlike any other. During our stays here, we've experienced a kind and quick check-in at 2am, clean rooms, having lost items shipped home to us at no cost, and this weekend, two incredibly kind women who went into the back room to get us blueberry muffins after they ran out, just because they're our favorite. Compliments to the hardworking staff, management, and all who continue to make this place a sanctuary in busy Anaheim- THANK YOU. We will definitely
Manager Response: Thank you for your gracious comments and being a loyal and repeat guest of the Candy Cane Inn, as we DO appreciate your business! I am glad you found us and that you were able to enjoy our many complimentary amenities we have to offer. We have an excellent team here dedicated to exceptional customer service to all our guests, and I am happy you concurred. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as I would be delighted to assist with rates and reservations. Warm Regards!

Summary: We are gearing up for our third stay at the Candy Cane Inn in a few weeks and am so looking forward to our stay. A hotel that is close enough to walk, has a free continental breakfast, free parking and a free shuttle can't be beat. The service, grounds, rooms and staff have always been accommodating. Looking forward to our upcoming stay.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for being a repeat member of the Candy Cane Inn family. We appreciate your business and kind comments regarding our property and the amenities we have to offer. We also look forward to seeing you folks again! Kind regards!

Summary: We chose the Candy Cane hotel because of all the reviews on tripadvisor. We were not disappointed. We liked this hotel because it is a low-rise and smaller than some of the other options. Location is perfect with a 10-minute walk or so to the park, or you can take the hotel's shuttle. Breakfast was good, pool and jacuzzi were nice. We would visit this hotel again.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your positive comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. We look forward to seeing you again and please feel free to contact me personally when your family is returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with reservations, as well as discussing what our team can do to bring your next review up to a five. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Very Comfortable, Very Close to Disneyland
Summary: I am grateful that someone told me about the Candy Cane Inn years ago.  My husband and I have been there three times, on our own and now twice with our son, and it is always good.  The flowers are pretty and effort goes into keeping the property attractive.  The beds were comfy (although there wasn't a lot of room around them) and very clean.  As we enjoy walking, we tend to walk to and from Disneyland but it's nice to take the handy shuttle once and while.  Feet do take a beating walking around the parks and standing in line for rides.  The pools are very nice (although it was cool this week for them) and there is a small fitness room.  The breakfast is simple but it serves its purpose.  Thank you to the Candy Cane for being just what we need near Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for your gracious comments and being a loyal and repeat guest of the Candy Cane Inn, as we DO appreciate your business! I am glad you found us and that you were able to enjoy our many complimentary amenities we have to offer. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as I would be delighted to assist with rates and reservations. Warm Regards!

Summary Heading: Greta location,  wonderful staff, for family or couples
Summary: Stayed 3 nights to visit Disneyland.  A short 10 minute walk to the main entrance but they also have a shuttle for the elderly and littlies.  Disneyland is practically next door.  Great pool and spa and free wi-fi.  Breakfast (free) was disappointing as it is all fatty sugary cakes and kids cereals.  Watching little kids eating chocolate coated doughnuts at 6am is pretty distressing!  It is however a wonderful hotel that I would recommend to everyone.  The biggest plus was it is QUIET!  had a wonderful time
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your positive comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. We look forward to seeing you again and please feel free to contact me personally when your family is returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: I've driven from Northern California to Anaheim about 8 times to visit Disneyland.  This is the first time at Candy Cane Inn.  My wife and I stayed for 3 nights beginning October 27th.  This is the first time we've been to Disneyland without kids. For us, everything about Candy Cane Inn was perfect!  Upon arrival, after being cheerfully greeted by the front desk (sorry, I don't remember the names of both people that greeted us), they asked us about our travels.  After casually saying we were visiting Disneyland for my wife's birthday, we unloaded our suitcases and went to dinner.  When we returned, we had a pleasant birthday surprise in our room for my wife.  Very unexpected! Our return from dinner was early.  There were kids and adults near our room on the second floor that
Manager Response: Thank you so much for allowing us the opportunity on your recent visit and I am delighted that you folks enjoyed our Inn. It was a pleasure speaking with you on the phone today and again, thank you for the kind comments regarding our front office team and the cleanliness of our property. Kind regards!

Summary: Great location, great upkeep, great staff, and great management!  We stayed in a premium room that we could get a fold-a-way to squeeze all five of us in, two adults and three children.   Since we were there strictly for the parks we only needed some place convenient and clean to sleep.  Don't expect 5-Star accommodations on this budget-minded motel though.   What you can expect is a great location, clean and moderate-sized rooms, comfortable beds, two luggage racks, professional and courteous staff.  There are  also a lot of little extras as well including welcome basket, free movie rentals, mini-fridge and microwaves in room, quality shampoo, soaps and other bathroom amenities.  I agree with other reviews in that the breakfast isn't too elaborate but it was the little bit that
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us the opportunity on your recent visit and I am pleased that we were able to make your stay an enjoyable one. We look forward to having you stay with us again. Kind regards!

Summary: We just visited the Candy Cane Jnn again a my wife has a serious Disneyland addiction , we loved it again!  Clean rooms , ok breakfast and right net to the ark , how can you go wrong for the price!  Thanks, Candy cane , we will be bak ! Mike
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us again and I am delighted that you enjoyed your visit. Kind regards!

Summary: We chose this hotel based on the reviews from Trip Advisor and we weren't disappointed in any way.  We had two connecting premium rooms and it was so worth paying the extra for them - having the breakfast delivered was a great perk as it meant we were able to eat something while we got ready on the days that we had a very early start and the late check-out was very welcome on our departure day.  We didn't use the microwave but the fridge is a decent size and the complimentary bottled water was very much appreciated.  The rooms are plenty big enough, we had three teens in one, and everything that you'd want is provided including decent size safes.  The grounds are beautifully kept and the pool was a lovely respite from the heat in the afternoon, even though it's small we always
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your many kind comments regarding our property, service and amenities. We have a wonderful team who take pride in their jobs and taking care of our guests and they too appreciate when folks take the time to write positive comments such as yours. I am also glad to hear that you are satisfied with our extended Reward Certificate program for overseas guests, as this is something I instituted after listening to guest requests. All guest’s comments are taken very seriously and we are glad to hear you recognize this as well. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would by my pleasure to assist with future reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: We checked the reviews of several hotels before deciding on the Candy Cane Inn and we're so glad that we chose it! The staff there is excellent. It's homey and the grounds are kept up very nicely. Our room (the Deluxe Queen) was great and there was plenty of room. I liked that the sink and counter area were outside of the bath room. The breakfast options were plentiful and the staff in the breakfast area was very accommodating. We celebrated both of our children's birthdays while we were there and they were given a packaged stack of cookies and a birthday card from the hotel upon arrival. (The kids were so excited to receive a surprise like that!) The location is excellent. There is a free shuttle but we chose to walk the block and a half to Disneyland. I would much rather give
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us the opportunity on your recent visit and I am pleased that you concurred that our Trip Advisor reviews were right on the money. We do aspire to deliver a quality product and exceptional friendly service to each and every guest that stays with us. We look forward to having you stay with us again and thank you in advance for being a repeat guest. Kind regards!

Summary: We have stayed at CCI before and was pleased with them in the past, however, after staying there last week, I can safely say we will NOT go back again.  PROS:  Good shuttle service to Disneyland but make sure you get on EARLY otherwise you will be standing up and battling all the rude people who refuse to fold their strollers and block the aisle. Fairly clean.  The bathroom tile has black stuff on it and the faucet in the shower had a LOT of black goo around it.  Beds are comfortable. CONS: Lack of parking!!  Breakfast is extremely basic and NO ROOM to sit unless you go outside and you end up standing in line all the way out the door and into the pool area. Rooms are SMALL and there's no drawer space.  If you have kids and are staying several days, theres not enough room to
Manager Response: First and foremost I would like to sincerely apologize that your stay was not to your expectations and I thank you for your input. I have attempted to reach you through the TripAdvisor email system however have not heard back and wanted to respond. We do listen to all comments and while we never want to disappoint our guests, we do value these opportunities to continue to train and grow our guest service. With that said, I would also like to point out that we have made some upgrades and additions to our breakfast since your previous stay, and I do apologize for the size of the breakfast room as we are limited to the amount of space we have available to us. Thank you again for your business and kind regards!

Summary: This is the first time we have stayed outside the park in both DIsney land and world and we were not sorry or disappointed in the least! Great location! Great prices! Great breakfast with good selection of fruit, bagels, cereals etc. Staff very friendly and helpful. Rooms large, neat and well maintained! Just to let you know...We bought our 3 day hopper from them - great price, however she didn't inform us that it came with 1 day early admission.  Found that out too late!  Still giving Candy Cane in a top rating!!! You won't be disappointed!  Joni B. Oct 25, 2013
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and I am happy that you enjoyed the Candy Cane Inn and your visit. We appreciate your kind comments and glad you were able to utilize our many complimentary amenities. I do want to apologize for the lack of information regarding your Magic Morning, as it is our duty and pleasure to provide guests with as much information as possible, in order to make their stay as pleasurable as possible. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as I would be delighted to assist with rates and future reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: The rooms are small and ordinary, but stuff works.  The breakfast is pretty basic.  The pool is small but well-maintained.  But the bottom line is you don't come to Anaheim for the hotel.  You come for Disneyland, and you can't get much closer to the park entrance than this.  There's a shuttle, but unless you're in extremely poor shape, it's an easy walk.  It is a distinct advantage to be able to come and go as you please, and the pool is just right for rinsing off the grunge if it's been a warm day with a lot of walking from ride to ride.  The staff are very attentive and responsive.  We had a toilet overflow and they sent a technician within a few minutes of my call who fixed it.  There are a number of properties just as close on the other side of the street; I don't know
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us and I am delighted that you enjoyed your visit. Kind regards!

Summary: Great value and location! Walking distance but there's a shuttle bus that is very consistent.  Comfortable pool area- decent breakfast.  Rooms comfy- you dhouldn't be spending much time there if you are visiting the Magic Kingdom!
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us the opportunity on your recent visit and I am pleased that we were able to make your stay an enjoyable one. We look forward to having you stay with us again. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: THE Place to stay during your Disneyland visit!
Summary: You can spend all of your money on a Disney property that you will be in a very few hours per day, but a wise traveler will stay at the Candy Cane Inn.  Granted the name is corny - remember you're going to Disneyland - but the property has been thoroughly maintained and updated since I was a little kid.  The grounds are beautiful. It is next door to Disney and an easy walk even if you're exhausted.  But, they have their own shuttle that runs on the half hour and stops nowhere but Disney and Candy Cane. Spend a bit more and reserve the premium room, they'll bring you breakfast, nothing fancy but very consistent and the height of convenience.   We have been staying at Candy Cane as adults for years and will continue to do so. Just a delightful place to stay.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for being a repeat member of the Candy Cane Inn family. We appreciate your business and kind comments regarding our property and the amenities we have to offer. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: This hotel is a great choice if you're visiting Disney Land. While it is an older property, everything is very clean, they refill breakfast items right up to the end and the bus service is a blessing!
Manager Response: Thank you for your gracious comments and staying with us at the Candy Cane Inn, as we DO appreciate your business! Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as I would be delighted to assist with rates and reservations. Warm Regards!

Summary: We stayed here for 3 nights in Oct 2013.  Easy checkin.  First room was facing Harbor Blvd and very noisy so we were given a different room with no problem at all.  Very quiet for sleeping.  Extremely clean and the pool area was very nice.  Breakfast was excellent.  Really enjoyed our stay.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us and sharing your many comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. I am pleased that your visit was an enjoyable! Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Clean, affordable, closest garden Inn to Disneyland.
Summary: We were impressed by the fact that we could enjoy our nice complimentary breakfast at the table around the swimming pool area surrounded by a lot of well landscaped green plantations close to our room. One could also choose to eat inside. Personally, I find it more relaxing to eat in a garden setting. Parking at the Inn and the shuttle bus to Disneyland are free to the hotel guests. We enjoyed taking a 10 mintes relaxing walk to the Disneyland with our 9 years old grandson instead of taking the shuttle sometimes. The staff at the reception area were always smilely, polite, efficient and friendly.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your wonderful comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. We at the Candy Cane Inn strive in providing a clean comfortable and nicely decorated guestroom with a strong emphasis on friendly and caring team members. Our ambiance and peaceful setting is relaxing and enjoyed by our guests and we are glad that you enjoyed too. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: THE BEST PLACE TO STAY WHEN VISITING DISNEYLAND
Summary: When it comes to hotels, I can be extremely compulsive.  I want to stay in a place that is clean with a great room and great customer service. THE CANDY CANE INN HAS IT ALL AND MORE.  The folks at the front desk were wonderful. The gentleman that checked us in was super friendly and went out of his way to help. Sorry but I can't remember his name ( day shift)  In fact when we were checking in, there were guests there waiting to talk with him specifically to praise him for great service.   Breakfasts were GREAT with a great selection. Eddie made his rounds at breakfast time and we had some great conversations.  Hello Eddie !! ( I was wearing the Zappa shirt). The walk to Disneyland couldn't be easier and the shuttle was always available and on time.  I could go on and on.   I
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your kind comments regarding our property, service and amenities. We have a wonderful team who take pride in their jobs and taking care of our guests and they too appreciate when folks take the time to write positive comments such as yours. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would by my pleasure to assist with future reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: We chose this place due to Tripadvisor reviews and were not disappointed!  It is walkable to Disney (about 12 minutes if you are walking with a 4-year-old, faster if adults only) but definitely not the closest hotel to Disney.  It has a good continental breakfast that was included in the room rate and also free parking.  With these amenities, the price is very competitive with other hotels within walking distance of Disney (many of which charge for parking and/or breakfast).  My son has a food allergy and the breakfast staff was very helpful in letting me look at the packaging for the foods that they have available so we could determine what was safe for him to eat.  Housekeeping also did a very good job keeping the room clean.  The rooms are on the smaller size, but we fit 2
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us the opportunity on your recent visit and I am pleased that you concurred that our Trip Advisor reviews were right on the money. We do aspire to deliver a quality product and exceptional friendly service to each and every guest that stays with us. We look forward to having you stay with us again and thank you in advance for being a repeat guest. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Feels like home away from home
Summary: This was our 5th (possibly 6th) stay at the Candy Cane Inn.  We are annual passholders and come here multiple times per year.  I have to say this hotel feels like home.  Warm, comfortable and everyone is so nice.  Once you enter the hotel you don't even feel like you are in downtown Anaheim.   From the front desk staff to housekeeping and bus drivers, they all make you feel welcome.  Had a great ride in the shuttle with Danilo who shuttled us to the park during the bus drivers lunch hour.  We have stayed in the regular, deluxe and premium rooms and I would recommend the premium rooms hands down.  They are larger, farther from the street and offer breakfast delivered to your room.  Not to mention including a microwave, robes and a welcome basket with treats as well as a 2pm
Manager Response: Thank you so much for being a repeat member of the Candy Cane Inn family. We appreciate your business and kind comments regarding our property and team of service professionals. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: This was our first visit to Disneyland and this hotel helped to make the trip wonderful. The location, continental breakfast, pool area, cleaniness of the grounds and the room maintenance were collectively better than any other hotel we have stayed at outside of a 5 star at WDW. The staff were wonderful and someone is always at the desk. I had a room request and I could not have received better rooms. Thank you Mr. Holl. I would recommend the hotel to anyone visiting this area.

Summary: What can you say? The Candy Cane Inn is incredible! Close to everything. Clean, quiet, great staff, and Edd! Great breakfast area, great pool and hot tub, rooms were clean, and the atmosphere was perfect. Would never stay anywhere else in Anaheim. The perfect location to everything you want to do!
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us the opportunity on your recent visit and I am pleased that we were able to make your stay an enjoyable one. We look forward to having you stay with us again. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Nice property - walk easily to Disney
Summary: This is a very nice property located within walking distance to Disney (even with my kids 6 and 8).  They have a nice small pool area with a covered hot tub which is nice to relax in after a long day at Disney.  The rooms are nice, well maintained, and clean.  The grounds and landscaping are incredibly maintained.  There is a private shuttle bus for the residents of the Candy Cane Inn to and from the Disney part which runs every half hour just before/after Disney opens for the day.  They have a very nice continental breakfast with croissants, danishes, donuts, juice, coffee, cereal, bagels, boiled eggs, and cheese.  While this is not a five star luxury property like a Disney Resort Hotel, it is very nice and is a far better value.  I was unable to find anything this nice and
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and providing your valuable feedback. I am apologetic for the incident that you noted, as Guest Service is of the upmost importance to us here at the Candy Cane Inn. I am glad that our Management Team was able to acknowledge and address your issue and I have spoken at length to the rest of my team to continue to train and grow them in excellent customer service. I again apologize for any inconvenience you may have experienced and please don’t hesitate to contact me personally when your family is returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards

Summary: The room was clean, lovely and has shutters instead of curtains! Cute and anti-dust :)  I loved it!  The room had a tiny bit of mustiness, likely from being closed up all day, but when we opened the window it was quite nice.  Great place for kids as there was a small wading pool in addition to a deeper pool for the bigger kids. The shallow end of the deeper pool was not that expansive, but with a wading pool it didn't matter so much.  The exterior is quite pretty, with lovely flowers. And from our balcony we could see the fireworks from Disney at night. A truly lovely experience.   It is a busy hotel being so close to Disney, but the staff are very professional and nice.  The breakfast offered a good variety, and the shuttle service to Disney was excellent. Although it is close
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your positive comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. We look forward to seeing you again and please feel free to contact me personally when your family is returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Look No Further Than The Candy Cane Inn
Summary: I have been to Disneyland the past 5 years in a row and after staying at various Hotels along the main road I have discovered this quaint gem! The hotel is an original from 1955 but has been renovated over the years. The cobblestone driveway and enchanting fountain that greet you as you enter the property tells you you have entered paradise! Despite being on Harbor Boulevard you do not hear any street noise and you are only a short 8 minute walk from the gates of Disneyland. There is a shuttle available also, free of charge! The grounds are kept up impeccably and the smell of the flowers and birds singing is so serene.There is a separate wading pool area for toddlers which is all enclosed by trees and flowers...I never saw any kids there though and found it to be a nice private
Manager Response: Thank you so much for being a repeat member of the Candy Cane Inn family. We appreciate your business and many kind comments regarding our property and team of service professionals. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: We have experimented with many accommodations in the area, but once we tried the Candy Cane, we knew our search was over. So close to the parks (you can see the back of Cars Land right behind), quiet, clean, charming and good breakfast. The staff are friendly and helpful, and they give you a voucher for a discount on your next visit if you return before a year has passed. We sleep 3 people to a room and have decided that upgrading to the Deluxe room is worth the extra charge.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us and I am delighted that you enjoyed your visit. The Rewards certificates are a great way for us to thank you for being a loyal and repeat guest and I am glad you are able to take advantage of them. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Great Place to Stay for Disneyland
Summary: I would highly recommend the Candy Cane Inn if you're traveling to Disneyland. We have stayed there more times than I can count and have never had a bad experience. The price is reasonable and accommodations are more than adequate. Its within walking distance of the park, although they have a free shuttle if you would rather not walk. Their free expanded continental breakfast has lots of items...something for everyone. They also give you a coupon for $10.00 off your next stay if it is within 12 months from that stay. They have other discounts as well (AAA, senior, etc.) Very good accommodations for the price.
Manager Response: Thank you for being a repeat guest and sharing your wonderful comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. We at the Candy Cane Inn strive in providing a clean comfortable and nicely decorated guestroom with a strong emphasis on friendly and caring team members. Our ambiance and peaceful setting is relaxing and enjoyed by our guests and we are glad that you enjoyed too. Kind regards!

Summary: We stayed 9/30-10/5/13. Our time at this hotel couldn't have been better. Every good thing everyone has written is true. We are not picky travelers and believe that you get what you pay for, so the value here is nearly hard to believe. My husband, upon arrival, posted a picture on his Facebook that simply said, "The coolest little retro hotel ever". I was just thrilled with the cleanliness, friendliness of staff and the comfort of the rooms. We will be back....hopefully soon.
Manager Response: Thank you for your gracious comments and staying with us at the Candy Cane Inn, as we DO appreciate your business! Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as I would be delighted to assist with rates and reservations. Warm Regards!

Summary: Very comfortable and nice. The staff was all very nice and helpful. The rooms are clean.  The shuttle is awesome.  We never once walked to Disneyland. I know its just two blocks, but that can seem like an eternity after a long day of walking.  I'd most definitely go back.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us and sharing your kind comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. I am pleased that you were able to enjoy our complimentary exclusive shuttle as well as the many other complimentary amenities that we have to offer here at the Candy Cane Inn. Kind regards!

Summary: The stay was pleasant, felt safe. If you stay as frequently as we do, you will know what I am talking about.  Some of the hotels around the Disneyland area are less expensive but not in very good areas of Anaheim.  The shuttle was nice for my family to go back and forth. We had to drive back and forth because they do not have a wheelchair accessible shuttle.  We paid more for the premium room and in my personal opinion was not worth it.  It came with a microwave and refrigerator, and a continental breakfast was delivered to our room in the morning.  Being diabetic, there wasn't anything I could eat.  Everything was carbs and lots of sugary items.  The room was clean and the staff was nice, this is always a plus for us! I would recommend this hotel for your stay but don't bother
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. We appreciate your valuable feedback and we do take all guest comments very seriously. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as I would be delighted to assist with rates and reservations. Warm Regards!

Summary: This is our fourth visit to the Candy Cane Inn in the past year.  It is our absolute favorite place to stay when we visit Disneyland.  It is like being home away from home.  The staff is friendly and accommodating.  We were greeted at the front desk by James.  After so many visits we now have become friends with Keico, Martha, and Edibertha.  These wonderful ladies manage the complimentary breakfast each morning. Edd is the friendly historian who greets us with his interesting collection of Tinker Bell.  One night, one of my sisters left her car lights on by accident, and Nick called our room to notify her. We were very grateful to say the least.  I like to reintroduce myself to Jeff, the manager, but he always seems to remember me.  We met Danielo, the house manager this trip.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your kind comments regarding our property, service and amenities. We have a wonderful team who take pride in their jobs and taking care of our guests and they too appreciate when folks take the time to write positive comments such as yours. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would by my pleasure to assist with future reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: Decided to give this hotel a try after being letdown by our normal hotel on multiple occasions & we couldn't be happier. The Candy Cane Inn is a great place to stay. There was plenty of parking for starters, check-in was a snap, and the room was immaculate. They provide a shuttle all day long so you don't have to walk. Even though if you don't want to wait for it, it took us 10 minutes to reach the front gate when we walked. We ate their continental breakfast which was great. They had everything you could ask for. I fully recommend this hotel if your heading to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us the opportunity on your recent visit and I am pleased that we were able to make your stay an enjoyable one. We look forward to having you stay with us again.Kind regards!

Summary: First time at the Candy Cane, location very close to Disney, the room was clean, air conditioner was quite and efficient, beds were comfortable.  The only thing I would do differently is request a room that is not on the end unit.  The Candy Cane is situated in a U type setting.  The rooms on the end units, we were in # 240 have 3 industrial strength fluorescent lights in the hall which will shine in your room all night, it will feel like you left the light on in your room.  Discussed this with the staff and were told it was for security reasons.  No sleep plus a day at Disney not good.   It is an older hotel but maintained well, breakfast by the pool was really good and a great way to start the day.  We had a Deluxe room that was a little small for a family of four, but worked
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and providing your valuable feedback. We do listen to our guests and appreciate the information as this enables us to make changes in our operation to enhance our product and service. Please be aware that we do try to meet all guest requests and should you stay with us again please don’t hesitate to make a specific request regarding the location of your room, as it would be our pleasure to serve you and your family. Kind regards.

Summary: Incredibly close walking distance to Disneyland, beautifully kept landscape, decent size rooms, great free-breakfast, peaceful atomosphere, comfy beds, convienient store right next door.  We will stay at the Candy Cane Inn next time back.  Already sold family on staying here during their trip in 2014.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and I am happy that you enjoyed the Candy Cane Inn and your visit. We appreciate your kind comments and please feel free to contact me personally when returning as I would be delighted to assist with rates and future reservations. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Third time staying here...some thoughts on our most recent stay
Summary: Our first stay at this hotel was back in 2003.  We returned in 2011, and again this past summer.  The one thing that always stood out for more me in our past two visits was how friendly the staff are.  I always felt so welcomed by the front desk staff and they always seemed to make you feel they would go out of their way to do anything for you.  I anticipated this same feeling when we returned again this past summer.  When we got to the front desk to check in, the gentleman, whose name I don't recall, was polite, but not really that friendly.  Now, I probably would have not even given this a second thought had I not stayed here before, but I was a little surprised.  I just dismissed it and thought that maybe he was having a bad day.  I encountered this same person several times
Manager Response: I am sincerely sorry that your experience in June was not as pleasant as your previous stay with us and I have attempted to reach you through TripAdvisor email with no response. I can say that we have made some upgrades and changes since your stay to better improve our service in all departments. We no longer have a few employees who have since departed and have brought in some new agents who are trained and practice the level of customer service that the Candy Cane Inn has built its reputation on. Our housekeeping staff has had some upgrades as well and I am happy to say that our rooms and carpets have never looked cleaner. Thank you again and I personally apologize for any inconvenience you had and please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards! Kind regards!

Summary Heading: I shouldn't tell you this, but....
Summary: ...this was by far the cleanest, best maintained property I have ever stayed on!  I have been going to Disneyland for more than 40 years. I have stayed at the California Grand Adventure, the Howard Johnson and everything in between. The Candy Cane in is the best property for the value and it is the best kept property of them all.   Our room was spotless, the pool was pristine, the beds were comfy and the shower spotless. It was just what we needed after spending the day walking and standing in line in the heat. You can tell that the owners really care about the guests. Thank you.   The reason I shouldn't tell you? Because then you'll want to stay there too and I might not be able to get in the next time.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your kind comments regarding our property, service and amenities. We have a wonderful team who take pride in their jobs and taking care of our guests and they too appreciate when folks take the time to write positive comments such as yours. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would by my pleasure to assist with future reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: I shelled out over $300.00 a night to stay at Disney's Grand Californian once.  I asked if they would mind printing out my boarding pass as I would be at Disneyland. They said, "We have a business center." I asked if they would call me a cab. They said, "In your room is a list of transportation companies." At the Candy Cane they said, "We'd be happy to print out your boarding pass and will you be needing transportation to the airport.?" Wow!! The Candy Cane is ALL about customer service. I haven't had a negative experience ever and I have been staying here for years! Best value, beautiful rooms and lots of smiles!  Now that's what makes a vacation enjoyable!  Thanks everyone at the Candy Cane Inn!
Manager Response: Thank you for your gracious comments and being a loyal and repeat guest of the Candy Cane Inn, we DO appreciate your business! Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as I would be delighted to assist with rates and reservations. Warm Regards!

Summary: Our whole stay at Candy Cane Inn was fabulous. From the moment we arrived, to the moment we left, everything was taken care of for us. Since it was out first visit to Disneyland/California our days were very long, and to come back to a clean, cozy and comfy room was truly appreciated. Loved all the extras that came with our room and the pillows were divine. Special thanks to all the staff for their friendliness and helping us with our plans. Will definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us and sharing your kind comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. I am pleased that your visit was enjoyable and that you were able to enjoy all of our many complementary amenities. We hope to see you again! Kind Regards!

Summary: We had a great time at the Candy Cane Inn. The free breakfast was hearty and much appreciated, the property is well kept, and our room was comfy and clean. It's very close to the main entrance to the park, but if your feet can't handle anymore walking, they provide a shuttle to and from Disneyland as well. Trust me, you will need it! Staff was also very helpful and friendly.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us and I am delighted that you enjoyed your visit. Kind regards!

Summary: Just returned home from the Candy Cane in Anaheim - it was our second time staying there having last visited in Aoril 2011.  Once again, the staff were very friendly and efficient - even the housekeepers always said hello when passing you. We saw one or two familiar faces from last time - pleased to see that Lee the shuttle driver was still there and remembered us from last time. As always, the shuttle was always on time and very handy at the end of a long park day - even though the walk from Disneyland is only 10 minutes. Only minor niggle was that the bus wasn't running at the end of the Halloween party on Tuesday 1st October - finished at 9.45pm that evening when party was on until 11pm.  The breakfast is always lovely around the pool in the morning and you can now go between
Manager Response: Thank you for being a repeat Candy Cane Inn guest and we DO appreciate your business and feedback. I am sorry for your A/C unit noise and should this occur please contact the front desk as we change the units out. We have taken measures to have our van make rounds for the individuals who are attending the Halloween parties. In regards to your comments about our Rewards Certificate expiration dates, this is something that I sincerely thank you for your feedback and both our owners and I think should be changed. This being said we have immediately initiated policy whereby we honor these for two years for oversees guests. Thank you again and please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: Stayed here for 2 nights while visiting Disneyland.... great location, an easy walk to the park however the shuttle service is excellent, and always on time.  We arrived prior to checkin and they let us park and take the shuttle early.  Room was spotless, staff polite and friendly... the only drawback... the breakfast area was a little cramped but the selection of food was very good and well stocked. I would definitely stay here again if I was in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us and sharing your kind comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. I am pleased that your visit was enjoyable and that you were able to enjoy all of our many complementary amenities. We hope to see you again! Kind Regards!

Summary: We stayed at the Candy Cane Inn with another family for 10 days, checked out on Tuesday the 1st of October.  Really great hotel, especially for families.  The property is immaculate and I thought very good value for money.  I have stayed at another hotel in Anaheim previously and also at a Disney property but would return to the Candy Cane Inn for sure.  We stayed toward the back of the property which we found was good, as I can imagine if you are a light sleeper (as I am) the pool noise may bother you.  A great hotel which I would highly recommend.

Since you'll be spending most of your time in Disneyland anyway, I wouldn't waste your money on the Disney resorts. Instead stay
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your positive comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. I am apologetic that our shuttles were too cold and please know that I have spoken to out Drivers to keep this in mind moving forward as we do listen to all guests and appreciate your valuable feedback. We do believe in providing an exceptional product and wonderful guest service while keeping in mind families travelling on a budget, and we hope to see you again soon. Kind regards!

Summary: This was our first stay at the candy cane inn, but we will definitely return here on our next visit to Disneyland.  Nice, family-friendly hotel with beautifully maintained grounds and gardens, quiet and relaxing.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your positive comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. We look forward to seeing you again and please feel free to contact me personally when your family is returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: My family loves Candy Cane Inn! It is within walking distance of the Disney parks but why walk when there is a shuttle to take you every 30 minutes? And pick up, which is nice after a lot of walking. :) Their rooms are quaint, clean, and accessible. We have two young children so we don't do well with lots of stairs and long hallways. The hotel is 2 stories and you can see the back of Disneyland California Adventure form their parking lot.  Speaking on parking, there is no charge to park there, so that saves the $15 a day for parking in the Disney parking lots. And be warned a lot of hotels in this area charge for parking. The breakfast is nice, Cold cereal, oatmeal, bagels, coffee, milk, juice etc. The pool is in the center and looks nice. I haven't stepped foot in it yet, but I
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your kind comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. We appreciate your business and delighted that your experience was wonderful. Kind regards!

Summary: I made a reservation for 5 people.  Upon arrival, I discovered that one of my family would be sleeping on the floor as I had not reserved a cot.  The reservation for 5 meant nothing, in fact, the room we were given was barely large enough to step over the poor sap sleeping on the floor.  I asked for extra blankets to make sleeping on the floor a bit softer and they never arrived.   I expected to overpay staying so close to DisneyLand, but I also expected some customer service.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and providing your valuable feedback. I am apologetic for the incident that you noted, as Guest Service is of the upmost importance to us here at the Candy Cane Inn. I have attempted to reach you through the TripAdvisor email system however have not heard back and wanted to respond. We do listen to all comments and while we never want to disappoint our Guest’s, we do value these opportunities to continue to train and grow our guest service. With that said I would like to point out that our website clearly states that our Deluxe rooms have two queen beds with a max occupancy of 5 per the fire code for the city of Anaheim and adds Rollaways are an additional $10.00 plus tax and tourism fee per night (subject to availability). We do not add that our rooms have pull out beds or anything of that sort as we do not want to give any sort of false advertisement at all. I again apologize for any inconvenience you may have experienced. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: great hotel in walking distance to Disney
Summary: Checked in after a long day on the road.  Quickly got us to our room.  Very comfortable.  No complaints.  Good complimentary breakfast.  They have shuttles to Disneyland, but it's easily in walking distance for those that are able.  Price was very good!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and we appreciate your kind comments regarding our products and services provided. Warm regards!

Summary Heading: Wonderful, charming, privately-owned hotel right next to Disney
Summary: Before I left for my trip to Anaheim for a convention and to visit Disneyland, I agonized over the hotel.  I saw that this hotel was #2 in all of Anaheim and read the reviews.  All the fabulous reviews were right on the money.  The rooms are clean, the grounds are safe, the breakfast is better than our typical continental offering and the staff was incredibly helpful and friendly.  And, the shuttle, was always right on-time with awesome drivers!  I cannot recommend this hotel more highly.  I would never spend the outrageous rates charged by other hotels.  Oh, the free internet access is super-fast.  Not a single complaint.  Had a wonderful time overall!
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us the opportunity on your recent visit and I am pleased that you concurred that the many fabulous reviews were right on the money. We do aspire to deliver a quality product and exceptional friendly service while being mindful of travelers on a family budget. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Highly rated Disney Good- Neighbor Hotel
Summary: Close to Convention center, Garden Walk, and their own personal shuttle to Disneyland. The rooms, grounds, pool ares are very clean. The people who work at CC keep it well maintained. The rooms are rather small, but as everyone else says, you're only there to shower, dress, sleep and go. The beds are extremely comfortable. I was really impressed with that. It was hard to crawl out of bed for Early magic, or D23. Didn't want to. The staff was helpful, and if your room isn't ready, they'll stow your bags, and if you want to go to the parks or anything on check out day- they'll keep your bags for you after check out too. We didn't have a flight until 5pm, but they held our luggage. We grabbed a cab back from the park; cab waited while CC got our luggage and loaded it, then off we
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for staying with us and sharing your comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. We appreciate your remarks about our team as they are wonderful group and it is my sincere pleasure to be associated with them. Yes, we receive many positive comments about our Serta Double Pillow Top Presidential Suite mattresses and I am delighted that you enjoyed as well. Kind regards!

Summary: The location was excellent for Disney and the Garden Walk.  Check in was a breeze and the front desk employee's were very helpful.  We checked in early, at 12:00 noon, but our room was not ready, as we had booked a room that offered late checkout, which I  am sure the prior guests were enjoying, which we enjoyed as well.  They gave us coupons for free appetizers and kids dinner at local restaurants to keep us busy, and told us to call before we came back and they would advise if our room was ready.  The room was very spacious and the beds were extremely comfortable.  We loved the option of having the continental breakfast delivered to our room or walking over to the breakfast area.   Delivery was prompt every morning.  We had a refridg and microwave in the room. We also really
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your kind comments regarding our property, service and amenities. We have a wonderful team who take pride in their jobs and taking care of our guests and they too appreciate when folks take the time to write positive comments such as yours. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would by my pleasure to assist with future reservations. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: A smile made all the difference!
Summary: It is refreshing to stay at a hotel that understands the vital difference those personal touches make. On our latest visit to the Candy Cane we were greeted at the front desk by James. He helped us check-in and answer all the questions we had about going over to Disneyland park the next day. Everything is always so clean and the grounds are impeccably maintained. We always feel so welcome and at home. Thanks again for a great stay. We will be back!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your kind comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. We appreciate your business and delighted that your experience was wonderful and you were able to enjoy our beautiful floral grounds. Kind regards!

Summary: We felt very comfortable and at home - pool area is small and intimate, so the kids met some new friends.  Unfortunatly room was also small and intimate... very squishy for family of 5.  But, who hangs out in their room when disney is just a 15 minute walk to the turnstiles!    Had read service was particualry great, but front desk staff wasn't super welcoming when we arrived, lots of chatter with each other and not with us. Went up to front desk again on second day and gal asked me if I was checking in... not really paying attention (I was in my bathing suit looking for another room key).  Spoke to housekeeping about getting our room clean each day by noon (we come back for afternoon) and it wasn't passed on so we came back to disaster.  They fixed that the next day though.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and providing your valuable feedback. I am extremely apologetic for the incident that you noted, as Guest Service is of the upmost importance to us here at the Candy Cane Inn. I have attempted to reach you through the TripAdvisor email system however have not heard back and wanted to respond. We do listen to our guests and I wanted you to know I have spoken to our Front Office team and used your comments as a training topic. While we never want to disappoint our Guest’s, we do value these opportunities to continue to train and grow our guest service. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: We just returned home from another terrific trip to Disney. So grateful to stay for the friendly and thoughtful service we received. James at the front desk is welcoming and so helpful. He made the check-in/check-out process quick and easy and is very knowledgeable about the area restaurants and attractions. We felt truly "at home". We will return again soon. Special thanks also to Amy in reservations who helped book our room. So delightful!
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us the opportunity on your recent visit to the Theme Parks, we appreciate your business and kind comments. We take great pride in our hotel and our wonderful staff and we thank you for recognizing this. Kind regards!

Summary: We feel you can't go wrong choosing the Candy Cane. We've stayed numerous times and always feel relaxed at right at home. We were there in june 2013 and our son had an allergic reaction to peanuts.  Yjey arranged transportation for us to a hospital and the nest morning James (I think it was) drove my husband to the drugstore and waited until he got the prescription.  Moast places would've probably handed us a list of cabs.  I think they go out of their way to accomodate their guests.  The breakfast is sufficient and can be taken to your room.  The shuttle drivers are very helpful and nice. Everyone has already said all the good things.  But please save us a room. I'm tryiung to book now and it  seems your inn is full .  Thanks for the great stays.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for being a loyal and repeat member of the Candy Cane Inn family. We appreciate your business and kind comments regarding our property and team of service professionals. I’m glad to hear your son was well taken care of and we are very proud of our Front Desk staff, who continue to work hard and give the best guest service possible to all our guests! Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: Stayed in May, took grandson to D land. Room was clean, comfy beautiful flowers nice pool area lotsa nice families and kids having fun breakfast buffet was just right. Shuttle service was great. Would definitely return!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and we appreciate your feedback about our rooms and services. We receive many positive comments about our exclusive complimentary shuttle and I am delighted that you found our service enjoyable. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: Got rooms in the back and 2nd floor as most suggested for a little more money. Worth it as more quiet for sure. Rooms are clean and spacious with queen beds. You need shuttle to get to Disney which the inn offers for free. Internet and breakfast were also free. Worth the stay with nice staff and clean place.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your kind comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. We appreciate your business and delighted that your experience was wonderful and you were able to enjoy our many complimentary amenities. Kind regards!

Summary: Beautifully kept landscape, rooms are clean and up to date and the staff, friendly.  Breakfast offered is plentiful and the location is convenient to Disneyland.  Price compared to the big hotel chains - this place beats them all.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us and sharing your comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. We Do appreciate and work extremely hard to earn and keep your business. Kind regards!

Summary: If you stay off the Disney property Stay Here. Our original plan was to spend two nights in another hotel. Due to the convention in town decent rooms were virtually non-exsistent. I had tried to book with the Candy Cane (we were referred by friends) prior to our visit and was unable due to they were sold out. Many friends had told me this was the place to stay and I was disappointed that I was not able to get a room. We were able to get a room at another establishment right across the street from the entrance so of course we took it due to available rooms were either much farther away or ones I thought I would not consider staying in. Well let me tell you that we spent one night wondering what we were smelling and laying on, totally gross. Desperate to get another room I tried
Manager Response: I am delighted to see that you were able to stay with us after we were recommended by many of your friends and that your experience was wonderful. Yes, our Premium Rooms have many nice amenities and guests certainly appreciate these during their stay. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: My son and I decided to do a trip out to Disneyland before school started.  We selected the CCI because of our previous stays.  All good.  This stay was just as expected.  From James and Nick at the front desk who answered our questions to the addition of eggs & cheese for breakfast options, CCI always seems to be striving for excellence. And the achieve it in my eyes.  Not only was the internet working, it was easy to connect to via my laptop and smart phone.    If there is one complaint I would have, it is directed more at the guests the hotel.  Please park your car in designated spots and not in the round-abouts. After walking the miles one does in the parks, walking the additional 100 feet to your car should be no problem.  We will stay here again...and most likely before
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us “again and again” and certainly know that we appreciate your business and DO care about our guests. Yes, the folks at the desk as well as the remainder of our team are very pleasant and guest service oriented. Please feel free to contact me when planning your Thanksgiving visit as I would be delighted to assist with reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: I originally chose Candy Cane Inn because of the very favorable Trip Advisor reviews and after comparison with many other hotels in the vicinity.  In the back of my mind I was concerned if I had made the right choice, but now know I had made the absolutely best choice.  Our stay at Candy Cane Inn was virtually perfect.  Even before arriving at Candy Cane Inn my choice was reaffirmed when I sent an e-mail to their contact address inquiring about receiving a parcel I would be sent.  I expected I would receive a reply in a couple of days and was totally surprised when in under an hour I received a reply from the general manager, Jeff.  I was impressed.  We arrived at Candy Cane Inn early on the morning of our arrival date having totally forgotten about check-in times and such.  The
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your kind comments regarding our property, service and amenities. We have a wonderful team who take pride in their jobs and taking care of our guests and they too appreciate when folks take the time to write positive comments such as yours. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would by my pleasure to assist with future reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: We decided to stay another day at Disneyland but there were no more rooms at Paradise pier we found Candy cane hotel and oh my God we loved it the price was half of what we paid on the othet hotel very clean very nice the clerk and bonus included breakfast deliciousand so many varieties very organized  this was awesome we are most defenetly staying in this hotel again.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and we are delighted that your visit was most enjoyable and you enjoyed our price value. Kind regards!

Summary: I am a frequent visitor to Disneyland (annual passport holder) & have stayed in alomst every hotel in the area, including on the Disney property.  The Candy Cane Inn is on an equal footing with the Disneyland Hotel ot Paradise Pier, for much less money.  It is pricier than some of the other hotels in the area, but it is also incredibly well maintained, conveniently close, with a shuttle offered at no charge, and offers a substantial breakfast in comparison to the "usual" continental breakfast.  The staff are all friendly and helpful, the rooms clean and comfortable, and the towels and sheets are much higher quality than one normally finds.  I would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your positive comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. Yes, we do believe in providing an exceptional product and wonderful guest service while keeping in mind families travelling on a budget. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Fantastic Hotel and Great Location for Disney!
Summary: We used The Candy Cane hotel for a base and then travelled around America in a camper van.  I meet my sister who lives in Australia and I live in UK. This was a great place to meet half way and we had the best time ever!. We stayed at the end of March and also again in mid April 2012.  Weather was lovely and we did Disney Land for the day.  We walked from the hotel to Disney land with my double buggy (easy to walk!)  The park was very easy and although smaller than Orlando it was great for our family!  We have 4 small kids!   The staff were so helpful, all of them! When we returned two weeks after our road trip they had kept my daughter's Micky Mouse T shirt in lost property!  The breakfast was great, simple and filling!  The pool was also really nice too.  Very friendly and
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us the opportunity on your recent visit to the Theme Parks, we appreciate your business and kind comments. We take great pride in our hotel and our wonderful staff and we thank you for recognizing this. Glad we were able to have found your lost t-shirt and you enjoyed some of our many complimentary amenities we offer here at our Inn. Kind regards!

Summary: This was our 2nd stay at The Candy Cane Inn and we loved it. We were initially given a ground floor room but we asked for a 2nd floor and it was no problem to change it. The room was great and spotless and the breakfast was a great start to the day. During the days we were there my husband was taken ill and I needed advice, so I went to reception and they gave me the details of a doctor that visits the hotels. Luckily he came promptly and my husband was treated and luckily recovered swiftly. The shuttle runs every 1/2 hour and is a bonus especially when it is hot. I cant recommend this place enough.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. Sorry to hear your husband was ill but glad our Front desk was helpful and was able to find you a quick solution. We appreciate your business and feedback provided. Kind regards!

Summary: This is our second stay at the Candy Cane Inn.  We previously stayed January 2009.  We had reserved a room many months ago, requesting a second floor room further away from the main road.  We were granted our request.  Check in was mere moments, friendly and efficient.  Breakfast was good with lots of selection.  Cereal, fruit, eggs, cheese, yogurt, oatmeal, bagels, toast, pastries, coffee, juice and milk.  Disney is about a 10 minute walk however it is nice to have the option of the shuttle.  Pool was a little chilly, but didn't seem to bother most.  The hot tub was lovely.  The rooms are a little small but we managed just fine with two adults and two teenagers.  The rooms are extremely clean.  We also noticed that it was very quiet as well.  We didn't hear anything from our
Manager Response: Thank you for being a repeat guest and I am extremely delighted that your recent stay was enjoyable. We are glad you enjoyed our Expanded Continental breakfast in addition to our many other complimentary amenities. Please feel free to contact me personally if there is anything that I can do to make your next visit even more enjoyable. Kind regards!

Summary: We stayed here the last time we took the kids to Disneyland, 8 years ago.  Since it had been so long since our last visit, I did check out the other hotels.  I'm glad we chose to come back here. First, its within an easy walk to the parks but they have a shuttle that runs like clock work every 15 minutes (leave hotel on the hour & half hour; leave the park on the quarter hours).  It also runs past the park closing so you never have to walk if you don't want to (lets face it, you will walk miles once you are in the parks, especially California Adventures). For this visit we went with the Premium 2 Queen room & it was worth the extra money to us.  You get extra space so there is room for a rollaway bed, which made our life easier as the kids weren't arguing over space in the bed.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and we certainly appreciate your kind comments and are delighted that you will be staying with us again in the future. The Premium rooms are a great value and we are glad you enjoyed the upgraded amenities. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: Unfortunately, we did not enjoy our stay at Candy Cane Inn as most people.  Yes, it's a cute motel, and great proximity to Disneyland, but that was about it for us.  We are a family of 4, kids ages 8 & 4.  I booked the Premium Room and requested 2nd floor to view fireworks, our stay was for four nights.  Upon arrival at 3:00, check in time, we did not receive the friendly staff that most people talk about.  A young woman helped us, I don't recall her name but she was very busy and when we were trying to ask about our room, she did not have any eye contact.  I finally asked her can you please look at us, once I said that she was fine.  She said our room wasn't ready and to wait 15 minutes.  Once we went back to check on our room it still wasn't ready so we accepted a 1st floor
Manager Response: First and foremost I would like to sincerely apologize that your stay was not to your expectations and I thank you for your input. We do listen to the comments of our guests and appreciate your valuable feedback and I have discussed with our front office team as friendliness is paramount in our business. In regards to our price value and the many resounding comments posted by past guests of the Candy Cane Inn I would like to share my findings. The hotel that you compared us to have daily charges of $16 for parking, $9.95 for WiFi, no Complimentary Expanded Continental Breakfast and the Anaheim Resort Transit shuttle would have been $14 for your family daily. Again, we appreciate your business and while I do not like to use this platform to challenge guests I do feel the need to clarify that our many complimentary items do add up. Kind regards!

Summary: We had a family vacation down there for a few days. We travelled there by train from LA, a must way to get there. Great hotel, large rooms, walking distance to Disney Land. Did not eat there, but there was a basket of food when we arrived. Nice staff. Will stay again
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers, we DO appreciate your business. Kind regards!

Summary: Stayed here with the family as it was close to the Disney entrance.  We found the property to be decent although there were a few bugs walking around the room, but the climate is such that these are everywhere I suspect.  We enjoyed the breakefast and the staff were nice and pleasent.  I'd certainly consider trying them again if needed.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and providing your valuable feedback. As we do have a lush garden landscape, we can attract the occasional bug or two and we thank you for your understanding. We do listen to our guests and appreciate the information as this enables us to make changes in our operation to enhance our product and service. Kind regards.

Summary: We usually stay at one of the Disney owned hotels when we visit Disneyland, but decided to go with Candy Cane Inn to save some money. It was a perfectly nice hotel. Our rooms were a little small for 4 people and our stuff, we should have splurged and paid for a bigger room. The hotel isn't new but it's very well maintained. The beds were very soft. The breakfast was nice. It had coffee, tea, milk, juice, cereal, yogurt, granola, fresh fruit, hard boiled eggs, bagels, toast, and various baked goods. Everyone in our party of seven found something they liked. What really makes this hotel is the landscaping. It would be a very basic two story hotel but they have flowers everywhere, it gives it a nice atmosphere. The shuttle was always on time. Overall a very good experience.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your kind comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. We appreciate your business and delighted that your experience was wonderful. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Not sure it's worth the extra $$
Summary: Make no mistake, this place is trying a bit harder than its competitors to create a sense of ambiance and charm...but you pay for it. The courtyard and swimming area are about the only things that are noticeably nicer than the other little hotels in the area, while the rooms (both the size and the quality) are very much like every other hotel room you've ever been in. The proximity to Disneyland is pretty good, but there are closer places with much shorter walks. And while our stay was pleasant, it wasn't exactly "magical" as the maid woke us up from a nap to ask if she'd left her cell phone in the room. The bottom line was that for shelling out the extra $15-20 a night compared to the other hotels, I was expecting to notice a real difference in experience and quality, and it
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and I am extremely apologetic for the incident that you noted. I have attempted to reach you through the TripAdvisor email system however have not heard back and wanted to respond. We do listen to our guests and while your stay was last September, I am happy to inform you that we have instituted a “No Cell Phone Policy” in April of this year for all members of our team. Please feel free to contact me should you be returning to the area as I would certainly like to speak with you as we would like the opportunity to restore your confidence in our Inn.  Kind regards!

Summary: Great little place to stay. 7 minutes from convention Ctr and 10 mins from Disney - walking. Clean. Safe.  Nice room.  Would definitely stay here again.  Little store near by for drinks and snacks.  CAA rate is a great money saving feature.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and we certainly appreciate your kind comments and are delighted that you would stay with us again in the future. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: This is the first time that we checked in at Candy Cane and our first time in California and first visit to Disneyland. So far, so good. Staff has been nice and polite. Great service. The only thing is that during the first hour we checked in and tried the hotel's wifi service, our laptop contracted a virus while my husband was surfing the internet. Anyway, he was able to fix the problem. The next morning, I informed front desk Nick about it in anticipation that he might need to report it. Otherwise, we're happy to be staying here. We will be checking out tomorrow, August 1.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your kind comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. We appreciate your business and delighted that your experience was wonderful. Kind regards!

Summary: This is an older motel that has been well renovated and is well kept.  We stayed four nights in a premium room in the back.  Our room was clean upon arrival and kept clean throughout our stay.  This room is a little bigger than a standard room and breakfast was delivered to our room every morning.  The bathroom was small, typical of an older motel, but clean and everything worked well.  There are two levels and no elevator.  The kids enjoyed the pool and hot tub.  We did try to do laundry our last night as we still had ten days to go on our trip, but the laundry was very busy and the dryers didn't dry anything.  I hung our wet laundry all around our room to dry.  It is walking distance to Disneyland and many restaurants, however, a shuttle bus was provided for us by the hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and providing us with this valuable feedback regarding your experiences. We do listen to our guests and certainly discuss guest comments to better train our employees on issues we can use to upgrade and better our operations and guest satisfaction. We do sincerely thank our guests for bringing items that will enhance the overall guest experience. Kind regards!

Summary: Convenient and nice hotel close to Disneyland with frequent shuttle bus services to the park.  Only drawback is that early check-ins are a problem if you arrive in LA early in the mornings, waiting times vary on availability of rooms.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I plan ongoing to Disneyland every year if possible and I will be staying here. The rooms where nice, quite,and clean. I loved the hot tub and pool. Stayed at places where pool closed at 7 they close at 11 great after a long day at the park. Staff was friendly and help full. Subway across street and 711 two spots over. What more could you ask for.
Manager Response: We are delighted that found your new home away from home and thank you for your wonderful comments. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: I have been to Disneyland so many times and I can't believe it took this long to find this place. My friend and I were planning a two day trip to Disney and we couldn't get in to our normal hotel. I found this and we took a chance....NOT disappointment. There are only about 100 rooms or so and they are very decent in size. The property looks like it was pulled from Disney and dropped next door. Beautiful floors make the entrance very inviting. They have a small pool and Jacuzzi and continental breakfast which is great if you are traveling with kids, which I have before. I would recommend if you are on a budget, but still want a nice hotel. I know a lot of people prefer the doors on the inside rather than the outside for safety reasons, but I felt very safe here. You can walk to
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us the opportunity on your recent visit and we are delighted that you finally found our Inn. Yes, we are a moderately priced family property with an emphasis on quality accommodations and exceptional guest service. Kind regards!

Summary: I was a little apprehensive about staying here during our recent trip to Disneyland since it was the only place I could get in a short notice.  Spend 2 nights the weekend of 7/19 - 7/21.  Rooms are clean and very quite, the best part is the proximity to Disneyland.  Although, they offer a shuttle service, the entrance to the park is only a 6 minute walk.  Will stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and we appreciate your comments regarding our cleanliness and being so very quiet. Yes, our location is wonderful and our exclusive complimentary shuttle to the theme parks is an added bonus. Kind regards!

Summary: i love staying at this hotel . the rooms are very clean , the bed is very comfortable , and the grounds are very pretty . We have stayed at other places near Disneyland much more expensive and the service is not near as good . The gm of the hotel is very helpful and very gracious . The hotel is a short 5 to 10 min walk away from Disneyland , and there is always the free shuttle . Another plus parking at the hotel is free . At most hotels in the area you have to pay for parking . The showers have good water pressure and the shower head is up high so my husband doesn't have to bend his legs . This place is great and we will stay here many times in the future .
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and we certainly appreciate your kind comments and are delighted that you will be staying with us many times in the future. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: This is the best Disneyland hotel value for your $$$. All the workers are super nice and helpful, the entire place is clean including the room.  The shuttle service was great and the breakfast was yummy and the pool the right temp.  We have been traveling for over three weeks and we encountered the softest pillows and the nicest greeting.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and I appreciate your kind comments about our team. They are a great group of service professionals and I too am very fond of each and every one of them and thank them for all that they do on a daily basis taking care of you, our valued guests. Kind regards!
