Summary: Small but clean rooms. Beautiful grounds - lots of flowers. Pool with jacuzzi and small childrens pool.  Good breakfast.  But the best thing is the location - walking distance (500 m) to Disneyland park. They even have a shuttle-bus service, but we preferred the stroll.   Good service - we had a problem with the room safe when we arrived - got it fixed immediately!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and while I apologize you had an issue with your room safe I am delighted that a member of our team immediately fixed it. We appreciate your business and look forward in seeing you again. Kind regards!

Summary: We just returned from a 3 day, 3 nights trip to Anaheim, where we stayed at the Candy Cane Inn. A friend had recommended the place, saying that she and her family always stay there. We were not disappointed.  We'd reserved two rooms for three nights, taking the smaller "Standard" rooms since we weren't planning to do much more than clean up and sleep there. Check-in was quite easy, allowing each family to pay for their own room. The hotel offered AAA, AARP or active-duty military discounts; they allowed two rooms to be reserved on one AAA membership. The only problem we found with check-in was parking. At first, our parking spot wasn't very near our rooms at all. It wasn't until the second day that a parking spot opened up closer to our rooms.  The room was very clean, the beds
Manager Response: Thank you for saying with us and I am delighted that you took the recommendation of your friend and gave us the opportunity. We have many repeat guests who like yourself visited us on the word of others and we appreciate this very much. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Charmed with our Frist Stay at the Candy Cane Inn
Summary: This was our first stay at the Candy Cane Inn, and we were absolutely charmed with it's whimsical setting and all it had to offer!!   Our second floor room, #279, was perfectly quaint...with just what you need...comfy beds, a beautiful window, a great shower head, and a mini fridge....and it was all super, super clean. We also had a lovely little table and chair set right outside our door, that provided an inviting place to sit and relax...anytime of the day or night!!  Over the three days/nights we spent at the Candy Cane Inn, I used the pool at least seven times. It was a very pretty and popular spot to soak up some glorious afternoon sun, and a perfect way to spend a break from Disneyland (especially during the hottest and most crowded hours at the park!!) I used the gym
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your kind comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. We appreciate your business and delighted that your experience was wonderful. Kind regards!

Summary: This was our first stay at the Candy Cane Inn, and I chose it based off the positive reviews and the annual pass discount.  We stayed in Room 203.  Upon arrival the front desk was very friendly  and helpful.  Our room upon first glance was small but clean.   The upholstered chairs and carpet were dirty but overall not too bad.  What really bothered me was the large amount of fruit flies that kept coming out of the drain holes surrounding the sink.  It was disgusting.  I would place the hair drier around the area and try and kill as many as I could.  I was so tempted to go to the  store and by apple cider vinegar etc to make a trap to kill them all. We did not eat from the continental breakfast that was offered because I had packed a toaster and frozen waffles and other items
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us and providing us with your valuable feedback and I sincerely appreciate our conversation today on the phone. We look forward in seeing you in August when you will be celebrating your little ones seventh birthday and in restoring your confidence in the Candy Cane Inn. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: This Will Now Be Our First Choice
Summary: We have been coming to Anaheim for years and had tried just about every hotel within walking distance of Disneyland and somehow we have missed this property.  I am so glad we finally tried it and will call it first whenever we return to the area.   The property itself is ideally located, less than 5 minutes away from the I-5 offramp and a quick 10 minute walk to Disneyland.  We usually bring our own food & snacks so the convenient distance made it very easy for us to hop back and forth between the parks and the hotel.  There is a shuttle that travels to/from the park every 30 minutes and we did use it once.  We actually prefer the walk, however it is a nice option for those with small children. There is also a nicely appointed pool area that has a full sized swimming pool, a
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind comments and wonderfully written in-depth review of our property. I am so glad you enjoyed the many complimentary amenities we have to offer here at the Candy Cane Inn. Jose is the newest member to our Management team and has been a wonderful addition and we thank you for recognizing this. I speak on behalf of all our team that we do look forward to your next visit with us! Kind regards!

Summary: When we arrived at the Candy Cane Inn we were very impressed with the lushly landscaped grounds and the cleanliness of the area. Given it's proximity to Disneyland and the warm feel, my family mistakenly thought the CC was a Disney property... they were shocked when I informed them otherwise.  We were allowed to check-in early. We found our rooms to be spotlessly clean, of adequate size for 2 and comfortably furnished. Cleanliness of hotels is my biggest issue and I could not find anything that was not up to my high standard.   The breakfast buffet was adequate, but no hot items. The inside dinning area was not large enough, but because the weather was nice we sat pool side. The shuttle to Disney was timely, but we had difficulty understanding the driver due to a strong accent.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. We appreciate your business and feedback provided. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: No More Searching for the Best Place to Stay at Disneyland
Summary: After trying multiple different Disneyland area hotels over the years, I don't think I'll ever stay anywhere else.  Our stay was just great - everything we could have asked for and more. My grandson & I stayed June 24 - 28, and had a Deluxe Queen room, which was very clean and updated. The room was exactly what I asked for in my reservation - 2nd floor towards the back with a view of the fireworks. I was so surprised how quiet the hotel is at night, even fully booked. The beds were very comfortable, and we slept very well. The bonuses of the continental breakfast & especially the shuttle were just great. Loved the shuttle, even though the hotel is in easy walking distance to the park. The staff was very pleasant & helpful, even carrying my heavy suitcase upstairs for me. A
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your kind comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers, as we certainly appreciate your time and business. Glad to see you enjoyed all of our complimentary amenities that we offer here at the Candy Cane Inn, and that we were able to accommodate your requests that you had with a 2nd floor room. Kind regards!

Summary: We have been coming here for about 8 years but I don't believe I've ever reviewed it before so I figure I better give this hotel its good review.  After being diehard Disney hotel people, we tried this one out and have never gone back to Disney hotels.  The kids always want to come here.  We love the grounds, the pool, the rooms, and the service.  We've always booked the premium room but it was not available this time so we took the deluxe room.  We actually enjoyed coming down to breakfast by the pool in the morning rather than having it in our room.  It was nice to have breakfast in a cool, pretty area.  The room was always clean and the staff are all very friendly.  We will be back in a few months as we are annual passholders.
Manager Response: Thank you for being a repeat guest and I am extremely delighted that your recent stay was enjoyable. We are glad you enjoyed coming down for breakfast and the outside view by the pool area, which is beautiful and lush with greenery. Please feel free to contact me personally if there is anything that I can do to make your next visit even more enjoyable. Kind regards!

Summary: I don't normally write reviews. However my recent stay at Candy Cane Inn was extremely disappointing. A couple months ago, some friends and I stayed at Candy Cane Inn and it was wonderful. We booked a room for two nights. We had 4 adults in the room and 3 cars. We were able to check in and park with no problem.  One thing you will notice when staying here is that parking is tight. However, as long as you get a parking pass for your car from the front desk, you should be fine...or so we thought.  Upon arriving to the hotel this time, we ran into a snag. Part of my room had checked in and gotten a parking pass for their car. When I arrived, the front desk informed me that we are only allowed one parking pass per room and I would need to park somewhere else off the property. I
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and I am sincerely apologetic that you felt your experience with us was disappointing. I am the Front Office Manager answering on behalf of my General Manager Jeff Holl and I am the male attendant your friend spoke with at the Front Desk. I apologize that I seemed rude and did not assist your friend in which she felt was a timely manner, as I was attempting to answer multiple phone calls to assist all guests who may need assistance, at the same time as your friend. I also apologize for the inconvenience you may have felt with allowing multiple vehicles, as we do ask all our guests to show consideration to other guests who also may have a vehicle with us, and our adhering to our policy of 1 vehicle per room, which is clearly noted in our hotel’s terms and conditions that is sent out to all our guests via confirmation emails, as well as on our Hotel’s website. Kind regards!

Summary: It you want a full service fancy hotel, you may want to stay elsewhere BUT you are either paying 4x as much to stay at the Disney properties or staying further out.  This place is great if you need a place to call home base while maximizing your trip at the park.   We originally booked (for a lower rate) a brand name property elsewhere but quickly tallied up the cost of parking, wifi, breakfast and shuttled, together with the great convenience of it's proximity to the park and it was more than a wash.    This property is very well maintained and from what I would tell, it has a very deep property line which means the rooms are set back from the road making it much more quiet than its competitors.  The rooms were clean, in our dealings with both maintenance staff and housekeeping
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. We are very proud of our hard working staff, who continue to work hard to keep our Hotel a clean and friendly environment. We appreciate your business and feedback provided. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Super location, well run facility, couldn't be better
Summary: Our family stayed here for 5 nights in July. My wife researched this through Trip Advisor, and we were thrilled with our choice.  The motel was very clean, with great service, and an excellent shuttle.  The price included parking, wi fi, and breakfast all at a competitive rate. This is an exceptionally well run motel, with one of the most convenient locations to disneyland. We walked many times to the park and it is about a 7 minute walk. If you miss the shuttle, hey no big deal just walk.  When we did line up with the twice an hour shuttle, it was also great.  We will be back.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us and sharing your kind comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. Please feel free to contact me personally if there is anything that I can do to make your next visit with us more enjoyable. Kind regards!

Summary: This will be my 8th annual visit to the candy cane inn. I can now tell that this is a very popular hotel. The rooms were all booked up so parking was a bit of a hassle but we were able to find parking close to the room. The room itself was starting to show some ware and tear due to the fact that the wallpaper was peeling in the bathroom but that's just cosmetics. The service at the hotel is where it truly shines every one from the maids to the bus driver are very friendly and helpful.. I will definitely  be retuning to the candy cane inn.(the new flat screen TVs in the rooms were a nice touch)
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your comments. I also thank you for your quick response to my email, and as I stated we appreciate all our guest feedback and my engineers have taken care of the wallpaper in the room you stayed in. Guest feedback is what allows us to continue to pursue and give exceptional guest service. Take care and kind regards!

Summary Heading: Great Place to Stay When Visiting Disneyland
Summary: We found this venue to be a great place to stay when going to the Disney Parks.  Reasonably priced when an attentive staff.  Rooms were clean and comfortable and the breakfast very good.  It is easy walking distance to the main gate of the parks and thier shuttle bus runs promptly twice every hour.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. We appreciate your business and feedback provided. Kind regards!

Summary: This was the second time we've stayed at the Candy Cane Inn and we would stay again.  We asked for a second floor room at the back and this is what we got.  We stayed in a Deluxe 2 Queen.  Breakfast is okay.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and we appreciate your return visit. We certainly strive to provide an exceptional product with a friendly and caring team and thank you for your feedback. Please feel free to contact me personally when planning your return trip as we are always interested in how we can improve your four rating to a five. Kind regards!

Summary: We stayed here for two nights during the spring time.  It was everything we'd hoped for someplace to lay our heads after long days at Disneyland and more!!  The free shuttle was an extra bonus after walking all day, the ABC store right next door was great for snacks, beverages or meds if needed or a little drink at night to cap off the evening.  The hotel staff were very pleasant and welcoming, the continental breakfast was just enough to fill us up before the parks, and the FREE parking!!  Can't say enough about this hotel.  We will be returning again next month!!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us and sharing your comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. Please feel free to contact me personally if there is anything that I can do to make your visit next month more enjoyable. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: 2nd visit and loved it even more!
Summary: We stayed here over Father's day weekend for Disneyland fun and Anaheim Angels game. Instead of a standard room I decided to upgrade to a Deluxe room. I Loved it much better. I love Candy Cane Inn because the grounds are nice, service is awesome and fast, rooms are clean. What I loved about the Deluxe room better is it def. has more room than a standard and I like the layout better, it's a bit different than a standard room. Bathroom area remains the same size. Breakfast was average. We always take fruit and yogurt to go. I love the walking distance to the park, it's perfect for our family. My boys love that the hotel is right behind Cars Land. I will def. be staying again and I had to review this place again because I don't think I gave it enough credit the first go around. You
Manager Response: Thank you for being a repeat guest and I am extremely delighted that your second stay was most enjoyable. Yes, the additional two feet of width in Deluxe room makes moving around the room a bit easier. And yes, Cars Land in our backyard is exciting to many young visitors. Kind regards!

Summary: My Husband and I stayed here for our honeymoon. I happened to find this hotel randomly while researching hotels in the Anaheim area for our Disney vacation.  We loved the convenience of its location to both parks. The beds were very comfortable and the rooms clean. My only hang up occurred when we returned from our room after our first day of exploring Disneyland. I had placed my suitcase on the luggage holder by the bed nearest the wall since it would be out of the way. Well, when we returned to the room, the rack with my suitcase on top was in the middle of the path to the bathroom by the table. And our pillows which we had brought from home were on the chair. Okay, so I understand the maid needed to make the bed, but she should have either put the luggage holder back where
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us on your very special occasion and bringing your very important comments to our attention. We certainly appreciate and listen to our guests and will use this feedback for immediate refresher training. You are very right and items are to be left where they are found and A/C units are not to be turned off in occupied rooms for guest’s convenience upon return. Kind regards!

Summary: We stay here every time we go to Disneyland.  The rooms are clean, the breakfast is decent.  They have a shuttle which is nice after a long day in the park.  The hotel grounds are beautiful, and the staff is the best in Anaheim.  We've been staying here for years (several times a year), and wouldn't think of anything else.  Also, being diabetic, very happy they added hard-cooked eggs to the breakfast.  See you again in a few months!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for being a loyal and repeat member of the Candy Cane Inn family. We appreciate your business and kind comments regarding our property and team of service professionals. Kind regards!

Summary: This is a wonderful gem right next to Disneyland. Older hotel owned by the son of the original owner who takes great pride in upkeep.  VERY CLEAN!  We liked the premium room with breakfast delivered to our room every day, and special welcome treats.  It was a very quiet room.  We loved the convenience of the hotel shuttle, even though Disneyland entrance was just a couple blocks away.  Lots of good places to eat within walking distance of the hotel.  Also, free parking!!  Other hotels we looked at were charging up to $16.00 a day for parking and did not offer shuttle service.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers, we certainly appreciate your time and business. Yes, our owners have been here for over 56 years and image, integrity and pride have always been the foundation of our Inn! And you are right parking is just one of the complimentary items that we provide in our room rate in addition to our Expanded Continental Breakfast, Exclusive Shuttle to and from the Theme Parks and also our WiFi throughout our property and guestrooms. Kind regards!

Summary: Our family stayed here for two nights before heading over to Hawaii.  We arrived at 10:30 am local time hoping we could check in.  We were in our room at 12 pm.  Great staff, clean rooms, grounds, shuttle and close to everything Disneyland.  Breakfast was free!
Manager Response: I am delighted to read that we were able to provide you with an early check-in and your stay was most enjoyable. Hope you had a wonderful time in Hawaii and see you again when your travel plans bring you back to the happiest place on earth!

Summary: Stayed here June30 - July07. Loved it! Property is gorgeous, staff is friendly. Rooms were clean, breakie is basic, but a good way to stay to start the day. The shuttle runs every 30 mins. CCI is only a 9 min walk to Disney if you happen to miss shuttle or it leaves early (which happened once to us!). Beds were comfy, shower fan was quite loud. I would def recommend this hotel and stay here again. Family friendly with a pool, hot tub and kiddie pool. Had a great experience. Lots of restaurants nearby, 7-11 next door.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. I am so sorry that our shuttle left early and for future visits please  keep in mind in the busy morning hours the bus may leave early if completely full however  it will it will come directly back and make another trip to the theme parks. Kid regards!

Summary: We stayed at the Candy Cane Inn this past June, and enjoyed our entire visit.  We requested the same room we occupied in April 2013.  Tripadvisor only allows comments every three months or I would have written about out previous stay.  We love staying at the Candy Cane Inn.  We were fortunate to receive the same room we occupied in April, which was very convenient for our needs.  The clerks (James) at the front desk were always helpful, accommodating, and polite. We enjoyed visiting with Edd at breakfast time.  He is a longtime employee, who shares his knowledge of Tinker Bell and Disneyland with each visit.  The ladies Keico and Martha are so gracious and kept the breakfast room looking great each morning.  Our housekeeper Martha was so nice and left extra towels for us each
Manager Response: Thank you so much for being a repeat Candy Cane Inn guest and I certainly appreciate the kind comments about so many members of our team. It was very nice meeting you personally and again, I thank you for taking your time and look forward in seeing you again on future visits. Please feel free to contact me personally as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations. Warm regards!

Summary Heading: First timers to the Candy Cane Inn
Summary: We will be arriving tomorrow , we booked a 3 night stay. My sister and her family always stay there and so does my good friends family. They both highly recommend this Inn, because of the personnel service for their guests and beautiful grounds.
Manager Response: Thank for listening to your family and friends and choosing the Candy Cane Inn. We look forward in providing you the utmost in personal service and enjoyment of our beautiful grounds. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Close to the action, clean, breakfast too.
Summary: A few nights at Candy Cane inn made our Disneyland vist that much more enjoyable.  Each morning our family had breakfast, then walked to Disneyland in time for opening.  It was February, but the grandkids did some time in the pool. Everythig was nice.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and I am delighted that your grandchildren enjoyed our pool that is heated year round for guest satisfaction. Kind regards!

Summary: We were only doing a one day trip to Disneyland, and wanted something nearby for one night.  The Candy Cane Inn was perfect!  The rooms were comfortable and clean.  Breakfast is continental.  Muffins, breads, fruit, and cereal.  We enjoyed sitting around the pool enjoying our breakfast.  It was a beautiful morning.  We left our vehicle at the inn and used their shuttle service to get to Disneyland, and it was great.  The drivers were very friendly.  Took us right to the front of Disney, and then picked us up again later that evening.  We loved the landscaping.  It was beautifully cared for, and made the stay just that more relaxing.  The personnel were all very friendly.  I would highly recommend for anyone staying in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your wonderful comments regarding our property and services provided with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. In regards to the difference of the standard and deluxe rooms, the deluxe are approximately 45 square feet larger and are rated a maximum of five occupants versus the standard that is rated four occupants per city of Anaheim fire code. Please keep in mind that both rooms have two queen sized beds and the only difference is the additional free floor space in the deluxe room. Kind regards.

Summary: We have been staying at the Candy Cane Inn since 1993 when we visit Disneyland. For the majority of the time we lived about an hour and a half away and would still choose to stay there because it was always such a great experience.  However over the last year (we visited 3 times even though now we are 10 hrs away) our experience has had a few bad moments. On one visit the front desk was not very friendly and seemed put off when we asked questions. Then recently when I called about reservations the gentleman was very rude and quick to hang up. If I had some questions he would have been gone before I could ask them.  As you can imagine over the past 20 years we have referred numerous people to this hotel. Now I worry that if we refer them they might not have a good experience. I
Manager Response: Thank you for posting your comments on TripAdvisor and I am concerned regarding your stay in August of 2012. I have reached out to you via email so that we provide you the stay that you have become accustomed to with your many years of past stays. Please feel free to contact me personally as I have stated in my email as it would be my pleasure to assist. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Turned a bad experience into a great one
Summary: We have been staying at the Candy Cane in for years.  About a year ago, I had a really bad experience at The Candy Cane and wrote a review about it.  The General Manager immediately contacted me and we made arrangements for our next stay.  He addressed all of my issues and made the experience a great one.  We have been back about 3 times since then and have continued to have a great experience.  Don't pass up this great hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for being a loyal and repeat Candy Cane Inn guest, we DO appreciate your business. I am delighted that we were able to restore your faith in our wonderful property and the guest service provided by our team. Please feel free to contact me when you are returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: In march we went for our first family Vacation with two toddlers. I'm very picky about Cleanliness and i was very pleased with the bathrooms being So clean.  Breakfast was delivered to our room every morning and that was great because who wants to chase two little kids around while trying to get ? The man who drove the shuttle was amazing. I am very surprised no one has mentioned him. He deserves a huge raise. Every time he saw us he offered to help with the stroller or diaper bag. Such a kind hearted man. We loved that we could count on the shuttle being there every half hour so if the kids needed a break we could have a ride. We walked back a few times. Nice walk.short.i felt safe. Like i said we love candy cane and will be coming back this next March.I have six friends that
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and we appreciate your kind comments about our housekeeping team, they do an awesome job in keeping our property pristine. Yes, our drivers are very helpful and they are mentioned from time to time but to be honest they simply enjoy what they do and seeing the happy guests is their reward. Kind regards!

Summary: Driving into the Candy Cane driveway always feels like coming home!  Perfectly trimmed foliage and fauna line the spotless stone walkways, with cascading flower baskets provide a tunnel of color, as you make your way to your room.  Rooms are spacious, clean, and comfortable with a southern plantation feel with wooden shutters on the windows.  All rooms come with a small fridge and you can request a room with a microwave.  The large bathroom counter, sink and mirror are separate from the toilet and shower area, making it convenient for a family of four to get their Disney day started.  We prefer the premium room, which includes your breakfast and coffee to be delivered to you at your requested time.  The Candy Cane shuttle leaves every half hour and will pick you up at Disney
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind comments and wonderfully written in-depth review of our property. I happen to agree with you and yes, we are truly blessed to have owners that clearly and sincerely care about the image of their property and our team of employees that are like family. Being that our owners have been here for over 55 years certainly speaks volumes of their desire to provide the highest quality product and deliver the utmost in customer service that the Candy Cane Inn has become known for. Kind regards!

Summary: I stayed here with my very elderly mother. They very kindly gave us the room right next to the shuttle and across from the breakfast room. Breakfasts were great. And the shuttle ran regularly every half hour early till late- bang on time! Younger people can easily walk to Disney however. Hot coffee and tea were always available. I will stay here again when going to Disney! (And you can see the fireworks from the end of the hotel!)
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and I am delighted that we were able to provide a room that was close and convenient for your mother! Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: This was our fourth stay at the Candy Cane Inn, and it was just great.  The breakfast, served pool-side, was better than ever---very fresh fruit, several kinds of bagels & cream cheese, toast, fresh danishes, muffins, yogurt, several cereals, oatmeal packets, peanut butter, milk, juice and coffee.  You have to factor the breakfast value into the cost of the room when comparing it to other hotels.  We have stayed at many other hotels around Disneyland and most of them offer packaged danishes and coffee and call it a free breakfast.   The room was spotlessly clean and smelled fresh.  The beds are really comfy. Parking is free.    The shuttle is a real bonus to this hotel. You can easily walk to the park, but after a long day running around Disneyland that Candy Cane shuttle is a
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for being a repeat guest and sharing your wonderful comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. I sincerely appreciate the time you have taken to send your feedback regarding our property and services provided by our team and they too enjoy reading these comments. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning and it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: we will be staying there for the 4th time  this July...No luxury but clean and comfy, the grounds are beautiful and very well maintained. Very close to Disney, you can either walk  (WE WALKED WITH 2 SMALL CHILDREN) or take the  complementary shuttle to the park. The rooms are of decent size compared to those offered by Disneyland Hotel. Complementary breakfast is  very good, and we like the coffee very much. I would recommend this hotel to everyone who needs accommodation while visiting Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for being a loyal and repeat guest of the Candy Cane Inn, we DO appreciate your business and look forward in seeing you in July! Warm regards.

Summary Heading: You would pay much less if this weren't by Disneyland, but comes out a winner with comparison motels
Summary: Everything you read in the reviews is accurate. Clean, budget motel (if you can say that about any Disney-close motel) with decent breakfast and great pillows. Just a few notes I didn't see in other reviews, there are no in-room movies, so know that if you come back for periods at the motel, you won't be able to do that. The parking spaces are a little too close together. I was wedged in a small car between two big vehicles...they should repaint those and give a few extra inches to get the doors all the way open on cars. The key locks are old school (I'm sure it's one way to keep the costs down) and the front desk person who checked me in seemed harried and not overly friendly. Also, our housekeeper moved my suitcase from a luggage rack and dumped in on it's side (open) in a
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with and bringing your comments to our attention as we certainly listen to our guest as we strive to improve our product and services. I am so sorry about your suitcase and I will speak with our housekeeping management team as our room attendants are very good about informing us should they knock something over by mistake. In regards to our room rates, please keep in mind as many other guests have stated here on TripAdvisor that when you factor in our complimentary items such as, parking, exclusive shuttle to the theme parks, expanded continental breakfast, WiFi and no resort fees we are in line. Kind regards!

Summary: We have been staying at the Candy Cane for the past 6 years.. Always a very clean room. It's nice to wake up to a breakfast down by the pool before visiting Disneyland.  All the staff are very friendly and the shuttle drivers the same! Parking is included with the room and a $10 off certificate is given for your next stay. We plan to visit the Candy Cane same time next year, and the next and the next!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us and sharing your comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers and please feel to contact me personally when returning next year as it would by my pleasure to assit with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: This place is seriously the best! Great rooms, lovely pool, good price. Walking distance to Disneyland. But if your too tired, they also provide a shuttle bus there! Breakfast was also very nice. Would definitely recommend this place to anyone.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and we appreciate your recommendation to other travelers. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Candy Cane Inn is a exceptional hotel that has eveything you need at the right price.
Summary: My wife and I stayed there for 8 nights. As soon as we pulled in we were impressed. The hotel grounds were beautiful. The staff is very friendly, helpful & accomidating. Our room was very clean & roomy. We heard no noises from neighbors just peace and quiet. Housekeeping did a great job, always keeping toiletries full & the room clean. The continental breakfast was always kept full & fresh. They had coffee, juices, fruits, cereals, bagels, donuts, breads, muffins, yogurts, hard boiled eggs & cheeses. Thats money we were able to save on breakfast for other things. We were lucky enough to walk out our door and watch Disneys fireworks every night. They are only a 5 minute walk to the center of Disney. You can't beat their prices for the value you get. If you are going to Disney
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us the opportunity on your recent visit to the Theme Parks, we appreciate your business and kind comments. We take great pride in our hotel and the cleanliness of our rooms and all parts of the property, and we thank you for recognizing this. Glad you enjoyed our expanded continental breakfast as well. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Great value, great location, great service
Summary: We were exhausted after being stuck in traffic most of the day and were greeted by a gentleman employee who was absolutely wonderful.  He helped us get settled in, and gave us advise.  He just made us smile.  The other staff was very helpful.  The place is clean, the laundry facilities clean, the bus service to Disneyland wonderful and I could go on.  This was such a pleasant experience and we would stay here again definitely.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your kind comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. Please feel free to contact me when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: Just returned home from a three night stay here.  We had 2 premium rooms.  I have always wanted to stay at The Candy Cane Inn and am so glad to finally get the chance.  The hotel is beautiful, the flowers were lovely and I loved the cobblestone pavement.  Check-in was very smooth and even though our rooms weren't ready, our luggage was held while we went to the parks for several hours.  Breakfast and a newspaper delivered each morning was an added bonus.  The rooms were so quiet with big fluffy towels and real toilet paper.  The shuttle to and from the parks always ran on time.  The driver even let us off at our room door on one occasion because my sister-in-law was having knee problems and in a lot of pain after a day of walking.  The ladies that delivered our breakfast each
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and providing us with your valuable feedback. I am delighted to hear you enjoyed our Premium rooms, as they are a great value for our guests. Thank you for your understanding regarding the order of our rooms being cleaned, but please don’t hesitate to call the Front Desk on your next visit, and we would be glad to have your room serviced as soon as you leave to go to the parks. Kind regards.

Summary: We stayed for 11 days and everyday was wonderful. First the price was right, cheaper than staying at Disneyland, and closer than some of the Disney owned hotels. We had two rooms (not adjoining) right across from the pool, and I never heard anyone late at night, maybe because I was so tired or because it seemed like mostly families staying there. The rooms are pretty much soundproof. The staff was pleasant, free continental breakfast, cereal, hard boiled eggs, yogurt, pastries, bagels, milk, coffee, apple juice and OJ, even cheese, all fresh, just right for getting you started for the day. Free shuttle to Disneyland every half hour, bus drivers were always on time and pleasant, rooms were clean, beds very comfy! The pool and hot tub were always clean, beautiful grounds Also lots
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your wonderful comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. We certainly attempt to provide an exceptional product with an emphasis on friendly customer service while being mindful of families and budget sensitive travelers. We do appreciate your business and please feel free to contact me personally should your travels bring you back to the friendliest place on earth! Warm regards.

Summary Heading: Good value for Money, Great location
Summary: Very conveniently located neighbourhood hotel near Disneyland. They had a shuttle service to Disneyland every 30 minutes so it was super convenient to go back and forth. Breakfast spread is okay. You can find a Chinese restaurant, Subway, Burger joint and an Indian restaurant right across the street. You can also find a 7-eleven store adjacent to the property.  Rooms are decent. I paid $130 a night and seemed good value for money
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and I am delighted that you found us to be a good value for your money. We do strive to provide an exceptional product and friendly guest service while keeping in mind our guests are mostly family travelers on a budget. Kind regards!

Summary: This is our second stay at the Candy Cane Inn.  This time we had the Premium Room and it was excellent.  They deliver breakfast right to your room, at the time that you designate.  Breakfast includes Cereal, Bagles, Muffins and Donuts, juice, coffee and milk.  There are Hard Boiled Eggs and a Cheese plate down in the Breakfast Room.   The Pool and Hot Tub were welcome after a long day at the parks.  There is a shuttle available, but the hotel is so close, walkikng back and forth is no problem. Every employee we encountered were friendly and responsive.  Thank you James for answering all of our questions.   If it is at all possible, book the Premium Room, it is worth every penny.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your kind comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. Please feel free to contact me when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: The hotel is within walking distance to California Adventure and Disneyland. They do offer a reliable shuttle service to and fromm the parks.   The rooms are large and nicely furnished. We've stayed in both standard and deluxe rooms.  They're basically the same except for square footage.  Pool area is comfortable and often crowded.  Breakfast is satisfying and varied.  Overall a nice place.
Manager Response: I am delighted that you enjoyed your visit to the Candy Cane Inn and appreciate your kind comments. Warm regards!

Summary: One of the best places we have stayed. We booked three rooms since the grandparents came along to Disney and the staff was very accommodating to all of our needs. Just book here, you won't regret it! Our boys loved seeing cars land from our door.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us and sharing your kind comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. Yes, many folks are so very excited to see Cars Land right in our “back yard” and experience this wonderful addition to the Theme Parks. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Doing Disney, great place to stay
Summary: Good - Perfect for Disneyland. Free parking. Good size room. Very clean. Slightly dated but practical. Very well kept and pretty hotel with outdoor pool, though did not use. Service friendly and helpful. 15 minute walk to Disneyland or bus runs from hotel every half hour. Continental breakfast was basic but ok. Good value for the area. Really enjoyed our stay and would recommend.  Not so Good - Some external noise but considering the location pretty reasonable. Breakfast could have done with more choice of cereals.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and providing us with your valuable feedback regarding our property and services provided. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Nice Location, Clean, and Friendly Staff
Summary: Just returned from five days staying in a standard room with two queen beds.    Rooms was shown in their pictures and most importantly clean including the bathroom.   Included breakfast is basic fare but tasty and they kept stocked throughout the times it was opened which was 6:30 to 9:30.  As it's a buffet same issues as any other one you have been too some parents not watching their kids so do need to watch or else the yucky food some kid touch is possible. I stuck with the fruit and cereal  a safe bet.
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us the opportunity on your recent visit to the Theme Parks, we appreciate your business and kind comments. We take great pride in our hotel and the cleanliness of our rooms and all parts of the property, and we thank you for recognizing this. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Good third visit, will be sure to have a fourth, fifth.....
Summary: I have already written about the Candy Cane Inn before when I stayed there on a trip in 2011 where I proposed to my girlfriend and gave the hotel a great review. My now wife and I stayed there June of 2012 for our Honeymoon and now again in June 2013 for our 1 year anniversary. We continue to have great experiences there. I have read a couple other reviews that complain that the rooms are small and the hotel is old, or the continental breakfast doesn't have certain foods. I think those complaints are from people who are expecting an experience as if they were staying at Disneyland Hotel or Grand Californian. Candy Cane Inn is not that type of establishment and that's also why you don't pay those types of prices. I think the age of the Inn is what adds to the charm of this place.
Manager Response: I am very delighted that you enjoyed your visit and we appreciate your return business and allowing us the opportunity to share in your milestone celebrations! Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards

Summary: I am a new father of two or a 4 year old father (you chose). While I never thought I would be like my dad, I have inevitably become him. I have no problems paying 9 dollars for a glass of bourbon but I will balk at paying .10 cents for a grocery bag.  So when it came down to losing my battle of whether by boys 4 and 2 1/2 year old should go to Disneyland my wife found the Candy Cane Inn and the package included 4 day hopper passes with free breakfast every morning.  Done.  But the best part is that everything they and and others said they were, they were! It was clean, the staff was super awesome and it was close. Like 1 block and a half close to the Parks! I have become Clark Griswold and I approve this Inn!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your comments Mr. Griswold and yes, we too believe in NOT charging for necessities such as Parking, Expanded Continental Breakfast, Exclusive Shuttle and WiFi! Warm regards!

Summary: We stayed at the Candy Cane Inn on 5/31/13-6/2/13 and we loved it.  We went for a last minute trip to Disneyland and this hotel was great.  Typically we stay at the Paradise Pier or the Grand Californian but the prices in the summer are substantially higher than normal so we were looking for something better priced and this was it.  The hotel was very well located for what we needed, it took only about 10-15 minutes to walk to the park and we only had to cross one small street.  The rooms were a decent size for my husband and I but I think that it would be a tad small if I brought all 3 of my children however they do have a room that's bigger than what we had that I'm thinking about for our next trip in August.  Also the property itself is very nice, there are lots of plants and
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing the opportunity on your recent visit and I am delighted that your visit was most enjoyable. Please feel free to contact me when planning your August visit as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: It's all about the location, which is indubitably great. The shuttle is nice for tired kids. The rest is not so impressive. The motel itself is older, rooms are small (albeit clean), and I think the a/c got me sick. Breakfast is crowded and lacks anything hot. Even with reasonable expectations, I don't get the glowing reviews. I would try someplace else next time.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and providing your valuable feedback. We do listen to our guests and appreciate the information as this enables us to make changes in our operation to enhance our product and service. Kind regards.

Summary: Front desk staff were friendly.  Our room was large and nicely decorated.  It was a great location, as it's only a 10 minute walk to DisneyLand.  The continental breakfast was exactly that and was often very crowded when we were there making it difficult to find somewhere to sit.  They do provide tables closer to the rooms, so we ended up eating there one morning.  It's not exactly convenient to have to carry food & drink that far, but it was more peaceful.  We'd stay here again if we were ever visiting DisneyLand again.
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us the opportunity on your recent visit to the Theme Parks, we appreciate your business and comments. Please know that there are trays provided in all guestrooms (under the ice bucket) for ease and assistance of this task. Kind regards!

Summary: My family of 4, 2 boys under 10 and my husband and I, stayed here on 4/20-4/23 and we had such a great time. The pool was perfect for my kids and the hot tub was nice to soak your sore feet and legs in. The employees where always smiling and happy to help . The check in process took a little bit longer then what I would have liked, but it was right at 4:00 pm and there was a line outside of the door. Our room itself was perfect, the beds where heavenly and where easy to sleep in. The bathroom was small sized but everything worked properly. Breakfast in the morning was  nice, I would recommend bringing the tray from your room it makes it much easier to get your food. One of my favorites of this hotel was all the flowers and beautiful gardening that is everywhere on this hotel.
Manager Response: I am delighted to read that you and the family had a great time on your recent visit. Yes, our in-house gardeners do such a wonderful job in maintaining all the greenery and beautiful flowers and thank you for the kind comments. Please feel free to contact me should you be returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: Keep your expectations reasonable.  This is not the Ritz.  It is an older, two story motel in a U-shaped design, with parking and the pool in the middle.  That said, there are so many wonderful things to say about the Candy Cane Inn.  After reading numerous Trip Advisor reviews, we opted to spend the extra $10 to get a room toward the back of the inn.  We also requested the second floor (no elevators) to minimize the dancing-over-our-heads factor.  Our room was spacious with a large bathroom area and 2 very comfortable queen size beds - and - it was quiet.    The front desk staff could not have been nicer and more accommodating.  We arrived very early on the day of our reservation, and were checked right into our room, invited to help ourselves to breakfast, and given a parking
Manager Response: I am very delighted that you enjoyed your visit and please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: We were expecting a budget motel, but found excellent service, a spotless room and comfortable rest.  The fragrant gardens and landscaping made the inn seem like a retreat from the bustling area.  I will paraphrase in sub-sections for ease in reading.  Check In:  Went flawlessly.  Frank let us check in early to one of our rooms (in the AM).  We were offered complimentary breakfast also.  The attendants also helped with printing our boarding passes for SW Airlines.  Breakfast:  Consisted of hard boiled eggs, cheese cubes, yogurts (peach, strawberry-Land o Lakes Brand).  Pastries, donuts, bagels (raisin, blueberry, plain), non-fat and regular cream cheese, bread for toast, butter, orange juice, apple juice, coffee.  Outdoors by pool is a cereal trolley with two types of cereal and
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your in-depth comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. We listen to our guests and I appreciate your comments and rest assured we will certainly take into consideration as we continually attempt to upgrade our level of guest service. Kind regards!

Summary: Beautiful and immaculate hotel. Premium rooms worth extra price especially when you have kids. Breakfast delivered to room, rental movies available and microwave and fridge in room. Located walking distance to Disneyland which was great to walk to in the morning. Shuttle great for ride home in the evening. Everyone very friendly and helpful . Would highly recommend .
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and we appreciate your kind comments regarding our property, services and helpful team of service professionals. Kind regards!

Summary: Didn't even get to Candy Cane! Wrote an email to JH to find out about rates etc (as he mentions on tripadvisor to do), waited a week, no response, so decided to book anyway. Guess what, all rooms booked out! It's now been 3 weeks since origin email & still no response. Very disappointed.
Manager Response: I am extremely sorry and deeply saddened that you did not receive any response and can understand your disappointment. In defense of our team at the Candy Cane Inn we will not open emails that do not have a clear or concise comment in the subject line. As well as if items fall into the “spam” folder we will not open by guidance of our information technology firm. This is simply done to protect our guest’s personal information and our operation as there are many viruses that can compromise our system and potential guest email accounts.  Being that we email all confirmations and enter credit card information we take precautions to maintain the integrity of us and that of our guests and I hope that you can understand. Our website has last room availability and the same rates that we quote at the property and I would ask that if you have issue please make the reservation online. I will contact our website hosting company as any requests that are sent via the Candy Cane Inn website are directed to us.  I personally care about our guests and your comments are being taken to heart and will certainly discuss with our management team as we stress to the team to respond promptly to any and all guest communications promptly. Kind regards!

Summary: The Candy Cane Inn has never disappointed us. The rooms are nice and always clean, the breakfast, the front office, all of the workers and the beautiful grounds, is the reason I have been returning there for 13 years with our church for the L.A.Congress and since we  discovered it, with my family.  I always recommend it with confident when anyone asks me where to stay when they go to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for being a loyal and repeat Candy Cane Inn guest, we DO appreciate your continued patronage and kind comments. See you next March for L.A. Congress. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Excellent place to stay,  nice comfortable beds
Summary: Good continental breakfast too.   Has a bus door to door to Disneyland every 30 minutes.  The beds were comfortable, the rooms nice, the pool was nice too.  Its very comfortable and the lobby is very nice, along with the plants and color in the front.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and I am delighted that you enjoyed our Serta Presidential Suite Double Pillow Top Mattresses; we receive many positive comments regarding them. Kind regards!

Summary: This homey welcoming hotel has so much gong for it. Professional staff, a welcoming environment, nicely kept grounds, great (hot) hot tub/spa, good breakfast included in price, no added charge for parking AND a free shuttle going to and from Disneyland every 30 minutes or so.  Rooms are comfortable, beds are fine and the place is relatively quiet.  The price isn't low but not a ripoff either.  Free wifi is included without a surcharge like comparable properties.  Candy Cane may not be as superficially upscale as the Annabelle Hotel, but I prefer Candy Cane hands down. Unlike places like Annabelle, breakfast, parking, shuttle and wifi are included. This property is well maintained and so convenient to Disneyland as well as a couple of restaurants and convenience marts literally
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. Yes, you are very correct that we do believe in including all the complimentary items and not surprising our guests with additional costs and fees. Kind regards!

Summary: We loved this place. The service was excellent, Our room was spacious and very clean and comfortable.  The flowers and landscaping are lovely.  The shuttle bus to Disneyland was excellent.  Would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and for your kind comments regarding our property and the lovely landscaping. Our in-house gardening team does an outstanding job in maintaining and cultivating the flowers and plants throughout the property and they certainly appreciate the praise too. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Candy Cane is always a hit, Disney (again) for spring break
Summary: We have stayed here at least 8 times over the last 4 years! Will keep coming back! Shuttle to Disney is great when the kids are too tired to walk back, but still close ernough to walk. Breakfast in the morning is great!
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for being a loyal member of the Candy Cane Inn family of repeat guests and please know that we DO appreciate your business. Please feel free to contact me personally when planning your next visit as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: This hotel is VERY nice.  It has a wonderful feel.  The rooms are not high end, but they are quite clean and comfortable and the hotel is very close to Disneyland.  They have a shuttle that is a direct shuttle to the parks (so you don't have to go to other hotels on the way).  The only problem that we had was after the park closed the shuttle did not show up to pick us up.  We waited for a long time because someone else from the hotel called to make sure that the shuttle was coming and was assured that they were.  After a while we just walked back expecting to see the shuttle on the way but did not.  When we got back to the hotel, the shuttle was just sitting in the parking lot.
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us the opportunity on your recent visit the Theme Parks. I am sorry to read that there was confusion as our last Complimentary Shuttle is forty five minutes after the park closes. There are times when the park hours are extended and if we were not made aware this could have happened and I will discuss with our team. Kind regards.

Summary: We stayed at the CC May 18 thru May 21 and couldn't be happier with the service we received. First of all, the place is beautiful. The flowers and landscaping are gorgeous! The parking lot is clean and quiet. The pool was nice, but crowded with kids-which is to be expected. Our room was very nice, very clean and neat and pleasant to stay in. The mattresses and pillows were super comfy. I'm very anal about hotel bedding and the bedding was in excellant condition-clean and soft. We all slept really well. The service at check in/check out was excellant-very professional and courteous. I was very impressed with Frank I think his name was. Not only was he extremely kind and pleasant to talk to-but seems to have a real good knowledge of the area and Disneyland. At one time, he even
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your first stay and I am delighted to read that you look forward to many times ahead. Were glad you were able to enjoy all of our numerous complimentary amenities we offer here at the Candy Cane. I’m delighted to hear our Front Desk staff was so helpful and Frank has been a great addition to our team, and we thank you for recognizing this! Please feel free to contact me personally as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and future reservations. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Very good because of location, service
Summary: This is an average hotel. Clean. Rooms were adequate. Service at the front desk was very good. What made this hotel was the excellent location -- an easy 15 minute walk to Disneyland and California Adventure with no major roads to cross.  Close enough that if you are overwhelmed you can go rest at your quiet hotel. There is also a hotel shuttle, which I believe is every half hour. We never used it because the walk is so easy.  Breakfast in the morning is a good continental with hard boiled eggs, bananas, pastries, yogurt, a cereal bar and pretty good coffee.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and we do appreciate your business and sharing your comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. While our hotel is known for being a family friendly environment, we are glad we have the opportunity to accommodate groups such as yourselves and others. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Second Stay at the Candy Cane Inn, and we are now forever customers!
Summary: Myself, husband and 2 children stayed at the Candy Cane Inn for 10 nights, May 3rd to 13th, 2013. We stayed in a standard room, which is the smallest room available. I do not have any complaints and my husband and I have already concluded that we will never stay anywhere else when we make our yearly trips to Disneyland. The staff were professional, courteous, and accommodating. The hotel is charming, and although it is an older building, it is well-maintained. The gardens are absolutely stunning and make you feel so happy as you walk past them to your room in the evening. The pool area is wonderful - just what you need to cool off in the afternoon heat or soak your tired feet after a long day of walking through Disneyland. Housekeeping was always prompt and efficient - rooms
Manager Response: Thank you so much for being a repeat guest and allowing us the opportunity on your second visit to the Candy Cane Inn, we DO appreciate your business. Yes, we continue to enhance our product and services and have been adding items to our Expanded Continental Breakfast. We recently upgraded our Donut. Croissant and Danish supplier and have received exceptional comments from our guests and appreciate yours as well. Please feel free to contact me personally when planning your next visit as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: CC was a great place to stay, without kids
Summary: We stayed at CC Inn 5/9-5/12 for our kids first trip to Disneyland.  I really liked the CC and would definitely stay again, without kids though.  The room was larger than I expected, very clean, comfie beds.  We were in a deluxe room on second floor.  Very nice pool area, and the breakfast was just what we needed in the morning. Nick at front desk was very nice.   There was a  of noise, but   Our kids are 4.6.8.  While they could make the walk to Disneyland in the morning no problem, the way back was tough, especialy late at night.  We seemed to see the shuttle tail lights driving away more than once.  We tried to time it right, but getting caught behind the herd trying to get out the gates after the fireworks show each night was ridiculous.  It was just too hard for us to time
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers, we appreciate your business and feedback. Yes, Nick is a wonderful addition to our front desk team and I thank you for recognizing this. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Very clean, comfortable and pretty motel
Summary: My five year old grandson and I stayed here for two nights for the first time and it was a very comfortable stay.  The rooms were clean and our bathroom was large and roomy.  The beds were quite comfortable for us also.  We loved the clean and neat pool area.  The foliage and flowers were quite beautiful for a motel and put me in a nice mood.  It was uplifting to return after a busy, tiring day at D'land. The breakfast was good although I did go off of the diet because of the all the goodies.  We had a room in front and it wasn't noisy at all.  I will be returning again in June with my other grandson. We used both the shuttle and walked to D'land.  The walk was short and we even walked back to the motel after a long day at D'land instead of waiting for the shuttle.  I can't wait
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us and I am delighted that you and the grandson had a comfortable stay. Please feel free to contact me personally when planning your return visit with the other grandson as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Clean, friendly helpful staff, great location
Summary: Excellent, friendly staff.  From check in, shuttle drivers, housekeeping to maint. staff, all employees were excellent and helpful.  The location is excellent, a short walk to the main gate of Disneyland. The second floor room was small, but adequate. Separate shower/toilet room from the vanity/sink area. The room was spotless and cleaned in a timely manner. The room location was across from the pool, which closes at 11pm. Perhaps it should be closed at 10pm as some parents have screaming, yelling children and NO regards to other guests. The shuttle bus drivers were helpful and friendly, especially Fred.  The bus was prompt and on time. The parking is good with no added charges for parking.  The breakfast was good, with a broad assort of food, fresh fruit and yogurt to
Manager Response: Thank you for being a loyal and repeat Candy Cane Inn guest. We appreciate your business and kind comments about our property and team.  I am sincerely sorry that you experienced children that were less than respectful of others and screaming at the pool. We only hope that others will read your comments and take the personal responsibility and be more considerate of others. Kind regards!

Summary: We stayed in Candy Cane Inn for 8 days and we really had a great time. We stayed in a premium room which was quite big for the three of us. The beds were so comfortable, and the bathroom was clean. Internet Wifi connection was excellent. The staff were so helpful and friendly. We loved the muffins and the bagels that we had for breakfast. We just checked out today, the next leg of our vacation, and the minute we arrived in our New hotel room, my daughter said "Oh I miss Candy Cane". How we wish we had stayed longer in Candy Cane Inn.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us and I am delighted that your daughter had a nice time and give her my well wishes. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Lovely landscaped with a great location!
Summary: I stayed at this hotel for my brothers band competition two years in a row and it has never disappointed!  Bagel and Danish breakfast.  Comfy beds with lots of pillows.  Clean bathrooms. Lovely pool area with a spa. The shuttle driver was beyond nice!   The only negative I could find was the fact that the breakfast sitting was limited. Even then, families are in and out quickly, and you can always take the breakfast to your room.   Overall, I would definitely get this hotel again!!! We did walk to the Anaheim cinema from the hotel which wasn't a long walk at all.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us for the past two years and we appreciate your kind comments about our property and team. Please feel free to contact me personally when planning your next visit as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: I am not sure why this hotel was voted one of the best, but if someone asks me if stay there again, I would say "yes". The hotel is very, very clean. It is very close to the entrance to Disneyland. Literary it is 2 blocks away. They also have a shuttle that goes there every 30 min. The shuttle actually was very nice to have because with young kids and on a very hot day, it is not that easy to walk 2 blocks. The staff, including the shuttle drivers, is extremely nice and helpful. They have a swimming pool which is really nice to have after a whole day of walking. Hotel comes with free breakfast. The breakfast is pretty good but nothing special. The rooms are pretty small, but clean and comfortable. If you want to have a view from your window onto the hotel yard, don't book the
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers, we DO appreciate your business. Kind regards!

Summary: I really don't have a lot to review about the candy cane since we did not spend any time there, we just slept there. The rooms were clean and the staff was helpful. The breakfast, not great but it got us on our way. On the night we stayed there the bus driver for the shuttle was sick so a van picked us up so it took a long time. Normally it would be no big deal but it was very cold that night.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and I am sorry if you waited for the shuttle a long time. We had the van running continually to and from the Resort throughout the evening. In regards to our breakfast, in the past week have added Hard Boiled Eggs and upgraded our Donuts and Pastries and are adding a healthier granola cereal option in the next couple days. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Beautiful flowers, great location, helpful staff
Summary: I stayed at the Candy Cane April 22-27 with my 3 children (5,6,8) and my mother. Overall we were very happy with our stay.  ROOM The room itself was mostly unremarkable. It contained 2 queen beds; an armoire with a TV, safe, and some drawers for storage; a bedside table with a few storage drawers; a small round table with 2 padded chairs; a sink area with a coffee maker and a small fridge; and a bathroom with toilet and tub. The windows are covered with plantation-style shutters rather than drapes, which I found to have a cleaner, brighter look and feel than curtains usually do. The coffee maker was located on the counter mysteriously out of reach of any electrical outlet, which resulted in us having to move it to the narrow strip of counter between the wall and sink to use it -
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for allowing us the opportunity and sharing your wonderful feedback with fellow travelers. As I noted in another review today, we have recently added Hard Boiled Eggs and will be adding a healthier Granola cereal in the next few days. We are also investigating and will be evaluating adding cheese to increase the protein options. Thank you again for your valuable feedback   and staying with us. Kind regards!

Summary: We stayed here one night on our trip to Disneyland. The room was nice and clean, however the location was not the best. The rooms #200, 201, 202 on our floor face a busy street. It can be quite loud at night. There are nice wooden shades, however they do not block out all of the light coming from the street. The parking lot is small. Since we were only staying one night and with such a small lot, we were unable to use the free shuttle and leave our car parked there. Had we stayed more nights, we could have used the shuttle. The hotel is an easy walk to Disneyland. They staff are very nice. There is a free continental breakfast which included bread, bagels, muffins, doughuts, yogurt and hard boiled eggs.  If we had it to do over again, we may try a different hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and I am sorry that your room was loud and not to your liking. We receive many requests for the rooms in the front and please feel free to contact the front desk and we will certainly do our best to move you if possible. Kind regards.

Summary Heading: Great place next door to Disney
Summary: This is a great affordable place to stay for a trip to Disneyland. The rooms are a little small for a family of 5 but overall worth it to not have to reserve 2 rooms. Free parking and a great free continental breakfast.  Quick walk to Disney, or take the shuttle.  It is close enough to take a 2-3 hour rest in the heat of the day then walk back to Disneyland when it gets dark.  We plan to stay there every time we visit Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your comments and please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: We really enjoyed staying 3 nights here. We had three rooms on the bottom floor. Enjoyed having free breakfast before heading into the parks. Their private shuttle is nice, or you can easily walk to Disneyland. It's a bit pricey compared to some other options, but the overall value is good. The grounds are beautifully kept, which makes for nice surroundings. The back of the property butts up against cars land, but there's minimal sound.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your comments with fellow travelers. Yes, when you take into consideration that our rate includes Complimentary Parking, Exclusive Shuttle to and from the theme parks, Expanded Continental Breakfast and WiFi the price value is certainly good. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Awesome comfort, continental breakfast & very quick bus transportation to Disneyland ! :D
Summary: I will always stay at this hotel until the day I die.  I love it!!!:D my family and i have been staying at this hotel my whole life as we've come on our Disneyland family adventures! :) very comfy and you get a sweet breakfast every morning by the crystal clear pool. :). They have a very convenient bus transportation that the hotel provides free for hotel guests that goes back and forth from the Disney parks :). This is the place to stay but be sure to get your reservation plenty early because they are always booked.  :)
Manager Response: We certainly appreciate your loyalty to the Candy Cane Inn and being a member of the family! Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as I would be delighted to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: We stayed at the Candy Cane Inn April 22-24.  Angel checked us in and was able to make special arrangements for us on the spot at check in.  We very much appreciated his help.  The CCI is located right next to Disneyland.  We were able to stroll to and from the park easily and quickly (about 5 minutes door-to-door).  The CCI runs free shuttles from the park entrance to the inn throughout the day and evening, but the weather was nice, so we opted to walk.  A big benefit of the CCI's location is the mini-mart next door.  The mini-mart made it easy to purchase low-cost groceries so we could save money on snacks and sundries (it also has wine and liquor, though we did not indulge).  We were able to buy inexpensive t-shirts and gifts at the mini-mart next door and at the souvenir
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your comments and please feel free to contact me personally when planning your family visit as it would by my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations. In regards to Angel and Edd, they are awesome members of our team and yes, Eddie has been around for so many years and folks just adore him. His knowledge is wonderful and he has seen many changes over the past many years. Kind regards!

Summary: My husband and I stayed at Candy Cane Inn for 3 nights - which gave us 2 full days in Disneyland. It was a short walk to Disneyland and we walked it each time without using the shuttle bus. The room was spacious and comfortable. We were only there to collapse each night and it was perfect for that purpose. The free breakfast was reasonable and included fresh fruit. The breakfast room was small but there were plenty of seats around the pool so as long as there is good weather it is not a problem. There are some restaurants nearby including a Cheesecake factory which we visited on our first night the other nights we ate in Disneyland. We also bought our tickets at reception for the same price which saved us the queue at the gate.  I would highly recommend this hotel for a
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. Yes, purchasing tickets at our front desk certainly assists you in avoiding the lines and waiting at the Theme Parks. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Fantastic Place to stay!! Second time just as Fabulous!!
Summary: Candy Cane Inn is the only place to stay when visiting DIsneyland. We love the location, as it is on the same side of the highway as Disneyland so walking to and from is no problem at all. We never used the shuttle bus but I probably would if I had small kids who were exhuasted after a big day at the parks.The Motel and the grounds are exceptionally clean, the staff obviously pride themselves on this. The decor is a bit retro, but that doesn't bother us at all. Towels are a plenty and the beds are very very comfortable. We had a room upstairs to the rear of the hotel, but we were able to lift our own luggage and didn't need a ground floor room.  The pool area is a lovely setting for breakfast. As most guests are wanting to hit the parks, it is designed to get you going and is
Manager Response: Thank you for being a repeat guest of the Candy Cane Inn and thank you for your kind comments about our property, services and the team. They truly do take pride in their work and providing exceptional service to our guests. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: Okay, when I saw this had 4 1/2 stars on Trip Advisors, I was expecting something above average. The hotel is clean, but there is nothing special. Good location to the park, but average at best. The breakfast did not meet expectations. I have been in neighboring hotels that served a much better breakfast with eggs, sausage, etc.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and providing your valuable feedback. We do listen to our guests will take their comments into consideration when upgrading the property, our amenities and services. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Nothing going for it except location !!
Summary: Location is great for Disneyland, an easy 7-10 minute walk , and the shuttle bus is great if you have small children in your party, it runs continually all day long. The shuttle bus drivers are really friendly and the hotel reception staff could learn a thing or two from them.   I personally didn't have any problems with noise and I was on the ground floor. Beds were comfortable, bathroom clean. Decor needs updating, it has a real 80's vibe to it.  Hotel staff were not very sincere in their greeting and I felt like I was imposing on them if I dared to ask a question or had a request. I don't think it was deliberate, I actually think they just need to attend a course in customer relations, I don't believe any of them are professionally trained in hospitality.  Probably the worst
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and I am sorry that we did not live up to your expectations on the items you noted. We do listen to our guests and appreciate the feedback. In regards to Edd, he is a wonderful, kind and caring elderly gentleman and has been a proud member of the Candy Cane Inn family for almost 28 years. He has extensive knowledge regarding the theme parks and our hotel and thus being our “Hotel Historian”. I am deeply saddened and sincerely sorry if he scared your son as he is held in the highest of regards by our team and countless guests for many years. Kind regards!

Summary: This was our first stay at Candy Cane Inn and really liked the motel.  We were there April 13-15th. The landscaping is pretty, room was clean and quiet, and it was nice to have a laundry room to wash some clothes.  Our room was upstairs in the middle and was very quiet and clean. The beds were probably one of the most comfortable beds I've ever slept in at a hotel. In the room there is a small refrigerator, coffee maker, TV, and ironing board and iron.  We utilized the continental breakfast every morning. The laundry room is in the middle downstairs on the north side. Check-out was fast and friendly. They let us sit around the pool after check-out to wait for our laundry to finish. The pool area is pretty. There is a hot tub and small children's wading pool also. The pool closes
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with and while I thank you for your many kind comments I have spoken with our Front Office team about your experience. In regards to our coffee maker, they are a one cup unit and there is no tray to pull out and you simply open the coffee packet and attach to the unit add water and it brews. I am very sorry for any misinformation that you were provided by the attendant at the park as our shuttle leaves on the 15 and 45 of each hour with the last run 45 minutes after the park closes.  Kind regards!
