Thank you again for your business and know that your comments are greatly appreciated. Kind regards!

Summary: If you are looking for a great hotel near Disneyland the Candy Cane Inn is perfect. A little less than an .5 miles away from both Disneyland/Cali Adventure you really do not have to take the shuttle. Which is provided for you for free and is very on time and done so very well. The check in process is great and the continental breakfast is nothing great, however it will get you on your way with a something in your belly to start your day. The hotel is quiet, parking is free and they do a great job getting you what you need. I def. recommend this hotel if you are not staying on Disney property and really want to be close to the parks with out paying a premium price.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for allowing us the opportunity on your recent visit to the theme parks, we DO appreciate your business. Yes, our Exclusive Complimentary Shuttle is certainly a time (and leg) saver that starts 30 minutes prior to the parks opening and continuing until 45 after the parks close at night. It operates on the hour and the half from the hotel to the park and returning at the 15 and 45 of each hour and the only time it does not operate is at 8:00pm to the park and 8:15pm return trip for the evening driver’s dinner break. Again, thank you for your kind comments regarding our Inn.

Summary: Our stay was pleasant. The room was clean and quiet. Very nice continental breakfast. My daughter liked the pool. Looking forward to another stay. Great discount using AAA. Very close to Disney. 7-11 right next door for easy convenience.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and I am delighted that your stay was pleasant! Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards.

Summary: We had a very nice experience at the Candy Cane Inn.  The setting is beautiful with all the flowers and paved brick roads.  We stayed in two premium rooms because of the extra amenities and service. The welcome gift of cookies and popcorn that were waiting for us were very nice. The rooms were clean and the beds were comfortable and had lots of pillows.  The kids loved the pool and I was happy about the wading pool for my nephew.  Having the breakfast delivered each morning was so convenient.  The private shuttle was also a reason we chose to stay at the Candy Cane but we could have walked because it was so only about a fifteen minute walk.  The only disappontment, and for us it was big, was that we did not get the connecting rooms I requested when I reserved our trip.  This is
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and we do appreciate your comments and I am sincerely sorry that your request for connecting rooms did not occur. We do attempt to honor all requests and there are times when this simply cannot occur for reasons mostly beyond our control and for that I am very apologetic. Please feel free to contact me personally when you return and I will certainly make sure to do everything possible to ensure that your room request is honored. Kind regards!

Summary: I travelled from the UK on 22nd July 2012 with my 18 year old son and stayed in the Candy Cane Inn.  The hotel and room were clean and comfortable and the staff were very helpful and friendly.   The bagles at breakfast time were delicious as was the hot cocoa.  This is our second visit and on our first visit we stayed at a much larger, more expensive hotel but the Candy Cane was far better.  The shuttle bus to Disneyland was very welcome at night when we were tired. Would definitely stay here again - excellent value and location.
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for allowing us the opportunity on your second visit and I am delighted to read that you had an “Excellent Stay”. The pastries and bagels for our Expanded Continental Breakfast are delivered seven mornings per week to ensure freshness.  Yes, the hot cocoa is certainly tasty and hit with adults and children alike. Kind regards!

Summary: Stayed here with girlfriend Jul 16-19 on another visit to DLand. Perfect location two blocks from DLand entrance. Clean, comfortable room, nice pool, grounds, attentive staff, affordable, easy walking distance to virtually any type of restaruants you could want. Parking is tight but OK.  Continental breakfast is usual fare, bagels, cereal, fruit, coffee, juice, etc.; plenty of seating in pool area outside or inside breakfast area. Pool clean as was two spas adjacent. Check in time is 3pm but we showed up way earlier than we had intended. Staff knew we were tired and ready to relax and went out of their way to provide us a room earlier than we expected (noon), and we sure appreciated their efforts! We were also able to purchase discount DLand tickets at the hotel desk that saved
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers.  I am delighted that our team of service professionals was able to provide you with early check-in and we do our best to accommodate any and all requests. In regards to the microwave, yes they are in our Premium Rooms however we have one in our Garden Room that is available 24/7. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: Stayed at the CCI last week in a premium room. Breakfast is supposed to be delivered when booking this room type. First day our form was overlooked and no breakfast was delivered, second day our form was "lost" and no breakfast was delivered. Third day it came as requested, but we were afraid to eat it after complaining about lack of service the two days prior. Moral of story don't bank of breakfast delivery, it's not worth the upcharge for the premium room.  The shuttle was wonderful for our tired feet at the end of the day. The room was very clean and very dated. The grounds are very well maintained with lush vegitation. The front desk staff were very pleasant. All pros in my book. Our only problem was really with the lack of breakfast delivery. It became a running joke
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and providing this valuable feedback regarding your experience. We certainly listen to our guests and make necessary changes to improve our product and service for future guests. I am sincerely apologetic this occurred with your breakfast delivery and only hope that another guest did not remove from your door overnight as this does occur from time to time and for that I am very sorry. I do appreciate your positive comments regarding many areas of the hotel and our team and hope that you will allow us another opportunity. Kind regards!

Summary: We arrived very early Saturday morning (9am) and even though our room would not be available until the afternoon they let us leave our overnight bags in their safe baggage room. We then walked the 10 minutes to Disneyland-down one road-. They do offer a shuttle bus that runs every half an hour (if you dont want to walk). We went around the Park and then about 4 o'clock walked back to check-in and freshen up. Room was spacious and clean, 2 double beds-very comfy-and a big bathroom.We then hit the Park again until closing time. Breakfast was included and it consisted of Cereals, Muffins,Donuts, Bread (toaster available), Fruit, Yoghurts and Tea,Coffee or Hot Chocolate.We were then booked on a Tour of Los Angeles/Hollywood so again they let us leave our bags in the safe room until
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us the opportunity on your recent one night visit to the Theme Parks. We certainly appreciate your business and taking the time to share your comments and feedback regarding your “Short Disney Break”. Kind regards!

Summary: My sissy and I and our kids all stayed together here and it was a BLAST!!! We took board games and there was plenty of room to play! We enjoyed the pool and movies in the room. Our rooms were spotless and the beds were so comfy!! You will love this place!!! We did!!
Manager Response: I am delighted that you, sissy and the kids stayed with us and had a “BLAST”. It’s been a while since you visited and please come back and see us again! It would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations, please feel free to call me personally. Thanks again for visiting and sharing your kind comments.

Summary: We typically stay at another hotel not too far from the Candy Cane Inn, the past two stays were less than impressive.  My husband saw this hotel last year as we were walking to Disneyland and told me to try to book a room at the Candy Cane Inn.  I checked for reviews on tripadvisor and booked the Premium Room.  So glad I did, I know we have found our place for our annual trips to Disneyland.  The room was wonderful.  All the little extras they do, from the welcome basket full of goodies, the delivery of the continental breakfast, the bathrobes as well as other amenities are really nice.  It is hard to find a hotel that caters to its customers with little gestures.  Those little gestures are noticed here and it iw well worth it.  The hotel is within perfect walking distance to
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a leap of faith and allowing us the opportunity to be of service on your recent visit to the Theme Parks, we DO appreciate your business. Yes, our Premium Rooms certainly have many added features and most who choose these rooms continue to do so again and again. I thank you for your kind comments and YES, we do care about our one time guests, and those who have become loyal repeat guests.  Please feel free to contact me personally as I would be delighted to assist with rates and reservations for any upcoming visits. Warm regards!

Summary: If you are going to disneyland, this hotel is in the perfect location. You can walk to the park and downtown disney or take their shuttle. Parking is the worst part as the spaces are quite thin. This hotel is great for families, or people who want to visit disneyland without using many hotel amenities.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your feedback as we certainly listen to our guests and make necessary changes to improve for future guests. Larger vehicles have become an issue and we certainly appreciate everyone’s assistance in parking between the lines and leaving the larger spaces for larger vehicles when available. Kind regards!

Summary: This was our second stay at the Candy Cane Inn.  We stayed 3 nights in July 2012. We returned because our first visit was wonderful.  On this trip we had flown into San Francisco and spent 5 days there before we flew to Orange County.  We arrived at the CCI around 1:00 and our room was not ready.  We asked if we could go ahead and do laundry while we waited for our room.  After we took our luggage to the laundry room and started 3 loads of laundry we returned to the lobby and they stored the luggage for us while we changed into swimsuits and enjoyed the pool and spa while our clothes washed and dried.  By the time our room was ready our clothes were dry and folded.  Everything worked out perfect!  We enjoy the ease of the breakfast each morning but would like it to start a
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us again and we appreciate your kind comments about our Inn and your enjoyable stay. I am delighted to read that the timing in doing your laundry and enjoying our pool and spa worked out perfect and we were able accommodate your busy travel schedule. Yes, I too believe that if you take care of the little things the big things fall into place. Thank you again for your business and warm regards!

Summary Heading: Absolutely great hotel for Disneyland area
Summary: This hotel was super. We stayed there twice during July and really looked forward to the 2nd visit. Rooms are large and have comfortable beds, although slighted dated colour scheme/bed covers etc. (the only other strange thing was having the sink in the bedroom rather than the bathroom was this wasn't an issue for us.) Each room had a good sized TV, and free wi fi and parking was also very welcome The hotel was very clean and the staff very friendly. The pool area is lovely with nice shrubs and lighting making it a pleasant and family friendly environment (also open long hours which is good for the kids.) No noise issues. Breakfast was plentiful with reasonable choice.  We only used the shuttle once as the hotel was so close to the Disneyland (6-8 minutes walk tops). I would
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us twice this month and we certainly appreciate your business and feedback. We certainly place our emphasis on being a family friendly hotel and want to create the most pleasant experience for our guests. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as I would be delighted to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: We stayed 6 nights at the Candy Cane Inn in May 2012. Our first time bringing our children (ages 4 and 1) to Disneyland. We considered staying at a Disney property but decided to cancel our reservations- could not justify the price difference and after reading rave reviews on Trip Adviser decided to book at CCI. Heard a lot of complaints from GC and DLH hotel guests staying and SO happy with our decision.  First the CCI accommodated our early check in after a long travel day from Alberta, then upon checking into our rooms we were delighted to see to birthday "surprise" bags full of homemade cookies and customized name tags for our children (they both recently had their birthdays and the trip was a celebration)- our 4 year old daughter was over the moon.  The location can't be
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us the opportunity to have your family as our guests during your recent visit to the theme parks. I too am delighted that your children enjoyed the cookies, a small token in the spirit of the celebrations. Yes, our shuttle drivers are so pleasant and I appreciate your kind comments as well. Please feel free to contact me personally when planning your next trip as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates, reservations and making the request for a second floor accommodation. Kind regards!

Summary: This is our 3rd stay at the Candy Cane Inn...and as usual WE LOVED IT! Always wonderful, helpful people, super-clean rooms, nice pool & great breakfasts (included), plus the amazing shuttle to & from Downtown Disney/Disneyland/California Adventure! Hotel is close to just about everything. We were approx. 5 miles from Knotts Berry Farms & 1/2 hour from Huntington Beach! Wish they had another amazing location because as it stands we have to come here just about every year LOL! Thanks Candy Cane Inn!
Manager Response: Thank you for being a loyal and repeat Candy Cane Inn guest, we DO appreciate your business and kind comments.  Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as I would be delighted to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Great hotel and close to Disneyland
Summary: We stayed 4 nights at the Candy Cane Inn in May 2012.  The rooms were clean and comfortable, we stayed in a ground floor room at the front of the hotel - no problems with street noise.  The free shuttle was very convenient and ran frequently however the hotel is an easy 10 min walk to Disneyland if preferred.  The reception staff were friendly and helpful and the candy cane pens were also a novel touch!  The hotel is also next to a convenient store which is handy.  We will definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your experience with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. We DO appreciate your feedback, business and look forward in seeing you again on your next visit. Kind regards!

Summary: We just returned from a trip to CA and stayed 4 nights at the Candy Cane Inn. The services they provide are amazing. The shuttle alone makes this a great place to stay when going to Disney. We used the shuttle everyday with no hassle what so ever. Everyone was friendly and the room although older was clean we could not have asked for more. We hope to visit again!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. Please feel free to contact me should you returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Great location, well kept, and friendly people
Summary: We took a last minute trip to Disneyland and stayed at the Candy Cane Inn for two nights. It was the perfect choice, minutes walk from Disneyland (or take the free shuttle), well kept grounds with beautiful landscape, and a decent breakfast. Yes, it's a very popular place and is filled with families and kids, but for the price and convenience, we found it very comfortable.
Manager Response: I am delighted to read that your “last minute trip” brought you to our Inn. We are happy that you enjoyed yourself and yes, we have many repeat families and always welcome new guests to our Candy cane Inn family! Kind regards!

Summary: We stayed here because of all the wonderful reviews from tripadvisor.  The location is wonderful and a close walking distance to Disneyland.  The free parking and shuttle was also a plus.  Its definitely more of a motel then hotel.  We stayed in a premium room on the second floor which looked nice but the musty smell of mildew near the bathroom drove me nuts. The breakfast...well if you get there 5 minutes after 9 you are out of luck!  As we were getting our bagels the lady shut down all the drinks and coffee makers so we were out of luck in getting drinks.  We practically had to beg the lady for cream cheese.  Overall, its a reasonably priced hotel close to Disney but, I think we would stay elsewhere next time.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and bringing your comments to our attention. We do listen to our guests and I have personally visited with our housekeeping and maintenance teams to rectify immediately. I am sincerely apologetic that we failed to live up to your expectations and that you felt rushed by our breakfast attendants and we have spoken with the entire team regarding this incident. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Found a Gem at Candy Cane Inn
Summary: I have been to Disneyland many many times.  The last couple of trips were at the Howard Johnson's but the rates went up so we decided to look around and we found a real gem at the Candy Cane Inn.  We stayed five nights starting 7/10 with two rooms, one standard and one deluxe.  Both rooms were on the bottom floor which was very convent as we were going back and forth to the pool.  The hotel is very close to the main entrance to Disneyland, California Adventure and Downtown Disney.  It is walking distance but they have a FREE shuttle (you have to pay at Howard Johnson's) that leaves every 30 minutes from the hotel and every 30 minutes from Disney.  The shuttle was always on time and the drivers were very nice.  I stayed in a deluxe room which was noticeably larger than the
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us the opportunity on your recent visit and I am delighted that your stay was most enjoyable. Thank you for your many kind comments about our facility and team of service professionals providing our guests with they have come to expect at the Candy Cane Inn. It would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservation for your next visit and please feel free to contact me personally. Kind regards!

Summary: Every time we've traveled to Disneyland, our family has stayed at the Candy Cane Inn. You can see my earlier reviews if you're interested in knowing how the hotel is... nice, comfy, and convenient. However, I'm sad/irritated to report that they've lost me as a loyal customer. We received a discount voucher for our next trip (everyone does) and I asked if they would allow me to use it for this upcoming trip (5 nights!) and they said no, because it's been over a year. I reminded them that they allowed me to use the voucher last time, even though it had been over a year, and reminded the manager that the last time he approved of my same request, he laughed and said "we're not that type of hotel" (as if to say, they aren't the type of people to try and screw you). Well... this time,
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: More of a motel than hotel
Summary: Stay at a premium room with family for 11 nights. This is how we feel:  Pros:  1. Super Value for Money. You really cannot stretch your dollar any further with the free internet, shuttle to disney, breakfast, parking, etc. 2. Super fast and friendly service. Front desk and engineer dept service standards put 5-star hotels to shame. They really go all out to 'delight' the customers. Special thanks to the head of engineer dept for lending us a stroller when ours gave way. 3. 10-mins walk from disney if you miss the bus.  Cons: 1. Hotel is more like a motel. Room was not particularly clean and bed covers showing signs of aging.  2. In-room breakfast can be late sometimes. 3. Drinking water only provided upon check-in, not on a daily basis. However, they do provide it ad-hoc upon
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and providing your valuable feedback on items that were positive and items that we can improve upon for future guests. I am delighted that our Gerardo, our chief engineer was able to assist you with a stroller and the service that our front desk provided. Again, thank your for your business, it IS most appreciated!

Summary: What's not not like.  Walking distance from Disneyland, comfortable beds, well-maintained and beautiful property.  Throw in a nice continental breakfast, a regular shuttle to Disneyland for families too tired to walk home, and a friendly staff.  Very nice,  The only downside - the motel promises in-room WiFi  The WiFi doesnt work in the room - the staff said the hardware doesnt work.  WiFi is available in the lobby, though.   That's the only downside.  When we go back to Disneyland we will stay here again
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and I am sincerely apologetic that our WiFi was giving you issues and we have been making ongoing improvements to enhance the service provided. Please feel free to contact when you are returning as I would be delighted to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: A big thank you to James for working his magic and juggling rooms to allow us to check in early after a long flight from Sydney. Very much appreciated considering the hotel was fully booked. We loved our stay, the staff were always helpful and friendly, obviously taking great pride in where they work.   Location is fabulous! Same block as Disney so you don't have to cross main highway... We only used the shuttle once as walk is only 5 minutes but I can see the benefit if you have small kids after a huge day at the parks.  Breakfast is basic and ideal to get you started for the day.... By the pool and designed to have you in and out with no fuss so you can hit the parks. If you prefer a long leisurely breakfast with linen and an omelette station then book elsewhere. I loved the
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us the opportunity on your recent visit and I am pleased that James worked his magic for you after a long flight. We certainly attempt to go the extra mile when it comes to providing exceptional guest service and appreciate you kind comments. Again, I am delighted that you enjoyed your visit and please do return and see us again!

Summary: My husband and I have been staying here for years along with my mom and grandparents! This is absolutely our favorite hotel to stay at while visiting the Disney area. The room and grounds are immaculate and the staff is exceptional. The breakfast they serve in the morning is extensive and it's the perfect start to a fun filled day in the parks. We love that it is only a five minute walk to the front gates and that the shuttle to and from the parks from the Inn runs very frequently and is so dependable. The rates are always reasonable and we would never dream of staying at any other hotel than the Candy Cane Inn! It's the best!!
Manager Response: Thank you for being a member of loyal Candy Cane Inn families that have found a home away from home. We DO appreciate your continued business and please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Simply the BEST hotel in Anaheim!
Summary: The Candy Cane Inn is my family's favorite hotel of all time. This was my 7th time visiting the hotel and it was PERFECT. I could not imagine Disneyland without staying at this hotel. The rooms are nice and have a home-like feel to them. Soft beds and great service and a good breakfast. I love that they have a shuttle every 30 minutes with a now even closer drop off to disneyland main gate! My family was sad to leave the hotel this morning but I am sure we will definitely be back. Thank You Candy Cane Inn for being a affordable, clean and caring home away from home..
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for being a loyal repeat guest at the Candy Cane Inn, we DO appreciate your business! Please contact me personally when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: On 7/7/2012 my family and i went to Disneyland. I found the lodging at Candy Cane Inn. I read a few reviews  and was convinced this was the place to go. The Inn is great. Its affordable, clean, and the staff will go out of the way to help you. Did i mention a free shuttle to and from Disney land. Surrounding the Inn is a variety of eating establishments as well as a 7 eleven next door.  I'm very happy to have found this jewell on Harbor Blvd. My hat goes off to the entire staff at Candy Cane Inn. You did a great job.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and it was as pleasure to speak with you on the phone yesterday morning. I am delighted that you and the family had such a wonderful stay and I look forward in assisting you personally with rates and reservations on your next visit. Kind regards!

Summary: This is my 3rd review of Candy Cane Inn and I can't say much more than what I've written in the past and what others have to say.  However, after a recent 6 night stay I want to share what happened.  Upon our arrival, the young man at the front desk (who I will not name) was a little rude.  He didn't seem to care about me or the other people checking in.  He even rolled his eyes at me when I made a small request.  Two days later, I was back at the front desk checking my parents in and idly chatting with the women taking care of the transaction.  I don't know how we got on the subject, but the conversation turned into my check-in experience with the rude employee.  Turns out she was one of the managers and she began to apologize profusely for the employee's actions.  I told her
Manager Response: Thank you for being a repeat and loyal Candy Cane Inn guest. I am sincerely apologetic about this situation and delighted that you understood and appreciated the prompt handling by our MOD, Kim. She is a fine young lady and her genuine care and concern is an attribute that is recognized by our guests and certainly appreciated by myself and our owners. Please feel free to contact me personally when you are returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: We just spent 4 nights at the Candy Cane Inn.  Check in was easy and quick and our roll-away bed we requested was ready when we checked in.  The room was very clean and comfortable.  We had 3 teens with us, so it was a little tight with the roll-away, but you don't spend a lot of time in the room anyhow.  The grounds were very pretty with flowering baskets everywhere.  The breakfast by the pool was good.  Bagels, muffins, cereal, and whole fresh fruit.  We walked the short distance to Disneyland most days, but the shuttle came in handy when our legs and feet were tired late at night.  The shuttle was always on time and the drivers were very friendly.  We would stay here again without hesitation!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your experience with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. Our Expanded Continental Breakfast and our Exclusive Complimentary Shuttle to the theme parks are a couple things that set us apart from other properties. Again, thank you for your business as we DO appreciate this!

Summary: We stayed here for two nights (June 28th-29th) to visit Disneyland.  We arrived at 8:30 am and were able to park at the hotel and take the shuttle to Disneyland.  This was great not to have to use Disney Parking on that first day.  At 3:00 in the afternoon I called to see if our room was ready and they said they would check and to call them back in 5 min.  I did and they said our room would be ready by the time we took the shuttle back to the hotel.  When we arrived back they knew who I was and instantly gave us our room key.  Check in took all of two minutes!   The room was on the second floor halfway back into the hotel grounds.  This was a good location and the room was spotless.  You can tell they really care about everything.  We had a personalized note with fresh cookies
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us the opportunity to be of service on your recent visit to the theme parks. We do appreciate your business and the kind comments about our property and the service that you received. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as I would be delighted to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: The only place to stay when visting Disneyland
Summary: Stayed here July 3rd and 4th for the 4 time and always great value, clean room and helpful staff. Throw in the free parking, breakfast and shuttle you have a win/win situation. This is no fancy resort but if your intend is to go to Disneyland have a place to rest your weary bones and attack Disneyland again this is your go to home base. Also if you have AAA, discount, if you need two day hoppers right now(they could be sold out) they have the old prices.What more can I say. Only thing this time around they forgot my sons birthday, usually they leave a little treat and some birthday goodies. No biggie really as we had a blast as always at Disneyland. See you next time.............
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for being a repeat and loyal Candy Cane Inn guest, we DO appreciate this and your business! I am so sorry that our team miscommunicated and missed the delivery for your son’s special 15th birthday. I do appreciate your responding to my email and he should be receiving something in the mail shortly from me. Again, thank you for being our guest and we look forward in seeing you again when your travels bring you back to the happiest place on earth! Warm regards!

Summary: Okay, so it's been over a year since we stayed at CCI, and I'm finally getting around to writing a review. We're planning a trip back to Disneyland and my kids have already requested we stay at Candy Cane Inn.  Even though it's so close to Disneyland we appreciated the free shuttle. The first night we were at the park we missed our shuttle. We made a call to CCI and they sent their driver back to get us so we didn't have to wait another 30 minutes!  The rooms were nice and clean. The beds were extra comfy and a perfect after a long day at the Parks.  The swimming pool was a great way to take a break from all things Disney, and even the kids loved all the beautiful flowers throughout the property.  We can't wait to get back to Disneyland and another stay at the Candy Cane Inn!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and thinking about us when planning your visit. It is very nice to read that your children have requested that you stay at the Candy Cane Inn. Yes, we do receive many positive comments about our drivers and I am delighted they showed you the same hospitality. Please feel free to contact me personally as I would be delighted to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: It's a home away from home for many repeat guests...
Summary: The Candy Cane Inn has been family owned and operated since day one. And it is very obvious that the owners take great care of their team and business, judging by the level of service and attention to detail throughout the property. This was our fourth visit there, and I saw many familiar faces of employees who are treated well. This place is a treat for those whose self worth is not based on a hotel flag or fancy chain. It's all about guest service, proximity to the Disney Resort and being consistent. You'll find gardeners out early in the morning caring for the lush vegetation throughout the property, which sets this place apart from most Anaheim lodging establishments. It smells and feels fresh. The housekeepers are hard working and smile as they greet you passing by. The
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and yes, we are very delighted that many repeat guests refer to the Candy Cane Inn as their “home away from home”. For that I am sincerely happy and professionally proud to be the guidance of this clearly wonderful team! We are blessed to have owners that care about the property and each and every one of the staff and make it a point to be involved so we do not lose our quality, consistency, edge and/or image and that is certainly more important than all the granite and marble or any flag! I do thank you for your very in-depth review and please feel free to contact me when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations. In regards to utilizing names, I expect the team to treat guests (and each other) in the same respectful manner that they like to be treated and only encourage them to display the utmost in professionalism and caring with everyone they come in contact with at all times. Warm regards!

Summary: this hotel gave me my best travel experience for my disney weekend.arrived on friday we were greeted by amy and her staff with loads of smiles.she and her staff made our weekend extemely enjoyable.very clean rooms,very roomy,great pool and the breakfast was fantastic.i would highly recommend the candy cane inn for your stay drop in and say hi to amy and her staff.  dave lopez
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us and I am delighted that Amy, and our team of service professionals made your stay extremely enjoyable. We look forward in seeing you on your next visit and Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Candy Cane Inn is the place to stay
Summary: Visiting Disneyland? This is the place to stay. Unpretentious and an excellent value. Breakfast, pool, hot tub, wading pool, parking, quiet rooms, shuttle to/from Disneyland twice per hour and if you really need to, within easy walking distance. Put it this way, the back of the hotel and the back of the Disney Cars ride butt up against each other; you can even see the backside of the fake landscape of the ride from the front of the hotel. We stayed in a front room. We thought it would be too noisy facing Harbor Blvd, but NO! The landscaping shutters blocked out all the noise. Breakfast was ample though if you're looking for bacon and eggs or waffles, it is only continental: toast, bagels, pastries, cereal, milk, juice, coffee (won't put Starbucks out of business), yogurt...you
Manager Response: Thank you so much for all your kind comments and staying with us, and…we LOVE our guests too!! We do aspire to give the utmost of exceptional guest service and in providing quality in all our products while keeping modest travelers in mind. Warm regards!

Summary: I can't tell you how many times we have stayed at the Candy Cane Inn, but this stay was just as good as the others!  This time, I asked for a handicapped access room so my father would have a little easier time.  With that, the bathroom did have a little more space, and there were hand rails in the bathtub and near the toilet.  A seat was also available for showers.    Our room was a deluxe double, and it was on the first floor near the middle of the property.  There was plenty of counter space near the sink, and there was adequate space in the room.  The television had plenty of good kids stations, which was important, of course.    The staff at this hotel is wonderful.  They are courteous, helpful, and always willing to help out.  The hotel offers a shuttle to Disneyland and
Manager Response: Thank you for being a loyal Candy Cane Inn guest and we appreciate you sharing your kind comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. You touched on so many different aspect of our nice little property and yes, it clearly shows the entire team cares about our guests. Please feel free to contact me personally when planning your next visit as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations.  Kind regards!

Summary: A five minute walk to the park with bright, clean, quiet, spacious rooms and a continental breakfast for $139/ night in the end of June, how can you beat that? Free coffee, candy canes, wifi. A pool to relax by in the afternoons. Friendly staff. Beautiful grounds. Thank you for another great visit! Highly recommend Candy Cane Inn!
Manager Response: Thank you allowing us the pleasure to be of service during your recent visit to the theme parks. We DO appreciate your business and wonderful comments. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Great way to stay at Disneyland without $$$$$$$
Summary: First and most important point is the amazing service throughout our entire stay.  There is nothing like being greeted and assisted with a genuine smile. The Breakfast served daily was alright but having it by the pool was really nice. And a very easy walk to the entire Disney resort, as well as a shuttle. Rooms were a little small but maybe that's just because we were three adults! They had very comfy beds and my favorite shutters! Great cleaning daily, you could tell they put a lot of effort into maintaining the property at it's peak. There was even fresh paint. For times I'm not staying at a Disneyland resort hotel. I Would definitely stay at the candy cane inn again.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. We DO appreciate your business and your feedback allows us to make necessary improvements. The team certainly does a wonderful job in providing exceptional service and a “genuine” smile is paramount in dealing with guests. We do aspire to provide exceptional guest service and a quality product with a family budget in mind. I am delighted to read that you would stay with us again and please feel free to contact me as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: Great value, very clean, helpful staff. We picked this hotel based on its good recommendations and it lived up to our expectations. We walked to Disneyland every day, spent afternoons at the pool, and were impressed with the cheerful staff and clean rooms.
Manager Response: Thank you for listening to the recommendations and allowing us the opportunity to be of service during your recent visit. I am a firm believer of this and the Candy Cane Inn is certainly happy that we have so many longstanding and wonderful relationships with guests. I am delighted that you enjoyed yourself and please feel free to contact me when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations. Warm regards!

Summary Heading: Maybe a value, if you can bear staying in a cheap motel
Summary: I was booked for 4 nights but checked out after the first night and into the Sheraton.  A "good value," perhaps, and definitely close to Disney, if you can stand the small, dark, shabby rooms and the pool in the middle of the parking lot.  It reminded me of a Motel 6.  The distance to the park doesn't matter since the area hotels have free shuttles.  It seemed clean enough.  Just don't expect more than a motel stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your comments, while it is clear that we did not live up to your expectations we do appreciate your input and listen to our guests. Kind regards.

Summary: Just returned to Canada after a wonderful 7 night stay at the Candy Cane Inn...our second stay in 4 years.  When we drove into the entrance last week, it honestly felt like we were at our "home" at Disneyland.  The grounds and landscaping so eye-appealing and feel as though you are entering a tropical oasis.  Beds, pillows and linens are always fresh and cozy feeling.  We love the walk to the Disney (about 7 mins), the wonderful poolside continental + breakfast and the shuttle which is so nice for those days when we venture back and forth several times.  Staff at the Candy Cane are amazing and do a wonderful job of keeping the place immaculate.  Our requests for fireworks view and rooms close together for our large family were all graciously accommodated.  Thanks to Edd, the
Manager Response: It is pleasuring to read that you came “home” to visit our Inn and I am delightful that the team treated you in the manner that you feel so comfortable in mentioning. I do appreciate all of our team members who display such caring and sincere hospitality to our guests and your comments are heartwarming. Yes, Edd is a wonderful gentleman and certainly has a wealth of knowledge and many many stories. Again, thank you for taking the time and please feel free to contact me when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations. Warm regards!

Summary: My siblings and I stayed  at The Candy Cane Inn last week until Saturday the 23rd, and this is the second time we have stayed here, the last time being in June 2008!! Whenever we stay, we always feel like we're staying on Disney property, as it is only 250 yards from the park, the rooms are comfortable, and the free breakfast by the pool is great! Also, the property itself has a certain charm to it, and the beautiful floral arrangments smell absolutely wonderful. Another awesome aspect is that from your room, you can see the Tower of Terror, back of Cars Land, and the fireworks at Disneyland going off at night! The staff is very friendly and accommodating, as we stored our luggage there on Saturday after we checked out and enjoyed our last day at the parks. We will continue to
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Nice, but more of the same
Summary: We had always wanted to stay at this hotel because on the surface it looked a bit more charming than some of the other nondescript hotels that surround the Disney parks. Sometimes you can judge a book by it's cover, that is to say that this hotel was precisely a bit more charming on the surface and nothing else. They certainly did make an effort to make the surroundings a bit more pleasant with lots of flowers and a generally clean and bright feeling, but the rooms were exactly like every other anaheim-area hotel that we'd ever stayed in. With this establishment charging about an extra $15-20 more a night as compared to their competitors, I was expecting some higher quality furniture, beds, bathrooms etc, but was disappointed on that front. I don't want to paint a bleak picture
Manager Response: I am sincerely sorry that we did not live up to your anticipated expectations and appreciate your giving us the opportunity and appreciate your comments about our property. In regards to price value, we do price valuations to be consistent in the area and pride ourselves on NOT charging for Parking, Our Expanded Continental Breakfast, our Exclusive Shuttle to and from the Theme Parks, Parking, Wifi nor do we have any other SUPRISE charges such as “resort” or “convenience” fees. Kind regards.

Summary Heading: Candy Cane Inn is really a secret treat!
Summary: We've stayed here a couple of times, late August 2011 and early December 2011. We love the closeness to Disneyland, the free shuttle that runs every half hour both to and from Disneyland (except in the evening so the driver may have their dinner break). The rooms are nice, neat and clean; plantation shutters, updated linens; very comfortable. The breakfast room and adjoining patio & pool area are fun to dine at each morning. You may also take a tray from your room and go get breakfast, coffee, etc. to take back to your room if you wish. The plants and flowers are pretty, you can almost feel as though you're sitting at New Orleans Square! Every staff member we've been in contact with has been friendly and polite. After your first stay they give you a voucher for your next stay to
Manager Response: I am so delighted to read that you enjoyed your recent visit and thank you for being a repeat guest. We do value our repeat guests and the rewards certificate is a token of our appreciation as the Candy Cane Inn is and continues to build on relationships. We do aspire to be a very clean and comfortable option with the budgets of family travelers on a budget. Warm regards!

Summary: This is my second stay.  An amazing value for the money.  Layout and grounds are clean and kid friendly.  Location couldn't be better for Disney, skateboard park, buses, souvenirs, family restaurants.  For lunch by the pool, you can get great family fare at the Seven-Eleven on the corner--pizza, chicken tenders, salads, fruit--at low price.    I had a bad fall at the pool and found the manager, Robert Fambrough, to be sincerely kind and helpful, not just ducking a lawsuit.  He dressed my wound and extended our time by three hours so I could rest on an ice pack.  Michaela checked on me to be sure I was recuperating.  These people truly care about guest service.
Manager Response: It was so nice to speak with you and learn that you are feeling much better and I appreciate your kind comments about Robert and Michaela. They are fine and caring individuals and I am very proud that they are on the team here at the Candy Cane Inn! I was also delighted that your grandson had a wonderful time as times with family are so very important and precious! Kind regards and look forward in seeing you again on your next visit.

Summary: Hubby and I went to Disneyland for my birthday.  Getting a hotel was proving difficult as most were chains and outrageously expensive.  Discovered The Candy Cane Inn.  Nicely maintained.  Staff is super friendly, breakfast is continental and delicious.  Grounds are stunning.  Shuttle to the park and back is great when too tired to walk the mere 250 yards to the gate.  Will stay there again.  Nice touch was cookies in the room and a card from the manager for my birthday.  : ).
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us to help you and “Hubby” enjoy this special occasion and day.  The cookies are a small token of our appreciation and learning that you had wonderful time is the most important thing for us. Warm regards!

Summary Heading: Love staying at the Candy Cane Inn
Summary: My husband, two daughters, and I have stayed many times at the Candy Cane Inn over the past 10 years. It was recommended to us by a friend.  Most recently, my daughters and I stayed for 4 nights in June. We were treated so well, as usual, by James at the front desk. He arranged for us to have an upstairs room closer to the lobby since my husband was not able to join us on this trip. James always greets you with a smile and is very helpful with anything we need. Many thanks!! We will be back next year.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your visit and sharing your kind comments about James, he is certainly an asset to the property and more importantly our guests! Please feel free to contact when planning your visit next year as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: We've visited Disneyland 6 times in the past 20 years. We've stayed at the Grand Californian twice, the Disneyland Hotel and assorted Good Neighbor hotels.  Hands down, for the money, this is where you want to stay.  My husband and I, along with 2 teenagers and one grown son stayed here June 16-19 and were very pleased with several aspects of this property. First and foremost is the ambiance and proximity to Disneyland. Disneyland is a short 10 minute walk or you can take the shuttle which leaves every 1/2 hour and drops you near the main entrance.  The gardens and pool area are lovely, and you forget you are on Harbor Drive.  The staff were extremely courteous and helpful and we found they will go out of their way to help make your stay pleasant and comfortable.  Breakfast is
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for staying with us and being a loyal repeat guest, we DO appreciate your business. Edd is a fine gentleman and his many stories are very interesting and being in the area so many years you see incredible changes. Thank you again and we send our warm wishes!

Summary: My husband and I both attended Disneyland in 1955. Our parents and grandparents brought us to Disneyland even before all the rides were completed. Dumbo was not up and running yet. And the teacups were not ready. We didn't know each other then, but my husband and I both fell in love with Disneyland. Through our lives we have come back to Disneyland, with our friends, with our spouses and children, and grandchildren. We will always love it. Now that we are older, it's harder to get around and there are way more people to wade through and traffic to get there. Staying at the Candy Cane Inn made this particular trip most enjoyable, because it's so close to the park, we don't have to rely on the shuttles. I have an electronic convenience vehicle and when we all go together, they
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your comments regarding your recent visit to the Candy Cane Inn.  Yes, our exclusive complimentary shuttle is most enjoyable after a long day at the theme parks.  It is nice to read that you and your grandsons enjoy the spa and pool that are heated year around for comfort.  Please feel free to contact me when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations. Warm regards!

Summary: Must be summer time, service was not as friendly this time, Amy and James were really nice as usual, thank you ! Room had a smell of mildew, just did not have as good of a feel of the cleanliness I usually feel when I stay here. That said I will be back, still my favorite place to stay!
Manager Response: Thank you for being a loyal repeat guest and your kind comments about Amy and James, they are great folks and I appreciate all that they do for our Candy Cane Inn guests! I have researched your reservation and our housekeeping manager and engineer walk the room to ensure there are no future issues. Thank you for bringing this to our attention, we DO appreciate the feedback.

Summary Heading: Not as good as it used to be
Summary: I wanted to share with everyone how disappointing my stay at Candy Cane Inn was this week.   First off, I have been staying at the Candy Cane, as have most of my friends, for years.  We love this hotel!  However, this was a TERRIBLE stay.  From check in to check out, we were very unhappy.  When we checked in, the front desk clerk was friendly but noted that we had a room near at front of the hotel and that was not a good thing.  She said it would be loud and be prepared.  I thought as a past guest that we may have at least gotten a decent room, not the worse room in the place.  So, we had already started the trip off on a bad note.  She was right, the room was terrible.  The room was incredibly loud.  We had requested a pak and play.  It was delivered and when I set it up, it
Manager Response: Thank you for speaking with me regarding your recent visit not being up to your expectations and I am delighted that you have allowed us the opportunity to restore your confidence in the hotel you “love” on your upcoming visit. I do sincerely apologize for the service you received and have spoken with the team as we clearly listen to feedback provided and use this for training and guidance. Kind regards!

Summary: After doing much research, we chose the Candy Cane Inn. It seemed the best deal in terms of price, location and breakfast.  We had two rooms - one king room and one with two queens. Both, while not huge, were fine for two nights. (The king room was actually a handicapped room and may have been a little bigger than a regular king room.)  I had requested quieter rooms, and both were in a back corner on the first floor. The king room was quiet (though somewhat dark), but the queen room was next to a supply room and seemed a bit noisy as people were going in and out at night.  The breakfast was plentiful but the hours are somewhat limited - 7am - 9am. It would be great if they'd serve until 10!  All in all, I'd recommend this hotel as a convenient, reasonably-priced family hotel for
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us the opportunity on your recent visit to the Theme Parks and we do appreciate your business. Thank you for your valuable feedback, we do appreciate and listen to our guests and make necessary changes to assist in future guests stays. Yes, we do aspire to be a reasonably-priced hotel with emphasis on quality produces and providing exceptional guest service.

Summary: My husband and I have stayed here twice, November 2011 and March 2012. Both times have been a good experience. The rooms are extremely clean and the landscaping is beautiful. They have so many flowers.  They also have a large continental breakfast with several items to choose from.  The hotel is close enough to walk to the parks but they also have the shuttle in case you are tired at the end of the day!  Definitely worth staying here!
Manager Response: Thank you for being a repeat guest and sharing your comments about our property on TripAdvisor. Our housekeeping team and gardeners do an outstanding job in maintaining the facility and they appreciate the compliments. Look forward in seeing you again and please feel free to contact me personally as I would be delighted to assist with rates and reservations. Warm regards!

Summary: Excellent location for Disneyland! The rooms are clean and more than adequet, the beds are good and we found ourselves having really good sleeps even if there were lots of children staying at the hotel. Infact we were amazed at how quiet it was at night! The parking can be a little crazy when the hotel is full.....best bet is to get a spot and not drive unless you need to! The breakfast is a basic one but enough to get you off in the morning. What we liked about this location is the attention that is taken to keep everything in A1 shape...something very rarely seen today. Overall we enjoyed our stay and are sure you will also.
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for staying with us and sharing your comments with fellow travelers.  We do receive many comments regarding our Serta Double Pillow Top Presidential Suite Mattresses and the quality of sleep. Again, thank you for your business, it IS most appreciated. Kind regards!

Summary: We have wanted to stay at Candy Cane Inn for years.  This May we were able to do so! I had heard much about the friendly and helpful staff at this pretty little Inn. It was such a lovely place, very very private and a real garden spot. The scent especially at night, was intoxicating. The shuttle drivers were excellent , almost as excited to drive us to Disneyland as we were to be going. The maids very dutiful and nice, the rooms always perfectly clean. My daughter had a little message back and forth with our maid, saying "thank you for keeping us so comfy" and a nice reply back from her. The beds were extremely comfortable, a real concern with our three bad backs, we all slept very well.   That said, two points I want to make. Firstly, the continental breakfast was generous and
Manager Response: Thank you much for staying with us and sharing your valuable feedback. We do value comments from guests and I am delighted that you responded to my email through TripAdvisor. Thanks again and know that this type of information allows us the opportunity to review in training our team and making changes to our operation. Kind regards!

Summary: This was our first stay at The Candy Cane Inn and we will be back. Very friendly staff, Clean rooms, your basic room. We had an awesome veiw of the Disneyland Fireworks( rooms 234 and 235). The grounds were very clean and pretty with all the landscaping. Had a contienetal breakfast( muffins, fruit, toast, bagels ect) Enough to keep us going for the morning. The shuttle drivers were very nice, It is close enough to walk but at the end of the day with 2 tired kids the shuttle was nice :) Can't wait to come back!
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for allowing us the opportunity on your recent visit to the theme parks.  Its nice to hear that you will be returning and please feel free to contact me personally as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations. Warm regards!

Summary: We had heard rave reviews about the Candy Cane Inn and it was very nice!  Perfect distance to walk to Disneyland though they also have a convenient shuttle.  The breakfast was standard continental with muffins, bagels and some fruit.  It was nice how they had the tables set outside by the pool, which is a very pretty setting because they also have a nice garden area and flowers.  This sure beats the last hotel we stayed at near Disney where the tables were alongside the parking lot.  The staff was very friendly and helpful, which is also not something you find at every hotel.  Finally, the rooms were fairly standard and comfortable.  Our room was clean.  My only complaint was the plumbing, as there was literally almost no water pressure in the shower and the sink backed up
Manager Response: It is great to know that you will be coming back to the Candy Cane Inn!  I am so sorry to read that the plumbing was not working properly.  I will be sure to address your concern with our Engineering Department.  Please be sure to contact me when you are planning your next visit and I would be more than happy to assist you with your reservations.  Warm regards!

Summary: On a whim, we decided to go to Disneyland for the long holiday weekend.  We were surprised, and pleased, to find availability at the CCI with less than 24 hours notice. We stayed from 5/24-5/27.  We have been staying at CCI numerous times a year for several years.  Each time we are always pleased with the place.  We took advantage of the shuttles buses to get back to the hotel, the breakfast for the quick bagel and fruit and the hot tub to soak our tired feet. Check in was a breeze as was check out.  It is also nice that they provide discount coupon for your next stay.  Overall the place has a very warm welcoming feel to it.
Manager Response: Thank you for being a loyal Candy Cane Inn guest!  It is our loyal guests who have kept us around for the last 55 years.  I am pleased to read that you enjoyed your stay with us and I cannot wait for you to come back!  As always, please be sure to let me know if I can be of assistance with your next reservation.  Warm regards!

Summary Heading: Coming in a bit unnerved, but looking forward to a good experience!
Summary: I have to be honest and say I'm a little bummed that this hotel doesn't offer agent rates at this time, working in the industry, I try to get the opportunity to try out all different places so I can better recommend them to my clients. However, I have still made a reservation and I'm looking forward to checking the place out with my family, considering all the great reviews it has been given on this site.  Assuming I don't come across a much better agent incentive, I will be back soon to report of my experience!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your comments with us.  Please know that we value the partnerships with have with our Travel Agents.  We encourage them to visit our hotel and experience first-hand what makes our hotel so special.  We do offer Travel Agent rates when available and ask that any Travel Agent interested in visiting the Candy Cane Inn

Summary Heading: Pleasant stay without the hassle of parking at Disney
Summary: This was the first time that we stayed close enough to Disneyland to walk instead of drive: very convenient. The motel had a very pleasant atmosphere with lots of flowers and trees. The room was very clean and comfortable. We did, however, have to get a little creative to get the roll-away bed into the room. Breakfast offered a little variety with yogurt, bananas, cereals, toast and baked goods. It was pleasant eating next to the pool. However, I guess you would have to bring your food back to your room if it rained since there is not much room inside to sit at a table. But I imagine that is not a problem very often. Met a very friendly employee with a badge that identified him as the "Candy Cane Inn Historian". He was clearly very proud of the place and gave me the history of
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share with us your experience at the Candy Cane Inn.  Edd is our official Candy Cane Inn Historian and has been with the company for almost 30 years!  I am happy to read that you enjoyed your stay and I look forward to your next visit.  Best regards!

Summary: Candy Cane Inn is an awesome place to stay. Customer service is excellent, We were able to find parking right in front of our door, which meant no lugging luggage around for our family of 5. Room is very clean and comfortable. Breakfast was yummy and enjoyed eating around the pool! The Grounds are really beautiful and kept up very well! This hotel has a lot to offer! We will be back again for sure!!!
Manager Response: We are glad to read that you enjoyed your stay with us.  Please keep in mind that we are always willing to assist you if you ever need help with luggage or finding a parking spot.  If you ever need assistance with reservations, please do not hesitate to contact me.  Thank you for your comments.  Best regards!

Summary Heading: The CCI we knew and loved
Summary: The level of customer service provided by Jeff Holl and the Candy Cane Inn staff was exceptional.  We stayed at CCI from 4/27-4/29. By the end of our trip, we did not want to leave! We try to visit Disneyland every other month and CCI has been our preferred home away from home.  As always, the beds were super comfy, service was excellent, breakfast hit the spot, and the pool/spa made my boys happy.  We ran into a problem during our February stay at CCI but heard back from management IMMEDIATELY! We were impressed for sure.  We’ve had issues at other hotels (like the Jolly Roger) and, after speaking to the front desk, have simply received a “So, are you checking out now?” response.   With my boys, at the end of a hotel stay, you never know where you’ll find your belongings.  So,
Manager Response: Happy birthday to your 8 year old!  I am so pleased to read that you enjoyed your visit to the Candy Cane Inn.  The cleanliness and the service we provide shows the dedication of our staff.  We all understand that things happen, but it truly is how things are addressed and handled that makes the Candy Cane Inn who we are.  Please be sure to let be know when you are back in town and it would be my pleasure to assist you with planning your next stay at our hotel.  Thank you for your comments and I look forward to your next stay with us.  Warm regards!

Summary: I can't rave enough about this hotel.  Check in was a 2 minute exercise.  Parking is FREE and practically on your doorstep.  The gardens surrounding the complex are beautiful.    The rooms have a homely appeal, which are very clean and well equipped.  Complimentary breakfast was a bonus and saved time with a busy schedule.  The pool area is lovely and inviting.  My children loved the pool and spent any spare hours there.  The paddle pool is a godsend with younger ones.  The location is FANTASTIC being roughly 300 metres from the parks and within driving distance of LA and various other beach destinations, such as Long Beach, Laguna and Newport.  The free shuttle bus would be a bonus for anyone requiring it.  We walked to the parks, which is roughly 5-10 minutes.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your feedback with fellow travelers.  We do aspire to have a clean, quaint Inn with an emphasis on exceptional guest service and providing price value. Please feel free to contact the front desk at any time as it would the pleasure of one of our team members to assist with luggage.  Kind regards!

Summary: Stayed at the Candy Cane Inn due to the proximity to Disneyland.  The room was nothing special, standard room, nice bathroom and a refridgerator everything you need in a hotel room.  This hotel does have a free breakfast in the morning consisting of toast, bagels, pastries, cereal, yogurt, fruit and beverages.  A perfect way to start out the day, especially if you will be eating at the parks later in the day.  This helps to save a few bucks and is a solid breakfast.  The pool area was kept up well, very clean and I believe the pool was heated.  The walk to the main entrance to Disneyland isn't too far but the hotel has a free shuttle that you might as well utilize, drops you off close to the gate and the drivers are very friendly.  Save the walking for the parks!  I would
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us the opportunity on your recent visit to the Theme Parks.  Yes, our Pool, Spa and child’s wading pool are all heated year around for guest’s satisfaction and comfort. Thank you for recognizing our shuttle drivers and I apologize for guest noise, sometimes folks get a little caught up in the excitement. Again, thank you for your business and feedback.

Summary: This was our second stay here and again, it was super.The Premium room is great.It is so roomy and does not feel at all cramped.Service is great,the pool is a treat!It is really worth paying a bit extra to have breakfast brought over.We will be back again in Feb.2013!!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us again and sharing your comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. Yes, many folks do enjoy the added space and amenities that our Premium rooms offer. Please feel free to contact me personally when planning your visit next year as I would be delighted to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: We travel for years. There have been a handful of properties that were outstanding. Candy Cane is one of those. Perfectly located.Very clean.Well maintained. The shuttle is a dream right on time, the drivers friendly. For the first time ever I brought my computer along, no problem setting it up. As for Disneyland, checking the bags is a joke.
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for allowing the opportunity to be of service on your recent visit. We do appreciate your comments and strive to provide a clean, comfortable and well maintained property with an emphasis on exceptional guest service. Please feel free to contact me personal when you are returning as I would be delighted to assist with rates and reservations. Warm regards!

Summary Heading: Paper plates and plastic cutlery? You can't be serious?!
Summary: The family and I stayed in a deluxe room - all rooms really,really small and dark. Poky bathroom. Carpets a bit dirty particularly at entry.  Staff were just plain unhelpful - couldn't tell me basic stuff about the area and how to get around. I had the feeling they knew the answers but couldn't be bothered to take the time to explain. Their attitude felt really unhelpful.  But my biggest issue was breakfast - food was ordinary with lots of processed and sweet stuff with some unripe fruit thrown in. It was all over and done with by 9am so if you didn't get there on time bad luck. And if they ran out of basics like bread at 8.30, you get nothing. Tables didn't get cleaned so it always felt disgusting to be eating amongst someone elses coffee rings and yogurt smeers. And to top it
Manager Response: I am sorry to read that your stay with us was not to your satisfaction. I would like to inform you that I have taken all of your comments into consideration and I have discussed them with my Management Team. I truly apologize that you did not enjoy the selection of our breakfast. We try to provide a variety of breakfast items so that all of our guests can find something to jump start their day. I understand that our selections may not fit every guest’s dietary needs, again I am very sorry. If you would like to discuss your concerns in more detail, please feel free to contact me directly. Warm regards!

Summary: We spent two nights at the Candy Cane Inn . The room was very clean and comfortable.  The grounds were beautiful and very well maintain.  The location was great, within walking distance to Disney and many good resturants and shops. With  free breakfast, free parking and a free shuttle bus to and from Disney what more could you ask for, it was a great stay.   Will definitely stay again next time we go to Disney.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: This is the place you're looking for
Summary: The property is clean, carefully maintained, and extremely convenient - you can walk into Disney in less than 10 minutes if you don't care to ride the free courtesy shuttle that roundtrips twice an hour. The staff was friendly and very helpful: we arrived several hours before check-in, but they still gave us a parking pass and put us on the shuttle - what a way to start a vacation! We never had a chance to try the pool, but we really enjoyed the complimentary breakfast by it.  We also stayed in the Disneyland Hotel this trip and, while it was very nice, we definitely were not getting three times the experience for literally triple the price.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your comments with us.  I am happy to read that you enjoyed your stay.  The Candy Cane Inn strives to provide our guests the essentials they need to enjoy their time at Disneyland without having to break the bank.  I hope that you will be back again soon.  Thank you again for staying with us.  Best regards!

Summary Heading: Candy Cane Inn never fails to deliver.
Summary: The Candy Cane Inn is the only motel I stay at when visiting the Anaheim area. It is clean, inside and out. The grounds are maintained beautifully. Each staff member is friendly and willing to help in any way. James, at the front desk, is amazing. He is efficient, friendly, and it is apparent that he likes his job. He goes out of his way to make sure your stay is pleasant. Edd is the motel historian and has been there for 26 years. He can tell you all about the Candy Cane. I hope I don't have to wait another 2 years before I return to Disneyland and the Candy Cane. For me, it's a package deal.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us!  To serve our guest is our pleasure and I am glad that James and Edd were so helpful.  Please feel free to contact me when you are ready to make your next reservation at the Candy Cane Inn.  Best regards!

Summary Heading: Best Value in the Disneyland Area
Summary: We've stayed at the Candy Cane Inn 5 times now and don't even consider any other property when visiting Disneyland. This has to be the best run hotel we have ever stayed at and that includes some places that cost more than twice as much. The location, excellent staff, free breakfast and frequent shuttle service all add up to make this our #1 choice. Our only complaint this visit was with the noisy compressor for the ice making machine. We were in room 160, directly across from the machine and had to use ear plugs to muffle the sound of the compressor running all night. Of course after 12 hours of walking in the parks, it's not too hard to fall asleep. We would still highly recommend the Candy Cane Inn, but will just ask for a different room next time.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback.  I am sorry that the noise of the vending machines disturbed you.  Please remember that if there is anything that is not to your satisfaction, please let our Front Desk know and it would be our pleasure to assist you.  Thank you again for all your wonderful comments and I look forward to your next stay with us!

Summary: Candy Cane Inn has the friendliest staff, is well manicured-building and landscaping, very clean, and an excellent location in the same block as Disneyland--no crossing streets.  We ALWAYS stay here.  Clean pool.  Great continental breakfast.  Well worth the price.  They even offer a discount for future visits.
Manager Response: Thank you for being loyal guests of the Candy Cane Inn.  I really appreciate the fact that you took the time to share your comments about your stay with us.  Please let me know if you need help with reservations and I will be more than happy to assist you.  Warm regards!

Summary: We just spent a week at the Candy Cane Inn. Our first night didn't go so well, but we spoke with the manager Chris who went out of his way to make the rest of our stay great! We travel a lot and have never had as outstanding customer service as we got here.  The Candy Cane Inn is a charming, family owned airline. The grounds are absolutely beautiful and lush. As soon as you reach the driveway you are immediately greeted with the smell of flowers.  Breakfast is served by the pool which is a peaceful way to start the day.  Disneyland is an easy 8 minute walk from the hotel but there is also a free shuttle that departs every 30 minutes which is great when you've got tired legs or feet!  Candy Cane Inn is a great choice for Disneyland lodging!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us at the Candy Cane Inn.  Chris made me aware of your concerns and it pleases me to know that he exceeded your expectations.  My Staff and I do our best to ensure our guests enjoy a comfortable and relaxing stay.  Please do not hesitate to contact me if you are back in the area and need assistance with reservations.  Until next time, warm regards!

Summary: The last time I visited Disneyland we stayed at the Disneyland Hotel so I was not expecting an optimum experience at the Candy Cane Inn but the Trip Advisor reviews were good and a friend recommended it to me. I was very pleasantly surprised. The staff was pleasant and professional; the grounds (including the pool area) were lovely and well-maintained; and the room was clean and comfortable. I would highly recommend this to families and adults alike and will definitely stay there again myself. They operate their own shuttle which was always on time and the drivers were friendly.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback.  One of the amenities that our guests appreciate is our complimentary shuttle to and from Disneyland.  Our shuttle leaves every 30 minutes, but we are also a short 250 yards (7-10 minutes walk) from the main entrance.  Thank you for giving us a chance and choosing to stay with us.  We hope to have you back again soon.  Warm regards!

Summary: I've checked into the Candy Cane Inn, currently still here, and will be here for several more nights.  It's clean, nice, feels safe! All is good and the wi-fi works (on PC) and speedy.  Great for tourists such my myself too.  What can I say? Join me!
Manager Response: Thank you for your invitation!  I truly hope that our TripAdvisor readers will take you up and join you at the Candy Cane Inn!  I am happy to read that everything is going well during your stay.  Please be sure to let us know if we can be of service to you.  Best regards!

Summary: We stayed at the Candy Cane inn for four nights last week, our 2nd stay and was not disappointed.  Rooms are always spotless; staff friendly & helpful; shuttle always on time.   Close enough to walk to Disneyland without difficulty, though shuttle is nice after a busy day at the Park. Candy Cane has the best hottub!  Laundry machines worked fine and they don't over charge like some other places we've stayed. Beds very comfortable with lots of pillows.  Breakfast was good, everything looked nice & fresh.    When we checked into our room the TV, minifridge & hair dryer would not turn on.  Called the office and a maintance staff showed up immediately and showed me where the red button on the light switch actually turned it all on.  I maybe the only person who never knew that... ha
Manager Response: Thank you sharing your comments with us.  I am happy to read that our Engineering staff was helpful.  It is our pleasure to come out and assist you with any questions or concerns that you may have.  Also, I will definitely take your suggestions into consideration.  Thank you again for staying with us and I hope to have you back again soon!

Summary: Whenever we come here, the service is terrific. Breakfast is always good( usual stuff like cereal, muffins, toast, fruit,etc.) and the shuttle is always on time, about a 2 second ride to Disneyland. The rooms are clean and spacious, we might be coming back in August!!!!!
Manager Response: We “love, love, love” the fact that you took the time to share your comments with our TripAdvisor readers!  When you are ready to book your next stay in August, please feel free to give me a call if I can be of assistance!  Warm regards!

Summary: Check-in was breeze.  Room was charming.  Found a past guest's sock hidden under the a/c unit but otherwise room was clean.  The grounds were VERY well kept as were the pool & breakfast area.  Breakfast was simple . . . mostly carbs and some yogurt.  (Coffee was pretty good too.)  All the staff we encountered were friendly and professional.  Beds are a bit soft but there were ample amount of pillows & blankets.  Would stay here again over the #1 rated Park Vue Inn.  Perfect 8 - 10 minute walk to the parks.  (Quicker than the hotel's complimentary bus that runs every half hour.)
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback.  I am deeply sorry to read that you found a sock under your A/C unit.  I have shared this information with our Director of Housekeeping to ensure this does not happen again.  Also, thank you for your recommendation!  I cannot wait to have you back at the Candy Cane Inn!  Warm regards!

Summary Heading: Cute little gem, minutes from Disney gates!
Summary: This immaculately kept little motel, is less than a 10min walk to Disney or you can take the great free shuttle every 30mins.  The property is spotless with lovely flowers and greenery with a great pool/hot tub area in the centre of the complex.  All rooms are accessed from the outside on the ground level or up a flight of outdoor stairs.  Ours was in the very back of the property sheltered from street and pool noise.  Walls between rooms are not well sound proofed as you could hear the shower and the hair blower quite well but the rooms are very clean, comfy and well appointed for this price point.  Breakfast was included consisting of bagels, fruit, baked goods, juices, coffee, tea, hot cocoa, milk and cereals/instant oatmeal....certainly adequate.  The staff was very friendly
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and providing feedback to fellow TripAdvisor travelers.  Our gardeners and housekeeping team do a wonderful job of maintaining our property to be pristine and quaint. And, yes the Anaheim GardenWalk has a wonderful variety of eating establishments and things to do. Kind regards!

Summary: We have stayed at many hotels in the Disneyland area, and we found this one to be the best. Here are the list of things that make this hotel exceptional:  1.
