Great Continental Breakfast - Very convenient and something that is required to enjoy the day at the park. 2. Great FREE Shuttle with convenient timings. 3. Beautiful property with very clean rooms and ample amenities. 4. WiFi connection is good and reliable. For us, it worked on Apple products too. 5. Very helpful and friendly staff. 6. Very close to the Disneyland main gate. It's just 5-7 minutes walk, so you don't have to depend on the shuttle all the time. Because of the convenient location, we used to always come to the room to rest in the afternoon for a couple of hours, before going back to the park again for more
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. We do appreciate your feedback and are always open for helpful suggestions to enhance our customer service or property. Please feel free to contact when you are returning as I would be delighted to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Great Hotel walking distance to Disneyland
Summary: We had to change hotels at the last minute because of a date mix-up.  I have never heard of the Candy Cane Inn and was a little leary due to the name.  We loved it! It has been there for 40+ years and is very quaint.  I liked that you could park right outside of your room so you didn't have to haul your luggage through a huge hotel.  It was quiet at night and we felt very safe.  They have a nice continental breakfast that is included and my kids who are 4 and 6, loved the pool!  They have a shuttle that leaves the hotel every 30 minutes up til midnight that is free.  When I say shuttle, I mean a bus, not a small van that only holds a few people.  The shuttle drivers were very friendly and helped with luggage.  It backs right up to disney and you could walk but the shuttle was so
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us the opportunity during your recent visit and I am delighted that you enjoyed yourselves. Yes, we have been continually owned and operated by the same family since 1957 and aspire to be a quaint and quiet property with an emphasis on quality and service. We do thank you for your comments and sharing your thoughts with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations. Warm regards!

Summary: If you have a family and want to go to Disneyland, and don't want to have to depend on a shuttle, this is the place for you.  However, if you value your security, or if you need wi-fi, don't bank on this.  First of all, I have a MacBook Pro, an iPhone, and an iPad, and none of them would connect to the hotel's wi-fi.  When I inquired about this at the front desk, no one had any solutions, except one nice lady said - "Macs don't work at our place!"  But the most SCARY thing that happened to us was a breach of security.  On our second night and final night, I got a phone call around 10:45pm.  It was a gentleman claiming to be from the front desk.  He knew my name, and was asking to verify some info because the charges weren't going through on my credit card.  The scary thing was
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. I want to personally let you know that the safety and security of our guests is our number one priority. My Management Team took action immediately upon hearing that guests were being contacted for their credit card information. In addition, this was reported to the Anaheim Police Department who informed us that this fraud/scam has been happening at other local hotels in the past few days. Please be aware that it is our policy NOT to ask guest’s for credit card or personal information over the phone. All transactions of this nature are handled face to face at our Front Desk. We do our best to ensure a safe environment for our guests, but we are not immune to fraud or scams. If someone overheard your name during a transaction at our front desk I am sorry. All we can do is educate our guests to be cautious and take measures to safeguard their information and property at all times. We encourage our guests to trust their instincts and verify if someone is knocking at their door or calling them asking for information with our Front Desk. I understand that our Front Office Manager spoke with you about your concerns. I am sorry if the situation was not handled in a manner that met your expectations. If you have any further questions or concerns, please feel free to contact me directly and it would be my pleasure to assist you personally. Warm regards.

Summary: Candy Cane Inn is a great small place to stay while in Anaheim.  Priced a little higher than some rooms in the area, but once you factor in the free continental breakfast, price is on par or cheaper than what you would pay for most other rooms and breakfast at Disneyland.  Rooms clean and well maintained.  Great staff and service and if you need transportation to the park, they have a free shuttle every half hour.  We only stay here when we visit Anaheim and we will be back in August.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us!  You are absolutely correct in that our rates are pretty much all inclusive.  We do not charge for parking, breakfast, shuttle service to Disneyland, internet access, or resort fees.  We cannot wait to have you back in August and thank you again for staying at the Candy Cane Inn!

Summary: My wife and I (from Australia) spent 5 nights at the Candy Cane Inn over Easter 2012.   We arrived at about 11am knowing that it was unlikely that our room would be available (and it wasn't), they allowed us to park onsite and we walked up to Disneyland (about 15 minute walk) and checked in later in the day (they offered to call when the room was available, however we declined this offer).  The room was clean and tidy, the usual amenities were available (coffee making facilities, refrigerator etc).  I agree with the other reviews that some protein would have come in handy, however a banana, bagel, yoghurt and coffee was a good enough start to the day for me.   Our only contact with housekeeping was when I had inadvertently left the "Do Not Disturb" sign on our door. When we
Manager Response: Thank you for enjoying your holiday with us at the Candy Cane Inn!  I am very pleased to read that you enjoyed the features and amenities that the hotel had to offer!  If you are back any time soon, please let me know if I can be of assistance.  Warm regards!

Summary Heading: fell above and beyond our expectations
Summary: We stayed here for 5 nights when we were going to Disneyland & it was a great choice! If nothing else the location and free shuttles would have made it worthwhile, but the rest of the hotel was lovely as well. Our room was very clean and comfortable. The beds were divine with lots of pillows and spare blankets if you needed it. We had a few issues with neighbouring rooms' showers waking us up, but that was a minimal discomfort. The staff were all amazingly helpful and friendly.  We also used the pool, which was a nice refresher after a full day of walking around Disneyland. The same could be said for the bathrooms, which are spacious and fitted with lots of fluffy towels. The only small complaint would be that there is no elevator, so if you are staying with large and or heavy
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for allowing us the opportunity on your recent visit to the theme parks and we appreciate your feedback and comments. In regards to no elevator on our property, please let the front desk know and it would be our pleasure to have one of our team assist you with luggage. Again, thank you and please feel free to contact me personally should you be returning as I would be delighted to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: Long review. Here is every thing I would have liked to know when I booked it. I selected this hotel based on rating from tripadvisor. We stayed at the Candy Cane over the Easter weekend (parks were very crowded) for a total of 8 nights. Our room was very clean. The bathroom has the sink split from shower/toilet area allowing one person to brush teeth etc. while another showers. The sink area has generous counter space over 6 feet long with full width and depth storage underneath. Towels were good quality. Shower had good pressure and head. Our room 151 is a deluxe double queen was in the far back corner for quiet. We did not have much noise from neighbors in this location, but being in a completely enclosed hall, all noise from the parking lot and office next door  was amplified
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write your review and share your experience with our TripAdvisor readers. You have brought up a lot of good points and I appreciate your thorough feedback.  I also will be sharing your comments with our Engineering team to ensure we check our rooms for any issues with carpets.  Thank you again for your review of the Candy Cane Inn and we look forward to your next stay with us.

Summary: I watched the reviews on this place for months before I made the reservations and the family and I finally arrived.  We were here over Easter Weekend and loved it.  The location could not be beat.  The breakfast was good, I used little trays in the room to bring it back to our room and patio outside the room to eat each morning.  the staff was great, the drivers were amazing and enough can not be said about the location.  Disney a heartbeat away, shopping, restraunts, etc so close.  Free parking, in room safe, and wonderful housekeeping.  This is a must visit.  We truly hope to come back again sometime!!!!
Manager Response: We cannot wait to have you back!  Thank you for your kind words.  I am very pleased to read that you enjoyed your stay with us.  Please do not hesitate to contact me directly if you are ever in need of reservations assistance.  Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Great place to stay for Disneyland
Summary: This place was just perfect for our stay and trip to Disneyland. After staying on site when we went to DisneyWorld in the fall, it was nice to have an affordable option that was away from Disney, but still a close enough walk (10 minutes from CC to main gate). The staff was very friendly. Check-in was smooth. Rooms were clean and comfortable. The parking was free and not a hassle. We were even able to keep our car in the lot past check out time on our last day. There was a shuttle that ran every 30 minutes to and from the parks.   Our room was on the first floor right next to the bus stop, but we were not bothered by that at all. The free breakfast in the morning had bagels, donuts, cereal, fruit, coffee, etc. It was simple, easy, convenient and helped save a little money on
Manager Response: After reading you comments it sounds like you all had a good time.  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us.  We cannot wait to have you back!  Please feel free to give me a call if you need assistance with reservations.  Best regards!

Summary: Took the family to Disneyland last week and stayed at the Candy Cane Inn. Upon arrival we had a couple problems with the room. I thought oh great here we go, we have a had a couple bad experiences with hotels around disneyland in the past. The fornt desk was friendly helpful and quick to resolve the issues unlike some others we have had to deal with. The location was great, room was clean and spacious. The free shuttle to the park really came in handy! When we got back to the room the second night there was a letter from the general manager Jeff Holl  stating that if we had any problems or needed anything to contact him directly. I thought that was nice of him and showed they really cared. Also there are free candy canes everywhere, how can you beat that! I have already
Manager Response: Exceeding our guest’s expectations is key in our business.  As much as we strive to be perfect, we do understand that things happen.  I am delighted to you know that you got my letter and I thank you for letting us know about your concern.  Letting us know that something is wrong helps us to make things right.  Thank you also for your referral and I cannot wait to have you back.  Please let me know if I can be of further assistance.  Warm regards!

Summary Heading: This is the place we ALWAYS stay at for Disneyland trips
Summary: We have stayed at the Candy Cane Inn 5 or 6 times over the past 4 years. It is our favorite place to stay near Disneyland.  We last stayed here in December of 2011. The rooms are a good size with REALLY comfortable beds.  We have a family of 5, so when we travel all together, we get one of the bigger rooms which can accomodate a rollaway.  This hotel has a nice pool and hot tub, and it serves an adequate, carb-heavy free breakfast.  (Enough to get you going for the day.)  It is about the same distance walk to the entrance of Disneyland as the Disneyland Hotel is.  If the walk, about 1/2 mile, is too much after being on your feet all day, they have a free shuttle bus. We have stayed at other hotels outside the park, but none that we like as well as the Candy Cane.  And the cost
Manager Response: Thank you for being a loyal and repeat Candy Cane Inn guest, we DO appreciate your business and large part of our family. Our Serta Presidential Double Pillow Top Mattresses are a hit with many guests after a long day at the theme parks. Yes, there are many dining choices within walking distance and the Anaheim GardenWalk is certainly worth a visit. Please feel free to contact me personally when planning your next visit and it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: This was the second time we stayed there and it still was the best stay ever.  The staff were great, I want to give kudos to James at the front desk, so helpful, Lee the shuttle driver was so nice and courteous and Edd was always a delight at breakfast.  All of the staff were nice and courteous.  I will defintely stay there again and again. Its so close to the Park that you can either walk or take the shuttle.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and your kind comments about the members of our team, they certainly appreciate them as well. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as I would be delighted to assist with rates and reservations.

Summary: I hesitate to write this review, because I kind of want to keep this place a secret.  The hotel is small, but quaint, and very well kept.  At any given time, there are always a number of people out working on the grounds, landscaping, etc.  The staff is VERY helpful and kind.  The only downside might be dragging luggage up and down the steps, but that is a small price to pay for all the other conveniences.  The proximity to Disney cannot be beat.  The other amenities make it worth the stay as well: free parking, free breakfast, and free Disney shuttle (which you don't really need considering how close the property is to the park).  A great place to stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. Our team certainly does a wonderful job of keeping the property pristine and it shows in their work and attitude. And as always we would be delighted to assist with luggage assistance and just let the front desk know and one of our house persons will be sent to your room. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Great location, Great service, Great place to stay
Summary: From our experience, Candy Cane is the ideal place to stay to visit Disneyland and surrounding attractions. The rooms and grounds are spotlessly clean, very comfortable and family friendly. Brekky, while basic, is all you need to get you started for the day. There are multiple dining options available over the road. We also did baseball & hired a mustang for a day and they had the contacts and arranged it for us, and with a smile. would highly recommend to anyone
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us the opportunity to be of service on your recent visit and sharing your thoughts and comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. Yes, there are many dining options within a short walking distance of our inn. I am delighted that our team was able to assist you with arrangements to enhance your vacation. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Candy Cane Inn - Another Great Stay
Summary: We always stay at the Candy Cane Inn for short stays in Disneyland. We love the pretty location and the spacious clean rooms. This time we stayed in a deluxe room and received a hot breakfast delivered to the room. The one caution is that they don't have an elevator so if you have lots of luggage and small children you may want to request a ground floor room. The Candy Cane Inn is just a short walk to Disneyland (although there is a free shuttle) and is next door to an ABC store.  It is also just a short walk to the car rental location. We hope to see you again soon Candy Cane Inn.
Manager Response: Thank you for being a repeat Candy Cane Inn guest, our reputation has been and is continuing to be built on loyal guests such as yourself, and we sincerely appreciate your business! Please feel free to contact me personally when planning your next visit as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Perfect location, great friendly service and spotless presentation
Summary: The Candy Cane is the ideal place to stay to visit Disneyland and surrounding attractions. The rooms and grounds are spotlessly clean, very comfortable and family friendly. Brekky is included and while basic is all you need to get you up and running for the day. There are multiple dining options available across the road we especially recommend Millie's and The Cheesecake Factory( on Katella) Short trip (we recommend Hugo's $12+ tip) to The Block of outlets at Orange, Westfield Main St Mall for shopping Of course Disneyland is about a 500m walk which we enjoyed doing a couple of times a day or there's the free shuttle which runs very regularly Loved the Candy Cane highly recommend
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and we do appreciate your comments and feedback. Yes, dining options are very plentiful and within short and mostly walking distances. Hugo does a fantastic job and is always very helpful and a courteous gentleman. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as I would be delighted to assist with rates and reservations.

Summary: This is our third stay here, and it just gets better. We always get a premium room. No issues at all this time -- the room was clean, quiet and comfortable. My 6 year old daughter loved the cookies, the popcorn, and the videos we rented (free.) I loved the comfort of the bed, the in-room bottled water and coffee, and the delicious biscotti that is tucked in with the coffee supplies. Just a great stay all around. if I could change anything, I would want an elevator. I always have to drag our bags up to the second floor. But I manage... and other than that I can;t think of a single negative to this year's stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for being a loyal repeat guest; we DO appreciate your business and taking time to share your comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. Yes, our Premium rooms are favorite’s for many return guests with their extra amenities and services. In regards to your comment regarding luggage assistance, please feel free to contact our front desk as one of our team would be delighted to assist with luggage. Again, thank you for your time. Kind regards!

Summary: Checking in was speedy..price was great...FREE shuttle always on time...good continental breakfast...rooms were very nice and clean! You can walk to the park and there were alot of places to eat very close. This hotel took all the worry out of our trip. We will stay here again and will recommend this to all friends and family! Thanks Candy Cane inn for a great stay!
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words!  All the things you mentioned are the reason why the Candy Cane Inn was awarded the 2012 TripAdvisor Traveler’s Choice Award.  Thank you to you and all our TripAdvisor readers for their support of the Candy Cane Inn.  If there is anything I can do to assist you with future reservations, please do not hesitate to contact me.  Warmest regards!

Summary: I really enjoyed my stay. So worth it. Like all the other reviews! I will definitely stay here again! James at the front desk is the best! Great customer service :-)
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your stay!  Also, thank you for your kind words about James.  James is truly the ambassador of the Candy Cane Inn and loved by many of our guests.  Thank you for staying with us and hope to have you back again soon!

Summary: I booked this hotel after reading all the reviews here.  The rooms are clean and quiet, but very small.  I had reserved a Premium Room, but due to a misunderstanding with the reservations department we were stuck with a Deluxe room.  It was disapointing that nobody was able to try to correct this problem, or seemed to care.  It would have been nice if they would have even tried to make this right, but they were sold out so we were stuck. The grounds of the hotel are beautiful.  We sat next to the pool and enjoyed our breakfast, which was a selection of muffins, bagels and the like.  We didn't use the pool, but it looked clean and nice. Overal this is a nice place to stay and a quick walk to the parks.  Just wish my request for a Premium room would have been honored.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to discuss your concerns with my Front Office Manager.  Again, I am very sorry about the confusion regarding your room.  I appreciate your comments, as we value the feedback of our guests to ensure we maintain the high level of guest service our guests expect.  Thank you again for your time and I look forward to your next stay at the Candy Cane Inn.  Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Great place to hang out during trips to Disneyland
Summary: We have stayed here many, many times over the years. Now with two young ones we especially enjoy our stays here with the many ammenities available. It is right next door to Disneyland and convenient shuttle service provided by hotel is great savings. You don't have to ever move your car once you arrive unless you are going out to dinner or elsewhere. You can choose to walk or just ride in style on the hotel shuttle bus and we especially like the driver named Mr. Lee. The girls always ask about Mr. Lee and when he is coming to drive us to Disneyland. Don't forget to view the fireworks from the upper level where you get unobstructed view rather than be sandwiched together with the crowds at Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us and sharing your feedback with fellow travelers. Yes, what can I say about “Mr. Lee”?, guests of all types and ages find him pleasant, helpful and friendly, not to mention his never ending smile certainly makes it a pleasure to have on our team! Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as I would be delighted to assist with rates and reservations. Warm regards!

Summary Heading: Great place to stay for Disneyland
Summary: My 16-year-old son and I stayed at the Candy Cane Inn on March 28th, 2012.  We'd read the reviews, and the place sounded great, but my son was a bit worried nonetheless, probably because of the name.    Check-in was speedy and we were told we'd been upgraded to a premium room, which included breakfast delivery.  We thanked the clerk, but I was thinking, it was probably a last-minute thing, when they ran out of regular rooms.  When we checked in, I asked if we could leave the car there all day the next day, as we'd be in the park until late.  He said it wouldn't be a problem.  The room was on the 2nd floor at the very back of this long, narrow property.  We had no problem with finding a parking space right by the room.  There was no elevator, so we lugged our stuff up the stairs.
Manager Response: After reading your comments, I am delighted that you enjoyed your stay with us.  Our Premium rooms offer many features that many travelers enjoy.  Being able to enjoy breakfast in the comfort of your own room and late checkout at 2pm are just some of the features our Premium rooms have to offer.  Thank you again for staying with us and we look forward to your next visit to the Candy Cane Inn.  Best regards.

Summary Heading: Will never stay anywhere else while visiting Disneyland!
Summary: Another fabulous stay at Candycane. I love that they take such pride in their motel. The three most important things for me in a hotel room, Clean, quiet and comfortable!  Last but not least super close to the Happiest place on earth, you can walk or take the free shuttle!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your stay.  I agree with you!  A clean, quiet, and comfortable hotel is what may of our guests look for.  Having a free shuttle to and from Disneyland and only being 250 yards away from the park are icing on the cake!  Please feel free to contact me if you ever need help with your reservations.  Warm regards!

Summary: I chose this hotel because of the rating and proximity to Disneyland.  It is on the same side of the street as Disney, basically the first hotel as you walk down Harbor toward Katella. The staff is very friendly and helpful, especially when my husband had trouble with the internet connection in our room.  Someone was at our room before my husband got back from the front desk. The breakfast was just fine. There was apples and bananas, donuts, bagels, oatmeal, yogurt, cereal, juice, cocoa, and coffee. It is busy at breakfast in the morning, but you can also sit outside by the pool. It was very nice to have free parking and internet.  The bed was comfortable which is big for me because a hard bed hurts my hips as I'm a side sleeper. It was always cleaned well too.  The best thing
Manager Response: Form time to time we all forget or misplace items.  I am so delighted to learn that Danilo was helpful in ensuring your sunglasses were returned to you.  All kinds of items are found and turned into our Lost and Found Department, but nothing is better than the feeling of letting a guest know we found their items.  Thank you for letting our TripAdvisor Readers know about your stay at the Candy Cane Inn.  I hope that we will be able to have you back again in the near future.  Until then, warm regards!

Summary Heading: Nice place but rooms on Harber Blvd. are LOUD
Summary: My family and I recently went here for one night (3/13/2012) for a quick trip to Disneyland.  Overall...it was fine.  My kids had a good time in the pool, morning buffet was decent, the room was clean...bed was good.  BUT...we were in room 221 (pretty sure that was the number)....which has a window facing Harbor Blvd.  The moment I walked into the room I thought..."Oh...I hope my kids will be able to fall asleep".  Well...they and my wife were able to sleep...but not me.  Disneyland closed at midnight that night, so traffic and buses etc. were going by until about 1AM at least and it all picked up again around 5:30-6AM.  I know...I was awake.  I mentioned the noise to a lady at the front desk the next morning...she said, "Oh...funny...you know some people actually like a little
Manager Response: Thank you for bringing this matter to our attention.  We attempted to reach out to you personally, but I did not receive a reply to our message.  I wanted to let you know that I have discussed your concerns with my Front Office Manager who has spoken to his team about your comments.  While it is true that everyone’s comfort level when it comes to noise can be different, being empathetic of our guest’s concerns is important to ensuring we provide good service.  I hope that you would consider giving us another chance.  If you do, please let me know.  It would be my pleasure to assist you with your reservations and ensuring a comfortable and relaxing stay.  Best regards.

Summary Heading: Location is great, everything else is average
Summary: This is a very simple, bare bones value hotel close to Disneyland.  You can absolutely walk to the entrance gate, even with young children.  If you just want a SIMPLE room to crash in after a long day then this will work just fine.  There is no luxury here.  We reserved a room for 5 and arrived to find out that they do allow 5 in some rooms but the 5th person has to sleep on the floor!  There's not a lot of floor space but my 8 year old is a good sport.  Also, I expected some cute candy cane decor (so did my kids) but there's none of that.  I think there was a basket of candy canes at the front desk but there's nothing else candy cane about the hotel.  The breakfast was all cold items, no hot items.  The tables around the pool were nice but generally the breakfast area was very
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us during your recent visit to the Theme Parks. We do appreciate and listen to the comments of our guests and make necessary enhancements for future travelers. We do aspire to be a clean, comfortable, safe and well kept property with an emphasis on service, friendliness and ambiance while being mindful of budget family travelers. I do apologize for the misunderstanding regarding sleeping for 5 guests and will cover with our reservationists. Our Deluxe and Premium rooms are rated for 5 occupants based on square footage and Fire Code however have only two Queen Beds. Again, thank you for your observations. Kind Regards!

Summary Heading: Another wonderful visit to the Candy Cane Inn!!!
Summary: This is the only hotel we stay at when we visit the Disneyland Resort!!! The property is beautiful, the rooms are clean and so cute, the staff is so kind and polite!!! I cannot say one bad thing about this place....love the premium room with the breakfast delivered to your room, and the welcome pack of goodies you recieve upon arriving. Love the free shuttle to Disneyland also, it is so convienent after a long day at the park. Just a wonderful hotel, I would recommend it to anyone :0)
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words!  We at the Candy Cane appreciate your loyalty!  We do our best to ensure a comfortable stay for all our guests and provide the essentials our guests need to enjoy the Disney theme parks.  Please be sure to let me know if you ever need help with reservations.  Until next time, best regards.

Summary: Took the family to Disneyland for the first time, and stayed at the Candy Cane Inn on a friend's recommendation. Couldn't have been happier. Free parking, free breakfast, free internet, and free shuttle to and from Disneyland. The rooms were sparkling and spacious with 2 queen beds and they even had turn-down service. All this for a reasonable price. And not even a 10-minute walk to Disneyland, if you want the exercise. Would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us!  I am very happy to read that you enjoyed the features of our Premium Room.  Also, just as a reminder, our Premium rooms offer complimentary movie rentals, complimentary newspaper daily, as well as late checkout for 2pm.  These are all great features for those who are traveling little ones or guests who wish to pamper themselves.  If at any time I can be of assistance, please do not hesitate to let me know.  Kind regards!

Summary: This is the third time I've stayed here and it was, as usual, a pleasant stay. The shuttle to the park is convenient and the proximity allows one to walk to D-land and back, too. The beds were a little squishier than I generally like, but I slept like a baby after walking around D-land all day so no biggie. I upgraded to a slightly more expensive room and had the continental breakfast delivered, which was a huge plus. Last year I went down to the breakfast area with my family and it was a a pain in the butt jockeying for the toaster, etc. Peeve: the pool and hot tub area are pretty nice but they play a soft-pop radio station annoyingly loud on several outdoor speakers, thus making the pool space undesirable for my wife and me. The kids do love this place, especially the extra
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments.  I am sorry that you did not enjoy the ambiance of our pool area.  We try our best to set the music in our pool area to create an enjoyable atmosphere.  If at any time the music is not to your liking, please let us know.  We will be more than happy to change the station or even turn it off while you are enjoying the pool.  We want to do whatever we can to ensure a comfortable and enjoyable stay.  If there is anything I can do to assist you in the future, please let me know.  Kind regards!

Summary Heading: New favourite place to stay at Disneyland!
Summary: This hotel just exceeded our expectations in so many ways.  From excellent price to excellent location (on the same block as Disneyland so no street crossing) and staff (really made our experience), this hotel is where we will book every time we go back to Disneyland from now on.  Highly recommend this hotel to anyone.  Rooms were very well kept and cleaned.  Staff so friendly and helpful.  Shuttle service to/from Disneyland was perfect (and free) and the breakfast included in the morning is more than enough to start your day and carry you through to lunch to save a few $$ on meals.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I've stayed at the Candy Cane Inn in the Fall of 2010 and 2011 and have plans to return again at somepoint this year as well.  The hotel is literally only a few minutes walk to Disneyland and California Adventure, and it is on the same side of the street.  Garden Walk is on the other side of the street, just a few blocks down.  Walking is easy and convenient; however, if you get tired they have a frequent shuttle.  There is a convenience store at the corner that is open 24-hours for coffee, etc.  However, Candy Cane Inn does a wonderful job at serving a continental breakfast in the morning.  You have your choice of cereal, yogurt, danish, fruit, juices and coffee/tea.  The pool is small, but there is a hot tub and everything is well maintained and clean.  The grounds are
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words!  My Staff and I take pride in what we have to offer at the Candy Cane Inn.  It is so nice of you to acknowledge their hard work.  If there is anything we can do to help make your stay more enjoyable, please do not hesitate to let us know.  It will be our pleasure to assist you.  Kind regards!

Summary Heading: No other hotel is worth your time.. or money!
Summary: I'm a realist. I believe you get what you pay for. I rarely book a hotel, and enter the property with expectations higher than what I have of my own home.  But wow.. Candy Cane Inn- You've gone & done it. I now have a standard set in my head of what a hotel should be!  I have visited Southern California, and in particular Anaheim many, many times. And never have I had a more pleasant stay in a hotel. I believe a holiday is what you make it, and my holiday probably still would have been great, but for some reason after a long hard day at Disney, being able to walk back to my hotel, and not have to cross a high way really made me feel at ease. I actually enjoyed just hanging out at the Candy Cane Inn. Popping down to the convenient store for snacks & sleeping on those heavenly
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your comments with our TripAdvisor readers!  I am pleased to read that we have earned ourselves another loyal guest!  The Candy Cane Inn was founded on our loyal guest and they are the ones who have kept us the longest family run hotel in all of Anaheim for the past 55 years!  I hope to have you back again soon!  If you ever need help with reservations, please be sure to let me know!  Best regards!

Summary: We stayed at the Candy Cane Inn for our anniversary. The location is really a 10 minute walk to Disneyland, but if you don't feel like doing that, you can always take one of their shuttles that run all throughout the day. We used the shuttle service a lot during the 3 days we stayed. We stayed in one of their premium rooms, it was a very nice room and I LOVED that they would bring breakfast to your room in a basket. It was so convenient and was a lovely added touch. The staff was always nice, as were the shuttle drivers. Hands down the BEST place we've stayed anytime we've gone to Disney and we will DEF. be staying there from now on!
Manager Response: Happy belated Anniversary and thank you for staying with us!  I am happy to read that you enjoyed your stay and can’t wait for you to come back.  If I can be of any help with your reservations, please feel free to contact me.  Kind regards!

Summary: This is the best place to stay when visiting Disneyland.  Within walking distance of the front gate they provide a frequent shuttle.  The staff are friendly and helpful.  The rooms are very clean with plenty of space.  The breakfast is continental.  If you need protein to start your day a nearby restaurant is the thing for you.  The coffee is great though.  Prices are reasonable.  Can't beat it!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your comments with us.  I am very pleased to read that you enjoyed your stay at the Candy Cane Inn.  If your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim area any time soon, please let me know if I can be of assistance with your reservations.  Warm regards!

Summary Heading: A Perfect Spot for Disneyland Visitors
Summary: I stayed at the Candy Cane Inn for two nights in March and was pleasantly surprised.  They advertise a 10 minute walk to Disneyland, but I don't think it even took that long.  It was so convenient.  The free breakfast was adequate, but nothing fancy,however, the free parking, free internet, and great location were fabulous. There is a convenient store right next door so you can buy water, snacks, suntan lotion, etc.  I would definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us the opportunity to be of service on your recent visit to the theme parks. We appreciate your comments and please feel free to contact me personally when planning your next visit as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: We stayed at this property last week for 4 nights and it was really really nice. We had to switch to the HoJo down the street for our last 2 nights as the CC was full and the HoJo was no where near as nice as the CC.  The HoJo was very very noisy, the CC was super quiet.  The grounds  at the CC were beautiful and well maintained and the room was super clean and we are very fussy!   We had the premium option with the breakfast delivery and that was the best thing ever.  No rush in the morning, breakfast is delivered to your door. I would stay here again.   The staff was very friendly and the shuttle drivers were really nice.  The only thing I might suggest is to get better pillows, the pillows are very big and they give you 4 pillows each per bed so some could be less puffy for
Manager Response: Thank for staying with us and sharing your feedback with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. We appreciate your kind comments about our Inn and the cleanliness, grounds, ambiance and staff & shuttle driver’s friendliness. Yes, our premium rooms and the morning breakfast delivery are certainly a big hit and a comfortable way to start your busy day. I will share your comments regarding the pillows with our housekeeping manager and linen supplier and thank for bringing to our attention. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: First off, we are Canadians with DL annual passes so needless to say, we are in Anaheim a lot! We have stayed at so many properties all within walking distance to DL. We stayed with Candy Cane Inn in February and were at the property for 16 nights!  Our stay was fantastic! Our room was ready prior to check in which in itself was enough to make us return as no other hotel/inn has had our room ready prior to 3:00 and after a long trip it was much appreciated! Parking was free, internet was free and was more reliable than any other hotel we have ever stayed at; it did go down a few days and when we phoned the front desk they reset the router and it worked perfectly again.  The room we had was so beautiful and homey! It was definately the cleanest room in this area! To be honest,
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for allowing the opportunity on your extended visit to the theme parks and I am delighted that your stay was wonderful! Your comments regarding so many details and aspects of our facility and services warm my heart as I sincerely know our team truly cares about our guests. Please feel free to contact me personally when you are planning your August visit as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Perfect location for a road trip!
Summary: We are on the road for two weeks, travelling from Whistler, BC.  With clothes and shoes for every weather type arriving here was a breath of fresh air.  We have (here now) a ground floor premium room.  If you want to see the fireworks from CCI, any guests can sit at the tables on the second floor south side or stand in parking lot.  Doesn't really matter where your room is.  We liked the ground floor for loading in! Walk to Disneyland is a breeze, so don't feel you have to rely on the complimentary shuttle.  Have never stayed at the Best Western Inn & Suites, but it definitely is the closest & highest ranked non-Disney hotel.  We've stayed at both the Disneyland Hotel & Grand Californian.  I'd say if you have the $$$ and are flying in and don't have too much luggage, stay at the
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and we do appreciate your comments on TripAdvisor. I have researched and your carpets were cleaned the day of your arrival and I will speak with our housekeeping manager to ensure completely dry. Again, thank you for your business and bringing these items to our attention as we DO listen to our guests. Kind regards!

Summary: Stayed in a deluxe room and were happy with it. It's located at the back of the hotel so we didn't hear much noise. A short walk to Disneyland but we were happy to take the free hotel shuttle at the end of the day after long days at Disneyland and California Adventure. All the staff were pleasant. Breakfast was delivered to our door but we chose to have the buffet continental breakfast some days. Would have liked more breakfast choices but it the quantity was good as you could order what ever you wanted.
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us the opportunity on your recent visit to the theme parks. Yes, the shuttle after a long day is relaxing however many children look forward to the bus ride in the morning as well. Out Premium Rooms with breakfast delivery is certainly a time saver and many guests prefer after their first experience of the extra amenities and services. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Our favorite place to stay when we come to Disneyland!
Summary: My wife and I with 2 of our grandkids just returned from another stay at Candy Cane Inn a couple of weeks ago.  As always, we love this place!  It has a very homey feel to it, we feel completely safe when we are there, and the staff is friendly and helpful.  The free breakfast is an easy way to start the day and the place is always very clean- from the grounds to our room.  The shuttle is welcomed after a long day at the parks and the drivers are always very nice.  My wife and I discovered Candy Cane about 4-5 years ago and always stay there when we go to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for being a loyal repeat Candy Cane Inn guest, we DO appreciate your business and kind comments regarding the staff and facility. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as I would be delighted to assist with rates and reservations. Warm regards!

Summary Heading: Great hotel in a great location!
Summary: Candy Cane Inn is a GREAT place to stay.  The staff is very friendly and helpful.  My family had the opportunity to stay in both the standard and premium rooms. While the premium room has extra perks and larger rooms, the standards are great too!  The rooms were super quiet.  Both rooms were by the stairs and I was worried it would be loud with all of the foot traffic. Aside from the occassional excited child we hardly heard any noise.  We spent only a small amount of time in the rooms as we were in Disneyland ALL day.  We did have a chance to take advantage of the pools, and the kids pool is really great.  It was nice to be able to relax in the sun while my son played in the shallow pool!  The grounds are beautiful and extremely well maintained.  The only advice I have, because
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. Your observations regarding so many different areas of the facility and the friendly and helpful staff are most appreciated. I am so delighted that you enjoyed your visit and continue to return to our Inn. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: We are So Cal residents and went to Disneyland for 2 days for my son's 4th Birthday, so we stayed 1 night here.  I needed to park there early on the 1st day prior to check in and park all day on the 2nd day after checkout.  The people here were VERY accommodating and friendly to us.  They have a free Disneyland shuttle every 30 minutes and the drivers are very friendly too.  The rooms were fine and the beds comfortable.  The free continental breakfast is fine, my only recommendations would be are to have a better quality yogurt and it should stay open another hour to 10AM.  I will certainly stay here again, it was a great find!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us and sharing your comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. We do attempt to accommodate early arrivals when occupancy permits and I thank you for your kind comments pertaining to our team. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as I would be delighted to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: Just got from our weekend Disneyland trip..We stayed at The Candy Cane Inn which is one of our all time favorites, due to location, private shuttle and their Continental Breakfast. Rooms was clean like they usually are. Front desk was very helpful when getting towels late at night. Even the staff around the hotel with their advice on where all the good local food can be found rather than the restaurant chains in the area. We will be heading back to the area again soon and look to stay again since they now give you $10 off per night voucher on your next stay and $10 off per night for Disney passport holders.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing the comments regarding your recent visit. I appreciate your feedback and please feel free to contact me personally when returning as I would be delighted to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: First impressions are not always right
Summary: I did a lot of research before going to Anaheim, and I chose Candy Cane Inn based mostly on the positives reviews of the property. Even when I have to confess that my first impression of the room wasn't 100% positive (I founded it dated, carpet was stained, and mattresses knew better times) overall I was very pleased with my stay (we were there for seven nights during February). So what makes Candy Cane so special? It certainly doesn't offer luxury, but the service compensates for everything else. First of all, it's really close to Disney parks, a very short walk even with my 5 year old. If you don't feel like walking, the hotel offers a free shuttle to and from the parks every half hour. As many people pointed here, all the drivers were very friendly and helpful (same thing
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us the opportunity during your recent stay at the theme parks. We do listen to our guests and have discussed your comments with our team. As I have previously noted we have personally met with the Serta Company to replace any mattresses that are defective. Again, I sincerely appreciate feedback from our guests and this assisted with the discovery and prompt response to this issue. I am delighted and appreciate your kind comments about our team of service professionals and you are totally correct that kindness, caring and warmth is paramount in customer service. Warm regards!

Summary Heading: Very Pleased to stay... will stay again!
Summary: I booked this hotel 2 weeks before our stay and they had room for us. This was our first time staying. We drove 13 hours (from Oregon) and we arrived a bit early cause check in is at 3pm and they allowed us to check in. Which I was very happy with cause myself, husband and my kids were all tired after the straight drive.   The property was BEAUTIFUL, well taken care of.  The room was comfy and the beds were comfy as well.   Our room was facing the back of Hollywood Tower of Terror. (Thats how close we were) and the new Cars attraction that will be out summer 2012.   One of the best things that I really appreciated was that we came for my daughters 8th bday and the hotel staff had put Cookies and a card in the room for her when we came back from Disneyland.   The ONLY down side
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for staying with us and sharing your comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. We do appreciate your business and I am delighted that your daughter enjoyed the cookies for her special day. Please feel free to contact me personally should you be returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Great place to stay on a Disney visit
Summary: We usually stay at another hotel when we go to Disney but they raised their prices and we didn't think they were worth the extra $$'s.  So we decided to give Candy Cane Inn a try, due in part to all of the great reviews.   Our stay there was great and when we go back to Disney we will be staying here again.   The beds and pillows were very comfortable and it was quiet at night.  The breakfast was ok, nothing spectacular but it was perfect for our needs.  The grounds are beautiful and very clean.  The pool and hot tub areas were clean and enjoyable as well. The shuttle to Disney was always on time and we were thankful for the ride even though the hotel is not very far away. All in all, CCI was a great place to stay for our Disney trip.
Manager Response: Thank you for telling us about your most recent stay.  We are proud of our hotel as well as the features and amenities we have to offer.  I was delighted to read that you enjoyed your stay and I hope that you will be back to visit us again soon.  Kind regards.

Summary: We booked CCI because of the shuttle option and it's not too far to walk. We had 2 young children with a big 2-kid stroller that wasn't really quick and easy to collapse and put up so we usually walked instead of using the shuttle. Because of that, we would probably stay closer next time. We've stayed at many of the closer, non-Disney hotels, and the CCI has the best breakfast choices, best swimming pool, hot-tub, is cleaner and better furnished. The standard rooms are kinda small for 4 people but certainly adequate.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing you feedback with us.  I can definitely appreciate the fact that trying to fold a big stroller to get on and off our shuttle can be challenging.  Please keep in mind that our shuttle drivers are always willing to assist you in any way to make the trip to and from the park as easy as possible.  Also keep in mind that we do offer deluxe and premium room types for those families looking for a little extra space.  If you ever need assistance with reservations, please feel free to contact me.

Summary Heading: Close to Disney , great shuttle service and breakfast included.
Summary: The Candy Cane is a nice small hotel within walking distance to Disney. Too tired to walk,take the free shuttle with friendly drivers. Their beds need an upgrade, too soft on edges, sheets and mattress covers did not fit well. Stayed 3 years ago and it was much better. Rugs were stained and needed a good cleaning behind side tables etc. The Candy Cane has nice grounds with lots of attention paid to keeping the plants looking great and the property clean. $129.00 a night - $10.00 off coupon for your next stay-front desk personal could take a lesson from the friendly shuttle drivers. Overall a little disappointed compared to my last stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your stay.  I was disappointed to read that your stay was not up to your expectations.  Based on feedback from guests such as yourself, we have met with representatives from Serta Mattress Company. Based on our findings we have identified a few mattresses that were deemed defective and are being replaced by Serta. Also, I am sorry to read that your experience with my Front Desk.  I have spoken to my Front Office Manager who has used your comments to coach his team to ensure the Front Desk provides the high level of service our guests expect.  I hope that you will come back and give us another chance.  Please feel free to let me know if I can be of assistance.  Warm regards.

Summary Heading: "A little oasis right next to Disneyland"
Summary: I first saw the Candy Cane Inn a few years ago when we walked by it on our way to Disneyland and vowed to stay there the next time we returned because it looked so nice. Beautiful landscaping and the cobblestone drive make it stand out from all the other hotels. The breakfast was very good. The staff were all friendly and helpful - even had our airline boarding passes done for us before we left.  The shuttle is nice when you're tired of walking all day around Disneyland. There are 2 convenience type stores next door to stock up your refrigerator and several reasonably priced take-out restaurants across the street.  Our room was next to the street and staircase yet we didn't hear anything during the night. My only regret was that we didn't stay an extra day to just sit by the
Manager Response: I am thrilled to read that you enjoyed your stay with us.  Definitely our location to Disneyland, convenience stores, the Anaheim GardenWalk, and the Anaheim Convention Center cannot be beat.  Our goal is to provide our guests with “legendary” guest service and ensure a comfortable stay.  Next time that you are back in the Anaheim area, please feel free to contact me personally to book your next trip!

Summary: I took my two kids for a three day trip to Disneyland.  We've been many times and this is our first time staying at the CCI.  We've stayed at the Disneyland hotels before and at hotels along the strip and this was the best experience yet!!!  We chose this hotel based on the FREE shuttle, FREE parking, and FREE internet (none of my apple devices would connect to the network???).  Just a minor issue that didn't affect the hotel stay at all.    The rooms were clean and spacious for me and my two kids.  We got a standard room on the bottom floor next to the stairs.  The noise wasn't bad at all but that's probably because we could sleep through anything.  Our room was directly adjacent from the shuttle stop.  Breakfast was ok, nothing great but good enough to put some food in my kids
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful comments.  We try hard to provide all the essentials for our guests to enjoy their stay at the Candy Cane Inn.  I am sorry for the technical difficulties with your apple devices and our wifi.  If you are ever experiencing troubles with our wifi, please contact the Front Desk for assistance.  Also, I am sorry that we were not able to accommodate you on your next stay to Disneyland.  Please keep in mind that if you ever have trouble booking with us please contact me directly and it would be my pleasure to try and assist you.  I hope to have you back again soon.  Best regards!

Summary Heading: Consistently a wonderful place to stay for a Disneyland trip
Summary: We have stayed at the Candy Cane Inn 8 different times.  Each visit has been a great experience!  The rooms and pool area are very clean.  The customer service representatives are always friendly and helpful.  We love that breakfast is included, which saves us a lot of money with a family of 5.  They also have rooms which can accomodate 5 people, saving us from paying for a second room.  The shuttle runs every 30 minutes to Disneyland and back to the hotel.  But if you miss the shuttle, it's not too far to walk.  We've stayed at a few other hotels near the resort, but always end up returning to CCI.
Manager Response: Thank you for being loyal Candy Cane Inn guests!  It is our loyal guests that have kept us in business since 1957.  Thank you also for your kind words and we look forward to your next visit to our hotel!  Until next time!

Summary Heading: Always a pleasure to stay here!!!
Summary: This was our 3rd time staying at the CCI and like always, it was very good.  The only bad spot I would put on the hotel was how crowded the first couple of shuttles were in the morning on the way to DL.  A few times the driver had to turn guests away and they ended up walking.  Would suggest they maybe place BOTH shuttles into service for the initial rush to the park.  The rooms were very clean and well maintained.  Breakfast was plentiful.  Each and every call for guest services we made were met with prompt and courteous service.  We will be staying here each and every time we travel to DL.
Manager Response: Thank you for coming back for the 3rd time!  The Candy Cane Inn has been a family owned property since 1957 and our return guests help to ensure the success of the Candy Cane Inn.  I also want to thank you for your comments.  It is true that during the first runs of the morning that our shuttles can get full.  Our drivers are trained to drop of guests off and come right back to the hotel continuously until the morning rush slows down.  So rather than wait 30 minutes, if you cannot board the shuttle, the turn around time is about 10 minutes for the next shuttle.  If transportation is ever a concern, please let our Front Desk know and we will be more than happy to assist you.  Again, thank you for being loyal Candy Cane Inn guests and I look forward to your next visit.

Summary Heading: Perfect, family-friendly hotel for our Disneyland vacation!
Summary: We stayed at the Candy Cane Inn for three nights in February - we were drawn here by the positive reviews on TripAdvisor and felt that everything was as good overall as promised. The free continental breakfast, free parking, comfortable beds, and kindly staff were terrific. The pool area includes a hot tub and toddler wading pool in addition to the main pool - our family used all three each day. They honored our request for a room toward the back of the hotel (we have a baby and read reviews on this site that it was quieter there), and also provided a free porta-crib. It was definitely nice and quiet! However, the only downside of that area was that the wi-fi signal was really weak at that end of the hotel, because it is far from the office. A booster signal apparatus would make
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your comments.  I am happy to read that you enjoyed your stay.  Also, thank you for your feedback regarding our WiFi.  We are currently working on improving our wireless network and exploring options to ensure connectivity.  Thank you for your recommendation and I look forward to your next stay with us.  Best regards!

Summary: Love the Candy Cane Inn! The staff is so nice. Clean and good location. Good for family vacation. The only thing I would say is there are alot of kids here so you are probably not going to sleep in in the morning as they tend to be loud and excited walking down the hall. But who wants to sleep in anyway when visiting DL?!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  The Candy Cane Inn is a family hotel with lots of families excited to head over to Disneyland.  We try to ensure a peaceful night’s sleep.  If noise ever becomes an issue, please be sure to let our Front Desk know.  Thank you for staying with us and cannot wait for your next trip to the Candy Cane Inn.

Summary: We chose this hotel from the reviews on Trip Advisor and found it great. It was within walking distance to Disneyland or you could take the free shuttle.  We had come off an international flight and arrived about 9.30am. This was no trouble for them at all. The gardens and greenery really gave this hotel a nice peaceful ambience. We were there end of August and although there were people at the hotel we rarely saw them. It was really our stop for Disneyland.  We would definitely go there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your comments with us.  We try to accommodate all our guests with early check-in when we can.  We understand that especially when you are getting off an international flight being able to check-in and relax is an advantage.  I am glad to read that you enjoyed your stay and hope that you will be back soon to visit again.  Best regards!

Summary: This great hotel continues to impress me. This was my 6th time at this hotel with the family and the service is always great. They have comfortable beds and a great breakfast. The walk is always a short 12 minutes or there is a convienient shuttle that leaves from the hotel every 30 minutes.The hotel does book up fast the last 3 times we went the hotel was completely booked solid. My family cannot wait to return for the 7th time in July.
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for your comments and being a loyal Candy Cane Inn repeat guest, we DO appreciate your business! Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as I would be delighted to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: We have stayed at the Candy Cand Inn several times over the last four years.  Our most recent visit was a January 2012 trip to Disneyland for four of us staying in one room.  On all of our past visits, staying here has been a great part of our vacation experience.  The grounds are beautiful and the breakfast/pool/bus drivers/staff have all been great.  Compared to the price of other places, it has always been a great value.  Unfortunately, this past visit did not measure up.  Our room looked as nice as expected when we first arrived.  But that night when we actually went to bed, tired from an exciting afternoon and night at the park, we found the mattresses were very broken at the edges.  My husband and I are not what you would consider to be large/heavy people, and on both beds
Manager Response: Thank you very much for bringing this to our attention as we do care and listen to our guests. I have sent you an email via TripAdvisor to obtain additional information regarding your comments. I have scheduled a meeting with Serta, the mattress manufacturer to inspect as all our mattresses were replaced at the same time and are not at replacement time as of yet. I do appreciate your comments and would enjoy speaking with you personally to address.

Summary: Overall, we love candy cane inn. What brings us back are the comfortable beds. Everything was great, staff was great, breakfast did the trick, price was great, LOVE the beds, and room was clean....well, most of it was I think. I lost my phone in the room. Lesson learned: never look for something in a hotel room by feel only!!! I found items like a comb and gumballs which were no biggie. But then I pulled out a pair of women's undies from a previous guest laying towards the front of the bed my kids were sleeping on. Now that was gross. I immediately woke up my family and had them get cleaned up. My thought was that, had the bedding been changed, they would have found the undies. So we must have been sleeping in the same bedding as the previous guests. Made my skin crawl. It was
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and I sincerely apologize for this occurrence. We do pride ourselves on our cleanliness and our housekeeping team and not changing linens is totally unacceptable. I appreciate your being a return guest and thank you for the other remarks about our staff and beds. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations.

Summary Heading: Well located, but not that comfortable.
Summary: The pros: 1. location cannot be beat 2. booked in advance and got 2 queen beds for $95 - great price 3. definitely clean 4. very nice staff 5. shuttle is great when you have travelers that need to conserve strength 6. breakfast is definitely adequate, pleasantly surprised by quality. The cons: 1. NO WI-FI.  They need to remove from the advertising so that if it is working the day you are there, you can be pleasantly surprised.  The staff admitted it is a constant issue. 2. bed so run down and soft that it sags at the edges, really not up to par at all. 3. loud air conditioner/heater - not central heating/cooling.  The bed thing really makes me wonder if I would return.
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us the opportunity on your resent visit and for bringing these things to our attention. We do listen and will certainly address the items noted and thank you again for taking the time. I have arranged a meeting with Serta, our mattress provider to investigate your comments. They are a high quality double pillow top and we receive many great comments but still feel that we need to have the manufacturer involved. Thank you again and please feel free to contact me directly when returning as I would be delighted to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: My husband, son, and I stayed at the Candy Cane Inn on a recent trip to Anaheim.  We read every review for this wonderful hotel before we left home, so we knew we were getting something special.  We arrived late on a weekday and got right into our room with no issues.  The room was exceptionally clean with a SPOTLESS bathroom.  We did not spend a great deal of time in our room as we spent most of our time at DisneyLand.  We especially appreciated the shuttle on our late nights at the parks.  Upon returning to our hotel late one afternoon, we found a letter from the general manager in our room, letting us know that the pool was available to use (it was under reconstruction).  From the housekeeping staff to the front desk folk, everyone was polite and helpful.  The breakfasts was
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us the opportunity on your recent visit to the theme parks and we do appreciate your business. We do aspire to provide a quality product with exceptional guest service keeping in mind families travelling on a budget. Please feel free to contact me as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and future reservations.

Summary: We regularly stay in Anaheim and that includes on occasion staying at the Disneyland Hotel. We stood in the premium room with our three young boys for 2 nights.  Even though we arrived early the staff was friendly and made us feel welcomed from check-in until check-out.  They accommodated to any of our request and really made our stay special.  The walk to the park was no different then walking from Downtown Disney to Disneyland.  We took advantage of the turn down service, the bathrobes and complimentary breakfast basket.  It was the most comfortable experience that we have ever had and the there is no way that the hospitality at the Disneyland Hotel could match up without charging an outrageous fee.   P.S. We've already booked our next stay for the "One More Day of Disneyland"
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for staying with us and sharing your wonderful comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. We do appreciate your business and you can always feel free to contact me personally as I would be delighted to assist you with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: We stayed here for the first time, not one of our regular Disneyland Hotels because some friends where staying there. It is a favorite with Socal people. Beautiful grounds and very quite, Beds very nice. The shuttle is great leaves the hotel every half hour the park every quarter hour, runs very late. There is a continental breakfast that is typical and fin you sit out by the pool and enjoy. Right next door is a convince store and across the street a strip center with about 5 restaurants including a 24hr Subway. The rooms are small, but also typical of these older properties. The quality of cliental seemed a notch above the other area discount hotels. Felt safe and secure. This is a good choice for people on a budget or who must have a shuttle service to the park.
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us the opportunity on your recent visit to the theme parks. We do appreciate your comments and thank your friends for recommending our Inn to you. Please feel free to contact me personally should you be returning as I would be delighted to assist you with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Shhhh!  Keep this to yourself...don't want them getting a big head.
Summary: When I open the door for my Sister and Niece, the first words are..."how nice!, soft beds...big bathroom."  and they live in Ca.  We used to...but were visiting from our home of 6 years...Kentucky.... Clean, Cozy...coffee in the lobby and the room. Continental brkfst...very nice choices.  You can even have them deliver choices to your room, for a small difference in room price.  We had annual passes when living in Ca.  This was and will always be our favorite hotel in the Anaheim area.  We feel truly...at home.  Southern shutters on windows and can sit anywhere without thinking....what is on this?  Thanks to the staff.
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for staying with us and sharing your wonderful comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. We do appreciate your being a loyal repeat guest and please feel free to call on me personally whenever you are visiting as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations. Warm Regards!

Summary: My daughter and I made a quick trip to the park, spending one nite at the Candy Cane Inn on Feb.6th. This wasn't our first stay with them, and we were very pleased with those stays. After an easy check-in, we headed to the room for a brief rest. I was very dissapointed to find that the toilet wouldn't flush correctly, but with their great customer service I wasn't worried. We stopped at the front desk on our way to the park, and was promised it would be corrected by the time we returned. When we did get back, it still was not working properly. I called the desk, and they sent 2 servicemen to the room. They told me (in VERY broken english) "it works". I told them "no it doesn't!" They went and got a snaking device, spent about 20 mins. and left. Still didn't work. At that point,
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for staying with us and I appreciate your conversation when we spoke regarding this visit. We do take guest comments very serious and listen trying to identify and make necessary adjustments in our operation to eliminate in the future. I do look forward in seeing you upon your next visit and again apologize for your inconvenience. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: First stay, Wonderful hotel, Met our needs!!
Summary: We stayed Feb 10-13 and had a family of 5. We upgraded to the "deluxe" room and it was very roomy and enough space to hold our family, as well as a pack in play.  The breakfast delivered to our room was wonderful and everything we ordered was correct. The shuttle was nice and the drivers were very helpful and sweet. We had to load a stroller into the shuttle and the drivers were always quick to help me load it in and very nice. The room was very clean and it looked like the carpets were shampooed before we arrived which is wonderful. The beds were turned down every night for us and room cleaned daily. Very nice to come back to after a long day at Disneyland.  This was our first stay here and when we return to Disneyland we will be staying here and no where else. Also very nice
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your kind comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. Yes, our shuttle drivers are certainly helpful and always available to assist with guests and strollers. Again, thank you for your business and we look forward in seeing you again when your travels bring you back to the happiest place on earth!

Summary: We have been staying at Candy Cane for years and never had a problem. The rooms are  clean and the staff is always friendly. I love the short walk to Disney and the free tram that is available when our feet are sore from the long day. The free breakfast, parking and internet makes this place the BEST to stay at. Great prices and no fees. The only problem I have with this hotel is I wish they would purchase new linens for the beds as you can tell the sheets are old. A few renovations here and there would make this place superb!
Manager Response: Thank you for being a repeat and loyal return guest, we DO appreciate your business as this is what our hotel has built its reputation on. We do listen to our guest feedback and I have shared your comments with our housekeeping manager and linen supply company as we do purchase quality linens. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as I would be delighted to assist with rates and reservations. Warm regards!

Summary: The Candy Cane Inn is a fantastic location from which to visit the Disneyland Resort. I timed it and I could walk from my hotel room and be inside Disneyland in 10 minutes. Just as convenient is Candy Cane Inn's dedicated shuttle that is included in the price of the hotel room.   There was a lot of confusion among the staff about when Candy Cane's shuttle service begins each day. When I called I was told one thing. When my friend called he was told something different. When I called back I received a third response. And, when I checked in, I was told something else again. So here's the real scoop: The first shuttle leaves the Candy Cane Inn 30 minutes prior to the opening of Disneyland. The shuttle leaves for the Disneyland Resort every 30 minutes at :00 and :30 and returns to
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your comments regarding your visit. I am sincerely sorry that there seemed to be confusion regarding our shuttle schedule and your “real scoop” is precisely correct and to be honest, very simple. We do aspire to provide exceptional service and a quality product at reasonable rates for family travelers.

Summary: This little  hotel was so wonderful!!!     We visited Anaheim on Sat. Feb. 11, 2012 and had a great experience here.   I had looked into staying on Disney property as we always do when we visit WDW (Florida).   I am so GLAD we stayed at the Candy Cane Inn!!    Location-next door to Disneyland!!!!   We walked to the parks!!!!!    There was a free shuttle to use, with a wonderful and personable driver which we used one time.  Front desk staff was very pleasant.  The evening of the 11th, we spent some time in the lobby talking to the clerk...a very pleasant, informative young man.  Breakfast was wonderful...so  many choices of pastries, coffee, juices, milk, breads, bagels, cereal, yogurt and fruit!!   and it was FREE!!   Seating indoors and by the pool.  This property was so clean
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your comments with fellow travelers. I am delighted that you enjoyed our property and had such nice comments regarding all areas you encountered. Please feel free to contact me personally should you be returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: I booked this motel based on Trip Advisors rating and was not disappointed!  It has lovely landscaping, very nice decor in the rooms with plantation shutters instead of blackout drapes, upscale furnishing, flat panel TV's, very comfortable beds, and nice linens, andwas very clean.  The location was great, a 10 minute walk from Disneyland, but if you are not in the walking mood, they also have a shuttle that runs every 1/2 hour with a friendly, safe, driver.  This shuttle also runs on Magic Mornings, so we were able to catch the shuttle at 6:30am.  We did not use the Pool/Spa, but it seemed clean and was heated.  The breakfast was fine, with bagels, pastries, cereal, fruit, juices, and coffee.  If I could say anything negative, they do not have an elevator, so if you have a
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us the opportunity on your recent visit to the Disneyland Theme parks. In regards to your comment regarding luggage assistance please feel free to contact the front desk as it would be our pleasure to send a houseman to assist you. Thank you again for your comments and staying with us.

Summary: We never stay anywhere else for Disneyland trips anymore. They rember us every year, so kind and helpful. Breakfast has lots of choices and actually counts as a meal! Free shuttle all day, clean rooms, lots of charm, anything you need. We even skip the shuttle and walk- takes about 10 minutes to the gates!
Manager Response: Thank you for being a loyal and repeat Candy Cane Inn guest, we DO appreciate your business and kind comments. Warm regards!

Summary: We just returned from a 3 night stay at the Candy Cane Inn while we visited Disneyland and California Adventure.  The Candy Cane Inn met all our needs during our visit- clean, quiet and comfortable rooms and beds, A great continental breakfast and very close to the entrance to Disneyland.  The front desk staff were very helpful and accommodating- we actually extended our stay.  Originally we planned to only stay 2 nights, but decided that we were so comfortable that we stayed an extra night.  As mentioned above, the continental breakfast is quite impressive without having any hot entrees offered- they had toast, bagels (with all the fixings), muffins/croissants/donuts, oatmeal, cereal (fruit loops, rice krispis, raisen bran), yogurt, Fruit (apples, oranges and bananas), drinks-
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us and sharing your comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as I would be delighted to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: We paid extra for the premium rooms, and I'm glad because they(we had adjoining rooms) were spacious and having breakfast delivered promptly each morning was great.  We rode the shuttle every day. Can't wait to go back!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. Yes, the added amenities of our Premium Rooms are certainly enjoyable and having our Expanded Continental Breakfast personally delivered in the morning is certainly a time saver. Please feel free to contact me directly when returning as I would be delighted in assisting with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: The Candy Cane was perfect for our trip to Disney last weekend.
