I was worried after the first night because our littlest had a cold and was hacking until 3am--she kept me up and I assumed she kept all our Candy Cane neighbors up, too. But when I saw the people next door the next morning and apologized, they said, "What for?" They hadn't heard a thing. Whew! We walked to and from Disney all but once. Perfect location; perfect price.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments.  I was delighted to read that you enjoyed your stay with us, but sorry to hear about your little one’s cold.  I hope that she was able to recover enough to enjoy the parks!  Also, I am glad that you liked our proximity to Disneyland.  We are only 250 yards away from Disneyland’s main entrance, or a 7-10 minute walk, we are in a great location to be able to come back and forth from the theme parks.  Thank you again for your comments and I look forward to your next stay with us!  Best regards!

Summary Heading: Reasonably priced inn in close proximity to Disney
Summary: We are a family of 4 and the room seemed very small in comparison to the other hotels we'd stayed in on our trip. I thought we didn't get the deluxe 2xqueen room I'd booked but the lady in reception said it was. The carpet was damp and took 2 days to dry properly. Fortunately we were out most of the time so the size and damp carpet wasn't really a problem.Besides that, the breakfast was great - more than enough food for everyone. We enjoyed the jacuzzi. The shuttle to Disney was punctual and after a long day in the park we really appreciated it. There were restaurants in the area and a shop next door to buy cooldrinks and snacks.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share with us your feedback regarding your stay at the Candy Cane Inn.  I want to sincerely apologize for the damp carpet in your room, and have reviewed your observation with our housekeeping manager.  Cleanliness is a priority to us and we want to ensure everything is clean for the next guest’s arrival.  But this does not excuse the fact that the carpet was still damp when you checked in and especially for two days.  I am very pleased to read that despite this fact you and your family still enjoyed your stay with us.  If you happen to come back, please feel free to contact me personally.  I really would like the opportunity to make up for this incident and ensure you are completely satisfied with your stay.  Until then, best regards!

Summary Heading: Sh-h-h- Don't tell anyone how great it is!!!!
Summary: We come to Disneyland at least one a year and have stayed at the Candy Cane Inn every single time since 1993.     It is our home away from home.    No the rooms aren't huge, but they are comfortable and very clean.    Staff has always been wonderful.   Shuttle is excellent.  The breakfast is AWESOME.   I just wish everyone would keep quiet about it.....we've always thought it was our best-kept secret!    We even rescheduled a vacation date once when the Candy Cane was full...none of us could bare to stay anywhere else!    We love you Candy Cane Inn!
Manager Response: Your secret is safe with us and the rest of our TripAdvisor readers!  Thank you for your kind comments and for being such a loyal and repeat Candy Cane Inn Guest.  If at any time you are having trouble making reservations, please feel free to contact me directly as it would be my pleasure to assist you. Until your next visit, best regards!

Summary: Stayed at this hotel with the kids and family, what I loved most about this place was how close it was to Disneyland and the kids were able to walk to the park without getting tired, but if needed they provide a shuttle. the room was pretty nice and clean, and the staff were very welcoming to us, from the front desk to housekeeping, the main pool was fantastic, no main issue with this hotel, except the people who stayed in the room next to us were a bit noisy, would stay here again, unless we can find a hotel that is even closer to the park.
Manager Response: Thank you for all your wonderful comments about our hotel.  I am sorry to read that your neighbors were noisy.  If at any time noise is an issue, please let our Front Desk know and we will be more than happy to address your concern.  Our guest’s comfort if important to us and we want to ensure a quiet and peaceful stay.  I hope to have you back again with us soon.  Best regards!

Summary: My son is a military dependant of a Soldier Killed in Afghanistan.  We booked our room with a military discount.  When we arrived to check in we were told that our ID was not valid as the ID was not that of an active duty member.  This was a  very rude, unedcuated, and insensitive decision in my opinion, especially to a surviving child of a soldier who was killed.  I will never stay here again.
Manager Response: First and foremost, I am deeply saddened to read about your family’s loss and send my sincere condolences.  I personally want to thank you for taking the time to respond to my inquiry when I sent you a message via TripAdvisor as we do listen to our guests.  I have researched your reservation and our records indicate that an exception was made and the discount was in fact honored on the reservation and stay last May.  Just to clarify, the discount that we offer our active duty military applies to US service members when they travel with their family to the Candy Cane Inn.  Unfortunately, this discount does not apply to dependents or other family members if the active duty service member is not present.  Please keep in mind that the discount of $10 per night is the same discount we offer to members of AAA, AARP, and Disneyland Annual Passholders.  Please accept my most sincere apologies for this inconvenience and I again thank you for your time.

Summary: My fiance' and I chose the Candy Cane Inn as our hotel on our vacation March of 2011. It also happened to be the trip where I proposed to her. We were both reluctant to choose any one hotel since we had no idea what we would get when we got there, even with other readers reviews. We were both very happy with everything we experienced at the Candy Cane Inn. The staff was busy checking in other guests when we arrived and we had to wait a bit to check in, but they were pleasant and did there best to attend to everyone as quickly as possible. Our room was very nice featuring all the basic ammenities you would expect at any hotel. We did not use their pool or jacuzzi, but they both seemed nice and were being enjoyed by other families. Their continental breakfast was fresh and offered
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your feedback with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. I send my congratulations on you proposing to your fiancé and am delighted that you will be returning to enjoy your honeymoon at the happiest place on earth. Robert our front desk gentleman who honored your expired rewards certificate does a superb job and recognizing this special occasion certainly did the proper thing for guest satisfaction. Please feel free to contact me personally should you need anything else to make your upcoming visit more enjoyable. Warm regards!

Summary: Stayed here again based on all of the previous good experiences.  We were not disappointed one bit.  Flight got in @ 7:AM, we were at the hotel at 8ish, not expecting to be able to check in. James at the desk, gave us a warm welcome and indeed did check us in as they had availability.  He was extremely friendly and accommodating the entire trip.  We promptly ate breakfast after dropping off the luggage and were off to the parks.  Pool/Hot tub were clean and comfortable, the breakfast was great.  Monday morning we failed to get to breakfast in time and the employees were extremely pleasant in getting us some leftovers and allowing us to use the breakfast room even though it had been cleaned and vacated.  Every hotel employee we encountered was extremely helpful, cheerful and an
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us on your recent visit to the theme parks and providing us with your valuable feedback. I apologize for the air conditioner in your guest room and we have researched to ensure this unit has been replaced. We do listen to our guests and you can always feel free to contact the front desk as we have engineers on property seven days per week to keep our property pristine. I am happy that you found our team pleasant and helpful and appreciate your kind comments. Kind regards!

Summary: We stayed 1/13-1/17.  Initially booked on line but I did not receive a confirmation in my email.  Spoke to Brian on the phone and he confirmed that my reservation had not been made but he was happy to oblige me.  I'm just glad that I realized that I had not received my confirmation otherwise I may have been hotel shopping upon arrival.  This was our second stay at the CCI.  The last time we stayed, we had a Standard room which I felt was just a little to small for my family of 4 (kids 8 and 5).  We opted for the Deluxe room and were much more comfortable.  Always quiet, clean and comfortable, we prefer the CCI over any of the Disney hotels for value. Helpful and friendly staff, a great breakfast and a prime location make for fond memories.  Looking forward to the opening of
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your feedback with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. Yes, Bryan is a fine gentleman and I am happy that he was able to accommodate your reservation. The new Cars Land is very exciting and this summer should be fun with the attractions opening at the theme parks. We do get many requests for the rooms close to the sitting area as it nice to relax and enjoy ambiance of the property and fireworks from the south side of the property.

Summary Heading: As always, a great stay for our family.
Summary: Service was fantastic. The room was very clean and the breakfast very nice. The grounds are beautifully kept. We highly recommend the Candy Cane to everyone. The shuttle is so helpful for tired feet. Thank you for the $10 coupon for our next stay!
Manager Response: none

Summary: What a terrific place.  We stayed 12/31 – 1/5 and had our 27 month old in tow.  Super clean room and grounds.  Housekeeping was great every day.  The room had modern finishes.  We had a premium room so the in-room breakfast every morning was a huge time and money saver.  The free Wi-Fi worked great. Weather was nice enough to enjoy the very nice HEATED pool AND toddler pool AND spa every day.  HUGE Disney movie library with free rentals (the free part a perk of the premium room I think) in the lobby.  The shuttle was like clockwork when you wanted it.  We did five full days in the park and walked it about 60% of the time which only took about 10 minutes door to door.  It was nice to have the shuttle there when our dogs were barkin.  A good mini-mart is attached to the property.
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us the opportunity to be of service on your recent visit to the theme parks. I am delighted that you enjoyed the amenities of our premium rooms and the upkeep of the property. I too believe that our team of service professionals is the true backbone to the success of the Candy Cane Inn!

Summary: My Family and I would like to Thank Chris and the Entire Staff for another Enjoyable Experience during our Vacation this Yr.The Hotel is the best in the Area we have been going there for 9 yrs. now and would not go anywhere else.The Room is Clean,the Breakfast is Great and the Grounds are Very Well Taken  Care of.Unfortunatly We All Came down with the Flu,we could not have been at a better place for that to happen,Chris and the Staff took very good care of us.House Cleaning staff did a fantastic job keeping our room clean.They did everything they could to make our stay a comfortable one.Thanks Again,The Sablak Family Cathy,Tom, Dane and Zach
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and becoming another long time repeat member of the Candy Cane Inn family, we DO appreciate your business and loyalty! I am sorry that your entire family came down with the flu during your visit however I am delighted that our team gave you genuine care. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: We stayed at Candy Cane with our 2 kids for 3 nights during the Thanksgiving weekend.  However, we were very disappointed in the room quality.  We had booked a deluxe room, which was supposedly bigger than the standard room.  However, there was hardly any room to move around.  The fittings in the bathroom and the sink were stained, the bathroom fan was too loud and only one switch controlled both the light and the fan.  The carpet looked dirty.  The AC control panel was quite old and had sliders to control the temperature, and no digital temperature indicator.  I guess we were expecting too much based on the reviews here.  Didn't know that this is basically a motel.  The breakfast was ok though with nice outdoor patio seating, but no egg items.  We will look for some other place
Manager Response: I truly apologize that we did not meet your expectations.  The Candy Cane Inn has a long established history of offering all the essentials for a family visiting Disneyland.  Our hotel also offers an expanded continental breakfast that features toast, bagels, donuts, assorted pastries, three fresh fruits, yogurt, hot and cold cereals, coffee, tea, and hot chocolate.  Also, I want you to know that I have personally inspected this room based on your comments and I am proud to say that I was not able to find any issues with the items that you mentioned.  The Housekeeping and Maintenance Staff of the Candy Cane Inn routinely perform preventive maintenance on each of our rooms regularly.  In the event that you find anything in your room or your stay not to your satisfaction, please be sure to let us know.  It is my responsibility to ensure your satisfaction and we are willing to do what we can to ensure you enjoy your stay.  I hope that you will return and give us another chance to prove to you what you experienced was an exception and not the norm.  Thank you for your feedback.  Warm regards!

Summary: We have stayed at a number of hotels along harbor blvd. the candy cane the best yet! Great staff, a bus to Disneyland every 30 mins, or 10 mins to walk to the main gate.  Room is great for families and free wifi is fast. Fresh breakfast included and pool is a decent size.  Parking near your room can be a problem during busy times. Convenient store and 7 eleven are next door,  pizza shop, subway and Mexican food are across the road.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments!  I am very pleased to read that you enjoyed your stay with us.  I must agree with you that during peak times parking directly in front of your room may be difficult.  If for any reason you have difficulties finding a parking space, please be sure to let the Front Desk know and we will be more than happy to assist you in finding a space.  Also, aside from the dining locations you mentioned, we are also one block away from the Anaheim GardenWalk and Downtown Disney which also offer a wide selection of dining options.  Thank you again for your comments and I look forward to your next visit with us!

Summary: We make the trip to Disneyland 2 to 4 times a year, but this is the first time our family has stayed at the Candy Cane Inn since I brought my husband for his first Disneyland trip in 1993.  We were very happy with our stay from 12/30 - 1/2.  Our (deluxe) room was clean and comfortable.  It was nice to have the in room fridge actually turned on and cold.  I know the web site says that room will sleep 5, but I honestly don't know where we would have put our son.  It didn't feel like the room was actually spacious enough for a cot/airbed. My husband and I enjoyed sitting at the table outside our room with a glass of wine after the kids were asleep also. We only had time one morning to try out the breakfast.  There was muffins, fruit, cereal, toast, juice and a few other items.
Manager Response: Wow, from the sound of things it seems like you all enjoyed your stay with us!  I am happy to read that you enjoyed the features and amenities of our hotel, especially our shuttle service.  Although we are only 250 yards away from the main gate of Disneyland, after walking in the parks all day, it is nice to be able to take a shuttle back to the hotel.  In regards to our deluxe rooms, please be aware that the only difference between our standard and deluxe rooms is 45 square feet.  Fire code in the City of Anaheim only allows for four guests to be in a standard room and five in a deluxe and premium room.  All our rooms feature two queen beds, but our deluxe and premium rooms are large enough that we can add a rollaway bed for an additional charge.  I am excited about your return visit to the Candy Cane Inn!  If you need assistance with reservations, please be sure to contact me.  Until your next stay, thank you for your comments!

Summary: We have visited Disneyland many, many times and have stayed in many, many places.  This was our first time at the Candy Cane Inn and if we ever return we will certainly stay there again.  There are less expensive places and more expensive places, but in our opinion the Candy Cane Inn beats them all.  The rooms were spotless and the beds comfortable.  Staff was more than pleasant.  Breakfast was pretty much the standard Continental Breakfast but was well stocked, fresh and there was plenty of seating both inside and out.  The shuttle was exceptional.  The drivers did everything they could to make sure we were all taken care of and moved back and forth to Disneyland on time.  The pools were clean and the kids loved it!  Disneyland has changed a lot since 1956 and it is no longer
Manager Response: I am sorry to read that your Disneyland experience was not what you expected.  Although I am pleased to read that you did enjoy your stay with us.  As a suggestion, I would plan on visiting Disneyland during off peak times.  In this way you can avoid a lot of the crowds and you will be able to find some great deals and specials staying at the Candy Cane Inn.  If you need help with planning your Disney vacation and your stay with us, please feel free to contact me and I will be more than happy to help.  Best regards!

Summary: I'm a So Cal native so usually drive home after a day at Disneyland. It was so great on the hotel shuttle to be picked up and dropped off. We will stay here again! Brian in Reservations was very helpful and courteous.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your stay.  I am happy to read that Bryan was so helpful in assisting you.  As one of our Reservationist, he is one first points of contact with the Candy Cane Inn and being helpful and courteous helps to ensure that your start your stay off right.  Again, thank you for your comments and I look forward to your next stay with us at the Candy Cane Inn.

Summary Heading: Located right next door to the parks
Summary: Decor is a little dated but you can't beat The Candy Cane Inn for location and value.   Free Shuttle runs every half an hour if you can't be bothered walking but in rush hour it's probably better to walk as it'll be quicker.    We were booked in over Xmas and received complimentary mugs, pens and Xmas tree decoration which was a nice touch.   Staff were friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments.  I am happy to read that you enjoyed our holiday goodies we left you.  I really appreciate your feedback and I will be discussing your comments with my Management Team to see what we can do to improve the décor of our hotel.  I hope to have you back again in the near future.  If you are ever in need of reservations assistance, please do not hesitate to let me know.  Best regards!

Summary: My family (3 of us,) have been making our annual trip to disneyland for 9 years. The last 4 years and 6 visits we have stayed at the Candy Cane Inn, for eight days. I put together many disneyland trips for friends and always put them up at the Candy Cane Inn. First of all it's beautiful, and quaint with it's European style, and you can tell it's family owned and run. Location is amazing! You can walk, but the shuttle is convenient and the drivers are so nice, they always recognize us each year. They are very accommodating, I always ask for a 2nd floor so I don't have a direct view of the parking lot, and for a longer stay the deluxe room is just a bit bigger. The pool is small but nice, and never feels crowded, and the complimentary breakfast, is really the "cherry on top". It
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your comments with our fellow TripAdvisor readers.  I want to let you know that I appreciate your kind words about the hotel.  I am sorry to read about your experience with the Front Desk.  I have taken this opportunity to speak with my Front Office Manager and partner with him on coaching our Staff.  My expectation is that every guest who enters my hotel feels at home and be treated like one of the family.  I hope that you will back again soon and give us another chance to share with you an experience more typical of the Candy Cane Inn.

Summary: I have stayed at the Candy Cane Inn twice before and loved it and I still love it.  I took my family, Mom, Dad, my husband, my daughter and grandaughter to Disneyland during the Christmas break.  We needed to rooms that connected because of my granddaughter.  Unfortunately our flight was delayed so we checked in late, the hotel was still very accomodating.  The front desk clerk found two rooms for us that connected we were hungry so he pointed out the direction of the restaurants and explained breakfast and the shuttle thoroughly.  The rooms were clean and enough towels were provided.  Only one thing that I think they need to work on is the beds, they are extremely soft, not to my liking but I'm sure others may like that.  The breakfast in the morning is pretty basic, cereal,
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us.  I am pleased to read that you found my staff to be helpful and attentive.  As you mentioned, the choice of firmness for a bed will vary from person to person.  We do offer Serta Presidential Double Pillow Top Mattress.  Since they are double pillow top, they are a softer type of bed.  I am happy to read that other then the bed, you enjoyed your stay with us.  Thank you again for staying with us and letting us know about your stay.

Summary: Moved to the Candy Cane Inn after staying at the Howard Johnson and being kept awake two nights with the freeway noise.  It is very well kept, the rooms are were clean and quiet. We stayed three nigths and have nothing to complain about. We used the shuttle a few times, but most of the time just walked to Disneyland, easy walk.  My husband and kids went down to breakfast, nothing spectacular, but not a deal breaker for us. We bring our own food. There was no microwave in our room, we used the microwave in the breakfast room which was available 24 hours.  We will be back in the near future.
Manager Response: Thank you for comments.  I am happy to read that you enjoyed your stay with us.  I am sorry that you had to move hotels, but I am pleased that you found our hotel more comfortable.  We do offer an expanded continental breakfast featuring toast, bagels, assorted pastries, fruit, yogurt, coffee, tea, as well as hot and cold cereals.  Also, for our guests who wish to have a microwave in their room we feature premium rooms at our hotel that include a microwave, flat screen TV, breakfast delivered to the room, complimentary movie rentals, as well as late checkout at 2pm free of charge.  I am glad to read that you will be back and if you need assistance with reservations, please feel free to contact me.  Best regards!

Summary: My family has stayed at the Candy Cane Inn 4 times in the year of 2011 and each time has been fantastic. There is nothing i could have to complain about. The breakfast is great and free with items such as variety of bagels, toast, yogurt, donuts, muffins, coffee, and juice. The shuttle is always there on time and is very convienent to get to the park. There are two stores right next to the candy cane, 7-eleven and ABC market. It's very convienent because my family will always go there in the morning and get water bottles and snacks so that we dont have to spend even more money at disney. It saves you quite a few bucks considering a water bottle at disney is $4. The beds are comfortable and the tv's have all the standard channels. Candy Cane even has roll away beds if you have 5
Manager Response: We certainly appreciate your comments and being another Candy Cane Inn loyal repeat guest. We do aspire to be a very clean, comfortable and moderately priced family hotel with emphasis on exceptional product and friendly service. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: We stayed 14 nights at candy cane inn using it as a base to meet up with our son who was working at catalina and of course for Disneyland for our 2 year old. Location can't be beaten. It is as close - or closer - than the Disneyland hotels. Room was good. We would've liked more storage space but I suppose most guests don't stay 2 weeks. We had turn down service which was nice touch. Having fridge and ironing board were a must. Breakfasts were good and had a nice, relaxed feel. These could have been served in room if desired. Pool was small but good. Hot tub was great. We went mid September and although there were other guests in pool and tub area, it never felt crowded. Downsides. Other noisy guests but only once in 2 weeks. There were maintenance works happening which started
Manager Response: Thank you staying with us and I am delighted that you enjoyed the visit with your son and little one of course. I do apologize for the noise you encountered and while we were re-roofing the property we attempted to be as considerate as possible with starting times after 9am and room assignments. The work being done at California Adventure and Cars Land behind us did start earlier in the mornings and while I sincerely apologize for this, city ordinances allow this early work time. The new and exciting things at the theme parks are progressing nicely and this has not been an issue and the finished product will certainly be very exciting! Again we do appreciate your business and comments.

Summary: Stayed 3 times now. very close to disney and shops food etc. clean and nice free breakfast
Manager Response: Thank you for being a loyal and repeat guest, we do appreciate your business! If you ever need assistance with rates and reservations please feel free to contact me personally. Kind regards!

Summary: Our family of 4 stayed at the Candy CAne over the holidays and our stay was fabulous. We were a little concered when we saw that our room was right outside the stair case and vending.  But over the course of the 3 nights we were there, it was surprisingly quiet.  When we went to the office to voice our concern about the room, the front desk clerk suggested that we try it for the first night, and if there was too much noise, she will change our room for the duration of our stay.  The breakfast buffet was great with pastries, and baked goods.  My 6 year especially loved the shuttle to and from the park.
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us the opportunity to be of service on your recent visit to the theme parks. I am delighted that our desk clerk was helpful and offered you a room move. Our guests are family travelers for the most part and are respectful to maintain a quiet environment for others. Yes, many young ones start their day off excited about the bus ride to from the park and our drivers a very friendly too…if I may say so myself.

Summary: The Candy Cane Inn was fabulous!  We are a family of 4 that has never been to California before.  Found this hotel thanks to Trip Advisor and a few Disney sites, and have zero regrets.    We checked in on 12/21 and stayed for 5 nights.  We left for 2 nights to go to San Diego and returned to the CCI for 2 additional nights before heading back home to the midwest. Did I mention the free parking??  We had a room on the first floor closest to the street.  The only noise we heard was the family next door calling their son's name outside one morning. Tip:  if you are a light sleeper in ANY hotel, use the fan in the heater/ac unit during the night.  We use it everytime we travel and it is great white noise and blocks any noise from the outside. The room was definitely on the smaller
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for staying with us and sharing your in-depth comments with fellow travelers. We do appreciate our guests business and our holiday gift bag is a small token along with our Reward Certificates to show this gratitude. Please feel free to contact me personally as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations. Warm regards!

Summary: We spent 3 days at the Happiest Place on Earth celebrating 50 years of marriage with our kids, and grandkids.  We had 3 rooms at the Candy Cane Inn which was perfect for a great breakfast, easy walk to Disneyland or take the shuttle.  It was great to have everyone together for breakfast on the lani before heading out for a day of fun.
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us the opportunity to be of service and congratulations on your 50 years of marriage. I am delighted that your stay with family was enjoyable and we look forward in seeing you again. Warm regards!

Summary: I recently returned from my sixth trip to Disneyland in five years.  I've been always intrigued by the Candy Cane Inn for its popularity online.  I decided to finally give it a try and just stayed here for 3 nights with my family of four and left disappointed.    The only upsides to this place are its proximity to Disneyland main gate (8-9 minute walk door to door) , cleanliness and its shuttle service which I found to be prompt and convenient staffed by friendly drivers.  Other than that it leaves a lot to be desired.    I stayed in Room 256, a deluxe room toward the back.  The room itself is supposedly a bit larger than the standard room but otherwise is pretty generic.  The walls were not only pretty thin but the sound of the neighboring shower and bathroom fan when running
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide your feedback regarding your stay.  I am sorry that your stay did not meet your expectations.  In your comments you voiced your concern regarding the fact that I requested the opportunity to investigate your complaint.  I apologize if this offended you.  My goal was to investigate the situation properly in order to determine the proper and immediate resolution to your concern.  I do not feel that a token discount is an appropriate gesture to simply pacify a guest.  It is my responsibility to investigate all guests’ concerns with my Managers and offer a resolution to our guests that is fair and reasonable.  Also, we at the Candy Cane Inn understand that every guest’s definition of comfort will be different.  We also understand that there are many hotels to choose from.  All we ask if for an opportunity to look into a guest’s concern to ensure it is corrected.  If we cannot correct the concern, then we will do whatever is necessary in order to make things right.  I am again sorry that you did not experience a stay more typical of the Candy Cane Inn.  I do thank you for your comments.  Warm regards.

Summary: Our family of 4 stayed at the Candy Cane Inn on 12/23 & 12/24. The lobby was nicely decorated and the girl at the front desk was very friendly. The hotel is within walking distance to Disneyland, however we took the hotel shuttle bus.The breakfast buffet had muffins, toast, bagels, juices, coffee, hot chocolate, cold cereral & fruit. The pool area was very well maintained & there where several people swimming in the pool. Our room was on the 2nd floor, it was very clean and the beds were really comfortable. The hotel was very busy, but we didn't hear any noise, which was great!  When we returned from Disneyland very late Christmas Eve, we had a bag waiting for us on our table & it was filled with cookies, 2 coffee mugs, pens, a tree ornament, and candy canes! What a nice
Manager Response: I am so happy to read that you enjoyed our holiday surprise!  Please enjoy them as our thank you for celebrating the holidays with us at the Candy Cane Inn.  Also, thank you sharing your comments with us and we cannot wait to have you back with us!  Best regards!

Summary: We visited relatives in San Diego for Christmas from Texas this week.  I wrote a review in September 2011 and the manager Mr. Holl of Candy Cane Inn said I could call him personally for a reservation on my next visit.  So on Dec 22nd, my daughter talked me into taking her to Disneyland the next day.  I told her that I would only go if the Candy Cane Inn had any available rooms.  So I called Mr. Holl and he set up my reservation for the next day.  He even said we could get in our room when we arrived if a room was available.  Needless to say, Candy Cane Inn came through and we had a lovely visit.  We were able to rest in the room and send the teens on their way to Disneyland as soon as we arrived,  Mr. Holl, Amy and the maintenance man were all so helpful and this is the only
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to tell our fellow TripAdvisor Readers about your stay.  It was such a pleasure to be able to accommodate you.  Also, thank you for your kind words about my Staff.  As always, if you ever need help with your reservations, please feel free to contact me.  Until next time!

Summary Heading: family vacations in 1998, 99, and 01 We ALWAYS stayed a week at CCI.
Summary: I surely hope to return to the CCI in the coming year of 2012. I haven't been back for a vacation since 2001.....Yep, Sadly eleven years have past..... Returning again to stay a full week ...... It will be like going home :)  Rooms may have not been spacious. But always very clean, inviting, and cozy! If there was ever anything a guest needed attention to. I found the hosts/staff always very helpful/attentive. Always worthy of tipping all the room attendants, also the shuttle bus drivers. Some of the most upbeat, friendly people you could hope to meet. Some of them there @ CCI for years. And, Some would even remember us between the three vacations. I SO HOPE maybe some of them may STILL be drivers there. I will remember there faces as well :)   Just Can't  stand the wait, till
Manager Response: Ms. Smith, thank to for being a loyal Candy Cane Inn guest!  Many of our Staff have been with us for years and it is a quality we hope to maintain for many more years to come.  These folks work hard to ensure our guests enjoy their stay and it means so much to us all knowing that our guests appreciate our efforts.  We are excited to be able to celebrate your birthday with you and we look forward to your return.  Thank you for your wonderful comments.   Best regards!

Summary: I visited Disneyland again for the holidays with my children.  They requested we stay at the Candy Cane Inn for this visit.  We have stayed several times at The Grand California Hotel but my kids prefer the charm and accommodations of this hotel.  Just like our first visit, the stay was wonderful.  We chose a premium room this time and it wasnwellmworth it.  The rooms are larger, they deliver a continental breakfast every morning and they have a DVD selection available.  For the location and price this is my hotelmofnchoicenwhen visiting Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments!  I am so pleased to read that you enjoyed the features and amenities of our Premium room.  If you ever need help with your accommodations, please feel free to contact me.  Warm regards!

Summary Heading: The Best budget hotel in Anaheim!!!!
Summary: Here's the facts:  Right next door to Disneyland.  About 10 minute walk (My kids are 5 & 8 & they had no problems w/ the distance).  2 story bldg w/ no elevator.  Staff more than willing to assist w/ luggage.  Lge. parking lot w/ FREE parking!!!!  (I believe most of the hotels around this area charge a fee).  Small pool   Continental breakfast:  hot/cold beverages (tea, coffee, milk, hot cocoa), fresh fruit (oranges, apples, bananas), cold/hot cereals, pastries (muffins, danish, bread) which is a plus for budget travelers.  Staff:  friendly, courtesy & helpful.  Rooms:  very clean, all non-smoking, hair dryers & microwaves (no extra charge).  Conveniences:  7/11 store, Subway, Tony Roma  & Chinese restaurant w/in walking distance.  Overall, I would recommend this hotel to
Manager Response: Wow!  Thank you for the kind comments!  Your description of our features and amenities was perfect!  Please take advantage of our Reward Certificate you mentioned.  This will give you $10 off per night of your next stay with us!  See you next time!

Summary: This is the second time we have stayed at the Candy Cane and we have been very pleased with our experience.  The staff is very friendly and the rooms are nicely kept.  We really appreciated the very nice breakfast and free parking.  Even though the motel is within walking distance to Disneyland, the shuttle service is nice to have at the end of a very long day. If we are ever back to Anaheim, we will be sure to stay at the Candy Cane Inn.  Thanks to everyone there for a wonderful visit.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us again!  I really appreciate your comments about our hotel and staff!  We look forward to your next visit with us and please feel free to contact me if you need reservations assistance.  Warm regards!

Summary: I stay here anytime I go to Disneyland. I stayed here first week of Decemeber. Hotel grounds are clean and staff is pleasant. The hotel shuttle bus is convienent and a great perk. Rooms were clean, Breakfast ends to early in my opinion and feel rushed by the ladies who stock and clean up the continental breakfast. If they are going to end breakfast so early the ladies who stock it need to keep it fully stocked and not just stand in the supply room talking. Seems like customer service is slipping just a tad but still above most hotels in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share with us your feedback.  I really appreciate you letting me know about your observation.  I have taken the liberty to speak to our Breakfast Staff to ensure that they are more attentive to the needs of our guests.  I apologize for this inconvenience and I hope that you will be back again soon to experience a stay more typical of the Candy Cane Inn.  Again, thank you for your comments!  Warm regards!

Summary Heading: Great place to stay close to Disneyland
Summary: If you don't want to pop for the bucks to stay at a Disneyland Resort property, this is a great alternative. There is no extra charge for parking or resort fees, and they give a discount for AARP/AAA with an additional discount for annual passholders. The shuttle bus was on schedule every time we needed it. The rooms were clean and had a nice set up for sharing with the sink and open closet area separate from the toilet and shower. The toiletries were good and even included a comb, shower cap and amenities pack. A great value for the money. You can see the fireworks from the hotel. The continental breakfast had a good variety of breads, muffins, donuts, pastries, bagels, and oatmeal in addition to fresh fruit, good coffee, cocoa and juice. There are ABC store and 7-11 next door.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments!  I could not have summed up our services any better!  We are proud to offer several discounts for our hotel, especially our new Disney Annual Passholder discount.  If you ever need assistance with reservations, please do not hesitate to let me know.  Thank you again and I look forward to your next stay with us.

Summary: After alternating between some of the less expensive hotels, and the Disneyland Resort hotels, we opted to give a some of the intermediate priced hotels a try(we are Annual Passholders so we come to DL quite often).  I am so glad we tried out the Candy Cane Inn last year.  Last year they gave us a $10 credit certificate to use on our next stay, so we used it last week.        We were greeted by friendly staff who welcomed us and got us all situated.  There is coffee and candy canes in the lobby.  I enjoyed the coffee after a long drive and the kids enjoyed the candy canes.      This place is extremely clean and you can clearly see the attention to detail in maintaining this place.  The rooms are a cozy size with everything we needed in room.  The contintental breakfast was a
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your most recent stay.  We are proud to honor AAA/AARP/Active Duty US Military discounts, as well as our $10 Reward Certificate discount.  Recently, we have added a Disney Annual Passholder discount which is $10 off per night when available.  I am delighted to read that you enjoyed the features and amenities of the Candy Cane Inn, as well as knowing that we will be your preferred hotel when you come to visit.  If you ever need assistance with reservations, please do not hesitate to contact me.  Best regards!

Summary: Ten minutes to the park. Great staff. Very clean and maintained property. nice pool. close to food and small shops. Walk to the park or take the shuttle. will be back
Manager Response: I am pleased to read that you enjoyed your stay with us.  Thank you for sharing your feedback with our TripAdvisor readers.  I look forward to your next stay with us.  Until then, best regards!

Summary Heading: Close to Disneyland but some disappointment
Summary: Family of four in one nicely appointed room with comfy as beds and plantation sitters. Small pool and ten min walk to disneyland and restaurants and a shuttle too. Few disapointments, given some bad advice when we needed some supplies, took a private taxi organised by hotel that was ten dollars more than fare should have been, and we were told four miles away..staff at front desk bit abrupt and just tolerating attitude...but I can't ever remember having breakfast in paper cups, bowls and plates with plastic cutlery...three cereals one being fruit loops...other rice bubbles..
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and I am sorry that your experience with the front desk was disappointing. I am not sure if you brought this to anyone’s attention and ask that any such instances be reported to me immediately for prompt handling. Please rest assured that our front office manager will share your comments with the team. In regards to our Expanded Continental Breakfast and paper cups, plates and plastics utensils being utilized. We are extremely mindful for the safety and security of our guests and therefore refrain form ANY glassware poolside. Also, we are more than happy to assist with luggage to the second floor and should you need assistance simply ask the front desk. Kind regards!

Summary: What the place lacks in mod cons and extras, it makes up for with a basic brekky, carparking and internet access !!!!
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed at this hotel because of the great reviews.  Very nice and clean.  Staff is very friendly.  Shuttle service was great, walking wasn't far at all about 10 min walk.  Breakfast was simple and it was nice to eat around the pool.  When we came back to our room each night the room looked like when we checked in, the maid service was perfect.  There are restaurants within walking distance, bubba gump was good and so was california pizza. We definitely will stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful comments about the Candy Cane Inn.  I must agree that our Housekeeping Staff is top notch and they work hard to ensure the cleanliness of our rooms.  Also, our proximity to the theme parks, the convention center, and the Anaheim GardenWalk cannot be beat!  We are within walking distance to all of these locations.  I cannot wait to have you back with us.  Please contact me if you ever need help with your reservations!  Best regards!

Summary: Our family of five, consists of 2 adults and 3 children, had recently stayed here for 5 nights when we visited Disneyland in Anaheim. The room had 2 queen-sized beds plus a rollaway, yet still had enough room to move around comfortably. Breakfasts were inclusive although it was just some simple pastries, fruit juices and coffee. But there were lot of fresh fruits such as banana, apple and orange! Very healthy. Internet was free but with no services for 2 nights. Informed the problem to management and got it fixed in no time. Good customer service. Liked their laundry facility as we can do our own laundry after coming back from the Disneyland park. Definitely recommend to family who want a place to stay near Disney.
Manager Response: I am very pleased to read that we met your expectations.  From time to time, we do encounter issues.  Our goal is to ensure that we address those issues immediately and fix them, such as your concern with the internet.  Thank you for your comments and we truly appreciate your recommendation!

Summary Heading: Location and Convenience good for Disneyland
Summary: Visited Thanksgiving week 2011. The good things:  On time shuttle that was free.  Free parking.  We had the deluxe room and the continental breakfast delivered every morning (free with Deluxe room) was great.  The room size and amenities was good for the price.  The bad.  Try and get a room on the 2nd floor.  We had a "Deluxe" room that was right next to the stair well on the 1st floor.  As a result the early risers and sometimes the maids had loud conversations right outside our door.  You would think that "Deluxe" would be a way from stairs.   Overall we would stay again if we didn't go with Disney properties directly.  We saved $1000 by staying at Candy Cane Inn vs. Disney properties.
Manager Response: Thank you for letting our TripAdvisor Readers know about your stay with us.  I am happy to read that you enjoyed your stay.  I am sorry for the issues you had with noise.  As always, if you ever encounter noise issues, please let us know and we will be sure to address your concern immediately.  My Staff and I are always willing to do what we can to ensure the most comfortable stay possible.  Thank you again for your comments and we look forward to you next visit to our hotel.

Summary: Our family of five, consists of 2 adults and 3 children, had recently stayed here for 5 nights when we visited Disneyland in Anaheim. The room had 2 queen-sized beds plus a rollaway, yet still had room to move around comfortably. Breakfasts were inclusive although it was just some simple pastries, fruit juices and coffee. But there were lot of fresh fruits such as banana, apple and orange! Very healthy. Internet was free but with no services for 2 nights. Informed the problem to management and got it fixed in no time. Good customer service. Liked their laundry facility as we can do our own laundry after coming back from the Disneyland park. Definitely recommend to family who want a place to stay near Disney.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I stayed at the Candy Cane Inn on a family holiday to the USA. We stayed in the states overall for nearly two months so there were a lot of Hotels along the way but I can honestly say Candy Cane Inn was not only the most enjoyable, but the friendliest, cleanest and most welcoming hotel of all. Now this could be a mix of the fact that I had never travelled overseas before so everything was so surreal, Disneyland! Who isn't happy when travelling to Disneyland? And that at this stage, I was fresh, happy and excited to start my holiday. In saying all of this, I think this hotel added to the experience.  After a really long day (Im talking 5am-10pm) Heading home to this deliciously comfy bed was more than amazing. We were here for a total of 4 nights- This property is located right
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your pleasant comments with fellow travelers. I am extremely delighted that your family had such a wonderful visit to the theme parks and our hotel. Yes, our centralized location to the Anaheim GardenWalk and the fact you do not have to cross busy Harbor Blvd is an added bonus for safety. Again, thank you for your feedback and we do appreciate your business. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Disney style & service at a great price!
Summary: After staying at the Candy Cane Inn several times in the past, we swore we would never stay anywhere else.  But after family we were traveling with booked another hotel with "points" we felt we had to stay where they were staying.  Arriving in Anaheim to find this different hotel a complete nightmare (filthy, undergoing construction, horribly dated and a mile away from the Mouse House with no shuttle) we called the Candy Cane Inn.  We were so thrilled that they had rooms for us and our family and allowed us to check in quickly and painlessly.  Their breakfast is perfect, the accomodations clean and well kept and the staff is very friendly.  We really will NEVER stay anywhere else again!!
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us to be of service on your recent visit and for your past visits as we do appreciate your business. I am sorry that your family trip started off on not such a positive note, however delighted that our team was able to get you into our hotel quickly and painlessly. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: First off for location it can't be beaten, minutes away from Disney so very convenient.  The room was very clean and came with free wi-fi, good cable selection and a turn-down service. Breakfast had a good selection and you could sit by the pool which was nice. The staff were very friendly and always able to accomodate.  The room had two double beds but was significantly small especially to accomodate four people and we had been told/paid to be booked into one of the largest. Also the mirror and sink area was in the bedroom, seperate to the bathroom which had no mirror or sink just a shower/bath and toilet. This was a nuisance as it meant brushing your teeth, shaving etc in the room yet showering in the bathroom and so having different amenities in different rooms. Also wardrobe
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and providing us with your valuable feedback. We do appreciate what our guests have to say as this assists us with making modifications and changes in our product and service. I am sincerely disappointed that we failed to live up to the expectations regarding the size of our rooms and bathroom accommodations. However, I do thank you for the positive comments you provided regarding our property and services. Kind regards.

Summary: We have been staying here for several years, and can't say enough great things about this place.  The rooms are clean and inviting, and the staff is extremely helpful.  We've asked them about restaurants in the area and they've been right on the mark.  The breakfast is a nice addition also and I highly recommend this hotel to anyone who is visiting the Anaheim area.
Manager Response: Thank you for being a loyal and repeat Candy Cane Inn guest we do appreciate your business and taking time to share your comments with fellow travelers. I do appreciate your kind comments about our team as they sincerely care and do in-depth research prior to recommending goods or services to guests. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as I would be delighted in assisting with rates and reservations.

Summary: I stayed at the Candy Cane for a week in July 2011, and it was amazing as always.  We had a group of 7 (6 adults, 1 child celebrating his 1st birthday!) and booked two rooms between us.  We had plenty of room, a playpen was supplied for the toddler in our group, and our rooms were very clean.    We usually visit Southern California in late August, so found the hotel to be much busier in mid July, and the parking spaces were all full, however there was no fuss made when having to park in areas other than the spots allocated.    Breakfast was exactly as it always is, bagels, toast, muffins, cereals, doughnuts , yogurts, fruit along with coffee/tea, juices and milk.  Perfect to get some energy before hitting the parks.    The pool was busy each day when we returned for an afternoon
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. I am delighted that you enjoyed your visit once again and we look forward in seeing you when you return. Yes, July is usually the busiest month of the year and late August into early September can be quieter when schools are starting. Again, thank you for your kind comments and feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Excellent place -- we will be back
Summary: We love the Candy Cane Inn (CCI)! We recently stayed at the CCI for three nights. Check-in was fast and easy and everything in the room was clean and worked fine. The room has a safe and small refrigerator. The complimentary breakfast is served from 7am to 9am and included fruit, bagels, pastries/donuts and coffee/juice. My 2 teens found the breakfast filling and it saved us a lot of money since we didn’t have to buy expensive breakfasts elsewhere. The staff is very friendly and does a great job keeping the grounds spotless. We’ve stayed at CCI two times in the last year and have found the Inn to be very quiet at night, which makes for better sleep as you rest up for the next day’s trudge thru Disney. Although it is a fast and easy walk to Disney’s main entrance (about 10
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us the opportunity on your recent visit and becoming a repeat Candy Cane Inn guest, we DO appreciate your business and kind comments. Our friendly staff members do an outstanding job in maintaining our quaint property and providing a warm and friendly environment. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: Having stayed in only a few hotel in America i liked mostly the ones i had been to. This hotel was perfect if you were staying at disneyland and using the parks. There are many things surrounding this hotel with shops and many resturants to choose from. The hotel itself had a good breakfast and it was easy to get to on the morning you were at the parks! The room was a perfect size although the bathroom could have been bigger but I didnt really mind cause you dont go there and stay in the hotel room all the time! Would recommend this hotel for people with young children as there is always a shuttle bus to disneyland!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for allowing us to be of service during your recent visit to the Theme Parks, we do appreciate your business and comments. Yes, our location is perfect in regards to many things to do and eateries within walking distance. In regards to your luggage and the second floor, please let the front desk know as it would be our pleasure to have one of our house persons assist. Thank you again and kind regards!

Summary: Candy Cane Inn is right next door to California Park/Disneyland. You can easily walk to the entrance of Disneyland, but the Candy Cane Inn also offers shuttle service that is excellent and only takes a couple of minutes. Great idea if you have little ones who are too tired to walk after a long day of Disneyland. Candy Cane Inn is an older establishment, but so clean. The staff was great. Room was big and very clean. No bed bugs. Nice continental breakfast with coffee, juice, fruit, yogurt, cereal, pastries. Would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for staying with us and sharing your kind comments with fellow travelers. Yes, the shuttle is certainly a relief at the end of your busy day, however also nice at the start as you walk all day at the theme parks. I would like to clarify that our property has only two floors and rooms are the same size on both floors. Again, thank you for your business it is most appreciated. Kind regards!

Summary: This hotel is a 10 minute brisk walk to the Disneyland main gates. (We timed it) If you are not up to it, the shuttle provided by the hotel is great to and from Disneyland for free, with the exception of tips for the drivers, which you dont mind giving considering the convenience and friendly service you are getting. The hotel is better than you see in the photos I thought, our room was clean and comfortable. The bathrooms are a little dated and small but for a few nights it was fine and it was a good shower, not one of those sprinkler types where you have to run around to get wet. Nice fluffy towels and amenity provisions and free wifi. The continental breakfast included was adequate, but not enticing. No complaints though. All staff were helpful and friendly. Our room was on
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us the opportunity on your recent visit to the theme parks. We do aspire to provide a clean, comfortable and serene property with excellent guest service and I thank you for your kind comments. Again, thank you for staying with us and sharing your comments with fellow travelers. Kind regards!

Summary: Stayed at Candy Cane in over the Veteren's Day Holiday.  3 Star Hotel with 5 Star service so gave a total of 4 overall.  Had premium hotel room with daily "room service".  Great location close to Disneyland (walkable or easy shuttle).  Would stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your comments with us and fellow TripAdvisor travelers.  I am very pleased to read that you enjoyed the features and amenities of our Premium room.  Being only 250 yards from the main gate of Disneyland and offering a complimentary shuttle to and from the parks makes it easy.  Please be sure to contact me the next time you are planning your next visit.  Kind Regards!

Summary Heading: Staying here made our trip even more special.
Summary: My boyfriend and I recently stayed two nights at the Candy Cane Inn for our trip to Disneyland, and it was awesome! Someone had recommended this place to me before and the reviews were so high on here we decided to check it out. This place was great; very clean, great customer service, a heated pool in November, and a nice breakfast spread. It was very easy to find, and the FREE shuttle to the park was great. Also free parking.  We will definitely be staying here again as well as recommending it to others! Thank you Candy Cane Inn staff :)
Manager Response: I am glad to read that you decided to give us a chance and you enjoyed your stay.  Also, thank you in advance for telling others about our hotel.  Word of mouth is the best advertising and we are very thankful for your recommendation.  Thank you for staying with us and hope to have you back real soon.

Summary: Stayed there for 2 nights based on tripadvisor ratings.  Found it to be way overpriced ($160/night) and not very comfortable, and we went with the "mid-size" room.  One bed had about 8 inches of space from the wall and the other even less, especially where the a/c was; maybe 4 inches to get by that.  The "bathroom" was a toilet and tub, which left no room for changing (my friend claims to have stood on toilet so as to have room to change).  The free high speed internet was literally non existent, and the walls were paper thin.  It was very noisy.  It would have been an okay place for maybe $80/night.  Will be exploring other options for our next visit.
Manager Response: I am sorry to read that you did not enjoy your stay with us.  Our goal is to provide our guests with clean, comfortable and a peaceful environment during their stay and I am disappointed that we did not meet your expectations.  We are constantly looking for ways to improve our hotel and I happy to announce that we are completing a renovation to our internet access this Friday that will help to drastically improve our wifi connectivity and performance.  Please feel free to contact me if you have any further questions or concerns.  Thank you again for your comments.  Best regards!

Summary: Next door to Disney so great location local shops two mins walk. Rooms good value,Pool small but good for kids.The only let down was the Wifi which was rubbish.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback.  I am happy to read that overall that you enjoyed your visit to our hotel.  As I mentioned in a previous post, we are renovating our internet access which will help to improve our wifi connectivity and performance.  I hope that you will give us another chance in the future and test our new wifi.  Until then, warm regards!

Summary: This is the second time I've stayed here, and I've never had a bad experience. The service is excellent, the rooms clean, and the staff friendly. The distance from Disneyland is a quick walk, and there's plenty of places to eat nearby. Candy Cane is definitely my preferred hotel when in Anaheim.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments.  I was delighted to read that we are your preferred hotel!  I will be sure to pass on to my staff that you enjoyed the cleanliness of your room, as well as the service they provided.  We cannot wait to have you back!  Best regards!

Summary: My daughter and I recently stayed at the Candy Cane Inn for a Disneyland vacation. We had a nice clean,quiet room. You would of never guessed it was full! The shuttle bus to the park stopped right in front of our door. It was easy to walk or when we were tired we also took the shuttle.Shuttle driver very nice as well. The free breakfast was simple but just enough for us girls in the morning. This motel has improved alot over the years. Planning on staying again soon. The pool is small but we have a pool at home and don't usually use one at a motel. Try it if you have a family you won't be disappointed. surprised it is not rated higher.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments!  I am pleased to read that you and your daughter had such a great time on your vacation.  We are constantly changing things at the Candy Cane Inn to meet the needs of our guests and I am excited to have you back with us.  If you ever need help with reservations, please feel free to contact me directly.  Best regards!

Summary: Another wonderful stay at the Candy Cane.   Easy to book on the internet, friendly staff, clean rooms, a courtesy bus to Disneyland, light breakfast included  plus a spa and pool to wash off the heat and dust after a long day at Disneyland!   Who could ask for more?   Great family accommodation.   Just fantastic and look forward to our next visit.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your comments with our Trip Advisor Readers!  I could not have summed up your comment any better myself.  We take pride in providing our guest the essentials they need to have an enjoyable stay and to help them enjoy Disneyland.  I hope to have you back with us again soon.  Until then, best regards.

Summary: We booked 2 adjoining rooms so we could share in the care of our 2 grand kids with their parents. It is close to Disneyland. About 15 min for a 4 year old to walk. Or there is a shuttle on the hour and half hour. Wifi reception is awful. Complained everyday without any results. Pool was good for the kids to work off some energy. Hot tub was truly hot. One day of white flour muffins for breakfast was enough for me. So ate my granola bars for breakfast and passed on their free continental breakfast. Like most places the noise was always loud. We were on the ground floor so other guests talking outside seemed to be in our room instead. I would think other people would have a clue at 10pm to keep their voices down outside someone else room.
Manager Response: As we have commented on in previous posts, we are currently in the process of upgrading our WiFi service and hope to have everything completed in December.  I am sorry that the noise was a disturbance for you.  Unfortunately, based on Disneyland’s closing times, this can be a busy time with guests coming back from Disneyland and people excited to talk about their day.  We do the best we can to ensure a peaceful environment, but please feel free to contact the Front Desk at anytime you feel noise levels are a concern and we will ensure we address the issue.  Again, please accept my most sincere apologies and thank you for your comments.

Summary Heading: Can't wait to go back to the Candy Cane
Summary: We love the Candy Cane Inn.  We have stayed there two times and we can't wait to go back.  It is so close to Disneyland, but we took the shuttle just to make it easier.  The breakfast in the morning is a perfect way to start your day.  The rooms was clean and decorated nicely.  And the front office was efficient and helpful.  (Note: a family we know goes there every year and stays at the Candy Cane Inn)  And the price was fair for what you got.  I recommend it.
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us the opportunity to be of service on both your visits. Yes, we do have many repeat guests and families that have grown and grown over the years and become a meeting place for family reunions. Again, we do appreciate your continued business and look forward in seeing you again.

Summary: We stayed for 3 nights at the Candy Cane Inn and loved our stay! The staff were friendly and helpful and the hotel was very easy walking distance to Disneyland (they have a shuttle bus if you don’t want to walk though). The breakfast was simple but free and a good way to start the day and the rooms were clean and large enough for our party of four. It was great that you could purchase park tickets at the reception desk, and the staff were always more than happy to book a car for us or give us directions. I would definitely recommend this hotel, its great value for money!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your comments with fellow travelers. We do appreciate your business and hope we may be of service should your travel plans bring you back to the area. Kind regards!

Summary: This is a great place to stay if you can not stay on property at Disneyland.  I have stayed here 4 times, the most recent was for the D23 Convention in August.  The rooms are nice and good-sized.  It can be noisy in the morning as all the kids excitedly runout of their hotel rooms for Disney, but it is not too bad.  The breakfast is just ok, continental.  I like the later hour son the pool and spa, which were great and relaxing!  The walk isn't too bad to and from the parks but the shuttle is also efficient if you need it.
Manager Response: Thank you for being a loyal and repeat Candy Cane Inn guest, we DO appreciate your business and comments! Yes, being a family hotel the little ones do become excited and looking forward to spending a day at the theme parks. Please feel free to contact me personally when planning your next visit as I would be delighted to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards.

Summary Heading: Best place to stay when visiting Disneyland!!!
Summary: We stayed at the Candy Cane Inn at the beginning of October for 3 nights, and it was the best experience ever! After reviewing hotels near Disneyland for MONTHS we finally decided on this property, and so glad we did! It is on the same side of Harbor Blvd as Disney, so no crossing busy streets with 3 young children. It is in easy, safe walking distance, although they do have a private, free shuttle back and forth to the hotel when you are too tired to walk. The staff was so friendly and accommodating, the free breakfast was plentiful and just right for a busy, young family, and the room was extremely clean, comfortable, and quiet. We had room 233, which was great, because at night, we could see the Disney fireworks perfectly from our room!! What a fun surprise for the kids!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your comments with us.  I was happy to read that you enjoyed your visit to our hotel.  Being only 250 yards away from the main entrance of Disneyland and the fact that you do not have to cross any major streets, I have to agree with you that our location is a nice feature of our hotel.  I really appreciate knowing that you would recommend us and I look forward to your next visit to the Candy Cane Inn.

Summary: Everything about this  hotel -- location, service, room itself -- was ideal for our visit to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thanks for sharing your comments with us!  I am glad that you enjoyed your stay.  If you ever need assistance booking your reservations, please do not hesitate to contact me.  Best regards!

Summary Heading: Good value budget option near Disneyland
Summary: I travelled with my youngest son to California this summer. We stayed near Disneyland for 3 nights at the candy Cane Inn. I always do some research on Tripadvisor before I book hotels for my vacations. I decided that this time since it was only the two of us I would look for a less expensive hotel. Two years ago my husband, my three sons and I stayed at the Disney Grand California Resort which cost us considerably more. I was very happy with my budget choice: 1) FREE parking- this is a great perk because Disneyland is an easy walk from the Inn and you don't need to use your car at all. If you don't like to walk there was a shuttle bus directly from the Inn's parking lot to the bus area at Disneyland. We preferred to walk so we didn't have to time our comings and goings to the
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with our TripAdvisor Readers!  I am happy to read that you found the Candy Cane Inn to be such a value to your family.  I must agree that there are so many different options for hotel accommodations, but we pride ourselves of being clean, comfortable, providing great service, and of course being a great value for our guests.  Again, thank you for your review and we look forward to have you back again in the near future!

Summary Heading: After all the great reviews, maybe my expectations were too high!
Summary: Well, I think the Candy Cane Inn's charm is it is the closest hotel on the same side as Disneyland and the grounds themselves. Even though it is close, it is still an 8 - 10 minute walk, not exactly as close as it sounds on paper. They do have their own free tram which is nice; it runs every half hour. The place is very nice outside, cobblestones in the driveway, hanging plants all around. That's all nice but I was quite disappointed in the room. The carpet was stained, it just seemed like it needed an overhaul.  It was our honeymoon, and they did provide us with a welcome gift basket with cookies, but there were no rooms with one big bed, or true luxury that I was told of. It really didn't seem much better than other hotels. The bathroom to me seemed quite dated, it had old
Manager Response: Congratulations on your honeymoon!  I am sorry to read that we did not live up to your expectations of a romantic getaway.  We definitely understand that every guest’s definition of luxury is different.  Since most of our guests are families traveling to Disneyland, we at the Candy Cane Inn feature two queen sized beds in all of our rooms, with the exception of three king sized rooms which are disabled access.  The upgrade to our Premium room is designed to give our guests more options with breakfast being delivered to the room every morning, complimentary newspaper service daily, complimentary movie rentals, as well as guaranteed late checkout at 2pm.  Especially when the theme parks are busy, it can be nice to enjoy breakfast from the comforts of your room and take a little more time to checkout.  Thank you for sharing your experience with us.

Summary Heading: Still great, even after all these years
Summary: We recently returned from another great stay at the Candy Cane Inn. If you check our other reviews, you will see that we have stayed at numerous other properties this year, but we keep coming back to the Candy Cane Inn. Why, you may ask? Because it never really disappoints. The rooms have always been clean, and I am a clean freak. The staff who work there are good. The grounds are beautiful. The shuttle is convenient and a foot saver at the end of a long day at Disneyland. The breakfast saves us not only money, but time as well and as everyone knows, time is money at Disneyland.   There were a couple of hiccups during this trip, though. We were in room 137 and one of the beds was broken down. When my husband first brought this up to the woman who was working at the desk, she
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your comments with us.  I am so sorry to hear about the situation with the bed.  Many guests comment on the softness of our mattresses, as we feature Serta Presidential Double Pillow Top Mattresses, and it seems as if the Front Desk Agent misunderstood your concern.  Still there is no reason why they should not have noted your concern and had the bed checkout anyway.  I have discussed your concern with my Staff to ensure this will not happen again.  I am happy to know that you will be back and that you continue to be a loyal guest of the Candy Cane Inn.  The next time you are back to visit, please be sure to contact me directly for your reservations.  Thank you again for your comments and I look forward to hearing from you.  Warm regards!

Summary: We’re just back from a trip to Disneyland in Anaheim and stayed at the Candy Cane Inn this time.  We stayed there a few years back and it was nice, but have stayed elsewhere the last few trips for whatever reason.  The Candy Cane Inn was a refreshing change and was great.  They have very friendly staff and the rooms although on the slightly smaller side, are super clean.  The rooms are set back off the street so are very quiet considering proximity to Disneyland.  Unlike many other places these days near the park, parking is free and is not a problem.  The distance to Disneyland is walk-able, but after a day of standing on your feet and running around the park, they have a free shuttle between the Inn and the park.  We had a hard time getting a good internet connection, but it
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us on your recent visit and I am delighted that you decided to return to our Inn. Our Deluxe rooms are about 45 square feet larger and the additional space is certainly helpful with multiple guests. We are currently are in the process of upgrading our WIFI system with a dedicated line being installed by our service provider. This should be completed by early December and we have been assured that this will improve connectivity and speed. Kind regards!

Summary: We were able to book a last minute vacation and after reading the reviews for the surrounding hotels, The Candy Cane Inn seemed like the best choice. It was close, not across the street, but 1/4 mile walk away. They had free parking and a continental breakfast. We wanted to be able to walk back to the hotel to rest up if needed and they were close enough that I didn't even think about using their shuttle. For the price, I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us the opportunity to be of service on your recent visit. Yes, we do believe in providing the utmost of product and service with no hidden fees. Our Expanded Continental Breakfast, Exclusive Shuttle to the theme parks and Parking are all items included in our modest room rates. Thank you for your comments and feel free to contact me personally when returning as I would be delighted to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: So hard to pack up and leave...
Summary: We visit the CCI every October during our son's Fall Break...I so look forward to this trip. We stayed for 5 days last week and those 5 days flew by let me tell you.  Yes, we love Disneyland, but the CCI is the icing on the cake.  I honestly feel it's our second home.  Love the staff, (hi James!!), the pool area, the breakfast, the flowers, the comfy clean rooms and of course the proximity to Disneyland. One night we went up to the second floor and had a great view of the fireworks. You know you are a regular when you go to check in and they pull up your reservation without my even giving my name!! Thanks again to Jeff and his amazing staff...we are counting down the days until next October...  The Napoli/Twohig Family
Manager Response: It is certainly our pleasure to make you feel like the Candy Cane Inn is your second home! James and our team of service professionals are delighted in providing exceptional service in the spirit of hospitality. Again, thank you for your comments and see you on your next visit!

Summary: After a hiatus from staying at the CCI of several years and trying many other hotels when visiting the happiest place on earth, we decided to try out the CCI once again. Let me just say, this place is incredible. We are on our second of three nights currently and I have nothing bad to say. One caveat I need to disclaim, I typically stay at much more expensive and upscale hotels and during our hiatus, we stayed at Marriott, Sheraton and hyatt properties when in Anaheim. If you are going to Disneyland, there is not a hotel that offers the cleanliness convenience and atmosphere quite like CCI. This blend makes for the perfect stay. I can't say enough good about this property and the perfect niche it provides for the Disney going fanatic like myself
Manager Response: Thank you so much for returning and sharing your comments with fellow travelers. We strive in providing the utmost in quality, cleanliness and service while being cognizant of families travelling on a budget. We do appreciate your business and please feel free to contact when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: My husband and I travel to Disneyland about two or three times a year and always stay at the Candy Cane Inn. We stay in their premium rooms and we love the little extra touches they provide. They make the stay great from the themed welcome basket to our breakfast delivered every morning.   We love the whole atmosphere of the grounds with the bright colors and flowers throughout. And not to forget its only a quick walk right to the Disneyland park gates.  James at the front desk remembers us each time and makes us feel so welcomed. He takes the time to chat with us if he has the time and always has a smile on his face. We always look forward to catching up with him each visit. The rest of the staff is also very friendly from the housekeepers to the maintance personel.   We would
Manager Response: Thank you for being a loyal Candy Cane Inn guest, we DO appreciate your business. I too agree that our Premium Room with the additional services and touches are certainly worth the costs. Yes, James is a pleasant person and is our ambassador with new and return guests alike. Please feel free to contact me personally when making your next reservations as I would be delighted to assist with rates and it would be my pleasure. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Another Great Time at the Candy Cane Inn
