Summary: We stayed at the Candy Cane the week of the 21st of September 2011. We have stayed there before and it was as nice this time as it always is. We had the whole family there so we had three different types of rooms. All very clean and ver comfortable. I really enjoyed the company of the shuttle driver, I wish I could remember his name, the man deserves a raise. I will be staying at the Candy Cane again on my next trip. No suprises. I love it.
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us to be of service on your recent and past visits and I appreciate your kind comments regarding our property and staff. I am delighted that our team of drivers is very friendly and most have been with us for an extended amount of time. Again, thank you for your business and we look forward in seeing you on your next visit.

Summary: Firstly on a positive note - the rooms, locatilon, pool area, and hotel cleanliness are all very good. The breakfast was great, especially around the pool on warm mornings. On a negative note - there were 12 in our travelling group, spread over about 5 rooms and nearly every one of us had front desk issues with incorrect billing and taking out too much money from accounts (Travelex Cards). On complaint, the next day, the shift manager could not say the words 'sorry, we made a mistake', instead he made himself look like a total fool, in trying to cover up his staff's errors. I must say, he did it very well, but what a customer service error you made there - knowing that people review you! When a customer has printed proof that you charged them incorrectly, just admit it, fix it,
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed in this hotel during our visit to Disneyland. service is good, breakfast in the basket is such a treat and shuttle to Disney is on time reliable and so sweet drivers so friendly. receptionist are so helpful too. While waiting for our room we relax near the pool. easy parking too. Will definitely recommend this hotel. The kids got. Time of their life!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your stay!  I am delighted to read that you enjoyed the breakfast delivery feature of our Premium room, as well as the other amenities of the Candy Cane Inn.  I hope that when you plan your next trip to Disneyland that you will think of us!  Until then, warmest regards!

Summary: OK, I did a TON of research about where to stay in Anaheim while visiting Disneyland. The Disney resorts are nice but VERY expensive. The hotels down S. Harbour Boulevard range dramatically both in age and quality and veer towards the discount variety. But this little non-chain is simply the top of the heap.   The rooms are incredibly clean and well appointed...we upgraded to a deluxe room that included a delivered breakfast, welcome basket and a late checkout (worth it if you head to the parks on the day you check out) along with a microwave and mini-fridge. The breakfast is brought in a nice big basket and you can select all the items you prefer the night before. Each day it arrived exactly on time and had everything we requested and more (it is a continental but they have
Manager Response: Well, from the sound of things it seems that your research paid off!  I am very pleased to read that you enjoyed the features and amenities of our Premium room.  Breakfast delivery and extended checkout at 2pm are definitely added perks when traveling.  Also, thank you for your kind words about our staff.  They all work hard to ensure our guests are well taken care of and they enjoy their stay with us.  Lastly, I am glad to read that we were able to accommodate your request to park your vehicle with us.  This is a request we are always willing to accommodate, as long as we have ample parking to accommodate our new guests checking in.  Thank you again for your comments and we all look forward to serving you again in the near future!

Summary: This is one facility where you are guaranteed good service. We have stayed here several times and each visit is better than the one before. Everyone employed by this facility is friendly and helpful.   Wheelchair access, even in non wheelchair rooms, is very comfortable. Be sure to request first floor as there is no elevator. The staff is quick to respond to any request or issues that may arrise.   Location to Disneyland is amazing. The hotel backs what is the new Cars Attraction at California Adventure. Tower of Terror can be seen over the hotel. You know you are at Disney from the moment you wake.   Only drawback is this place does need a few more curb cuts for better access and some actual handicap parking would be beneficial as parking spaces are narrow making it difficult
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback!  I am delighted to read that my staff was helpful.  As my staff and I take pride in our service and we feel our service helps to distinguish our hotel from others.  In regards to your comment regarding parking, I definitely understand that during peak seasons, parking can be a challenge.  Due to the location of our disabled access rooms towards the rear of our hotel, our disabled parking spaces are also located to the rear of the property.  If at any time parking is a concern, my staff and I are always willing to make arrangements to assist you.  Thank you again for your comments and we look forward to your next stay with us.

Summary: Stayed here with my daughter for her 1st visit to Disneyland. Rooms are clean. Shuttle to Park is great but it's close enough where you can walk. Decent price.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us.  I hope that your daughter enjoyed her first visit to Disneyland.  With the Candy Cane Inn being around since 1957, it gives us great joy in seeing the faces of our guests who come to experience Disneyland for the first time.  I also hope that you enjoyed your stay with us and I am excited to have you back for your daughter’s second visit to Disneyland in the near future!

Summary: We spent 5 wonderful nights at the Candy Cane Inn.    We were very impressed with how clean & well maintained the hotel was.  The staff was very helpful and pleasant.  We had a standard room which wasn't large but worked just fine for our family of 4.    The pool area was always nice and clean.  Breakfast was served every morning pool side & that was a very pleasant way to start the day.  Breakfast was nothing fancy, but definitely adequate.  It was an easy walk to Disneyland.  Even with two children (ages 6 & 4) it only took us about 15 min. to get to the main gate.  We only took the shuttle one time but it was nice knowing it was there if needed.   This hotel is very cute & the grounds are just lovely.  No it's not fancy but it was clean, comfortable & lovely and to me that is
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Candy Cane Inn.  I am very pleased to read that you enjoyed your stay.  At the Candy Cane Inn, you can expect great service, clean and comfortable accommodations, with all the necessities to get you going on your way to enjoy Disneyland.  Thank you again for staying with us and I hope to see you back soon.

Summary: Great hotel, everything you need for a good base for Disneyland.  Good breakfast, followed by free shuttle to the park. All clean and well kept, pool area always seemed to be clean though it was a bit cold for us to use it. Had great fun here, we would definitely recommend this hotel
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us the opportunity to be of service on your recent visit to the theme parks. We do aspire to provide an exception product and quality service while keeping mind family travelers on a budget. One thing to note is that our pool, spa and children’s kiddie pool is heated year around for guest satisfaction. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Pleasant stay at Candy Cane Inn
Summary: Place was clean, nice grounds, walking distance to Disney, about 10 minutes, shuttle to disney every 30 minutes if you dont want to walk. Desk staff was very cool . Decent breakfast to start out the day, only thing they close it at 9am wish it was open until 10, but motivated us to get in gear.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your comments with fellow travelers. We ask our team to slow down their collecting and cleaning in the garden room following breakfast during busy times to allow guests to relax. Please feel free to contact me directly should you need assistance with future rates or reservations as I would be delighted to assist. Kind regards!

Summary: Ok, let me start out by saying I have a very big bug phobia so I went into the room and started turning the place upside down. I did find a VERY dead and VERY old and VERY crunchy bedbug in the seam of one of the beds. Unfortunately, my daughter crushed it so I had nothing to take to the front desk at 12am when we got there from Disney so we slept in the other bed (very scared) and left in the morning ASAP. I mentioned it to the man at the front desk in leaving and he appeared not to hear me as there were at least 6 other people waiting to check out.  Other than that, the room was spotless...breakfast ...ugh...parking..good...wifi..good.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and I appreciate your email response regarding the room where you stayed. I am very pleased to say that this room was thoroughly inspected without any findings or traces of infestation. We do follow a rigorous extermination program throughout our entire property based on our levels of business and our goal in providing quality accommodations. I am sincerely apologetic regarding this incident and have shared your comments with our teams at the front desk and housekeeping. In addition I do thank you for your kind comments regarding our cleanliness and other amenities. Kind regards!

Summary: Best thing about the hotel is location in relation to Disneyland and exterior area was well kept. Upon arrival my wife found hairs on the counter and bed and didn't feel that it was cleaned very well. Rooms were very humid and had to sleep with the windows open. Breakfast was simple and okay. Staff was friendly. It was also nice to park right next to the room.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and I am sincerely sorry that your guestroom was not cleaned to your expectation. I attempted to obtain information on the room number and sent an email through TripAdvisor without response. We strive in providing a clean and comfortable experience and I have covered your comments with our housekeeping team. In regards to being humid, all guestrooms have individual A/C units and are controlled by the guests of the room. Should you ever experience an issue please feel free to contact our front desk and it will be addressed immediately. Again, thank you for your business and comments.

Summary: We travel to Disneyland frequently and once we tried the Candy Cane Inn, we stopped booking at other hotels.  Hotels in Anaheim run the gamut between bare bones, dirty and uncomfortable and high-end luxury.  For us, Candy Cane is perfect.  The rooms are very clean and comfortable, the grounds are well cared for and garden-like.  The pool area is relaxed and pleasant.  The free continental breakfast is high-quality, unlike most in the area.  And since food cost a small fortune at Disneyland, eating a meal at the hotel saves us a bundle.  Each room also has a refrigerator.    The employees are courteous.  Candy Cane Inn has their own FREE, dedicated shuttle to and from Disneyland every half hour.    If you choose, you can book a premium room and your breakfast will be delivered to
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us the staying with us and sharing your feedback with fellow travelers. We do appreciate your business and kind comments regarding our property and services. Please feel free to contact me personally when planning your next visit as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Good location, friendly feel but slightly dated rooms
Summary: Great location 10 minutes walk to Disney. Hotel staff were lovely very friendly and helpful. Rooms are slightly dated, bathroom is very small but helps having the sink outside of the toilet/shower area. As a base to stay for Disney, perfect location and much better value than the Disney hotels.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. Our team does a wonderful job in providing friendly hospitality while being mindful of families who are budget conscious. Yes, we are a short 10 minute walk to the theme parks; however please be aware that we also offer our Exclusive Complimentary Shuttle. Kind regards!

Summary: I have stayed at all three Disney hotels . Looking for a great spot at a good price, look no further.  We upgraded to a room with breakfast delivery included. Order from a lovely menu the night before,pick a delivery time and breakfast comes to you. Fresh baked donuts and fruit,muffins,juice coffee milk, etc...something for everyone. Standard room has a buffet near the pool.  Rooms are clean and comfortable. We had a rollaway and it was an actual twin mattress. We moved the small table and put the extra bed against the wall and out of the way. All rooms face outside parking lot, no interior hallways. Parking was included in room rate.Staff were super helpful.  The grounds are tidy and clean. The shuttle is super easy to use,however some days we just  walked, as it was about 8
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your comments with fellow travelers. I tend to agree that our Premium Rooms are certainly a value with the additional size, amenities and services. Our gardeners and housekeeping team do an exceptional job in maintaining our property and its pristine and serene atmosphere. Again, thank you for your business, we DO appreciate and strive to exceed our guests expectations. Kind regards!

Summary: Took my daughter as we do every year to Disney for her Birthday.  For her 15th Birthday we stayed at the GRAND CALIFORNIAN which is in the CALIFORNIA GREAT ADVENTURE PARK.  Needless to say I was not too impressed being with the cost for a nightly stay, there were really not many perks.  The room was nothing special,  the first day I couldn't use the hotel entrace to the park until I went to the main gate and processed my tickets..a pain as this was the perk I was going for!    So this time I looked around and found this lovely motel.  It is really a nice place and very reasonable.  I had money to spend on other things than on a room at a fancy hotel that wasn't all that fancy at the resort.  Candy Cane Inn is so close that you can walk.  They also have the shuttle that is so
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us the opportunity to be of service on your recent visit and celebrating Sara’s 16th birthday. I am delighted that you enjoyed your visit and thank you for the kind comments. Please feel free to contact me personally when planning your next visit as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Great location and a nice place to stay
Summary: We spent four nights at Candy Cane Inn and enjoyed our stay.  The room was clean, beds comfortable and overall our experience was good.  Close enough to walk to Disneyland, but with the shuttle there's no need to.  Continental breakfasts were helpful and they had a nice selection of items.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and we appreciate your comments here on TripAdvisor.

Summary: My family and I stayed here in 2009 after reading hundreds of hotel reviews. It seemed that the Candy Cane Inn was the most reliable hotel in the area.  Well.....After spending 5 days in Disneyland and Sea World, we got home and the kids kept on talking about how great the Candy Cane Inn was! So we booked it again for our trip this past May and we were not dissapointed. It was another great stay. The rooms are immaculate, the staff are friendly, the flora is gorgeous and location to Disneyland is awesom...8 minute walk. We love this place and will definately be back!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for being a loyal repeat Candy Cane Inn guest, we DO appreciate your business and the kind comments! Please feel free to contact me personally when planning your next visit as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: We booked just one night at the Candy Cane Inn because we had a dinner reservation at the Napa Rose Restaurant in the Grand Californian that night. We had been on vacation north of LA and we traveled to San Diego the following day. The Inn’s shuttle bus that runs to and from Disneyland every 30 minutes was right on time and worked very well for us. Free parking was another attraction for us. But we are glad that we only had one night here because the beds were not very comfortable. There was sufficient room for the two of us for a night but storage space is very limited and I cannot imagine a family of 3 or 4 spending more than 2 days maximum comfortably at the Candy Cane Inn. The breakfast was very simple; cereals, bagels and toast (I think,) yogurt, bananas and beverages. We
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us the opportunity to be of service on your recent visit. I am sincerely sorry that you did not rest comfortably on our Serta Double Pillow Top Presidential Suite Mattresses. We receive many positive compliments on these mattresses and while this is certainly a preference item I appreciate and respect your comments. Again, we do appreciate guest’s feedback and will certainly take into consideration. Warm regards!

Summary: When we arrived we thought it looked more like a motel than a hotel but overall we were very impressed with this hotel. Location perfect for Disney, the pool area was lovely and the staff were friendly. It's worth asking about price of upgrade for bigger room as it was only 3 dollars a night for us and premium rooms get breakfast delivered to the room and are a but bigger. The bathrooms are a bit basic and small but for the price (around 140 dollars a night) we thought it was good value. Lots of restaurants in walking distance in addition to Disney ones - we had a great meal at cheesecake factory 10 mins away!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your comments with fellow travelers. Our Premium Rooms are $30 more per night than the Deluxe Rooms and offer many features and amenities. The addition of the Anaheim Gardenwalk with many dining options has been a great addition to the area and just across the corner and not a block walk. Please feel free to contact me personally should you be returning as I would be delighted to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: My husband and I were running the Disneyland Half Marathon and were looking for a nice, yet inexpensive place to stay, considering we were only visiting from Los Angeles. I booked the Candy Cane based on the reviews here on Tripadvisor and on Yelp. Everything delivered! Clean rooms, great rate, breakfast, walking distance to Disney (but they also had a convenient shuttle!) and the half marathon. Best of all, the people who worked at the Candy Cane were all very friendly, accommodating, and nice. We didn't get to use the pool, but it looked clean and inviting. My only complaint would be that the beds were too soft. We don't often need to stay in Anaheim, but if we do the half marathon again, we will be staying at the Candy Cane Inn. Also, we will recommend the hotel to all of our
Manager Response: Congratulations for participating in the Disneyland Half Marathon!  Also, thank you for all your kind words about our hotel.  I am very pleased to read that you enjoyed your stay and I thank you again for recommending us.  I hope that we will have you back again soon and of course please feel free to contact me if you need assistance with Reservations.

Summary Heading: Five star magic on Disney doorstep
Summary: Over the years we've stayed in a number of Anaheim hotels many of which have been very good. Having noted that the Candy Cane always appeared near the top of tripadvisor ratings and given its location practically in the parking lot of Disneyland we took the Candy Cane option this time around. We will never stay anywhere else again!  First up is location, location, location. It doesn't even require the crossing of any busy road to get to Disneyland. Nevertheless the hotel sees fit to provide a FREE shuttlebus (other hotels use buses that require payment and the cost adds up for families staying over a few days) every half hour. Despite thinking that we'd have no need of it we did use it, especially trudging slowly out of Disneyland at midnight with two sore feet and two sore
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your most recent trip to the Candy Cane Inn.  I am delighted to have read that you enjoyed your stay with us.  I must agree with you that our breakfast can get busy right before 9am when we prepare to close.  Please be aware that we do provide breakfast trays in all of our rooms and you are always more than welcome to take your breakfast items back to your room to enjoy.  Also, I am glad to know that you were able to utilize your Rewards Certificate for your second stay.  I hope that you will be able to take advantage of our Rewards program and visit us again soon.  If I can be of any assistance, please do not hesitate to contact me personally as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: Came here to celebrate our oldest daughters graduation. Stayed 3 days here and 2 days at the Grand Californian. The stay was much more enjoyable here. The kids love the pool. Our annual passes were blocked out the day we arrived so we spent the day and night swimming. The in room breakfast for the premium rooms is well worth it. We have stayed here too many times to recall. There is a reason we return. Grounds are always clean and staff very friendly.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: best hotel by disneyland and better with edd
Summary: this is the best hotel by disneyland the last time i stayed there i had a hotel room on the left side 2 floor and had a different view of the fireworks with the tower of terror in the for ground and Edd said something funny to me when i was washing my cloths he said i will buy you breakfast
Manager Response: none

Summary: Stayed here for 3 nights in early august!  Nice and cosy.  Though our room is located on the 1st floor and in front of the laundry room, it wasnt noisy as i would have expected.  Room furnishing is basic and of reasonable size. Breakfast choice had been the same throughout our stay...it will be good if they can add in more varieties! Friendly service, esp the shuttle bus drivers that fetch the guests to/fro disneyland.  Walking distance to the Disneyland can be quite tiring, esp with little children or after a day in disneyland.  mini-mart and a 7-11 are located just next to the hotel, and couple of restaurants across the street.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your comments with our Trip Advisor Readers.  I wanted to let you know that I have taken your comment regarding our breakfast into consideration and have discussed this item with our team.  I hope that you all will be back again in the near future.  Until then, warm regards!

Summary Heading: Another great stay at the Candy Cane
Summary: Husband & I made our yearly pilgrimage from hot, boring Arizona to Anaheim to go to Disneyland & Newport Beach for a few days. Didn't think twice about staying anywhere else, the choice was clear. As usual the room rate was cheaper than other comparable hotels in the area as we stayed during the week instead of on the weekend. Free parking is always a good thing, & breakfast was good but a bit crowded.  Having a fridge in the room is a huge plus as well. A few minor complaints: when my husband & I went back to our room to take a nap in the afternoon, there was quite a bit of noise as people were cutting the palm trees right outside our room. Recommend bringing a box fan and/or earplugs to block out noise if you want to rest during the day. Dark spots on the carpet in front of
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Candy Cane Inn should be #1 on tripadvisor
Summary: Why stay anywhere else?   We were able to check in at 7am. That was great especially since we traveled from Hawaii with 3 tired kids. The check in process was so fast and the staff was very friendly. We had a rental car and was able to park it nearly in front of our hotel room.  The room has everything you need. Nice tv, fridge, safe, and clean bedding. We had a ground floor room near the pool. I recommend getting a ground floor room just because its seems more accessible. Save yourself from having to climb stairs. You will walk plenty inside the park.  Morning breakfast is awesome. They had everything you need to get your day going. I really liked the bagel toaster. For my preference I run my bagel through it twice. I like it crispy. You may want to get there a little early so
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us the opportunity and certainly agree with you when you say that memories are priceless.  We do all that we can to ensure our guests are comfortable and satisfied.  I am delighted to read that my staff was able to accommodate you with an early check-in and that you enjoyed the features and amenities of our hotel.  Also, thank you for your tip!  In N Out is definitely a favorite of many and a must see if you are visiting the Southern California area!  Hope to see you back again soon!  Regards!

Summary: We just spent 4 nights at the Candy Cane Inn and it was our first stay there. We originally had reservations at the Carousel Inn but switched to the Candy Cane Inn based on several bad reviews of the Carousel. The location was great, a 9 minute walk from our room to the Disneyland turnstiles.  There are a few closer places to stay but they are rated much lower by guests. They have a nice breakfast and you can park close to your room. The pool is small but nice in the afternoon heat. The grounds are very quaint and well taken care of.   Our only complaint about the Candy Cane Inn is about their bedding. The sheets are not high quality. We buy nice sheets and we like to stay in nice hotels so were surprised to have such poor sheets at such a highly rated motel. Would the sheets
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and providing your valuable feedback.  I am happy to know that you enjoyed our services, and be assured that I have discussed your bedding comment with my Director of Housekeeping, linen and chemical suppliers.  We do listen to our guests and certainly appreciate the perspective of their comments.  Again, thank you for your time and please feel free to contact me personally as I would be delighted to assist you with rates and reservations. Kind Regards!

Summary Heading: Charming hotel a short walk from Disneyland main gate
Summary: We have stayed at the Candy Cane a few times and it is a little gem. It has elaborate landscaping ,comfortable and quiet rooms, prompt and friendly service and very reasonable prices. We like the deluxe rooms which come with  a welcoming bucket of goodies, delivery to your door of the complimentary breakfast, and late checkout. The free shuttle to the park runs every 30 minutes or it is just a short walk.  My only suggestion for improvement is to update the weak WiFi service but the front desk says that is in the works.  Two convenience stores are next door and many restaurant choices are within a few blocks.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing you feedback with us.  I am happy to read that you enjoyed your stay.  I do understand that internet has proven to be a challenge, but I would like to share with you that we are currently in the process of upgrading our internet service to fiberoptics.  This should be a big help to ensure the stability of our internet service.  Unfortunately, even with an upgrade this will not solve 100% of all issues with the internet.  Due to personal settings and configuration, there can be many variables that could be preventing guests from getting online.  You are always more than welcome to bring your device to our Front Desk and we would be more than happy to try and assist you.  Again, thank you for your feedback and we look forward to your return to the Anaheim area!

Summary: we stayed 3 nights 4 days it is located near 7-11 store and places to eat  are across the street and disneyland is located down the street  so if you want to walk to disneyland   you can or take the hotel shutter bus like we did .the rooms were nice i give it a 8 the service a 8 the pool area i give it a 6 it a bit to small for me the t.v is outdated  but we spent our time at disneyland i  recommend is hotel  .
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with and sharing your feedback with fellow travelers. We do appreciate your business and you taking time to provide us with your comments and thoughts. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: This is our third time at Candy Cane
Summary: We first found this Inn in 1991 and wouldn't stay anywhere else in Anaheim, it is very pretty. It's an ideal family Inn which provides an excellent choice of continental breakfast food included in the reasonable price they charge. The rooms provide comfortable accommodation, with 2 Queen beds, a vanity area and a small bathroom. There is a small but well designed pool area which includes a smaller pool for children, a larger pool and a jacuzzi. This provides a welcome cool down after a hot day at the theme parks. There is a laundry room which, if like us you are travelling around America for some time, comes in very handy. It's ideally placed for Disneyland and California Adventure Park which are about a 10 minute walk away, although there is a shuttle bus if you don't want to
Manager Response: Thank you for being a loyal repeat Candy Cane Inn guest, we DO appreciate your business and kind comments. We do aspire to be a clean, comfortable and well maintained property with exceptional customer service. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations. Warm regards!

Summary: great value and very close to disney and surrounding eateries like subway, pizza place and panda express. regular shuttle bus to disney. nice pool and hot tub. clean rooms -good breakfast, would recommend.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your feedback with fellow travelers. We do appreciate your business and recommendations. Kind regards!

Summary: my husband and my 2 boys stayed for 3 nights so we could visit disneyland, the location was great we could easily walk to disneyland or take the free of charge shuttle which was great after a long day queing and walking around. The breakfast by the pool was good, included cereal, coffee, juice, muffins, toast with spreads and fresh bananas and apples this was a great way to start the day and was great to reduce the cost of feeding our 2 hungry boys, my only gripe would be the use of disposable/plastic utensils and cutlery which I found quite wasteful, but considering we ate around the pool perhaps safety was their major concern. I would absolutey recommend this accomodation to families
Manager Response: I am delighted to read that you and your family enjoyed your recent visit to our Inn. I do understand your concern regarding our breakfast utensils and yes safety is a major concern. If anything is broken around the pool we must close the pool to completely investigate for the well being of our guests. Thank you again for your visit and we do appreciate your comments.

Summary: The location couldn't be more perfect, a short walk to Disney even though they do offer a free shuttle service.  You could easily drive past this place but once inside it is quaint, quiet with a great ambience.  It is surrounded by lush flowers and greenery.  Very affordable, with a complimentary breakfast, swimming pool and hot tub.  You are soon away from the craziness of Disney
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us the opportunity on your recent visit to the theme parks. We appreciate your kind comments regarding the quaint and quiet ambiance and surroundings. Our in-house gardeners have been with us for many years and do just a beautiful job on the greenery. Again, we appreciate your business and please feel free to contact me personally should you be returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations. Warm regards!

Summary: The Candy Cane Inn is so close to Disneyland!  We had a great stay.  The front desk was very helpful.  We had a few changes that needed to be made due to an extra guest but everyone was very helpful.  The breakfast was good and helped us save a lot of money.  I will choose Candy Cane Inn again the next time we go to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us the opportunity and I appreciate you sharing the comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. Please feel free to contact me directly when returning as I would be delighted to assist with reservations.

Summary Heading: Good Quality for What it is...
Summary: My Husband and I stayed at the Candy Cane Inn for the first time this past weekend.  I did a lot of research leading up to my Birthday trip to Disney and settled on the CCI due to the ratings on tripadvisor and other sites.  I am glad I chose this hotel and do feel like I would return, however there were a few things that were great, and a couple that stunk.  First off, the check in process stinks!  Since we planned to go to California Adventure the day we checked in, we requested early check-in.  Now I know that sometimes they can't honor these requests, but at least honor them in order of when the person arrives to check in!  We had to call from disney 3 times to check and see if a room was available.  That was annoying.  Jessica at the front was not helpful at all and didn't
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and providing this valuable feedback on your recent visit. We do listen to our guests and I personally apologize for the service extended by our front desk and I have reviewed with our Front Office Manager. In regards to the refrigerator we have engineering on property that will attend to items as reported. I hope you had an enjoyable birthday and are delighted that you enjoyed your cookies and personalized card. Please feel free to contact me when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: Our family of four stayed for two night to attend Disneyland, which is just a walk of about 10 minutes away. The area features a ton of lodging options and most are utilitarian since most guests will spend most of their time at Disneyland so we were just expecting the basics, a clean and use-able room and a place to keep our car.  So I wasn't  concerned when we arrive a few minutes before check-in and our room wasn't ready. Nor was I upset when the room's fridge wasn't working. I didn't get angry when we found a plastic wrapper by the bed, one bed that lacked a sheet and another that had a sheet that was too small for the mattress — all those problems were corrected when brought to the attention of hotel staff.  I even didn't get  when we requested a wake-up call -- an essential
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and I appreciate your feedback regarding your visit and wish we could have discussed this personally. I attempted and sent you an email via the TripAdvisor system and with no response I wanted to reply to your comments. We certainly do care and listen to all guests and take necessary steps to eliminate items from reoccurring. I sincerely apologize for the situation regarding the parking of your vehicle and have discussed in-depth with our team as we must honor commitments and I regret this was not done. Again, thank you for taking the time to bring this to my attention as exceptional customer service and delivering a quality product are items the Candy Cane Inn has built its reputation on. Kind regards.

Summary Heading: We  enjoyed the stay, will go back gain.
Summary: It  is a beautiful independent hotel. It was clean and comfortable. Services are great too.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your feedback with fellow travelers. We do appreciate your comments and thank you for your business as it is most appreciated. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Clean hotel, but for the price and better customer service..,go across the stree
Summary: While the rooms were clean they were not overally large and the pool was very small. While staying our first night, we found a hotel across the street for lilterally half the cost ( we were staying for 5 nights), that has an Olympic size pool, bigger rooms ( 1.5 times bigger) and just as clean. More importantly, the customer service recieved across the street was 10 times better. Just to clarify, the c.s. at Candy was great from the front line staff, however, the hotel manager-who refused to provide any information, has never attended any type of training obviously. We have never been treated like that before, and did what was best-informed the GM, ( Jeff). Not sure if the manager was reprimanded or not, but i was appalled at the behavior.  Again, the front line staff was very
Manager Response: I sincerely apologize for the handling of this incident and please rest assured this was discussed in length as to clarification and handling of guests departing early. You were misinformed by the front desk agent and for this I am deeply sorry and training has been provided. In regards to rates offered by other properties we feel that we must maintain price integrity that is fair based on the level of maintenance of our facility and the services provided to our guests. Thank you again for bringing this to my attention and I wish you a delightful day.

Summary: After a negative review about 2 years ago due to the hotel charging the wrong card and taking no responsibility, we chose to stay at the Candy Cane again when we visited in October 2010. Because of the previous complaint, they gave us one free night as well as our returning guest discount, and AAA... obviously enough discounts to convince me to try them again.   We had a fantastic stay and they proved to me that truly what I experienced the first time was just a mix up and not the norm. The hotel is always clean and fresh. Free parking, free breakfast (cereal, yogurt, fruit, juice, muffins) and free shuttle. They are close enough to Disneylands front gate that you can easily walk but after a long day in the park, it's nice to catch the shuttle. They earned their 5 star rating
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us the opportunity to restore your confidence in our Inn. I am delighted that your stay was enjoyable; please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would by my pleasure to assist with reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: This hotel was right next to the Disneyland property.  In fact the back of Tower of Terror appears almost next to the hotel.  Not a bad walk to the front gate and there is a shuttle that runs frequently as well. During our trip we visited Knott's Berry Farms, which was a short drive from the Candy Cane Inn. The hotel is clean and our kids loved the pool. The included in price breakfast was very good (muffins, cereal,fruit, bagels,etc).  The only opportunity was the crowded parking lot and the longer than unusual lines for the breakfast areas. Both just may have been timing on our part. The staff was friendly.  We enjoyed being able to see some of the Disneyland fireworks from the 2nd floor walkway.  Definitely would recommend this hotel and would stay there again if in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your experience with our TripAdvisor readers.  I am very pleased to read that you enjoyed your stay.  I am sorry though that you experienced challenges with parking and line for breakfast.  Just as a suggestion, we recommend that our guests join us for breakfast early.  During the later hours of our breakfast service, things tend to get busy.  Also, for the convenience of our guests, we do offer trays in our rooms that allow you to enjoy breakfast from the comfort of your own room.  In regards to parking, during peak seasons, our parking can get busy.  If there is ever a time where you are having difficulty finding parking, please let our Front Desk know and we will be more than happy to assist you with finding a space.  Thank you again for your feedback and I look forward to having you back again in the near future.

Summary: It was a first time stay for us at the Candy Cane Inn.  Stayed a total of 4 nights.  Similar to a previous review, it was a good place to stay but nothing special.  I don't think that we overpaid and think the quality is commensurate with what we paid.  Having said that, it is a place we would consider returning to again.  We had to wait an additional 30 mins to check into our room because it had not yet been cleaned (this was after the 3 pm check-in time).  We waited in the breakfast room while they made up our room.   The room was on the first floor;  it had 2 queen beds.  It was not very large as it barely fit a small table w/2 chairs and the tv entertainment center which also housed 3 dresser drawers and the in-room safe.  If this was a deluxe room, I was questioning what a
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Perfect price, perfect location and friendly service
Summary: A short walk from Disney, with it's own shuttle, this little gem was just perfect for us. A great place to stay when your focus is making the most of your time at the park!  There is no room service but there are convenience stores next door and lots of restaurant on Harbour Boulevard and at Downtown Disney.  Lots of little extra touches - free wifi, reception printed our boarding passes free of charge etc. Really makes such a difference!  Keep up the great service, guys!! :)
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback!  It is wonderful to know that the extra touches made a difference to you.  We understand that there are many options in regards to hotels, but we believe that the extra touches are what separate's us from the rest.  Thank you again for your feedback and for staying with us.  If your travels ever bring you back to the Anaheim area, please do not hesitate to contact me for reservations!

Summary: We came to Disneyland for my Grandson to propose to his girlfriend. Went on Space Mountain and then when they got off, he went down on one knee and proposed to her.  It was very exciting and lots of fun. The family.....My daughter, Grandma,  sons girlfriend 1 room Grandson wife 2 great grandsons another grandson 1 room Grandson and fiance another room Every one is so nice there, and helpful and friendly. We will be back again for sure!!!!!     :o)
Manager Response: We are honored that you decided to stay with us at the Candy Cane Inn to experience this unforgettable moment in your Grandson’s life.  We hope that this will turn into a tradition for your family and you all will be back again celebrating this wonderful occasion.  If you ever need assistance with reservations, please feel free to contact me.  Until then, congratulations and best wishes to your Grandson and his fiancé.

Summary: Have stayed at the Candy Cane for the last many years during an annual trade show.  Close to the convention centre and right next to Disney too.  Clean, MASSIVE rooms, accessible to everything.  Wouldn't bother staying anywhere else...even on the company dime!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Nothing bad, nothing special, other nearby places are better
Summary: We have gone to Disneyland several times, and since we spend all waking hours on the go our hotel room isn't very important to us on these trips. So an "average" place is all we really need. That said, the Candy Cane Inn was the definition of "average", but the price was actually a bit higher than nearby places I would consider comparable (like a couple Best Westerns on Harbor Blvd).  On the positive side, the Candy Cane Inn is two long blocks from the main entry to the parks, and they run a shuttle that goes round trip every 30 minutes all day long (opening to close). So if you want some transportation to and from the park - maybe really young kids who are going to collapse after a day of walking, or an older couple who want some options - the shuttle is a very good perk.  On
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your comments with us.  I was disappointed to read that you felt our hotel was average.  My staff and I strive to ensure quality accommodations for our guests, providing a complimentary shuttle, breakfast and fruit items delivered fresh daily, as well as other complimentary features and amenities. While I do understand that everyone’s definition of comfort is different, we are always willing to do what is necessary to ensure our guests are satisfied and taken care of.  If there is anything else I can do to assist you, please do not hesitate to contact me.

Summary: We chose the Candy Cane Inn because of the good reviews, the reasonable rates, and the close proximity to Disneyland.  When we arrived, we were immediately impressed with the quick, professional and friendly service at check-in.  The rooms were large with two queens (very comfy mattresses and pillows) plus room enough for a play and pack supplied by the hotel for our grandson.  Once settled, we enjoyed an afternoon lounging around the lovely heated pool and hot tub, and played with our grandson in the perfect sized  kid's pool.   The hotel conveniently stocked Disney Park Hopper Passes which we were able to purchase for a good rate. The walk to Disneyland only took fifteen minutes, however, for tired feet the hotel offered a continual shuttle service back and forth to Disneyland
Manager Response: Thank you for telling us about your stay.  I am so pleased to read that everything during your stay was to your liking.  Also, I must agree with you that our employees are our secret to making the Candy Cane Inn successful.  We definitely understand that if we take care of our staff, our staff will take care of our guests.  Thank you again for staying with us and I look forward to seeing you back again in the near future.

Summary: This place treats you like family, not like a chain motel. The staff is friendly and accommodating, breakfast is great and they have a great shuttle service that functions like clockwork. Best place to stay if your going to Disneyland....Nice pool and Jacuzzi too.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Our family stayed at the Candy Cane Inn for three nights in the middle of our southern California vacation.  This was our third visit to Disneyland but our first visit to the Candy Cane Inn after staying at another location on the previous visits.  We were all happy with our choice of the Candy Cane Inn.  The property is located beside Disneyland.  They provide a free shuttle that leaves every hour if you dont feel like making the ten minute walk to Disneyland.  We used the shuttle only once since the location of the hotel was so close.  The rooms were clean and comfortable.  The property provides a free continental breakfast and has a swimming pool, as well as free WiFi.  If you plan to spend nearly all your day at Disneyland the Candy Cane Inn would be an ideal choice.
Manager Response: none

Summary: There are many reviews addressing all aspects for The Candy Cane Inn.  It is a wonderful property.  For our family , the room was perfect and well appointed.  I was really pleased with how quiet things were, even being across from the pool.  In addition, the location for Disneyland visitors is OUTSTANDING.  Being able to walk to DL or DCA and never cross Harbor Drive was worth the price alone.  I feel The Candy Cane Inn is a spectacular property  that is charming and family owned.  STAY HERE....we will again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I was at the Candy Cane on business for 4 nights. The room and bathroom were both very spacious and well equipped. The only negatives, in a ground-floor room, were the very noisy people upstairs and the fact that you had to keep your blinds shut at all times for privacy reasons. The hotel's grounds were beautiful and immaculately kept. The staff was extremely friendly and helpful. The clientele was a nice mixture of business visitors and families. Breakfast, either indoors or in the swimming pool area, was nice and plentiful, with bread and pastries, fruit, hot and cold drinks. The hotel is within easy walking distance of the convention centre and is served by the various bus and shuttle services to the airport and other tourist destinations. It also has a small gym.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed here for one night, and it was great.  The room was nice, and stocked with some snacks (popcorn, cookies and water) which was a nice treat.  Most people are getting in with kids and you know they are all about snacks after a car ride!  There is a shallow kiddie pool which was great for our 3 year old - she loved it.  The bigger pool was great too, except there was WAY too much chlorine.  My son's eyes were on fire!  I will warn you there is NO elevator, so either request a ground floor or be prepared to haul your luggage up a flight of stairs.  Overall, I was very pleased with the hotel layout, cleanliness, staff, and amenities.  Easy walk into Disneyland too, as well as a bunch of places to eat.  We live in San Diego, so this is going to be our "go to" hotel when we
Manager Response: none

Summary: After reading many reviews and speaking with a good friend who frequents Disneyland, we easily narrowed down our choices to the CCI and Best Western Anaheim Inn.  Even though the CCI was about $40 more, the rave reviews, complimentary breakfast, and quaint pool area enticed me to reserve our room at CCI.  I have stayed at the Grand Californian twice and while the hotel and grounds are beautiful, the rooms are small and very standard.  I quite preferred the rooms at CCI to the GC and the walking distance to DL is the same.  We arrived too early for check-in but they gave me a parking pass and allowed me to leave my rental car on property.  We hopped on the very clean and air-conditioned shuttle and arrived at the main gate in less than 10 minutes.  While at at the park, I was
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Another Great Experience at the Candy Cane Inn
Summary: This is the second time we have stayed at the Candy Cane Inn.  With the proximity to Disneyland, and the free shuttle service every 30 minutes, this location cannot be beat!  Ameneties include: Free parking, free continental breakfast, in-room refrigerator, free shuttle to Disneyland Resort, swimming pool, hot tub, and gorgeous courtyard.  The staff at check in and check out where courteuos and efficient.  After a long day at Disney, the beds are comfortable, and the rooms are quiet.  We will be back!!!
Manager Response: none

Summary: While planning our trip to California I Googled hotles near Disneyland. I clicked on the first link and was directed to Candy Cane Inn. It look very nice, price was great, and the reviews were good, so I checked to see if they had any rooms avalible and we were in luck! We booked a room, got the conformation email in no time, and we were all set. When we arrived at Candy Cane Inn our mind's were blow at the sight of all the breath taking plants and flowers. When we walking into the lobby the staff was super friendly and extremely helpful. Our room was clean, bed were comfy, water hot, the A/C worked great, and their breakfast was delicous. The hotel was so close to Disneyland it was almost unbelieveable. We were able to walk to Disney and on a nice sidewalk. We stayed four days
Manager Response: none

Summary: This was our second time to stay at the Candy Cane Inn. This time I brought my sister and her family. Prior to our stay I emailed and asked that our rooms be close to one another. Our rooms were 209 and 210, can't ask for anything closer then that! The staff is very friendly and the front desk staff makes you glad you made reservations. Chris and Robert are very helpful, courteous and friendly, they made us feel important. I had a small problem with the sink draining in my room and Robert had it promptly corrected. Jeff give yourself a pat on the back as well as  all of your staff as they keep your guests returning. From the lovely cleaning ladies to the shuttle bus drivers. This was my 4th visit to Disneyland and the last 2 stays have been with the Candy Cane Inn. If my kids
Manager Response: none

Summary: The Candy Cane is a quaint hotel. It is well-kept, has the amenities one needs, and is a great choice in my opinion for travelers, especially those with kids. It is not fancy, but it is nice. They serve a light, complimentary breakfast consisting of fruit and pastries and drinks. They have a free bus that leaves every 30 minutes, thought the park is literally next door to the hotel. We walked from our door to the GATES into the park in under 10 minutes, but we walked briskly. However, the shuttle is SUPER handy! For me, hotels near Disney are about 2 things: comfort and location, and the Candy Cane has both. Also, they are the most hospitable staff I have ever come across. I will never stay anywhere else!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Third stay at Candy Cane Inn, always good.
Summary: This was our third time at the Candy Cane Inn. We contemplated staying somewhere else this time just to try something different but after much research decided that we would stick with what we know and we weren't disappointed. The Candy Cane is a great family hotel, it is clean and well run and a great base for a visit to Disneyland. The rate includes a great breakfast which you can eat by the pool, free wifi internet, free parking, guest laundry, fitness room and free shuttle bus to and from Disneyland.  When we made our booking I requested a room at the front of the hotel so I could be sure of reliable internet connection as I have an online business that I need to attend to daily. We had stayed further back in the hotel last time and did have a few problems connecting, I had
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Second visit and still as great as the first time
Summary: This was our second trip to the Candy Cane Inn and it was just as great as the first. We upgraded to a Premium room again and it is well worth it. We all loved the breakfast basket idea. It works really well you simply pick what you want from the list and then leave the order on your door before you go to bed. The basket is then delivered at your chosen time the follwoing morning. Breakfast in bed all round.  The hotel is ideally located a very short walk from Disney or if you prefer the hotel runs a shuttle bus service. The rooms are always clean and have all of the essentials and a few good extras. Our daughter loved the microwave popcorn.  The pool is small but ideal for cooling down after a hot day in the parks. We also took advantage of the onsite washers and dryers.  Will
Manager Response: none

Summary: My favorite off property hotel for our Disney visits.  We've been staying here for many years.  Love the property, so pretty, the dedicated shuttle, the free breakfast and the proximity to Dland.  I will say that the rooms have gotten a little worn over the years, to be expected, but would love it even more with a remodel.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Second Stay ,just as good as first
Summary: This was our second stay at the Candy Cane and we really enjoyed it! We travelled with our three kids... We loved the breakfast every morning. The breakfast room tables are usually full, but we enjoyed sitting beside the pool better. The breakfast consisted of toast,, bagels with cream cheese,muffins, donuts pastries, fruit, hot cereal and cold breakfast bar with many choices for the kids. Juices, Milk, Coffee, Tea, Hot chocolate.  We like to get going earlier in the morning-so this was great! Enough choices for everyone! We enjoyed the walk (about 10-15 minutes) Disneyland. We also used their shuttle if we were going around the time they were leaving. I believe it leaves on the hour and pick up from disneyland was on the half hour? The drop off and pick up are close to Harbour
Manager Response: none

Summary: We returned for the third time to celebrate our son's 11th birthday and our long-awaited honeymoon- had a great stay! We enjoyed the pool, free breakfast and parking, and great service. Loved coming back to the hotel to celebratory cards and cookies from the manager! Thank you, Jeff! We will be sure to return on our next trip to Disneyland!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Stayed here with family for a trip to Disneyland.  Booked the hotel on the basis of it being second highest rated on trip advisor, and paid what i felt was slightly above the odds and whilst it is a nice enough property i dont quite understand how it achieves this rating although it is extremely well located for Disney and offers a free shuttle.  The property is clean and well maintained and the staff were pleasant, especially the breakfast lady.  For the number of rooms, 60 something if i remember correctly, the breakfast area was somewhat cramped and busy with a fair bit of hanging about for tables as the majority of people probably arrived at approximately the same time every day.  The breakfast was ample, which a lot of people seemed to like, but was nothing overly special,
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Good value, good service, large rooms
Summary: We stayed for 3 nights in a deluxe room - it was very large for a family of 3 with 5 large suitcases. The beds were comfy with a range of pillows. The free breakfast was very good with a range of fruit, pastries, juice, and yoghurt (plus other stuff we didn't eat). The location was fine being a 10 minute walk from Disneyland, a mini-mart next door, and plenty of restaurants within a 5 minute walk. Like others, we appreciated the shuttle bust the end of the day for tired little 4yo legs. The pool, whilst small, is a refreshing option too.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with and I am happy that you enjoyed your visit. We do get many positive “comfy” comments on our Double Pillow Top Serta Presidential Mattresses. Yes, our Expanded Continental Breakfast has a wide variety and is certainly a nice way to start a busy day. Kind regards!

Summary: Just got back from a stay at the Candy Cane hotel.  Let me say, I did a ton of research on walking distance hotels.  For the time we were going, I had it narrowed down to 3:  The Fairfield Inn, Howard Johnson, and the Candy Cane.  They were all around the same price.  Before I could book, the Howard Johnson booked up.  The Fairfield looked really great, and had been recently remolded, but we didn't like that there wasn't an in room safe.  My husband carries a ton of electronics with him for work so a safe is a must.  After reading hundreds of reviews, we decided on the Candy Cane because it is ranked #2 on tripadvisor.     We have 2 toddlers, so cleanliness is a number one priority, along with quietness and proximity to the park.  The Candy Cane did not disappoint.  We loved it
Manager Response: I am delighted that you chose to stay with us and enjoyed your recent visit. Our housekeeping team does a wonderful job in maintaining our property at a pristine level and I too agree that cleanliness is extremely important while traveling, especially with little ones. I sincerely apologize that your refrigerator was turned off when you arrived and have covered this with our housekeeping team as they are to be set at mid temperature. Yes, guests enjoy our in-room safes and they are very easy to use as well and will accommodate a laptop as well. Thank you again for staying with us…we DO appreciate your business!

Summary Heading: So Glad we Chose this Hotel
Summary: We stayed here for 5 nights in June. Our room was a premium room , which meant that it was a bit more spacious and we could get breakfast delivered to our room.Perfect when you are setting the alarm for 6am so you can get to the Magic Morning at 7am. Just means you can relax a bit more and save time in the morning. We did use the shuttle on a couple of nights but mainly we walked to the park and back. The kids only had time to use the pool on the first day but it was very clean and they liked it. I chose this hotel based on its reviews and I am so glad that I did. It was great value, perfect location, very comfortable, clean, the staff were friendly and it had lots of nice little touches - fresh flowers, small fridge, complimentary bottled water, laundry room, free parking and
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. Yes, our Premium Rooms offer those touches that add to the experience and it is nice to have our Expanded Continental Breakfast delivered to your room. Please feel free to contact me personally when making your return plans as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations.

Summary: This is the place to stay!  I have tried all the other hotels/motels closest to Disneyland and this is the best one.  The entire property is very well maintained.  I even saw the workers scrubbing the curbs!   The walk to Disneyland is about 10 minutes along a well maintained sidewalk. We never took the shuttle, but it's there.  When we walked by the driver he would always ask us if we wanted a ride!   The hotel staff is very personable and pleasant.  The motel is not fancy, but for the rates, you can't get any better.  I have paid more for less in the Disneyland area.    If money is no issue, stay at the Grand Californian on Disney property (it's amazing).  If you don't want to spend $300-$500 per night, book this hotel now.
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us the opportunity to be of service on your recent visit to the Disneyland Theme Parks. Our team certainly does take maintaining our property with high regards and are friendly with guests. I thank you for your kind comments and we look forward in seeing you again on your next visit. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: I am not sure how this hotel could be so highly rated!
Summary: My family stayed here for two nights in July 2011, using it as a base for Disney at the end of our US tour. My wife and I had stayed there about 17 years ago and nit much appears to have changed!  Room was ok but basic and dated. Beds were soft. Breakfast was included but again nothing to write home about. Wifi was slow and no dedicated pc for customers to use when checking in for forthcoming flights. Pool small but adequate. Biggest selling point is its proximity to Disney. If there is a next time we would definitely look for a better hotel at the same (or lower) price. My recommendation - keep looking.
Manager Response: Thank you for responding to my email message regarding your comments. We do listen to our guests and I sincerely appreciate and thank you for taking the time to share your suggestions. We are currently working on a couple of the items you mentioned and these will assist our guests. I am delighted to inform you that we are adding a dedicated feed for our WIFI that will improve service drastically.  I have also been in contact with service providers regarding adding an internet kiosk/station in our lobby for guest convenience. Thank you again for your business and feedback!

Summary: We stayed here on the way back to NZ after a big trip around the northern hemisphere. It was the typical motel accommidation. Very helpful friendly staff, nothing flash, but just a nice place to stay especially for families. Good place for Disneyland , continental breakfast, swimming pool spa. Very clean rooms and grounds. Reasonable shopping near by Good access to LA and domestic & international airports
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your comments with our follower’s on TripAdvisor.  I am happy to read that you enjoyed your stay and I hope you will be back to visit us again soon.  Warm regards!

Summary: We stay here every time we visit Disneyland, and just love it.  The staff, especially James, are very helpful and friendly.  The breakfast is always fresh, the pool clean, the rooms welcoming.  A great place.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your feedback with our readers.  Our Staff and service are what makes our hotel so special.  With employees like James, we all strive to ensure that our guests do not feel like they are not just another person staying with us, but we hope they feel like family.  Again, thank for your wonderful comments about our hotel and we hope to have you back in the near future.

Summary: This is a pretty good hotel for the price its less than 15 minutes to the park and a convenient 7 eleven next door. This is my 5th time staying at the Candy Cane Inn and will definitely return. The only thing I can complain about is noisy children and teenagers playing in the pool till 11PM  making it very hard to sleep. Otherwise its a good quality hotel close to Disneyland with great breakfast.
Manager Response: Thank you for telling us about your most recent stay.  I am sorry to ready that you had a hard time sleeping.  With our pool hours until 11pm, it comes with mixed feelings.  I do know that a lot of our guests love the fact they can soak the tired feet in our spa and take a dip in our pool, while others find it disturbing.  If at any time you do find the noise levels to be of a disturbance, please do not hesitate to let our Front Desk know.  We want our guests to be able to enjoy the features and amenities of the hotel, but not at the cost of our guest’s rest.  Again, please accept my apologies and I assure you that we will be paying closer attention to this matter.  Thank you again for your comments and hope to have you back again soon!

Summary: I really liked the Candy Cane Inn, as everyone says, the location is great.   The rooms are comfortable, the pool is nice and the breakfast was tasty.   Couple of things, you sadly cannot get a good view of Disney fireworks from the hotel grounds, we waited in the pool area for the display and found that it was impossible to see them from there.   Also, the name of the hotel makes it seem like you are going to be at an over-the-top red-and-white stripped everything hotel. It seems like the name Candy Cane Inn, doesn't match the image of this hotel. (Thankfully!)   The staff were so helpful at the front desk, booking us transport to the airport and plus a day trip.   I really liked this place.
Manager Response: Thank you for telling us about your trip and I am happy to read that you enjoyed your stay.  I have to agree with you that it is difficult to see the fireworks from our pool.  Disney’s Hollywood Tower of Terror and other Disney structures do block a good portion of them.  But I am glad that you did enjoy our hotel’s features, amenities, and our staff was of great help to you.  We hope to have you back with us again in the near future.  If I can be of any assistance with your next reservations, please do not hesitate to let me know.

Summary: The Candy Cane Inn was the perfect location for our visit to Disneyland.   We walked the short distance to Disneyland and took the shuttle when we didn't feel like walking.   From outside our room we could hear noise coming from the room next door(baby crying, dog barking), but once we were in our room we didn't hear anything from the neighbors.  It was very quiet and we slept well. The pool was great, the breakfast was good and the staff was friendly.  Our room had a great view of the Disneyland fireworks. The free parking was an added bonus. I would recommend this hotel and would stay here again.
Manager Response: From what I read it looks like you all had a good time!  I was happy to learn that everything was to your satisfaction and that you even got a chance to see the fireworks from your room.  I hope that we have turned you all in to loyal fans of the Candy Cane Inn and you will be back soon!  If there is anything I can do to assist you with your future reservations, please be sure to let me know!  Until next time!

Summary Heading: Loved it reviews say it all
Summary: Stayed for 4 nights whilst doing the disney thing . Positon perfect short walk to main gate seven 11 next door and mini mart etc . Great staff , grounds immaculate . Very clean rooms and well appointed for price this place is a bargain . Pool was a hit with the kids** hint take goggles as they were in the pool for so long there eyes got sore Heavily chlorinated . Breakfast had a good choice  ( nice to see some fruit ! rare thing in the states ) would stay here again in fact my son says when are we going back to the candy cane Inn mum ? Free parking you may not get exactly in front of your room but at least its safe. Shuttle bus handy for tired little legs .
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your comments with us.  We do try to put a variety of items out for breakfast and I am happy to read that you enjoyed them.  I was disappointed to read how sore your eyes were from the pool.  I want to let you know that I spoken with our Maintenance Team, as well as our Pool Service to ensure the pool is not overly chlorinated.  They have checked and assured me that the chlorine levels are at the specified levels required by our County Health Department.  But as your son says, I hope you will be back with us again soon.  Thank you again for your comments and we look forward to your return.

Summary: The Candy Cane Inn has become our new Disneyland tradition.  The staff is extremely friendly and helpful. Rooms are not overly large but are clean, well maintained, and quiet (we've never had problems hearing noise from other rooms).  The breakfast is very nice, with a good selection of pastries, breads, cereals, yogurt, fruit and drinks--and there is also adequate room for people to sit most of the time.  You can get to the park walking in about 15 minutes (straight down the road--no busy street crossings), but it's also extremely nice that they run their own free private shuttle service.  Lee, the shuttle driver, is extremely friendly and we felt like we needed to personally thank him for his great attitude. Shuttles are always running, we even got picked up one day by the
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your comments with us.  I am happy that we have turned you in to loyal fans of the Candy Cane Inn.  I am sorry to read that you had concerns about our shuttle pick-up and drop off location at Disney.  Unfortunately, with the expansion of the Disney Parking Lots, the majority of the hotels have been pushed out to this area.  To avoid missing the shuttle, just know that we consistently leave on the 15 and 45 of every hour.  But I am glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope that you will be back again soon.

Summary: It was really nice to be able to get up in the morning and have cereal, yogurt, fruit and pastries for breakfast at no charge and then take a short walk to the entrance at Disneyland.  Although Candy Cane Inn provides free shuttle twice an hour to the park it was convenient to be able to walk over whenever we desired.  The property was nicely landscaped and pretty quiet.  The rooms are older but clean and practical.  There is free internet and parking provided.  When we checked into our room the safe had been locked by the previous guest; we called the front desk and someone came to our room within 10 minutes to open it for us.  That was the only time we had to ask for assistance and it was prompt. We appreciated the late check out time of 2:00 so we could enjoy the park on the
Manager Response: I am pleased that you enjoyed your stay and the amenities provided to our guests. The 2:00pm check-out time in our Premium Rooms is helpful for those who wish to visit the theme parks the morning of departure. I apologize that your safe was not unlocked upon arrival, however am delighted our engineering was prompt in repairing. Thank you again for your business and providing us with this feedback.

Summary Heading: Friendly service and can't beat the location
Summary: We recently stayed here with our daughter and family.  We had connecting rooms which made the space seem larger as the rooms aren't huge.  They are adequate though especially since you aren't in them a lot.  Disneyland takes a lot of time if you want to see and do everything.  We only took the shuttle  twice as it's easy to walk and almost as fast.  The grandchildren loved the pool after spending hours in the park they really enjoyed a swim.  The breakfast is fine and it's great to grab a quick bite before heading out for a long day of fun.  The small refrigerator in the room is a nice plus and also the safe.  We put our wallets, keys etc.in it and didn't have to pack them around or worry about losing them.  All in all I don't think you can go wrong at the Candy Cane.  We stayed
Manager Response: I am delighted that you and your family enjoyed your recent visit. We do appreciate your comments and feedback regarding the amenities of our property and the friendly service provided by our team. Please feel free to contact me should you be return as it would be my pleasure to assist with reservations.

Summary: Skip the chain hotels and stay here.  This was one of the nicest looking properties in the area.  We were pleasantly surprised to find that we could walk to Disneyland.  After navigating traffic in Southern California, it was nice to park the car for two days and not move it at all.  We had a room on the front of the building and despite it being on the main street, it was very quiet.  Two queen beds took up most of the room but we weren't spending much time in the room anyway.  Breakfast was good, nice to have a free start to the day since you will spend a fortune in the park on food.  Breakfast served 7-9 so you have to get up early enough to get it. Shuttle was quick and convenient but it is definitely walkable to all the Disney attractions.  Room was clean and updated.  I
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us the pleasure in being of service on your recent Disney visit. We do appreciate your kind comments and our gardeners do an exceptional job in maintaining the property year around. Again, we do appreciate your business and feedback. Warm regards!

Summary: What a great hotel, and a beautiful property that is easy walking distance (about 2 blocks) to Disneyland. And for people like me on a strict budget, it didn't put me in the poor house. Pride of ownership and management are obvious. Arrived to our room with a personalized welcome note and a bag of fresh cookies. What amazed me was how quiet the room was given that most of the guests were families with lots of excited (i.e. loud) children running around, including mine. Small pool/jacuzzi area but it served the need for a quick cool off, and the free breakfast had all that we needed. This will be our Disneyland hotel going forward!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. We do believe in providing a quality product and exceptional customer service with a strong emphasis on maintaining a moderate price point. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations

Summary: My Husband and I stayed 5 nights at the Candy Cane Inn as our first stop on our honeymoon. I picked the Candy Cane because of all the great reviews i read on Trip Advisor. Let me first start by saying the location is fantastic. 10 minute walk to Disneyland and even quicker with the courtsey bus at the hotel ( which was great to have to save our tried legs). There is a Seven Eleven and ABC Mart directly next door which came in handy for drinks and snacks. Directly across the street is a group of shops, ie) Pizza, subway, burger place, chinese plus a couple of others. Pizza Parlor was the only one we had and i can stay it was great pizza and perfect to take back and eat in hotel room after a long day at Disney. Down the street was a Denny's which is open 24 hours and is a great
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us on your recent visit and I appreciate your comments and feedback regarding your experience. I believe in listening to our guests and taking action to improve the items we can to better serve our guests. I have spoken with our front office manager so we may use your comments as a training tool with the team. Thank you again for taking time to bring this item up as well as providing many kind comments as well. Warm regards!

Summary: This was my second stay at the Candy Cane Inn and it didn't disappoint!  Having had a great experience here in April with a standard room we came back with the family for a four day Disneyland excursion. We booked a deluxe room which, on the website, stated it had both a refrigerator and a microwave, but upon checking in we were told microwaves were only in the premium rooms. Despite this minor set back  we were very happy to hear that there's  a microwave available in the lobby which we used and they even had a wine opener available for us when we realized we forgot ours.  I have to say that I am a fan of the continental breakfast here as it has so much more than other places. The four days that we were there we had available to us apples, bananas, oranges, 3 different
Manager Response: Welcome back!  I am thrilled to read that you decided to come back after your first experience with us at the Candy Cane Inn.  I am sorry for any confusion regarding microwaves in our rooms.  Unfortunately, microwaves are only available in Premium rooms, but you are correct in that we do have a microwave in our breakfast room for our guests to use.  Also, all our hotel’s features and amenities such as pool, fitness center, laundry facilities are open from 7am to 11pm daily.  I thank you for sharing your comments with us and I hope to have you back again soon!

Summary: My friend and I took our daughters to visit Disneyland.  We stayed at the Candy Cane Inn based on my friend's experience from about ten years ago.  I was extremely happy with the accommodations.  Room was clean and cheerful.  All the staff were very pleasant.  Couldn't have asked for better service.
Manager Response: Thank you for letting us know about your stay.  It is great to know that even after 10 years we still continue to impress our guests.  It is always a great feeling to know that you all had a good time and the service you received was to your satisfaction.  I hope that you will be able to share your experience with your other friends so they too may experience features, service, and amenities of the Candy Cane Inn.  Best regards!

Summary Heading: Park by your door, walk 10 min to Disneyland. Have fun.
Summary: Fun family friendly place a stone's throw from Disneyland. Has a small heated pool, simple breakfast and redundant shuttle service to the park. Nice big rooms and friendly staff.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your feedback with us!  I am so pleased to read that you enjoyed your stay.  We too believe that our location, features, and staff are what make the Candy Cane Inn such a wonderful place to stay.  I hope that you will be able to come back again soon.  Until next time, warm regards!
