Summary: We're a family of 4, 2 small children, 2 adults and this hotel was perfect.  We usually stay at the Hilton when we go to Disneyland, but I decided to try to find something nearer since our smallest is 21 months old and the Hilton is too far to walk to.  The CCI was not, my 21 mo old was able to walk back (well run!) back.  The pool and hot tub were perfect for our afternoon break from the park.  There is a fridge, which was great as we brought milk etc.  There's free parking, free wi-fi (a little slow, but ok).  Location is great!  There's a target down the street (if you're driving).  Lots of restaurants to choose from.  We ate breakfast, which we brought to our room and then went to the park.  The landscape is beautiful and really makes the place.  The rooms are clean, and
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments!  I am glad that we were able to turn your family into return guests!  We take pride in providing our guest clean and comfortable accommodations to all our guests.  Also, we are always willing to accommodate early checks ins, as long as rooms are ready and available.  If you are every back in the area, please do not hesitate to contact me personally for assistance with your reservations.

Summary Heading: We Were Pleased, WILL BE BACK!!!
Summary: I was not sure what to think reading reviews. Some people are either super picky or travel so much that they know. I am neither of those. I do know that Candy Cane Inn was recommended to us, and on here there was NO mention of bed bugs where as other nice, and spendy hotels reviews mentioned bed bugs. I was sold then and because there was a continintal breakfast.  There were mixed reviews on the breakfast. Here is ours. DELICIOUS AND THE LARGEST SELECTION OF A CONTINENTAL BREAKFAST I HAVE EVER SEEN. Bagels, danishes, donuts, toast, several cereal selections, yogurts, juices, coffee, hot chocolate, and a gorgeous fruit arrangement. There was SO much food to choose from yet they keep it simple and replenished. The breakfast was good, nothing stale. The kids LOVED eating by the
Manager Response: Thank you for telling us about your stay.  We take all of our guest comments seriously and we are constantly assessing how we do business to ensure our guest’s satisfaction. In regards to our shuttle, we do understand that the first shuttle of the morning can get busy.  During peak times, our drivers will continuously circle to and from Disneyland until we can get all our guests waiting over to the park.  For guests who do not wish to wait, the Main Gates of Disneyland are only 250 yards away or a 7 – 10 minute walk.  Again, thank you for your comments and I can’t wait to have you back!  Until next time!

Summary Heading: Simply no better possible hotel option for a Disneyland trip
Summary: Those Priceline bids may seem like you're getting the cheapest deal for an alleged "three-star hotel", but in reality it's just a roll of the dice.  Could end up being a borderline three-star place with one-star service.  That said, what a difference a visit to a high-rated TripAdvisor hotel recently made!  My family and I had a bad experience at a larger hotel a few months back via Priceline.  And I pretty much lost faith in Disneyland-area hotels and assumed that they were all overpriced tourist traps with subpar service.  That was before we recently stayed at the Candy Cane Inn.  Even though its daily rate was twice that of the previous place, I learned my lesson when I did the math and saw that I got a better experience for the same overall price.  And the overall price was
Manager Response: Thank you so much for allowing us the opportunity on your recent Disneyland visit. I do appreciate your kind comments regarding our team, service, cleanliness and ambiance of our Inn. We believe in providing an exceptional product with an emphasis on moderate costs for budget minded travelers. Please feel free to contact me personally when planning your next visit as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: This was our first time staying at the Candy Cane Inn.  We have previously stayed at Embassy Suites, Best Western Park Place Inn & Suites, Residence Inn & Suites, and the Disneyland Resort hotels.  The room we had was clean, and the beds were comfortable.  When I think about what would set the Candy Cane Inn apart from the others, it would be the special amenities and accommodations it provides its hotel guests.  We opted for the Premium room because of the microwave oven, breakfast delivery, and 2pm check-out, all of which impacted our trip positively.  The breakfast was a continental breakfast, but somewhat better.  The bagels and toast with spreads, cereal and milk, oatmeal, yogurt, and coffee, tea, hot cocoa, and juices gave us a good start.  They also had a variety of
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us the opportunity on your recent visit to the theme parks. I am delighted to read that your experience was positive and you enjoyed the amenities of our Premium Rooms and our property in general. We do try and think of all the little things that will enhance the guest experience and receive many wonderful comments regarding our Expanded Continental Breakfast and Exclusive Complimentary Shuttle to and from the parks. Please feel free to contact me personally when planning your next visit as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Very nice hotel but possibly a little expensive
Summary: We stayed at CC Inn  in May '11 for  8 nights in two installments (2 adults and 1 child). It was a very pleasant experience. The rooms were adequate as were the two double beds though I'd have appreciated a little more luggage storage space. The free in room locker was a life saver. The proximity to Disneyland (15 minutes walk), plenty of dining options within walking distance, a very nice supermarket/souvenir shop and 7-11 right next door was great, as was their punctual pick up drop service to Disneyland. After 12 hours in the park, you appreciate not having to walk back carrying a tired child.   The free continental breakfast was nice though I'd have appreciated some cooked hot food beside hot toast and  coffee but I'm not complaining. The staff was very very friendly and
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your feedback with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. We do appreciate your kind comments regarding our property and services. Out team is very friendly and do strive to provide a positive experience to guests. Kind regards!

Summary: Only very small dings:  Wifi is intermittent at the back, and the breakfast is fairly prefab, but is really is fine for folks on the go.  That being said:  nice, safe, clean rooms; nice pool; friendly, helpful service; free Wifi; free courtyard parking directly in front of your room; not overly expensive, especially considering that breakfast is included; and, most of all, LOCATION LOCATION LOCATION!    I don't think there's an easier, closer hotel to Disneyland than this one.  A very quick walk, and you don't even have to cross the street.  You can even see the back of Cars Land from the parking lot.  And I did not feel unsafe walking alone late at night.  I would definitely stay here again, no question!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your comments with fellow travelers. I am delighted to read that you enjoyed the features and amenities of our hotel. I see that you had troubles with our WiFi, however your stay was back in January and we have made upgrades to our system since. It has proven to be a challenge for us, but with so many different types of devices and each user’s personal settings, it is difficult to make internet connectivity perfect. We ask that you report any internet issues to the Front Desk and allow us an opportunity to troubleshoot the situation. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: Stayed in mid price room.  Spacious.  Two chairs and a table.  Flat screen TV of decent size.  Cable stations limited in number.  Very clean.  Beds good except for crushed spot where people lay to watch TV.  Breakfast OK except for lack of protein(yogurt and milk available).  Hard boiled eggs would help.  Bus to Disney was always exactly on time.  Walk is not bad (but there are closer options).  Nice landscaping.  Rooms reasonably quiet; unusual for an older California motel.  Pool not large but OK for kids. Management, people etc. very nice and open. When coming to Disneyland again, would be happy to stay at the Candy Cane.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. We listen and learn from our guest’s comments and strive to improve the overall guest experience. Should you be returning please feel free to contact me personally as I would be delighted to assist with rates and reservations.

Summary Heading: Would definatly recomend to friends and family
Summary: If you are looking for a place that has clear rooms, friendly staff, good service, and a no hassle stay within walking distance to disneyland, this is a good bet. My wife and stayed here for a week, and we had no complaints. The rooms are clean, beds are comfy, the grounds are very clean, the hot tub was hot every night, and we found the staff friendly and helpful. The park is a 5-10 min walk, and the shuttle is a nice touch as well. This was our third  trip to disneyland, and we had stayed at the Annabella before. This is not a 5 star resort, but is clean, close to the park and a very solid choice.
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us the opportunity on your recent visit to the Disneyland Theme Parks. I do appreciate your kind comments and recommendations to family and friends as that is the foundation of our Inn for the past 54 years. Please feel free to contact me directly should you be returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: Very clean rooms, nice breakfast included, free parking, and a Disneyland shuttle.  Only gripe was the spotty to unusable (free) wifi coverage.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your comments with us.  I am happy to ready that you enjoyed the features and amenities of our hotel.  I was disappointed to read that you had troubles with our WiFi.  It has proven to be a challenge for us, but with so many different types of devices and each user’s personal settings, it is difficult to make internet connectivity perfect.  We ask that you report any internet issues to the Front Desk and allow us an opportunity to troubleshoot the situation.  Thank you again for your comments and I look forward to seeing you back again soon!

Summary Heading: Can't say enough good things about this place!!
Summary: Love this place so much I booked another stay for 6 days in September!  THANK YOU Cane Inn for your excellent customer service, friendly staff, healthy breakfast selections and comfortable, clean rooms and not to mention all the money I'm saving on parking fees and food!  WOW!!!!  L. Billings
Manager Response: none

Summary: My husband and I stayed here with our families when we were children, so it was exciting to return with our own family in tow.  Everything was as we remembered it (great location, clean rooms, friendly atmosphere).  We loved the healthy choices at the continental breakfast (fruit, wheat toast, oatmeal) and our son loved the sugary cereal dispenser. =) The shuttle was east to find (at the hotel and the park) and came on schedule.  The "baby pool" (1 1/2 feet deep) is such a fun feature!  Our two year old loved splashing and laughing in water that came up to his waist.  We received a wonderful pizza delivery recommendation from the front desk and had a picnic in our room one night!  There is a little market next door which made milk runs and pre-park snack buying wonderfully easy!
Manager Response: Wow!  I am thrilled to read that you had a great time staying with us!  Our Children’s Wading Pool is definitely a feature that families with young children enjoy!  Thank you for telling our TripAdvisor readers about your stand and I hope to see you back at the Candy Cane Inn real soon!  Best regards!

Summary Heading: last minute trip to Disneyland what a great find
Summary: My daugher and I  called last minute on Memorial Day weekend and was surprised to see they had a room for us. We have AAA so we used that for a nice little discount. ( YOU DO have to show that on check in.) Location to Disney land is amazing. its actually walking distance, but they do have a great bus shuttle (FREE) , the room what a great surprise. Nice and comfortable and looks like you should be paying more for the room then you are. There are not many hotels I would say. I will be back. But I WILL Be back to visit this hotel. You will not be disappointed by this place. With a name of Candy Cane kinda scared me just a little. You will see the staff using candy can pens and you get candy cane candy when getting on the shuttle bus.. too cute.  Nice pool area, and a store right
Manager Response: It was our pleasure to accommodate you on your recent trip.  I am happy to know that you enjoyed your stay with us.  I am also happy to read that you were able to take advantage of our AAA discount.  Just to make you aware, we proudly offer our guests AARP and Active Duty Military discounts as well.  But most importantly, I am glad to know that the name Candy Cane will no longer scare you.  Now, I hope, it will mean the place to stay when you are visiting Anaheim!  Warm regards!

Summary Heading: Can we go back to Blue 17?
Summary: Dear management: this is our 7th stay and we've loved everytime.  The only two changes we'd like to see are a return to the bus pickup area Blue 17 [safer and bus is visible from a distance] and also more TV channels or better selection [more movies and sports; less LA news channels].  We especially enjoy your friendly and competent staff.  I want to single out Lee, your afternoon bus driver, as polite, funny, courteous, and a good listener.  He was of great help everytime in 10 trips to my family and grandsons.  Rich Nielsen
Manager Response: Mr. Nielsen, thank you for your comments.  Unfortunately, with the expansion of Disney’s parking area, shuttle parking is very limited.  Our shuttle has been designated to pick-up and drop off at the Silver Zone located next to Harbor Blvd and only approximately 15 yards further than the area designated “Blue 17.”  We are continually having conversations with Disney in order to ensure the safety, comfort, and satisfaction of our mutual guests.  Also, thank you for your kind comments about Lee.  Our drivers are our Ambassadors for our hotel and are always available to help in any way possible.  I hope to see you all again soon!  Best regards!

Summary: This was our third visit to the Candy Cane.  We stay in the premium rooms and the kids (adults really) love the rooms.  The buses are ON TIME which is a major plus.  Breakfast each morning is a major plus.  Breakfast is good.  We travel with a service dog (hearing dog for my daughter) and they are very accommodating.   The nightly movie check out is something the girls really enjoy.  AND LOVE THE COOKIES!  We will be back!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us!  We really appreciate you being loyal guests of the Candy Cane Inn!  My staff and I strive to accommodate our guests with any requests and needs they may have.  I am happy to know that you enjoy the features and amenities of our Premium rooms! The next time you visit us again, I will make sure your cookies are waiting for you!  I hope to see you all again soon!  Until then, feel free to contact me if you need assistance with your reservations!

Summary Heading: Wonderful Place for Families to Stay!
Summary: This is the second time our family stayed at the Candy Cane Inn, once in May 2010 and May 2011.  The front desk to the maintenance staff are wonderful to deal with and I have nothing but praise for the work that they do to make you feel welcome!  The continental breakfast is exceptional and it keeps you going until noon.  It is an easy 10 minute walk to Disneyland and to the local restaurants in the area.  I recommend this place to anyone interested in visiting Disneyland!!!
Manager Response: We at the Candy Cane Inn thank you for your personal recommendation!  It really means a lot to us that you enjoyed your stay and the fact that you keep coming back!  It is our loyal guests that have kept us in business for 54 years and will help to ensure we will be here for at least another 54 years!  We can’t wait to have you back for your trip in May 2012!  Be sure to reach out to me if you are ever in need of assistance with your reservations!  Best regards!

Summary Heading: Excellent! can't wait for the next trip
Summary: My mom and I stayed at CCI for two nights and we're super impressed by the hotel. It didn't take long to check-in and check-out. The staffs (front desk) are very polite and helpful. The breakfast was also great. There's many things to choose from and they're all good! The location is perfect. It's close enough to Disneyland to walk, but if you don't want to, their free shuttle bus which leaves every half an hour is also great. It's new, clean, and on time. We got a room on the second floor and we had nothing to complain about it. It's clean, big, nice, and the bathroom is very good too. Oh and we also bought Disney park hopper tickets from the front desk too! convenience and time saver! In conclusion, we're coming back to Candy Cane for sure the next time we come to Anaheim. I
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your comments with us.  I am happy to read that you were impressed by our hotel.  We strive to provide our guests with clean and comfortable accommodations with many features and amenities to ensure they enjoy their stay.  I hope that the next time your travels bring you back to the Anaheim area, that you give me a call and it would be my pleasure to assist you in booking your next trip to the Candy Cane Inn.

Summary: I've been staying at the candy Cane since the 60's. I was wooed away by Hilton points and lived to regret it. Having extensive customer service training for 15 years I an very critical in this area. Your staff have always exceeded my expectations with outstanding customer service, the wonderful breakfast you offer to kickstart my day and your friendly housekeeping staff who never fail to have my room fresh and clean and restocked. Kudo's to all of you for your continued over the top customer service!  L. Billings
Manager Response: As General Manager of the Candy Cane Inn, I take pride in my staff and their commitment to provide “over the top” guest service.  Thank you for sharing your feedback with our TripAdvisor readers.  I will definitely share your comments with my team!  Until we see you again, thank you for staying with us at the Candy Cane Inn!

Summary: First off, let me preference this review by saying that this is my second review. This time, my mom and I booked a premium room and had an infant in tow.  We decided to give this hotel a second look due to a.) its location b.)our prior experience with the staff and c.) the shuttle bus. Pros:  -Again, we had an excellent experience with the shuttle bus drivers, Fred especially. He was always prompt, courteous and helpful. From helping me lift my daughter's stroller in and out of the bus, to keeping my mom company, as she vomited, due to food poisoning (while I held the baby), this guy needs a triple raise!  -The check in and check out personnel was friendly and prompt. -In addition, Jeff was nice to let us stay an hour over, due to my mom's sickness, without a penalty. This
Manager Response: After reading your comments, I must admit that I was disappointed to read that you experienced challenges during your stay.  I do agree with your comment of “attitude is everything.”  I have spoken to my Management Team and we will be using your feedback as a coaching opportunity to ensure incidents like this do not happen again.  I am very pleased that specific members of my staff were very helpful to you and your family.  I want to assure you that we are taking your comments seriously.  I hope that you would reconsider and give us another opportunity to share with you an experience more typical of the Candy Cane Inn.  Please feel free to contact me if you have any further questions or concerns.  Best regards!

Summary: We're happy we gave the Candy Cane Inn a second chance.  This second time around was excellent.  We were on the second floor in a premium room.  When we arrived we were greeted with a welcome gift of cookies, popcorn, two free movies, and other goodies.  Each morning we had the option of having our breakfast delivered to our room and we took advantage of that service. At the requested time one of the staff was at our door with what we had ordered the night before.   The free shuttle was right on time whether leaving the inn or picking us up at Disneyland.  And, we can't forget to mention the free parking for the entire trip.  We will be back and recommend the upgrade to the premium room.
Manager Response: We definitely agree with you and believe that our Premium rooms are a great value.  Aside from the amenities that you had mention, our Premium rooms are the largest accommodations at the Candy Cane Inn.  They also feature:  microwaves, flat screen TV’s, nightly turndown service, as well as a late checkout for 2pm.  If you are ever back in the Anaheim area, please be sure to give me a call.  It would be my pleasure to assist you with your future reservations!  Best regards!

Summary: My husband and I stayed for 3 nights in mid-April.  When we checked in we had been allocated a room on the upper level but as there is no lift and we are in our 60s we asked reception for a ground floor room and the guy on the desk made numerous phone calls and got his supervisor to also check and they eventually shifted some things round so we did get a room on the ground floor - very good indeed.  The location is fantastic, it must be the nearest hotel to Disney.  That said, the shuttle bus which ran on the hour and half hour to Disney and on the quarter past and quarter to the hour on the return journey were always on time and the drivers were chatty and courteous.  There was a driver of Vietnamese origin and he was especially chatty (especially when we told him that we had
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us.  I am happy to read that we were able to accommodate your request for a ground floor room, as my staff does try their best to accommodate all our guest’s requests.  Also, thank you for your kind words about our Drivers.  They truly are the Ambassadors of our hotel.  But I am sorry to read that you had a challenge with our toaster during breakfast.  In the future, please feel free to ask any of our Breakfast Attendants for assistance and we will be more than happy to adjust the toaster to toast your bread to your satisfaction.  After all, it is our goal to ensure you enjoy your stay!  I hope that you will be back again soon.  Until then, best regards!

Summary: The Candy Cane Inn was great for our trip to Disneyland.  The best part was the breakfast.  So much stuff to choose from, lots of juice, coffee, teas, fruit, yogourt, cereal, breads, bagels, cream cheese, jams ect.  This was a great way to start off a long day of walking at Disneyland.  The hotel is about a block from the main Disneyland entrance, but on the same side of the street, so no worrying about crossing the busy street with little kids.  Staff was friendly, a small convenience store right next door, pool was great, rooms were really clean.  The only thing I would criticize would be that the rooms are dated.  However, for the short amount of time that you spend in the room, it was fine.  The beds were soft, which I love, the tv was new, also a plus, and the rooms were
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us and our TripAdvisor readers!  We are always looking for ways to improve what we do at the Candy Cane Inn and that is why your comments are so important to us.  I am happy to read that you enjoyed our expanded continental breakfast.  We try to ensure that we provide a variety of fresh and quality items for our guests to start their day off right.  In regards to your comments about our rooms, we are constantly making improvements to our rooms and I will be sure to discuss this with my Management Team.  Thank you again for your feedback and I hope to have you stay with us again soon!

Summary: This Inn is right across from Disneyland.  On top of that they have a shuttle that runs every 1/2 hour. The Inn is very clean and the appearance of the place in general shows pride in keeping the place current.  A decent continental breakfast with bagels, fruit and cereal makes it even better for those on the way to Dland.
Manager Response: I am delighted that you enjoyed your stay and thank you for sharing your comments with us.  I am happy to read that you enjoyed our exclusive complimentary shuttle to the theme parks.  Many people do not realize that our shuttle services the Candy Cane Inn exclusively and runs 30 minutes prior to park opening and 45 minutes after Disneyland closing.  If your travels bring you back to the Anaheim area, please feel free to contact me personally if you need assistance with Reservations.  Warm regards!

Summary Heading: Amazing, fantastic, wonderful, stay every time!!!
Summary: I'm from southern California and my family and I currently live in Oregon. We vacation in Cali to visit Disneyland 2-3 times a year! For the past 3 years we have been staying at the Candy Cane Inn and could not be happier! My husband and I even stayed there for our honeymoon!!! Staff very nice and  helpful, rooms clean and very nice beds and pillows, and we just love  the breakfast, we look forward to  the chocolate chip muffins :) oh and  the free shuttle is great the drivers are sooo nice and helpful. We also enjoy the beautiful hotel grounds the flowers are just beautiful all year!!! And parking is great! I can go on and on about how great this hotel is...
Manager Response: I loved reading your comments and I want to thank you for sharing them with us.  I also wanted to thank you for being a loyal Candy Cane Inn guest and for staying with us so often!  Next time you are at the hotel, please stop by and say hello.  It is always great to meet members of our Candy Cane Inn family.  Until we see you again, best regards!

Summary: Highly recommended.  Park the car right in front of your room on the main floor.  Quiet.  Small pool but heated.  Walking distance to Disneyland even for the kids 8 & 10.   Across the street multiple fast food restaurants and corner stores for snacks.  Fabulous breakfast.  lots of options for everyone.  Wifi was terrible.  And yes there are free candy canes for the kids.
Manager Response: Thank you for high recommendation!  We truly value what our guests have to say.  With that being said, I am sorry that you experienced challenges with our WiFi.  WiFi is an area that we continually monitor and work on to improve.  If at anytime you experience connectivity issues, please contact the Front Desk and allow us an opportunity to troubleshoot the issue.  Thank you again for your comments and we hope to have you back with us again in the near future!

Summary Heading: Had a nice stay while visiting Disneyland
Summary: My husband and I found this to be a very nice hotel while visiting Disneyland and California Adventure parks. There are shuttles, but the parks and Downtown Disney are literally right around the corner so we just walked - so convenient! The rooms were very clean and comfortable, and while we didn't use the pool during our stay, it also looked to be quite nice. All the staff members we encountered were also very polite and pleasant. The only drawback for us was that our room was in a back corner close to where the housekeeping carts were stored, so the view from our window was usually a housekeeping cart or two and the hustle and bustle of the housekeeping staff was our wake-up call. I don't think this would be a problem in any of the other rooms though. Overall, would definitely
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us the opportunity during your recent Disneyland visit. We do appreciate your valuable feedback and thank you for the kind comments at the same time. I sincerely apologize for the inconvenience and noises caused by and have spoken with our housekeeping team. Please feel free to contact me personally should you be returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservation assistance. Kind regards!

Summary: This is the only place to stay for Disneyland! Impeccable customer service and an amazing staff. The 5 star hotels could learn a lot from this place. Hats off to the management and staff!
Manager Response: Thank you for being a loyal return guest of the Candy Cane Inn, we DO appreciate your business and kind comments.  I share your thoughts and also feel that bricks and mortar and a fancy lobby cannot compare to sincere and genuine care and concern of guests. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Perfect Place to stay for Disneyland
Summary: We travelled with 2 adults and 2 kids (8 and 5) staying for 4 nightsat Candy Cane Inn. The rates are reasonable and the rooms were very clean and comfortable after long days at Disneyland! We loved this hotel very much, with an easy 10 minute walk to Disneyland or their shuttle which is free of charge and runs regularly day and night!  Next door to the hotel is a great convenience store if you need to top up on snacks or drinks and you can store them in the mini bar fridge.  Breakfast was perfect including cereals, bagels, donuts, toasts, fruit etc and served poolside in a relaxing environment.  There are plenty of restaurants within walking distance too if you need to dine out of the theme parks to save money.  Free Wi-fi was a bonus but not a great connection most of the time.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your comments with other TripAdvisor readers. We do continually work on our WIFI to ensure maximum connectivity as we have numerous access points throughout the property. One thing to further assist us is if that you would be so kind in reporting while on property so we can investigate promptly as these devices fail too. Please feel free to contact me personally when you are returning as I would be delighted to assist with rates and reservations as well as check connectivity in the area of the room you are being assigned. Warm regards!

Summary: The pool is a little on the small side and gets busy when people come home from Disney. The breakfast can get a little cramped if everyone decides to eat at the same time as the eating area is around the pool. Enough food for a start to your day. Rooms very clean and a little on the small side for american standards but all the channels for those with jetlag, also a few shops nearby so if you're up at all hours with jetlag you can get something to eat.
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us the opportunity to be of service on your recent visit. We do appreciate guest’s comments and the time taken to share with fellow travelers. Kind regards.

Summary Heading: Loved Loved Loved the CAndy CAne!
Summary: booked a premium room and was super pleased. very clean. decent beds and pillows. great shower pressure. nice friendly staff. shuttle service for tired sore feets in the evening. nice little pool. laundry room. we loved this spot and almost don't want to tell anyone else about it it's so fantastic ;)
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your comments with us.  I am pleased to read that you enjoyed your stay.  Many claim that we are the best kept secret in Anaheim, but we encourage you to tell everyone you know about you know about the great time you had!  Be sure to give us a call the next time you are in our area!  Best regards!

Summary: The staff at this hotel are superb. Every need we had was looked after with a smile. From check-in to booking us a car rental (which picked us up right at the hotel)- they even looked after assisting us with checking in for our flights and booking us a shuttle to the airport while we enjoyed our last day at Disneyland.  We highly recommend the Premium Room (which isn't a Premium price) as it is a little larger than a standard and we had our breakfast delivered to our room each morning at our leisure. What a bonus when you are getting ready for a full day of sight seeing! Premium Rooms also have a great welcome basket waiting for you with a basket full of snacks and cookies. Nice touch, indeed.  The only thing that I would have appreciated that they don't have is a buisiness
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with our TripAdvisor readers.  I was thrilled to read that you enjoyed the features and amenities of our Premium rooms.  Keep in mind that our Premium rooms feature flat screen TV’s, complimentary movie rentals, spa quality toiletries, coffee maker, as well breakfast delivered to your room daily, and extended checkout until 2pm.  Although we do not have a business center, we do have complimentary WIFI access and the Front Desk is always willing to assist with boarding passes, directions, or any thing else you may have questions about.  I hope that you will come back and visit us again soon!

Summary: We stayed here for three nights nights with two small children.   This is the fourth hotel in the area I have stayed at while visiting Disneyland and it is far superior to the others.  The hotel was super clean with lots of friendly staff.  The housekeepers were very helpful with cleaning my very messy room.  They have a wonderful breakfast that you can eat in the morning by thhe pool.  They have a decent pool and a very cute little kids pool that is 1 and 1/2 feet.  I also forgot something in my room and they called me right back and put it aside for me.  I was really impressed with the service.  The only complaint I had was the room size.  It was small and tough with four people.  It is worth it to spend a little extra for a bigger room.  Even though they provide a nice bus it
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments!  I am happy to read that you enjoyed our visit.  Being able to come back to a room that is made up after a long day at Disneyland is such a refreshing feeling.  That is one of the reasons why people love going on vacation.  I also understand that our standard rooms may be small for some families, but that is why we offer deluxe rooms that 45 sq. ft. larger, and our premium rooms at 90 sq. ft. larger than our standard rooms.  Next time you decided to come back and visit us, please feel free to speak with me personally and I will be more than happy to assist you with your reservations.  Warm regards!

Summary Heading: Look no further if you are traveling with kids.....
Summary: We checked into the candy cane for 5 days recently and almost immediately I knew we were in the right spot...! We were greeted by James and let me tell you, this guy   Is  fantastic !  James made every effort to ensure our stay was a memorable  one... The candy cane is in a perfect spot. Walk 5 min to Disney main gate, walk 2 min to all the shops an services you need, they have a free shuttle bus to Disney, but you can easily walk it. The CC is clean and the grounds are spotless. The free breakfast by the pool is terrific also.  The housekeeping staff were awesome to deal with and no request was too hard for them...  - on a couple of days whilst we were there it was quite warm and when we returned from our day at Disneyland we found our air condition had been turned on to make
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us to be of service on your recent visit to the theme parks. I am delighted and appreciate all your kind comments about our team of service professionals. We do try our best to provide the utmost of product and service while keeping our rates that appeal to family travelers. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: 2nd Trip to the candy cane inn :)  Still fantastic
Summary: This was our second trip to the candy cane inn.  We walked in and saw James at the front desk.  He remembered our faces and organised rooms for us straight away.  (It is a long flight from Brisbane to LA and then coach ride to Anaheim)  Thanks for organising our rooms so quickly James, we really needed to catch up on some sleep.   After spending our first day walking around disneyland, I remembered that the CCI have a hot spa - heaven! Perfect hotel for a stay next door to disneyland!
Manager Response: Thank you for being loyal Candy Cane Inn guests and visiting us again!  James is truly the Ambassador of the Candy Cane Inn and is loved by so many.  All of my Staff strive to accommodate all of our guests.  We understand what one goes through when traveling.  That is why, as long as we have rooms ready, we are more than happy to check guests in early.  Sometimes, during peak times of the year, this may not always be possible, but we are always more than happy to hold luggage and allow our guests to enjoy the amenities of the hotel until their room is ready.  Again, thank you for coming back and seeing us.  Until we see you again!

Summary: This motel/hotel is really nice, rooms are clean & most importantly the site is very clean. We have used the pool & spa and also we appreciated the washer & dryer on site & the breakfast was exactly like I expected. The shuttle to Disney was perfect ! always on time, and we could even walk there ! Parking was not always easy, it gets really full in the morning and nights. But overall experience was good !
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your comments with our TripAdvisor readers!  I was happy to read that you enjoyed the features and amenities of our hotel.  Our own hotel operated shuttle is definitely a feature we are proud of.  Unfortunately, during peak times of the year, parking can be a challenge.  But if at any time of you have difficulty finding a parking space, please be sure to speak to our Front Desk and they will be happy to assist you.  Again, thank you for sharing your comments and we look forward to coming back in the near future!  Best regards!

Summary: We stayed at The Candy Cane Inn while experiencing our first trip to Disneyland as parents.  It was wonderful - from the continental breakfast in the morning( which had a great variety of things and was replenished several times each morning) to the pool to the staff!!  It is quite literally a 2 block walk to the entrance of Disneyland which takes about 7-10 minutes depending on how fast you walk, which was handy for us because our 2 year old needed a nap every afternoon.  I had dropped my passport while packing up the car to heading to Phoenix - when we realized it was missing 4 days later they were absolutely amazing in helping us get it back.  There had even been a message left on my home phone from the Candy Cane Inn.  I will definitely be back!!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us!  I am so thankful to read that we were able to find your passport.  Our Director of Housekeeping oversees our Lost and Found Department and does an excellent job of ensuring that lost items are returned promptly to their owners.  Thank you again for staying with us and I hope that you will be back again soon!  If you need help with reservations, please do not hesitate to contact me.  Take care!

Summary: The shuttle driver told us that we chose a great hotel when he dropped us off and we found his opinion to be spot on! The inn is charming and clean, as well as only a short walk to Disneyland and Anaheim Garden Walk if you are planning to take some bus tours. The staff was very accommodating and friendly, a kind female staff member allowed us to buy some Nyquil when the inn shop had closed for the night. The breakfast was quite good, you have the option to take your breakfast up to your room or take it with other guests on the dining room. We found the selection to be a great alternative to the heavy greasy breakfasts available in nearby restaurants. The plants and flowers that decorate the inn were a very nice touch too!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience with us.  I am glad to read that you enjoyed your stay.  We at the Candy Cane Inn believe in providing a “fresh” expanded continental breakfast.  Our fruits, pastries, bagels, donuts, and breads are all delivered fresh daily.  We do not freeze and thaw our breakfast items.  We also try to be as accommodating as possible and I am delighted to read that my staff was able to assist you with buying some Nyquil when you needed it.  Again, thank you for sharing your experience with us and I hope that you will visit again soon.  Warm regards!

Summary Heading: Stayed many times at this hotel and every stay has been great.
Summary: This hotel is a short 10 minute walk to Disneyland, but they also offer a shuttle that runs on a frequent basis back and forth between the park. For parents who stay here with small children this is a nice service. The staff is friendly, the rooms are very clean and the beds are comfortable (I slept really well).  They also have a heated outdoor pool that is a welcoming break after tromping around the park all day. Finally they offer a continental breakfast each morning that has a good variety to choose from. If you are staying for a few nights this variety is very nice.  The only thing I would suggest is having a place to store luggage if possible. We arrived in the afternoon and our room was not quite ready and if would have been nice to store our luggage until it was ready. I
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and providing fellow travelers with your comments. I am very sorry that our front desk staff did not offer to store your luggage as we do have and are delighted to store luggage for arriving and departing guests. Again, for your kind comments and please feel free to contact me for assistance with future bookings or rates and availability. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Absolutely the best of three places we have stayed in previously
Summary: This was our thrid trip to Anaheim in 4 years. We have previously stayed at Howard Johnsons and The Tropicanna. Candy Cane Inn is without a doubt the best of the three. Everything exceeded my expectations. We arrived early and were checked in early, our flight on departure day wasnt until 10.30pm, so our check-out was extended to 1pm. Our luggage was safely stored for us so we could enjoy our last few hours in Disneyland. The staff were lovely, friendly, and nothing was ever a bother for them! A very special thank-you to James ( he will remember us as the Aussies hunting for VANS shoes! ) also, the young lady who was often at the front desk with him was great too ( im sorry I have forgotton her name ) Im not sure what some people complain about with the breakfast in the reviews,
Manager Response: I am thrilled to read that we exceeded your expectations!  Thank you for taking the time to write about your stay with us.  I will definitely pass on your kind words regarding James’ service.  In regards to your rings, our Director of Housekeeping has been trying to reach you and wanted me to share that he was unsuccessful in locating your rings.  If you would like to discuss this further, please feel free to contact us.  Again, thank you for sharing your feedback with us.

Summary Heading: Great Place to Stay.  Fantastic Location
Summary: We stayed at the Candy Cane Inn last week and loved it.  The location is perfect for walking to and from Disneyland.  Short enough that we were able to piggyback our seven year old daughter from the park back to the hotel after a long day.  With older children or adults you can walk it in less than 10 minutes if you want.  Don't even have to cross Harbor Blvd.  The breakfast is perfect unless you are the type who likes a big, meat and and eggs type meal.  As other have mentioned, the hotel is of the motel variety, but in a most charming way.  If you are looking for five-star luxury, probably not your thing, but for a nice clean room and bed it can't be beat.  The staff is fantastic and the shuttle -- should you need it -- is great.  We will be coming back if we next time we go
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us and sharing your feedback and comments with fellow travelers. Your comment regarding not having to cross Harbor Blvd. is very important and something that many find convenient not to mention safer for children and adults alike. Please feel free to contact me directly on your next visit as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and room reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: This was our second stay here.  Literally a 10-15minute walk from the parks.  A nice breakfast is included in the rate.  This is a cute hotel.  I will say it it more motel like than I remembered.  This is not a bad thing, but just something to be aware of as you are picking a hotel.  It is clean and the rooms have been renovated.  They maintain the property nicely.  If you are looking for a good deal and a place close to the parks, the Candy Cane Inn is a good bet.  If you are looking for a four diamond rated hotel, this is not it.  On this most recent trip we ended up staying at some pretty nice places, so the differences between them and the CCI were apparent, vs. the last time we stayed here, we did not have such a contrast.    Again, you get a lot for your money - clean
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us this second visit and sharing your comments with fellow travelers as we DO appreciate your business. We have always aspired to provide our guests a clean, comfortable, peaceful and serene property while maintaining a price point that compliments modest family travelers. Warm regards!

Summary Heading: Great location, Good price, Kids loved the pool
Summary: Spent 4 nights at the Inn with some friends. Really enjoyed the convience of adjoining rooms with no extra cost. The weather cooperated during our stay and the kids loved their "downtime" at the pool. The rooms weren't huge but ample room for our family of four, there was just enough room in the closet to store our two large suitcases. The staff were accomodating and always had a smile; before our arrival, the price of the room dropped, we were given the lower rate without any hassles. The in-room coffee was nice, fridge came in handy, as did the in-room safe. Continental breakfast was typical as described in other reviews. We were able to walk to Disneyland entrance in 15 mins with the kids (ages 9 to 12), we did use the shuttle once and did notice it was always on time. The
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us the opportunity to be of service on your recent visit with friends and family. I am delighted to see that the kids enjoyed the pool and our staff was accommodating and always had a smile. Yes, we will certainly honor the lower rate should they drop after making your reservation as that is only good business and fair. Please feel free to contact me personally when planning your next visit as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservation assistance. It is our goal to make your next visit a rating of 5. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: location equivalent to a Disney hotel without the hefty pricetag.
Summary: The Candy Cane Inn has a tacky name. Really tacky. Maybe they know that and make up for it by being anything but tacky. The landscaping is top notch. Luscious, and wonderful to walk into after a day at Disneyland. The customer service is also unbelievably good. In the first day, the maintenance staff had to visit our room twice. Once for unknowingly locking the safe, and another time for locking the bathroom door. Both times the staff made a point to reassure us we weren't a bother, that removing the doorknob was totally normal and not a hassle at all. And locking the safe happens ALL the time. In fact, they laughed and smiled the whole way through the process. The pool is small, but it's warm and our kids loved it. The continental breakfast is very good, and has a lot of
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us to be of service during your recent visit to the Disney Theme Parks. The Candy Cane Inn was one of the first hotels opened at Disneyland and has been owned and operated by our founder and his family for over 54 years. I thank you for your kind comments regarding our property and the services we provide. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Only Place I'll Ever Stay While Visting Disneyland
Summary: This was my 3rd stay at the Candy Cane Inn and it was just as wonderful as my first stay 10 years ago. Other than the Disney properties I'm convinced that the Candy Cane Inn is the best property at Disneyland. The room was spotless and comfortable. We slept very well and didn't hear any noise from the other rooms or the hallway. The fan does a good job of blocking out any noise one would hear. The beds were very cozy after a long day at the Parks. Breakfast was plentiful with many choices. Even though it was crowded at breakfast it was laid out well and it was easy to get what you wanted. The pool was nice and clean, but a little crowded. We never had a hard time finding a chair when we needed it though. We mostly walked to the Park which took less than 10 minutes. When we did
Manager Response: Thank you for being a loyal and repeat guest, we DO appreciate your business and kind comments. We have always aspired to be a moderately priced family property with emphasis on providing a quality product and friendly guest service. Please feel free to contact me personally on your next visit as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: Great location. Ten minutes walking distance to Disney. Clean and comfortable, despite it's obvious age, and a decent breakfast.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your kind comments about our Inn. We do pride ourselves on providing a clean, comfortable property with an emphasis on product and exceptional customer service. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Another WONDERFUL stay at Candy Cane!
Summary: Once again, Candy Cane Inn made our trip to Disneyland magical!  When we arrived from the airport at 10 AM, our room was ready!!!!  It was wonderful to be able to get our stuff to our room, then head over on the 10:30 AM shuttle to Disneyland!    The beds were comfortable, the bathroom was spotless, and I love the amount of room for dressing near the sink.  Coffee in the room, a small refrigerator...how could you need more?  Granted, we don't hang out in our room much, but the rooms at Candy Cane Inn are SO nice to relax in after a long day at the park.  The shuttle service is so convenient, but we even walked to the park twice during our stay...the weather was nice and the park is SO close!  The staff at Candy Cane Inn is unbeatable.  They are so friendly, so easy to work with.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share with the TripAdvisor readers your comments.  I was delighted to read that you enjoyed your stay with us.  My staff does work hard to ensure our guests are taken care of.  If you get an opportunity to come back to the Anaheim area, please feel free to contact me personally for reservations.  Best regards!

Summary Heading: Cozy and Comfortable but parking is a problem
Summary: We usually stay elsewhere when we go to Disneyland but this time, with only smoking rooms available at our usual hotel, we opted to stay at the Candy Cane Inn.  The reviews were so good that I wondered what all the fuss was about.  I still do.   First of all I was thankful that the entire facility is smoke free and that your room is available for check in at any time, even at 1:30am when we showed up.   This is not an Inn or a hotel, it's a motel, horseshoe shape with two stories of doors facing the parking lot and the pool, spa-pool, kiddie pool and office in the center.  The parking was ridiculous.  There were cars parked in every single space and along the pool fence and just squeezed into every available inch.  I had to park in front of the pool gate because there was just
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your feedback with us.  We always look at our guest’s comments as opportunities to improve our hotel.  I would like to clarify your comment regarding charges for wifi, as the Candy Cane Inn does not charge for wifi access.  But again, thank you for your feedback, as I have taken this opportunity to share your comments with my Management Team to ensure we do our best to exceed our guest’s expectations.  Best regards.

Summary Heading: Great Hotel!  Will definitely stay here again.
Summary: My husband, our two boys (12 and 9), and I stayed at the Candy Cane Inn from March 27th-30th.  We had never been to Anaheim or Disneyland so we chose a hotel based on value and reviews.  Let me tell you that you will not be disappointed with this hotel.  I am very wary of hotels and beg bugs or little critters and we check the mattresses and the room thoroughly before we make the final decision to stay anywhere.  The room was spotless.  Housekeeping does a fabulous job.  The staff is helpful and accommodating.  We stayed in a Deluxe room and it wasn't all that big but we were barely in the room and when we were it wasn't something that we even paid attention to.  My husband and boys used the swimming pool and hot tub on our last afternoon while I used the laundry facilities and
Manager Response: First and foremost, thank you to the members of our military for their sacrifices.  We at the Candy Cane Inn understand how difficult it must be to be away from your family and that is why we proudly offer Active Duty Military discounted rates.  I was so happy to read that you enjoyed your stay with us.  Thank you for sharing your comments with our TripAdvisor readers.  I hope that you all get an opportunity to come back and visit us again soon!  Warm regards!

Summary: I have stayed at a few hotels and always went back to Disney hotel because it was convienent and clean.  The Candy Cane Inn had a very  nice room. You save with the breakfast. Donuts,Bagels,toast,Coffee, Orange Juice, Apple Juice. You also save with the shuttle. Its always on time and every half hour. The only suggestion would be having numbered parking so that you can park near your room. I noticed the employee's park in front instead of back . Needed a little more shampoo and towels in the room. But I enjoyed my stay and would book again on my next visit. I was pleasantly surprised. It is also near a mini mart and 711 and across the street is subway and a pizza place.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments.  I wanted to let you know that I have shared your feedback with my entire staff, especially your comments regarding parking.  We strive to be accommodating in regards to parking.  At times, especially during peak seasons, parking can be difficult.  We do our best to ensure parking for all our guests, as well as our employees.  If at any time you are having challenges with parking, please be sure to inform the Front Desk.  My staff will be more than happy to assist you.  Again, thank you for your comments and we look forward to serving you again in the near future.

Summary: This was my first trip to Disneyland and my first time as a solo traveler.  I felt comfortable being on my own here- everyone on staff was more than helpful to me; I especially felt the shuttle bus drivers were very nice and provided useful information.  The grounds are beautiful and the room was spotless.  The breakfast offerings were fresh and filling.  I would love to visit again and hope I have the chance to soon!
Manager Response: I am thrilled to read that you enjoyed your first visit to the “Happiest Place on Earth, Disneyland,” as well as your stay with us at the Candy Cane Inn.  I hope that we have turned you into a loyal Candy Cane Inn fan!  If there is anything I can do to assist you with your future reservations, please do not hesitate to call!  Thank you again for staying with us and hope to have you back again soon!

Summary: We just returned from the Candy Cane Inn and our stay was wonderful! The property is gorgeous, flowers and trees everywhere. My daughters loved walking around looking at all the flowers. There was a heated pool and hot tub, we did not use them but the pool area is very pretty, with lots of seating. Check in was quick and easy. Our room wasn't ready when we arrived (9am on a Sunday, so we were not expecting an early check in) but we were able to park the car (free parking!) and we walked over to Disney. The walk to Disney is about 5-10 minutes, super easy. There is also a shuttle that runs every 30 minutes (also free!). We used the shuttle several times during  our stay because our little girls didn't always want to walk to and from Disney. The shuttle drivers were all very
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your wonderful feedback with fellow travelers. I am delighted that your daughters enjoyed our grounds and exclusive complimentary shuttle to save their feet. We do thank you for being our guest and feel free to contact me personally when returning for rate and reservation assistance, as it would be my pleasure to assist. Kind regards!

Summary: From the time we checked in until the time we left we experienced nothing but a friendly vibe. Our grandchildren, ages 8 and 11, loved the pool and the breakfast and didn't want to leave at the end of our stay.  Grandpa and Grandma were enthralled with the beautiful flowers and flowering plants and trees. When visitiing Disneyland with kids this is THE place to stay!
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us the opportunity to be of service on your recent visit and thank you for the business! I am delighted that your grandchildren enjoyed themselves and you folks enjoyed our beautiful grounds and peaceful setting. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: No other hotel can match it!!
Summary: We stayed here in January while on a fun filled vacation and was blow away! The staff, the customer service, the rooms, the hotels and the rates are unbeatable! We expected a lot from the ratings but it really was so much more. It made our Disneyland experience so much more and I am happy to say I got engaged here. We have just decided to take the last part of our honeymoon this May, to stay at this amazing hotel! I couldn't see it ending any better! Thank you more the memories!! Sincerely and with great admiration, Lauren Olsen
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your experience and this most beautiful story. I extend my sincere congratulations to the both of you and I look forward in seeing you on your honeymoon! Warm regards!

Summary: I stayed at this hotel many times before and absolutely loved it. The staff are very friendly and are always attentive to you. The first time we visited Disney we stayed at an other hotel close by called "Alpine Inn". On the first night at alpine we found 2 cockroaches!!! One on my wife and one on my 5 year old son. The manager there was terrible by telling us very rudely that we could not change rooms.  We left immediately and drove to this beautiful hotel we saw on the way driving.  Around 2 am or so we arrive at Candy Cane Inn with a crying 5 year old and in our pj's and tell the desk clerk our experience and ask if there is anything available he kindly said they did have a room available and absolutely loved it ever since. I will always remember how kind the staff at the
Manager Response: Thank you so much for allowing us the opportunity of having you as a repeat guest at our inn. I am delighted that Ryan, our night auditor was helpful, kind and assisted you during a most unpleasant situation. He is no longer with us however; his caring and sincere nature was very warm and hospitable. Please feel free to contact me personally should you need assistance with rates or reservations on your next visit. Kind regards!

Summary: This was our first stay and not our last.  We have stayed at all 3 of the Disney hotels, and this is almost as close.  They also have their own free shuttle.  It's clean, the staff is friendly and they even have a continental breakfast.  (toast, bagels, 3 cereals, muffins,  fresh fruit, yogurt, juice and coffee)  And free internet!!  We will defiantly choose this hotel again.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your feedback with fellow travelers. We do aspire to provide our guests with the utmost of products and services while maintaining a cost point that appeals to families. Please feel free to contact me directly when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Look no more, this is the hotel to stay in Disneyland.
Summary: My husband & I stayed for 3 nights from 1 Mar to 4 Mar. The deluxe twin room is big and clean, with nice and comfy beds. The inn was just a short walk to Disneyland, though we can take the hotel free shutter bus. There was a 7-11 and a ABC provision shop next door for our necessity needs. Opposite are some eateries such as subway, pizza n Chinese food. We will definitely come back to Candy Inn the next time round.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us on your recent visit and sharing your comments with fellow travelers.  I am delighted that you enjoyed yourself and please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: I agree with all the great things said in previous reviews. So I would like to simply thank the following staff for their great service: Front office James, Chris, and Andrea. And from housekeeping: Martha. Thank you guys for a great stay.  On a side note, we were initially given a room next to the housekeeping storage room at the end of the hallway which isn't the quietest room. We asked for a room change after the first night and were easily accommodated.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your comments with fellow travelers. Your kind comments regarding members of our team is most appreciated and they appreciate as well. I am delighted that your room move request was easy, however I am sincerely sorry that our housekeeping team was a bit noisy and will personally address in their daily meetings. Again, we appreciate your business, feedback and continually strive to be a five!

Summary: We are CCI regulars. The purpose of this trip was to celebrate family birthdays. With three family members having their birthdays only a few days apart Disneyland seemed like a fun place to go. We had two rooms - one for my son and me and one for my parents.   Check-in on Wednesday night was easy. There was one other person ahead of us, but everything went smooth. We checked out Thursday, again it went smoothly. We spent Thursday night on the Queen Mary in Long Beach before returning back to CCI. Again, we had two rooms, but this time for several days. My father was impressed that he was able to use his discount coupon he got after his first stay on the second stay.  Everything went well. One of the biggest highlights was the shuttle bus. As my parents are nearing 70, they loved
Manager Response: Thank you for being a loyal CCI repeat guest, we DO appreciate you and your business. I am delighted that you used your certificate and we certainly try to be easy to do business with. Danilo, our Housekeeping Manager does an exceptional job with lost and found and all we ask is that you pay the actual shipping charges as it is our pleasure to see that items are returned. Please feel free to contact me when you are returning as I would be happy to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: We love the Candy Cane Inn!
Summary: My wife and I stayed at Candy Cane in February with our son and his family.  As usual, the staff was great (James is so helpful), the rooms were clean, the breakfast was good, and the shuttle was such a help (all of the drivers are very friendly and helpful).  We love the Candy Cane and don't plan to stay anyplace else when we come to Disneyland- which is 2-3 times a year.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and I appreciate your kind comments about our team and property. I see that you are a frequent guest and please feel free to contact me directly for rates and reservation assistance as it would be my pleasure. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Wonderful staff. It wouldn´t have been the same without them.
Summary: From my first entry into the hotel, I was thoroughly impressed by all the staff we encountered. They are friendly, knowledgeable, and go above and beyond. As I entered the doors, I realized that I had left something very important onboard the transfer minibus. Before I could find my cell phone, James from reception, was on the phone. He had overheard my problem and was already waiting for the transfer company to pick up. He had the number of the van and stressed the urgency of the problem so that they returned immediately with my lost item. What incredible service! Rooms, pool, and breakfast were all great too!
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us the opportunity of being of service on your recent visit. I am delighted that you enjoyed your visit and the level of service provided by all our staff you encountered. I am equally happy that James assisted you in retrieving your lost item on the shuttle to the hotel. Please feel free to contact me personally should you be returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Good Value, for a hotel outside disney property
Summary: After checking many reviews for Candy Cane Inn we decided to stay three nights here and two at Disneyland Hotel. A month before arriving I wrote an e-mail to the manager asking to upgrade to a premium room<after reading reviews of small rooms I figured we needed the extra space with 5 of us> And, also asked for a roll away and a room facing fire works. He promptly e-mailed back that he was going to reserve a roll away<for a fee>, upgrade< for a fee> and put us close to a room that would have a view. After a 8 hour drive we arrived at 9am hoping to store our luggage and car, and our room was already ready.The lady behind the counter was confused and after trying to make several phone calls she asked if we upgraded. I then asked about a roll-away and was told they could not be
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write about your most recent stay.  I must admit that I was disappointed to read that we did not meet all of your expectations.  I want to assure you that your comments have not fallen on deaf ears.  I have taken the opportunity to work with our Front Office and Housekeeping staff to improve the efficiency of our service.  Also, I am sorry to hear that you were experiencing issues with our internet.  We have been working with Computer Specialist to explore ways of improving our internet connectivity.  In the future, please feel free to speak to our Front Desk and they will be more than happy to try and assist you with any connectivity problems.  Again, thank you for your comments.  I hope that you will give us another opportunity in the future to share with you an experience more typical of the Candy Cane Inn.  Best regards!

Summary Heading: stayed here many times, still first class
Summary: We have stayed here 5 or 6 times in the last 18 months. We always get a premium room for the breakfast delivery. We stayed during a slow time so the place wasn't that busy. The only thing that concerns me is I wasn't given a $10 off coupon for my next visit. I wonder if this has been stopped. Other than that everything was fine as usual. The walk is only 6 or 7 minutes to the park but the shuttle does come in handy late at  night
Manager Response: Thank you for being a loyal repeat Candy Cane Inn guest, we do appreciate your business! I am extremely concerned that you did not receive your certificate and am attempting to research this oversight. I have sent you a response through tripadvisor to obtain your name so I may reach out to you and send immediately. Thank you again for your comments and feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: We stayed this week at Candy Cane Inn.The value was very good for our room.We got the premium room which was so worth it.They brought breakfast in the morning which was very handy.The room was clean and uncluttered.We were not cramped at all in this room.I will definitely stay here again when going to Disneyland.The shuttle service was also very good.All and all it is a great place to stay.The only negative was that our room was not cleaned at 4pm when we got back for a break from Disneyland.I'm sure most people are still at the park at that time though and it wasn't that big of a deal since it was cleaned shortly after that.The staff was very,very nice as well.So as I said,we will be back for sure!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your comments with us!  I was thrilled to read that you enjoyed the features and amenities of our Premium room!  I am sorry to read that your room was not serviced until 4pm.  On the weekends, our Housekeeping staff works diligently to have all rooms cleaned and ready no later than 4pm.  Please keep in mind you can always call the Front Desk, when you leave for the day, and request service early.  We will do everything we can to fulfill your needs.  But thank you again for your comments and I hope that you will be back again in the near future!

Summary: The Candy Cane Inn's reasonable priced includes:   very clean rooms,  a good breakfast selection, an accommodating staff and the property is only a five minute walk to Disneyland.  We recommend it highly when you are visiting Disneyland and California Adventure.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your comments with our TripAdvisor Readers!  I was happy to read that you found the value of staying at the Candy Cane Inn!  I hope that when you have the opportunity to come back to the Anaheim Area that you will visit us again!  Warm regards!

Summary Heading: Location and shuttle A rating -- hotel room basic and average
Summary: After much research and a personal referral, our family of 4 chose Candy Cane Inn.  The hotel is really a motel or motor lodge, with parking right in front of the rooms.  It is an older facility, its age is more obvious in the room and bathroom than the parking lot.  The good: Clean room, clean beds and we saw other rooms having carpets cleaned.  Location: 15 minute walk to Disney.  Free and on-time courteous shuttle!  Small pool great for kids. Continental breakfast had something for everyone (nothing hot).  Also good to have laundry facilities on site that worked well - but bring a roll or two of quarters; there is no change machine (Detergent is $1.25 for 1 load box, $1.25 for bounce sheet, $1.25 per load washer, $1.25 per load dryer. Next time I'll bring detergent and bounce
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your comments with us.  I am sorry to read that we were unable to meet all of your expectations.  We believe in providing clean, comfortable, and friendly service to all our guests.  Unfortunately, every guest’s definition of comfort is different, but we do strive to provide quality accommodations to our guests.  I appreciate your feedback and I will be sure to share your comments with my Management Team.  Best regards!

Summary: I loved this Inn. Overall was a wonderful trip, everyone of the hotel people were very nice, they  extended my checkout because i missed it, by 2 hours they extended, parking was free, very nice also, food was great, lots to eat. They even let me park my car they for an extra day for free because I was going to disneyland that same day and I checked out that morning so that was really wonderful. OH and my car would not start at all so they even jump started my car. THAT WAS THE BEST EVER THANK YOU!!!  I will be staying here again, so "I'll be back" =]
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us to make your visit the "Most Memorable Trip" and I am delighted that you shared your very kind comments with fellow travelers. It is heart warming to read a review that was written with such passion and genuine appreciation. Please feel free to contact me personally when you returning as it would certainly be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservation assistance. Kind regards!

Summary Heading: Great place for families to stay while in Disneyland
Summary: We just arrived home after a 5 day stay at the Candy Cane Inn.   The location to Disneyland is ideal.  You aren't directly across the street from the entrance, but you are on the same side of the street and just 2 blocks away.  It is quicker to walk to the hotel then to wait for the shuttle.  Although the shuttle service is excellent.  The staff is in one word, happy.  They are very helpful and the Candy Cane Inn knows what customer service is all about.  The place is maintained and clean.  The pool was very warm and even though it was raining outside, people still used the pool.  The continental breakfast consisted of yogart, bagels, muffins, doughnuts, toast, cereals and wonderful fresh fruit.   It was my daughters birthday and they made her homemade cookies in a gift bag with
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking time to share your experience and feedback. We do aspire to provide a very clean and comfortable property with guest satisfaction and service a main ingredient. Yes, we do heat our pool, kiddie pool and spa all year for the comfort of our guests. Our complimentary Exclusive Shuttle and Expanded Continental Breakfast are items that set us apart from many properties and something that guests have come to enjoy and appreciate very much. I am delighted that your daughter enjoyed her cookies; it is my pleasure to add a bit of happiness to her special day! Warm regards.

Summary: We stayed at the Candy Cane Inn for 3 nights and it was WONDERFUL!  The breakfasts were great and the rooms and bathrooms were large, clean and well appointed.  Being within walking distance to Disneyland was a plus although they do off a shuttle free of charge also.  I would recommend this place to anyone.  I didn't use the pool but my grandson went swimming every day and loved it.  A++++
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for staying with us and sharing your experience with fellow travelers. I am delighted that your grandson "loved" our pool that is heated year around for guests comfort enjoyment. Please feel free to contact me directly should you need assistance with rates or reservations for future visits.

Summary Heading: Comfortable and convenient when visiting Disneyland!
Summary: This inn is literally minutes away from the entrances to Disneyland and California Adventure. I thought this was a cute little inn and was just perfect for the price because of how little time you would actually be spending there at the inn anyway.  The only issue we had was that the Wi-Fi was very weak in our room. Not a huge deal though all the same.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us on your recent visit and bringing attention to the weak WIFI signal in your room. We continually monitor and strive to improve our system and feedback is a valuable tool so we can address the area. Kind regards!

Summary: This hotel is close to Disneyland, and when we didn't want to walk anymore the shuttle service is really handy, especially with small children.  Our hotel room was a little on the small side for 2 adults and 2 children.  The breakfast is your usual continental breakfast, well stocked with muffins, bagels, fruit ect.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and we appreciate your comments on TripAdvisor. We do have three room types and they vary in sizes for guests who opt for the additional space as most rooms have two queen beds. We only have three King bedded rooms on property and they are in our Deluxe category. Our Standard Room, our Deluxe Room which is approximately 45 square feet larger and our Premium Room which is approximately 45 square feet larger than the Deluxe and these rooms have additional amenities and services. Kind regards!

Summary: We stayed here on business for four nights. This hotel is very nice and looks like it has recently been rennovated. Rooms were good sized, comfortable and quiet. Breakfast and coffee were provided which was very convenient. We had trouble with the heater the first night but the staff immediately fixed the problem when we let them know. I look forward to staying at this hotel again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us and providing us with your valuable feedback. I am delighted that your heater was repaired promptly and must agree that our engineering team responds without hesitation once they are notified. I do appreciate your comment regarding the condition of our property as we continually strive to improve and keep in pristine condition. Please feel free to contact me personally when returning as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations. Kind regards!

Summary: Stayed at the Candy Cane through word of mouth in August 2009. We enjoyed that stay so much, that we returned a year later. The rooms are large, comfortable and quiet. With a 7 year old the extra room on the balconies was well received. The pool was enjoyable as was the breakfats around the pool in the mornings.  There was plenty of parking (free) and it was only a short walk to Disneyland during the day and Garden Walk (restaurants) at night. The free (well, small tip - worth it) shuttle was also very much appreciated on hot days.   Will happily stay again when venturing over to see Mickey and the gang, although my wife has stated she could stay there just to relax, go shopping and visit the nearby restaurants.
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us the opportunity to be of service on your past two visits. We certainly appreciate your feedback and are delighted that you enjoyed your stays. Please feel free to contact me directly when you are planning your next visit as it would be my pleasure to assist with rates and reservations.

Summary: We have stayed at the Candy Cane Inn many times over the last 12 years. Our children have grown up with this hotel and are also very comfortable here. The rooms are clean and comfortable, breakfast is simple but good with a  variety pastries, bagels, fruit , and cereals, with an attentive staff keeping it filled, front desk staff are friendly, management is quick to take care of any problems, and we are grateful they still have their own shuttle. Try squeezing into an over-crowded Resort Transit bus only to be driven around Anaheim before arriving at your own hotel. As for others complaints about rooms being small. This may be true, the hotel is an older , well maintained property,  but we are there only to sleep, as we spend most of our time at the resort or surrounding
Manager Response: Thank you for being a loyal Candy Cane Inn guest, we DO appreciate your business and kind comments.
