Thank you for recognizing our shuttle driver and staff for their friendliness. Warm regards!

Summary Heading: So glad we chose to stay here!
Summary: I was hesitant to stay in a "non-chain motel" sight unseen, especially with an infant who crawls on the floor.  However, the reviews on TripAdvisor have always been pretty on target, so I took the leap of faith and made our reservations with the Candy Cane Inn.  I am so glad we did, because our stay was absolutely wonderful.  The room was clean, the staff was friendly & accommodating, the courtyard was a peaceful oasis from the bustle of the Disney area and the hotel is practically next door to the park entrance.  The room rates were reasonable and the complimentary continental breakfast was more than sufficient.  Target is just down the street if you need to pick up essentials.  The only thing I might say is if you need to have a crib, I wonder if the premium room might have
Manager Response: Thank you so much for allowing us the opportunity and staying with us on your recent visit. TripAdvisor is a trusted site and I too encourage guests to review any property prior to staying if they have no knowledge or history. In regards to cleanliness, we have an excellent housekeeping team who maintain our property well. I thank you for your comments and knowing that you feel comfortable in recommending is valuable to me. Warm regards!

Summary Heading: 3rd stay at Candy Cane & we'll be back.....
Summary: We have come to love the Candy Cane Inn. Whenever we visit Disneyland, Candy Cane is home. Some folks love it others don't care for it.  Here's my 2 cents......it is a motor inn so expect all that goes along with that. The rooms are located right off the parking lot so you do hear cars and lots of voices.  Folks who love the Candy Cane do so because of the cottage-like ambiance, great staff (love the guy with all the tinker bell pins who circulates at breakfast), close proximity to park, shuttle, and value.  At this visit it was evident that they were cutting back a bit with the breakfast.  I seem to remember there being yogurts and hard boiled eggs before.  Now it's bagels, muffins, cereal, and fruit.  Still very satisfying. My one and only complaint is about the noise in the
Manager Response: Thank you so much for continuing to stay with in spite of your noisy neighbor's. I apologize for this and we even have security on overnight who continually the walk the property and quiet those guests who are not as considerate as others. Our ambiance is certainly something that guests love and the internal corridor vs external is that of preference. In regards to your comments on our expanded breakfast, we have not cut back at all. In conversation with our "tinker bell pin" gentleman, Edd, who has been here 24 years states we have never had hard boiled eggs or yogurts. None the less we do appreciate your continued business and comments and look forward in seeing you next year.

Summary: Stayed here for a few days with family. Great little hotel near Disneyland and everything else. Lots of places to eat nearby and close to major highways. If looking for a great, clean and cozy little hotel then you can't go wrong.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your comments. We do appreciate your business and comments.

Summary: We decided on a last minute trip down to Disneyland and all our regular places were booked up, so we opted to try the Candy Cane.  Now, we are unusual in that we travel with my daughter's hearing dog and we also train service dogs for another organization.  We were very pleased with the staffs ability to accommodate us.  We stayed in 2 deluxe rooms. They were clean and well maintained. The pool was very nice and the breakfast was very good.  We really liked that the shuttle ran ON TIME.  Over all, a very pleasant stay!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and it was our pleasure in assisting with your daughter's service dog. Requests are something that we take seriously and certainly do whatever possible to ensure guest satisfaction. Thank you again for your business.

Summary: This place has become a must after our first visit last summer and due to the Christmas frenzy at Disneyland our latest trip was at jeopardy because all the rooms were sold out. It just took one little call to the manager Jeff Holl and he worked hard for a week to make sure we could get a room during this crazy season, Thank you Jeff! The next test was because of the hectic and busy Christmas season how well would this Inn stand up to the insanity, verdict: Quality remained the same, despite the crowds. The biggest draw for us remained the complimentary Breakfast every morning, Free DEDICATED shuttle to Disneyland, Free Internet WiFi, Free parking, cozy courtyard, and the comfortable beds waiting to greet you after a long day. Really couldn't imagine having a Disneyland trip
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your comments and staying with us. We do appreciate your business and sharing your experience. See you next trip and feel free to contact me anytime for reservations assistance. Warm regards!

Summary: This is the first time we have stayed off property (instead of the Grand Californian).  We can't say enough for the service and friendliness of the staff.  What a pleasure to have free breakfast delivered to our room.  The premium rooms were large enough for 4 (which included 2 teenagers).  The shuttle came every 1/2 hour, although the 7 minute walk was not that far.  The location was great.  Very quiet!  Beds were comfortable.  Next time we visit Disneyland we will make reservations @ Candy Cane Inn.
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us to opportunity and staying with us on your recent trip. Your comments and business are appreciated and it is our pleasure in serving guests. I would be delighted in assisting you with future reservations and feel free to contact me directly. Warm regards!

Summary Heading: Total Pleasure Staying at Candy Cane Inn
Summary: We make at least one trip to Disneyland a year. At first we shopped around until we tried the Candy Cane, mainly because of it's close location to the park and it's award for beauty.  We have never looked back.  The rooms are always spotlessly clean, the beds comfortable.  This time we found they had upgraded to flatscreen TV's, very nice!  The Inn has gorgeous flowers outside, is cozy & welcoming inside.  Two queen beds in every room. We upgraded to a deluxe room this time as the standard room , while adequate, is bit tight on space.  The deluxe room is well worth the extra charge!  The larger room was perfect for us!  We always request a room on second floor as well, the kids footsteps can be hard to listen to on the bottom floor, at least until they fall asleep!  Top floor is
Manager Response: We thank you for staying with us and taking time to share your observations regarding our hotel and services provided. We do aspire to be a comfortable and cozy property with an emphasis on cleanliness, product and personalized guest service. We look forward in seeing you again and feel free to contact me directly should you need reservations assistance.

Summary Heading: Trust me...you will love this hotel
Summary: This was our second 6 day stay at the Candy Cane Inn.  I can't tell you how fantastic this hotel is in words! It is clean, quiet, staff is so friendly and professional, the shuttle bus is always on time with friendly patient drivers, breakfast is great, grounds are beautiful, close to Disneyland! We love it!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Happiest Place to Stay on Earth
Summary: This is THE BEST polace to stay with small children.....It is the best deal out there!!!!!!!  The rooms are incredible, the staff awesome and the inn room breakfast a deal!!!!!!! It made our trip to Disneyland even better...We will stay here for years to come!!!!!!! The best hotel, even better than a Disney property!!!!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and I am pleased that you were happy with your room and our staff was helpful during your visit. We do appreciate your business and look forward in seeing you again. Please feel free to contact me directly should you need assistance with reservations.

Summary: We just returned home from a trip to SoCal, which included five nights at The Candy Cane Inn. Coming from La Costa in the SanDiego area, we were a little bit spoiled as far as accomodations. I was nervous about staying at a smaller, less expensive hotel, but was pleasantly surprised with our experience! Check in was a breeze, literally took 2 minutes. Our room was ready at check-in time and very conveniently located. The rooms are small. Because we were a family of 4, on a 10 day excursion, we had lots of luggage. We had to leave some of the luggage in the car (which was fine, as we had a great parking spot just outside the door of our room). FREE PARKING. :) The beds were very comfortable, and the room very clean. As soon as we used the toilet, it started to overflow. We called
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for your staying with us and the response you posted. I am delighted that your vacation to California was enjoyable and I do appreciate your kind comments regarding our property, service and hospitality provided you and your family. Warm regards!

Summary: We spent four nights at the Candy Cane Inn and were very happy with the hotel.  We had orginally booked the Carousel Inn 3 bedroom but after receiving a call 1 month prior telling us they would be remodeling that room and could get us two adjoining rooms we decided to book the Candy Cane Inn-we are glad we did.   Our family booked two premium adjoining rooms for Jan. 27th-31st, prior to checking in, I called to confirm and asked if we could get a lower rate (never hurts to ask) and to my surprise she gave me the same rate for all the nights which was $159.   Our family enjoyed the premium rooms and the "perks" you received for booking that room, our favorite was breakfast delivered to your room.  Breakfast was close and we could always get more if needed but to not have to leave
Manager Response: Thank you for making the switch and allowing us the opportunity to serve your family. Our Premium Room's, and their amenities are something that once you try you most likely will book over and over. Yes, we will honor a reduction in rates without question if they have been reduced in our system. We do get many positive comments on the fact that our pool, spa and kiddies pool are heated year-around for guest comfort. In closing, we certainly appreciate your recommending our quaint little hotel to your friends. Warm regards!

Summary: A friend who frequents Disneyland recommended the Candy Cane Inn to us. She said it was the only place she stayed. So with her rec and all the great reviews here, we decided to give it a try. We couldn't have asked for a better stay. It was close enough to the park to walk, which we did on most days even with the kids. We did use the shuttle 3 times and found the drivers to be very pleasant and helpful. The front desk was always nice and accommodating. I asked for a parking pass for my MIL so she could come a few nights and babysit, while my husband and I enjoyed late night Disney and they had no problems with this. I asked to check out an hour late since our flight wasn't until the afternoon and that was not a problem either. The rooms were immaculate and very nicely decorated.
Manager Response: We thank you for staying with us and your friend for the recommendation. Word of mouth is very important and goes a long way when coming from a trusted friend. Working with guests on requests certainly builds loyalty and goodwill and that is what the Candy Cane Inn is known for. I thank you for your comment on our green policy and will discuss with our housekeeping team.

Summary Heading: Only place we stay at for Disneyland
Summary: We stayed Dec 11th through the 13th. We were also here in October and April 2009. I think we have stayed here 5 times over the past few years. With young children the premium room is what we go for. They deliver breakfast and we use the microwave alot. The rooms are always spotless and the service is first class. The front desk is always friendly and ready to assist with any questions you may have. When we were here it rained hard Friday and Saturday so the dryer they have on the property came in handy. The shuttle drivers will stop and pick up people in the lot if they are running late. If you choose to walk it's maybe a 10 minute trip. We plan on returning again in April
Manager Response: Thank you for continuing to stay with us and taking time to share your experiences. Our team sincerely attempts to give exceptional guest service and I appreciate your recognition of such. Yes, our guest laundry is helpful for families travelling or that emergency when the weather is not cooperating with your vacation. Thank you again for your business and see you in April!

Summary: I arrived the morning of January 2, 2010.  I was pleasantly surprised that my room was ready for me.  I am handicapped and the room assigned to me was near the office and the shuttle pickup spot.  Each morning the breakfasts were great.  I always had more than enough to eat. The room was always clean.  The gentlemen who drove the shuttle were fantastic.  They assisted the clients who had difficulty with the steps.  The shuttle was one of the reasons that I choose this establishment.  The management were quickly to solve problems.  One morning, I had a planned activity called Breakfast with Minnie and Friends.  The shuttle was changing over from the holiday schedule to their regular schedule.  I had to be at the park for 9:30. The shuttle didn't run until 10:00 that morning.  The
Manager Response: I am delighted to learn that your stay was enjoyable and our team lived up to the reputation of the Candy Cane Inn. Customer service is paramount in our industry and we strive for memorable guests experiences. Thank you for your business and it would be my pleasure to assist you with future reservations. Warm regards!

Summary: This was my first time staying at the Candy Cane Inn and I was pleasantly surprised.  I decided to stay due to the good reviews, value and proximity to the park.  The rooms were clean and comfortable and a good size.  The rooms were mostly quiet.  We could not hear any noise coming from other guests.  The only "noise" we heard were excited kids and guests walking down the corridors leaving for the morning.    What determined my stay was the "extras' that came with the room.  Free Wi-fi, parking, shuttle to Disneyland and breakfast.  The wi-fi was a bit slow but parking was excellent.  It was easy to find a spot close to your room.  The shuttle to Disneyland was awesome!  This is perfect since other hotels usually only offer the ART bus system which has a daily fee.  The shuttle
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and I appreciate your taking time to respond and post your comments. I am sincerely sorry about your electrical outlet and upon my research found, yes, it was immediately replaced upon your comment at check-out. We do like to pride ourselves on the fact that we have NO hidden charges or fees. The rate you pay for room and tax is inclusive of room, expanded complimentary breakfast, parking, our own exclusive shuttle to and from the park, WIFI and all hotel amenities. We do look forward in seeing you again and feel free to contact me directly should you need reservations assistance. Warm regards!

Summary: Candy Cane is one of my favorite little hotels. Great location and private shuttle. Although we usually walk it. The hotel is always clean and has a great comp breakfast to start your day off.  The rooms were nice and clean but are starting to show some wear . Would love to see new bedding and better carpets but other than that it's a great place.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments and past business, we do appreciate this! I am certainly proud of our housekeeping team and the job they do in keeping our property nice and clean. We changed our bedding, carpeting and wall covering just over a year ago and have received many positive comments to the "lighter and brighter" tropical feel. We do receive some comments on guests who liked the "heavier" feel of the comforters and pillow shams and it just may be personal preference. Thank you again for your business and comments.

Summary: We stayed at the Candy cane Inn for the first time April 2009.   We are staying with them again this March as we were very pleased with the superb service, cleanliness of rooms and grounds and amenities.   If you travel with a family it is a great place to stay as you have a very nice continental breakfast that has food for all ages.  The proximity to Disneyland cannot be beat.  You can walk and be at the front gate in matter of minutes, or you can simply ride on their shuttle which runs every 30 minutes on the dot.  The pool area is a wonderful place to spend some time after a day in the park as there is a very nice hot tub area.  I didn't notice the noise factor as we have a young child and we were having probably just as much fun as all the other families staying in the motel
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and I am delighted that you will be returning in March. Please feel free to contact me personally should you need any assistance in preparation to your visit or while you are here. We do appreciate your business, past and future!

Summary Heading: The only place we will stay in the Disneyland area.
Summary: I can't say enough good things about this little motel. The service was outstanding. We were traveling with our extended family and received wonderful care by the staff. My father required medical equipment, some of which was delivered before we arrived, and the staff made sure that everything was set up for us. They also suggested a place to rent a lark like scooter and took care of setting it up for us. Not only were they helpful, but they helped us save money on the scooter which was an upgrade from the ones at Disneyland.  The rooms were clean, the beds were comfortable, the breakfast was enough to get us all going for the day and the staff was friendly and helpful. We really appreciated the free shuttle to and from Disneyland.  After trying various other hotels and motels
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and I appreciate your comments and business. Our team certainly cares and assisting guests with equipment or services is an important park of their daily routine. We do receive many positive comments on the high quality double pillow top Serta mattresses we have in all our guest rooms. I do thank you for your comments on the cleanliness of our rooms as this is extremely important issue in traveling. We look forward in seeing you again and feel free to contact me directly for any assistance. Warm regards!

Summary: I cannot rate this hotel highly enough. We booked it based purely on tripadvisor ratings and were not disappointed.  The staff are so helpful, the rooms fabulous, in fact the whole experience was brilliant. From the candy cane pens the staff use (I know, rubbish detail but I loved it!) to the free breakfast which we didn't realise we were getting. You can load up before hitting Disney and then stop at one of the local restaurants on the way back for dinner.   The hotel has a small pool which was in use constantly and it's literally next door to Disney. If you're old, overweight or have young children, take the free courtesy bus from the hotel, otherwise it will take you less than five minutes to walk.
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us the opportunity and staying at our hotel. I am delighted that we lived up to the TripAdvisor ratings and you enjoyed your visit. Warm regards!

Summary: Great location. 5 minute walk to main gates at disney, although for the less inclined there is a shuttle every 30 mins.  rooms are ok. This is an old establishment (I'd guess about 50 years) but has been updated and cared for. It's certainly not modern but is clean and satisfactory. It's rated the best hotel in the area but I've certainly stayed in much better in other cities, so can only suspect it wins on location and staff who are all very pleasant and helpful.   Breakfast is ok, usual things for an Inn, but wished the coffee was a little stronger.  Having said all this I would definitely stay again because the short walk is great.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and providing us with your feedback. I will certainly discuss your comments with our coffee vendor. Strength is that of personal taste but none the less I will make sure we are not set too light either. Yes, we are one of the first hotels at the park and have been continually owned and operated by the same family over 53 years. The hotel was re-built in 1987 and we continually upgrade and renovate to maintain a product our guests have grown to enjoy. Warm regards!

Summary: Am a bit late writing this but wanted to "sing the praises" of what a great time we had.  Had two adjoining rooms and found that there was plenty of room for a portacrib in each.  The shuttle was very handy to take us to and from the park --the driver even helped to load the strollers without us having to fold them up.  Taking our breakfast back to the room was easier than toting all the kids to and from; and there were plenty of choices for all of our needs.  The grounds are lush with beautiful flowers and shrubs; and I loved the quaintness of the cobblestone driveway.  Every worker we came in contact with was most friendly; and anything we needed was brought to the room in a very timely manner.  We're already planning to come back in 2011 and will definitely be staying here.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and I appreciate your sharing feedback with other travelers. Our shuttle drivers are true gentlemen and I thank them and all our employees for being sincerely friendly and assisting guests.

Summary: Please folks, ignore the recent negative reviews, I work with the general public, and let me tell you, some people always find something to complain about.   CCI is the best, hands down.  Let me put it this way:  if we were planning a trip to Disneyland and the Candy Cane was booked, we would not go.  Simple as that.  The staff is beyond friendly, grounds are beautiful, rooms simple and clean, breakfast is great and above all we love the pool area after a long day in the park.  Thanks again to Jeff and James and your wonderful staff....we will be back in October.  Can't wait!!  The Napoli Family
Manager Response: I am delighted that we once again lived up to your expectations. We certainly appreciate the opportunity in having you continue to stay with us and sincerely appreciate your business!

Summary: I have unfortunately instilled my love of Disney onto my 3 year old son.  And during the month of November he had constantly begged to go to Disneyland.  I am always eager to go while hubby on the other hand will go somewhat unwillingly.  Thanksgiving week we were still 50/50 about going.  The Wednesday before Thanksgiving still not decision.  And then at 3 pm Thanksgiving day to the heck with it!  We decided to leave to Disney that night.  No hotel and no idea if we would be able to find a room.  I called Candy Cane Inn at 3:30.  Upon reading that Candy Cane was one of the better hotels around Disney I crossed my fingers.  Reading the reviews and having the manager respond to almost every single one of the reviews whether good or bad is great since that makes me think they
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for staying with us and providing the readers with your in-depth feedback. I do appreciate your comment regarding my personally responding to all guests. I feel very passionate about guest service and if you can take valuable time to provide me with feedback, I certainly should be considerate to read and respond. We are a family hotel and while we are tucked in and quaint we still experience the young and the young at heart that can be a bit noisy at times. I am delighted that we passed the "hubby" test and please feel free to contact me directly should you need any assistance with future bookings. Warm regards!

Summary: We visit Disneyland at least once a year and have been staying at various hotels.  We decided to try Candy Cane Inn because of the high ratings on Trip Advisor.  We were definetely very disappointed!  The guest rooms have very thin walls and I could hear conversations from the adjacent rooms.  It was not party or loud noise but just normal talking voice.  I've never experience this at other places before.  In addition, everytime when people walk by or shut their doors near our room, it woke us up from our sleep.  One of our beds (the one I slept on with my 6 year old) was also extremely uncomfortable.  It seemed very old and must have broken springs in it.  I tossed and turned the entire night and wondered if I should just go sleep in my mini van instead.    Perhaps I got the
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at our hotel and providing us with your feedback. We do listen to our guests and appreciate the comments provided as they are valuable tools. In regards to your comments on mattress I do appreciate and certainly understand personal preference in softness or firmness. I do want to clarify that all of our beds are Double Pillow Top Serta Presidential Mattress that are rotated per manufacturer specifications and are less than two years old.

Summary: We stayed at the Candy cane inn to celebrate my daughter's 3rd birthday at Disneyland. We were pleasantly surprised when we arrived to find a   little batch of cookies with a happy birthday card attached to it on the bed. They were some really good cookies with an assortment of flavors. Thank you! Pros: Very clean. Beautiful grounds. 10 min. stroll to the entrance of Disneyland. ABC store right next to it for more affordable gifts and snacks. Basic but free breakfast from 7-9am, but they do have a try in the room so you can carry the food back to your room. Awesome free shuttle every 30 min. and always on time. Free parking. Con: The only con I had was that there wasn't an elevator. So if you are handicapped or have a lot of luggage, I suggest  you stay on the 1 st floor.  I
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us and sharing your comments regarding your visit. I am delighted that your daughter enjoyed her birthday cookies and it was my pleasure! In regards to elevators, you are correct that we do not have elevators however please feel free to ask upon checking in as we would be happy to assist with luggage.

Summary Heading: Don't ever change your reservations!  You'll pay for it!
Summary: I booked a room months in advance for a family vacation to Disneyland.  When I wanted to shift my trip by one day, I had to cancel my original reservation and make a new one.  That's fine, but then I found that my credit card was charged as a no show for the original reservation.    I was not able to get the $160 refunded to me, despite the fact that I have been a yearly visitor and the hotel was not full, so they didn't lose any money on it.  I wasn't even offered ANY of the money as a refund!  I was told that I could apply the money to a visit within the next year.  Well I live in Washington state, so that doesn't help, does it.    I will never stay here again!  I hear there's a great Embassy Suites close by!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: A must-stay for those visiting D-Land!
Summary: I visited Candy Cane inn with my husband last fall for my first 'on location' travel writing assignment. It was our first time to D-Land and we absolutely loved it all! CCI was a great hotel to stay at. It has it's own shuttle, great breakfast, wonderful service, and a great pool and jacuzzi to hang out by. My hubby and I both loved the hotel and the area. We visited Anaheim Gardenwalk, Universal Studios Hollywood, and checked out a quaint pizza place across from the CCI. I have been to other hotels and locations since, but have yet to find one I loved as much as D-Land and Candy Cane Inn. I look forward to coming back this spring!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your feedback. I am so happy that you and your husband enjoyed yourselves in southern California. We look forward in seeing you this spring and feel free to contact me directly should you need reservations.

Summary: We absolutely loved our stay at this hotel!!!  This was my 4th trip to Disneyland and 2nd trip with the family.  I've stayed at other hotels in the area, but the Candy Cane Inn was the better value of any of the hotels for the following reasons:  location to Disneyland and restaurants (within walking distance), free shuttle service, better than average FREE continental breakfast, free WiFi, very clean accomodations and friendly staff.   If you're going to be traveling with small children, I wouldn't pay too much attention to some of the other reviews who complain of aggressive housekeeping (we never experienced such behavior) or the noise.  We heard more giggles than crying, but that's to be expected when there are many families staying at this hotel. If you're a person who
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us the opportunity and staying with us on your recent visit to the theme parks. We do aspire to be a family property that is clean, friendly and moderately priced. Please feel free to contact me directly should you be returning as I would be delighted to assist with reservations or rates. Warm regards and a happy holiday season!

Summary Heading: Does NOT live up to the hype! Stay across the street from the park for better room, less $$.
Summary: After reading countless positive reviews here on tripadvisor.com about the Candy Cane Inn, we decided to book our stay here. That was a mistake. Here is my honest assessment of the pros and cons of the Candy Cane.  Pros: -Shuttle service was always on time, and drivers were extremely friendly -Property has nice landscaping with lots of flowers and cobblestone  -A reasonable distance from Disneyland- took us about 10 minutes to walk at an average pace -Front desk staff was very friendly, with the exception of one (see Cons). -Breakfast was free. Not very good, but free.  -Christmas music was playing in the pool area- that was really nice!  Cons: -THE ROOM. The deluxe room we stayed in was larger than a standard room, but I can't imagine how the room could have been any smaller
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to respond regarding your most recent stay. Feedback is key to the continued success of the Candy Cane Inn.  First and foremost, I sincerely apologize for the inconveniences you encountered during your stay.  Although we strive for perfection, I do understand that challenges occur and how we address these concerns will determine guest satisfaction.    As you stated, I did receive your initial e-mail during your stay and immediately had my team address your concerns. I must admit that I was disappointed to learn, that despite your reply stating your concerns were rectified, my team and I were unsuccessful in renewing your faith in our hotel.  I want to assure you that the satisfaction of our guests continues to be our number one priority, and has been for the last 53 years.  I have shared your comments with our Management Team and I have asked them to use your comments as a coaching tool to improve our services.  Again, thank you for sharing your feedback with me. If your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim area and you would like to give us another chance please give us a call.   Happy Holidays!

Summary: We were impressed from the very start.  While checking in I was looking through the stack of local attraction brochures and had picked one up for The Rain Forest Cafe.  I believe Kristen C was checking us in and noticed I was holding the brochure.  She whipped out two free kids meal vouchers and gave them to us.  It was great, The Candy Cane Inn was already saving us money!  The Hotel is gorgeous.  The landscaping is just beautiful.  We were in awe as we drove through the cobblestone parking lot to a spot right in front of the stairs to our room.  When we entered our room it smelled clean.  We could tell housekeeping had been there and had actually done their job.  It was beautiful.  My wife and kids loved the shutters on the windows.  They were so easy to open and close and
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time to share your experiences at the Candy Cane Inn. I am pleased to read that you and your family enjoyed your stay. We look forward in seeing you again and feel free to contact me directly should you need reservations assistance. Warm regards!

Summary: We arrived at the candy cane inn during a down pour so it was a nice relief to get off the freeways. We arrived early but our premium room was available. Check in was fast, but the two reception staff must have had a disagreement prior to our arrival so the service was a little less professional than expected. The room itself was spacious with a very hand fridge, coffee machine, DVD player etc. The upgrade to Premium was worth it as the breakfasts were very good, as were the little touches you get with this option inc. 2pm check out. It takes all of 5 minutes to reach the disney gates and we made a full day of it starting at 8am and getting back at 5pm. J D Chang chinese restaurant in the Garden walk area (5 minutes waya by foot) is well worth a visit for dinner and there is
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us and providing us with this valuable feedback. I also appreciate your prompt response when I send you the internal email to obtain more information. This has enabled me to take immediate action and prevent future opportunities in regards to lack of professionalism. I am pleased that you enjoyed your Premium Room and additional amenities. Happy Holidays!

Summary Heading: The Candy Cane Inn does it again!!!!
Summary: How many times have you had a wonderful experience at a place only to be let down the next time you go because of your high expectations? Not here. High expectations from previous visits and they deliver again. Always a pleasure to stay at the Candy Cane Inn. For the price you can't beat it. The continental breakfast, the employees, and the clean rooms. The list goes on and on. So close to Disneyland you could walk or take the comp shuttle. As always we will return!!!!
Manager Response: I am so happy that we once again met your exceptions for a return visit. We do appreciate your allowing us the opportunity to continue and be your hotel of choice when visiting the theme parks. I wish you and yours a pleasant holiday season!

Summary Heading: Candy Cane Inn was true to its reviews.
Summary: Check-in: quick, without hassles. Breakfast service: 7-9 a.m., decent quality, choices, but basic breakfast.  Seating indoors was limited, but plenty of seating outdoors, by pool.  Chilly mornings would make it difficult to enjoy a leisurely breakfast, but this is SoCal - not too many cold mornings. Maid service: impeccable. Shuttle to Disneyland: always on time, drivers were friendly, willing to lend a hand with loading up stroller. Our room had a small fridge; bathroom had tub.  Room was spacious, clean, well-appointed. Parking spaces - free; not too difficult to find on the property, on beautiful cobblestone pavement.  Location: Walking distance to Disneyland Resort; plenty of chain and other restaurants within a mile of the motel.  ABC stores for supplies, knick-knacks right
Manager Response: I am delighted that your stay was enjoyable and thank you for sharing your thoughts here on TripAdvisor. We do appreciate your business and look forward in seeing you on your next visit. Please feel free to contact me directly should you need assistance with reservations. Warm regards!

Summary Heading: Small room - BIG amenities - Relaxing stay - wonderful staff
Summary: First of all, yes, the premium room is small. BUT it is big on amenities. There were only two of us so we didn't need much room. I wish I had a place like this when our daughter was small and we were making our D'land trips and paying through the nose for extras. The location of the 7-11 and the ABC store make it easy to walk and pick up a couple of things for meals. The grounds are super clean and very cute. Pool area very nice with music - also very clean. We will be returning for a little get away in the future.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and providing us with your feedback. Cleanliness, friendliness and customer service are extremely important items and we appreciate your commenting on them. In addition to the ABC and 7-11 the Anaheim GardenWalk offers many fabulous dining options. We look forward in seeing you again and feel free to contact me directly for reservations assistance. Happy Holidays!

Summary: I'll start on a positive note:  Pros: Bed is super comfy, rooms are spacious and clean and have a very 'cosy' feel, bathroom is roomy and updated, basin is outside of bathroom, coffee pot, flat screen tv, free shuttle which we used often. Breakfast was tasty.  Cons: the free WIFI worked about 20% of the time, big minus as this was one of the reasons I paid extra for this hotel. Very noisy for us, we were so jet lagged and needed extra sleep but sleeping in is not an option here, we were right next to the cleaners room and had stairs outside our bedroom door as well and could hear the cleaners trolleys and every family walking past, we were woken up about 6.30 every morning...very frustrating.  I guess for families with kids who rise early and you don't have any intention of
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us and providing us with this valuable feedback. We continually work to enhance our WIFI system to better serve our guests and I apologize if you were located in a weaker location. In regards to noise I have covered with our housekeeping staff that arrives at 8am. As for guests and happy little ones it is beyond our control. For those guests reading, we would ask and appreciate consideration of others that may not be early risers. Warm regards!

Summary Heading: excellent place to stay for a disneyland trip
Summary: We stayed at the candy cane inn based on reviews on tripadvisor and were not dissappointed. It is exactly what we expected. The staff is very friendly and accomodating, the grounds were beautiful, The room was perfect for a family with young children(premium room). We also enjoyed the breakfast basket brought to our room each morning. It made it easy with small children to eat and get ready for a big day at disneyland. We upgraded to the premium room just for that ammenity and it was worth it.( I'm sure the breakfast they served by the pool area was very nice as well ). We also enjoyed the free shuttle service offered since we did not have a stroller to walk to the park. We also reallly liked the fact that the pool was kept nicely heated. Because of the time of year the air temp
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and I am very  delighted that we lived up to your expectations. Our Premium Rooms provide those extras that many guests like and they reserve over and over again. Yes, we heat our Pool, Spa and Kiddie Pool for comfort year-around. The convenience stores next door as well as the new Anaheim GardenWalk certainly add to shopping and dining choices. We look forward in seeing you again and feel free to contact me directly should you need assistance with reservations.

Summary Heading: Loved the Candy Cane - perfect location and very comfy
Summary: A great, great place to stay when Disneying. Free parking right outside your room, free breakfast that you can bring back to your room. Comfy beds and nice linen. Free shuttle bus with friendly drivers and prompt service. Couldn't ask for more! Keep up the good work Candy Cane Inn!
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us the opportunity and staying with us as well as providing us with your feedback. We do believe in "NO" hidden or extra charges and when we quote room and tax that is exactly what you are charged. Warm regards!

Summary: My daughter surprised me with a trip to L.A. and we had the pleasure of staying at the Candy Cane Inn.  What a wonderful place it was.  Clean and nice.  We enjoyed the hot tub each evening.  The breakfast was perfect for us and the shuttle bus to Disneyland was wonderful.  I spoke with a lot of people there and they wouldn't stay any where else.  Thanks to my daughter's surprise, I too got to experience a wonderful trip.  Thank you Candy Cane Inn.
Manager Response: I am delighted to read that your "surprise" trip was wonderful. We do aspire to be a clean and comfortable property while providing exceptional service and exceeding guests expectations. Thank you again for your business and we look forward to your next visit. Happy Holidays!

Summary Heading: Good location - average motel with some issues
Summary: This hotel has a great location - - on the same side of the street as Disneyland, an easy walk. Our room was clean and generally in good repair (there was a spot in the bathroom, on the door frame, that was completely rusted out, but that was an exception to an otherwise clean room).  The one time that we tried to take the shuttle to Disneyland it left 5 minutes early, leaving us and the other guests waiting without a ride to the park. We all just walked, but after waiting for a shuttle that had left early!  The wireless internet did not work at all on our trip, despite our asking the front desk personnel. This is an important thing for our family, as my husband fits in a bit of work here and there, and really a deal-breaker for future stays. We were told in the evening that
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for taking the time to share your comments and then personally speaking with me regarding your visit. We do listen to our guests and value the feedback and perception you offer. We are in an ever changing "travelling" world where service, ownership and follow-through regarding opportunities are basic ingredients. We clearly missed the mark on these and I sincerely apologize for that. I look forward in meeting you on your visit next spring. Warm regards!

Summary: We just got back from a 4 night stay at CCI on our 3 person family trip to Disneyland. I booked CCI based on reviews from this site. My family and I weren't disappointed. First the location was great (next to being at a Disneyland hotel it couldn't be much better). It was nice being on the same side of the street as the park, which made the 10 minute walk easy. Also the private CCI shuttle was a bonus. There was also an ABC Market  and 7-11 right next door which made it easy to grab snacks. CCI is also close enough to walk to the Anaheim Garden Walk which hosted some nice restruant choices outside of the park.  The property itself was extremely clean. There is staff constantly maintaining the grounds. The rooms were adequately sized (deluxe with 2 queens) and were kept extremely
Manager Response: We thank you for staying with us and I appreciate your taking time to share your experience. Our location is certainly very positive for the things you noted; the only hotel adjacent to Disneyland, not having to cross a major street, convenience stores located next door and the GardenWalk is certainly a great addition. We do look forward in seeing you again and thank you so much for your business, it is most appreciated!

Summary: Once again, the Candy Cane rocked with a great shuttle service and staff that are great and it seems like a family there. No corporate attitude here. within 5 min from Disneyland, and a shuttle every half hour, this place really a dream come true. I dare you to visit and think you can find better Bill
Manager Response: I am delighted that we "once again" exceeded your expectations.  Thank you for the kind comments regarding our "family" as they certainly make the Candy Cane Inn pleasant and warm. We do appreciate your staying with us and sharing your comments and look forward in seeing you again!

Summary Heading: Good Enough for Us! Will Return
Summary: I booked this room for myself and my 6 year old daughter knowing I had to be close to the park because my little girl performed for the filming of the 2009 ABC Christmas Disneyland Parade, then later for their Mainstreet Parade, so there was a LOT of in and out of costume and back and forth.  We stayed in the park mostly because of time restrictions....but during my down/wait time, it was nice to be able to go back to the room and put my feet up!   The service desk says it's 250 yard/10 minute walk to the ENTRANCE of DL.  And it pretty much is.  I call it more like 15 minutes, but I am really out of shape, have Achilles tendonitis, and recent ankle surgery.....so if I can do it, it's close enough.   My biggest concern was what was considered "entrance to Disneyland" some places
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and I am delighted that we met and exceeded your expectations. You are very true as to our location and our exclusive complimentary shuttle saves your feet and your wallet. In regards to your comment on a microwave we do have one in our breakfast room that is available for guest use 24 hours per day. And in the future if you need luggage assistance it would be our pleasure, first or second floor. We look forward in seeing you again and welcome to the Candy Cane Inn family of repeat guests!

Summary Heading: This hotel lived up to all of its great reviews
Summary: We had read a lot about the Candy Cane Inn on TripAdvisor and it lived up to the hype.  It's great to find a place where the employees take pride in their work and their facility.  Everything is maintained beautifully.  Every day there was someone working on landscaping, maintenance, parking lot, etc.  And it wasn't repair work, it was beautification, even down to pressure washing the parking lot.   The pool was open until 11:00 p.m.  This was perfect as the park closed on weekdays at 8:00 p.m.  We loved coming back and taking a dip in the heated pool (not something you find at many So Cal hotels, but nice to have in November).    The breakfast was simple, but sufficient.  Juices, muffins, toast, bagels, hot and cold cereal, hot chocolate, etc.  Definitely enough to get you
Manager Response: Thank you so much for giving us the opportunity to be of service during your recent So Cal visit. It is nice that you recognize the hard work of the family here at the Candy Cane Inn. Yes, our Pool, Spa and Kiddie Pool are heated year around for guest satisfaction. We do look forward in your next visit and please feel free to contact me directly for reservations assistance. Warm regards!

Summary: My wife and I will only stay at the Candy Cane Inn when we come to Disneyland.  We have tried other places up and down Harbor Blvd. (we've even stayed at the Disneyland Hotel and the Grand Californian) but we like Candy Cane the best.  The rooms are always clean and sufficient for our needs, the staff is friendly and helpful and the shuttle is great.  The price is also a good deal and it is nice to have the option of the free breakfast is we choose.  If you haven't yet tried the Candy Cane Inn you are missing one of the hidden gems of the whole Disneyland experience.
Manager Response: Thank you for your continued loyalty and sharing your experiences with others. We do appreciate your kind comments and will continue and strive to deliver a quality experience. Warm regards!

Summary Heading: Just the right accommodations for our Family :)
Summary: We stayed at the Candy Cane Inn 14 years ago, and like homing pigeons found ourselves being drawn to give it at try all these years later. It was a short 3 night stay, and it was so nice not to be at all disappointed. Check in was fast, and we were given a quiet room at the back of the property. Our breakfast was served in our room and our kids as well as my husband and I enjoyed it. If your looking for bacon and eggs, well then this will not be the added draw it was for us. Considering what it would cost to feed the four of us in a restaurant and the time we saved, it was a big bonus offered by the Candy Cane Inn. My husband and I would like to comment on the beautiful gardens and grounds keeping. Being able to walk out of your room to the trees and flowers and the singing
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for returning to the Candy Cane Inn 14 years later. We receive many comments such as your and I contribute this to our wonderful owners. They have owned and operated CCI for over 52 years and believe in ongoing relationships, quality and consistency.  Edd is a prime example as his friendly nature and caring smile have been around for over 24 years and going strong!

Summary: Accommodations were clean and quiet and the pool refreshing.  After a long drive we were delighted to be able to check in early and rest for the evening festivities at Disneyland.  When we checked out we were able to leave our car there for a few hours to finish up at Disneyland.  This was important to us and a big help to make our stay more enjoyable. When we checked out we overlooked two personal items in the room. .A staff member  found them and after leaving a message with Danilo Gonzalez, Executive Housekeeper, we  learned they had been found and would be mailed to us.  This was good news to us and   within two days we received our items.   We look forward to our return stay and would recommend the hotel to anyone.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and providing us with your valuable feedback. We do allow guests to check-in early when rooms are available to enable you to rest or enjoy your day. Danilo and the housekeeping team do an exceptional job and returning guest personal items that have been left behind are our pleasure. Thank you again for your business and we look forward in seeing you on your next visit!

Summary: Housekeeping staff is very aggressive. If you forget to tip or aren't out of your room by 8:30 a.m. so they can clean, expect to find your alarms reset or your room otherwise sabotaged. Excellent location, nice rooms, beautiful grounds, free Disneyland shuttle and very helpful front desk. Not a luxury resort hotel, but nice for a motel. Bring earplugs as it can be a little noisy. Other than the housekeeping problems - something deliberately wrong with the room 3 out of 5 days - I'd have rated the Candy Cane Inn very good or excellent.  Bottom line, if you don't mind being jerked around by housekeeping, or are alert enough after 12 hours at Disneyland to check for booby traps before bed, consider staying here. Otherwise, check out other options.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time to share your comments regarding your recent stay. It was a pleasure in speaking with you directly and I sincerely appreciate your answering my request for information. Feedback is very an important tool and we must listen to our guests and address concerns. Again, thank for your input and I look forward in seeing you when you return to the Candy Cane Inn. Warm regards!

Summary: We finally stayed at the Candy Cane and am so glad we did.  I have wanted to stay here for several years due to the great reviews, but each year our friends would talk me out of it.  We are a family of 4 with two little girls.  We are on a budget, but still like to stay in a clean and quiet hotel.  The Candy Cane was both, as well as close to the park.  We walked to Disneyland every day.  First, I have never before walked into a hotel room and thought it smelled good, but our room at the Candy Cane actually smelled nice when I walked in.  The room was clean and fresh as was the entire property.  The landscaping was beautiful; it made me forget that I was in Anaheim.  Unlike some of the other reviews, I did not feel that our room was any smaller than some of the more moderately
Manager Response: Thank you for following your intuition and finally staying with us, we do appreciate your business. We pride ourselves on being a reasonably priced family property with an emphasis on quality, cleanliness and friendliness. I appreciate your feedback and will speak with our pool person to ensure proper chlorine levels. As you noted we do have very pleasant guests, and many that continue to call the Candy Cane Inn their "home away from home". Warm Regards!

Summary: Just back from spending 4 nights at the Candy Cane Inn.  The grounds are lovely, the staff very attentive.  We found the room very comfortable and spacious enough for two adults and our two young children.  Everything in the room worked properly (lights, hairdryer, coffee maker).  No complaints!  Being so close to the park gates, I thought we would not use their shuttle much.  Since it was so easy to catch, both coming and going, we used it for all but one trip!  Even the walk back is very easy, and you don't have to cross the major road at all.  The staff accommodated a room request so we could be near family.  The pool is on the small size, but the kids don't care, as long as there is one!  I only made it to the free breakfast one day , but it is OK for others to bring food
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us to be your choice on your recent visit to the Theme Parks. I am delighted that you have placed us atop your list. We certainly appreciate your business, comments and look forward in seeing you again. Safety is certainly a concern with families and being adjacent and not having to cross the major road is a plus. And with our own shuttle this is true as well being we leave the hotel and go directly to the park and return directly to the hotel. Thank you again and warm regards!

Summary: Private, amazingly quiet, beautiful, short walk to Disney, breakfast buffet.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your comments. We look forward in seeing you again when your travels bring you back to the Anaheim area.

Summary Heading: For a GREAT value -- Stay Here!
Summary: I stayed at the Candy Cane Inn for 3 nights in late October.  I stayed with my family of 4, including children ages 2 and 4, in one room and my in-laws in another.  We LOVED it here.  Let's face it...if you're considering the Candy Cane Inn then you obviously don't want to spend hundreds of dollars a night to be on property.  I looked on TripAdvisor for a good deal that would still be nice and comfortable.  This motel is not the closest hotel to the Disneyland entrance, however it is still very close.  There are a few hotels right across the street but that means crossing a super busy street (where the cars in this area are NOT considerate) and those hotels don't have the same ambiance.  The walk is about 300 yards - 6 minutes if you walk fast - 10 if you don't.  Shuttle runs
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for allowing us the opportunity to have you stay with us. I am delighted to hear that your visit was enjoyable and we met all of your expectations. Danilo, our Housekeeping Manager is a gracious person and runs a very good department. Today we must all be concerned with cleanliness and he and his team do an outstanding job. Again, thank you for your business, it is most appreciated. Warm Regards!

Summary: We just stayed here for one night and I was impressed. It's a motel, not a swanky hotel, but it was well taken care of, the staff was very pleasant and helfpul, and it was great value.  It was in a perfect location, a short (10 min or less) walk to Disneyland and a few block walk to a big mall with lots of great shops and restaurants such as P.F. Changs. Downtown Disney was a longer walk away (20 min), maybe it would be hard with little kids, but it was nice for us.  There were a few families with kids around, but we had no noise issues at all.  I loved having breakfast by the pool.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and providing us with your feedback. True, we are a not a "big box" hotel however, we do strive to provide a very clean, comfortable, peaceful, relaxing and friendly experience for all types of travelers. Our location is perfect as we are about equal distance to Disneyland, Anaheim Gardenwalk and the Anaheim Convention Center. We look forward in serving you again and have a delightful day!

Summary: We spent 5 nights here in late September/October  and had 2 adjoining rooms for my mum and I and my 3 kids, aged 2, 7 and 10.   Firstly, I would say that this hotel is great for the purpose of visiting Disneyland, which let's face it is all you will be doing in Anaheim.  It is a 10 -15 minute easy walk from the hotel and one of the major bonuses staying here is the shuttle bus that runs at set times, so you can plan your departure and importantly at the end of a long day, your return!!! That really came in handy and the drivers of the bus were helpful and friendly.  The rooms were clean and a reasonable size.  The pool is not big but fine for the kids to have a swim in as we found the weather really hot and we are from Perth!  The breakfast is average but free, so easy for a
Manager Response: First and foremost, how is your little one doing? Fine I hope! Secondly, thank you for staying with us and I appreciate your honest and straight forwardness in your review. While we do in fact get many raving reviews, I personally take to heart and investigate ALL comments. We certainly have not delivered to your expectations and that saddens me and you can rest assured it is being dealt with. We must never forget that sincere friendliness and genuine caring are basic ingredients to customer service and hospitality. Thank you again for your business and comments. Warm regards!

Summary Heading: Candy Cane Inn is our place
Summary: We just love it there. We went on our honeymoon and every anniversary for the last 3 years. We couldn't imagine staying anywhere else. Always clean,helpful. The shuttle to and from the park is so great. We usually stay to late to catch it home for the night, but it's a beautifuk walk to the hotel. We will be returning every year for  a very long time.
Manager Response: I am so delighted to learn that you have spent your honeymoon and anniversaries since with us. It would certainly be my pleasure to assist you with your next year's reservations and feel free to contact me directly. Warm regards and we look forward to many enjoyable years together.

Summary Heading: A great choice for the price
Summary: So close to Disneyland you can walk. Breakfasts around the pool a terrific idea All the staff were very obliging especially Cara?? who checked us in. Rooms are clean and provide all the necessities but can be a bit noisy with airconditioners from neighbouring rooms Would recommend this hotel for its proximity and the great staff. Heather Melbourne
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us and your feedback regarding your stay. Thank you for your kind comments about Carla at our front desk. She is certainly special, helpful and very friendly with our guests. We do appreciate your business and I wish you a great day!

Summary Heading: Does What It Says On The Tin
Summary: We stayed here for 3 nights while we visited Disneyland and were very very happy with our choice. The location is perfect - a ten minute walk right to the entry gates of the park and no having to cross a busy road. We had a room at the back of the property and it was blissfully quiet. The room was clean and while it wasn't the fanciest it was perfectly adequate for what it was. For the price you pat it is extremely good value- free wifi, free parking and a lovely carb-centric breakfast with some of the best bagels and donuts I have had in a long time (but then I am from England). My only quibble was that the beds were a bit soft, but that is jusy my personal taste. Overall I would recommend CCI to anyone wanting somewhere safe and clean to stay with easy access to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for making the choice to stay with us on your recent Disneyland visit. We do strive to provide price value while maintaining a level of comfort and quality unequalled by our direct competition. We do get many compliments on our double pillow top Serta mattresses however this is certainly a personal preference item. Warm regards!

Summary Heading: We couldn't have picked a better place!
Summary: We selected the Candy Cane Inn based on the rave reviews here on TripAdvisor.  We were not disappointed!  My wife, 3-year old daughter and stayed for seven nights on a week long trip to Disneyland, and we were sad to leave.    The property is cleaner and better kept than any of the surrounding hotels.  The cobblestone driveways, landscaping and buildings are elegant, clean, and make you feel comfortable.  The pool courtyard where breakfast is served is very nice, with a swimming pool, hot tub and kid's wading pool.  The rooms are "motel" style with the doors on the outside of the buildings, however the entire property is a courtyard and all the rooms face the inside of the property, so the rooms feel every bit as safe as a hotel with doors on interior hallways.    The rooms are
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and your wonderful comments. I am glad you enjoyed your stay and cannot wait have you come and stay with us again in the future. Warm regards!

Summary: I'm not typically one to stay in a motel type place, but decided to give this place a chance based on the stellar reviews.  On the plus side, the kiddies appreciated the kiddie size pool and the room was pretty quiet considering we were on the first floor of a motel.   The shuttle was convenient and the location of the Inn is definitely walking distance, but given all the walking you do at Disneyland the shuttle helped.  The bathroom was what I would expect of any motel - dingy, low water pressure and compelled me to wear flip flops in the shower.  Beds were fine.  This isn't anything fancy but if you can live with the fact that it really is just a place to sleep at night, this is not a bad spot.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share with us your feedback. I am sorry to learn that we did not meet your expectations during your most recent stay. Our Engineering and Housekeeping teams continually check the quality and comfort of our guestrooms. I do thank you for this information and hope you will allow us to restore you confidence in the future.

Summary: We stayed here for 3 nights.  I booked based on the previous reviews and location.  I was very pleased once I got there.  The room was very clean and had no odors.  Check in and check out was a breeze.  There was plenty of lighting in the room (I really dislike rooms that still look dim even after you turn on all the light sources.).  Internet connection was never a problem.  Hooray for having plenty of towels too!  Too often I have to "go begging" for a third towel just to dry my hair. You can't beat the location and FREE Parking.  It was just 15 mins.or so walk from Disney.  Very close to restaurants and shops.  BTW, I would recommend La Casa Garcia on W. Chapman Ave.for Mexican food.   We went for lunch and had the shredded beef burrito.  It was more than enough and very
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us and providing your feedback for prospective guests. We do value guest's comments and make changes with respect of travelers and their wants and needs. We believe in 4 of each towel's based on families and why make a second trip for requests. I too really enjoy La Casa Garcia and recommended just this evening to a guest. Warm regards!

Summary: Nothing fancy here but close to the parks and the staff are very friendly!  They even have a shuttle that runs every 1/2 hour to the park.  Free parking is also a plus.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking time to share your response. Warm regards!

Summary: I have visited Disneyland since the year it opened in 1955.  Throughout those years I have stayed at various motels, but none can beat the Candy Cane Inn. Cleanliness is my first priority, followed by proximity.  From the moment you enter the grounds, you can see that the facility practically sparkles and the landscaping is immaculate.  The registration clerks greet you with a smile (not a forced one, I might add), as do the groundskeepers, the shuttle drivers and the housekeeping staff.  I have referred several people to the Candy Cane Inn and they, too, have stated they won't stay anywhere else. We arrived before check-in time, and Amy was kind enough to let us enter our room early.  She also let us stay a little past check out time while we were waiting for our van to the
Manager Response: We thank you for being a loyal and repeat Candy Cane Inn guest. We do appreciate your business and taking time to share your comments with other travelers. I will certainly pass on your kind comments to the team as they appreciate them too. Thank you again and warm regards!

Summary Heading: A Hidden Gem...Right Next to Disneyland
Summary: My family and I have stayed at Candy Cane Inn twice now.  Most recently we stayed for four nights while visiting Disneyland with our 3 young children.  We love this hotel and I'd like to offer my thoughts on some of the criticism I've read in recent reviews.  One thing that many people mention is the small breakfast area.  I've never found it to be overly crowded, in fact, if you take your food outside and sit by the pool there are usually seats available and you can watch the birds play by the palm trees and enjoy the beautiful garden areas.  Sometimes there is a bit of a line, but everyone (staff and guests) are so friendly, that it feels like a sort of extended family reunion.  Everyone is happy to be at Disneyland.  I've been especially impressed that the manager of the
Manager Response: none

Summary: My family and I usually stay at the Candy Cane Inn when we go to Disneyland. The hotel property is very tropical and clean. The rooms are clean but a bit small. Service at the front desk is normally good. The best part of the hotel is the free shuttle the hotel provides to Disneyland. There are a few closer hotels but not as good quality as the Candy Cane. My biggest complaint would have to be the morning continental breakfast. I know past reviews have commented on how early they discontinue the breakfast. The staff removes all the breakfast items promptly at 9 AM not 9:01 but 9:00. They don't necessarily do the best at keeping it stocked plus its a mad dash to get to the food before they put it all away. I think if they served breakfast at least until 10:00 that would make a
Manager Response: I certainly thank you for being a loyal Candy Cane Inn guest. We appreciate your business and feedback. We will take into consideration making future changes. In the meantime, I have spoken with our breakfast staff to ensure a more comfortable breakfast experience.

Summary Heading: I kept saying, "I can't believe what a great place this is!"
Summary: Really.  The rate was extremely reasonable, esp. when compared to staying on property at Disney, yet it was plush with landscaping and immaculately clean, with a most efficient and attentive staff!  I fully intended we would take advantage of the free shuttle, but the park entrance was so close, there was really no need.  The continental breakfast was great with lots of variety (my only suggestion would be to make stronger coffee) and you can enjoy your breakfast inside, poolside or under the shade of a big beautiful trees in the pool area.  Look no further; this is where to stay for a Disney trip.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us and sharing your experience. We pride ourselves on being one of the few hotels in the area with a fulltime landscaping team on staff. Hope to see you again when your travels bring you back to the Anheim area.

Summary: I would highly recommend this hotel to everybody visiting LA Disney. Although the rooms are slightly small.... the overall experience is very pleasant. The staff is very helpful specially the drivers of the Coach which takes you for a complimentary ride to Disney.  Very child friendly and the location is the best part..... walking distance to the Park.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind comments and staying with us. I agree our drivers are very plesant and accommodating. Warm regards!

Summary Heading: Candy Cane Inn is the BEST!!!!!
Summary: We love the Candy Cane Inn!  We stayed for 4 nights. We had a premium room, which was great.  Just enough room for the three of us and great ammenities!  They really treat you well!  Great location, very close (10 minute walk) to Disney.  The shuttle bus is wonderful and always on time!  Property and rooms were spotless and the staff is very friendly.  The staff really goes above and beyond.  They have the ultimate customer service.....My 5 yr old son woke up our first morning there with a double ear infection and in alot of pain.  The gentleman at the front desk called for a cab right away and it was there within minutes.  As we were getting into the cab, the manager Jeff, gave us his card and said to call when we needed a ride back and he would send the shuttle van.  Sure
Manager Response: Thank you for your very nice comments and I am so happy that your little guy was feeling better before you went home. I know he enjoyed his cookies and it is always our pleasure in assisting a guest in need. That is true hospitality! Warm regards!

Summary: I stayed 4 nights at Candy Cane Inn during a business trip.  I attended a seminar at the Anaheim Conference Center.  The inn was very clean and the staff very friendly and cordial.  The rooms were small but very adequate.  The TV was limited and I could not get the Sunday night football game as ESPN is not offered.  The free wireless internet service was slow and hit & miss as far as the signal was concerned. If this is important, you may want to look elsewhere if they don't upgrade the service!  Otherwise I would recommend it as it is a homesy type of place, away from the corporate feel of most big chain hotels. Free shuttle service to Disneyland every 30 minutes and the convention center is within easy walking distance.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and I do appreciate your feedback as this assists us in making upgrades or changes. WIFI is something that we continually monitor to improve and enhance this service. Our technician will be on property today and I will have the area in which you stayed checked for connectivity and make necessary changes. We do appreciate your business and taking your valuable time to respond. Warm regards!

Summary Heading: Very good stay at Candy Cane Inn.
Summary: Our family stayed at the Candy Cane Inn with my husband’s sister and her family.  We reserved three deluxe size rooms and they put all three rooms next to each other which was great.  Even with a rollaway bed in the 3rd room, there was still plenty of room.  The rooms were large, clean, smelled fresh, had nice a small refrigerator, and plenty of towels and bath products.  The shuttle to Disneyland was always on time and the driver was very nice.  The staff was extremely helpful and the breakfast they served was perfect.  The only negative thing I can say is that the beds were a little too soft in all three rooms.   But without hesitation, I will definitely stay at the Candy Cane Inn again; however I will request that our rooms not be near the vending machine and the laundry
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your comments here on Tripadvisor. We do pride ourselves on being very clean property and giving exceptional guest service. I am sorry that you felt that our double pillow top Serta Mattresses were too soft. These are an item of personal preference and therefore we sampled various and purchased the one that had the most favorable reviews. Please inform our reservationist of your desire to be located in a specific location as it is our pleasure to note and honor the request. Warm regards!

Summary: We stayed at the Candy Cane Inn on Sept. 19th and were so impressed.  We got there around 730a and were given parking passes to leave our car while we went to Disneyland.  We were told we could check in that night and were guaranteed late arrival.  We left our bags in the car, but they would have stored them if we wanted.  We were on the shuttle and at the front gate of Disneyland by 8am!  We spent all day at the park, came back on the shuttle and went to our room.  Opening the door was a nice surprise, the room was very clean, smelled good and had nice furniture.  The bathroom is tiny, but there is a large area outside the bathroom for brushing teeth. putting on make-up etc.  We were also able to see the fireworks from our hotel balcony!  The beds were comfortable and the next
Manager Response: I am so pleased that you enjoyed your visit and we thank you for staying with us. Arriving early is something that occurs and I am happy that things worked out for you to enjoy the most of your day at Disneyland. Thank you for your kind comments about your room and our expanded continental breakfast.

Summary: We were searching for a reasonably priced hotel near Disneyland and we came across this through previous trip advisor reviews. Hands down the best stay for the price! We paid $95 per night and enjoyed the cleanest room ever! The bathroom floor was so clean i would eat off of it! The room was a little on the small side for 3 adults, but was very updated with new light fixtures, roll shutter blinds etc. Free shuttle to Disneyland or a 9 minute walk. Free internet, free parking. Staff were pleasant and cheerful and the continental breakfast was sufficient with a variety of bagels, cream cheese, white/brown bread, muffins, juices, cereals, milk etc. If you want a cute up to date and friendly motel, the Candy Cane Inn was a great experience!
Manager Response: I am certainly pleased that you trusted your intuition and stayed with us based on previous reviews. We do our best in providing an exceptional guest experience and product while maintaining a moderate price point for traveling families. Thank you for your comments and staying with us!

Summary: We spent two nights at the Candy Cane Inn while visiting Disneyland.  It is a throwback to the 50's style motels but with nice updated rooms where you can park your car right outside your room.  Wonderful pool area and very nice breakfast provided.  We took the free Candy Cane bus shuttle but could have easily walked to the park.  Close to shopping areas and places to eat.  You can't go wrong staying at the Candy Cane Inn!
Manager Response: none

Summary: This was our 2nd stay at The Candy Cane Inn and it was great.  We used our $10 off per night coupons that we received with our last stay (and yes, we received a certificate to use on our next stay also).  We also stayed in the slightly bigger room and it was much better than the first stay.  I was impressed that the hotel staff was steam cleaning the chairs from all the rooms, I thought that was nice...and I wondered how many other hotels do that?!?.  The internet connection was much better in our room this time, so that was also a plus.  The staff and the shuttle service were also great!  We will definitely stay there again!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us again, and I am delighted that you utilized your Rewards Certificate. They are becoming "VERY" popular and I do encourage using and do remember they are over and above any discount you have (AAA, AARP or Active Military) and are good for one year from date of stay. In regards to your comments, we continually work to enhance the WIFI reception and cleanliness is an extremely important issue to our guests as well as us. Warm regards!

Summary Heading: Great Quality, Great Location, Will definitely return
Summary: If you want a great stay when visiting Disneyland or Anaheim in general-- stay here! The staff take pride in their work, the facility is constantly maintained -- the grounds look tropical with a relaxing pool. rooms have new pillow top beds and the air conditioners are the most quiet ever.  I have done a fair amount of traveling-- stayed in average hotels and in the best hotels in the world and this hotel is exceptional for the price.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your kind comments and staying with us. Our staff does their best to provide exceptional service and friendliness to guests and each other. I do believe the family feel and long relationships established are very important in developing pride in their work. Warm regards!

Summary Heading: An average hotel/motel with an excellent shuttle service
Summary: This hotel/motel is probably more like a, 3.5 in my book.  Without the shuttle, this place is a three. Pros: Really clean room, Comfortable plush beds, close to the Disney Parks and has an EXCELLENT shuttle service.  In addition, the hotel service overall is pretty decent. We had a non-functioning refrigerator and a light bulb out. The maintenance person was there to fix the issues within mere minutes of my call. Cons: Really small rooms. We booked a deluxe room, but I'd be really afraid of the standard. The deluxe room is small by average room sizes. I have no idea how they believe that five people could fit comfortably in that room. There was just two of us, and we had a hard time figuring out where to put our luggage (where it could be accessible) without tripping over it.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and I do appreciate your taking time to share your thoughts. We do listen to our guests and your comments are a valuable tool in our making modifications. I am very biased and too think our shuttle drivers are excellent! Warm regards.

Summary Heading: If you are going to Disneyland, why stay anywhere else?
Summary: My husband and I had a wedding in Hollywood and decided to extend our vacation and go to Disneyland.  I originally had reservations at the Doubletree and changed because of the good reviews on Tripadvisor and because they did not charge for parking, internet, the shuttle or breakfast. The location is great.  Disney is less than 1/2 mile from the hotel.  You can easily walk or ride the hotel's free shuttle if your feet are tired. Our room was nice - two queen size beds.  We are used to a king but they were sold out.  After the first night, my husband asked if we could sleep in separate beds.  The beds are a bit on the soft side.  There is a nice armoire.  A huge vanity with a small refrigerator.  Everything that we needed for our 4 night stay.  Plenty of towels.  The only
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your comments with other travelers. We do believe in no hidden or added fees and all you will pay is room rate and occupancy tax. I am sorry that your internet connection was an issue and we continue to monitor and make necessary modifications with access points. We do appreciate your business and thank you again!

Summary: My wife and I stay here every year for the half marathon through Disneyland.  And while it has been excellent every year, this year was beyond excellent.  We arrived a few hours before check in and were greeted with smiling, helpful faces saying they had a room set.  They got up at (or before) 5 am the morning of the run to open up an early breakfast for the runners.  They genuinely wished us luck.  The room was clean and the beds are wonderful.
