The staff is always friendly.  It was a typical great stay.  But what pushed it beyond excellent was that my daughter left her phone behind.  When we came back a couple days later, Denilo greeted us with an ear-to-ear smile and raced (literally) to his office to grab the phone.  He thanked us for coming to get it.  That summed up the
Manager Response: Thank you for being a loyal Candy Cane Inn guest, your business is most appreciated! We do attempt to allow guests who arrive early access to a guestroom and it our pleasure. Danilo is a wonderful gentleman and I am proud that he is a part of our management team. We look forward in seeing you again next year at the marathon and we will have the juice and muffins waiting! Warm regards!

Summary Heading: How can you not love the Candy Cane
Summary: They are great!  Breakfast delivered to your door, plenty of parking, a great shuttle bus to Disney which you can also walk to.  Late checkout, comfy bed...great new mall across the street.  I could go on and on.  I loved the Candy Cane, thanks guys!
Manager Response: Thank you!! Thank you!! Thank you!!  Your short but direct comment is appreciated. And, YES the new Anaheim GardenWalk is great with many things to do and fabulous dining options!

Summary: My wife and I stayed at the Candy Cane in August 09 and we could not have been happier with our choice. The Candy Cane Inn is located within an easy 15 minute walk to the Disneyland ticket booths and for those who are unable to make the walk the Candy Cane provide an air conditioned shuttle bus that will drop you off and pick you up with no extra cost to you.  We arrived early in the morning and had no problem checking in. Staff even advised us that if we were hungry that breakfast was still on and we could help ourselves. We checked into our room and had two queen size beds with a fridge, adequate bathroom, TV and air conditioning. Staff stated that as we had arrived late August many American families had left as their kids began school in the last week of the month.  Beds were
Manager Response: We know you have many choices when traveling and we appreciate your staying with us. I am happy that your arrival was most pleasant and we do allow guests to check-in early should rooms be available upon arrival. I appreciate your kind comments and our team does a very good job of maintaining the property in a pristine manner. Please feel free to contact me personally when you are returning as it would be my pleasure in assisting with reservations.

Summary: While this hotel is considered a 'moderately-priced" Good Neighbor Hotel, it had ameneties found at more expensive  hotesl.  The beds were so comfortable with wonderful pillows.  I usually don't sleep well away from home but these beds were so comfortable I slept like a baby.  The towels were large and soft and pool towels were also provided.   The staff was freindly and helpful.  The continental breakfast was pretty standard but that's not a bad thing - it was still complimentary - and it was lovely sitting out by the pool to eat.  The grounds are beautiful and well kept  giving the hotel a very  tropical atmosphere. It is just a short walk to Disneyland but the hotel offers a shuttle, which after running the Disneyland half marathon, was a very welcome perk.  I would highly
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your comments with others. We strive to provide a friendly and warm atmosphere at a moderate price point. We do get many compliments on our Serta double pillow top mattresses and I am happy that your sleep was that of a baby. We do appreciate your business and your kind comments.

Summary Heading: Highly Recommend the CCI! Great value for your $$
Summary: A friend of a friend highly recommended the Candy Cane Inn to us.   I was skeptical at first, but once I checked the ratings on Trip Advisor, I thought, let's give it a try.  I still can't believe how reasonably priced is is!  It's a small yet nice and quaint hotel (has that B&B feel).  Our room was very clean and the landscaping was perfect.  The CCI is literally two blocks from Dland and free parking and free breakfast!  We upgraded to a premium room just so we could have a micro (for our little one), and to have the newspaper and breakfast delivered to our room.  What a treat!  I recommend that if you have a little extra $$.  For me, customer service is so important.  Everyone from the shuttle drivers to the housekeepers were so friendly and helpful and HAPPY!.  I'll admit
Manager Response: I am pleased that you listened to your friend and took their advice and I thank you for staying with us. We do pride ourselves on being a quaint, clean, friendly and moderately priced family property with NO hidden costs or fees. Yes, our Premium Rooms offer those extra items that most feel are well worth the added cost. Again, we do thank you for your business and look forward in seeing you on your next visit. Please feel free to contact me directly for reservations assistance. Warm regards!

Summary Heading: Tried it for the first time will be back.
Summary: Recently my wife and I took our two grandsons, ( 10 & 6), to the Anaheim area to visit  several locations. We have stayed at various hotels in the Anahiem area in the past. The good reviews  for the Candy Cane promted us to give them a try. We spent four nights. While this is not a "luxury" hotel it more then meets the mark for the needs of most like us, who are travaleing with kids who are there to go to theme parks and have a good time. The motel is clean, very well maintained,  reasonably priced and well located.  We enjoyed the dedicated shuttle to Disenyland. While the motel is well within reasonable walking distance, at the end of a long day what is reasonable in the morning appears less so in the evening. We closed the park several nights and the shuttle was there waiting
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us the opportunity and staying with us on your recent visit. We do aspire to be a family friendly hotel providing all the comforts of home while maintaining a modest price range. Yes, we are located within close proximity of all the conveniences necessary and the addition of the Anaheim GardenWalk is excellent. Warm regards!

Summary Heading: The only place to stay for Disney
Summary: The Candy Cane Inn is perfect in every way.  My 10 year old got off to a great start when he was given candy cane pens from reception on arrival (which smell of mint) and free candy canes.  Our room though a little dark right at the end of the corridor was great for us and I loved the fact that the wash basin was outside the bathroom.  It was very clean and we were very happy.  On our first night we watched the fire works (albeit with a limited view) from the balcony. It's a short 10minute walk to Disney and the half hour shuttle is reliable if needed.  Breakfast was good - everything we needed to start our day and I loved sitting by the pool to eat it. It was a short walk to Garden Walk shopping centre with some decent eating places (if you can escape Disney). The pool was
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your experience here on TripAdvisor.  Your comments are very in-depth and I thank your for covering such a variety of positive points. I apologize that your faucet needed adjustment and am pleased that our gentleman was prompt in repairing to your satisfaction. We look forward in seeing you should your travels bring you back to the Disneyland area!

Summary Heading: Great place to stay during visit to Disneyland
Summary: Very comfortable and great price.  The continental breakfast was good.  Oatmeal, bagels, fruits, cereals and juices.    Clean and housekeeping did a great job.  This was our second time back and a definite recommendation to anyone looking for a clean place to stay while visting Disneyland.  It's only a 20 minute walk to Disneyland and the shuttle was handy.  Fitness room and pool were great as well.  You won't regret choosing the Candy Cane Inn.  Very friendly front offfice staff.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with again and we do appreciate your business. We aspire to be a moderately priced hotel with emphasis on cleanliness, comfort, serenity and genuine customer service. Please feel free to contact me directly when returning as it would by my pleasure in assisting with reservations.

Summary Heading: A pretty little motel in an excellent location
Summary: We've stayed at the Candy Cane Inn before (7 years ago) on the recommendation of a friend. They have upgraded the motel since that time. The landscaping is beautiful and the property in general is well kept.  CONS: Rooms-The rooms are still on the smaller side. We had a "Deluxe" room, one grade above standard. The toilet and bath/shower are in their own little closet of a room. Hard to turn around if you close the door. Carpet -Our carpet was moderately dirty. The bottom of my white slipper socks were a medium grey after two nights walking on the carpet. Noise near balcony-We had a room on the second floor (228) with a little balcony area with table and chairs right outside of our door, off of the main walkway. For two of our three nights at the Inn we had different groups of
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and I appreciate your feedback regarding your experiences. We listen to our guests and do utilize this valuable information to make necessary modifications to our property and services. I apologize for the poor reception on your TV and DirecTV replaced the faulty part that was causing the lines. In regards to the sitting areas on the second floor, we attempt to place guests in these rooms that request the area. I would like to point out that we happily attempt to move any guest who is not satisfied with their room assignment. I look forward in our conversation as I have attempted to contact you personally. Warm regards!

Summary: Just when I thought the Candy Cane Inn couldn't get any better!  Executive Housekeeper Mr. Danilo Gonzalez found my lost iPhone, packaged it carefully, insured it and sent it to my home!  I would give the Candy Cane ten stars if I could, because the service is literally twice as good as any five-star hotel I have ever experienced.  I wish the people who run CCI would give seminars in how to make a simple motel so wonderful.  Thank you, Candy Cane!
Manager Response: Thank you for your response and I sincerely appreciate your kind comments. What can I say about Danilo he is an excellent leader with his team, provides our guests with clean, comfortable guestrooms and handles lost and found with ultimate professionalism. I am so proud that he is on our management team! Warm regards.

Summary: The hotel was beautiful.  Our rooms were clean, a bit small, but fine for a family of 3.  We could have used extra drawer space, but again, no big deal.  The staff was very friendly and accomodating.  We arrived in the early afternoon and a room was ready for us.  Especially great news when you have had a 7+ hour flight.  Big shout out to James, who was very accomodating and helpful.  The pool was great, location great, and the breakfast was plentiful.  I would definitely recommend to others.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and we appreciate you taking time to write a review. We do try and accommodate early arrivals when rooms are available and I too think James is Top Shelf! Thank you for your recommendations!

Summary: All staff members made effort to make our stay pleasant and trouble free.  Of particular note was James (front desk) who not only printed our airline boarding passes, made necessary Super Shuttle reservations to the airport, he researched local bus schedules to Anaheim Angels Stadium (for a baseball game).  James also went the extra mile (literally) by giving us a lift to the far side of Downtown Disney to help expedite a shopping/dining excursion.  We found the hotel clean, comfortable, an excellent value and "as reported" by so many on Trip Advisor.  Would recommend this hotel to our friends.
Manager Response: Thank for taking the time to share your experience at our hotel. James and the rest of our team strive to exceed guest expectations. We appreciate your business.

Summary: I really wanted to like this motel, and for the most part, I did.   The good... Charming grounds with beautiful landscaping Small pool, but very nice Clean rooms with attractive decor Comfy beds, pillows, etc. Staff was very pleasant Shuttle bus on time, but it's a short, easy walk along a shady tree lined sidewalk Continental breakfast good, nothing fancy, but can't beat the price  Now, the bad.... My one big complaint, small rooms.  I read others comments, but I'm not picky so figured it would be okay.  But with 3 adults and one 3 year old it was just too crowded for us.  The beds also seemed smaller than a queen, but desk clerk insisted they were queen size though they felt more like full Housekeeping never made up our room while we were at the park from about 9am til 2pm.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your feedback with us and I am sorry to learn that we did not meet your expectations. Just to inform you that our beds are in fact queen size and tend to look smaller due to the height of the double pillowtop Serta mattresses. In the future if you would like service at a specific time please contact the front desk. Our housekeeping team cleans rooms from 8am to 430pm and they would be delighted to accommodate your request. Warm regards!

Summary Heading: It's the best we always stay here.
Summary: The staff is friendly and so very nice.  The man in the breakfast area is so very nice and full of information about disneyland.   It's just the best.  Will always stay there.  Thank you staff and drivers are great.
Manager Response: Thank you for being a loyal repeat guest. We DO appreciate your business and I am happy that our team continues to give you the service you have come to expect.

Summary Heading: Definitely worth repeating - great location, great price
Summary: We booked the CCI by sheer (lucky!) accident. It was a great find! We always stay on-property at Disney World, but decided to try a "good neighbor" hotel for our first trip to Disneyland. CCI was about a third of the cost of the Disney hotels, and with the location and in-room breakfast, we were glad we stumbled into the great deal at this hidden gem. The staff was consistently friendly and helpful, and the facilities are clean and comfortable. The room was average size (not huge), but it was fine for four of us. The beds were comfortable, and the room was quiet even though our room backed up against California Adventure. The quiet was a pleasant surprise since we could easily hear the screams from the roller coaster outside our room.  Parking is free (not true everywhere) and
Manager Response: I am thrilled to read that you enjoyed your stay with us and thank you for sharing your experience. Our team works hard to exceed guest expectations and promptly take action when challenges arise. Thank you for staying with and hope to see you again when your travel plans bring you back to that area. Warm regards!

Summary: Great hotel very close to Disneyland entrance. Nice clean rooms with nice beds which were comfortable to sleep on,and very quiet which was good as i can't sleep if it's to noisy.Would definitely go back.
Manager Response: I am glad to read that you enjoyed your stay with us and am happy to see you join our family of return guests.

Summary: Our second stay. Candy Cane Inn is perhaps one of Disney Resort areas "hidden gems" when it comes to lodging. It is very efficient in all aspects..ranging from friendly service, clean accomodations, lodging and shuttle service. "Superbly Simple and Efficient" is the perfect description. Rooms are not as large as the other higher end hotels in the area but it seems better operated than most. Great for those families that are "on the go" since it is located only a couple of blocks from Disney. Best bang for your buck stay by far!
Manager Response: I am happy to hear that you consider our hotel to be "Superbly simple and efficient". We take pride in ensuring our guest's satisfaction while providing quality accommodations at moderate prices. Thank you for staying with us!

Summary: As usual, our stay was perfect.  Great rooms, upgraded to the connecting rooms to be next to our kids and grandson which cost more but still fun.  Wish the prices were a little lower since we had two rooms and it's our fourth time there.  Next time we are going to try Super8 because we heard they had everything as this one but 1/2 the price.  Breakfast was good, pool was lots of fun, a bit of noise when the young groups came back but nothing you can do with kids who have no clue.  Don't get the room by the table and chairs on the second floor because everyone either eats or uses their cell phones there making noise, again no respect.  Short walk to Disneyland, took free shuttle in am and most times walked back to hotel.  Great Stay
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great value, and walking distance to Disneyland.
Summary: We checked in and looked at our room (we got the deluxe room). It was just as we expected just the right size for our family ( 2 adults, 2 young kids). Loved the fact the bathroom had cabinets under the sink to put stuff away. The closet and small fridge were also a plus. The only thing was that 1 of the beds needed to be replaced, it felt like it sunk just a bit in the middle. Other than that the stay was good, we've stayed at Candy Cane a total of 3 times. We will stay there again because it is soo close to Disney and the room fits our needs.
Manager Response: none

Summary: What a great deal! The room very nice and clean. Hotel staff polite and helpful. Nice pool area and continental breakfast also timely shuttle to and from the park. Would definitely stay again
Manager Response: We can't wait to have you back! Thank you for your kind comments.

Summary Heading: Great little motel: clean, incredibly convenient to Disneyland, smoothly run.
Summary: I was referred to the Candy Cane Inn by a coworker and was not disappointed. Breakfast, wireless internet, and parking are all included. It was an easy walk to Disneyland; we didn't even need to use the bus, and it was even close enough to walk home to after a long day traipsing through the park. The rooms are clean, well-maintained, well-appointed and everything worked exactly as it was supposed to. This may be the lodging most conveniently located to Disneyland. I will not hesitate to stay here again the next time we go. The mint-scented candy cane pens my daughters received as we checked in were a big hit too.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and we do appreciate your business. We do believe in a "no hidden charges" approach in pricing. Our Expanded Continental Breakfast, Exclusive Resort Shuttle, Parking and WIFI are all complimentary. We are happy that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again soon.

Summary Heading: Candy Cane was the sweetest part of our trip
Summary: We just returned from a 2-day visit to Disneyland, and stayed at the Candy Cane Inn. We can't recommend this hotel enough. Before our trip we did the required research, and Candy Cane was at the top of the recommended list. After reading the reviews, my husband said, "This is crazy—everyone LOVES the Candy Cane Inn." The reviews were stellar, but could our actual experience match up? Yes. Our expectations were high, and the CCI delivered. We arrived early Monday morning at 7:30 am and wanted to see if we could check our bags at the front. The friendly desk clerk told us that we could check in our room early, so we were able to unload our luggage and have a place to park our car immediately. We hopped onto the 8:00am shuttle and were in the park at 8:15am, ready to go. After a
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your experience. We are happy to accommodate guests wishing to check in early if rooms are available. We look forward in seeing you again in the future. Warm regards!

Summary Heading: Wonderful Stay at the Candy Cane Inn
Summary: We just returned home after a 5-day vacation to Disneyland.  We are a family of 4 with two teenagers and we stayed at the Candy Cane Inn for the entire 5 days.  Upon our initial check-in, we found the room very clean and the beds were EXTREMELY  comfortable.  However, the air conditioner in the room didn't seem to be working properly.  We made one call to the front desk and within 15 minutes, the old air conditioner was removed and a new one was put in place!  The hotel's location was perfect.  The walk to the park was only 10- 15 minutes.  If you prefer, the hotel shuttle is extremely convenient and the bus ride is just about 5 minutes.  There's also a 7-Eleven right next door where you can get snacks for your room.  The only negatives were that it's a little difficult to find
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and providing us with your valuable feedback. I sincerely apologize regarding your faulty air conditioner, however am extremely happy that our team promptly rectified. We do heat our pool, spa and kiddie pool year-round to a desirable 79-80 degrees and the summer sun may increase this. I will discuss with our Chief Engineer to monitor and ensure comfort. Thank you for your business, it is most appreciated.

Summary Heading: Doesnt get much better than this!
Summary: Have to agree with most of other reviews, fantastic stay at Candy Cane, we visited Anaheim to see Disneyland, tour California and meet up with family and this was a fantastic begining to our holiday, the staff were so welcoming and helpful from the moment we arrived they really went the extra mile to be helpful. Breakfast was fantastic, the rooms very comfortable and our kids would have happily stayed in the pool rather than visit Disneyland! Thank you Candy cane for making a once in a lifetime trip so addictive - we will be back!
Manager Response: none

Summary: The Candy Cane Inn is a fantastic place to stay if you're looking for an "everything in one" package.  It offers the FREE stuff that we were looking for in a place to stay.  Complimentary breakfast (bagels, bread, fresh fruit, beverages, etc.), free DIRECT shuttle service to Disneyland (which was great because it wasn't like other places whose shuttle buses stopped at more than one hotel), free wireless internet and free parking.  It also includes a pool and a jacuzzi for those who want to take a break from the heat.  Really Disneyland was only a few minutes (8) away and if the bus wasn't there walking was fine.  The rooms were spacious enough for us, two adults, two kids, a double stroller and there was a fridge and of course a/c.  The beds were really plush so if you're used
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your valuable comments with prospective guests. We do believe in providing a clean and comfortable family hotel at moderate prices with NO hidden fees. I am happy that you enjoyed your rest on our Serta double pillow-top mattresses. Please feel free to contact me directly when making reservations as it would be my pleasure to assist.

Summary: We stayed for 7 nights in a premium room at the Candy Cane Inn, July 29th - August 5th.  The room was very clean & comfortable, beds were super soft.  We enjoyed the daily delivered breakfast, robes, microwave popcorn,  and complimentary DVD & video rentals and the shuttle bus to Disneyland & California Adventure, everyone was so friendly and helpful and the grounds of the Inn are beautiful.  The location is very convenient to the parks, to Garden Walk, there is a small market next to the Inn and plenty of restaurants in the area such  as Denny's, IHOP, Ruth's Chris, Mortons, McDonalds, Subway.  The street the Inn is located on is tree lined and a lovely walk, always plenty of people around we felt very safe walking day or night.  The CCI was a quarter of the cost of the Disney
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and I appreciate your taking time to respond on TripAdvisor. The addition of the new Anaheim GardenWalk has been very favorable and it is basically right across the corner. The wide variety of dining establishments, shopping and entertainment is a welcome addition to the Resort area. We do aspire to be a warm and friendly family hotel providing quality and service at a moderate cost. Warm regards!

Summary: This place is great for Disney land the shuttle bus runs all day. The rooms are clean and comfortable and all you need is a short stroll away. The breakfast was ok if you like to only eat sugary fare and a little fruit: no protein in sight and only instant porridge for the wheat intolerant!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and providing us with your valuable feedback. We do listen to our guests and will look into the addition of protein items. Our shuttle bus starts one half hour prior to the park opening and continues until forty five minutes after the park closes. It runs on the hour and half from the hotel and returns on the fifteen and forty five from the park. The only exception is for our driver to take their dinner therefore we do not run at 8pm and 815 pm from the park. Thank you again for your business, it is most appreciated!

Summary: Although Disneyland is in our backyard, it's nice to sometimes turn a visit into a staycation. In the past we've gone 100% Disney with stays at the Grand Californian and Disneyland Hotels.  We've also done Disney-adjacent with a stay at the Best Western Park Place Inn, directly across the street (Harbor Blvd.) from the Disney entrance.  The Disney hotels were wonderful but pricey; Park Place was a good value and great location but congested and compact.  For our latest trip, we booked at the Candy Cane Inn, primarily based on TripAdvisor reviews.  We got a nice AAA rate 60-70% below that of a Disney hotel.  It is not quite as close to the entrance as Park Place--about a 15 minute walk--but it is the only motel on the same side of the street as Disney.  They also have a free
Manager Response: Thank you for giving us the opportunity and staying with us on your recent Disneyland visit. I appreciate you taking the time to share your so very in-depth observations. So nicely put and yes, the hotel has charm. We want to be different from the surrounding properties while maintaining a family friendly property at a moderate price point. Please feel free to contact me directly should you need assistance with future reservations or information. Warm regards!

Summary Heading: What a great place, and very reasonable
Summary: We just loved the CCI, and would not hesitate to stay there again.  We were in Anaheim 1/2 way through a so.cal vacation, and this was by far the best place we stayed the whole trip.  The staff was extremely pleasant and helpful, much appreciated at the end of a trek from LA.   The courtyard area was just lovely, and all the rooms open onto it.  And, oh, let me just tell you about the room...this bed was so comfortable, I would have never imagines I would find something like this in a hotel - plush and, well, extravagant! I have stayed in 5 star hotels that didn't compare. The whole room was clean, neat, and lovely.  There is a shuttle to DL, but it is so close we chose to walk - it is nice to know it is available. Breakfast was included, with lots of choices, enjoyed out on the
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and I appreciate your feedback. Yes, our quaint environment is most enjoyable and relaxing. I am happy that you liked our double pillow-top mattresses. This is an item that while we receive negative feedback on at times, the positive comments have well outweighed. Thank you again for your business, it is most appreciated.

Summary Heading: Overall good, but not sure I'd stay again...
Summary: First off, I was really excited to stay at this hotel. I had been watching the rates for weeks and feel I got the best rate available, and it was even lower than the rate the manager offered me when I called to make reservations.   So we stayed for 5 days while we took our 3.5 year old and 1 year old to Disneyland. What I really ended up loving was the shuttle. The drivers were always nice and on time, and we used it quite often, although I do feel it's close enough to walk. On one occasion we missed the shuttle back by just a few minutes, so we walked because we knew it'd be faster that way. So it is definitely close to the park (10 min walk) and not a bad walk. I also like that it's on the same side of the street as Disney.   Also, our friends arrived a day earlier and stayed
Manager Response: none

Summary: Going to Disneyland in the busy season is scary. We wanted to be close to the park and I generally avoid motels. But the Candy Cane Inn offered premium rooms that I thought would be a step up. Good things about Candy Cane Inn: - dedicated shuttle - free continental breakfast - access to the park and to a 7-11 - in room refrigerators - clean and well-tended -free wireless! Stuff I wish was different - it's noisy - it's a motel after all and not much barrier to outside noise - access to the park - materials say 1000 feet to main gate which is true, sort of! It's close to the DRIVE IN gate - the WALK IN gate is still about 4 blocks further. But if you don't want to walk, take the shuttle. -Premium rooms offer amenities (breakfast delivered to room; newspaper; bathrobes; microwave
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking your valuable time to share your feedback. We do listen to our guests and appreciate any and all comments be they positive or giving us thoughts for improvement. Summer season is generally busier and with this comes families and we are a family property. Thank you again for your business and feedback.

Summary: This is our 3rd stay here and I would highly recomend this hotel.  It is very clean.  The beds are super comfy.  Everyone has always been very nice and great customer servie.  About a 8 minute walk to the parks.  Very beautiful landscaping.  Good rates I think for how clean the rooms and hotel are.  No parking fees!! Pretty basic breakfast.  Cereal, donuts, breads, fruits, bagels.  I only like to stay here in anaheim. it is not noisy and is pretty private.
Manager Response: Thank you for your continued business and be sure to use your Rewards Certificate on your next stay. We do appreciate your business and feedback.

Summary Heading: A business to be proud of!!
Summary: We have returned home to NZ from a wonderful 7 night stay at this hotel.  From the moment we were met by James and Amy at the front desk to their help in our last couple of hours we enjoyed every minute of our stay there.  The rooms are spacious, sparkling clean and quiet, the grounds well looked after, the pool and spa a great place to soak tired and hot bodies and the shuttle was a welcome rest for sore feet.  We previously stayed at the Peacock Suites and the Carousal Inn which is closer to Disneyland but neither compare to the CANDY CANE.  Well done to all the staff for creating and atmosphere that we would love to return to.
Manager Response: Thank you for giving us the opportunity and staying at our Inn. Yes, James and Amy at our front desk are quite the team in the morning and always go the extra mile for our guests. We do appreciate your comments and business. Warm regards!

Summary Heading: Thank you Jeff for going the extra mile!
Summary: My nephew and I were looking at various places to stay for our upcoming trip to Disneyland. We needed rooms for myself, husband and two young children, my mother inlaw and my nephews parents and his friend. We decided on the Candy Cane Inn, once our rooms were booked my nephew contacted Jeff to ask if anything could be done for his parents 35th Wedding Anniversary, that we would be celebrating on our first day in Anaheim. Jeff went out of his way to add little goodies to each of our rooms (3 rooms). What a nice surprise!The staff were all very, very friendly especially the shuttle bus driver (he drove us July 13 and 14 in the morning). We have all been to Disneyland before and all agreed that we would return to the Candy Cane Inn. I might add that one of the reasons we chose the
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for staying with us and I am delighted your family enjoyed their visit. It was my pleasure in assisting Matthew with his parent's 35th anniversary celebration. Warm regards!

Summary: Though the place is charming, a good value, and very convenient to Disneyland, I left with a sour taste in my mouth. Still, I would recommend the place.  I have been to Disney land several times and I always wanted to stay here. I am glad I did, but I would not stay here again.  The Good: -Location, location, location: Walked back in forth most of the time -Having a dedicated shuttle is fantastic. Most Anaheim hotels use the city shuttle, which makes way too many stops. -Room was clean and comfortable -Pool was small, but having a small kid pool was great. My three year old could play in it without her floaty. -Free parking! We arrived early -- they would not let us check in, but we were allowed to park our car  The Bad: -What cheesed me off about this place was their policy of
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your feedback on your recent stay at our Inn. We do listen to all guest's comments and will certainly review the items that you noted. In regards to room size there is a difference of over 40 sq. feet from the Standard to Deluxe (rooms are two feet wider) and the Premium are another 40 plus sq. feet larger than the Deluxe (wider and deeper). Fire code is occupants allowed per square foot of guestroom space and we choose to adhere, taking our guest's safety into consideration.

Summary: i stayed in this hotel for our vacation in disneyland with my wife and 2 year old daughter, i got a premium room because of all the extra's advertised and we all got it. the breakfast is ok and i liked it because it get's delivered to your room at the time you like. we also liked the turn down service every night especially after a long day at disneyland. it is also near the entrance of the theme park and if you get tired from all the walking they have a shuttle service to and from the hotel every 30 mins. it's also near a 7-11 and some restaurants so you can buy food. over-all my family enjoyed our stay at candy cane inn.
Manager Response: I am so happy that you, your wife and 2 yr old daughter enjoyed your stay at our Inn. Our Premium Rooms with the extra amenities and services are certainly worth the extra costs. We thank you for your business and comments and look forward in seeing you on your next visit and don't forget to use your Rewards Certificate for $10 off per night.

Summary Heading: A Great Place to Stay in Anaheim!
Summary: The Candy Cane Inn was a great hotel.  I had read many great reviews of the CCI here on TripAdvisor, and you can add this one to the list!  We did not reserve a Deluxe Room, opting for a Standard Room instead, but the room was clean and well kept.  It had nice furniture and comforters. The room was quiet, we never heard anyone next door to us, the only noise we heard was at 9:25 p.m. when the fireworks went off at Disneyland.      I guess the CCI is what you would call a 'motel style', where the doors open to the outside as opposed to an inside hallway.  I normally do not book rooms at these kind of motels for safety reasons.  But I never felt unsafe in any way here.  And would not hesitate to book here again.  Speaking of outside the hotel, this place is well landscaped and
Manager Response: Thank you so much for giving us the opportunity and staying with us. Your feedback is detailed and I am at a loss of words on how to reply. With that I will simply say thank you for your business as it is most appreciated. Warm regards!

Summary Heading: Great place to stay at if your going to Disneyland
Summary: Every time I go to Disneyland I always stay at this hotel. The rooms are nice and they are only a short walk or shuttle ride to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and thinking about us whenever you visit Disneyland. Please feel free to contact me when making reservations as I would be delighted in assisting.  We do appreciate your business and make sure you utilize your Rewards Certificate for $10 off per night.

Summary Heading: Great location but housekeeping needs to knock first
Summary: We stayed here the first night of our Disneyland vacation in one of the premium upgraded rooms. The rooms were clean and the pool was nice. The location was fantastic. I felt that there were some nice touches like the welcome amenity (which is a popcorn bucket with snacks in it) but I do feel the price was a bit high for this type of inn. For the same price we stayed at Disney's Paradise Pier. The reason we checked out was because of a few employees were very rude. Housekeeping walked into our room without knocking while we were changing despite a do not disturb sign we had placed on the door and that irritated me. The front desk must have been in training or something because they were unable to help us with some basic questions and did not ask for a manager to help out.  The
Manager Response: Dustin, Thank you for taking time to return my telephone call and speaking with me in regards to your recent visit. Listening to our guests and their perception assists us in rectifying and/or preventing such re-occurrences. Again, thank you for your time and I look forward in seeing you again. Warm regards!

Summary: I had to write about this hotel. I had my concerns having not stayed at the Candy Cane Inn before. The reviews on Trip Advisor were good so we took a chance! What a blessing this hotel was. Clean, clean, clean, courteous, prompt room cleanup, sparking grounds and pool. Small which was really nice. Shuttle service to & from Disneyland was always on time and the drivers were wonderful! Complimentary breakfast was also very good! I don't have a bad thing to say. We loved it! Thanks Candy Cane Inn employees!!
Manager Response: I appreciate you giving us the opportunity and am delighted that we lived up to TripAdvisor reviews. I do applaud our housekeeping team as they truly do a great job in keeping our property immaculate. Thank you again for you comments and staying with us.

Summary: Our 9 year old son got 'lost ' on his way down to breakfast. Though we only lost sight of him for a few moments, we were terrified. Mom called out for him and your staff member Danillo, quickly told her 'we will find him", and jumped into action. He checked all the cars leaving the lot, the shuttle, had someone check the pool and spread the word as he passed by the front desk. Our son had headed back to the room and was located in a very few moments. Though the entire event only took moments, we are forever grateful . His competence, comforting, and quick action were beyond belief.
Manager Response: First and foremost I am happy that your son was found without incident. I thank you for your comments here and the nice letter you sent to Danilo and me. It is a sincere pleasure in working with a gentleman like Danilo. His genuine care and concern for our guests and his associates is something that is most appreciated. Thank you for staying with us and feel free to contact me directly if your plans bring you back to the area. Warm regards!

Summary Heading: Absolutely the best place to stay near Disneyland
Summary: I have stayed at the Candy Cane Inn several times over the past 10 years (or more?), and it is absolutely the best place to stay for a Disneyland trip. Rooms are clean and spacious, breakfast is excellent, and location is walking distance from the park entrance. There is nothing better than just pushing a stroller straight to the entrance (we were with our two-year-old on our most recent trip), and stopping off to pick up some pizza and pasta on the way home for dinner. I believe lots of other restaurants are along the way. Older kids could easily make the walk. My son's only complaints was that Mickey Mouse was not waiting for him in our room when we arrived! (At just two years old, he initially didn't understand the difference between the Disney visit and the hotel stay!)
Manager Response: Thank you for continuing to stay with us and we do appreciate your comments and business. The short walk to the main entrance is very nice and not having to cross any main streets is certainly less stressful. Your comment about your son is so sweet. When my little nephews came they were telling friends that their Uncle Jeff built Disneyland. How do you argue with that? Give your little guy my regards and we look forward in seeing you again!

Summary: The Candy Cane Inn is a wonderful place to stay.  I already told relatives who are booking an August  trip about this hotel.  The staff is so pleasant and helpful.  I have a teenager and 10 year old and they loved the hotel.  Everything was so clean and the continental breakfast was a great added bonus.  The hotel is so close to Disney...we mostly walked to the parks but took the shuttle bus occassionally.  I will definitely stay here next time we come to CA.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us on your recent visit to the Disney Theme Parks. We do appreciate your business, comments and certainly your recommendation to relatives. We have MANY long term repeat guests and families that have grown and grown over the years. Please ask your relatives to contact me directly as I would be delighted to assist with availability, rates and reservations.

Summary Heading: This place has Perfection down to an art! SUPERB!!
Summary: Everything about The Candy Cane Inn is superb! From the greating at the front desk to, my favorite, Edd who has worked there for some 22 years and has every part of "wonderful" in his bones! The rooms were very clean and spacious. Very nice pool and spa. Super breakfast. The atmosphere was like you were in a botanical garden and, well, you were kind of! Very quiet (except when fireworks at Disneyland went off :-)  ) and extremely comfortable just relaxing by the pool! Convenient to many places. Will even stay here when going to downtown LA or other southern Cal places since it is so wonderful! Customer service is numero uno here and you can tell that the staff has been chosen and trained carefully. Not the Hotel Ritz, just better! Please tell Edd that Marty said "HI"! Thanks for
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your comments about our Inn and Edd. He is truly a wonderful and pleasant ambassador of the hotel and approaching his 24th anniversary. I agree that customer service is extremely important and we strive to continually improve and do listen to all comments. We thank you for your business and please feel free to contact me directly should you need assistance with future reservations as it would be my pleasure. Warm regards!

Summary: We recently stayed at the Candy Cane Inn on recommendation of a friend of mine who stayed there last month. All in all, we had a fabulous stay. The breakfast was great, the pool and hottub were perfect for relaxing in after a day in Disneyland, the beds were comfy, and the location was perfect: not too far to walk, but the shuttle was there if you were feeling extra tired.  It was my son's 9th birthday July 5th, and the staff even left him a card and cookies in our room while we were at Disneyland; he was delighted to receive them!  We loved this hotel and definitely will be back on our next visit to the area!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us, we appreciate your business and the recommendation of your friend. I am so delighted that Christian enjoyed his cookies and hopefully made his 9th birthday more memorable. Please make sure you use your Rewards Certificate for $10 off each night of your next stay.

Summary Heading: Oour Favorite Place To Stay When Visiting Disneyland!!!
Summary: We have been coming to Candy Cane Inn over the past several years. The prices are reasonable too. You may be able to find some cheaper hotels in the DL area but usuall comes with a price. Like, some hotels charge you extra for parking or fin room fridges, etc.. With the Candy Cane Inn, your price at booking is the price at checkout. Everything is included. I would also like to mention that they have two on site laundry rooms that are available for guest for a small fee that works out great if you dont want to pack a lot of clothes. You can go a couple of days, then head back to hotel and do a load or two either before you go to bed or first thing in the morning while you are enjoying your breakfast. The shuttle is also FREE OF CHARGE and it runs every half hour. No other hotel
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us again, we do appreciate your business and comments. Yes, we do aspire to be a very clean and comfortable family hotel at moderate prices. We believe in NO extra fees or hidden charges and I Thank You for doing your homework and sharing this with prospective guests.  Please feel free to contact me directly when planning your upcoming visit as it would be my pleasure in assisting with reservations. Make sure that you use your Rewards Certificate that gives you a $10 per night discount on your next stay!

Summary: We stayed at this hotel after much consideration of the reviews on tripadvisor.  I'm really happy to say we weren't disappointed. This hotel was perfect for our stay last fall, providing clean and comfortable rooms, great pool, and perfect location to the park. We will definately stay here again if the opportunity arises.
Manager Response: none

Summary: My husband, 2 year old daughter, parents and I recently traveled to Disneyland and stayed at the Candy Cane Inn from June 24 - July 1, 2009.  It was our 1st visit to this hotel and we loved it.  We have stayed at numerous other Anaheim hotels including all three Disneyland Resort hotels.  We will definitely stay here again.  All the employees were great, we loved the continental breakfast, it was very quiet, and we especially loved the shuttle at night with a tired toddler.  We also appreciated that our room and my parents room were right next to each other.  Each morning my daughter could greet Grandma and Grandpa and ask if they were ready to go to Disneyland.  I would recommend this hotel to everyone and we will definitely be back.
Manager Response: Thank you for giving us the opportunity and staying at our hotel on your recent family vacation. I am so happy that your daughter was able to start the day with a pleasant greeting to grandma and grandpa, those memorable moments are extremely important. We do try and accommodate all requests as it pertains to room requests. I am happy to see that you will be returning and feel comfortable to call me directly as I would be delighted to assist. Warm regards!

Summary: This is our third stay at the Candy Cane Inn and each year it seems to improve.  The pricing is extremely competitive for the area and includes a breakfast and free shuttle to the Disney parks (though you could walk if so inclined).  The room was very clean and included a small fridge.  Breakfast is standard fare for this type of hotel: cold cereal, toast, muffins, bagels.  Things are kept stocked and fresh.  Breakfast shuts down when posted so don;t be late.  Timing is key as the breakfast rush strains seating capacity around the pool.  The shuttle worked very well and was timely for pickup and drop off.  Service was friendly from all and they do an amazing job.  They have allowed us to park our car to avoid Disney parking even on the day of departure.  This is a real hidden
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us for your past three visits. We do appreciate your business and taking time to share your experiences. It is our mission and goal to give our guests the utmost customer service while providing a clean, comfortable property and value at a moderate price point. Our owners are original and have been here for over 52 years and strive for perfection. Please feel free to call on me personally when you are returning as it would be my pleasure in assisting.

Summary Heading: Best hotel we've stayed at in the Disneyland area!
Summary: Great experience. Clean, friendly & efficient staff. Breakfast was good, and the grounds were beautifully kept. Nice open concept of hotel allows you to park your car in front of your room. (Hotel is U shaped with courtyard, parking, and pool in middle) Free Parking. 5 minute walk to Disneyland gates, but the hotel has a free shuttle running on a regular schedule also. Ask for a room on the second floor with a balcony in front of it. These are communal areas, but no one really used them - we sat out and had breakfast on the balcony in the warm california sun.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and posting your comments for other travelers. We can advertise and market the hotel however, word of mouth from actual guests is something that is unbiased and sends a strong message. The sitting areas on the second floor are nice for that quiet time relaxing or enjoying the peaceful setting. And, yes we do pride ourselves on being well maintained, clean and moderately priced with many complimentary features.

Summary: Another great stay. Tried a standard room this time and I was very pleased. I guess it is a bit smaller, but not in any way that matters. Parking was no problem, and after driving 8 hours I REALLY wanted to park!  Staff was wonderful as always. : ) One small problem with the room was dealt with very efficiently. Thanks again. See you in September!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and being a loyal repeat guest, we do appreciate your business. I am very sorry and apologize that you encountered an issue however, I am extremely happy that it was handled efficiently. Please feel free to contact me when making your September plans as it would be my pleasure in assisting you. And, DO NOT forget your Rewards Certificate that gives you $10 per night off the best available rate. And keep in mind this is in addition to AAA/AARP or any other discounts.

Summary: We flew in from Australia into LAX at 7 am.  We arrived by shuttle to the Candy Cane Inn at around 9.30 am.  The staff at the front desk were extremely helpful and let us check in early at no extra cost.  We were very tired after our 12 and a half hour flight from Brisbane and were greatful for our early check in and some much needed sleep.  The front desk reception staff were very helpful in organising our tours and private drivers to Hollywood, Seaworld, a museum, and Huntington beach.  Our standard room was comfortable enough for our family of 4.  We have a child who is 6 yrs old and a child who is 9 yrs old.  The beds were very comfy.  The free breaky was enough to start our day.    The shuttle bus was a good alternative to walking to or from the park, especially at the end
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us and I am so delighted that you clearly enjoyed your Holiday. Arriving early and the ability to check-in is something that will always make a long trip better and we allow this if rooms are prepared. Carla with her warm and genuine personality is one of our newest  team members and just a real pleasure. Amy being here longer who is studying hospitality and James, our long ambassador are guest service professionals. And, I do as well as they appreciate your warm comments. Yes, the new Anaheim Garden Walk offer many great dining options and is less walk than to Disney. Thank you again and warm regards!

Summary: This was my third stay at the Candy Cane Inn in 5 years.  I have come each time with my teen daughter.  It always has the same quality and relaxing feel to it.  It really looks like a Disney French Chateau, with flowers and fresh paint everywhere.  The beds are very comfortable.  You can see the fireworks from the balcony of one side of the Inn.  The pools stay open until 11 pm, to soak your sore feet or swim.  We frequently came back around 2 or 3 pm to rest and swim.  The pool was never crowded, even though the park reached capacity the day before our arrival and was very crowded everyday we were there. The breakfast bar had everything we needed.  I always check for other deals at other hotels and always go back to the CCI.  You can't beat it for value, convenience and beauty.
Manager Response: Thank you for continuing to stay with us, it is greatly appreciated. I will pass on your comments regarding decor suggestions. I do ask that guests take all into consideration when pricing hotels in the area as we certainly offer price value. Thank you again for your business and valuable feedback. Warm regards!

Summary: We recently stayed here for our trip to Disneyland.  Our room was very clean and the staff was friendly.  My daughter loved the pool!  We never needed to use the shuttle because Disneyland is an easy walk from the Candy Cane Inn, but...it's nice to know we could have used it because...your feet get pretty tired at Disneyland!  Everything was perfect and we will definitely be back again!  (I know it's a small thing...but my daughter was thrilled that they gave out little candy canes!  Nice touch!)  Beautiful property too.  We've been to Disneyland many times and my daughter (10) said this was her very favorite hotel and now she only wants to stay there when we return someday!  Thank you!  :  )
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Candy Cane Inn and staying with us on your recent trip to Disneyland. I am so delighted and happy to learn that we are your daughter's favorite hotel. Comfort, serenity and happiness are very important ingredients in guests selecting and returning for future visits. Please give my regards to your daughter and let her know Candy Canes are always in a basket at our entrance. Warm regards!

Summary: Very clean, quiet rooms and super helpful staff. I left my 2 year old's blankee and didn't realize it untill I was well on my way home. The Executive housekeeper was very helpful in locating and sending this beloved item quickly back to my wailing 2 year old...thank goodness. They have my undying patronage from this time on when a Disneyland trip is ever planned. This was a hospitality that I've never experienced at any other Hotel.  My older daughter was also meeting up with my family to accompany her baby sister's  first Disneyland experience. The hotel even gave us an extra parking pass so that she could park her car along with ours in the hotel parking...wow. Thank you from the bottom of my heart for the extra help and hospitality. Leah
Manager Response: Thank you for your vote of hospitality and staying with us, it is most appreciated! I am happy that your daughters were able to share a Disneyland experience and family time together. Danilo, our Executive Housekeeper does an exceptional job in tracking lost items and personally handles for their safe return. I am delighted your little ones blankee is now back in her arms. Please feel to contact me directly when your travels bring you back to the area as it would be my pleasure in assisting with reservations. Warm regards!

Summary: Our family of 3 early teens, mom, dad and grandmother stayed at the Candy Cane to visit  Disneyland.  Our rooms were adjoining as requested which helped with the sleeping arrangements.  Our rooms were also clean, fresh and roomy with safe, t.v., coffee maker, fridge and bathroom heater.  The air conditioning units were quiet so you could sleep at night and have them on if you chose to do so.  The staff were polite, friendly and constantly busy cleaning and maintaining the entire area.  The cobblestone driveway and courtyard were swept daily.  The slight problem with one of the toilets was corrected immediately with apologies from the staff for the problem.  The breakfast was a hit with everyone.  You can eat poolside, in the breakfast room or use the tray in your room to take
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us and we do appreciate your kind comments. We try and provide a feeling in that of home and making our guest's feel as family. Thank you again for your feedback, it is very detailed and does assist with travelers in choosing hotel accommodations. Warm regards!

Summary: The service was pleasant from check in to check out. It was our first time staying here after to coming to Disneyland for over 20 years. It is now "our" hotel. Nice clean rooms,quiet and beautiful green surroundings . We loved the turn down service, and in room breakfast, the special popcorn box arrival goodies were very cute! One of my favorite things about staying here was their very own shuttle. It was prompt and never skipped a beat. The drivers were so very friendly,professional and kind. I could not have had a better experience.
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us the opportunity and being our guest on your recent Disneyland visit. I am delighted that you enjoyed the amenities of our Premium Rooms and the extra's they offer. I do appreciate your kind comments regarding our drivers. Mr. Lee, Robert and Fred are superb gentlemen and I am proud they are on the Candy Cane team. Thank you again for your business and feel free to contact me directly should you need reservations assistance. Warm regards!

Summary Heading: Nowhere else could be as perfect
Summary: We travelled from the UK on a package tour with Virgin Holidays, staying for a week prior to moving on to San Diego and San Francisco for the second week. On the basis of the reviews on Trip Advisor I asked Virgin if we could book an independent stay whilst in Anaheim and luckily they agreed.  We booked one of the premium rooms and were very pleased with the one allocated. We made good use of the extra facilities, such as having breakfast delivered to the room. Our first full day was a Sunday and we'd planned to go to Magic Morning at 7am and hadn't really expected to get breakfast but it arrived with perfect timing.  As everyone says, the grounds are stunning and makes for a very fragrant walk to and from the room.  We did have breakfast round the pool area a few times too and
Manager Response: Thank you for giving us the opportunity on your recent vacation to California. I am happy that you enjoyed your accommodations and the extra services provided with our Premium Rooms. Yes, our pool is heated year round and is most enjoyable later in the evening when relaxing after a busy day on your feet. We do appreciate your business and, thank you for your sharing your experience here and with friends at home.

Summary: Myself, husband, daughter and 8year old granddaughter were there recently for a 5 night stay.  it was as good as I expected it to be.  The room, though not large, was very clean and was sufficiently large enough for us to put a twin size air bed up at night.  We had requested a  2nd story room so that noise from someone above us would not be a problem.  We did not have any issues with noise from neighbors or foot traffice the whole time we were there.  We enjoyed having breakfast out by the pool area and a couple of times brought it back to or room.  The shuttle bus was wonderful and we used it several times a day, we would come back to our room to swim and relax in the afternoon. It was a beautiful place and would stay here again and recommend it to anyone
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your experience and feedback. We do have a top shelf housekeeping department and it is a pleasure for all our guests. This is a very important item in today's travel and I thank you for your positive comment on cleanliness. We do appreciate your business and feel free to contact me directly should you be returning and need assistance with reservations.

Summary: Chose the Candy Cane based on the excellent reviews and we were not disapointed.   We had three rooms total and had no problems with any of the rooms.  The grounds are spectacular!  They made a perfect backdrop for family pictures and for eating breakfast around the pool or the secluded table outside our room.  The pool was extremely warm and inviting.  The walk to the park was pretty easy.  We stayed at the Disneyland hotel last time and we thought this walk was actually a little shorter.  But the shuttle came in handy at the end of the day when we were tired.  Rooms were clean and beds were comfortable.  The maids even took the extra time to prop up my childrens lttlle stuffed animals around their bed, which really excited my little ones.  We will have such fond memories of
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us the opportunity and staying with on your recent visit to Disneyland. Our gardeners certainly do a very nice job in maintaining the greenery and yes it makes for a peaceful setting and great for pictures. In regards to our rating, it certainly is NOT due to our service, quality, ambiance or cleanliness. The phrase that has been given by the AAA inspector is the lack of free floor space and therefore the rating is based solely on size of rooms. This is something we cannot easily change and thus we concentrate on items that enhance our guest's experience. Thank you again and warm regards!

Summary: We stayed at the Candy Cane Inn after being highly recommended by the lady at Disney travel.  We were not disappointed at all.  Upon arrival we were completely impressed with the landscaping and flowers surrounding this hotel.  They look and smell every bit as beautiful as the flowers at Disneyland.  The staff was wonderful and courteous.  Everyone was bending over backwards to help us and make our stay enjoyable.  This place is so clean, I couldn't believe it.  The ground is meticulously cleaned, not a cigarette butt in site!  I saw a guy pressure washing the pavement twice.  When we arrived at noon there was a room available, so we got to check in early.  The rooms are gorgeous, and CLEAN. Plenty of towels for everyone in the family.  The bed was comfy, and you get extra
Manager Response: Thank you for giving us the opportunity and staying at the Candy Cane Inn. We do have a long standing exceptional relationship with Walt Disney Travel. We visit their sales office twice per year to brief them of any changes or upgrades to maintain their knowledge of our property. It is always refreshing to know that they enjoy selling our Inn as it speaks to their and our mutual goal of guest satisfaction. Thank you again for all of your kind comments and your business. Warm regards!

Summary Heading: Amazing service and hospitality with staff that went the extra mile every day!
Summary: I came to tripadvisor to read other reviews before deciding on a hotel for my birthday trip to Disneyland. My boyfriend and I stayed in the handicap room at the far end of the hotel. The entire trip, before and after, was flawless. The staff at the CCI was remarkable! They were friendly, made sure all of our needs were met, and even sent cookies to our room with a card wishing me a happy birthday. The breakfast was always well stocked and had plenty to choose from. This was a nice part of my stay. i was on a budget and not having to worry about the most important meal of the day was awesome!   I want to take time to thank the management and staff. Everyone was super friendly and helpful. I was worried, being a gay couple, how we would be received. This proved not to be any worry
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and I am sincerely delighted that your 26th Birthday celebration was flawless. Our staff read tripadvisor and will be happy to see your recognition and I thank you for the kind comments. I believe that you can have the most beautiful property, however, the genuine care and concern is what makes ones stay enjoyable. Please feel free to contact me directly should you wish to celebrate your 27th with us as it would be my pleasure in assisting with reservations. Warm regards!

Summary Heading: My all-time favorite non-Disney place to stay!
Summary: We arrived in Anaheim at around 9:30am, a lot earlier than we had expected to and headed straight to the Candy Cane, thinking we would just ask if we could park our car and head to the parks. To our surprise and delight, we were able to check in to our hotel room at that time! We were so tired from our 7 hour drive that it was so nice to get into the room and rest for a while. This was my first time staying in a Deluxe room and it was very nice and clean. The beds were so comfortable and we looked forward to coming back to our room after being at Disneyland. The front desk staff, housekeeping and gardeners were all very kind and cheerful and always said "hello" to us when we walked by them. The breakfast was nice (bagels, muffins, bread, donuts and fruit to eat as well as
Manager Response: Thank you for being a loyal Candy Cane Inn guest, your business is sincerely appreciated. I do appreciate you noticing the friendliness of our staff they too read tripadvisor for feedback and continually strive to improve. Yes, our expanded continental breakfast is something our guests appreciate and enjoying poolside in the morning is relaxing. Please feel free to contact me directly when you are returning as it would be my pleasure in assisting with reservations. Warm regards!

Summary Heading: A perfect hotel walking distance to Disney
Summary: There are numerous hotel choices around Disneyland.  We stayed in a distant hotel with a shuttle the first time we visited.  Two disadvantages:  it was inconvenient and time-consuming to take a break and return to the hotel during the day, there was usually a wait and a line to board the shuttle bus.  Our second visit to Disneyland, we chose a reasonably-priced hotel that was within walking distance.  Though the location was ideal, the hotel (Park Place) was dated, noisy, mediocre.  Our recent trip, we were absolutely delighted with the Candy Cane Inn.  It was immaculate , very reasonably-priced, beautiful grounds, nice amenities (pool, mini-fridge).  Management was very helpful, the breakfast buffet was better than most.    Though they offer a shuttle, the walk was less than 10
Manager Response: Thank you for giving us the opportunity as your "home away from home" on your last visit to Disneyland. We are certainly delighted that you enjoyed your visit. We do aspire to be a moderately priced hotel with higher than expected price value. In regards to internet, we do offer complimentary WIFI throughout guestrooms, our garden room and poolside. Also, we do have a microwave oven in our garden room that is available 24 hours per day for your convenience. Thank you again for you feedback and make sure to use your Rewards Certificate on your next stay with us.

Summary Heading: Nice hotel if you are going to Disney, if not, lots of traffic
Summary: Overall, the Candy Cane Inn was acceptable. It would be great for families going to Disney. Disney was just a few blocks away and the hotel offered complimentary shuttle service to the park. Because Disney was so close, the traffic and noise level were very high. We did not go to Disney, so this was a problem. You could literally hear people at the park screaming on the roller coasters until 11 or 12 at night. Then there was the noise from all the families coming back from the park at the end of the day. Plus, with lots of families comes lots of kids, who are also very loud.   Speaking of the noise, the walls of the hotel were very thin. My husband and I could hear the TV in the room next to us. We could also hear people outside our room on the sidewalk talking. The noise was
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us and I appreciate your feedback. You are certainly correct that if you are not enjoying the Disney Theme Parks then maybe this is not your best choice. We understand that children and families are on vacation however we do attempt to keep things respectable. Again, we do appreciate your business and welcome your comments. Warm regards!

Summary: This hotel is the greatest hotel next to Disneyland.  Its is so nice and clean and at a great price.   Very Homey and Beautiful grounds.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us and taking time to reflect on your feelings about our Inn. Comments such as yours are nice to read as I know our entire team what they do and it shows with the long standing relationships that have been developed. We do appreciate your staying with us and warm guests assist in keeping our atmosphere homey!

Summary: I decided on Candy Cane Inn after reading the posts here on TripAdvisor, glad I did.  It was a great choice, lovely grounds, nice room, very helpful and friendly desk people. We did change rooms due to too many children running past our room, guess it's to be expected staying right next to Disneyland!  Second room was quieter but I had a hard time getting on the wi-fi. The very nice desk lady was very helpful and even let me use her laptop in the office.  Of course after I got back to the room my internet popped up! We didn't eat at the breakfast buffet, had our own. It did look very crowded but I didn't hear anyone complaining about it.   The shuttle bus was a godsend as my friend is handicapped and had a hard time walking very far so it saved us from driving over.  The bus was
Manager Response: Thank you so much for giving us the opportunity and staying with us. I am delighted that you are glad you did and appreciate your feedback regarding the wifi. We continually work with our provider to enhance the service and the more information we have the better it serves them. Yes, our gardeners do a wonderful job in maintaining and I thank you for commenting on this. Warm regards!

Summary Heading: loved it!! wont stay anywhere else!
Summary: staff was fabulous and kind! the breakfast was great to have and filled us up most of the day! We were planning on staying in the park our first trip but a friend recommended candy cane. We are so glad we listened. We wont stay anywhere else when we visit disneyland!
Manager Response: I appreciate the fact that you listened to your friend and thank you for giving us the opportunity. Please make sure you use your Rewards Certificate for your next stay.  You can always feel free to contact me directly for reservations assistance as it would be my pleasure. Thank you for your business!

Summary: We have stayed at the Candy Cane many times(at least 10) and have always been happy to be there. The staff always goes out of their way to make sure everything is great.  I get so euphoric just walking out of the rooms and smelling the beautiful flowers everywhere and enjoying the beautiful , well-kept grounds.  You will not go wrong choosing this wonderful motel.  We are very disappointed that we cannot stay there anymore since we are now a family of 8 and cannot afford 2 rooms, but if we visit with less children , we will definitely stay again.  Thanks so much for all our past cordial stays.
Manager Response: Thank you for writing and sharing your comments regarding your love for our Inn. A growing family is enjoyable (and costly) and I ask that you watch for any reduced rates we may be offering. Also, please take into consideration when comparing our hotel to others as we have no additional costs..ie..Shuttle, expanded continental breakfast, parking, resort fees or additional fees that many hotels are charging. And you can feel free to contact me and I will be happy to look at dates and rates with you as we DO appreciate our loyal guests!

Summary Heading: Great Place to stay, location, location, location!!!"
Summary: My husband and our three daughters aged 11,10 & 8 stayed at the Candy Cane Inn for a week in May.  It is a great hotel, very clean and tidy and it is fabulously located.  A short 10 -15 minute walk to Disneyland, (they had a shuttle bus but we never used it, and walking was quicker).  There is a small mini mart next door and a 7/11 two doors down.  A short stroll up the street are many eating establishments including The Cheesecake Factory which served delicious healthy meals at a reasonable price. The staff at the Candy Cane Inn were very helpful and friendly.  Our room was a little small as we needed a roll-away, but after removing a couple of chairs, it was fine.  We would stay here again anytime.  Great Hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and I am delighted you and your family enjoyed your visit. Yes, the addition of the Anaheim Gardenwalk is certainly nice and close with many dining selections too. I appreciate you comments about our staff and they too enjoy providing exceptional guest service and also reading feedback. Please use your Rewards Certificate on your next visit and feel free to contact me directly for reservations assistance. Warm regards!

Summary Heading: Each stay is better than the one before!!
Summary: My family, including my parents stayed at the Candy Cane Inn the first week of May. We tried the Premium rooms for the first time, and let me tell you...they are the way to go!! First of all, having your breakfast delivered to your room in the morning at the time you request it is priceless! Anyone who had a problem with the so-called crowded breakfast room should just upgrade to the premium room, and problem solved! The robes were a nice touch, and our little boy loved the mints left with the turn-down service. The nicer toiletries were also a definate plus. Would we spend a little extra money to upgrade to the premium room? ABSOLUTELY!! The shuttle is great at the end of the day, and the drivers are always very courteous and greeted the kids with a high-five sometimes. The
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for staying with us and I am delighted that "Grandma" enjoyed her first stay at the Candy Cane Inn. Our Premium rooms are certainly a nice upgrade if you like the "extras" and most folks get "hooked" once they experience them. I did enjoy the cookies (as did our staff) and I sincerely appreciate your kind gesture...though it was not necessary at all! I am glad that you have become a member of our family and look forward in seeing you again in the future. Warm regards!

Summary Heading: the happiest place in our world every time we come out!
Summary: we have been staying at the candy cane for at least 15 years! it makes the long drive there worth it.   our daughter is disabled and you always make us more then comfortable, thank you for that, we love coming there and staying with you. a very satisfied family.
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for your continued business and being a loyal Candy Cane Inn guest...it IS appreciated! I am delighted that we are able make you and your daughters stay more comfortable. Genuine care and concern is the foundation of hospitality and it warms my heart to learn that this is extended to your family. Warm regards!

Summary: I am online searching availability and rates for our upcoming trip to Disneyland and realized I never wrote a review for my last visit!  My son and I visited Disneyland for the 1st time in March to celebrate his 4th birthday.  We left dad and baby sisters at home for this trip.  Because I was traveling alone with my son I was searching for a clean, safe hotel not too far from the park.  After MUCH research and reading reviews, I decided to go with Candy Cane Inn.  I am SO glad to have discovered this hotel and plan to stay for every visit we make.  We just bought the annual pass, so hope to visit frequently!  :)  I called the 800# to make reservations and everything went smoothly.  My son and I arrived earlier than check-in, but we were able to check in right away.  The room was
Manager Response: I am very happy that your son enjoyed our friendly Inn and his 4th birthday celebration. James is the Candy Cane Inn "Ambassador" and continues to make friends with children and adults alike.  I would be delighted to assist you with reservations for your upcoming visit. Please feel free to call and ask for me directly as it would be my pleasure. Thank you again for your business and feedback!

Summary: We loved the close proximity to the park.  Though the hotel offers a shuttle, we chose to walk (most of the time!).  It took us just a few minutes to get there, and the flowers along the way (and at the hotel) were breathtaking.  The beds and pillows were very comfortable, and the staff was very friendly and helpful.   The room, refrigerator and pool were all very small, the television didn't seem to work properly, and the facility overall was (at times) pretty noisy, but other than that we did enjoy our stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and providing us with your valuable feedback. I appologize that your television was not working properly and I am not sure if you called for assistance or not. We do have maintenance personnel on duty seven days per week and could have changed out. In regards to noise we try and keep operational noise to a minimum as being a family hotel there is already noise concerns. Thank you again and I am glad you enjoyed your stay.

Summary: I chose the Candy Cane based on a friend's recommendation.  Staff are excellent, rooms and bathrooms are super-clean, comfortable, good lighting for reading or working.  Good value (my conference hotel was much too expensive).  There were many families with young children, but noise level was low and I slept well.  Thanks for the good and free wireless internet access and helping me book my airport shuttle.
Manager Response: We are happy that you listened to your friend and gave us the opportunity during your recent visit. Our location and proximity to the convention center as well as Disney is often overlooked. We do offer value for the moderately priced traveler with the charm and quaintness of a smaller property. Thank you again for your business.

Summary Heading: This hotel will complete your Disneyland experience
Summary: I stay at the Candy Cane Inn every time I come to Disneyland.  It is very consistent as far as the friendliness and helpfulness of the staff and the cleanliness of the room.  The breakfast is great.  It starts your DIsney experience off right, without having to wait in the long lines at a restaurant.  The shuttle service is also very nice, with the buses running every half hour to and from the park.  Even if you miss the shuttle, the hotel is close enough to walk to and from the park.  My daughter and I drove in from Phoenix and arrived very early but they still allowed us to check in.  It is always such an awesome experience, I just can't imagine staying anywhere else when I go visit Mickey.  Heigh ho.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us once again, we DO appreciate your loyalty and business. In regards to your early check-in we try and accommodate this request whenever possible. We understanding that you want to get over and see Mickey as soon as possible. Warm regards!

Summary Heading: Best alternative to being ripped off by staying inside the Park
Summary: The rooms - and we had a 'premium' one - are only ok; clean but a little on the old-fashioned side. And the breakfast arrangements are in a poolside area that can't accommodate all the guests comfortably. But it's a lovely looking place; the rate is great for the area; it's a five minute stroll to the disney park entrances (and there's a shuttle too). Easily the best alternative to paying through the nose by staying inside the Parks. Personally, found the service a little offhanded. But maybe it was just my experience.
